# language_name:        Sea Island Creole English
# closest ISO 639-3:    gul
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1998
# year_long:            1923-1989, 1936
# vernacular_title:     De Nyew Testament
# english_title:        New Testament in Sea Island Creole

# notes:                
40001001	Dis yah de people wa dey write down say been kin ta Jedus Christ , fom way back ta Abraham time . Jedus come out fom King David fambly , an King David come out fom Abraham fambly .
40001002	Abraham been de fada ob Isaac . Isaac been de fada ob Jacob . Jacob been de fada ob Judah an e broda dem .
40001003	Judah been de fada ob Perez an Zerah , an dey modda been Tamar . Perez been de fada ob Hezron . Hezron been de fada ob Ram .
40001004	Ram been de fada ob Amminadab . Amminadab been de fada ob Nahshon . Nahshon been de fada ob Salmon .
40001005	Salmon been de fada ob Boaz , an e modda been Rahab . Boaz been de fada ob Obed , an e modda been Ruth . Obed been de fada ob Jesse .
40001006	Jesse been de fada ob King David . David been de fada ob Solomon , an e modda been Uriah wife .
40001007	Solomon been de fada ob Rehoboam . Rehoboam been de fada ob Abijah . Abijah been de fada ob Asa .
40001008	Asa been de fada ob Jehoshaphat . Jehoshaphat been de fada ob Joram . Joram been de fada ob Uzziah .
40001009	Uzziah been de fada ob Jotham . Jotham been de fada ob Ahaz . Ahaz been de fada ob Hezekiah .
40001010	Hezekiah been de fada ob Manasseh . Manasseh been de fada ob Amon . Amon been de fada ob Josiah .
40001011	Josiah been de fada ob Jechoniah an e broda dem . Dey been bon wen de people fom Babylon come een pon de Israel people an cyaa um off wid um ta Babylon an pit um een slabery .
40001012	Atta dey enemy dem pit um een slabery an cyaa um off ta Babylon , Shealtiel been bon . Jechoniah been de fada ob Shealtiel . Shealtiel been de fada ob Zerubbabel .
40001013	Zerubbabel been de fada ob Abiud . Abiud been de fada ob Eliakim . Eliakim been de fada ob Azor .
40001014	Azor been de fada ob Zadok . Zadok been de fada ob Achim . Achim been de fada ob Eliud .
40001015	Eliud been de fada ob Eleazar . Eleazar been de fada ob Matthan . Mattah been de fada ob Jacob .
40001016	Jacob been de fada ob Joseph . Joseph been Mary husban , an Jedus , wa dey call Christ , been Mary son .
40001017	So den , dey been foteen generation ( fom granfada ta granchile ) fom Abraham time ta King David time . An dey been foteen generation fom King David time ta de time wen de people fom Babylon pit um een slabery an cyaa um off ta Babylon . An dey been foteen generation fom den ta de time wen Jedus Christ bon .
40001018	Now dis yah wa happen wen Jedus Christ bon . Jedus modda Mary been gage fa marry Joseph . Bot , fo dey git marry an Joseph cyaa um fa lib wid um , dey find out dat Mary been speckin . An dat been de powa ob de Holy Sperit wa mek dat happen .
40001019	Now Joseph wa been gage fa marry Mary , e been a man wa waak scraight wid God , an e ain been wahn fa see Mary come ta no open shame . So Joseph mek op e mind fa paat wid Mary an keep um hush op .
40001020	E beena study haad bout wa e gwine do , wen de Lawd sen a angel ta um een a dream . De angel tell um say , “ Joseph , ya wa come out fom King David fambly , mus dohn be scaid fa marry Mary . Cause de chile wa e speckin , dat wa de Holy Sperit mek happen .
40001021	E gwine hab son , an ya mus gim de name Jedus , cause e gwine sabe e people fom dey sin . ”
40001022	Now all dis happen so dat wa de Lawd done tell de prophet say gwine happen , e happen fa true . E say ,
40001023	“ One nyoung ooman dat ain neba know no man , e gwine be wid chile . E gwine hab son , an dey gwine call de chile Emmanuel . ” ( Dat mean fa say , God right yah wid we . )
40001024	So wen Joseph wake op , e done wa de Lawd angel chaage um fa do . E gone an marry Mary .
40001025	Bot Joseph neba tetch Mary til e done hab e son . An Joseph name de chile Jedus .
40002001	Now Jedus been bon een Betlem town , een Judea , jurin de same time wen Herod been king . Atta Jedus been bon , some wise man dem dat study bout de staa dem come ta Jerusalem fom weh dey been een de east .
40002002	An dey aks say , “ Weh de chile da , wa bon fa be de Jew people king ? We beena see de staa wa tell bout um een de east , an we come fa woshup um op . ”
40002003	Wen King Herod yeh dat , e been opsot fa true . An ebrybody een Jerusalem been opsot too .
40002004	E call togeda all de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Jew Law teacha dem . E aks um say . “ Weh de Messiah gwine be bon at ? ”
40002005	Dey tell King Herod say , “ E gwine be bon een Betlem town een Judea . Cause de prophet write say ,
40002006	‘ Betlem een Judah lan , ya sompin fa sho
40002007	So King Herod sen fa de man dem dat done come fom de east fa meet wid um , bot e ain tell nobody bout de meetin . Den Herod aks dem man fa tell um de zact time wen dey fus see dat staa .
40002008	E tell um say , “ Oona mus go ta Betlem an look roun good fa de chile . Wen oona find um , mus come back an leh me know , so dat A kin go mesef fa woshup um op too . ”
40002009	Atta dem man yeh wa de king say , dey gone on , an dey see de same staa dat dey beena see wen dey been back een de east . Dey folla dat staa til dey git ta de place weh de chile been , an den dat staa ain gone no foda .
40002010	Wen de man dem fom de east see dat staa dey , dey been too glad . Dey been glad til dey ain know wa fa do .
40002011	Dey gone eenta de house , an dey see de chile dey wid e modda , Mary . Den dey kneel down fo de chile an woshup um op . An dey open op dey bag an tek out de rich ting dey beena cyaa long wid um fa gii de chile . Dey gim gole , frankincense , an myrrh .
40002012	Now den , de Lawd come ta dem man een a dream an waan um , tell um say , “ Mus dohn go back fa tell King Herod nottin . ” So dey gone noda way back ta weh dey come fom .
40002013	Atta de man dem fom de east done gone , de Lawd sen one angel een a dream fa waan Joseph . De angel tell um say , “ King Herod gwine come look fa de chile , fa kill um . Ya mus git op , tek de chile an e modda an ron way right now ta Egypt lan . Stay dey til A tell oona fa come back fom dey . ”
40002014	So Joseph git op , e tek de chile an e modda an gone een de night time ta Egypt lan .
40002015	E stay dey til King Herod been dead . Wa de Lawd been tell de prophet fa say gwine happen , e happen fa true . E been say , “ A call me Son fa come out fom Egypt lan . ”
40002016	Wen King Herod find out dat de man dem fom de east done fool um good , e been mad down . E gii orda ta e sodja dem say , “ Mus kill all de boy chullun een Betlem an een de whole arie roun bout . Mus kill all dem two yeah ole an nyounga . ” De king done dat cause ob wa dem man fom de east done tell um bout de time wen dey fus beena see de staa .
40002017	Dis mek wa de prophet Jeremiah done say come true . E say ,
40002018	“ Dey yeh a nise da come outta Ramah ,
40002019	Atta Herod done dead , de Lawd sen e angel een a dream ta Joseph dey een Egypt lan . E tell um say ,
40002020	“ Mus git op an tek de chile an e modda an gone back ta Israel lan , cause dem dat beena try fa kill de chile done dead . ”
40002021	So den Joseph git op an tek de chile an e modda an gone back ta Israel .
40002022	Bot wen Joseph yeh say dat Archelaus been tek e fada Herod place fa rule een Judea , e been scaid fa go dey fa lib . De Lawd sen e angel fa waan Joseph , tell um een a dream wa fa do . So Joseph gone ta de arie call Galilee .
40002023	E gone fa lib een one town dey name Nazareth . So wa de prophet dem done say bout Jedus , e come true . Dey been say , “ Dey gwine say e de man fom Nazareth . ”
40003001	Een dat time , John wa Bactize come ta de wildaness een Judea , an e staat fa preach dey .
40003002	E tell um say , “ Oona mus change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo . Cause de time mos yah wen God gwine rule oba we ! ”
40003003	John been de man wa de prophet Isaiah beena taak bout wen e say ,
40003004	John cloes been mek wid camel hair , an de belt roun e wais been mek wid animal hide . E beena nyam locust an wile honey .
40003005	A whole heapa people come fa yeh um , fom Jerusalem , fom all ob Judea , an fom all de whole arie close ta de Jerden Riba .
40003006	Dey beena tell all de sinful ting dat dey done done , an dey aks God fa fagib um . Den John beena bactize um een de Jerden Riba .
40003007	Heapa de Pharisee an de Sadducee dem beena come fa hab John bactize um . Wen John shim , e tell um say , “ Oona wickity , jes like snake ! Who tell oona dat ef oona git bactize , oona kin git way fom de jedgiment wa God gwine sen fa punish oona ?
40003008	Oona mus do dem ting wa show oona done change oona way fa true .
40003009	An oona mus dohn tink say , ‘ We de chullun ob Abraham . ’ Dat ain gwine sabe oona . A da tell oona , God able fa tek dem stone yah an ton um eenta Abraham chullun !
40003010	Now de ax ta de foot ob de tree , ready fa cut um . Ebry tree wa ain beah good fruit , God gwine cut um down an chunk um een de fire .
40003011	A da bactize oona wid wata fa show dat oona done change oona sinful way . Bot one man wa hab heap mo tority den me gwine come . A ain fit fa eben tote e shoe . E gwine bactize oona wid de Holy Sperit an wid fire .
40003012	E gwine jedge de people an separate um op like a faama wa hab e pitfork een e han fa separate de chaff fom de wheat . E gwine geda de good wheat an pit um een e baan . Bot de chaff , e gwine bun um een de ebalastin fire . ”
40003013	Den Jedus come fom Galilee an gone ta de Jerden Riba . E gone fa hab John bactize um .
40003014	Bot John ain wahn fa gree fa bactize Jedus . E tell Jedus say , “ A oughta hab ya bactize me . Ya ain oughta come fa me fa bactize ya , ainty ? ”
40003015	Jedus tell John say , “ Leh we do um de way A say fa now . E fittin fa we fa do all wa God tell we fa do . ” So den John gree fa do wa Jedus say .
40003016	Atta John done bactize Jedus , Jedus come op outta de wata . Jes den God open op de eliment . An Jedus see God Sperit da come down like a dob an light pon um .
40003017	Den dey yeh a boice fom heaben say , “ Dis yah me own Son wa A da lob . E pledja me tommuch . ”
40004001	Atta dat , de Holy Sperit lead Jedus eenta de wildaness , weh de Debil try fa mek um do sompin e ain oughta do .
40004002	Wen Jedus ain nyam nottin fa foty day an foty night , e been hongry down .
40004003	De Debil , wa try fa mek people do ebil ting , come ta Jedus dey an tell um say , “ Since ya God Son , chaage dese rock yah fa ton eenta bread . ”
40004004	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dey done write down een God Book say , ‘ E tek mo den sompin fa nyam fa mek people lib fa true . E tek ebry wod dat come outta God mout . ’ ”
40004005	Den de Debil cyaa Jedus ta de holy city Jerusalem . E pit um way op pontop de mos high paat ob God House .
40004006	E tell Jedus say , “ Since ya God Son , shrow yasef down fom yah . Cause dey done write down een God Book say ,
40004007	Jedus tell de Debil say , “ Dey done write down noda ting een God Book , say , ‘ Mus dohn try fa test de Lawd ya God . ’ ”
40004008	Atta dat , de Debil tek Jedus op ta a high place an show um all de country dem een de whole wol wid all dey powa an all dey purty ting wa dey got .
40004009	De Debil tell Jedus say , “ A gwine gii ya all dem ting ef ya bow down an woshup me op . ”
40004010	Jedus tell um say , “ Git way fom yah , Satan ! Cause dey done write down een God Book say , ‘ Mus woshup de Lawd ya God an mus dohn saab nobody cep um . ’ ”
40004011	Den de Debil lef Jedus , an de angel dem come fa tek cyah ob um .
40004012	Wen Jedus yeh dat dey done pit John eenta de jailhouse , e gone back ta Galilee .
40004013	Bot e ain gone ta Nazareth . E gone fa lib een Capernaum , one willage close ta Lake Galilee , een de arie ob Zebulun an Naphtali .
40004014	Dis happen fa mek come true wa de prophet Isaiah done been say ,
40004015	“ Een Zebulun an Naphtali lan ,
40004016	dem people beena lib een de daak .
40004017	Fom dat time dey , Jedus staat fa tell all de people say , “ Oona mus change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo . Cause de time mos yah wen God gwine rule oba oona ! ”
40004018	Jedus beena waak long de sho ta Lake Galilee wen e see two broda dey wa been fishaman . Dey name been Simon , wa dey call Peter , an e broda Andrew . Dey beena cyas dey net eenta de wata fa ketch fish .
40004019	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus come folla me ! Oona beena ketch fish , bot tareckly , A gwine laan oona fa ketch people fa me . ”
40004020	Soon as e say dat , dey lef dey fishin net an gone long wid Jedus fa folla um .
40004021	Jedus gone on fom dey , an e see two oda broda name James an John . Dey Zebedee son dem . Dey been dey een dey boat wid dey fada Zebedee , da mend dey fishin net . Jedus call um fa come folla um .
40004022	Scraight way , James an John lef de boat an dey fada , an dey gone wid Jedus .
40004023	Jedus gone all shru Galilee . E beena laan de people een de Jew meetin house dem , an e tell um de Good Nyews bout how God da come fa rule . An e heal all kind ob ailment dat de people hab .
40004024	De nyews bout Jedus spread all oba Syria country , an de people come ta um . Dey come da tote all de sick people dat hab all diffunt kind ob ailment . Some dem beena suffa plenty pain an some hab ebil sperit eenside um . Some hab fits an some ob dem ain able fa eben moob . Dey all come ta Jedus , an e heal dem op .
40004025	A great big crowd ob people gone long wid Jedus . Dey come fom Galilee , fom de Ten Town , an fom Jerusalem , an Judea an de arie pon de oda side ob de Jerden Riba , an dey all folla Jedus .
40005001	Wen Jedus see all de crowd dem , e gone pontop one high hill . E seddown dey , an e ciple dem come geda roun um .
40005002	Den Jedus staat fa laan um . E say ,
40005003	“ Dey bless fa true , dem people wa ain hab no hope een deysef ,
40005004	Dey bless fa true , dem wa saaful now ,
40005005	Dey bless fa true , dem wa ain tink dey mo den wa dey da ,
40005006	Dey bless fa true , dem wa hongry an tosty fa wa right ,
40005007	Dey bless fa true , dem wa hab mussy pon oda people ,
40005008	Dey bless fa true , dem dat only wahn fa jes saab de Lawd ,
40005009	Dey bless fa true , dem wa da wok haad fa hep people lib peaceable wid one noda ,
40005010	Dey bless fa true , dem wa oda people mek suffa cause dey da waak scraight wid God ,
40005011	“ Ya bless fa true wen people hole ya cheap an mek ya suffa an wen dey say all kind ob bad ting bout ya wa ain true , cause ya da folla me .
40005012	Mus be glad fa true , cause ya gwine git a whole heapa good ting dat God da keep fa ya een heaben . Ya mus memba dat de people wa mek ya suffa dem ting yah , dey ole people done de same ting ta de prophet dem wa lib way back dey .
40005013	“ Oona jes like salt fa all people . Bot ef de salt done loss e taste , ain no way ya kin mek um git e good taste back , ainty ? Dat salt dey ain good fa nottin , cep chunk um out .
40005014	“ Oona jes like light fa de whole wol . Ain no way ya kin hide a city wa people build pontop a hill .
40005015	An ain nobody light a lamp an den pit um ondaneet a bushel basket . Steada dat , dey pit de lamp op pontop de table , weh e da shine so all de people een de house kin see .
40005016	Same way so , ya mus leh ya light shine een front ob people , so dey kin see de good ting ya da do . Den dey gwine praise ya Fada God een heaben !
40005017	“ Ya mus dohn tink say dat A come fa git rid ob de Law wa God gii Moses , needa wa de prophet dem beena laan de people . A ain come fa git rid ob dem . A come fa mek ebryting happen wa dey say been gwine happen .
40005018	A da tell oona fa true , long as de heaben an de whole wol las , ain nottin een God Law gwine be git rid ob , not eben de leeleetles pen maak needa de leeleetles pint , til all dat de law taak bout done happen fa true .
40005019	Ef somebody ain do wa eben de leeleetles one ob dem Law dat God gii we say , an ef e laan oda people , say dey ain got fa do um needa , God gwine mek dat poson hab de mos low place weh God da rule . Bot dem wa da do wa de Law dat God gii we say , an da laan oda people fa do um too , God gwine gii dem a place high op weh God da rule .
40005020	So den , A tell oona say , ya ain gwine go ta heaben weh God da rule ef ya ain scraight wid God mo den de Jew Law teacha dem an de Pharisee dem .
40005021	“ Oona done yeh dat dey beena laan de Jew people way back dey , say , ‘ Ya mus dohn kill nobody . Dey gwine cyaa de poson ta court wa kill somebody . ’
40005022	Bot A tell oona say , whosoneba git mad op wid e neighba , dey gwine cyaa um ta court . Whosoneba shrow slam pon e neighba say , ‘ Ya ain good fa nottin , ’ dey gwine cyaa um ta de Jew High Court fa jedge um . An whosoneba tell e neighba say , ‘ Ya fool ! ’ dat bad nuff fa mek um go suffa een de fire ob hell .
40005023	So den , ef ya staat fa gii ya gif ta God dey fo de alta een God House , an ya memba dat ya neighba got sompin ginst ya ,
40005024	ya mus lef ya gif dey een front de alta an go scraight ta ya neighba . Fus ya mus mek peace wid um . Den ya kin come back ta God House an gii ya gif ta God .
40005025	“ Ef anybody aagy wid one ob oona an e da cyaa ya ta courthouse , den ya mus try fa settle wid um fo ya git dey . Cause ef ya git ta de courthouse , e gwine han ya oba ta de jedge . An de jedge , e gwine han ya oba ta de police , an dey gwine chunk ya eenta de jailhouse .
40005026	A da tell oona fa true , ya gwine stay een de jailhouse til ya pay de las cent ob de fine wa ya owe .
40005027	“ Oona yeh dat dey beena laan de people say , ‘ A man mus dohn sleep wid noda man wife . ’
40005028	Bot A da tell oona say , de man wa look pon a ooman wa ain e wife an wahn fa sleep wid um , dat man done sleep wid dat ooman een e haat .
40005029	So ef ya right eye da mek ya sin , dig um out an chunk um way ! Fa sho , e mo betta fa loss jes one paat ob ya body , den fa leh ya whole body git chunk eenta hell .
40005030	Ef ya right han da mek ya sin , cut um off an chunk um way ! Fa sho , e mo betta fa loss jes one paat ob ya body , den fa leh ya whole body git chunk eenta hell .
40005031	“ Oona yeh too wa dey beena say , ‘ Ef a man worce e wife , e haffa write paper an gim ta de ooman fa show e done worce fom um . ’
40005032	Bot A da tell oona say , ef any man worce e wife wen dat ooman ain sleep wid noda man , dat husban sponsable wen e wife git marry gin , fa mek de ooman lib een sin , cause e da sleep wid noda man . An de oda man dat marry de ooman wa done been worce dat way , dat man da lib een sin too . E da sleep wid noda man wife .
40005033	“ Oona yeh too dat dey beena laan de people way back , say , ‘ Wen ya gii ya wod an sweah ya gwine do sompin fa true , ya mus do wa ya promise fo de Lawd fa do . ’
40005034	Bot A da tell oona say , Mus dohn sweah tall , say ‘ A sweah ta heaben , ’ cause een heaben God da seddown an rule .
40005035	Mus dohn say , ‘ A sweah ta de wol , ’ cause God da res e foot pon de wol . Mus dohn say needa , ‘ A sweah ta Jerusalem , ’ cause Jerusalem de city ob God de great King .
40005036	An ya mus dohn say , ‘ A sweah ta me head , ’ cause ya ain able fa mek eben one dem hair een ya head ton white or ton black .
40005037	Mus jes say ‘ yeah ’ or ‘ no , ’ cause any oda wod come scraight fom de Debil .
40005038	“ Oona yeh too dat dey beena laan de people say , ‘ Ef somebody buss ya eye out , ya kin buss out dat poson eye , ’ an ‘ Ef somebody knock ya teet out , ya kin knock out dat poson teet . ’
40005039	Bot A da tell oona say , Ya mus dohn git back at de poson wa da do ya bad . Ef somebody knock de right side ob ya face , ya mus ton an leh um knock de lef side too .
40005040	An ef somebody tek ya ta court fa mek ya gim ya shat , ya mus leh um hab ya coat too .
40005041	Ef somebody mek ya tote e load one mile , ya mus tote e load two mile .
40005042	Ef somebody beg ya fa sompin , ya mus gim . An ef somebody wahn fa borry sompin fom ya , ya mus lend um ta um .
40005043	“ Oona yeh dat dey beena laan de people say , ‘ Ya mus lob ya neighba dem an hate dem wa do ya wrong . ’
40005044	Bot A da tell oona say , Ya mus lob dem wa do ya wrong , an ya mus pray ta God fa dem people wa da mek ya suffa .
40005045	Dat way oona gwine be chullun fa true ob oona Fada een heaben . Oona Fada God da mek de sun shine pon de ebil people an pon de good people dem all two . E da mek rain come down pon dem wa da do wa e wahn an pon dem wa ain do wa e wahn .
40005046	Ef oona lob jes dem wa lob oona , oona ain got no right fa look fa no payback fom God fa dat , ainty ? Cause eben dem wa da geda tax , dey da do de same ting !
40005047	An ef oona speak jes ta oona broda dem , oona ain do no mo den oda people da do , ainty ? Cause eben people wa ain bleebe pon God , dey da do de same ting !
40005048	Ya mus be pafeck , same like ya Fada God een heaben pafeck .
40006001	“ Tek cyah ! Wen ya da do dem good ting wa God wahn ya fa do fa hep people , ya mus dohn do um een front ob oda people so dat dey gwine shim . Ef ya da do dat , ya ain gwine git de payback wa ya Fada een heaben got fa .
40006002	“ So wen ya da gii sompin ta dem wa ain got nottin , ya mus dohn tell all de people bout wa ya da do , same like de hypicrit dem do een de Jew meetin house an een de screet . Dey do um fa mek people praise um . A da tell oona fa true , dat praise wa dey git fom people , dat all de payback dey gwine git .
40006003	Bot wen ya da gii ta dem wa ain got nottin , ya mus do um so dat eben ya bes fren ain gwine know bout dat .
40006004	Mus dohn leh nobody know bout de good ting dem ya done . An ya Fada God wa see wa ya do een secret , e gwine pay ya back .
40006005	“ Wen ya da pray ta God , ya mus dohn do like de hypicrit dem da do . Dey lob fa pray wiles dey da stanop een de meetin house an pon de cona ob de screet , so dat all de people kin see dem wiles dey da pray . A da tell oona fa true , dey done git all de payback wa dey gwine git .
40006006	Bot wen ya da pray , ya mus go eenta ya room . Ya mus shet de door an pray ta ya Fada God wa dey een heaben weh ya cyahn shim . Ya Fada da see all wa ya da do , eben wen nobody else ain shim . An e gwine pay ya back .
40006007	“ Wen ya da pray , ya mus dohn go on an on wid sommuch taak wa ain mean nottin , same like dem wa ain bleebe pon God da do . Dey tink dat wen dey da pray , God gwine yeh um cause dey da pray so long .
40006008	Ya mus dohn be like dem , cause ya Fada God done know wa ya need fo ya aks um .
40006009	Pray like dis yah , say ,
40006010	We pray dat soon ya gwine rule oba de wol .
40006011	Gii we de food wa we need
40006012	Fagib we fa we sin ,
40006013	Leh we dohn hab haad test
40006014	“ Ef oona fagib oda people fa de bad wa dey do oona , oona Fada een heaben esef gwine fagib oona .
40006015	Bot ef oona ain fagib oda people fa de bad wa dey do , oona Fada een heaben esef ain gwine fagib oona fa de bad oona do .
40006016	“ Wen ya fast an ain nyam nottin so dat ya kin woshup God , mus dohn pit on no long face same like de hypicrit dem do . Cause dey da go roun wid dey face all mess op so dat ebrybody see dat dey da fast . A da tell oona fa true , dey done git all de payback wa dey gwine git .
40006017	Bot wen ya fast , ya mus pit oll pon ya head an wash ya face so ya kin look good ta people .
40006018	Ya mus do dat so dat people ain gwine see ya da fast . Jes ya Fada God wa ain nobody kin see , e da see wa ya da do , eben wen people ain shim . E gwine gii ya ya payback .
40006019	“ Ya mus dohn pile op a whole heapa spensiz ting fa yasef een dis wol . Cause de mot kin nyam um , an de rust kin rust um out , an tief broke een an tief um .
40006020	Stead ob dat , ya mus pile op ya tredja een heaben . Ain no mot kin nyam um , needa no rust kin rust um out dey , an ain no tief kin broke een an tief um .
40006021	Cause weh ya tredja da , dat weh ya haat gwine be .
40006022	“ Ya eye like a lamp fa ya body . Ef ya eye good , all ya body full op wid light .
40006023	Bot ef ya eye ain no good , all ya body gwine be een de daak . So den , ef de light wa spose fa be dey eenside ya ain dey , den de daak wa dey eenside ya gwine be daak fa sho , mo den all oda daak !
40006024	“ Ain nobody able fa saab two massa . Ef ya try fa do dat , ya gwine hate one an lob de oda one . Ya gwine be true ta one an hole de oda one cheap . Ya ain able fa saab God an be a slabe ta money same time .
40006025	“ So den , A da tell oona say , mus dohn warry bout how ya gwine lib , wa ya gwine nyam , or wa ya gwine drink , needa wa cloes ya gwine weah pon ya body . Cause ya life walyable way mo den sompin fa nyam , ainty ? An ya body walyable way mo den cloes , ainty ?
40006026	Now den , leh we study bout de bod dem wa fly roun . Dey ain plant no seed , needa geda crop . Dey ain pit op no crop een de conehouse . Stillyet , oona Fada een heaben da feed um . Oona way mo walyable den dem bod , ainty ?
40006027	An fa true , ain nary one ob oona kin lib a bit longa cause e da warry , ainty ?
40006028	“ An hoccome ya da warry bout cloes fa weah ? Leh we study bout de lily wa da grow wile . Dey ain wok , needa mek cloes fa deysef .
40006029	Now , A da tell oona , King Solomon been too rich an hab fine cloes . Stillyet , eben Solomon ain neba hab cloes fa dress purty an fine like dem lily .
40006030	God de one dat gii cloes ta de wile grass . An dat grass dey taday an e gone demarra . People cut um down an bun um op . Ef God dress op de wile grass like dat , fa true e gwine do way mo den dat fa mek sho ya hab cloes fa weah . Sho nuff , oona ain bleebe God wid all oona haat !
40006031	“ So den , ya mus dohn warry none tall say , ‘ Weh A gwine git sompin fa nyam ? ’ or ‘ Weh A gwine git sompin fa drink ? ’ needa say , ‘ Weh A gwine git cloes fa weah ? ’
40006032	De people dat ain bleebe een God , dey da warry all de time bout dem ting . Oona Fada een heaben know ya haffa hab sompin fa nyam an drink an cloes fa weah .
40006033	Bot fus ob all , leh God rule een ya life , an study bout how e wahn ya fa waak scraight wid um , an den God gwine gii ya all dem oda ting yah too .
40006034	So den , mus dohn warry bout wa gwine happen demarra . Demarra gwine hab e own warry . Ebry day hab nuff trouble ob e own .
40007001	“ Mus dohn jedge oda people . Den God esef ain gwine jedge ya .
40007002	De same way ya jedge oda people , dat how God gwine jedge ya . Ef ya easy on oda people or ef ya mek um suffa , dat de same way God gwine do ya .
40007003	Wa mek ya see de leetle splinta ob wood een ya broda eye , bot ya ain pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye ?
40007004	How ya gwine tell ya broda say , ‘ Broda , leh me tek dat leetle splinta out ya eye , ’ wen ya ain eben pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye ?
40007005	Ya hypicrit ! Fus ya mus tek de big log out ya own eye . Den ya kin see plain how fa tek dat leetle splinta out ya broda eye .
40007006	“ Mus dohn gii dog dem ting wa blongst ta God . Ef ya do dat , de dog gwine ton an teah ya op . Mus dohn shrow ya fine bead dem ta de hog dem . Ef ya do dat , dey gwine mash um onda dey foot , an den ton roun an teah ya op .
40007007	“ Aks God , an e gwine gii ya wa ya aks fa . Look ta God , an ya gwine find wasoneba ya da look fa . Knock ta God door , an e gwine open um op ta ya .
40007008	Cause de one wa da aks , God gwine gim . De one wa da look ta God , e gwine find wasoneba e da look fa . An de one wa da knock ta God door , God gwine open op de door ta um .
40007009	Ef ya hab a son , an ef e aks ya fa a piece ob bread , ya ain gwine gim no rock , ainty ?
40007010	An ef ya son aks ya fa a piece ob fish , ya ain gwine gim no snake , ainty ?
40007011	Ef oona wa ebil know how fa gii oona chullun good ting , oona Fada een heaben know how fa gii a heap mo good ting ta dem wa aks um !
40007012	“ Een all wa ya do , ya mus do ta ebrybody jes like ya wahn dem fa do ta oona . Dat wa de Law God gii Moses an wa de prophet dem laan we .
40007013	“ Ya mus go een shru de leeleetle door . Cause de door weh people da go een weh dey gwine be stroy een hell , dat door big fa true , an dat way easy fa folla . Plenty people da waak een dat way dey .
40007014	Bot de door weh people da go een fa git ebalastin life , dat a leeleetle door , an dat way haad fa folla . Ain a whole heapa people wa find dat way .
40007015	“ Oona mus tek cyah ! Look out fa dem prophet wa ain taak true . Wen ya shim , dey look jes like sheep . Bot eenside dey haat , dey jes like a wile wolf .
40007016	Ya gwine know dem by de fruit dey da beah . Ya ain gwine pick grape fom a bramble bush , ainty ? Ya ain gwine geda fig fom de briah patch , ainty ?
40007017	Same way so , ebry tree wa da grow good , e da beah good fruit , bot a tree wa ain grow good , e da beah bad fruit .
40007018	A tree wa da grow good , e cyahn beah no bad fruit . An a tree wa ain grow good cyahn beah no good fruit .
40007019	Dey gwine cut down all dem tree wa ain beah no good fruit . Dey gwine chunk um een de fire .
40007020	So den , ya gwine know dem by de fruit dey da beah .
40007021	“ Ain ebrybody wa da call me say , ‘ Lawd , Lawd ’ ain gwine go een weh God da rule een heaben . Jes dem wa do wa me Fada God een heaben wahn .
40007022	Wen dat day come , plenty people gwine tell me say , ‘ Lawd , Lawd ! Een ya name we done beena tell people wa God say , ainty ? Een ya name , we done beena dribe out ebil sperit an do plenty miracle , ainty ! ’
40007023	Den A gwine tell um say , ‘ A ain neba know oona . All oona wickity people , git way fom me ! ’
40007024	“ So den , ebrybody wa da yeh me wod an do wa A tell um , dey stan same like a poson wa got sense . Wen e build e house , e lay de foundation pon de rock .
40007025	De rain come , an de riba flood oba . De haad wind blow an beat ginst dat house . Stillyet , de house ain faddown , cause de man done lay de foundation pon de rock .
40007026	Bot de poson wa yeh me wod an ain do wa A tell um , dat poson dey same like a fool man wa build e house pontop de sand .
40007027	De rain come , an de riba flood all oba . De haad wind blow an beat ginst dat fool man house . An de house faddown , bam ! E smash op ! ”
40007028	Atta Jedus done tell de people all dis , dey been stonish how Jedus da laan um .
40007029	Cause e ain laan um like de Jew Law teacha dem . E laan um like e hab tority fa laan people dem ting yah .
40008001	Wen Jedus come down fom de high hill , a whole heapa people beena folla um .
40008002	An one man been dey wa been sick wid leposy . E come an kneel down pon de groun fo Jedus . E beg um say , “ Sah , ef ya gree fa do um , ya able fa mek me clean ! ”
40008003	Jedus scretch out e han an tetch um say , “ A wahn fa do um . A mek ya clean ! ” Same time , de leposy gone , an de man been well .
40008004	Den Jedus chaage um say , “ See yah , mus dohn tell nobody bout dis . Mus go ta de Jew priest an leh um see dat ya all well now , an offa de sacrifice wa Moses done chaage de people fa mek . Dat gwine mek ebrybody know ya all well now fa sho . ”
40008005	Wen Jedus git ta Capernaum , one Roman offisa gone meet um . E beg Jedus fa hep um .
40008006	E beg um say , “ Lawd , me saabant bad off sick . E da leddown een de house , an e cyahn moob . E da suffa too bad . ”
40008007	Jedus tell de offisa say , “ A gwine ta ya house an mek um well . ”
40008008	Bot de offisa say , “ No , Lawd ! A ain fit fa hab ya come eenta me house . Bot jes say de wod , an me saabant gwine git heal .
40008009	A mesef a man onda tority ob offisa wa oba me , an A hab tority oba oda sodja dem wa onda me . A tell one say , ‘ Mus go ! ’ an e gone . An A tell noda one say , ‘ Mus come ! ’ an e come . An A tell me saabant say , ‘ Mus do dis wok ! ’ an e do um . ”
40008010	Wen Jedus yeh wa de offisa say , e been scruck . E tell de people wa beena folla um , say , “ A da tell oona fa true . A ain neba see nobody yah een all ob Israel wa hab fait like dis man yah .
40008011	A da tell oona , plenty people gwine come fom all oba de wol , fom de east an fom de west . Dey gwine seddown wid Abraham , Isaac an Jacob een dey place ta de feas weh God da rule een heaben .
40008012	Bot God gwine sen way dem wa ain onda e rule , out eenta de daak place weh dey gwine cry an grine dey teet . ”
40008013	Den Jedus tell de Roman offisa say , “ Ya mus go ta ya house . Jes wa ya bleebe , dat wa gwine happen . ”
40008014	Jedus gone ta Peter house , an e see de modda ob Peter wife sick een de bed wid de feba .
40008015	Jedus tetch de ooman han , an de feba lef um . An e git op an staat fa fix sompin fa Jedus fa nyam .
40008016	Dat ebenin , people come ta Jedus da bring plenty people wa got ebil sperit eenside um . Jedus dribe out dem ebil sperit wid de wod wa e say , an e mek all de sick people well .
40008017	All dem ting yah dat Jedus do , dey happen fa mek come true wa de prophet Isaiah been say . E say , “ E tek way all we ailment . E cyaa off all we sickness . ”
40008018	Jedus see all de crowd roun um , an e gii orda ta e ciple dem , say mus git ready fa cross oba ta de oda side ob de lake .
40008019	Den one Jew Law teacha come ta um an say , “ Teacha , A gwine folla ya wehsoneba ya gwine go . ”
40008020	Jedus tell um say , “ De fox got hole een de groun , an de bod wa fly roun op een de air , dey got nes . Bot de Man wa Come fom God ain got noweh fa lay e head fa res . ”
40008021	One oda man wa beena gone long wid Jedus , e tell Jedus say , “ Sah , A gwine folla ya , bot fus leh me go an bury me fada . ”
40008022	Jedus ansa um say , “ Ya mus folla me . Leh dem wa dead bury dey own dead . ”
40008023	Jedus git eenta de boat , an e ciple dem folla um .
40008024	An jes dat fast , a big wind come an blow oba de lake . E mek de swellin wata come eenta de boat til e mos sink . Bot Jedus beena sleep .
40008025	De ciple dem gone an wake Jedus op . Dey say , “ Lawd , sabe we ! We gwine git drown ! ”
40008026	Jedus ansa say , “ Hoccome oona so scaid ? Oona ain got bot jes a leeleetle fait een me ! ” Den Jedus git op an e chaage de big wind an de swellin wata . Jes den ebryting calm right down .
40008027	De man dem been stonish . Dey aks one noda say , “ Who dis man yah ? E da chaage eben de wind an de wata , tell um wa fa do , an dey do um ! ”
40008028	Jedus cross ta de oda side ob de lake ta de arie weh de Gadarene people lib . Wen e git dey , two man wid ebil sperit da lib eenside um come outta de grabeyaad fa meet um . Dem man been so wile dat nobody ain been able fa pass by dat way .
40008029	Dey holla loud say , “ Ya de Son ob God ! Wa bidness ya got wid we ? Ya come yah fa mek we suffa fo de time wen God gwine toment we ? ”
40008030	Now den , a heapa hog beena nyam pon a hill dey .
40008031	Dem ebil sperit da beg Jedus say , “ Ef ya gwine dribe we outta de man dem , leh we go eenside dem hog . ”
40008032	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona git way fom yah ! ” So de ebil sperit dem come outta de two man an gone eenside de hog dem . Den all de hog ron down de side ob de steep hill like sompin wile . Dey ron eenta de lake an git drown .
40008033	De people wa beena mind de hog dem ron off an gone ta de town . Dey tell de people all de nyews an wa done happen ta de man dem wa been hab ebil sperit eenside um .
40008034	Den all de people een de town gone fa meet Jedus . Wen dey shim , dey beg Jedus fa go way fom dey .
40009001	Jedus git eenta a boat an cross ta de oda side de lake , an e come ta e own town .
40009002	Some man dem come long da tote one man wa paralyze , pon e bed . Wen Jedus see dat dey bleebe fa true dat e gwine heal de man , e tell de sick man say , “ Me son , ya mus dohn warry . Ya sin done been fagib . ”
40009003	Wen dey yeh dat , some de Law teacha dem say ta deysef , “ Dis man Jedus da hole God cheap ! ”
40009004	Jedus know wa de Law teacha dem beena tink bout , so e tell um say , “ Wa mek oona tink bad ting een oona haat ?
40009005	Fa sho , e mo easy fa tell dis man say , ‘ Ya sin done been fagib ’ den fa chaage um say , ‘ Git op an waak ’ ainty ?
40009006	A gwine show oona dat de Man wa Come fom God hab tority een dis wol fa fagib people sin . ” Den Jedus tell de paralyze man say , “ Git op , tek ya bed an go home ! ”
40009007	De man git op an gone home .
40009008	Wen de crowd see wa happen , dey been cyaa way . An dey praise God cause e gii a man dis kinda tority .
40009009	Jedus lef de place weh e been . Wiles e beena gwine , e see one man name Matthew , wa da geda tax , da seddown ta e office . Jedus tell um say , “ Come folla me . ” An e git op an gone folla Jedus .
40009010	Jedus beena seddown fa nyam een Matthew house . Plenty people wa da geda tax come , long wid oda people wa de Jew leada dem say ain fit fa mix wid de Jew people . An dey all seddown , da nyam wid Jedus an e ciple dem .
40009011	Wen some Pharisee see dat , dey aks e ciple dem say , “ Oona teacha ain oughta nyam wid dem kinda people , ainty ? ”
40009012	Jedus yeh wa dey say , so e tell um say , “ Dem wa well ain need no docta . Jes dem wa sick need um .
40009013	Oona mus go an find out wa dey mean wen dey write say , ‘ God wahn people fa hab mussy pon oda people . E ain wahn jes dem animal sacrifice wa oona da mek . ’ A ain come fa call dem wa tink dey da waak scraight wid God . A come fa call de sinna dem . ”
40009014	John ciple dem come ta Jedus an aks um say , “ Hoccome we an de Pharisee dem da fast , bot ya own ciple dem , dey ain fast ? ”
40009015	Jedus ansa um say , “ Wen people come ta a weddin , dey ain gwine be saaful long as de groom dey wid um . Bot de time gwine come wen de groom gwine be tek way fom mongst um . Dat de time wen dey gwine fast .
40009016	“ Ain nobody gwine cut piece fom nyew closs wa ain neba been wash fa shrink , an nyuse um fa patch e ole cloes , cause wen de patch shrink e gwine pull , an den de teah gwine be eben wossa .
40009017	Ain nobody gwine tek ole bottle an pit nyew wine een um wiles de wine still da draw . Cause ef e do dat , dat wine gwine buss open de ole bottle . De wine gwine waste an de ole bottle gwine git ruint too . Stead ob dat , dey mus pit nyew wine een nyew bottle wa ain gwine broke op , an de wine ain gwine waste needa . ”
40009018	Jedus still beena taak ta dem wen one leada een de Jew meetin house come an kneel down ta Jedus foot . E beg Jedus say , “ Me daughta mos dead . Bot do please , come an pit ya han pon um an pray fa um . Den e gwine lib . ”
40009019	So Jedus git op an folla dat leada , an e ciple dem gone long wid um too .
40009020	Jes den , one sick ooman wa beena bleed fa tweb yeah , e come op hine Jedus an tetch de edge ob Jedus cloes .
40009021	De ooman beena say een e haat , “ Ef A jes tetch e cloes , A gwine git heal . ”
40009022	Jedus ton roun . E see de ooman an tell um say , “ Me daughta , ya mus dohn warry ! Cause ya bleebe , ya done been heal . ” Dat same time e been heal .
40009023	Wen Jedus git ta de leada house an gone een , e see de people dem wa beena gwine fa play flute fa de buryin an ebrybody wa beena weep an wail loud fa de chile .
40009024	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona git out de house ! De chile ain dead . E da sleep ! ” De people jes laugh at um .
40009025	Wen dey done mek all de crowd go out de house , Jedus gone eenta de chile room . E tek de chile han , an de gyal git op .
40009026	Den de nyews spread all oba dat lan dey bout wa Jedus done .
40009027	Wen Jedus come outta dat place , two man wa been bline beena folla um . Dey holla say , “ David Son , hab mussy pon we ! ”
40009028	Den Jedus gone eenta de house an de man dem wa been bline come ta um . Jedus aks um say , “ Oona bleebe A able fa heal oona ? ”
40009029	Jedus tetch dey eye an say , “ Leh um happen den , jes like oona bleebe ! ”
40009030	Den dey been able fa see gin . Dey been heal . Jedus taak scrong ta um say , “ Oona mus dohn tell nobody wa happen . ”
40009031	Bot de man dem gone an spread de nyews bout Jedus all oba dat lan dey .
40009032	Wiles de two man wa been bline beena gwine out fom weh Jedus been , some people come ta Jedus , da bring one man wa ain able fa taak an wa got ebil sperit eenside um .
40009033	Jedus dribe de ebil sperit outta dat man , an soon as e done dat , de man staat fa taak . All de people been stonish . Dey say , “ Nobody ain neba see nottin like dis fo een Israel ! ”
40009034	Bot de Pharisee dem say , “ De leada ob de ebil sperit dem , e de one wa gii Jedus powa fa dribe ebil sperit outta people . ”
40009035	Jedus gone roun ta all de town an willage dem . E beena laan de people een dey meetin house an tell um de Good Nyews bout God rule . An e heal de sick people wa got all kind ob ailment .
40009036	Wen Jedus see all de crowd dem , e been too saary fa um fa true , cause dey been mix op an ain able fa hep deysef , jes like sheep wa ain got no shephud fa mind um .
40009037	Den Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ De crop done ready fa geda , bot dey ain nuff han fa geda um .
40009038	Mus pray ta de Lawd ob de crop fa sen out mo han fa geda de crop . ”
40010001	Jedus call e tweb ciple togeda , an e gim powa fa dribe out ebil sperit an fa heal dem wa hab all kind ob ailment .
40010002	Now dis yah de name ob de tweb man Jedus name postle : fus , Simon wa dey da call Peter , an e broda Andrew , James an e broda John , wa been Zebedee boy dem ,
40010003	Philip an Bartholomew , Thomas an Matthew wa beena geda tax , James wa been Alphaeus boy , an Thaddaeus ,
40010004	Simon wa been call de Patrot , an Judas Iscariot wa ton Jedus een fa money .
40010005	Jedus sen dem tweb postle fa go out fa tell de Good Nyews . Bot e chaage um say , “ Oona mus dohn go noweh weh de people lib wa ain Jew , needa ta no town een Samaria .
40010006	Steada dat , oona mus go ta de Israel people , wa same like sheep wa done loss .
40010007	Wiles oona da gwine , oona fa tell all de people say , ‘ De time wen God gwine rule done come ! ’
40010008	Oona mus heal de sick people . Mus mek de people dem wa done dead git life back . Mek de people wa got leposy clean gin , an dribe de ebil sperit dem fom outta people . Oona ain pay nottin fa wa oona git fom God . Same fashion , oona mus dohn mek people pay nottin fa wa oona da gim .
40010009	Mus dohn tote nottin long wid ya . Mus dohn tek no money , no gole , no silba , not eben a penny een ya money bag .
40010010	Mus dohn cyaa no grip long wid oona fa de trip , needa no cloes fa change , needa no spare pair ob sandal , not eben no stick fa waak . Cause de people dem wa oona gwine wok fa , dey haffa gii oona wa oona need .
40010011	“ Wen ya come ta a town or a willage , ya mus find somebody dey wa glad fa gii ya haaty welcome . Ya fa stay wid um til ya ready fa lef dat place dey .
40010012	Wen ya da go eenta de house dey , ya fa say , ‘ Leh God peace be pon oona . ’
40010013	Ef de people dem een de house gii ya haaty welcome , leh de blessin ya gim stay dey pon um . Bot ef dey ain gii ya no welcome , ya fa tek back de blessin wa ya gim .
40010014	Ef ya come ta a house or a town an de people dey ain glad fa hab ya stay dey , wen ya da come outta dey , shake de dort fom off ya foot .
40010015	A da tell oona fa true , wen de Jedgiment Day come , dem een dat town gwine suffa mo den de people een Sodom an Gomorrah !
40010016	“ Listen ! A da sen oona fa go , an oona jes like sheep wa da gwine mongst wolf . Oona mus be wise , same like a saapent . Oona mus dohn do no bad ta nobody , same like a dob .
40010017	Ya mus look out fa people wa gwine do ya bad . Dey gwine grab hole ta ya an bring ya fa be jedge front ob de leada dem een dey court . Dey gwine beat ya een dey meetin house .
40010018	Dey gwine grab hole ta ya , cyaa ya ta de gobna an de king fa dem fa jedge ya . Dat wen ya gwine tell dem an all people de Good Nyews .
40010019	Wen dey grab hole ta ya an tek ya fa jedge ya , mus dohn warry bout wa ya gwine say . Wen dat time come , God gwine tell ya wa fa say .
40010020	De wod ya say den , dey ain gwine be ya own wod , cause de Holy Sperit wa ya Fada God sen , e gwine pit de wod dem een ya mout .
40010021	“ Dey broda wa gwine han oba dey own broda ta people wa gwine kill um . Same fashion , some fada gwine han oba dey own chullun . An some chullun gwine ton ginst dey own fada an modda an han um oba ta de tority fa jedge um an kill um .
40010022	All de people gwine be ginst oona cause oona bleebe pon me . Bot God gwine sabe all ob oona wa stanop fa me til de wol done end .
40010023	Wen dey mek ya suffa een one town , ya mus ron go ta noda town . A da tell oona fa true say , ya ain gwine do wok een all de town dem een Israel fo de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back gin .
40010024	“ Poson wa da laan ain mo betta den de one wa da laan um . An saabant ain mo betta den e massa .
40010025	E good nuff fa de one wa laan fa be same like de one wa laan um , an fa de saabant fa be same like e massa . Ef people beena call de head man ob de house , say e Beelzebub , fa sho dey gwine say ting eben mo wossa bout dat man fambly .
40010026	“ So den , mus dohn be scaid ob people . Wasoneba kiba op gwine be onkiba . Wasoneba people da do een secret , ebrybody gwine know bout um .
40010027	Wa A da tell oona een de daak ob de night , ya mus tell um gin ta people een de broad daylight . An wa A da taak bout wid oona ondaneet me bret eenside de house , ya mus holla um pontop de house .
40010028	Ya mus dohn be scaid ob dem wa able fa stroy ya body , cause dey ain able fa stroy ya soul . Steada dat , ya mus feah God , cause e able fa stroy ya body an ya soul all two een hell .
40010029	De sparra ain wot nottin . Two ob dem wot one cent , ainty ? Stillyet , ain eben one ob dem gwine faddown pon de groun ef oona Fada God ain gree fa leh um .
40010030	God esef done count ebry scran ob hair pon ya head .
40010031	So den mus dohn be scaid . Oona way mo walyable den a whole heapa sparra ! ”
40010032	Jedus tell um say , “ De poson wa da tell people dat e blongst ta me , A mesef gwine tell me Fada God een heaben say , dat poson dey blongst ta me !
40010033	Bot de poson wa da tell people , say e ain blongst ta me , A gwine tell me Fada God een heaben , say dat one dey ain blongst ta me !
40010034	“ Oona mus dohn tink say dat A come fa bring peace ta de wol . No , A ain come fa bring peace . A come fa bring a sode .
40010035	A come fa ton de son ginst e fada , de daughta ginst e modda . A come fa ton de daughta-een-law ginst e moda-een-law .
40010036	Some mongst oona own fambly gwine be oona enemy wa hate oona mo den all .
40010037	“ Whosoneba lob e fada or e modda mo den me , e ain fit fa be me ciple . Whosoneba lob e son or e daughta mo den me , e ain fit fa be me ciple .
40010038	An whosoneba dohn tote e own cross an come folla me , dat poson ain fit fa be me ciple .
40010039	De poson wa da try fa sabe e life , e gwine loss e true life . Bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me , e gwine git true life .
40010040	“ Whosoneba gii oona haaty welcome , dat poson da gii me haaty welcome . An whosoneba gii me haaty welcome , e da gii de one wa sen me haaty welcome .
40010041	Whosoneba gii God prophet a haaty welcome , God gwine gim de same payback wa e gii de prophet . An whosoneba gii haaty welcome ta de poson wa waak scraight wid God , God gwine gim de same payback dat e gii de oda poson .
40010042	Whosoneba gii cole wata fa drink ta de poson wa leas ob all me ciple dem , fa true dat poson gwine git e payback . ”
40011001	Wen Jedus done tell e ciple dem wa dey spose fa do , e lef dey an gone ta dey town fa teach an tell de people de Good Nyews .
40011002	Now den , wen John , wa been een de jailhouse , yeh bout dem ting dat Jedus Christ beena do , e sen e ciple dem ta Jedus .
40011003	Dey aks Jedus say , “ Ya de Messiah wa been gwine come , or we spose fa look fa noda poson ? ”
40011004	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus go back an tell John wa oona da yeh an wa oona da see .
40011005	De people wa been bline , dey kin see . De cripple op people da waak . Dem wa hab leposy , dey clean now . De deef people able fa yeh , an dem wa done dead git op an lib gin . An de po people da yeh de Good Nyews .
40011006	De one wa ain loss e fait een me , e bless fa true . ”
40011007	Now wen dem ciple ob John beena gwine back , Jedus tell de great crowd bout John . E say , “ Wen oona gone ta John een de wildaness , wa ya been spect fa see ? Ya spect fa see a piece ob grass wa da bend down wen de breeze da blow ? No , ya ain gone fa see dat .
40011008	Den wa ya gone fa see ? Ya gone fa see a man dress op een fine cloes ? No , ya ain gone fa see dat . Cause dem wa dress op een fine cloes , dey lib een house wa blongst ta king dem .
40011009	Bot fa true , wa ya gone fa see ? Ya gone fa see a prophet , ainty ? An A da tell oona de trute , oona done see de man wa mo greata den all de oda prophet dem .
40011010	John de one dey write bout een God wod say ,
40011011	A da tell oona fa true , John wa Bactize , e mo greata den all de people wa eba lib . Stillyet , de poson wa leas ob all dem people wa God da rule , dat poson mo greata den John .
40011012	Fom de time wen John wa Bactize tell people bout God rule , op til now , dey been plenty people da fight ginst God rule fa tek um way .
40011013	All de prophet dem an de Law wa God gii Moses , op til John come , dey all taak bout God rule .
40011014	An ef oona wahn fa bleebe wa dey tell oona , John de man wa dey beena taak bout wen dey say Elijah gwine come back .
40011015	Oona wa got yea fa yeh , oona mus yeh wa A say ! ”
40011016	Jedus say , “ De people dat lib een dis day yah , wa kin A say dey like ? Dem people stan like chullun wa da seddown ta de maakut . Dey da holla ta oda chullun say ,
40011017	‘ We done play music fa oona ,
40011018	Wen John come , e fast fa woshup God an e ain drink no wine , an dey say , ‘ Dat man got ebil sperit eenside um ! ’
40011019	Now wen de Man wa Come fom God come , e da nyam an drink , an dey say , ‘ Look yah , dat man da stuff e gut an e a dronka ! Dem people wa da geda tax an dem oda people wa ain fit fa mix wid Jew people , dem e fren ! ’ Stillyet , dem wa da waak scraight wid God , dey gwine show dat God wise fa true . ”
40011020	Den Jedus staat fa buke de people wa lib dey een dem town weh e beena do mos all ob e great miracle , cause dey ain change dey sinful way .
40011021	E say , “ E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa lib een Chorazin an een Bethsaida ! Cause ef de people wa lib een Tyre an Sidon been see dem miracle wa A beena do fa oona , dey been gwine change dey sinful way . Dey been gwine weah croka sack an rub ashesh pon dey head an seddown fa leh ebrybody know dey done change dey way !
40011022	A da tell oona , wen de Jedgiment Day come an God da jedge all de people , oona gwine suffa mo den dem people een Tyre an Sidon !
40011023	An oona wa lib dey een Capernaum , oona tink say , oona gwine git lif op ta heaben , ainty ? No ! Oona gwine git shrow down ta hell ! Ef de people wa beena lib een Sodom been see dem miracle wa A beena do fa oona , Sodom been gwine still been dey eben op til now .
40011024	A da tell oona fa true , wen de Jedgiment Day come , an God da jedge all de people , oona gwine suffa mo den dem people een Sodom ! ”
40011025	Dat same time dey , Jedus say , “ Fada , ya de Lawd . Ya da rule heaben an ya da rule dis wol . A tank ya cause ya done hide dese ting fom dem wa tink say , dey wise an hab plenty laanin , an ya done show dese ting ta dem wa ain hab no laanin .
40011026	Yeah , Fada , e been ya good pledja fa do um like dis . ”
40011027	Jedus tell de people say , “ Me Fada done gii me powa oba ebryting . Ain nobody know de Son cep fa de Fada . An ain nobody know de Fada cep fa de Son an dem wa de Son pick fa mek um know de Fada .
40011028	“ Come ta me , all oona wa weary an da tote hebby load . Come , an A gwine gii oona res .
40011029	Jes like de ox tek dey wood yoke pon dey shoulda , tek me yoke pon ya . Leh me laan ya , cause A da beah wid ya an A hab a humble haat . Ef ya come ta me like dat , ya gwine git res fa ya soul .
40011030	De yoke wa A gii ya ain haad fa beah . An de load A gii ya ain hebby tall . ”
40012001	Jurin dat time , Jedus dem beena waak shru de wheat fiel pon one Jew Woshup Day . E ciple dem been hongry so dey pick some wheat an nyam um .
40012002	Wen some Pharisee see dat , dey tell Jedus say , “ Look yah ! Oona ciple dem da do wa de Jew Law say we ain spose fa do pon de Woshup Day ! ”
40012003	Jedus tell um say , “ A mos sho oona done read wa King David done , wen e an de man dem wid um been hongry , ainty ?
40012004	David gone eenside God House , an e an dem wid um been nyam de bread dat de Jew priest dem done been gii ta God . Stillyet , we law say nobody spose fa nyam dat bread cep de priest dem .
40012005	An A mos sho dat oona done read de Law wa God gii Moses , wa taak bout how de priest dem een God House kin do wa de Law say we ain spose fa do pon de Woshup Day ? Stillyet , dey ain done nottin bad , ainty ?
40012006	A da tell oona fa true . Dey sompin yah wa mo greata den God House .
40012007	Dey write een God Book say , ‘ A wahn oona fa hab mussy pon oda people . A ain wahn dem animal sacrifice dat oona da mek ! ’ Ef oona been know wa dem wod yah mean , oona ain been gwine condemn people wa ain done nottin bad .
40012008	Cause de Man wa Come fom God , e de Lawd ob de Woshup Day . ”
40012009	Jedus lef dey an gone ta dey Jew meetin house .
40012010	One man been dey an e han been flicted . Dey been wahn fa cuse Jedus , say e da do wrong , so dey aks Jedus say , “ Ain e ginst we law fa heal somebody pon de Woshup Day ? ”
40012011	Jedus ansa um say , “ Sposin one ob oona got a sheep wa fall eenta a big hole pon de Woshup Day . Ya gwine grab hole ta dat sheep an pull um outta dat hole , ainty ?
40012012	A man way mo walyable den a sheep ! So den we law leh we do good pon de Woshup Day . ”
40012013	Den Jedus tell de man wa han been flicted say , “ Scretch out ya han ! ”
40012014	Bot de Pharisee dem lef dey an meet fa study how dey gwine kill Jedus .
40012015	Jedus know dey da plan fa kill um , so e gone way fom dey . An a whole heapa people beena folla um , an e heal all dem wa been sick .
40012016	E waan de people , chaage um say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody bout me . ”
40012017	Wen Jedus do dis , e mek come true wa de prophet Isaiah done say ,
40012018	“ Dis yah me saabant wa A done pick fa do me wok .
40012019	E ain gwine aagy . E ain gwine holla .
40012020	E ain gwine broke off a reed wa done bend oba ,
40012021	An all people
40012022	Some people bring one man ta Jedus wa been bline an ain able fa taak cause a ebil sperit been dey eenside um . Jedus mek de man well so dat e able fa taak an see .
40012023	All de people dey been stonish , an dey aks one noda say , “ Dis man yah , ya tink e de Son ob David ? ”
40012024	Wen de Pharisee dem yeh bout dat , dey say , “ Dat jes de Debil Beelzebub , de leada ob de ebil sperit dem , wa da gii dis man Jedus de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit . ”
40012025	Jedus know wa dem beena tink , an e tell um say , “ Ef de people een a country da fight ginst one noda , dat country ain gwine las . Same way , ef de people ob a town or a house da fight ginst one noda , dey gwine soon paat .
40012026	An ef dem wa wok fa Satan da fight mongst deysef , Satan rule ain gwine las , ainty ?
40012027	An ef Beelzebub da gii me de powa fa dribe out dem ebil sperit , whodat gii oona people de powa fa dribe um out ? No ! Dem ting wa oona people deysef da do , dey show dat oona ain right .
40012028	God Sperit esef da gii me de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit , an dat show dat God done staat fa rule mongst oona .
40012029	“ Ain nobody able fa broke een a scrong man house an tief wa e got , cep ef e fus tie um op . Den e kin cyaa off all dat de scrong man got een e house .
40012030	“ Now de poson wa ain fa me , e ginst me . An e wa ain hep me fa geda people , e da scatta um .
40012031	So den , A da tell oona fa true say , God gwine fagib ebry bad ting wa people do an ebry bad taak wa dey da taak , bot God ain gwine fagib nobody wa taak bad ginst de Holy Sperit .
40012032	God gwine fagib people wa taak ginst de Man wa Come fom God , bot God ain gwine fagib nobody wa taak ginst de Holy Sperit . God ain gwine fagib um now een dis wol , an e ain gwine fagib um een de nex wol needa .
40012033	“ Ef ya got a tree wa good , ya gwine git good fruit fom dat tree . Bot ef a tree ain no good , ya ain gwine git no good fruit . Ya know de tree by de fruit e beah .
40012034	Oona snake ! How oona gwine taak good wen oona bad people ? Wa de haat full op wid , dat wa de mout da taak .
40012035	De poson wa good , e da pile op good ting een e haat , an dat mek um do good ting . Bot de bad poson , e da pile op ebil ting een e haat , an dat da mek um do bad ting .
40012036	“ A da tell oona say , wen de day come wen God gwine jedge de wol , all people gwine haffa ansa ta God fa ebry wod wa dey done been say jes dry long so .
40012037	Cause God gwine tek de wod dem wa ebry one ob oona say , an e gwine nyuse dem wod fa sho ef oona guilty or ef oona ain guilty . ”
40012038	Den some Jew Law teacha an some Pharisee dem say , “ Teacha , show we a sign . ”
40012039	Bot Jedus tell um say , “ De people wa lib now , dey wickity an dey ain bleebe pon God . Dey da aks me fa show um a sign , bot A ain gwine do um . Dey ain gwine see nottin cep de sign ob de prophet Jonah .
40012040	Jes like de prophet Jonah been shree day an shree night een de big fish belly , same way so de Man wa Come fom God gwine be dey shree day an shree night een de groun .
40012041	Wen Jedgiment Day come , de people ob Ninevah gwine condemn dese people wa da lib now . Cause wen de people ob Ninevah yeh wa Jonah say , dey change dey sinful way an ain do um no mo . An look a yah , somebody way mo greata den Jonah dey yah now !
40012042	Wen Jedgiment Day come , de queen wa nyuse fa rule een de sout , e gwine stanop an taak ginst de people wa da lib now . Cause e trabel haf way roun de wol fom e country , clean ta weh Solomon been . E gone dey fa yeh de wise wod wa Solomon da say . An look yah , somebody way mo greata den Solomon dey yah now !
40012043	“ Wen ebil sperit done come outta a man , e da trabel shru place wa dry fa find a place fa res , bot e ain able fa find no place .
40012044	So den e say ta esef , ‘ A da gwine back eenside de house weh A been . ’ Wen e come back eenside de man , e ain find nottin dey . E find um jes like a house wa clean an scraighten op .
40012045	Den de ebil sperit gone an git seben oda sperit way mo ebil den esef . Dey all come fa lib eenside dat man . Now dat man een a wossa shape den e been . Dat how e gwine stan fa dese wickity people wa da lib now . ”
40012046	Jedus still beena taak ta de people wen e modda an e broda dem come ta um . Dey beena stan outside de house da wahn fa taak wid Jedus . [
40012047	Somebody tell Jedus say , “ Ya modda an ya broda dem da stan outside de house . Dey wahn fa taak ta ya . ” ]
40012048	Jedus aks um say , “ Oona know who me modda an me broda dem fa true ? ”
40012049	E pint ta e ciple dem an say , “ Look ! Dese yah me modda an me broda dem fa true .
40012050	Cause de poson wa da do wa me Fada wa dey een heaben wahn , dat poson me broda , me sista an me modda . ”
40013001	Dat same day dey , Jedus come outta de house weh e been an e gone seddown close ta Lake Galilee .
40013002	An de crowd wa geda roun um been so big dat e git eenta a boat , an e seddown een de boat wiles de people dem beena stanop pon de sho .
40013003	Den e tell de people paable fa laan um plenty ting . E say ,
40013004	Wiles e beena scatta de seed , some fall long de pat , an de bod dem come an nyam um op .
40013005	Some seed fall pontop ob groun weh dey been heapa stone , an dey ain been bot a leetle bit ob dort . De seed sprout an staat fa grow quick cause de dort ain been deep dey .
40013006	Bot wen de sun git hot , e bun de leaf ob de plant dem . Dey root ain grow nuff een de groun an dey wilta .
40013007	Some seed fall eenta de briah . De briah grow op an choke de plant dem til dey ain been able fa grow .
40013008	An some seed fall pontop good groun , an de plant dem beah . Some plant beah a hundud , some beah sixty , an some beah tirty time mo den wa e staat wid . ”
40013009	An den Jedus say , “ Oona got yea fa yeh , ainty ? Den oona mus yeh wa A da say ! ”
40013010	Jedus ciple dem come ta Jedus an aks um say , “ Wa mek ya tell paable fa laan de people ? ”
40013011	Jedus tell um say , “ God gii oona de chance fa know bout dem secret bout how e gwine rule all people , bot oda people ain got dat chance .
40013012	De poson wa hab sompin , God gwine gim mo . Bot de poson wa ain hab nottin , God gwine tek way eben dat leeleetle bit wa e hab .
40013013	Dis hoccome A tell um paable . A tell um so dat dey kin look , bot eben dough dey look , dey ain gwine see . Dey kin yeh , bot dey ain gwine yeh fa true , needa ondastan .
40013014	So dey da mek wa de prophet Isaiah done been say come true ,
40013015	Cause dem people git haad haat .
40013016	“ Bot oona bless fa true , cause oona eye da see an oona yea da yeh .
40013017	A da tell oona fa true say , plenty prophet an plenty people wa waak scraight wid God been wahn fa see dem ting wa oona da see , bot dey ain shim . Dey been wahn fa yeh wa oona da yeh , bot dey ain yeh um .
40013018	“ Now den , oona mus listen yah ta wa de paable bout de seed mean .
40013019	De people dem wa yeh , bot ain ondastan de wod wa tell bout God rule , dey stan like de seed wa fall long de pat . De ebil one come long an tek way de wod wa been dey een dey haat .
40013020	De seed wa faddown pontop de groun wa full op wid rock , dat like people wa yeh de wod an dey glad fa bleebe um soon as dey yeh um .
40013021	Bot dey ain got no root . De wod ain down deep een dey haat fa true , so dem people bleebe jes a leetle wile . Cause dey beena bleebe de wod , dey git trouble an people mek um suffa . So den dey lef tareckly .
40013022	Dem seed wa fall eenta de briah , dat like de people wa yeh de wod , bot dey fret bout de ting dem dey got . Dey lob plenty ting an pledja een dis wol . Dem ting choke out de wod een dey haat . Dem people ain do nottin fa God . Dey crop dohn mount ta nottin .
40013023	Bot de seed wa fall pon de good groun , dat like de people wa yeh de wod an ondastan um een dey haat . Dey mek good crop . Some beah a hundud , some beah sixty , an some beah tirty . ”
40013024	Jedus tell um noda paable say , “ Wen God da rule , e stan like wen one man plant good seed een e fiel .
40013025	Bot one night wiles all de people beena sleep , dat man enemy come an plant grass mongst de good wheat seed wa de man done plant . Den e enemy gone .
40013026	Wen de plant dem grow an staat fa beah , people see de grass mix op wid de wheat plant .
40013027	Dat man wa own de fiel , e saabant dem aks say , ‘ Sah , ya done plant good seed een ya fiel , ainty ? Weh de grass come fom wa da grow dey ? ’
40013028	De man tell um say , ‘ Dat been me enemy wa done dat . ’ De saabant dem aks um say , ‘ Ya wahn we fa go pull de grass op ? ’
40013029	E tell um say , ‘ No , cause wen oona da pull de grass op , oona gwine pull some de wheat plant op long wid de grass .
40013030	Oona leh de wheat an de grass grow togeda til haabis time come . Den A gwine tell de haabis wokman dem say , Oona pull de grass op fus an bun um . Den oona geda de wheat an pit um eenta me baan . ’ ”
40013031	Jedus tell um noda paable , say , “ Wen God da rule , e stan like one mustard seed dat a man tek an plant een e fiel .
40013032	Now de mustard seed de leeleetles seed ob all , stillyet wen e grow , e git big mo den all de oda plant dem een de gyaaden . E da ton ta a tree , so dat de bod dem come an mek nes pon e limb . ”
40013033	Jedus tell um noda paable say , “ Wen God da rule , e jes like yeast . A ooman tek yeast an mix um wid a big sack ob flour til de whole dough rise op . ”
40013034	Jedus tell de crowd ob people all dem ting yah een paable . E ain tell um nottin cep een paable .
40013035	E tell um paable so dat wa de prophet done say , dat gwine happen , wen e say ,
40013036	Den Jedus lef de crowd an gone eenta de house . E ciple dem come an aks um fa tell um wa de paable bout de grass een de fiel mean .
40013037	Jedus tell um say , “ De Man wa Come fom God , e de man wa plant de good seed .
40013038	De fiel , dat de wol , an de good seed stan like de people dem wa God da rule oba . An de grass , dat dem wa blongst ta de ebil one .
40013039	De enemy wa plant de grass , e de Debil . De haabis time , dat de time wen de wol gwine end , an de haabis wokman , dat de angel dem .
40013040	Jes like dey pull de grass op an bun um een de fire , dat de same ting wa gwine happen wen de end time come .
40013041	De Man wa Come fom God gwine sen e angel dem an dey gwine pull out all dem wa mek people sin , an dem wa do ebil , mongst dem wa God da rule oba .
40013042	De angel dem gwine shrow dem bad people eenta de hell fire , an dey gwine cry bitta teah an grine dey teet .
40013043	Den de people dem wa waak scraight wid God , dey gwine shine same like de sun , dey weh God da rule . Oona got yea fa yeh , ainty ? Den oona fa yeh wa A say !
40013044	“ Wen God da rule , e stan like one walyable ting wa dey done bury een a fiel fa hide um . A man come find um , an den e bury um gin fa hide um . E so full op wid joy dat e gone an sell all e got . Den e gone back an buy dat fiel .
40013045	“ Same way so , wen God da rule , e stan like one poson wa da look fa walyable bead fa buy .
40013046	Wen e find one wa walyable mo den mos ob um , e gone an sell all e got an e buy dat walyable bead .
40013047	“ Same way so , wen God da rule , e stan like a fishin net wa people cyas eenta de wata an ketch all kind ob fish .
40013048	Wen de net full , de fishaman dem drag um ta de sho . Den dey seddown fa pick de good fish dem an pit um eenta dey bucket , an dey shrow way de fish wa ain no good .
40013049	Dat how e gwine be een de time wen de end come . De angel dem gwine come an geda op de ebil people , pick um out fom mongst dem wa waak scraight wid God .
40013050	An de angel dem gwine shrow dem ebil people eenta de hell fire . Dey dey gwine cry bitta teah an grine dey teet . ”
40013051	Jedus aks um say , “ Oona ondastan all dis wa A done tell oona ? ”
40013052	E tell um say , “ So den , dis mean dat ebry Law teacha wa done laan de true ting bout God rule , e stan jes like a poson wa own a house an e bring ting wa walyable outta e room weh e sto um , ole ting an nyew ting too . ”
40013053	Wen Jedus been shru da tell dem paable , e lef dey .
40013054	E gone back ta e home town . E staat fa laan de people een dey meetin house . An de people dem wa yeh um dey been stonish . Dey say , “ Weh dis man git dis sense an de powa fa do dem miracle yah ?
40013055	Ain dis de capenta boy ? Ain Mary e modda an ain James , Joseph , Simon an Judas dem e broda ?
40013056	Ain e sista dem all dey yah wid we ? Weh dis man git all dis sense an powa fa do miracle yah ? ”
40013057	So dey ain wahn fa hab nottin fa do wid um .
40013058	An cause de people ain bleebe een um , Jedus do jes a few miracle een dat place dey .
40014001	Dat same time dey , Herod wa beena rule een Galilee , e yeh bout all wa Jedus beena do .
40014002	King Herod tell e saabant dem , say , “ Dat man , e John wa Bactize ! E done dead , bot now e da lib gin ! Dat wa mek um git powa fa do dem miracle yah . ”
40014003	Now den , fo dat time , King Herod done been mek dem grab hole ta John an tie um op an pit um een de jailhouse . King Herod done dat cause ob Herodias , wa e been marry ta , eben dough Herodias been King Herod broda Philip wife .
40014004	Cause John beena tell King Herod say , “ Ain fittin fa ya fa marry ya broda Philip wife ! ”
40014005	King Herod been wahn fa kill John , bot e been scaid ob de people , cause dey been tek John fa a prophet .
40014006	Bot de day wen dey beena mek paaty fa King Herod birsday , Herodias daughta come an dance fa Herod an de people ta de paaty . An King Herod been too heppy fa e dance .
40014007	So e promise dat gyal an sweah ta um say , “ Ya mus aks me fa wasoneba ya wahn . A da tell ya de trute , A gwine gim ta ya ! ”
40014008	Herodias done been tell e daughta wa fa say , so de daughta tell King Herod say , “ Ya know John wa Bactize . A wahn ya fa gii me e head pon a big plate right yah ! ”
40014009	De king been too saary . Bot cause e done been promise de gyal fa true an sweah ta um , an de people ta e paaty done been yeh wa e say , e gii orda fa dem fa gii de gyal John head .
40014010	So e sen e sodja fa go cut John head off een de jailhouse .
40014011	Dey pit John head pon a big plate an bring um , gim ta de gyal . De gyal tek um , gim ta e modda Herodias .
40014012	An John ciple dem come an tek way John body , pit um een a tomb . Den dey gone an tell Jedus .
40014013	Wen Jedus yeh bout dat , e lef dat place weh e been an e tek a boat ta a place weh nobody ain lib at . Bot wen de crowd ob people yeh bout weh Jedus gone , dey come out de town dem , an dey folla um , da waak by lan fa go ta um .
40014014	Wen Jedus come out de boat pon de sho , e see de big crowd . E feel saaful fa um an e heal dey sick people .
40014015	Dat ebenin , e ciple dem come ta Jedus say , “ Sundown done come an nobody ain lib ta dis place yah . Ya mus sen way de crowd . Mek um go ta de willage dem fa buy deysef sompin fa nyam . ”
40014016	Jedus tell um say , “ Dey ain haffa go way fom yah . Oona mus gim sompin fa nyam . ”
40014017	De ciple dem tell um say , “ We ain got nottin yah cep fibe loaf ob bread an two fish . ”
40014018	Jedus say , “ Oona mus bring um ta me . ”
40014019	E chaage de people fa seddown pon de grass . Den e tek de fibe loaf ob bread an de two fish . E look op ta heaben an e tank God fa de bread an de fish . Den e broke op de bread an e gim ta e ciple dem an de ciple dem gim ta de people .
40014020	All dem done nyam til dey been sattify . An de ciple dem geda tweb basket ob lef oba bread an fish .
40014021	Bout fibe tousan man been dey , an dat ain count de ooman an de chullun dem .
40014022	Jes atta dat , Jedus chaage de ciple dem fa git eenta de boat an go head ob um ta de oda side . Dey fa cross oba de lake . Wiles dey beena gwine , Jedus tell de crowd dat e time fa go back home now .
40014023	Atta e done sen de people home , e gone op one high hill by esef fa pray ta God . An wen ebenin come , e been dey . Ain nobody been dey cep um .
40014024	Now dat time dey , de boat wid e ciple dem been out faaway fom lan . De wata been so rough dat de boat ain been steady cause de wind beena blow ginst um .
40014025	So late een de night , sometime atta shree o'clock , Jedus gone out ta e ciple dem . E beena waak pontop de wata .
40014026	Wen de ciple dem see Jedus da waak pontop de wata , dey been scaid ta det . Dey say , “ Dat a haant ! ” An dey holla loud cause dey been so scaid .
40014027	Jedus speak op fast . E tell um say , “ Study yasef ! Dis me ! Mus dohn be scaid ! ”
40014028	Den Peter tell um say , “ Lawd , ef dat ya fa true , mus chaage me fa come out pontop de wata fa meet ya . ”
40014029	Jedus say , “ Come ! ” So den Peter git out de boat an waak pontop de wata ta Jedus .
40014030	Bot wen Peter feel de scrong wind , e been scaid . An e staat fa sink down eenta de wata . E holla say , “ Lawd , sabe me ! ”
40014031	Jes den Jedus scretch out e han an grab hole ta Peter . E tell Peter say , “ Ya ain bleebe pon me no mo den jes a leetle bit ! Wa mek ya doubt ? ”
40014032	Den de two ob dem git eenta de boat an de wind stop .
40014033	De ciple dem een de boat woshup Jedus an say , “ Fa true , ya God Son ! ”
40014034	Wen dey been cross oba de lake , dey lan ta Gennesaret .
40014035	De people dey been know Jedus wen dey shim . So dey sen wod all oba de lan dey . An people come ta Jedus , fa tote all dey sick ta um .
40014036	De people beg Jedus fa jes leh dey sick tetch de hem ob e cloes . An all dem wa tetch e cloes , same time dey tetch um , dey git heal .
40015001	Some Pharisee an Jew Law teacha dem fom Jerusalem come ta Jedus an aks um say ,
40015002	“ Hoccome ya ciple dem ain do wa we ole people been laan we ? Dey ain wash dey han fo dey nyam ! ”
40015003	Jedus aks um back say , “ An hoccome oona ain do wa God Law tell oona fa do fa sake ob wa oona ole people tell oona fa do ?
40015004	Cause God chaage we say , ‘ Ya mus show hona an be manisable ta ya fada an modda , ’ an ‘ De poson wa taak bad ginst e fada or e modda , oona mus kill um . ’
40015005	Bot oona say , ef a poson got sompin e able fa gii e fada or e modda wa gwine hep um , bot e say , ‘ A done promise fa gii God dis ting yah , ’
40015006	oona say dat poson dey ain haffa show hona ta e fada an gim dat ting fa hep um . Dat show how oona ain do wa God Law say . Oona jes da do dem ting wa oona ole people laan oona fa do .
40015007	Oona hypicrit ! De prophet Isaiah done tell de trute bout oona wen e say ,
40015008	‘ Dese people yah da hona me wid dey mout ,
40015009	Wen dey woshup me op , dat dohn mean nottin ,
40015010	Jedus call de crowd fa come ta um . E tell um say , “ Oona mus yeh wa A say an ondastan !
40015011	E ain wa gone eenta poson mout wa mek um sinna een God eye . Wa come outta de poson mout , dat wa mek um sinna een God eye . ”
40015012	Den de ciple dem come ta um , aks um say , “ Ya know dat de Pharisee dem been opsot wen dey yeh wa ya say ? ”
40015013	Jedus ansa say , “ Me Fada een heaben gwine root op ebry plant wa e esef ain plant .
40015014	Oona fa lef um be ! Dey bline people wa da try fa lead oda bline people , an ef bline poson lead bline poson , dey all two gwine faddown eenta de ditch . ”
40015015	Peter aks Jedus fa splain ta um wa dat paable mean .
40015016	So Jedus tell um say , “ Oona stillyet ain ondastan wa A tell oona , ainty ?
40015017	Ain oona see dat wasoneba gone eenta somebody mout , e lef dey an gwine go eenta e belly an den come outta e body ?
40015018	Bot de wod dat come outta somebody mout , dey come fom eenside e haat . Dat wa mek e sinna een God eye .
40015019	Cause eenside , een e haat , a poson da study fa do ebil ting , fa kill , fa ramify roun an do wickity ting , fa tief , fa lie , fa taak bad bout oda people .
40015020	All dem ebil ting come fom eenside a poson haat an da mek um sinna een God eye . Bot ef a poson ain wash e han , dat ain mek um sinna een God eye . ”
40015021	Jedus lef dey an gone way ta de arie close ta Tyre an Sidon .
40015022	One ooman wa beena lib dey wa ain Jew gone ta Jedus . E been fom Canaan . Dat ooman beg Jedus say , “ Sah , David Son , do please , hab mussy pon me ! Me daughta da suffa tommuch cause ebil sperit dey eenside um . ”
40015023	Bot Jedus ain gap e teet . De ciple dem come ta Jedus an beg um say , “ Sen dat ooman way . E da folla we an da holla loud . ”
40015024	Jedus ansa say , “ God sen me jes ta de people ob Israel wa stan like loss sheep . ”
40015025	Den de ooman come kneel down fo Jedus an say , “ Sah , do please hep me ! ”
40015026	Jedus ansa de ooman say , “ E ain fittin fa tek de food way fom de chullun an chunk um ta de dog . ”
40015027	De ooman say , “ Dat true , sah , bot eben de dog dem kin nyam de food lef oba wa da faddown fom dey massa table ! ”
40015028	So den , Jedus tell um say , “ Ya a ooman wa bleebe fa true ! Wa ya wahn , leh dat happen . ” De ooman daughta git well dat same time .
40015029	Jedus lef dey an waak long de sho ob Lake Galilee . Den e climb op one high hill an seddown dey .
40015030	A whole heapa people gone ta um . Dey bring um people wa ain able fa waak , dem wa bline , dem wa cripple op , dem wa ain able fa taak , an plenty oda sick people . Dey pit um fo Jedus an Jedus mek um well .
40015031	De people been stonish wen dey yeh dem wa ain been able fa taak , now dey da taak . Dem wa been cripple op , dey well , an dem wa ain been able fa waak , now dey da waak . Dem wa been bline , now dey da see . An dey praise de God ob Israel .
40015032	Jedus call e ciple dem fa come ta um an tell um say , “ A saary fa de people yah . Dey been wid me shree day , an now dey ain hab nottin fa nyam . A ain wahn fa tell um fa go ta dey house wid nottin fa nyam . Dey gwine pass out long de road . ”
40015033	E ciple dem aks Jedus say , “ Weh we kin find nuff food fa gii ta all de big crowd yah fa nyam ? We ain able fa git no bread out een dis place weh ain nobody da lib . ”
40015034	Jedus aks um say , “ Hommuch bread oona got ? ”
40015035	Jedus chaage de people fa seddown pon de groun .
40015036	Den e tek de seben loaf an de fish an e tank God fa um . E broke de bread an de fish op an gim ta e ciple dem , an de ciple dem gim ta de people .
40015037	All de people nyam til dey belly full . An wen de ciple dem gone fa git de food wa been lef oba , dey geda seben basket full .
40015038	Bout fo tousan man been dey , an dat ain count de ooman dem an de chullun dem .
40015039	Den Jedus tell de people dat e time fa go ta dey house . Den e git eenta de boat an go ta de Magadan sho .
40016001	Some Pharisee an some Sadducee dem come ta Jedus . Dey wahn fa test Jedus so dey tell um say , show dem a sign fa show dat God sen um fa true .
40016002	Jedus ansa um say , “ Wen ebenin come , oona kin say , ‘ Demarra gwine be fine , cause de sky red . ’
40016003	An wen e day clean , oona kin say , ‘ E gwine be bad weda cause de sky red an daak . ’ Oona know how fa look ta de eliment an tapetate bout de weda , bot oona ain able fa tapetate de sign dem wa ya da see een dis day yah .
40016004	De people wa da lib now , dey wickity an dey ain bleebe pon God ! Oona da aks fa a sign fa show dat God sen me . A da tell oona fa true , A ain gwine show no sign cep fa de sign ob de prophet Jonah . ”
40016005	Dey done cross oba ta oda side ob de lake , bot de ciple dem been fagit fa cyaa bread wid um .
40016006	Den Jedus waan um say , “ Oona mus tek cyah . Mus look out fa de Pharisee an de Sadducee kinda yeast . ”
40016007	De ciple dem staat fa taak ta one noda bout dat say , “ E say dat cause we ain cyaa no bread wid we . ”
40016008	Jedus know wa dey da say , so e aks um say , “ Hoccome oona da taak ta one noda , da warry cause oona ain got no bread ? Oona ain bleebe pon me haadly tall !
40016009	Oona stillyet ain ondastan , ainty ? Oona ain memba wen A broke op dem fibe loaf ob bread fa gim ta fibe tousan man fa nyam ? Memba hommuch basket full ob lefoba bread oona done pick op ?
40016010	An wen A broke op seben loaf ob bread fa gim ta fo tousan man fa nyam ? How many basket full ob lefoba bread oona done pick op ?
40016011	Hoccome oona ain ondastan dat A ain da taak ta oona bout bread ? A beena tell oona fa look out ginst de Pharisee an Sadducee kinda yeast . ”
40016012	Den de ciple dem ondastan dat Jedus ain beena waan um fa look out fa de yeast wa dey pit een bread . Jedus beena say fa dem fa look out ginst wa de Pharisee an de Sadducee dem da laan de people .
40016013	Jedus an e ciple dem gone ta de arie name Caesarea Philippi . An e aks e ciple dem say , “ Who people say de Man wa Come fom God da ? ”
40016014	Dey ansa um say , “ Some people say ya John wa Bactize . Oda people say ya Elijah . An some say ya Jeremiah or one dem oda prophet fom way back . ”
40016015	Den Jedus aks e ciple dem say , “ Well den , who oona say A da ? ”
40016016	Simon Peter ansa um say , “ Ya de Messiah , de Son ob God wa da lib faeba . ”
40016017	Jedus ansa , “ Ya bless fa true , Simon , Jonah son ! Cause no poson laan ya dis . Me Fada een heaben , e show ya .
40016018	An A da tell ya say , ya Peter , an pon dis rock yah A gwine build me choch . An eben all de powa ob hell ain neba gwine be able fa win out oba um .
40016019	A gwine gii ya de key dem fa weh God da rule . Wasoneba ya say ain oughta be een dis wol , God gwine gree , say dat dey ain fa be een heaben . An wasoneba ya say kin be een dis wol , God gwine gree , say dat dey fa be een heaben . ”
40016020	Den Jedus waan e ciple dem say , mus dohn tell nobody dat e de Messiah .
40016021	Fom dat time dey , Jedus staat fa splain ta e ciple dem say , “ A haffa go ta Jerusalem . Dey de Jew leada dem an de leada dem ob de priest dem an de Law teacha dem , dey gwine mek me suffa a whole heap . Dey gwine kill me , bot een shree day A gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ”
