40016022	Peter call Jedus way fom de oda ciple dem an e staat fa buke Jedus say , “ Lawd , mus dohn leh dat happen ! Dat ain neba gwine happen ta ya ! ”
40016023	Jedus ton roun an tell Peter say , “ Git way fom me Satan ! Ya da git een me way , cause ya da tink like people da tink . Ya ain tink like how God da tink ! ”
40016024	Den Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Ef a poson wahn fa come wid me , e mus dohn do jes wa e wahn fa do no mo . E haffa tote e cross an folla me .
40016025	De poson wa da try fa sabe e life , e gwine loss e true life . Bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me , e gwine git de true life .
40016026	Wa good e do a poson ef e git ebryting een de whole wol an stillyet e gone ta hell wen e dead ? E done loss e true life , ainty ?
40016027	Cause de Man wa Come fom God gwine come wid e Fada God glory an de angel dem . An den e gwine gii all people de pay fa wa dey done .
40016028	A da tell oona fa true , some ob dem wa dey yah , dey ain gwine dead til dey done see de Man wa Come fom God come fa rule oba de wol . ”
40017001	Atta six day , Jedus call Peter , James an e broda John fa go long wid um . Dey gone pontop a mountain , an jes dem been dey .
40017002	An wiles de ciple dem beena look pon um , dey see Jedus change right fo dey eye . E face beena shine like de sun , an e cloes ton white jes like a bright light .
40017003	All ob a sudden , dem shree ciple see Moses an Elijah appeah , da taak wid Jedus .
40017004	Peter tell Jedus say , “ Lawd , e a good ting we dey yah ! Ef ya wahn , A gwine mek shree bush aaba oba yah , one fa ya , one fa Moses an one fa Elijah . ”
40017005	Wiles Peter da taak , a cloud wa beena shine bright , cyas a shada oba um an kiba um op . An dey yeh one boice come outta de cloud say , “ Dis yah me Son , wa A lob a whole heap . A sho please wid um . Mus listen ta wa e tell oona ! ”
40017006	Wen de ciple dem yeh dat boice , dey been so scaid dey faddown wid dey face ta de groun .
40017007	Jedus come tetch um , an say , “ Git op ! Mus dohn be scaid ! ”
40017008	So dey look op , bot dey ain see nobody dey cep Jedus .
40017009	Wen dey come down de hill , Jedus chaage um say , “ Oona mus dohn tell nobody wa oona been see op dey , til de Man wa Come fom God done git op fom de dead an lib gin . ”
40017010	De ciple dem aks Jedus say , “ Den hoccome de Jew Law teacha dem say Elijah haffa come fus ? ”
40017011	Jedus ansa um say , “ Fa sho , Elijah come fus , an e gwine git all ting ready .
40017012	Bot A da tell oona , Elijah done come , bot people ain know um . An dey beena do um jes how dey wahn fa do . Same way so dey gwine mek de Man wa Come fom God suffa . ”
40017013	So den , de ciple dem ondastan dat Jedus beena taak ta um bout John wa Bactize .
40017014	Wen Jedus an e ciple dem git ta de crowd ob people , one man come an kneel down fo Jedus .
40017015	E say , “ Lawd , A da beg ya , hab mussy pon me son ! E ketch fits an da suffa tommuch . E so bad dat heapa time e faddown eenta de fire an eenta de wata .
40017016	A done bring um ta ya ciple dem , bot dey ain been able fa mek um well . ”
40017017	Jedus mek ansa say , “ Oona people yah wa lib een dis time ain got no fait ! Oona ain ondastan nottin . Hommuch mo longa A gwine haffa pit op wid oona ? ” Den e tell de man say , “ Bring ya son yah . ”
40017018	Jedus gii orda ta de ebil sperit wa hab de boy . Dat ebil sperit come outta de boy , an jes den dat boy git well .
40017019	Den de ciple dem come ta Jedus , way fom de oda people . Dey aks um say , “ Hoccome we ain been able fa dribe de ebil sperit outta de boy ? ”
40017020	Jedus ansa say , “ Oona ain got nuff fait . A da tell oona fa true say , ef oona bleebe , eben ef oona fait ain no mo big den a leetle mustard seed , oona kin gii orda ta dis high hill say , ‘ Come outta dey an go oba yonda ! ’ An dat hill gwine moob . Ain nottin wa oona ain gwine be able fa do ! ”
40017021	“ Bot oona ain gwine be able fa dribe out dat kind ob ebil sperit , cep oona pray an fast . ” ]
40017022	Wen de ciple dem all meet op een Galilee , Jedus tell um say , “ Dey gwine han oba de Man wa Come fom God ta dem wa een chaage yah .
40017023	Dey gwine kill um . Bot atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead . E gwine lib gin . ”
40017024	Wen Jedus an e ciple dem git ta Capernaum , de people wa geda tax come ta Peter . Dey aks Peter say , “ Oona teacha da pay de tax fa God House , ainty ? ”
40017025	Peter ansa um say , “ Yeah , e da pay de tax . ”
40017026	Peter ansa say , “ De come-yah people , ainty ? ”
40017027	Bot we ain wahn fa mek dem people bex wid we , so go ta de lake an cyas ya hook out eenta de wata . De fus fish wa ya ketch , open e mout an ya gwine find one silba coin dey . Tek dat coin an pay um fa we tax . ”
40018001	Jes den , de ciple dem come aks Jedus say , “ Whodat de big leada mongst dem wa God da rule ? ”
40018002	Jedus call one leetle chile an hab um stanop mongst um .
40018003	Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , cep oona change oona way an come fa be like leetle chullun , oona ain neba gwine be wid God wen e da rule .
40018004	Weh God da rule , de poson wa humble esef like a leetle chile , God hona um de mos .
40018005	An de poson wa heppy fa tek een a leetle chile like dis one yah een me name , dat poson da tek me een too .
40018006	“ De poson wa mek one ob de leetle chullun like dis wa bleebe pon me do bad , e mo betta fa dat poson ef dey been tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta de deep sea .
40018007	E gwine be a haad time fa de people een de wol cause ob dem ting dey wa da mek um sin ! Fa true , ting gwine happen wa mek people wahn fa do bad . Bot de poson wa mek dem ting happen , e gwine hab plenty trouble !
40018008	“ Ef oona han or oona foot da mek oona do bad ting , cut um off an shrow um way . E mo betta fa oona fa be cripple op an hab jes one han or one foot an git life wa neba end , den fa oona fa keep two han an two foot an den dey chunk oona eenta de fire wa gwine keep on da bun faeba .
40018009	An ef oona eye da mek oona do bad ting , oona fa pull um out an chunk um way ! E mo betta fa oona fa hab jes one eye an git life wa neba end , den fa oona fa keep two eye an den dey chunk oona eenta de hell fire .
40018010	“ Oona mus mek sho dat oona ain look down pon none ob dese leetle one yah , tink say e ain mount ta nottin . Cause A da tell oona dat dese leetle one yah , dey own angel dem een heaben da look pon me Fada face all de time ! [
40018011	De Man wa Come fom God , e come fa sabe dem people wa done loss dey way . ]
40018012	“ Sposin a hundud sheep blongst ta one man . Ef one ob dem sheep git loss , wa dat man fa do ? E gwine lef de ninety-nine sheep wa safe dey pon de hillside , an e gwine saach fa de one wa loss , ainty ?
40018013	An A da tell oona fa true , ef e find um , e gwine rejaice fa dat one sheep mo den fa de ninety-nine oda res wa ain neba loss dey way .
40018014	Same way so , oona Fada God een heaben ain wahn none ob dese leetle one fa loss e way .
40018015	“ Ef ya broda da do ya bad , go ta um an show um wa e do bad ginst ya . Bot ya mus tek um off ta de side . Ef e gree , say e done bad , ya done win ya broda back .
40018016	Bot ef e ain gree wid ya , ya mus tek one or two oda broda long wid ya an go ta um , so dat two or shree poson gwine be dey fa know wa e been say .
40018017	Ef dat broda ain gree wid wa de oda broda dem tell um , den ya mus tell de choch wa e done bad ginst ya . An ef dat poson ain gree eben wid wa de choch people tell um , den ya mus treat um like poson wa ain bleebe pon God , an like poson wa geda tax .
40018018	“ A da tell oona fa true say , wasoneba oona say ain oughta be done een dis wol , God gwine say dat ain oughta be done een heaben . An wasoneba oona say kin be done een dis wol , God gwine say dat kin be done een heaben .
40018019	“ A da tell oona gin say , wen two ob oona een dis wol gree bout wasoneba ting oona da aks God fa , me Fada een heaben gwine do dat ting fa oona .
40018020	Cause weh two or shree geda togeda fa pray een me name , A dey wid um . ”
40018021	Den Peter come ta Jedus an aks um say , “ Lawd , how many time A mus fagib me broda wen e da do me bad ? A fa fagib um til e reach seben time ? ”
40018022	Jedus ansa um say , “ No , not jes seben time . Ya mus fagib um sebenty-seben time .
40018023	Cause wen God da rule , e stan like one king dat cide fa look at e book weh e been write down hommuch e saabant dem owe um .
40018024	Wen de king staat fa look at de book , dey come da bring een one saabant wa owe um a whole heapa money .
40018025	De saabant ain got no money , so de king chaage e man dem fa sell dat saabant , long wid e wife an e chullun fa be slabe , an fa sell all dat saabant propaty , fa pay wa e owe .
40018026	Den dat saabant faddown fo de king an beg um say , ‘ Lawd , do please , beah wid me , an A gwine pay ya ebryting A owe ya ! ’
40018027	De king feel saary fa dat saabant an e tell um e ain haffa pay back de money e owe um , an e leh um go free .
40018028	“ Bot wen dat saabant done gone , e meet one ob de oda saabant dem wa been owe um a leetle bit ob money . E grab hole ta um by e troat an staat fa choke um , an chaage um say , ‘ Ya mus pay me all wa ya owe me ! ’
40018029	Dat oda saabant faddown fo um an beg um say , ‘ Please sah , beah wid me , an A gwine pay ya back wa A owe ya ! ’
40018030	Bot dat saabant ain gree ta dat . Steada dat , e mek dem shrow dat oda saabant eenta de jailhouse til e pay wa e owe .
40018031	Wen de oda res ob de saabant dem see wa happen , dey been opsot fa true . So dey gone an tell de king all wa done happen .
40018032	Den de king hab um call een dat saabant wa e been fagib . E tell um say , ‘ Ya wickity saabant ! A been say ya ain haffa pay back de money wa ya owe me , cause ya beg me .
40018033	Yasef oughta been hab mussy pon de oda saabant , jes like A been hab mussy pon ya , ainty ? ’
40018034	De king been too bex so e gim ta dem wa gyaad de jailhouse an mek um pit dat saabant eenta de jailhouse til e pay back all wa e owe . ”
40018035	An Jedus say , “ So den , dat how me Fada een heaben gwine do ta ebry one ob oona , ef wid all ya haat ya ain fagib ya broda wa do ya bad . ”
40019001	Wen Jedus done say dem ting dey , e come outta Galilee an gone ta de lan ob Judea ta de oda side ob de Jerden Riba .
40019002	Great crowd ob people dem folla um dey , an e heal de sick people .
40019003	Some Pharisee dem been wahn fa ketch um da taak ginst God Law , so dey aks um say , “ Coddin ta we law , e right fa man fa worce e wife , wasoneba mek um wahn fa do um ? ”
40019004	Jedus ansa de Pharisee dem say , “ Ain oona neba read wa God Book say ? Fom wen e fus mek de wol , ‘ God mek two kind ob people , man an ooman . ’
40019005	An God say , ‘ Cause ob dat , de man gwine lef e fada an e modda an jine wid e wife , an dem two gwine come fa be one poson . ’
40019006	So dey ain two poson no mo . Dem two done come fa be one poson . So den , wen God done jine dem togeda , mus dohn nobody tek um paat fom one noda . ”
40019007	De Pharisee dem aks Jedus say , “ Den hoccome Moses been gii we law wa say man kin gii e wife worce paper an sen um way ? ”
40019008	Jedus ansa um say , “ Cause oona haat haad , Moses gii oona dat law dey wa say man kin worce e wife . Bot dat ain de way dat been wen God fus mek man an ooman .
40019009	A da tell oona say , ef a man worce e wife fa oda reason cep ef e sleep wid oda man , an den dat man marry noda ooman , dat man done guilty ob sleep wid ooman wa ain e own wife . ”
40019010	Jedus ciple dem tell Jedus say , “ Well den , ef dat so e stan wid man an e wife , e betta ef a man ain git marry . ”
40019011	Jedus ansa um say , “ Ain all man kin cept dis , bot jes dem wa God done mek um able fa do dat .
40019012	Dey diffunt reason wa mek some people able fa lib dout dey marry . Some dem dat way fom de time dey bon , an some dat way cause people mek um like dat . An some oda ain marry cause dey wahn fa gii God all dey life fa bring people fa lib onda God rule . So den , de poson wa able fa cept dis , leh um cept um . ”
40019013	Some people bring leetle chullun ta Jedus fa hab um pit e han pon dey head an pray fa um . Bot de ciple dem buke dem people wa beena bring um .
40019014	Jedus say , “ Oona mus leh de chullun come ta me . Mus dohn stop um , cause de people wa like dem chullun yah gwine be wid God wen e da rule . ”
40019015	An Jedus pit e han pon dey head an bless um . Den e gone way fom dey .
40019016	One man come ta Jedus an aks um say , “ Teacha , wa good ting A mus do fa git ebalastin life ? ”
40019017	Jedus ansa um say , “ Hoccome ya aks me bout wa good ? Ain nobody good cep fa God . Ef ya wahn fa git ebalastin life , ya mus do wa God Law tell ya fa do . ”
40019018	De man aks Jedus say , “ Wish ob de law dem A haffa keep ? ”
40019019	Ya mus pay mind ta ya fada an ya modda , an lob oda people same like ya da lob yasef . ”
40019020	De nyoung man tell Jedus say , “ A done keep all dem law yah . Wa lef dat A haffa do ? ”
40019021	Jedus ansa , “ Ef ya wahn fa be fit een God eye fa git ebalastin life , ya mus go sell all dem ting ya got an gii way de money ta de people wa ain got nottin . Ef ya do dat , ya gwine be rich fa true een heaben . Atta ya done done dat , ya mus come folla me . ”
40019022	Wen dat nyoung man yeh wa Jedus say , e been too saaful an e lef Jedus , cause e hab a whole heapa ting .
40019023	Den Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ A da tell oona fa true , e ain easy eben a leetle bit fa rich people fa come onda God rule .
40019024	A da tell oona sompin mo , e mo easy fa mek de camel go shru a needle eye den fa a rich man fa come onda God rule . ”
40019025	Wen de ciple dem yeh wa Jedus say , dey been stonish an dey aks um say , “ Ef dat so e stan , ain nobody gwine be sabe , ainty ? ”
40019026	Jedus look scraight at um an ansa say , “ God able fa do wa people ain able fa do . God able fa do all ting . ”
40019027	Den Peter ansa say , “ Look yah ! We done lef ebryting fa folla ya ! Wa God gwine gii we ? ”
40019028	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell oona fa true say , een de wol wa gwine come , wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine seddown pon e shrone fa rule de wol wid great glory , oona wa beena folla me gwine seddown too , pon tweb shrone fa jedge de tweb tribe ob Israel .
40019029	An ebrybody wa done lef e house , or e broda dem , or e sista dem , or e fada , or e modda , or e chullun , or e propaty so dat e kin do wa A tell um fa do , God gwine gim a hundud time mo den wa e done lef fa folla me , an e gwine gim ebalastin life .
40019030	Bot plenty wa fus now , dey gwine be las , an plenty dem wa las now , dey gwine be fus .
40020001	“ Wen God rule , e stan like wen one man wa got a faam go out aaly een de maanin fa find wokman dem fa go wok een e grape fiel .
40020002	De man gree fa gii dem wokman dey pay fa de day , wa been one silba coin fa ebry man . Den e sen um out fa wok een e fiel .
40020003	Bout nine o'clock , de man gone out gin ta weh all de man dem da geda , an e see some oda man dem da stanop dey an dey ain da do nottin .
40020004	So e tell um say , ‘ Oona fa go wok een me fiel too , an A gwine pay oona wa right fa oona fa git . ’ So de man dem gone fa wok .
40020005	Den bout tweb o'clock an bout shree o'clock e gone back gin an done de same ting .
40020006	Bout fibe o'clock e gone out gin ta weh de man dem beena geda , an e see oda man dem still da stanop dey . E aks um say , ‘ Hoccome oona da stan yah all day an ya ain do nottin ? ’
40020007	Dey ansa um say , ‘ Ain nobody aks we fa wok fa um . ’ De man say , ‘ Well den , oona gwine come an wok een me grape fiel too . ’
40020008	“ Wen ebenin come , de man wa got de faam tell e head man ob de wokman dem say , ‘ Call de wokman dem an gim dey pay . Staat wid dem wokman fus wa A sen las ta de fiel an keep on da pay dem dat way til ya end op wid dem wa A sen fus ta de fiel . ’
40020009	E gii ebry one ob de wokman dem wa e sen ta de fiel bout fibe o'clock , one silba coin .
40020010	So den , wen de wokman dem wa e sen fus ta de fiel see dat , dey tink say e gwine pay um mo den e pay de oda wokman dem . Bot e gii ebry one ob um one silba coin .
40020011	Wen dey git dey money , dey staat fa grumble ginst de man wa got de faam .
40020012	Dey say , ‘ Dem wokman wa ya sen fa wok las , dey wok jes one hour . Bot we beena wok de whole day een de hot sun . Stillyet , ya gii we de same pay same like dey got . ’
40020013	Bot de man wa got de faam , e ansa one ob um say , ‘ Me fren , listen ta me ! A ain do ya bad . Ya been gree fa wok fa one silba coin , ainty ?
40020014	Tek ya pay an go ta ya house . A wahn fa gii dem wokman wa A sen las ta de fiel de same pay wa A gii ya .
40020015	Ain A got de right fa do wa A wahn wid me own money ? Ya ain git de long eye cause A good ta dem , ainty ? ’ ”
40020016	An Jedus tell um say , “ So den , dem wa las gwine be fus , an dem wa fus gwine be las . ”
40020017	Wen Jedus beena gwine op ta Jerusalem , e tek de tweb ciple ta one side an e tell um say ,
40020018	“ We da gwine op ta Jerusalem . An de people dey gwine han de Man wa Come fom God oba ta de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Jew Law teacha dem . Dey gwine jedge um an say e mus dead .
40020019	Atta dat , dey gwine ton um oba ta de people wa ain bleebe pon God . Dem people gwine tek um fa mek fun . Dey gwine whip um an den dey gwine nail um pon a cross til e dead . Bot atta shree day , de Man wa Come fom God gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ”
40020020	Atta dat , Zebedee wife wid e son dem come ta Jedus . De ooman kneel down fo Jedus an beg um fa do sompin fa um .
40020021	Jedus aks um say , “ Wa ya wahn me fa do fa ya ? ”
40020022	Bot Jedus tell de son dem say , “ Oona ain ondastan wa oona da aks me fa do . Oona gwine be able fa suffa wid me , fa drink fom de cup wa A gwine drink fom ? ”
40020023	Jedus say , “ Fa true oona gwine drink fom dat cup wa A gwine drink fom . Bot A ain got de tority fa say dat oona gwine seddown pon me right han side an pon me lef han side . Me Fada da keep dem place dey fa de people wa e done pick . ”
40020024	Wen de oda ten ciple dem yeh bout dat , dey been too bex wid de two broda .
40020025	Jedus call um all togeda an tell um say , “ Oona know bout de leada dem wa da rule oba de people dey een de wol . Dey tell de people wa fa do all de time , an dey big leada dem got tority oba um .
40020026	Bot e ain gwine be dat way mongst oona . Steada dat , ef one ob oona wahn fa be oona leada , e mus be oona saabant .
40020027	An ef one ob oona wahn fa be fus , e mus be oona slabe ,
40020028	jes like de Man wa Come fom God . E ain come fa mek people e saabant . E come fa be de people saabant , an fa gii e life fa pay de price fa sabe a whole heapa people . ”
40020029	Wen Jedus an e ciple dem beena come outta Jericho , a big crowd ob people beena folla um .
40020030	Two bline man been seddown close by de road . Wen dey yeh say dat Jedus da pass by , dey holla say , “ Lawd , Son ob David , hab mussy pon we ! ”
40020031	De people een de crowd buke de man dem , tell um fa hush op dey mout . Bot de man dem holla mo louda , “ Lawd , Son ob David hab mussy pon we ! ”
40020032	Jedus stop dey an call ta um . E aks um say , “ Wa oona wahn me fa do fa oona ? ”
40020033	Dey ansa say , “ Lawd , we wahn ya fa mek we see . ”
40020034	Jedus been saary fa um een e haat . E tetch dey eye . Dat same time dem man been able fa see , an dey folla Jedus .
40021001	Wen Jedus an e ciple dem git close ta Jerusalem , dey git ta Bethphage , dey ta de big hill dey call de Mount Olib . Jedus sen two e ciple dem on head ob um .
40021002	E tell um say , “ Go ta de willage wa dey fo oona . Same time oona git ta de willage , oona gwine see one donkey dat dey done tie op dey . E got e leetle one dey close ta um . Oona mus ontie um an fetch um ta me yah .
40021003	Ef anybody aks oona wa ya da do , oona fa tell um say , ‘ De Lawd need um . ’ Den dey gwine sen um right way . ”
40021004	Dis happen fa mek come true wa de prophet been say gwine happen , wen e say ,
40021005	“ Tell de people een Jerusalem , de city ob Zion , say ,
40021006	So de two ciple dem gone long ta de willage , an dey done wa Jedus tell um fa do .
40021007	Dey tek de donkey an e leetle one ta Jedus . Den dey pit dey cloes pontop um , an Jedus git op pon um , da seddown pon dey cloes .
40021008	A great big crowd ob people wa been dey spread some ob dey cloes pon de road front ob Jedus . Oda people broke off some leetle branch fom some tree , spread um pon de road weh Jedus been gwine pass .
40021009	De great crowd ob people dem wa beena waak long front ob Jedus , an dem wa come hine um , dey beena holla , say , “ Leh we praise de Son ob David ! God bless de one wa come een de Lawd name ! Praise God een heaben ! ”
40021010	Wen Jedus gone eenta Jerusalem , de town ton opside down . De people been stir op an dey say , “ Who dis man yah ? ”
40021011	De crowd ob people ansa say , “ Dis yah Jedus , de prophet . E come fom Nazareth een Galilee . ”
40021012	Den Jedus gone eenside God House , an e dribe out all dem people wa beena buy an sell ting dey . E ton oba de table dem weh people beena mek change fa de money ob people fom oda lan . An e ton oba de chair dem weh dey beena sell pigeon .
40021013	E tell de people say , “ God Book say , ‘ People gwine call me House de place weh people come fa pray ta God , ’ bot oona da ton um eenta place weh de tief dem da hide ! ”
40021014	De bline people an dem wa cripple op , dey come ta Jedus dey een God House , an e mek um well .
40021015	Bot de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Jew Law teacha dem been too bex cause dey see de great wok dem wa Jedus beena do , an dey yeh de chullun dey een God House da holla say , “ Leh we praise David Son ! ”
40021016	So de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Law teacha dem aks Jedus say , “ Ya ain yeh wa dey da say ? ”
40021017	Jedus lef um an gone outta de city fa sleep een Bethany .
40021018	De nex maanin wen Jedus beena go back ta Jerusalem , e been hongry .
40021019	E see one fig tree close ta de road , so e gone ta de tree . Bot e ain find nottin pon um cep leaf . Den e tell de tree say , “ Ya ain fa beah no fig no mo ! ” Right way , de fig tree done dry op .
40021020	Wen de ciple dem see wa happen , dey stonish , an dey aks say , “ Wa mek dis tree yah dry op right way ? ”
40021021	Jedus ansa um say , “ A da tell oona fa true , ef oona bleebe God fa true an oona ain doubt , oona gwine be able fa do wa A done ta de fig tree yah . An ain jes dat dat oona gwine be able fa do . Oona gwine be able fa tell dis mountain yah say , ‘ Ya fa git op an go shrow yasef eenta de sea , ’ an dat wa gwine happen .
40021022	Wen oona da pray ta God fa sompin , ef oona bleebe God gwine do um fa oona , den fa true dat wa gwine happen . ”
40021023	Jedus gone eenta God House . An wiles e beena laan de people dey , de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an oda Jew leada dem come aks Jedus say , “ Tell we , hoccome ya got de right fa do dem ting yah ? Whodat gii ya dat right ? ”
40021024	Jedus ansa um say , “ Leh me aks oona one queshon too . Ef oona ansa me , A gwine tell oona whodat gii me de tority fa do dem ting .
40021025	Wen John wa Bactize people come yah , whodat gim de right fa bactize . Tell me , God gim de tority , or de people gim dat tority ? ”
40021026	Bot ef we say people gii John dat tority , we haffa be scaid ob de people , cause dey all bleebe dat John been a prophet . ”
40021027	So dey ansa Jedus say , “ We ain know . ”
40021028	Jedus say , “ Now den , wa oona tink bout dis ? One man got two son . E gone ta de fus son an tell um say , ‘ Me son , dis day yah go wok fa me een de gyaaden . ’
40021029	De son ansa e fada say , ‘ A ain gwine do um . ’ Bot atta dat , e saary fa wa e say . E change e mind an e gone fa do de wok .
40021030	Den de fada gone ta e oda son an tell um de same ting . Dat son ansa um say , ‘ A gwine go do um , sah , ’ bot e ain go do um .
40021031	Now den , tell me wish one ob dem two son yah done wa e fada tell um fa do ? ”
40021032	Cause John wa Bactize been come fa show oona how fa waak scraight wid God , an oona ain bleebe um . Bot dem wa da geda tax an dem ooman wa da lib loose life , dey bleebe um . Eben wen oona see dat dey bleebe um , oona still ain change oona sinful way an bleebe um . ”
40021033	Jedus tell um say , “ Listen yah ta dis oda paable . One man wa got a faam , e plant a heapa grapewine . E mek a wall roun de grapewine fiel , an e mek a place fa mash op de grape dem fa mek wine . An e build a place pontop de stone wall fa people fa keep gyaad oba de gyaaden . Den e rent de faam wid de grapewine ta some faama dem fa tek cyah ob de gyaaden . Den dat man gone way ta noda country .
40021034	Wen haabis time come , de man wa own de grapewine faam sen e wokman dem fa git de owna paat ob de haabis .
40021035	Bot dem faama wa tek cyah ob de grapewine , dey grab hole ta de owna wokman dem . Dey beat op on one , an dey kill noda one . An dey chunk stone at noda one .
40021036	Den de man wa own de grapewine faam sen oda wokman dem , mo den de fus time . Bot dey beat um op same way .
40021037	So den las ob all , de owna sen e son ta de faama dem . E say , ‘ Dey gwine show hona ta me son . ’
40021038	Bot wen de faama dem see de owna son , dey tell one noda say , ‘ Dat de son wa dis propaty yah gwine be lef ta . Leh we kill um , so dat de propaty gwine come ta we . ’
40021039	So dey grab hole ta um an shrow um outta de faam an kill um . ”
40021040	Den Jedus aks um say , “ Now den , wen de man wa own de grapewine faam come , wa e gwine do ta dem faama ? ”
40021041	Dey ansa say , “ Fa true , e gwine kill dem wickity people , an e gwine find oda faama dem fa tek cyah ob de grapewine , an fa gim e paat ob de haabis wen haabis time come . ”
40021042	Jedus tell um say , “ Ain oona neba read wa dey write een God Book ? Dey say ,
40021043	“ So den , A da tell oona say , de right wa oona got fa lib onda God rule ain gwine blongst ta oona no mo . Oda nation wa gwine do wa God tell um , dey gwine git de right fa hab God rule oba um . [
40021044	De poson wa faddown pon dis stone yah gwine broke op all e bone . An wen de stone faddown pon somebody , e gwine grine um op . ” ]
40021045	Wen de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem de Pharisee dem yeh dem paable wa Jedus tell , dey ondastan dat e beena taak bout dem .
40021046	So dey beena look fa way fa grab hole ta um . Bot dey been scaid ob de crowd ob people , cause de people bleebe dat Jedus a prophet .
40022001	Jedus da taak ta de people een paable gin .
40022002	E say , “ God rule stan like wen one king beena mek a marry feas fa e son .
40022003	E sen e saabant dem fa go call de people wa e done eenbite fa come ta de marry feas , bot dey ain wahn fa come .
40022004	So den , e sen oda saabant an e tell um say , ‘ Tell dem wa A been eenbite say , A done mek ready all ting fa de feas . A hab um butcha me ox dem an me fat calf dem , an ebryting done ready . Oona mus come ta de marry feas ! ’
40022005	Bot de people wa de saabant dem call fa come , dey ain pay um no mind , an dey gone off . One gone ta e faam . Noda one gone ta e sto .
40022006	De oda res grab hole ta de saabant dem wa de king sen . Dey beat um op an kill um .
40022007	De king been too bex . E sen e sodja dem fa go kill de people wa done kill e saabant dem , an fa bun dey town .
40022008	Den de king tell e oda saabant dem say , ‘ De marry feas done ready , bot de people wa A done been eenbite ain been fit fa come dey .
40022009	Mus go out ta de main screet dem an eenbite all de people wa oona able fa find . ’
40022010	So de saabant dem gone out ta de screet an geda all de people dey able fa find . Dey eenbite good people an bad people . An de place weh de king mek e marry feas been full op wid dem people wa e eenbite .
40022011	“ Bot wen de king gone een ta dat place fa see dem wa e eenbite , e see one man dey wa ain weah de cloes dat e oughta weah ta de marry feas .
40022012	De king aks um say , ‘ Me fren , how ya happen fa come eenside yah wen ya ain weah de cloes dat ya oughta weah ta de marry feas ? ’ De man ain got nottin fa say .
40022013	Den de king tell e saabant dem say , ‘ Tie op dis man han an foot , an chunk um out een de daak . Dey , people gwine cry bitta teah an bite dey tongue . ’ ”
40022014	An Jedus say , “ God eenbite plenty people , bot plenty people ain been pick fa come lib onda e rule . ”
40022015	Den de Pharisee dem gone way an mek plan togeda fa aks Jedus schemy queshon fa trip um op .
40022016	Dey sen dey own ciple dem ta Jedus , togeda wid some ob de Jew people wa been jine Herod group . Dey sen um fa go tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , we know ya da taak true , an ya da laan we de true way fa folla God . Ya ain warry bout wa people da tink , cause ya da look pon all people de same . ”
40022017	Den dey aks Jedus say , “ Well den , tell we wa ya tink . E right , coddin ta we Law , fa pay tax ta de Roman rula Caesar ? ”
40022018	Bot Jedus see shru dey trick , so e tell um say , “ Oona hypicrit ! Hoccome oona da try fa tek wa A say fa ketch me ?
40022019	Show me de Roman coin wa oona tek fa pay de tax ! ”
40022020	Den Jedus aks um say , “ Whodat hab e face an e name dey pon dis coin ? ”
40022021	Dey say , “ Dat Caesar face an name dey . ”
40022022	Wen dey yeh wa Jedus tell um , dey been stonish down . So dey lef um an gone way .
40022023	Dat same day dey , some Sadducee come ta Jedus . De Sadducee dem say dat dead people ain gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . Dey come aks Jedus one queshon .
40022024	Dey say , “ Teacha , Moses been say , ‘ Ef a man dead an lef e wife an ain hab no chullun , de man broda mus marry de wida ooman an hab chullun een de name ob de man wa done pass oba .
40022025	Now den , dey been seben broda wa nyuse fa lib yah mongst we . De fus one marry an e dead . Bot cause e ain hab no chullun , e lef e wife ta e nex broda .
40022026	De same ting happen ta de nex broda , an de nex atta dat . De same ting happen ta all de seben broda dem .
40022027	Las ob all , de wida ooman esef dead .
40022028	So den , wen de time come wen de dead people gwine git op an lib gin , whodat mongst de seben gwine hab dat ooman fa e wife ? All dem been marry um . ’ ”
40022029	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona ain tink right , cause oona ain ondastan wa dey write een God Book , needa God powa .
40022030	Wen de dead lib gin , dey gwine be like de angel dem een heaben an dey ain gwine be marry .
40022031	Now den , oona ain neba read wa God tell oona een e Book bout people wa gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin ?
40022032	God say , ‘ A de God ob Abraham , de God ob Isaac , an de God ob Jacob . ’ Dat tell we dat e de God ob people wa da lib . E ain no God ob dead people . ”
40022033	Dat dey wa Jedus beena laan de people mek um stonish .
40022034	Wen de Pharisee dem yeh say dat Jedus ansa de Sadducee dem so good dat dey ain got nottin mo fa say , den dey git togeda .
40022035	One ob dem Pharisee wa been a Jew Law teacha come ta Jedus an aks um queshon fa try trap um .
40022036	E aks um say , “ Teacha , wish law great mo den all de oda law dem ? ”
40022037	Jedus say , “ ‘ Ya mus lob de Lawd ya God wid all ya haat , an wid all ya soul , an wid all ya mind . ’
40022038	Dat de law wa great mo den all de oda law dem . Dat fus ob all de law dem .
40022039	De secon law , wa great mo den de oda res , e like dat fus law . Dat law say , ‘ Ya mus lob ya neighba de same way ya lob yasef . ’
40022040	All de Law dem wa God gii Moses , an all wa God hab de prophet dem laan people , dey eenside dem two law yah . ”
40022041	Wen de Pharisee dem geda togeda , Jedus aks um one queshon .
40022042	E say , “ Wa oona tink bout de Messiah ? Whodat fambly e come out fom ? ”
40022043	Jedus say , “ Den hoccome God Sperit mek David call um ‘ Lawd ’ ? Cause David say ,
40022044	‘ De Lawd say ta me Lawd ,
40022045	David call Christ ‘ Lawd . ’ So den hoccome Christ kin come fom David fambly ? ”
40022046	Wen Jedus say dat , ain been nobody able fa ansa um . Fom dat time dey , nobody ain got no mind fa aks Jedus queshon no mo .
40023001	Den Jedus taak ta de crowd ob people an e ciple dem .
40023002	E say , “ De Law teacha dem an de Pharisee dem got de tority fa tapetate fa oona de Law wa God been gii Moses .
40023003	So den , oona mus do all wa dey chaage oona fa do . Bot oona mus dohn do wa dey da do , cause dey ain do wa dey tell oda people fa do .
40023004	Dey way dey da tapetate de law , dey gii people hebby load fa tote . Bot deysef ain pit eben one finga fa hep um tote dat load .
40023005	Wasoneba dey da do , dey do um jes fa leh all de people shim . Dey da tie lezza case pon dey han an de front ob dey head wid diffunt wod fom God Book eenside um . Bot dem Pharisee an Law teacha mek dey case big so dat all de people kin shim . Same way so , dey got long tassle pon de bottom paat ob dey cloes .
40023006	Wen dey a feas , dey lob fa seddown ta de bes place fa nyam . Ta de meetin house , dey lob fa seddown weh all de people kin shim .
40023007	Pon de road , dey lob fa people fa hail um , call um ‘ Teacha . ’
40023008	Bot oona me ciple dem , oona mus dohn git people fa call oona ‘ Teacha , ’ cause oona all broda ob one noda , an oona got jes one Teacha .
40023009	Oona mus dohn call nobody yah een dis wol ‘ Fada , ’ cause oona got jes one Fada , an e dey een heaben .
40023010	An oona mus dohn git people fa call oona ‘ Massa , ’ cause oona got jes one Massa , wa de Messiah .
40023011	De one wa de mos high op mongst oona , e mus be oona saabant .
40023012	De poson wa pit esef op , God gwine pit um down , an de poson wa ain try fa be sompin special mongst oona , God gwine raise um op .
40023013	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona da shet de door een people face ta weh God da rule . Oonasef ain wahn fa go eenta weh e da rule , an oona da stop de oda people wa da try fa go een fa lib weh e da rule ! [
40023014	E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona tek oba wida ooman propaty an tief all dey got . An den oona stanop da pray long time so dat people kin say oona good people fa true ! Cause ob dat , God gwine punish oona mo den e gwine punish oda people ! ]
40023015	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona da trabel all oba de lan an de sea fa taak ta jes one poson an win um oba fa bleebe wa oona bleebe . An wen e bleebe , oona da mek dat poson go ta hell jes like oonasef , an e two time mo wossa den oonasef !
40023016	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona ! Oona jes like bline people wa da show oda bline people de road ! Oona da laan people say , ‘ Ef poson mek a wow an sweah ta God House , e ain haffa do wa e say e gwine do . Bot ef e mek a wow an sweah ta de gole wa dey een God House , dat poson haffa do wa e say e gwine do . ’
40023017	Oona bline eye fool ! Fa true God House mo greata den de gole , cause God House wa mek de gole God own , ainty ?
40023018	An oona da laan people say too , ‘ Ef poson mek a wow an sweah ta de alta een God House , e ain haffa do wa e say e gwine do . Bot ef e mek a wow an sweah ta de gif dey pon de alta , dat poson haffa do wa e say e gwine do . ’
40023019	Oona bline eye fool ! Fa true de alta mo greata den de gif , cause de alta wa mek de gif God own , ainty ?
40023020	So den , wen a poson mek a wow an sweah ta de alta , e da sweah ta de alta an all de gif dem pon de alta .
40023021	An wen a poson mek a wow an sweah ta God House , e da sweah ta God House an ta God wa da lib dey een God House .
40023022	An a poson wa mek a wow an sweah ta heaben , e da sweah ta de place weh God seddown fa rule , an ta God wa da seddown dey .
40023023	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona gii God a tent ob all de crop an ting oona git , eben de leetle mint an dill an cummin an oda herb wa oona grow een ya gyaaden . Stillyet , oona ain got no mind fa do de mo bigga ting dem wa God Law say oona mus do . Oona ain da do right ta people an hab mussy pon um . Oona ain scraight wid God . Fa true , all dem ting yah ya spose fa do , bot ya mus dohn lef off dem oda ting .
40023024	Oona jes like bline people wa da show oda bline people de road ! Oona da tek cyah fa pull de leeleetle fly outta ya drink bot swalla de big camel .
40023025	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona da wash de outside ob oona cup an plate , bot dey full op wid all dem ting wa ya git wen ya da tief an lib jes fa yasef .
40023026	Oona bline Pharisee ! Oona mus clean eenside de cup an de plate fus , an den de outside gwine be clean too .
40023027	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona jes like tomb wa dey kiba op wid white paint . De outside ob de tomb look too fine , bot eenside de tomb full op wid dead people bone an all kind ob dorty ting .
40023028	Same way so , wen people see oona , e look like oona da waak scraight wid God , bot eenside oona haat full op wid bad ting oona da do cause oona hypicrit an wickity .
40023029	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona , oona Law teacha an Pharisee ! Oona hypicrit ! Oona build tomb fa memba de prophet dem . An de tombstone ob dem wa beena waak scraight wid God , oona mek look too fine .
40023030	Oona da say , ef oona been dey een dat time wen we ole people been dey , oona ain been fa do wa dey done wen dey kill de prophet dem .
40023031	So oona da gree , say dat oona de chullun chullun ob dem wa been kill de prophet dem .
40023032	So den , oona mus go finish op de guilty wok wa oona ole people been staat fa do .
40023033	Oona snake an de son ob de snake ! Oona mus dohn tink oona gwine be able fa do sompin fa mek God dohn condemn oona fa go ta hell .
40023034	So den , A da sen oona prophet dem , man dem wa got sense an Law teacha dem . Oona gwine kill some ob dem . Oona gwine nail some ob dem pon a cross . An oona gwine beat some ob dem een de meetin house an dribe um fom one town ta noda .
40023035	An so God gwine hole oona sponsable fa all dem people wa done been kill yah pon dis eart , wa ain done nottin bad . Oona gwine suffa fa all dem wa been kill fom Abel , wa been scraight een God eye , all de way ta Zechariah , wa been Barachiah son , wa oona done kill dey tween God House an de alta weh dey mek sacrifice ta God .
40023036	A da tell oona fa true say , God gwine hole oona people yah wa da lib now sponsable fa all dat !
40023037	“ O Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Oona kill de prophet dem wa taak fa God , an chunk rock til oona kill dem wa God sen ta oona ! Hommuch time A been wahn fa geda oona people togeda roun me , jes like a hen geda e biddy dem ondaneet e wing ! Bot oona people ain wahn me fa do dat !
40023038	Look yah ! God gwine lef oona place , an ain nobody gwine go dey .
40023039	A da tell oona , oona ain gwine see me gin til de time come wen oona gwine say , ‘ God bless de one dat e done sen , dat come een de Lawd name . ’ ”
40024001	Jedus come outta God House an e beena waak way , wen e ciple dem come ta um fa git um fa look good at de buildin dem ob God House .
40024002	Jedus aks um say , “ Oona see all dis ? A da tell oona fa true , none dese stone yah gwine be lef een dey place , one pontop de oda . Ebry stone yah gwine be chunk down outta e place . ”
40024003	Wen Jedus seddown pon de Mount Olib , e ciple dem come ta um . Wen dey ain been none oda people dey , de ciple dem aks Jedus say , “ Wen dat gwine happen ? Wa gwine happen fa show we wen ya gwine come back an de end time done come ? ”
40024004	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona mus be on de watch . Mus dohn leh nobody fool oona .
40024005	Cause plenty people gwine come een me name . Dey gwine say , ‘ A de Messiah ! ’ An dey gwine mek plenty people fool .
40024006	Oona gwine yeh bout waa dem wa dey close by oona , an people gwine tell oona bout dem wa faa way . Bot oona mus dohn be scaid . Dese ting yah haffa happen fus , bot dat ain mean dat de end time done come .
40024007	Nation gwine fight ginst oda nation , an one country gwine be ginst noda country . All oba de wol dry drought dem gwine come shru an plenty people ain gwine hab nottin fa nyam , an de groun gwine rumble all roun .
40024008	All dem ting dey , dey same like de fus pain wa come fa de modda wen e da bon e chile .
40024009	“ Den de people wa hab tority gwine grab hole ta oona an do oona plenty bad ting . An den dey gwine kill oona . People een all de country dem ob de wol gwine hate oona cause ob me .
40024010	Een dat same time dey , plenty people gwine fall eenta sin an ain gwine folla me no mo . Dey gwine hate one noda an han one noda oba ta de tority dem .
40024011	Heapa prophet wa ain taak true , dey gwine appeah an fool plenty people .
40024012	An cause ebil gwine spread all oba de wol mo an mo , heapa people gwine hab less an less lob een dey haat .
40024013	Bot God gwine sabe ebrybody wa stanop fa me til de wol done end .
40024014	Dey gwine tell de Good Nyews bout God rule all oba de wol , so dat all people gwine git de chance fa yeh . An den de end gwine come .
40024015	“ Oona gwine see ‘ De Horrible Bad Ting wa mek God place empty ’ wa de prophet Daniel been taak bout , da stanop een de place wa blongst ta God . ” ( Oona wa da read , oona fa ondastan wa dis mean ! )
40024016	“ Wen dat time come , de people een Judea mus ron way quick ta de hill country .
40024017	Dem wa dey pontop de roof ob dey house mus dohn tek de time fa go down eenside dey house gin fa tek dey ting .
40024018	An dem wa da wok een de fiel mus dohn go back fa tek dey cloes .
40024019	Dat time gwine be mighty haad fa ooman dem wa wid chile , an dem wa hab leetle baby !
40024020	Oona mus pray ta God dat dat time wen oona haffa ron way ain come een de winta time , needa pon de Woshup Day !
40024021	De bad trouble wa gwine come ta people een dat time gwine be wossa den all de trouble dem wa done come fom de time wen God mek de wol op til now , an atta dat , ting like dat ain gwine happen gin .
40024022	Bot God done been say dat e gwine cut shot dat time dey wen people gwine suffa too bad . Ef God ain done dat , ain nobody gwine be lef een de wol . Bot fa de sake ob dem people wa God done pick , e gwine cut shot dat time dey .
40024023	“ Wen dat time come , oona mus dohn bleebe nobody ef e tell oona say , ‘ Look de Messiah dey yah ! ’ or ‘ Look , e oba yonda ! ’
40024024	Cause some people gwine come wa gwine lie , say dey de Messiah . Some gwine come wa gwine lie , say dey a prophet . Dey gwine do miracle an show plenty sign wa stonish de people . Dey gwine try fa mek fool ob de people dem wa God done pick , ef dey been able fa do dat .
40024025	So den oona mus listen op ! A done waan oona bout dem ting yah .
40024026	“ Ef people tell oona say , ‘ Look , de Messiah dey een de wildaness ! ’ oona mus dohn go dey . Needa ef dey tell oona say , ‘ Look , e da hide yah eenside de house ! ’ oona mus dohn bleebe um .
40024027	Cause wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come gin , ebrybody gwine be able fa shim , jes like lightnin dat flash cross all de sky an light um op fom de east side ta de west side .
40024028	“ Wehsoneba dey a dead body , de buzzat dem gwine geda togeda dey too .
40024029	“ Wen all dat bad trouble dey done , de sun gwine daak an de moon ain gwine shine no mo . De staa dem gwine faddown outta de sky , an de powa dem wa dey een de eliment gwine shake an moob outta dey place .
40024030	Dat de time wen de people gwine see de sign een de cloud wa show dat de Man wa Come fom God da come . Den ebrybody fom ebry nation gwine cry bitta teah . Dey gwine see de Man wa Come fom God da come down pon a cloud wid powa an great glory .
40024031	De trumpet gwine blow loud . Den e gwine sen e angel dem all oba de wol fom one end ta de oda , fa geda togeda dem people wa e done pick fa be e own an bring um ta um .
40024032	“ Now den , mus look ta de fig tree fa laan fom um . Wen de branch ob dat tree hab nyew life an staat fa leaf out , oona know summa mos yah .
40024033	Same way , wen oona see all dem ting wa A beena taak bout , oona gwine know dat de end time mos yah .
40024034	A da tell oona fa true , all dem ting yah gwine happen fo de people dead wa da lib now .
40024035	De eliment an de wol esef ain gwine las faeba , bot me wod gwine las faeba an eba .
40024036	“ Ain nobody know de day , ain nobody know de hour wen dem ting yah gwine happen . De angel dem wa een heaben deysef , needa God Son esef ain know dat day or dat hour . Jes me Fada God , e de onliest one wa know de time wen dem ting gwine happen .
40024037	Jes like how e been een Noah time , dat de way e gwine be wen de Man wa Come fom God come back .
40024038	Een Noah time fo de wata been kiba de wol , de people beena nyam an drink an git marry . Dey beena lib dat same way til dat day wen Noah gone eenside de ark .
40024039	Stillyet dey ain been know wa beena happen til de big rain come an dey all git kiba op een de wata . Dat so e gwine be dat day wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back ta de wol .
40024040	Two man gwine be een de fiel , da wok . Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one .
40024041	Two ooman gwine be dey da grine meal . Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one .
40024042	So den , oona mus be on de watch , cause oona ain know wa day oona Lawd gwine come back .
40024043	Oona mus ondastan dat ef de man wa own a house know wen de tief gwine come ta um een de night , dat man ain gwine sleep . E gwine stay wide wake an e ain gwine leh de tief broke eenta e house an tief e propaty .
40024044	Same fashion , oonasef mus stay ready all de time , cause de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back ta dis wol wen oona da tink say , ‘ E ain da come now ! ’
40024045	“ Who dat wokman wa got plenty sense an wa true ta de man e wok fa ? E de one dat de bossman gii chaage oba all dem een de house wen de bossman gone off , fa gii de oda wokman dem dey food wen de time come fa nyam .
40024046	Dat wokman gwine be bless fa true , wen de bossman come home , ef e find um da do dem ting wa e done tell um fa do .
40024047	A da tell oona fa true , de bossman gwine gim chaage oba all e propaty an ting .
40024048	Bot sposin dat wokman een chaage , e wickity an tink say , ‘ Me bossman ain gwine come right back . ’
40024049	Den e gwine staat fa beat op pon de oda wokman dem , an e gwine nyam an drink wid dem wa git dronk .
40024050	Den one day de bossman gwine come back home wen dat wokman ain spect um fa come .
40024051	De bossman gwine whip um too bad . E gwine mek um suffa dey weh de hypicrit dem da suffa . Dey een dat place e gwine cry bitta teah an bite e tongue .
40025001	“ Wen dat day come , God rule gwine stan like wen ten nyoung gyal dey tek dey oll lamp an gone fa meet de groom .
40025002	Fibe ob dem nyoung gyal ain got no sense , bot de oda fibe dem got sense .
40025003	Wen de fibe wa ain got no sense tek dey lamp an gone , dey ain tote no extry oll long wid um fa dey lamp .
40025004	Bot dem wa got sense , dey tote extry oll long wid um fa dey lamp .
40025005	De groom been late , so de nyoung gyal dem all git tired an fall fa sleep .
40025006	“ Somebody holla out een de middle ob de night say , ‘ Look , de groom da come ! Oona mus go meet um ! ’
40025007	Den all dem gyal git op an trim dey lamp dem , git um all ready .
40025008	Dem wa ain got no sense tell dem wa got sense say , ‘ Oona mus gii we some ob oona oll , cause we lamp da gwine out . ’
40025009	Bot dem wa got sense , dey tell um say , ‘ No , cause we jes got nuff oll fa wesef . Steada dat , oona mus go ta dem wa sell oll an buy oona own . ’
40025010	So dem fibe gyal wa ain got no sense , dey gone fa buy dey oll . Bot wiles dey beena gwine , de groom git dey ta de fibe gyal wa got sense . Dey done been ready fa meet um an dey gone wid de groom eenta de place weh de marry feas been . Den de door ta dat place been lock shet .
40025011	“ Atta dat , de oda fibe gyal wa ain got no sense , dey come back an say , ‘ Please sah , open de door fa we ! ’
40025012	Bot de groom say , ‘ A da tell oona fa true , A ain know who ya da ! ’ ”
40025013	An Jedus tell de people say , “ Oona mus keep on da watch , cause oona ain know de day or de hour wen A gwine come back .
40025014	“ God rule gwine be jes like wen one man ready fa lef e house an go faa way . E call e wokman dem an gim chaage oba e propaty .
40025015	De man gii all de wokman dem walyable gole coin , coddin ta how ebry one ob um able fa do e wok . E gii one wokman fibe gole coin , an e gii de secon wokman two gole coin . E gii de oda wokman one gole coin . Den e gone pon e journey .
40025016	Tareckly de wokman wa got de fibe coin gone fa trade wid e gole coin an e mek fibe mo gole coin .
40025017	Same way so , de wokman wa got two gole coin , e mek two mo gole coin .
40025018	Bot de wokman wa got one gole coin , e gone an dig a hole een de groun an hide de gole coin wa e bossman gim .
40025019	“ Long time e gone , de bossman ob dem wokman come back . E aks de wokman dem fa tell um wa dey done wid de gole coin dem wa e gim .
40025020	De wokman wa e been gii fibe gole coin , e come bring um fibe coin mo . E say , ‘ Sah , ya gii me chaage oba fibe gole coin . Look ! A done mek fibe mo gole coin . ’
40025021	E bossman ansa say , ‘ Ya done good . Ya a good wokman wa true ta e bossman ! Cause A able fa trus ya fa do a leetle job , now A gwine gii ya chaage oba plenty big ting . Come hab a good time long wid ya bossman ! ’
40025022	Den de wokman wa de bossman been gii two gole coin , e come say , ‘ Sah , ya gii me chaage oba two gole coin . Look ! A done mek two mo gole coin . ’
40025023	E bossman ansa say , ‘ Ya done good . Ya a good wokman wa true ta e bossman ! Cause A able fa trus ya fa do a leetle job , now A gwine gii ya chaage oba plenty big ting . Come hab a good time long wid ya bossman ! ’
40025024	Den de wokman wa de bossman been gii one gole coin , e come say , ‘ Sah , A been know dat ya a haad man . Ya da haabis weh ya ain plant an ya da geda weh ya ain scatta no seed .
40025025	So A scaid ob ya an A gone out an hide de gole coin wa ya been gii me , een de groun . Look ! Yah de gole coin wa blongst ta ya . ’
40025026	De bossman ansa say , ‘ Ya a wickity wokman wa ain do nottin ! So ya been know dat A da haabis weh A ain plant an A da geda weh A ain scatta seed , ainty ?
40025027	Well den , ya oughta hab pit me money een de bank . Den wen A come back , leas A gwine hab de money an de interest e done git too . ’
40025028	E say , ‘ Oona mus tek de gole coin fom dis man . Gim ta de wokman wa hab de ten gole coin .
40025029	Ebry poson wa got sompin , God gwine gim mo , an e gwine hab mo den nuff . Bot de one wa ain got nottin , God gwine tek way dat leeleetle bit wa e got .
40025030	An dis wokman yah wa ain wot nottin , chunk um way outside , eenta de daak place . Dey , people gwine cry bitta teah an bite dey tongue . ’
40025031	“ Wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come gin wid all e glory an all God angel dem , e gwine seddown pon de shrone fa rule .
40025032	All de people een de wol gwine be geda dey fo um . Den e gwine wide de people op eenta two side , jes like de shephud wa da wide op de sheep dem pon one side an de goat dem pon de oda side .
40025033	E gwine pit de sheep dem pon e right han side , an e gwine pit de goat dem pon e lef han side .
40025034	Den de King gwine tell dem people pon e right han side , say , ‘ Oona come , oona wa me Fada bless ! Oona come tek ya place wa God gwine gii ya onda e rule . E done git dat place dey ready fa oona fom de time wen e fus mek de wol .
40025035	Cause wen A been hongry , oona gii me sompin fa nyam , an wen A been tosty , oona gii me sompin fa drink . Wen A been a scranja , oona gii me haaty welcome eenta oona house .
40025036	Wen A ain hab nottin fa weah , oona gii me cloes , an wen A been sick , oona come hep me . Wen A been een de jailhouse , oona come an wisit me . ’
40025037	De people wa waak scraight wid God , dey gwine ansa say , ‘ Lawd , wen ya been hongry an we gii ya sompin fa nyam ? Wen ya been tosty an we gii ya sompin fa drink ?
40025038	Wen ya been a scranja an we gii ya haaty welcome eenta we house ? Wen ya ain hab nottin fa weah an we gii ya cloes ?
40025039	Wen ya been sick or ya been een de jailhouse an we gone fa wisit ya ? ’
40025040	De King gwine ansa say , ‘ A da tell oona fa true , wensoneba oona done dem ting yah fa one ob me broda dem yah wa oda people say ain wot nottin , dat been fa me dat oona done dem ting . ’
40025041	“ Den de King gwine tell de people dem wa pon e lef han side , say , ‘ Oona git way fom me ! God done condemn oona fa suffa een de fire wa gwine bun faeba an eba , wa God done git ready fa de Debil an e angel dem .
40025042	Cause wen A been hongry , oona ain gii me nottin fa nyam . Wen A been tosty , oona ain gii me nottin fa drink .
40025043	Wen A been a scranja , oona ain gii me no welcome eenta oona house . Wen A ain been hab no cloes , oona ain gii me nottin fa weah . Wen A been sick an een de jailhouse , oona ain come fa wisit me . ’
40025044	Den dey gwine ansa say , ‘ Lawd , wen we eba see ya hongry or tosty or ya a scranja ? Wen we eba see ya wid nottin fa weah or sick or een de jailhouse , an we ain hep oona ? ’
40025045	De King gwine ansa say , ‘ A da tell oona fa true , wensoneba oona ain hep one ob dem people yah wa oda people say ain wot nottin , dat been me dat oona ain hep . ’
40025046	So den , dey gwine go way weh dey gwine be punish faeba an eba . Bot de people dem wa waak scraight wid God , dey gwine git ebalastin life . ”
40026001	Wen Jedus done taak all dem wod yah , e taak ta e ciple dem .
40026002	E say , “ Oona know dat een two day de Passoba holiday da come , an dey gwine han oba de Man wa Come fom God ta people wa gwine nail um pon a cross . ”
40026003	Den de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem , dey meet togeda een Caiaphas bighouse . Caiaphas been head man ob de Jew priest leada dem .
40026004	Dey beena study dey head fa figga out how fa grab hole ta Jedus an kill um dout nobody find out bout um .
40026005	Bot dey say , “ We mus dohn do dat jurin de Passoba holiday , cause ef we do , de people gwine fight fa um . ”
40026006	Jedus been ta Bethany een Simon house . Simon de man wa been hab leposy .
40026007	Wen Jedus gone ta de table an dey beena nyam , one ooman come ta Jedus , da tote spensiz pafume een a jar wa dey mek fom alabasta stone . De ooman pour dat pafume pon Jedus head .
40026008	Jedus ciple dem shim an dey git bex . Dey aks one noda say , “ Hoccome dis ooman done waste spensiz pafume like dat ?
40026009	Dey kin sell dat pafume an git a whole heapa money fa um , an gii dat money ta de people wa ain got nottin ! ”
40026010	Jedus been know wa dey beena say , so e aks um say , “ Hoccome oona da bodda dat ooman ? Dat one fine ting wa e done fa me .
40026011	People wa ain got nottin gwine be dey wid oona all de time , bot A ain gwine be dey wid oona all de time .
40026012	Wen de ooman pit dis pafume pon me body , e done um fa git me ready fa de time wen dey gwine bury me .
40026013	A da tell oona fa true , all oba de wol , wehsoneba dey gwine go fa tell de Good Nyews , dey gwine memba dis ooman an taak bout dis ting wa e done . ”
40026014	One ob Jedus tweb ciple wa name Judas Iscariot , e gone ta de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem .
40026015	E aks um say , “ Wa oona gwine pay me ef A han Jedus oba ta oona ? ” Dey gim tirty silba coin .
40026016	Fom dat time dey , Judas staat fa look fa a chance fa han Jedus oba ta dem .
40026017	De fus day ob de Feas ob Unleaven Bread , de ciple dem come ta Jedus an aks um say , “ Weh ya wahn we fa go git de Passoba ration ready fa nyam ? ”
40026018	Jedus ansa um say , “ One man dey een de city . Oona go ta um an tell um say , ‘ De Teacha say , me time ain faa way . Me an me ciple dem gwine nyam de Passoba Suppa ta ya house . ’ ”
40026019	De ciple dem gone fa do wa Jedus tell um , an dey git de ration ready fa de Passoba Suppa .
40026020	Wen ebenin time come , Jedus an de tweb ciple dem come seddown ta de table fa nyam .
40026021	Wiles dey beena nyam , Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , one ob oona gwine han me oba ta dem people wa wahn fa kill me . ”
40026022	De ciple dem been too saaful , an dey staat fa aks Jedus one by one say , “ Fa sho , Lawd , ya ain mean me , ainty ? ”
40026023	Jedus ansa say , “ De one wa dip e bread een de same dish wid me , e de one wa gwine han me oba .
40026024	De Man wa Come fom God gwine dead jes like dey write bout um een God Book . Bot e gwine be too bad fa dat man wa da han oba de Man wa Come fom God ta dem wa gwine kill um ! E been gwine be faa betta fa dat man dey ef e ain neba been bon ! ”
40026025	Den Judas , de one wa gwine han Jedus oba , say , “ Fa sho , Teacha , ya ain mean me ainty ? ”
40026026	Wiles dey beena nyam , Jedus tek de bread an tank God fa um . Den e broke de bread op an gim ta e ciple dem an say , “ Oona fa tek dis bread yah an nyam um . Dis yah me body . ”
40026027	Den e tek de cup ob wine an tank God fa um . An e gim ta um an say , “ All ob oona , drink fom dis cup .
40026028	Dis me blood wa bine op de nyew cobnant tween God an e people . Wen me blood done pour out , God gwine fagib plenty people dey sin .
40026029	A da tell oona , A ain gwine drink wine no mo til dat day wen A gwine drink de nyew wine wid oona weh me Fada da rule . ”
40026030	Den dey sing one hymn an gone out ta de Mount Olib .
40026031	Den Jedus tell um say , “ Dis night , oona all gwine ron way an bandon me . Cause dey write een God Book say , ‘ God gwine kill de shephud , an de sheep gwine scatta . ’
40026032	Bot atta A git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , A gwine go ta Galilee head ob oona . ”
40026033	Peter tell Jedus say , “ Eben ef all de oda ciple dem bandon ya , A ain neba gwine bandon ya ! ”
40026034	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell oona fa true , dis night , fo de roosta crow , ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me . ”
40026035	Bot Peter ansa say , “ Eben ef A haffa dead wid ya , A ain neba gwine say dat A ain know ya ! ”
40026036	Den Jedus gone wid e ciple dem ta a place wa dey call Gethsemane . E tell um say , “ Oona seddown yah wiles A pray oba yonda . ”
40026037	Wen e gone , e tek Peter an Zebedee two son long wid um . An Jedus git too saaful an e haat been too hebby .
40026038	E tell um say , “ Me haat hebby sommuch , A feel like A gwine dead . Oona wait yah an stay wake wid me . ”
40026039	E lef um an gone on a leetle bit mo . Den e git down wid e face pon de groun an e pray ta God say , “ Me Fada , ef e kin be , tek way dis cup fom me . Stillyet , ya mus dohn do wa A wahn . Mus do wa ya wahn . ”
40026040	Den Jedus gone back ta de ciple dem an e see dat dey beena sleep . E aks Peter say , “ Ain oona able fa stay wake wid me fa jes one hour ?
40026041	Oona mus stay wake , an pray ta God so dat Satan ain gwine be able fa mek oona do ebil . Oona hab mind fa do de right ting , bot oona body ain hab scrent fa do um . ”
40026042	Jedus gone way de secon time an pray say , “ Me Fada , ef ya cyahn tek way dis cup lessin A drink fom um , ya mus do wa ya wahn . ”
40026043	Den e come back gin ta de ciple dem , see dat dey beena sleep . Dey ain been able fa keep dey eye open .
40026044	So Jedus lef um an gone way gin , an fa de tird time e pray de same pray wa e beena pray .
40026045	Den e gone back ta de ciple dem an say , “ Oona stillyet da sleep an res ? Look yah ! De time done come wen dey gwine han oba de Man wa Come fom God ta dem wickity people .
40026046	Oona mus git op ! Leh we go . Look yah , de man wa da han me oba , e da come now ! ”
40026047	Wiles Jedus beena taak , Judas , wa been one ob de tweb ciple dem , e git dey . E come wid a whole heapa people da tote sode an big stick fa fight wid . De leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem done sen dem people yah wid Judas .
40026048	Judas done been tell dem people how dey gwine know Jedus . E been say , “ De man wa A gwine kiss , dat de man oona fa grab hole ta . ”
40026049	So wen Judas git dey , e gone scraight op ta Jedus , an e say , “ Good ebenin , Teacha . ” Den e kiss um .
40026050	Jedus ansa say , “ Fren , do wa ya come fa do . ”
40026051	Jes den one ob dem wa been dey wid Jedus pull out e sode . E scrike de saabant ob de head man ob de Jew priest leada dem , an e cut off e yea .
40026052	Jedus tell de one wid de sode , say , “ Pit ya sode back een e place , cause all dem wa fight wid sode , de sode gwine kill um .
40026053	Ain ya know dat ef A aks me Fada fa hep me , jes den e gwine sen tweb aamy ob angel fa come hep me ?
40026054	Bot ef A do dat , how dat gwine happen wa dey write een God Book ? Cause God Book say e haffa happen dis way . ”
40026055	Den Jedus tell de crowd say , “ Oona haffa come da tote sode an big stick fa fight wid , fa grab hole ta me ? A ain no tief . Ebry day A beena seddown da teach een God House , an oona ain neba grab hole ta me .
40026056	Bot all dis happen so dat wa de prophet dem been write een God Book gwine come true . ”
40026057	De people dem wa grab hole ta Jedus tek um ta Caiaphas , de head man ob de priest leada dem . De Law teacha dem an de oda Jew leada dem been geda togeda dey .
40026058	Now Peter beena folla long hine Jedus bot e ain git close ta um . E folla long right ta de head man yaad . Den e gone eenta de yaad an seddown wid de gyaad dem fa see wa gwine happen .
40026059	De leada dem ob de priest dem an all de oda leada dem wa jedge een de Jew Council , dey try fa find some chaage ginst Jedus eben ef e ain been true , so dey kin kill um .
40026060	Bot dey ain been able fa find none , eben wen plenty people come tell lie ginst Jedus . Den two people come op .
40026061	Dey say , “ Dis man say , ‘ A kin stroy God House an den tek shree day fa build um back op gin . ’ ”
40026062	De head man ob de priest leada dem stanop an aks Jedus say , “ Wa mek dem people say ya done dem ting ? Ain ya got nottin fa say bout dat ? ”
40026063	Bot Jedus ain neba say a mumblin wod . De head man taak ta um gin say , “ A da chaage ya een de name ob God wa da lib faeba , ya mus sweah fa tell we ef ya de Messiah , de Son ob God . ”
40026064	Jedus ansa say , “ Ya right wen ya say dat . Fudamo A da tell oona say , de time gwine come wen oona gwine see de Man wa Come fom God da seddown pon de right han side ob God , wa got all powa . Oona gwine shim da come down ta dis wol pon heaben cloud ! ”
40026065	Wen de head man yeh wa Jedus say , e bex til e teah e cloes an e say , “ Dis man done say ebil ting ginst God ! We ain need no mo people wod ginst um , ainty ? Right yah , oonasef done yeh de ebil ting e say ginst God !
40026066	Wa oona say ? ”
40026067	Den dey spit een e face an knock um . An some ob dem slap um .
40026068	Dey say , “ Ya a prophet , de Messiah . So den tell we who dat wa knock ya ! ”
40026069	Now den , Peter beena seddown outside een de head man yaad . An one de gyal dem wa wok fa de head man come ta Peter an say , “ Ya been dey too , wid dat Jedus wa come fom Galilee . ”
40026070	Bot Peter tell um all e ain know Jedus . E say , “ A ain know wa ya da taak bout . ”
40026071	Den Peter gone out close ta de gate . Noda saabant gyal see Peter an e tell de people wa beena stan roun dey say , “ Dis man been dey wid Jedus wa come fom Nazareth . ”
40026072	Bot Peter gin say dat ain so . E say , “ A sweah , A ain know dat man ! ”
40026073	Atta a leetle bit , de man dem wa da stan roun dey come op ta Peter an tell um , say , “ Fa sho , ya one ob dem wa been dey wid Jedus . De way ya da taak show dat fa true ya come fom dey ! ”
40026074	Den Peter mek a wow an sweah ta um say , “ Leh God mek me suffa ef A ain da taak true ! A ain know dat man ! ”
40026075	An Peter memba dat Jedus done tell um say , “ Fo de roosta crow , ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me . ” Peter gone outta de yaad an e cry bitta teah .
40027001	Wen day clean , all de leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem geda togeda fa mek plan ginst Jedus fa kill um .
40027002	Dey tie op Jedus han , an den dey tek um way an han um oba ta Pontius Pilate , wa been de Roman gobna .
40027003	Wen Judas wa sell Jedus an han um oba ta e enemy dem know dat dey done condemn Jedus , e been too saary fa wa e done done . So e tek de tirty silba coin back , gim ta de leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem .
40027004	E tell um say , “ A done sin , cause A sell a man wa ain done nottin bad . ”
40027005	Judas fling dem silba coin eenta God House an lef dey . Den e gone off an hang esef .
40027006	De leada dem ob de priest dem pick op dem coin an say , “ Dis blood money . We law ain leh we fa pit um een de place weh we da keep de money fa God House . ”
40027007	So dey cide fa go buy one fiel wa name Potter Fiel wid dat money . Dey do dat fa mek a grabeyaad fa people wa ain Jew .
40027008	Cause ob dat , eben op ta now , dey call dat fiel , de Blood Fiel .
40027009	So den , wa de prophet Jeremiah been say , dat so e happen . E been say , “ Dey tek de tirty silba coin wa some de Israel people gree fa pay fa um ,
40027010	an wid dat money dey buy de fiel wa blongst ta a man wa beena mek clay pot , jes like de Lawd tell me fa do . ”
40027011	Dey mek Jedus stanop fo Gobna Pilate . De gobna aks Jedus say , “ Ya de king ob de Jew people ? ”
40027012	Bot wen de leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem cuse Jedus , say e do bad , Jedus ain ansa nottin .
40027013	Pilate aks um say , “ Ain ya yeh all dem bad ting dey da cuse ya ob ? ”
40027014	Bot Jedus ain crack e teet . So de gobna been stonish .
40027015	Ebry yeah wen dey hab de Passoba Feas , de gobna nyuse fa free one poson wa de crowd ob people been wahn , fom outta de jailhouse .
40027016	Dat time dey , one man wa all de people know bout , e been dey een de jailhouse . De man been name Barabbas .
40027017	So wen de crowd ob people geda togeda , Pilate aks um say , “ Wish one ob dem two man yah oona wahn me fa free fa oona ? Oona wahn me fa free Barabbas or Jedus , wa dey call de Messiah ? ”
40027018	Pilate been know dat de Jew leada dem done han Jedus oba ta um cause dey been jealous ob um .
40027019	Wiles Pilate beena seddown een de chair weh dey seddown fa jedge people , Pilate wife sen tell um say , “ Mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid dis man wa ain done nottin bad . Cause las night de dream wa A dream bout um been warry me tommuch . ”
40027020	Bot de leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem coax de crowd til de people ready fa tell Pilate dey wahn um fa free Barabbas an kill Jedus .
40027021	Gobna Pilate aks de people gin say , “ Wish one ob dem two man yah oona wahn me fa free fa oona ? ”
40027022	Den Pilate aks de people say , “ Well den , wa A gwine do wid Jedus wa dey call de Messiah ? ”
40027023	Pilate aks de people say , “ Hoccome ? Wa ebil ting e done ? ”
40027024	Pilate see dat e ain gwine be able fa git de people fa say nottin diffunt . Steada dat , dey staat fa riot . So e tek some wata een a basin an e wash e han fo de crowd . E tell um say , “ A ain sponsable fa dis . Ef e dead , oona sponsable fa um ! ”
40027025	All de people ansa say , “ Leh we an we chullun be sponsable fa e det . ”
40027026	Den Pilate free Barabbas fa um . An e han oba Jedus ta e sodja dem fa beat um an nail um pon de cross .
40027027	Pilate sodja dem tek Jedus eenta Gobna Pilate bighouse , an all de sodja dem wa lib dey geda roun Jedus .
40027028	Dey pull all e cloes off um . Den dey dress Jedus een a daak red robe , like a king weah .
40027029	Den dey mek a crown fom bramble branch an pit um pon e head . An dey pit a stick een e right han fa hole . Den dey kneel down fo um . Dey hole um cheap , hail um say , “ Leh de Jew people King hab long life ! ”
40027030	Den dey spit pon um an tek de stick wa been dey een e han an knock um een e head oba an oba gin .
40027031	Wen dey done hole um cheap , dey pull de robe off um an dress um een e own cloes gin . Den dey tek um way fa go nail um pon de cross .
40027032	Wiles dey beena gwine , dey meet one man wa name Simon , wa been bon een Cyrene . De sodja dem grab hole ta um an mek um tote Jedus cross .
40027033	Dey git ta de place dey call Golgotha . Dat mean “ De place wa look like a man skull . ”
40027034	Den de sodja dem gii Jedus wine wa dey been mix wid gall . Bot wen Jedus taste um , e ain drink um .
40027035	Dey nail Jedus pon de cross , an den dey shrow dice fa wide op e cloes mongst um .
40027036	An den dey seddown da watch um dey .
40027037	Dey write down de chaage dey been hab ginst Jedus fa de people fa read , den dey nail um oba Jedus head . De chaage say , “ DIS YAH JEDUS , DE KING OB DE JEW PEOPLE . ”
40027038	Dey nail two tief too pon dey own cross . Dey pit one man pon Jedus right han side an de oda man pon e lef han side .
40027039	De people wa beena pass by shrow slam pon Jedus . Dey shake dey head fa show dey hole Jedus cheap .
40027040	Dey tell um say , “ So dey ! Ya beena say ya gwine stroy God House an jes tek shree day fa build um back op . Well den , sabe yasef now ! Ef ya God Son , come down fom de cross ! ”
40027041	Same way so , de leada dem ob de priest dem , de Law teacha dem an de oda Jew leada dem hole um cheap .
40027042	Dey say , “ E sabe oda people , bot e ain able fa sabe esef ! E de King ob Israel , ainty ? Leh um come down fom de cross now , so dat we gwine bleebe pon um !
40027043	E bleebe pon God an e say e God Son . Leh God sabe um now ef God wahn um fa e own ! ”
40027044	Same way , de tief dem wa been nail pon dey own cross , dey too shrow slam pon Jedus .
40027045	E been bout tweb o'clock noon wen de sun stop fa shine . All dat lan been pitch daak fa shree hour .
40027046	Bout shree o'clock , Jedus holla loud say , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? ” Dat mean , “ Me God , me God , hoccome ya done lef me ? ”
40027047	Wen some people wa beena stanop dey yeh wa Jedus say , dey say , “ Dis man da call ta Elijah . ”
40027048	One dem ron fa git a sponge . E soak um wid cheap wine an tie de sponge pon de end ob a long stick . Den e hice de stick op ta Jedus lip fa leh Jedus suck de wine een de sponge .
40027049	Bot de oda people dey , dey say , “ Wait , leh we see ef Elijah gwine come fa sabe um ! ”
40027050	Jedus holla loud gin , an den e dead .
40027051	Jes den , de big tick curtain wa beena hang een God House split down de middle , fom de top down ta de bottom . De groun shake an de big stone dem broke een two .
40027052	De tomb dem deysef broke open , an de body dem ob a whole heapa God people wa done been dead , dey git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin .
40027053	Dey come outta dey tomb , an atta Jedus git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , dey gone eenta de holy city Jerusalem an appeah ta plenty people .
40027054	De Roman offisa an de sodja dem wa been wid um da gyaad Jedus dey , wen de groun shake an dey see wa happen , dey been scaid ta det an dey say , “ Fa true , dis man yah been God Son ! ”
40027055	Plenty ooman dem wa been come outta Galilee beena folla Jedus fa hep um . Dey beena stanop way off , da look at wa happen .
40027056	Some dem ooman been Mary Magdalene , Mary wa been James an Joseph dem modda , an Zebedee son dem modda .
40027057	Wen ebenin time come , one man wa been rich come dey . E been come fom Arimathea town an e name been Joseph , an e beena bleebe pon Jedus an folla um .
40027058	Now Joseph gone ta Pilate an aks um fa leh um hab Jedus body . Pilate gii e sodja dem orda fa gii Joseph de body ob Jedus .
40027059	So den , Joseph tek Jedus body an wrop um op een a clean linen closs .
40027060	Den e gone pit Jedus body eenside e own tomb wa dey jes been cut outta de rock dey . E roll one big stone fo de tomb doormout , fa kiba um . Den e gone .
40027061	An Mary Magdalene an de oda Mary beena seddown dey , cross fom de tomb .
40027062	De nex day , pon de Woshup Day , de leada dem ob de priest dem an de Pharisee dem gone ta Pilate .
40027063	Dey tell um say , “ Sah , we memba wen dat man wa ain taak true been dey wid we , e been say , ‘ Atta shree day , A gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ’
40027064	So den , please sah , gii orda fa mek sho de tomb shet op good an tight til de shree day pass , so dat e ciple dem ain gwine be able fa tief de body an den tell de people say , ‘ E done git op fom mongst de dead an e da lib gin . ’ Ef dat happen , dis las lie gwine be mo wossa den de fus lie . ”
40027065	Pilate ansa um say , “ Oona kin tek de sodja dem an hab um gyaad de tomb good as oona kin . ”
40027066	So dey gone an mek sho de tomb been shet op good an tight an pit a seal pon um , an dey lef de sodja dem fa gyaad um .
40028001	Atta de Woshup Day , day clean pon de fus day ob de week , Mary Magdalene an de oda Mary gone fa look at de tomb .
40028002	All ob a sudden , de groun shake too bad . De Lawd angel come down fom heaben an roll back de big stone wa beena kiba de tomb doormout . Den de angel seddown pon de stone .
40028003	Dat angel beena shine like lightnin , an e cloes been white like snow .
40028004	An de sodja dem wa beena gyaad de tomb , dey tremble cause dey scaid , an dey faddown jes like dey dead man dem .
40028005	De angel tell de ooman dem say , “ Oona mus dohn be scaid ! A know oona da look fa Jedus wa dey nail pon de cross .
40028006	Jedus ain yah . E done git op fom mongst de dead an e da lib gin , jes like e beena say . Look , dis yah de place weh dey been lay um down .
40028007	Go quick an tell e ciple dem say , e done git op fom mongst de dead an da lib gin , an e da gwine fo oona ta Galilee . Oona gwine shim dey ! Dis wa A got fa tell oona . ”
40028008	So de ooman dem lef de tomb quick . Dey been scaid , bot full op wid joy . An dey ron fa go tell e ciple dem .
40028009	Wiles dey beena gwine , all ob a sudden Jedus meet um , tell um say , “ Good maanin . ” De ooman dem gone an git down pon de groun fo um an tek hole ta e foot fa woshup um .
40028010	Jedus say , “ Mus dohn be scaid ! Go tell me broda dem fa go ta Galilee . Dey gwine see me dey . ”
40028011	Wiles de ooman dem beena gwine fa tell de ciple dem , some ob de sodja dem wa beena gyaad de tomb , dey gone back ta de city an dey tell de leada dem ob de priest dem all wa happen .
40028012	De head man dem gone meet wid de oda Jew leada dem an figga wa fa do . Dey gii de sodja dem plenty money .
40028013	Dey chaage de sodja dem say , “ Oona mus tell ebrybody say , ‘ Jedus ciple dem come jurin de night an dey done tief de body wiles we beena sleep . ’
40028014	An ef de gobna yeh bout dat , we gwine sattify um so dat oona ain gwine git een no trouble . ”
40028015	De sodja dem tek de money an done wa de leada dem tell um fa do . Dey story spread all oba ebryweh mongst de Jew people . Eben ta dis day , dey yeh say dat wa been happen .
40028016	Now de leben ciple dem gone ta de high hill een Galilee weh Jedus been tell um fa go .
40028017	Wen dey see Jedus , dey kneel down fa woshup um . Stillyet some ob dem beena doubt ef dat been Jedus fa true .
40028018	Den Jedus come op ta um an say , “ God done gii me all de tority an powa fa rule een heaben an een dis wol .
40028019	So den , oona mus go ta all de people all oba de wol an laan um fa be me ciple dem . Oona mus bactize um een de name ob de Fada God , an de name ob de Son , an de name ob de Holy Sperit .
40028020	Oona mus laan um fa do all wa A done chaage oona fa do . An fa sho , A gwine be dey wid oona all de time til de time end . ”
41001001	Dis yah de Good Nyews bout Jedus Christ , God Son .
41001002	De Good Nyews staat like how God prophet Isaiah done write , weh e say ,
41001003	Somebody da holla een de wildaness say ,
41001004	John beena bactize people een de wildaness . E beena preach say , “ Ef oona change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo , A gwine bactize oona an God gwine paadon oona fa de ebil oona done . ”
41001005	A heapa people fom dey een Judea lan an fom Jerusalem city gone fa yeh John . Dem people fess op bout ebil ting dem dey beena do fo ebrybody wa been dey . Den John bactize um een de Jerden Riba .
41001006	John cloes been mek wid camel hair , an de belt roun e wais been mek wid animal hide . E beena nyam locust an wild honey .
41001007	E taak ta de people say , “ Atta A done me wok , one man wa hab heap mo tority den me gwine come . A ain fit eben fa stoop down an loose e shoe .
41001008	A da bactize oona wid wata , bot e gwine bactize oona wid de Holy Sperit . ”
41001009	Jurin dat time Jedus come fom Nazareth town wa dey een Galilee . An John bactize um een de Jerden Riba .
41001010	Wen John done bactize um , Jedus come op outta de wata . Jedus see de eliment open op an e see God Sperit da come down like a dob til e light pon um .
41001011	Den one boice taak fom outta heaben say , “ Ya me own Son . A da lob ya an ya da pledja me tommuch ! ”
41001012	Dat same time God Sperit mek Jedus go eenta de wildaness .
41001013	Jedus been dey een de wildaness foty day an foty night . An Satan beena try fa mek um do ebil . Jedus been dey wid dem wild animal . Bot de angel dem come ta Jedus an hep um .
41001014	Atta John wa Bactize done been pit eenta de jailhouse , Jedus gone ta Galilee , da tell de people all roun dey de Good Nyews wa God sen .
41001015	Jedus say , “ De time done come . Soon people gwine see God da rule oba de people an de wol ! Oona mus change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo . An oona mus bleebe de Good Nyews . ”
41001016	Wen Jedus beena waak long de sho ob Lake Galilee , e see two fishaman , Simon an e broda Andrew . Dey beena cyas dey fishin net eenta de wata .
41001017	Jedus tell dem say , “ Come trabel longside me . Oona beena wok da ketch fish . A gwine laan oona how fa wok fa ketch people fa me . ”
41001018	Simon an Andrew lef dey fishin net an dey gone da trabel longside Jedus .
41001019	Wen dey gone long de lake sho leetle bit mo , Jedus see two oda broda , James an John . Dey been Zebedee son dem . Dey been eenside dey boat , da mend dey fishin net .
41001020	Wen Jedus shim , e call um . Dey lef dey fada Zebedee an de wokman dem een de boat , an dey folla longside Jedus .
41001021	Jedus an e ciple dem gone ta de town name Capernaum . Wen de nex Jew Woshup Day come , Jedus gone eenside de Jew meetin house an laan de people God wod .
41001022	De people beena stonish bout de way Jedus laan um , cause e beena laan um wid tority . E ain teach like how Jew Law teacha dem beena do .
41001023	Jes den , one man wa hab ebil sperit een um come eenta de Jew meetin house . E holla loud ,
41001024	e tell Jedus say , “ Jedus fom Nazareth , wa bidness ya hab wid we ? Ya come yah fa git rid ob we , ainty ? A know who ya da . Ya de one wa blongst ta God fa true ! ”
41001025	Jedus buke dat ebil sperit say , “ Mus dohn say no mo . Mus come outta de man . ”
41001026	De ebil sperit shake de man haad . E holla loud an den e come outta de man .
41001027	All de people beena stonish tommuch . Dey beena taak ta one noda say , “ Wa dis ? Dis a nyew ting e da laan we ! Dis Man hab tority fa tell eben de ebil sperit dem wa fa do an dey do um ! ”
41001028	Dat same time dey , people staat fa taak all oba Galilee lan bout de ting dem wa Jedus done .
41001029	Jedus wid James an John an e oda ciple dem come outta de Jew meetin house an gone scraight ta Simon an Andrew dem house .
41001030	Simon moda-een-law been sick een bed . A feba hab um . No soona den Jedus git dey , dey tell um bout um .
41001031	Jedus gone ta de ooman an tek e han , hep um fa git op . Same time , de feba gone . An de ooman fix sompin fa dem fa nyam an gim .
41001032	Dat same day atta de sun done set fa red , people come bring ta Jedus all de sick people an all dem wa hab ebil sperit eenside um .
41001033	All de people een dat town come geda togeda een de yaad , fo de door ob Simon an Andrew dem house .
41001034	Jedus heal a heapa people wa been hab all kind ob ailment . An e dribe a heapa ebil sperit outta people . E ain leh dem ebil sperit say eben one wod , cause dey been know who Jedus da .
41001035	Aaly maanin , fo day clean , Jedus git op an lef de house . E gone ta a place weh dey ain been no people , weh e pray ta God .
41001036	Simon dem gone saach fa Jedus .
