41001037	Wen dey find um , dey tell um say , “ All de people da look fa ya . ”
41001038	Jedus ansa um say , “ We haffa go ta dem oda willage roun yah , so dat A kin tell dem people God wod dey too . Cause dat wa A come ta dis wol fa do . ”
41001039	Jedus gone all oba Galilee lan . E gone ta de Jew meetin house dem , da tell de people God wod . An e beena shrow de ebil sperit dem outta de people .
41001040	One man wa been tek bad sick een e skin wid leposy come ta Jedus . E kneel down fo Jedus an beg um say , “ Ef ya wahn fa do um , A know ya able fa mek me clean . ”
41001041	Jedus been too saary fa de man . E reach out e han an tetch um , an e say , “ A wahn fa do um ! A mek ya clean . ”
41001042	Dat same time de man been clean an e ain hab leposy no mo .
41001043	Jedus sen de man pon e way . Fo e gone , Jedus waan um an chaage um .
41001044	E tell um say , “ See yah , mus dohn tell nobody nottin bout wa happen . Mus go ta de priest an leh um look pon ya so e gwine know ya ain sick no mo . Ya mus gim de sacrifice fa bun fo God , same like Moses done chaage de people fa do . Dat gwine mek all de people know ya ain sick no mo . ”
41001045	Bot de man lef Jedus an e taak ta plenty people . E tell de nyews ebryweh . E taak sommuch dat Jedus ain able fa come eenta no town no mo , cause all de people dey beena crowd roun um . E stay outta town weh nobody lib . Stillyet , de people beena come fom all oba fa shim dey .
41002001	Two , shree day pass an Jedus gone back ta Capernaum , an de people yeh say Jedus done come back .
41002002	A heapa dem come ta de house . Dey been dey all bout dat house so dat dey ain been no place fa pit foot , not eben een front de door . An Jedus beena tell dem God wod .
41002003	Wiles e beena taak , fo man come bring one man wa paralyze , da tote um ta Jedus .
41002004	Bot cause ob de crowd , de man dem ain been able fa pass fa git dat man wa paralyze ta de place weh Jedus been . Dey climb pontop de house , pull op one paat ob de roof right oba de place weh Jedus been . Den dey pass de man wa paralyze down ta de place weh Jedus been . De man been leddown pon a bed .
41002005	Wen Jedus see how dey bleebe pon um , e tell de man wa paralyze say , “ Me son , A done paadon ya sin . ”
41002006	Some Jew Law teacha wa beena seddown dey een de house tink een dey haat ginst Jedus . Dey tink say ,
41002007	“ Who dis man yah wa da hole God cheap ? Dey ain nobody wa able fa paadon people sin cep God ! ”
41002008	Dat same time , Jedus know wa dem Jew Law teacha beena tink een dey haat . E aks um say , “ Wa mek ya tink susha ting een ya haat ?
41002009	Wish one e mo easy fa say ? Fa say , ‘ A done paadon ya sin , ’ or fa tell um , ‘ Stanop , tote ya bed an go waak ta ya house ’ ?
41002010	Bot A gwine show oona dat de Man wa Come fom God hab de tority een dis wol fa paadon people sin . ” So den , Jedus taak ta de man wa paralyze , e say ,
41002011	“ Stanop , tek ya bed an go waak ta ya house . ”
41002012	Same time , wiles dey all beena watch , de man stanop . E tek e bed an gone way . All de people been stonish an dey praise God , say , “ We ain neba see susha ting like dis yah . ”
41002013	Jedus gone back ta de sho ob Lake Galilee . Plenty people geda roun um , an e staat fa laan um God wod .
41002014	Wiles e beena waak long , e see one man wa da geda tax . Dat man name Levi , an e been Alphaeus son . Levi been seddown eenside e office . Jedus tell um say , “ Come folla longside me . ” Levi git op . E lef e wok dey an e gone fa folla longside Jedus .
41002015	Atta wile , Jedus an e ciple dem beena nyam ta Levi house . A heapa people beena nyam wid um . Dey been dem wa geda tax an oda Jew people wa de leada dem hole cheap cause dey ain keep all de Jew Law . A heapa dem beena waak long wid Jedus .
41002016	Some Jew Law teacha wa been Pharisee see Jedus da nyam wid dem people yah , dem wa geda tax an dem oda dat de leada dem hole cheap . So den , dey gone aks Jedus ciple dem say , “ Jedus ain oughta nyam wid dem kinda people , ainty ? ”
41002017	Jedus yeh wa dey say an e ansa um say , “ Dem wa well ain need no docta . Jes dem wa sick need um . A ain come fa call dem wa tink dey da waak scraight wid God . A come fa call de sinna dem . ”
41002018	One day John ciple dem an de Pharisee dem beena keep dey fast , an some people come aks Jedus say , “ Hoccome John ciple dem an de Pharisee ciple dem da keep de fast , bot ya ciple dem ain keep de fast ? ”
41002019	Jedus ansa um say , “ Ya tink wen de groom an e paaty dey dey ta de weddin , dey ain gwine nyam , wiles de groom dey wid um , e ain fittin fa e paaty fa keep de fast .
41002020	Bot de time da come wen people gwine snatch de groom way fom e paaty . Wen dat time come , dat wen dey gwine keep de fast .
41002021	“ Ain nobody gwine cut piece fom nyew closs wa ain neba been shrink , an nyuse um fa patch e ole cloes , cause wen de patch e gwine pull , an den de teah gwine be eben wossa .
41002022	Same way , wen people mek wine , dey ain gwine pit um eenta ole bottle , ainty ? Cause wen de wine staat fa wok een dem ole bottle , dey gwine buss . Den de wine an de bottle all two gwine waste . Stead ob dat , dey pit nyew wine eenta nyew bottle . ”
41002023	One day , Jedus an e ciple dem beena pass shru de wheat fiel pon de Jew Woshup Day . Wiles Jedus ciple dem beena waak long , dey pick some wheat fa nyam .
41002024	De Pharisee dem see dat , an so dey come ta Jedus say , “ Look , hoccome ya ciple dem da do dat ? We law say we ain oughta geda grain pon de Woshup Day , ainty ? ”
41002025	Jedus aks um say , “ Oona ain neba read bout wa King David done wen e an de people wid um ain hab nottin fa nyam ? Dey been hongry down .
41002026	Way back dey wen Abiathar been leada ob de priest dem , David gone eenside God House an tek de bread wa been pit dey special fa God . David nyam some bread an e gim ta de people wid um too . Now den , de Jew Law say nobody oughta nyam dat bread dey , cepin de Jew priest dem . ”
41002027	Den Jedus tell um say , “ God mek de Woshup Day fa de good ob people . E ain mek people fa de good ob de Woshup Day .
41002028	So den , de Man wa Come fom God , e de Lawd eben ob de Woshup Day . ”
41003001	One oda day , Jedus gone ta de Jew meetin house , an one man been dey wa hab e han cripple op .
41003002	Some people dey been wahn fa cuse Jedus , so dey watch um all de time fa see ef e gwine heal dat man wa hab e han cripple op pon de Woshup Day .
41003003	Jedus tell de man wa hab e han cripple op say , “ Come stanop yah ta de front ob we . ”
41003004	Den Jedus aks de people say , “ Tell me , coddin ta we Law , wa oona say we kin do pon de Woshup Day ? E right fa do good , or fa do bad ? Fa sabe man life , or fa stroy um ? ”
41003005	Wiles Jedus look pon um e bex een e haat . Bot same time , e pity um cause dey head been so haad an wrong . E say ta de man , “ Scretch out ya han . ” De man scretch e han out an dat han git well like nyew .
41003006	De Pharisee dem gone outta de Jew meetin house . Dey gone meet right way wid some ob King Herod people fa see how dey gwine kill Jedus .
41003007	Jedus an e ciple dem wa alltime trabel longside um , dey gone way ta Lake Galilee . An a heapa people come fom Galilee an folla longside Jedus .
41003008	Wen dey yeh bout all wa Jedus beena do , a heapa people come fom Judea lan , fom Jerusalem city an Idumea lan . Dey come fom oba ta de side de Jerden Riba an dem town roun Tyre an Sidon .
41003009	De people been so many dat Jedus tell e ciple dem fa draw op a boat , bring um close ta de sho ready fa um fa go eenta , ef de people crowd um tommuch .
41003010	Cause Jedus done beena heal plenty sick people , so all de people wa sick beena crowd um fa try fa tetch um .
41003011	Wensoneba people wa hab ebil sperit een um see Jedus , dey faddown pon de groun een front ob um . Dem ebil sperit holla say , “ Ya God Son ! ”
41003012	Bot wensoneba dey say dat , Jedus waan dem , chaage um say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody who A da . ”
41003013	Jedus gone op one high hill an e call out de man dem wa e wahn fa come , an dey gone fa meet um .
41003014	Jedus pick tweb man fa e be e postle . E pick um fa trabel long wid um an fa go tell people God wod .
41003015	An e gim powa fa dribe de ebil sperit dem outta people .
41003016	Dese been de tweb man wa Jedus done pick . One been Simon wa Jedus gii de name Peter .
41003017	Dey been James an e broda John , dem wa been Zebedee son . Jedus call dem Boanerges , dat mean “ Man wa git bex tommuch an mek nise like tunda . ”
41003018	An e pick Andrew , Philip , Bartholomew , Matthew , Thomas , James wa been Alphaeus son , Thaddaeus , an Simon wa been call de Patrot .
41003019	An e pick Judas Iscariot , wa been gwine han Jedus oba ta e enemy dem .
41003020	Den Jedus an e ciple dem gone ta a house fa stay . A crowd come geda roun um gin , so dey ain hab chance fa nyam .
41003021	Wen Jedus fambly yeh bout dat , dey gone fa tek um outta dey , cause people beena say , “ E da mek like e outta e head . ”
41003022	Some Jew Law teacha wa come outta Jerusalem say , “ Beelzebub , de leada ob de ebil sperit dem , dey eenside Jedus , tell um wa fa do ! E gim de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit fom people . ”
41003023	So Jedus call de people an laan um . E tell um one paable say , “ Fa sho , dat poson wa Satan hab powa oba ain gwine dribe out Satan , ainty ?
41003024	Same like ef people een de same country da fight mongst deysef , dat country ain gwine las .
41003025	An ef people een de same house da fight mongst deysef , dey gwine scatta .
41003026	Same way so , ef Satan da fight ginst e own wokman dem , dey gwine wide op e powa . Satan ain gwine rule oba um no mo .
41003027	“ Fa true , ain nobody gwine go eenside scrong man house an tief e propaty , lessin e fus tie dat scrong man op . Den e kin tek all de scrong man propaty .
41003028	A da tell oona fa true , God gwine paadon all kinda ebil ting people do , an all de ebil ting dem dey da taak bout me .
41003029	Bot God ain neba gwine paadon nobody wa say ebil ting ginst de Holy Sperit . Dat sin gwine stay dey pon dat poson faeba . ”
41003030	Jedus say dat cause some people beena say , “ Ebil sperit dey eenside Jedus . ”
41003031	Jedus modda an e broda dem come find um . Dey beena stan outside de door , an dey sen somebody fa call um .
41003032	De crowd wa beena geda , da seddown roun Jedus , tell um say , “ Look , ya modda an ya broda dem right outside de door . Dey wahn fa see ya . ”
41003033	Jedus ansa um say , “ Who dat me modda , an me broda dem ? ”
41003034	E ton look roun pon de people wa beena seddown roun um an say , “ Oona wa dey yah , oona me modda an me broda dem !
41003035	De poson wa da do wa God wahn , dat poson me broda , me sista an me modda . ”
41004001	One oda time Jedus staat fa laan de people wa been wid um close by Lake Galilee . An a heapa people geda roun um til de crowd been too big . So e gone seddown eenside a boat , dey een de wata close ta de sho . An de crowd beena stan pon de sho .
41004002	Jedus tell um paable fa laan um plenty ting . Wen e beena laan um , e tell um say ,
41004003	“ Listen ! One faama gone ta e fiel fa plant seed .
41004004	Wen e scatta de seed dem , some faddown pon de pat an some bod come out , nyam op all dem seed .
41004005	Some seed faddown pon groun weh dey been heapa stone an dey ain been much dort . Cause ob dat , de seed dem buss quick , cause de dort ain been deep dey .
41004006	Bot wen de sun git hot , de nyoung plant dem widda an dead , cause dem root ain been gone down deep een de groun .
41004007	De faama scatta oda seed wa faddown mongst bramble bush . De bramble bush grow an kiba op de good plant so dey ain been able fa beah .
41004008	Bot oda seed faddown pon good groun . De seed buss an grow fine an beah plenty . Some seed beah tirty , some sixty , an some a hundud . ”
41004009	Jedus say , “ Oona wa got yea fa yeh , oona mus yeh wa A da say . ”
41004010	Wen de crowd done gone way , some ob de people wa been wid Jedus an de tweb ciple dem come aks um say wa dem paable mean .
41004011	Jedus ansa dem say , “ Fa oona , God gii oona de chance fa know bout how e gwine rule all people . Bot de oda people wa ain wid we . A da laan dem wid jes paable .
41004012	A da tell um so dat ,
41004013	Jedus tell de people wa come aks um say , “ Ef oona ain ondastan dis paable , oona ain gwine ondastan dem oda paable , ainty ?
41004014	De faama da scatta God wod .
41004015	Some ob de people , wen dey yeh de wod , Satan come snatch way de wod outta dey haat .
41004016	Now de seed wa faddown pon groun weh dey been heapa stone , dat same like de people wa yeh de wod an same time bleebe um , an dey glad .
41004017	Bot de wod ain gone down deep een dey haat , so dey ain keep um . Dey stan like plant wa ain hab root . Wen trouble meet um or people fight ginst um cause dey bleebe de wod , same time dey lef dey right way .
41004018	De seed wa faddown mongst bramble bush , dem same like de people wa yeh de wod ,
41004019	bot dey study tommuch pon de ting een dis wol wa dey wahn fa do . Dey wahn fa git rich , dey wahn fa hab all kind ob ting . So God wod ain git place fa spread dey een dey haat , same like plant wa been kiba op an ain beah fruit .
41004020	Bot de seed wa faddown pon good groun , dey same like de people wa yeh de wod an dey bleebe um good . Dat wod stay een dey haat . Dey stan like plant wa beah plenty . Some beah tirty , some sixty an some a hundud . ”
41004021	Jedus tell um noda ting say , “ Ef ya git lamp an light um , ya ain gwine kiba um op wid a bowl or pit um onda a bed , ainty ? No , ya gwine pit um pontop de table so people able fa see e light .
41004022	Cause all ting wa people do now wa dey hide , dem ting haffa come out sometime . An people gwine ondastan dem ting wa secret now .
41004023	De poson wa hab yea fa yeh , mus yeh wa A da say . ”
41004024	Jedus say , “ Oona pay mind now ta wa oona yeh . De way oona da jedge oda people , dat de same way God gwine jedge oona . An God gwine jedge oona mo scronga den how oona da jedge oda people .
41004025	Anybody wa hab sompin , God gwine gim mo , bot anybody wa ain hab nottin , de leetle bit wa e hab , God gwine tek um way . ”
41004026	Den Jedus laan um wid noda paable . E say , “ God rule stan jes like how seed da grow wen a man scatta um pon de groun .
41004027	Jurin de day an de night , wen de man wake an wen e da sleep , de seed dem da buss out an da grow . Bot de man esef ain know how dey da grow .
41004028	Jes de groun esef da mek de seed grow . Wen seed da grow , de paat wa buss out fom de root fus , dat wa ya see fus . Den ya see de leetle sprout dem , an las ob all , ya see de food wa e beah .
41004029	Den wen de plant done big an de food ready fa nyam , de man tek e hook knife fa cut um , cause de time done reach fa de haabis . ”
41004030	Jedus tell um gin say , “ A gwine show oona mo now bout how God da rule people like king . A gwine laan oona noda paable fa splain how God da rule .
41004031	God rule stan like mustard seed , wa de leeleetle seed ob all de seed ya da plant een de groun .
41004032	Bot wen e grow , e kin grow big mo den all de oda gyaaden plant dem . An e git plenty big branch weh bod kin come lib pon um . ”
41004033	Jedus taak plenty ob dis kinda paable , wen e beena laan de people God wod . E tell um all dat dey been able fa laan .
41004034	E taak jes paable ta de people . Bot wen e an e ciple dem done lef de people , den e splain ta e own ciple dem wa de paable dem mean .
41004035	Dat same ebenin time dey wen de sun beena lean fa down , Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Leh we cross oba de wata ta de oda side ob de lake . ”
41004036	So dey lef de crowd . De ciple dem git een de boat wid Jedus an dey gone . An dey been mo boat dey too .
41004037	Wen dey beena gwine , a big wind steal op pon um , an de big swellin wata staat fa come eenta de boat til de boat staat fa full op wid wata .
41004038	Jedus been een de back paat ob de boat . E beena sleep wid e head pon a pilla . De ciple dem wake um op an aks um say , “ Teacha , ya ain mind we gwine dead ? ”
41004039	Jedus stanop , taak scrong ta de big breeze say , “ Hush , stop blow . ” An e say ta de swellin wata , “ Go down . ” De big breeze done hush an stop fa blow , an de swellin wata gone down an been peaceable an steady .
41004040	Den Jedus ton roun ta e ciple dem an e say , “ Hoccome oona so scaid ? Stillyet oona ain bleebe pon God , ainty ? ”
41004041	Bot dey beena stonish til dey ain know wa fa tink . Dey aks one noda say , “ Who dis yah man yah ? E tell eben de breeze an de wata wa fa do , an dey do jes wa e tell um ! ”
41005001	Wen Jedus an e ciple dem done cross oba de lake , dey gone ta de Gadarene people country .
41005002	Same time Jedus git outta de boat , one man wa come out fom de buryin cabe fa meet um . Dat man hab ebil sperit eenside um .
41005003	E beena lib mongst de tomb dem , an e been scrong til nobody ain been able fa keep um tie op , eben wid chain .
41005004	Plenty time de people done tie op e han an e foot , bot ebrytime e done broke de chain an e smash op de iron chain pon e foot . Nobody ain been able fa trol um .
41005005	An jurin de day an de night de man been dey mongst de tomb dem an pon de hill . E beena holla loud an tek stone fa cut esef .
41005006	E been a good way fom Jedus wen e shim , so e ron go meet um . E kneel down fo Jedus .
41005007	E holla loud , say , “ Jedus , ya de Son ob God , de God wa great mo den all oda god . Wa dat ya wahn fa do ta me ? A beg ya een God name , mus dohn mek me suffa ! ”
41005008	De man taak dat way cause Jedus beena tell um , say , “ Ebil sperit , come out fom eenside dis man . ”
41005009	Jedus aks de man say , “ Wa ya name ? ”
41005010	An e beg Jedus oba an oba fa dohn dribe de ebil sperit dem outta dat countryside .
41005011	Same time a heapa hog beena nyam dey pon de hillside close by weh Jedus been .
41005012	All de ebil sperit dem beg Jedus say , “ Sen we ta dem hog . Leh we gone fa lib eenside um . ”
41005013	Jedus gree fa leh um gone eenta de hog dem . So de ebil sperit dem come out fom eenside de man an gone eenside de hog dem . All de hog dem rush down de steep hill eenta de lake . An dey been bout two tousan dem . Dey all faddown eenta de wata an been drown .
41005014	De people wa beena mind de hog dem ron gone tell de nyews een de town an oba de countryside , so de people come look .
41005015	Dey meet Jedus , an close by um dey see de man wa been hab plenty ebil sperit eenside um . E beena seddown , da listen ta Jedus . Dat man been soba an e beena weah cloes . Wen de people see dat , dey stonish .
41005016	Den de people wa done see wa happen , dey tell de oda people wa come fa look , all wa been done ta de man wa been hab ebil sperit , an bout de hog dem too .
41005017	So den , dat mek de people staat fa beg Jedus fa git outta dey country .
41005018	Wen Jedus beena git eenta de boat , de man wa been hab de ebil sperit dem eenside um beg Jedus say , “ Leh me go wid ya . ”
41005019	Bot Jedus ain leh um . E tell um say , “ Go back ta ya house ta ya people . Tell um all wa de Lawd done done fa ya , an how e done hab mussy pon ya . ”
41005020	So dat man lef an gone all shru de arie wa dey call de Ten Town , da tell wa Jedus done done fa um . An all de people been stonish .
41005021	Jedus tek de boat , gone back cross de oda side ob de lake . Dey ta de lake sho a bunch ob people come op roun um .
41005022	An one man name Jairus come dey . E been a leada een de Jew meetin house . Wen e see Jedus , e come kneel down fo um .
41005023	E beg um say , “ Me leetle gyal sick ta de pint ob ob det . Please come pit ya han pon e head an pray fa um , mek e git well so e ain gwine dead . ”
41005024	So den , Jedus gone wid Jairus . Now sommuch people beena gwine long wid Jedus dat dey beena crowd um fom ebry way .
41005025	One ooman been dey wa beena suffa too bad . E beena bleed fa tweb yeah .
41005026	Plenty docta done treat um , da try fa heal um , an e done spen all e money , bot e ain git no betta . Stead , e beena git wos mo an mo .
41005027	De ooman done been yeh bout Jedus , so e come op eenta de bunch ob people fa reach um , an e tetch Jedus cloes .
41005028	Cause dis ooman done beena say ta esef , “ Ef A kin jes tetch Jedus cloes , A gwine git well . ”
41005029	So e tetch Jedus cloes an same time de bleed done stop , bam ! An e feel een e body e done git well ob e misery .
41005030	Dat same time , Jedus know powa done gone outta um fa heal somebody , so e ton roun ta de bunch ob people , aks um say , “ Whodat tetch me cloes ? ”
41005031	E ciple dem ansa um say , “ Ya see all dis bunch ob people da crowd ya ? Hoccome ya aks who dat tetch ya cloes ? ”
41005032	Bot Jedus look roun fa see who been tetch e cloes .
41005033	Now de ooman ondastan e done git well , so e come ta Jedus . E so scaid e beena shiba . E come kneel down fo um an tell all wa done happen ta um .
41005034	Jedus tell um say , “ Me daughta , cause ya bleebe , ya done git well . Go een peace wid quiet haat . Dat kind ob misery ain gwine come pon ya no mo . ”
41005035	Same time Jedus beena say dis ta de ooman , some people come bring nyews fom Jairus house . Dey tell Jairus say , “ Ya daughta done dead , so ya ain oughta warry de teacha no mo , ainty ? ”
41005036	Wen Jedus yeh wa dey say , e tell Jairus , “ Mus dohn be scaid . Jes bleebe . ”
41005037	Den Jedus gone ta Jairus house , bot e ain leh nobody go wid um , cepin Peter , James an James broda , John .
41005038	Wen dey reach Jairus house , Jedus see de people da mix op . Dey beena mek loud nise , da cry an wail .
41005039	Jedus gone eenside an tell de people say , “ Wa fa all dis mix op ? Wa mek oona cry so ? De chile ain dead . E da sleep . ”
41005040	De people mek fun ob Jedus . Bot e pit um all outta de house , cepin de chile fada an modda , an de shree ciple dem . Dey all gone eenta de room weh de chile beena lay .
41005041	Jedus hole de chile han an tell um say , “ Talitha koum ! ” Een dey way ob taak , dat mean “ Me chile , A tell ya , git op . ”
41005042	Same time de chile open e eye an git op . E waak roun een de room . ( E been tweb yeah ole . ) Dem wa been dey wid Jedus been stonish .
41005043	Jedus waan um say mus dohn tell nobody wa done happen . Den e tell um fa gii de chile sompin fa nyam .
41006001	Jedus lef dat place an gone back ta e town , an e ciple dem gone long wid um .
41006002	Wen de Jew Woshup Day come , Jedus gone ta de Jew meetin house an staat fa laan de people bout God . Heapa dem wa yeh um beena stonish , say , “ Weh dis man git dis sense ? Who dat gim dis sense yah ? E eben do miracle !
41006003	Dis man jes de capenta , ainty ? Ain e Mary son ? An James , Joseph , an Judas an Simon dem e broda , ainty ? An e sista dem yah wid we , ainty ? ” So dat how de people beena taak ginst Jedus .
41006004	Jedus tell um say , “ People da gii hona ta a prophet ebryweh cep weh e raise op at . Een e own town an mongst e own kinfolk dey ain gim no hona . ”
41006005	Dey een e own town , Jedus ain been able fa do miracle , cepin e lay e han pon shree , fo people head an heal um .
41006006	Jedus beena stonish cause de people dey ain bleebe pon um .
41006007	E call e tweb ciple dem togeda an tell um fa go out ta de willage dem roun bout dey . E sen um out two by two an e gim powa fa dribe out ebil sperit .
41006008	An dis yah how e tell um fa go . E chaage um say , “ Mus dohn tote nottin wid oona cepin jes a waakin stick . Mus dohn tote food or a grip an no money een oona pocket . ”
41006009	E tell um fa weah sandal , bot dey ain fa tote extry cloes .
41006010	An Jedus tell um say , “ Wen oona da gwine eenta a town , de fus house weh dey gree fa leh ya stay , oona mus stay oba wid um til oona lef dat town .
41006011	Ef oona go eenta any town weh de people ain welcome oona , an dey ain gwine yeh wa oona say , oona mus lef dat town . An wen oona come out , mus shake de duss off ya foot fa show de people dat dey done ebil . ”
41006012	So de ciple dem gone all oba , da tell people dey mus change dey sinful way an dohn do um no mo .
41006013	De ciple dem dribe out a heapa ebil sperit , an dey pit oll pon de head a heapa sick people an mek um well .
41006014	De nyews bout Jedus spread all oba til King Herod , wa beena rule een Galilee , yeh bout um . Some people say , “ Dis yah John wa Bactize . E done dead bot now e da lib gin , come outta e grabe . Dat wa gim powa fa do miracle . ”
41006015	Oda people say , “ No , dat dey Elijah . ”
41006016	Bot wen King Herod yeh bout all wa Jedus beena do , e say , “ Dat dey John wa Bactize ! A done mek dem cut e head off , bot now e da lib gin ! ”
41006017	King Herod say dat cause fo dat time e done been mek dem ketch John an pit um een de jailhouse . E done dat fa sake ob Herodias , wa e done marry eben dough Herodias been e broda Philip wife .
41006018	John done beena tell Herod say , “ Ain fittin fa ya fa marry ya broda Philip wife ! ”
41006019	Herodias been hab bad taste een e mout fa John , an e been wahn fa kill um , bot e ain been able .
41006020	King Herod beena scaid ob John cause e know John waak scraight an e been God own man . So Herod done all e able fa do fa keep John safe . Wensoneba e yeh John tell bout God , Herod warry , warry , bot spite a dat , e glad fa yeh um .
41006021	Now de time reach wen Herodias git de chance fa do wa e wahn ta John . One day , King Herod been mek paaty fa e birsday . De king call all de big leada dem wa wok fa e gobment , de aamy offisa an dem oda leada een Galilee fa come ta e feas .
41006022	Den Herodias daughta come an dance fa de paaty . E dance so fine dat King Herod an de people wa ta de paaty been too heppy fa um . So de king tell dat gyal say , “ Mus aks me fa anyting ya wahn . A gwine gii ya um . ”
41006023	De king promise de gyal say , “ A tell ya da trute . A gwine gii ya anyting ya aks fa . Ef ya wahn , A gwine eben wide op dis country A da rule eenta two paat an gii ya one paat . ”
41006024	So den , dat gyal gone fa aks e modda say , “ Wa A oughta aks um fa gii me ? ”
41006025	So de gyal mek hace , gone back fa tell de king say , “ A wahn ya fa gii me de head ob dat John wa Bactize pon a big plate right now . ”
41006026	Den King Herod been too saary , bot e ain been wahn fa broke de promise e done been mek . Cause e done promise de gyal , an de people een de paaty done been yeh wa e say .
41006027	De king sen sodja fa go bring um John head . So de sodja gone ta de jailhouse an e cut off John head .
41006028	E pit de head pon a big plate an bring um , gim ta de gyal . De gyal tek um , gii e modda Herodias .
41006029	Wen John ciple dem yeh bout dat , dey gone an tek way John body , pit um een a tomb .
41006030	De postle dem come back , meet wid Jedus . Dey tell um all dey done an wa dey been laan people .
41006031	Now , so many people beena gwine een an out dey , dat Jedus an e ciple dem ain been git chance eben fa nyam . So Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Leh we gone way ta some quiet place an oona kin res a bit . ”
41006032	So dey gone out een a boat by deysef fa cross oba ta a place weh nobody lib .
41006033	Bot plenty people done shim wen dey da gwine , an dey know right way who dey da . So dem people gone out fom all de town . Dey ron ta de place weh Jedus an e ciple dem beena gwine fo Jedus dem reach dey .
41006034	Wen Jedus git outta de boat , e see dis big crowd ob people da wait fa um dey . Jedus been too saary fa dem , cause dey been like sheep wa ain got no shephud fa mind um . So den Jedus staat fa laan dem people plenty ting .
41006035	Wen de sun staat lean fa down , Jedus ciple dem come ta um say , “ Lawd , ain nobody lib een dis place yah , an de sun da lean fa down .
41006036	Ya oughta sen de people ta dem willage an faam close by fa buy sompin fa nyam . ”
41006037	Bot Jedus ansa um say , “ Oonasef mus gim sompin fa nyam . ”
41006038	Jedus aks um say , “ Hommuch loaf ob bread oona hab ? Go look . ”
41006039	Jedus tell e ciple dem , “ Chaage all de people fa seddown by group pon de green grass .
41006040	Some group ob bout a hundud head an oda group ob fifty head . ”
41006041	Jedus tek de fibe loaf ob bread an de two fish . E look op ta heaben an tell God say , “ Tankya fa de ration . ” Den e broke op de bread loaf eenta heapa piece an gim ta e ciple dem fa saab de crowd ob people . E broke op de fish too an gim ta all dem .
41006042	All de crowd nyam til dey been sattify .
41006043	Wen de ciple dem done geda op wa been lef oba , dey hab tweb basket full ob bread an fish .
41006044	Dey been a whole heapa people wa done nyam de bread an de fish . Jes de man dem been fibe tousan .
41006045	Jes atta dat , Jedus chaage ciple dem fa git eenta de boat an cross oba de lake , go head ob um ta Bethsaida town . Wiles de ciple dem beena gwine , Jedus tell de crowd fa go back home .
41006046	Atta e done lef de people , Jedus gone op one hill fa pray ta God .
41006047	Wen night time come , de ciple dem been een de boat out een de middle ob de lake . Same time , Jedus been by esef pon de lan .
41006048	De ciple dem beena row ginst de wind . An Jedus see dat dey beena hab haad time fa mek de boat go long cross de wata ginst de wind . So late een de night , sometime atta shree o'clock , Jedus gone out ta dem . E beena waak pontop de wata , an e mek like e plan fa pass de ciple dem by .
41006049	Wen dey shim da waak pontop de wata , dey tink one haant da come by . So dey holla loud ,
41006050	cause dey all been too scaid wen dey shim .
41006051	Den Jedus git eenta de boat wid um , an de wind stop . De ciple dem been too stonish .
41006052	Cause dey still ain been ondastan fa true bout Jedus powa , eben wen dey shim tek de bread an feed a big crowd ob people . De ciple dem haat been haad like rock .
41006053	Jedus an e ciple dem done cross oba de wata ta Gennesaret town , weh dey tie op de boat .
41006054	Wen dey git outta de boat , de people know Jedus soon as dey shim .
41006055	So dem people gone quick all oba de countryside . Wehsoneba dey yeh say dat Jedus dey , de people come ta um , da tote sick people pon dey bed .
41006056	Een ebry town an willage an settlement weh Jedus gone , de people come da tote dey sick ta um . Dey bring um ta dey maakut place , an dey beg Jedus fa jes leh dey sick tetch de hem ob e cloes . An all dem wa tetch e cloes , same time dey ain been sick no mo .
41007001	Some Pharisee dem an some Jew Law teacha dem fom Jerusalem come geda roun Jedus .
41007002	Dey see Jedus ciple dem da nyam dout wash dey han de way dey ole people say dey haffa do fa mek um clean een God eye .
41007003	( Cause de Pharisee dem an all de oda Jew people ain nyam nottin cepin dey wash dey han de way wa dey ole people been laan um fa do .
41007004	An wen dey buy ting een de maakut , dey neba nyam um cepin dey wash dey han dat way . An dey beena do plenty oda ting wa dey ole people been laan de Jew people fa do , like fa wash cup an pot an coppa bowl dat way . )
41007005	De Pharisee dem an de Jew Law teacha dem aks Jedus say , “ Hoccome ya ciple dem ain wash dey han fo dey nyam ? Hoccome dey ain do like how we ole people been laan we ? ”
41007006	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona hypicrit ! De prophet Isaiah done tell de trute bout oona wen e write say ,
41007007	Wen dey woshup me op , dat dohn mean nottin ,
41007008	Jedus say , “ Oona done stop do wa God tell people fa do , an oona da do jes wa people tell oona fa do . ”
41007009	E tell um say , “ Oona tink oona hab good sense wen oona ain do wa God Law tell oona fa do . Oona do like dat jes fa do wa oona ole people tell oona fa do !
41007010	Moses done write , ‘ Ya mus show hona an be manisable ta ya fada an modda . ’ An Moses say , ‘ De poson wa taak bad ginst e fada or e modda , oona mus kill um . ’
41007011	Bot oona say ef anybody hab sompin e able fa gii e fada or e modda wa gwine hep um , e ain haffa gim . E kin say , ‘ Dis ting Corban ’ ( dat mean , A done promise fa gii God dis ting yah ) ,
41007012	an oona say dat poson ain haffa gii e fada or e modda de ting wa been gwine fa hep um .
41007013	Dat show how oona ain do wa God say . Oona jes da do dem ting wa oona ole people laan oona fa do . An oona da laan oona chullun same ting . Oona da do plenty oda bad ting like dem yah . ”
41007014	Jedus call de crowd back an tell um say , “ Mus listen ta me good fashion , so dat oona ondastan .
41007015	Ain nottin wa gwine eenta poson wa mek um sinna een God eye . Wa da come outta de poson , dat wa mek um sinna een God eye . [
41007016	De poson wa hab yea fa yeh , e mus yeh wa A da say . ] ”
41007017	Wen Jedus lef de crowd an gone eenside de house , e ciple dem aks um wa mean dat wa e done say .
41007018	So Jedus tell um say , “ Oona too ain ondastan wa A done tell oona , ainty ? Dat wa a poson nyam an drink ain able fa mek e haat bad , mek um sinna een God eye .
41007019	Cause dat ration ain gone eenta e haat . Dat gone eenta e belly an den come outta e body . ” ( Wen Jedus say dat , e laan we dat we kin nyam all kinda food . )
41007020	An e say , “ Wa come out fom eenside e haat , dat wa mek de poson sinna een God eye .
41007021	Cause eenside , een e haat , a poson da study fa do ebil ting , fa ramify roun an do wickity ting , fa tief , fa kill .
41007022	Een e haat , e da study fa sleep wid oda poson wife or husban , fa cyas e eye pon oda poson propaty , fa do all kinda wickity ting , fa tell lie . E da study fa tell lie bout people , fa mek proud , an fa do foolish ting .
41007023	All dem ebil ting come fom eenside poson haat , an dey mek de um sinna een God eye . ”
41007024	Wen Jedus lef dey , e gone way ta de countryside close ta de city dem name Tyre an Sidon , an e gone eenta a house dey . E ain wahn nobody fa know e dey , bot de people find out .
41007025	One ooman beena lib dey wa hab daughta wid ebil sperit eenside um . Wen dat ooman yeh bout Jedus , e mek hace an gone an kneel down fo Jedus .
41007026	De ooman ain been a Jew . E been bon een Phoenicia een Syria country . E beg Jedus fa dribe de ebil sperit outta e daughta .
41007027	Jedus ansa de ooman , say , “ We haffa feed de chullun fus . E ain fittin fa tek de wittle way fom de chullun an chunk um ta de dog . ”
41007028	De ooman ansa Jedus say , “ Dat true , sah , bot eben de dog dem onda de table kin nyam de wittle lefoba wa da faddown wen de chullun nyam ! ”
41007029	So den , Jedus tell dat ooman say , “ Cause ya ansa so good , ya kin go back home now . De ebil sperit done come out fom eenside ya daughta . ”
41007030	So de ooman gone home . An e find de chile da lay peaceable pon de bed . Sho nuff de ebil sperit done come out fom eenside um !
41007031	Den Jedus lef de countryside close by Tyre . E gone shru Sidon an de arie wa dey call de Ten Town ta Lake Galilee .
41007032	Some people come ta um dey , bring um one deef man wa hab hebby tongue . De people beg Jedus fa pit e han pon dat man head fa heal um .
41007033	Jedus gone wid de man off by deysef , way fom de crowd . Jedus pit e finga eenside de man yea . E spit an tetch de man tongue wid e spit .
41007034	Den Jedus look op ta heaben an leh out a big sigh . E say ta dat man , “ Ephphatha , ” wa mean , “ Ya yea gwine open op ! ”
41007035	Dat same time de man been able fa yeh . E tongue ain been hebby an e staat fa taak clean wid no trouble tall .
41007036	Den Jedus chaage de people say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody wa A done . ” Bot ebry time e tell um , mo an mo dey beena tell people wa Jedus done done .
41007037	All de people been stonish . Dey say , “ E da do ebryting too good ! E eben da mek deef people yeh an e heal people wa hab hebby tongue so dey kin taak . ”
41008001	Jurin dat time , noda big crowd ob people come geda roun Jedus . Wen de people ain hab nottin lef fa nyam , Jedus call e ciple dem .
41008002	E tell um say , “ A saary fa de people yah . Dey been wid me shree day an now dey ain hab nottin fa nyam .
41008003	Ef A tell um fa go ta dey house wid nottin fa nyam , dey gwine pass out long de road . Cause some ob dem done come a good way . ”
41008004	E ciple dem aks Jedus say , “ Weh anybody kin find nuff ration fa gii all dese yah people fa nyam ? We ain able fa git bread out een dis wildaness . ”
41008005	Jedus aks um say , “ Hommuch bread oona hab ? ”
41008006	Jedus chaage all de people fa seddown pon de groun . Den e tek de seben loaf an e tank God fa um . E broke de bread an gim ta e ciple dem fa han out ta de people . An de ciple dem gii de people de bread .
41008007	Dey hab few leetle fish too . Jedus tell God tankya fa dem an tell e ciple dem fa han um out .
41008008	Ebrybody nyam til dey sattify . An wen de ciple dem done geda de food wa been lef oba , dey git seben full basket .
41008009	Bout fo tousan people been dey .
41008010	Den Jedus sen de people ta dey house , an e git eenta de boat wid e ciple dem an gone ta de place dey call Dalmanutha .
41008011	Some Pharisee come ta Jedus an staat fa aagy wid um . Dey wahn fa trick um , so dey aks um fa do a sign fa sho dat God sen um fa true .
41008012	Jedus leh out a big sigh an e say , “ Hoccome people dese wahn me fa show a sign ? A da tell oona fa true , A ain gwine show oona no sign . ”
41008013	Den Jedus an e ciple dem lef dem people an git back eenta de boat , cross oba ta de oda side ob de lake .
41008014	De ciple dem been fagit fa bring plenty bread . Dey been jes one loaf wid um een de boat .
41008015	Wen dey gwine , Jedus waan um say , “ Oona mus tek cyah . Mus look out fa de yeast wa de Pharisee dem an Herod da nyuse . ”
41008016	De ciple dem taak ta one noda say , “ E taak so cause we ain hab no bread . ”
41008017	Jedus know wa dey beena taak bout , so e aks um say , “ Hoccome oona da taak say oona ain hab no bread ? Oona stillyet ain know , oona ain ondastan , ainty ?
41008018	Oona hab eye . Hoccome oona ain see ? Oona hab yea . Hoccome oona ain yeh ? Oona ain memba nottin , ainty ?
41008019	Wen A broke op dem fibe loaf ob bread fa gim ta fibe tousan man dem , how many basket full ob lefoba bread oona pick op ? ”
41008020	Den Jedus aks um say , “ An wen A broke op seben loaf ob bread fa gim ta fo tousan people , how many basket full ob lefoba bread oona pick op ? ”
41008021	Jedus say ta dem , “ Oona done see all dat , stillyet oona ain ondastan , ainty ? ”
41008022	Wen Jedus an e ciple dem come ta Bethsaida , some people bring one bline eye man ta Jedus . De people beg um fa tetch de man an mek um well .
41008023	Jedus tek de bline eye man by e han an lead um outta de willage . Den Jedus spit pon de man two eye an pit e han pon um . Jedus aks um say , “ Wa ya da see ? ”
41008024	De man look op an say , “ Yeah , A see some people , bot dey look like tree wa da waak roun . ”
41008025	Jedus tetch de man eye gin . De man look roun an pay close tention ta wa e see . E ain been bline eye no mo . E able fa see good an e see ebryting plain .
41008026	Jedus chaage um say , “ Mus dohn eben go eenta de willage . ” Den e sen um home .
41008027	Jedus an e ciple dem gone ta dem willage close by Caesarea Philippi . Wiles dey beena gwine , Jedus aks e ciple dem say , “ Wen de people da taak bout me , who dey say A da ? ”
41008028	Dey ansa Jedus say , “ Some people say ya John wa Bactize . Some say ya Elijah , an some oda say ya one ob dem prophet wa come fom de ole people . ”
41008029	Jedus aks um say , “ Bot who oona say A da ? ”
41008030	Den Jedus waan dem say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody bout who A da . ”
41008031	Den Jedus staat fa laan e ciple dem say , de Man wa Come fom God haffa suffa plenty . De Jew leada dem an de Jew priest leada dem an de Law teacha dem gwine say dey ain wahn um roun . People gwine kill um an pit um een de tomb . Bot atta shree day pass , e gwine come outta de tomb an lib gin .
41008032	Jedus tell um dat scraight ta de pint . Den Peter call Jedus way fom de oda ciple dem an e buke um say , “ Massa , mus dohn taak like dat ! ”
41008033	Jedus ton roun an look pon e ciple dem . An e buke Peter say , “ Peter , mus git way fom me , cause Satan wok same like ya da do yah ! Ya da tink like how people da tink . Ya ain tink like how God da tink . ”
41008034	Jedus call de crowd an e ciple dem . E tell um say , “ Ef anybody wahn fa come longside me , e mus dohn tink jes bout wa e wahn fa do fa esef . E haffa be ready fa tote e cross an come longside me .
41008035	De poson wa jes da try fa sabe e own life , e gwine loss um . Bot de poson wa loss e life fa do wa A tell um an fa tell de Good Nyews , e gwine git true life .
41008036	De poson wa git ebryting een de whole wol an den dead an gone ta hell , e done loss de true life , ainty ? E ain git nottin !
41008037	Ain nottin a poson kin pay fa git true life .
41008038	Ef anybody shame ob me , ef e shame fa taak bout wa A done laan um yah mongst de wickity people wa ain bleebe pon God een dis time , de Man wa Come fom God gwine be shame ob dat poson , wen e come wid de angel dem ob God , een de glory ob e Fada . ”
41009001	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell oona fa true . Some ob oona wa dey yah now ain gwine dead til ya done see God come fa rule wid powa . ”
41009002	Atta six day pass , Jedus tek Peter , James an John an gone way . E lead um way op pontop a high mountain , weh ain nobody lib . Wiles de shree ciple dem beena , look , Jedus body change fo dey eye .
41009003	E cloes change ta shinin white , white an too bright . Ain nobody een dis wol able fa mek cloes white like dat .
41009004	Den de shree ciple dem see Elijah an Moses , da taak wid Jedus .
41009005	Peter tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , e good we dey yah ! Leh we mek shree bush aaba , one fa ya , one fa Moses , an one fa Elijah . ”
41009006	Peter ain been know wa fa say , e an de oda two ciple dem scaid neah ta det .
41009007	Den a cloud come kiba um . Dey yeh one boice da taak fom eenside de cloud say , “ Dis yah me Son , wa A lob a whole heap . Oona mus listen ta wa e tell oona ! ”
41009008	Jes den de ciple dem look roun quick , bot dey ain see nobody dey cep Jedus .
41009009	Wiles dey beena come down de mountain , Jedus waan um say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody wa oona done see , til de Man wa Come fom God done dead an lib gin . ”
41009010	Dey ain tell nobody bout dat , bot dey beena aks one noda wa Jedus mean wen e say dat de Man wa Come fom God gwine dead an lib gin .
41009011	Dey aks Jedus say , “ Hoccome de Jew Law teacha dem say Elijah haffa come back fo dem ting yah gwine be ? ”
41009012	Jedus ansa um say , “ Fa true , Elijah come fus fa git all ting ready . Stillyet , hoccome dey write een God Book dat de Man wa Come fom God gwine suffa plenty an people ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um ?
41009013	A da tell oona say , Elijah done come , an de people done do um bad . Dey done all wasoneba dey wahn ta um . An dat jes wa God Book say been gwine happen ta Elijah . ’ ”
41009014	Wen dey meet de oda ciple dem , dey see plenty people geda roun um . An some Jew Law teacha dem beena aagy wid de ciple dem .
41009015	Wen de people see Jedus , dey been stonish plenty . Dey ron an tell um say e good fa see ya .
41009016	Jedus aks e ciple dem say , “ Wa oona beena aagy bout wid dem Law teacha ? ”
41009017	One man een de crowd ansa say , “ Teacha , A bring me son ta ya , cause a ebil sperit hab um an e ain able fa taak .
41009018	Ebrytime wen de sperit come pon um , dat sperit chunk um down pon de groun . Foam da come outta e mout . E da grit e teet an all e body git stiff . A done beg ya ciple dem fa dribe out dat ebil sperit , bot dey ain been able fa do um . ”
41009019	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona people wa lib een dis time ain got no fait ! How long A haffa be dey wid oona ? How long A gwine haffa pit op wid oona ? Bring de boy ta me ! ”
41009020	So dey bring um ta Jedus .
41009021	Jedus aks de boy fada say , “ How long de ebil sperit been hab ya boy ? ”
41009022	Plenty time de sperit mek um faddown eenta de fire an eenta de wata , da try fa stroy um . Please tek pity pon we an hep we , ef ya able fa heal um ! ”
41009023	Jedus say , “ Ya aks me ef A able fa heal ya son ? God kin do all ting fa de poson wa bleebe een um . ”
41009024	De boy fada right way holla say , “ A da bleebe . Hep me bleebe mo an mo . ”
41009025	Wen Jedus see dat mo an mo people da ron come geda roun um , e buke de ebil sperit say , “ Ya ebil sperit wa da mek poson deef an so e ain able fa taak . A chaage ya , mus come outta de boy . Ya ain neba fa go eenside um gin ! ”
41009026	De ebil sperit mek de boy holla loud . E chunk de boy down wid bad fits an den e come outta de boy . De boy leddown pon de groun like e a dead man . An plenty people taak say e done dead .
41009027	Bot Jedus hole de boy han , hep um fa git op , an de boy stanop .
41009028	Wen Jedus reach de house wid de ciple dem , way fom dem oda people , dey aks um say , “ Teacha , hoccome we ain been able fa dribe de ebil sperit outta de boy ? ”
41009029	Jedus ansa say , “ Oona ain gwine be able fa dribe out dat kind ob ebil sperit , cepin oona pray . ”
41009030	Jedus an e ciple dem come outta dey an pass shru Galilee . Jedus ain wahn nobody fa know e dey ,
41009031	cause e beena laan e ciple dem . E tell um say , “ Dey gwine han oba de Man wa Come fom God ta people wa gwine kill um . Bot atta e dead , e gwine lib gin . E gwine come outta de tomb atta shree day . ”
41009032	Now de ciple dem ain know wa Jedus mean , bot dey been scaid fa aks um .
41009033	Wen dey reach Capernaum , Jedus an e ciple dem gone eenside de house . Den Jedus aks um say , “ Wa oona beena bicka bout wen we beena waak long de way ? ”
41009034	Dey ain say nottin , cause wen dey beena waak , dey beena bicka bout who dat mongst dem been de big leada .
41009035	Jedus seddown , an e call de tweb ciple dem . E tell um say , “ Ef one ob oona wahn fa be oona big leada , e haffa pit esef las , an e haffa saab all ob oona . ”
41009036	Den Jedus tek a chile an hab um stan een de middle ob um . E hole de chile een e aam an taak ta de ciple dem .
41009037	E say , “ De poson wa heppy fa tek een a leetle chile like dis one yah een me name , dat poson da tek me een too . An e ain jes me de poson da tek een , cause same time e da tek een de one wa sen me . ”
41009038	John say , “ Teacha , we done see one man da dribe out ebil sperit by de powa ob ya name . We tell um fa stop dat , cause e ain been one ob we . ”
41009039	Jedus ansa say , “ Oona mus dohn tell um fa stop , cause nobody dat tek me name fa do a miracle kin say nottin bad bout me atta dat .
41009040	Whosoneba ain ginst we , e fa we .
41009041	A da tell oona fa true , ef anybody gii oona a cup ob wata fa drink een me name , cause oona blongst ta de Messiah , fa sho dat poson gwine git de good ting wa God gii ta dem wa saab um . ”
41009042	“ De poson wa mek one ob dese leetle chullun wa bleebe pon me do ebil , e mo betta fa dat poson ef dey been tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta deep sea .
41009043	Ef oona han da mek oona sin , mus cut um off ! E mo betta fa oona fa hab jes one han an git life wa neba end den fa oona fa keep two han an go ta hell , weh de fire ain neba gwine out . [
41009044	Oba deyso , de woom ain neba gwine dead an de fire ain neba gwine out ! ]
41009045	Ef oona foot da mek oona sin , mus cut um off ! E mo betta fa oona fa be cripple op an git life wa neba end , den fa oona fa keep two foot an den dey chunk oona eenta hell . [
41009046	Oba deyso , dem woom wa neba dead gwine keep on da nyam de people . An de fire neba gwine out . ]
41009047	Ef oona eye da mek oona sin , mus pull um out ! E mo betta fa oona fa hab jes one eye an go eenta de place weh God da rule , den fa oona fa keep two eye an den dey chunk oona eenta hell .
41009048	Oba deyso , de woom neba gwine dead an de fire neba gwine out ! ”
41009049	Fire gwine mek all people clean , same like salt kin mek dem ting wa dey da sacrifice clean .
41009050	“ Salt a good ting , bot ef de salt done loss e taste , dey ain nottin we kin do ta um fa mek um git back e taste , ainty ?
41010001	Jedus lef dey an gone ta Judea lan . Den e cross oba de Jerden Riba . Plenty plenty people geda roun um gin dey . An e laan um bout God , same like how e done beena do .
41010002	Some Pharisee dem come quizzit um . Dey beena try fa ketch um da taak ginst God Law . Dey aks Jedus say , “ Coddin ta we Jew Law , e right fa man fa worce e wife ? ”
41010003	Jedus aks um say , “ Wa de Law wa Moses gii oona chaage oona fa do ? ”
41010004	De Pharisee dem ansa Jedus say , “ Moses say a man kin write paper fa gii ta e wife fa worce um . Den de man kin sen um way . ”
41010005	Jedus tell um say , “ Moses write dat law fa oona cause oona haat haad .
41010006	Bot fom wen e fus mek de wol , ‘ God mek two kind ob people , man an ooman . ’
41010007	Cause ob dat , de man gwine lef e fada an e modda an jine wid e wife ,
41010008	an dem two gwine come fa be one poson . So dey ain two poson no mo . Dem two done come fa be one poson .
41010009	So den , wen God done jine dem togeda , mus dohn nobody tek dem paat fom one noda . ”
41010010	Now wen Jedus an e ciple dem gone back eenta de house , e ciple dem aks um bout wa e been say bout worce .
41010011	E ansa um say , “ Ef a man worce e wife an den e go marry oda ooman , dat man sin ginst e fus wife , cause e da sleep wid oda ooman .
41010012	Same way so , ef a ooman worce e husban an den e go marry oda man , dat ooman sin ginst e fus husban , cause e da sleep wid oda man . ”
41010013	Some people come bring chullun ta Jedus fa hab um pit e han pon dey head fa bless um . Bot e ciple dem buke de people , tell um dey ain oughta bodda Jedus so .
41010014	Wen Jedus see wa e ciple dem beena do , e been mad down . E tell e ciple dem say , “ Oona mus leh de chullun come ta me . Mus dohn stop um , cause people like dem chullun yah gwine be wid God wen e da rule .
41010015	A da tell oona de trute , anybody wa ain wahn fa hab God rule oba um same like dem chullun , dat poson dey ain gwine be wid God wen e da rule . ”
41010016	Den Jedus pick op de chullun , an e pit e han pon dey head an aks God fa bless um .
41010017	Wiles Jedus beena gwine way , one man ron meet um an kneel down fo um . E tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , ya wa good , tell me wa A haffa do fa git life wa neba end ? ”
41010018	Jedus ansa um say , “ Hoccome ya say A good ? Ain nobody good cep fa God .
41010019	Ya know de law wa Moses gii . ‘ Ya mus dohn kill nobody . Ya mus dohn sleep wid oda man wife . Mus dohn tief . Mus dohn lie bout wa oda people done . Mus dohn cheat . Mus pay mind ta ya fada an ya modda . ’ ”
41010020	De man ansa say , “ Teacha , A done keep all dem law eba since A been a chile . ”
41010021	Jedus look pon de man an e like um . An e tell um say , “ Jes one ting lef wa ya ain done yet . Mus go sell all ya hab an gii de money ta de people wa ain hab nottin . Ef ya do dat , ya gwine be rich fa true een heaben . An atta dat , ya mus come be me ciple . ”
41010022	Wen de man yeh wa Jedus say , e look sad . E been too saary , cause e been hab a whole heapa money . E lef Jedus an gone way .
41010023	Jedus look roun pon e ciple dem , tell um say , “ E sho nuff haad fa a rich poson fa come onda God rule ! ”
41010024	De ciple dem been stonish wen Jedus say dat . Bot Jedus tell um gin say , “ Me chullun , e sho nuff haad fa a rich poson fa come onda God rule .
41010025	E mo easy fa mek de camel go shru a needle eye den fa a rich poson fa come onda God rule . ”
41010026	Den de ciple dem been eben mo stonish . Dey aks one noda say , “ Ef dat so e stan , ain nobody gwine be sabe , ainty ? ”
41010027	Jedus look pon um an say , “ God able fa do wa people ain able fa do . God able fa do all ting . ”
41010028	Peter tell Jedus say , “ Look yah , we done lef ebryting an folla longside ya ! ”
41010029	Jedus ansa say , “ A da tell oona fa true , de poson wa done lef e house or broda or sista or modda or fada or chullun or propaty fa sake a me an de Good Nyews ,
41010030	God gwine gim hundud time mo den wa e done lef . E gwine gim house , broda , sista , modda , chullun an propaty . God gwine gim now wiles e da lib yah een dis wol . An people gwine mek um suffa bad yah , bot God gwine gim life wa neba end , een de wol wa gwine come .
41010031	Bot plenty wa fus now , dey gwine be las , an plenty people wa las now , dey gwine be fus . ”
41010032	Wiles dey beena trabel long de road ta Jerusalem , Jedus waak een front ob e ciple dem . Dey been stonish tommuch . An de people wa beena come long wid um been scaid . Jedus call e ciple dem ta one side an tell um gin bout wa gwine happen ta um .
41010033	E say , “ Oona listen ta me . We da gwine ta Jerusalem , weh some people gwine grab hole ta de Man wa Come fom God . Dey gwine han um oba , gim ta de Jew priest leada dem an de Jew Law teacha dem . Den dey gwine han um oba ta people wa ain Jew fa kill um .
41010034	Dem people gwine hole um cheap . Dey gwine spit pon um , whip um an kill um . Bot atta shree day , e gwine come out fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . ”
41010035	James an John , wa been Zebedee chullun , come ta Jedus say , “ Teacha , we wahn ya fa do sompin dat we gwine aks ya fa . ”
41010036	Jedus aks um say , “ Wa dat oona wahn me fa do fa oona ? ”
41010037	Dey ansa um say , “ Wen ya gwine rule all de wol een glory , leh we seddown nex ta ya , one ob we pon ya right han side an de oda one pon ya lef han side . ”
41010038	Jedus say , “ Oona ain ondastan wa oona da aks me fa do . Oona gwine be able fa suffa wid me , fa drink fom de cup wa A gwine drink fom ? Oona gwine be able fa dead wid me , fa be bactize like A gwine be bactize ? ”
41010039	Dey ansa say , “ We gwine be able fa do um . ”
41010040	Bot A ain hab de tority fa leh oona seddown pon me right han side an pon me lef han side , wen A gwine rule . God done keep dem place fa de people wa e done pick fa seddown dey . ”
41010041	Wen de oda ten ciple yeh bout dat , dey been too bex at James an John cause ob wa dey been aks Jedus fa do fa um .
41010042	Jedus call um all togeda an tell um say , “ Oona know bout de leada dem wa spose fa rule oba de people dey een de wol . Dem leada hab powa oba de people an da tell dem wa fa do .
41010043	Bot e ain gwine be dat way mongst oona . Ef one ob oona wahn fa be de head poson , e mus be oona saabant .
41010044	Ef one ob oona wahn fa be fus , dat poson mus be ebrybody slabe .
41010045	Cause eben de Man wa Come fom God ain come fa mek people e saabant . E come fa be de people saabant , an fa gii e life fa pay de price , fa sabe a whole heapa people . ”
41010046	Jedus an e ciple dem come ta Jericho . Wen dey been lef Jericho long wid a whole bunch ob oda people , one bline eye man name Bartimaeus beena seddown close by de road , da beg . E been Timaeus chile .
41010047	Wen Bartimaeus yeh say dat Jedus wa come fom Nazareth beena pass by dey , e staat fa holla say , “ Jedus , Son ob David , hab mussy pon me ! ”
41010048	Plenty ob de people buke Bartimaeus , tell um mus dohn crack e teet . Bot e da holla mo louda say , “ Son ob David , hab mussy pon me ! ”
41010049	Jedus stop , tell de people say , “ Call um fa come yah . ”
41010050	Bartimaeus shrow off e coat off . E hop op an gone ta Jedus .
41010051	Jedus aks um say , “ Wa ya wahn me fa do fa ya ? ”
41010052	Jedus say , “ Ya kin go pon ya way now . Cause ya da bleebe , ya done git well . ”
41011001	Jedus dem come close ta Jerusalem . Dey been dey by Bethphage een Bethany willage . Wen dey reach ta de Mount Olib , Jedus tell two e ciple fa go on fo de oda res .
41011002	E chaage um say , “ Oona mus go ta dat willage oba dey . Wen oona reach dey , oona gwine see one nyoung donkey wa tie op dey . Nobody ain neba ride pon dat donkey . Mus ontie um an bring um ta me .
41011003	Ef somebody aks oona hoccome oona da ontie de donkey , mus tell um say , ‘ De Lawd need um , bot e gwine hab we bring um back wen e done wid um . ’ ”
41011004	So de two ciple gone an dey see de nyoung donkey tie op ta one house door dey een de screet . Dey staat fa ontie dat donkey .
41011005	Some people wa beena stanop dey aks de ciple dem say , “ Hoccome oona da ontie dat donkey ? ”
41011006	De ciple dem ansa um say jes wa Jedus been tell um fa say . So de people leh um tek de donkey an go .
41011007	De ciple dem tek de donkey , come ta Jedus . Wen dey git dey , dey spread dey coat pontop de donkey back . Jedus seddown pontop um an staat fa ride eenta Jerusalem .
41011008	A heapa people spread dey coat pon de road weh Jedus pass . Some oda people broke off branch fom de tree dem close by een de fiel an spread um pon de road .
41011009	De people wa beena waak fo Jedus an dem wa come hine um beena holla say , “ Praise God ! God bless de one wa come een de Lawd name !
41011010	God bless de gobment wa da come . E gwine be same like de gobment wa we ole time leada David done rule oba . Praise God een heaben ! ”
41011011	Jedus gone eenta Jerusalem an eenta God House . E look roun at ebryting dey . Bot de sun beena set fa red so e an e tweb ciple dem gone out ta Bethany willage .
41011012	De nex day wen dey come back fom Bethany , Jedus been hongry .
41011013	E look cross de way an e see one fig tree wa been git plenty leaf . So Jedus gone look fa see ef de tree da beah fig . Wen e come close by um , e see dey ain been no fig pon um , jes de leaf da kiba um , cause e ain been de time yet fa beah fig .
41011014	Jedus taak ta de tree say , “ Ya mus dohn beah fig no mo fa nobody fa nyam . ”
41011015	Wen Jedus dem git ta Jerusalem , Jedus gone eenta God House . E staat fa dribe out de people dey wa beena buy an sell ting . E ton oba de table dem weh people beena mek change fa de money ob people fom oda lan . An e ton oba de bench dem weh people come fa seddown wen dey sell pigeon .
41011016	E ain leh nobody tote nottin fa sell wen dey pass shru de yaad ob God House .
41011017	Den e laan de people say , “ Fa true , dey done write een God Book say , ‘ Dey gwine call me House de place weh people wa come fom all oba de wol come fa pray ta God . ’ Bot oona done ton um eenta place weh de tief dem da hide ! ”
41011018	Wen de Jew priest leada dem an de Jew Law teacha dem yeh wa Jedus beena say , dey staat fa look fa way fa kill um . Dey been scaid ob um , cause all de crowd ob people been stonish wen dey yeh wa Jedus teach .
41011019	Wen de sun set fa red , Jedus an e ciple dem come outta de city .
41011020	De nex maanin wen Jedus dem beena gwine long de road , dey see de fig tree . All dat tree done dry op an dead , fom de bottom root op ta de top de tree .
41011021	Peter memba wa been happen , an e tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , look dey ! Dat fig tree wa ya been cuss , e dead . ”
41011022	Jedus ansa um say , “ Mus hab fait een God .
41011023	A da tell oona , ef somebody tell dis mountain yah say , ‘ Mus git op an go shrow yasef eenta de sea , ’ dat wa gwine happen , ef dat poson ain doubt een e haat , ef e bleebe fa true dat wa e say gwine happen .
41011024	So den , A da tell oona say , wen ya aks God fa sompin , mus bleebe fa true dat ya gwine git um , an God gwine gim ta ya .
41011025	Wensoneba ya da stan an pray ta God , mus paadon de poson wa done ya bad . Den oona Fada God wa dey een heaben gwine paadon oona fa de ebil ting wa oona done . [
41011026	Ef oona ain paadon oda people , den oona Fada wa dey een heaben ain gwine paadon oona fa de ebil ting wa oona done . ] ”
41011027	Jedus an e ciple dem come back ta Jerusalem , an Jedus beena waak een God House . De Jew priest leada dem an Jew Law teacha dem an oda Jew leada come ta Jedus .
41011028	Dey aks um say , “ Wa right ya hab fa do dem ting yah ? Who dat gii ya de tority fa do um ? ”
41011029	Jedus ansa say , “ A gwine aks oona one queshon . Ef oona ansa me , A gwine tell oona who dat gii me de tority fa do dem ting yah .
41011030	Mus tell me say , ‘ Who dat gii John de tority fa come bactize people ? God gii John tority , or some poson gim de tority ? ’ ”
41011031	De leada dem bicka mongst deysef say , “ Ef we ansa say God gii John tority , Jedus gwine aks we say , ‘ Hoccome oona ain bleebe John ? ’
41011032	Bot we mus dohn say , ‘ Some poson gii John de tority . ’ ” Dey been scaid fa say dat cause all de people bleebe say John been a true prophet .
41011033	So dey ansa Jedus say , “ We ain know who dat gii John tority . ”
41012001	Jedus staat fa tell dem paable . E say , “ One man plant plenty grapewine een e gyaaden . E mek stone wall roun de gyaaden . E mek a hole fa mash op de grape fa git de grape juice . An e build a place pontop de stone wall fa people fa keep gyaad oba de gyaaden . Den e hire some faama dem fa tek cyah ob de gyaaden . An e gone way , trabel ta oda country .
41012002	Wen haabis time come , de man wa own de grapewine sen e wokman fa aks de faama dem fa gim de owna paat ob de haabis .
41012003	Bot dem faama grab hole ta de wokman an beat op pon um , an dribe um outta de gyaaden . Dey ain gim nottin .
41012004	De man wa own de gyaaden sen oda wokman , bot de faama dem beat um een de head an shame um .
41012005	De owna sen noda wokman . Dey kill dat one . De owna sen plenty oda . Dey beat op pon some ob dem an dey kill some ob dem .
41012006	So den , de owna hab one poson lef fa sen . Dat e own son , an e lob um a whole heap . E sen um ta de gyaaden , tink say , ‘ Wen dem faama see me son , dey gwine hona um fa true . ’
41012007	Bot wen de faama dem see de owna son , dey tell one noda say , ‘ Dat de son dis propaty gwine be lef ta . Leh we kill um so dat de propaty gwine come ta we . ’
41012008	Dey grab hole ta um an kill um , an dey chunk e body outta de gyaaden . ”
41012009	Den Jedus tell um say , “ Oona know wa dat man wa own de gyaaden gwine do ? E gwine come kill dem faama , an e gwine hire oda faama fa tek cyah ob de gyaaden .
41012010	Fa sho , oona done read wa dey write een God Book say ,
41012011	De Lawd mek um dat way ,
41012012	De Jew leada dem try fa grab hole ta Jedus an res um , cause dey know dat paable wa e done tell been ginst dem . Bot dey been scaid ob de crowd ob people , so dey lef Jedus an gone way .
41012013	Dey sen some Pharisee an some ob King Herod people ta Jedus fa ketch um , mek um say sompin so dey able fa cuse um .
41012014	Dey come ta Jedus say , “ Teacha , we know ya da taak true an ya ain warry bout wa people tink . Cause ya da look pon all people de same . Ya da laan we de true way a folla God . Bot leh we aks ya one queshon . E right , coddin ta we Law , fa pay tax ta de Roman rula Caesar ?
41012015	Tell we ef we oughta pay um or ef we ain oughta . ”
41012016	Dey bring um de Roman coin . Jedus aks dem say , “ Whodat hab e face an e name dey pon dis coin ? ”
41012017	Jedus say , “ Well den , oona mus gii Caesar dat wa blongst ta Caesar , an gii God wa blongst ta God . ”
41012018	Some Sadducee people come ta Jedus . De Sadducee dem been bleebe say people wa done dead ain gwine git op fom de grabe an lib gin .
41012019	Dey aks Jedus say , “ Teacha , Moses done write we law say , ‘ Ef a man broda dead an lef a wife bot ain hab no chullun , de broda wa lef haffa marry de wida ooman fa hab chullun fa e broda wa done dead . ’
41012020	Now den , dey been seben broda . De fus broda marry . Den e dead an e ain hab no chullun .
41012021	So den , de nex broda marry de wida ooman . E done dead too an ain hab no chullun . Same fashion , de nex broda .
41012022	All de seben broda dem marry de one ooman , bot dey done dead an dey ain hab no chullun . Den las de ooman dead .
41012023	Now den , all seben broda dem done marry dat one ooman . Tell we , de day wen God gwine mek all de people wa done dead rise op fom de grabe an lib gin , wish one dem seben broda gwine hab dat ooman fa e wife ? ”
41012024	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona wrong fa true , ainty ? Cause oona ain know God Book an oona ain ondastan bout God powa .
41012025	Cause wen de people wa done dead rise op fom de grabe an lib gin , dey ain gwine be marry no mo . Dey gwine be like de angel dem een heaben .
41012026	Now den , leh we taak bout how God da mek de people wa done dead lib gin . Ain oona read wa Moses write wen e tell bout de bush wa beena bun bot ain neba bun op ? God tell Moses say , ‘ A de God ob Abraham , de God ob Isaac an de God ob Jacob . ’
41012027	Oona Sadducee wrong fa true ! Cause dat tell we e de God ob people wa da lib . E ain no God ob dead people . ”
41012028	One Jew Law teacha been dey an e yeh dem da aagy . E know Jedus done ansa dem Sadducee good . So e come ta Jedus aks um say , “ Wish law great mo den all de oda law dem ? ”
41012029	Jedus ansa um say , “ De law wa great mo den all de oda law dem say , ‘ Pay tention oona , Israel people ! De Lawd we God , e de onliest Lawd .
41012030	Ya mus lob de Lawd ya God wid all ya haat , an wid all ya soul , an wid all ya mind , an wid all ya scrent . ’
41012031	De nex law wa great mo den all de oda res say , ‘ Ya mus lob ya neighba de same way ya lob yasef ! ’ Dey ain no oda law mo greata den dem two yah . ”
41012032	De Jew Law teacha tell Jedus , “ Teacha , ya done ansa scraight ! Ya done tell de trute wen ya say de Lawd de onliest God . Dey ain no oda God .
41012033	Ya done tell de trute wen ya say we mus lob God wid all we haat , all we mind , an all we scrent . An we mus lob oda people roun we same like we lob wesef . E mo betta fa do wa dem two law yah tell we fa do den fa gii God all we offrin , an de sacrifice dem wa we da mek , an all de animal dem wa we da bun fo God . ”
41012034	Jedus know de Jew Law teacha ansa um sensible , so e tell um say , “ Ya done come close ta leh God rule oba ya . ”
41012035	Wen Jedus been een God House da laan de people , e aks um say , “ Hoccome de Jew Law teacha dem say dat Christ , de Messiah , e David son ?
41012036	Cause de Holy Sperit done mek David esef say ,
41012037	David esef call de Messiah ‘ Lawd , ’ so how de Messiah kin be David son ? ”
41012038	Wen e beena laan de people mo , e tell um say , “ Mus watch out fa de Jew Law teacha dem . Dey like fa waak roun een day long robe een de maakut place so dat de people wa geda dey show um hona .
41012039	Dem teacha like fa seddown een de mos portant seat een de Jew meetin house . An wen people call um fa come fa feas , dey wahn de bes place weh de big leada dem sit .
41012040	Dem Law teacha like fa git hole ta de wida ooman dem propaty . An dey da pray long pray fa mek people say dey good fa true . God gwine punish um mo den e gwine punish oda people ! ”
41012041	Jedus been ta God House , an e seddown weh e been able fa see de box weh de people da pit offrin money . E beena look pon de people wiles dey beena come pit dey money eenta de box . Plenty rich people pit heapa money een dey .
41012042	Den one po wida ooman come pit een two leetle coppa coin wa wot bout a penny .
41012043	Jedus call e ciple dem togeda an tell um say , “ A da tell oona de trute . Dis po wida ooman done pit mo eenta de offrin box den all de oda people .
41012044	Dey all hab plenty ting an da gii jes a paat ob de money wa dey hab . Bot dis ooman done pit een all e money . E gii all wa e been hab fa lib . ”
41013001	Wen Jedus beena come out fom God House , one ob e ciple dem tell um say , “ Teacha , look at dem fine big stone an all a dem fine buildin yah ! ”
41013002	Jedus ansa say , “ Oona see dem big buildin yah ? Time da come wen dem all gwine faddown . Ain one stone gwine be lef pontop noda . ”
41013003	Jedus gone ta de Mount Olib , an e beena seddown dey , weh e been able fa see God House . Peter , James , John an Andrew come fa taak ta Jedus , paat fom de oda people .
41013004	Dey aks um say , “ Tell we wa time dem ting gwine happen ? Wa sign gwine show we dat all dem ting gwine staat ? ”
41013005	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona mus tek cyah . Mus dohn leh nobody mek oona fool .
41013006	Plenty people gwine tek me name an come ta oona . Dey gwine say ‘ A de Messiah , ’ an dey gwine mek plenty people fool .
41013007	Oona mus dohn warry wen oona yeh de nise ob waa close by oona , an oona yeh nyews bout waa wa da faaway . Dem ting dey haffa be , bot de wol ain gwine end yet !
41013008	One country gwine fight oda country , an one nation gwine fight oda nation all oba de wol . De groun gwine rumble een plenty place . People ain gwine hab nottin fa nyam . All dem bad ting dey jes de fus ting wa gwine come , same like wen de fus pain come fa de modda wen e chile da bon . Wos ting dem gwine folla atta . ”
41013009	“ Oona mus tek cyah . Cause oona bleebe pon me , people gwine grab hole ob oona an tek oona ta de jedge dem een court . Dey gwine beat oona op een de Jew meetin house . Dey gwine tek oona fo de gobna dem an king dem wa da rule fa dem fa jedge oona . So den , oona gwine dey fa tell dem de Good Nyews wa oona know bout me .
41013010	People een all de country ob de wol gwine yeh de Good Nyews fus .
41013011	Ebry time dey grab hole ta oona , tek oona ta court fa trial , mus dohn warry bout wa oona gwine say . Mus dohn study bout dat fo de time come . Cause wen de time come , wasoneba wod wa de Holy Sperit pit een oona mout , dat wa oona mus say . E ain gwine be oona own wod . De Holy Sperit gwine tell oona wa fa say .
41013012	Some man gwine han oba dey own broda ta people wa gwine kill um . Same fashion , some fada gwine han oba dey chullun ta people wa gwine kill um . Chullun gwine fight dey own fada an modda , han um oba ta people fa leh dem kill um .
41013013	All de people gwine be ginst oona cause oona bleebe pon me . Bot God gwine sabe ebrybody wa stanop fa me til de wol done end . ”
41013014	“ Oona gwine see ‘ De Horrible Bad Ting wa mek God place empty ’ da stanop een de place weh e ain oughta dey . ” ( Leh oona wa da read ondastan wa dis mean . ) “ Wen dat time come , de people een Judea mus ron way quick ta de hill country .
41013015	Ebrybody wa dey pontop e house mus dohn tek time fa go down eenside de house gin fa tek ting wid um .
41013016	Ebrybody wa da wok een e fiel mus dohn go back ta e house fa tek e coat wid um .
41013017	Een dat time dey , e gwine be bad fa ooman dem dat wid chile an ooman wa hab leetle chullun !
41013018	Oona mus pray ta God dat dem ting yah mus dohn happen een de winta time , wen de rain come .
41013019	Cause de people een dat time gwine suffa mo den people done suffa fom de time wen God fus mek de wol eben til now . An atta dat , ting like dat ain gwine happen gin .
41013020	Bot de Lawd done say fo han dat e ain gwine leh dem suffa too many day . E mek de time wen dey gwine suffa be cut shot . Ef e ain done dat , ain nobody been gwine lef een de wol wen dat time come , wen dey suffa so . Bot fa sake ob dem people wa de Lawd done pick , e done mek dat time be cut shot .
41013021	So den , wen dat time come , oona mus dohn bleebe nobody ef e tell oona say , ‘ Look , de Messiah dey yah ! ’ or ‘ Look , e oba yonda ! ’
41013022	Cause some people gwine come da lie , say dey de Messiah . An some gwine come wa gwine lie , say dey a prophet . Dey gwine do miracle an show plenty sign wa stonish de people . Cause dey wahn fa mek fool ob dem people wa God done pick , ef dey able fa do dat .
41013023	So oona mus tek cyah . A done tell oona all ting fo dey happen . ”
41013024	“ Atta people done suffa all dem ting , de sun gwine daak an de moon ain gwine shine no mo .
41013025	De staa dem gwine faddown outta de sky . An de powa dem wa dey een de sky gwine shake , come outta dey place weh dey been .
41013026	Den ebrybody gwine see de Man wa Come fom God da come down een de cloud dem . E gwine hab greata powa , an bright glory light gwine shine roun um .
41013027	E gwine sen de angel dem all oba de wol fom one end ta de oda fa geda togeda de people wa e done pick fa be e own . ”
41013028	“ Now den , oona mus look ta de fig tree fa laan fom um . Wen de branch ob dat tree hab nyew life een de spring time an staat fa leaf out , oona know summa da come soon .
41013029	Same way so , wen oona see dem ting wa A tell oona bout , oona gwine know de time mos yah .
41013030	A da tell oona fa true , all dem ting mus happen fo de people dead wa da lib now .
41013031	De sky an all de eart gwine pass way , bot me wod ain neba gwine pass way .
41013032	“ Ain nobody know de day , ain nobody know de hour wen dem ting yah gwine happen . Eben de angel deysef an God Son esef ain know . Jes de Fada God , e de onliest one wa know de time wen dem ting gwine happen
41013033	Oona mus pay tention . Mus tek cyah an pray ta God , cause oona ain know wa time dem ting yah gwine happen .
41013034	E gwine stan like wen one man da gwine fa trabel faa way fom home . Fo e gone , e lef e house ta e wokman dem . E chaage um all , tell um wa dey fa do , one by one . An e tell de watchman fa tek cyah fa pay tention all de time .
41013035	So den same fashion , oona mus tek cyah , mus pay tention all de time . Cause oona ain know de time wen de massa ob de house gwine come . Oona ain know ef e gwine come aaly een de night time , een de middle night , fus fowl crow or day clean .
41013036	Oona mus tek cyah , mus pay tention . Cause ef oona ain pay tention , e gwine come all ob a sudden an find oona da sleep .
41013037	So dis wa A da tell oona ain jes fa oona , bot e fa all people . Oona all mus tek cyah . Mus pay tention . ”
41014001	E been two day fo de Jew holiday wa dey call Passoba an de Feas ob Unleaven Bread , wen dey nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast . De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Jew Law teacha dem beena try fa find way fa grab hole ta Jedus fa kill um . Bot dey ain wahn de people fa know wa dey da do .
41014002	Dey say ta one noda , “ We ain oughta grab hole ta Jedus now jurin dis holiday wen plenty people dey yah . Cause ef we do , de people gwine fight fa Jedus . ”
41014003	Jedus been een Bethany een Simon house . Simon de man wa been hab leposy . Wiles Jedus beena nyam , one ooman come een wid sweet ointment oll eenside a jar wa dey mek fom alabasta stone . Dat been a spensiz ointment wa dey mek fom de nard plant . De ooman broke de jar mout an pour de dat ointment pon Jedus head .
41014004	Some ob de people dey git bex . Dey say ta one noda , “ Hoccome dis ooman done waste de spensiz ointment like dat ?
41014005	Ef dey been sell dat ointment , dey been able fa git heapa money fa um , mo den wa a man kin mek een a whole yeah , an den dey kin gii de money ta de people wa ain hab nottin . ” An dem people buke de ooman bad .
41014006	Bot Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus dohn buke dis ooman no mo . Mus dohn bodda um . Dat one fine ting wa e done fa me !
41014007	People wa ain hab nottin dey dey wid oona all de time , an oona kin hep um wensoneba oona wahn fa hep um . Bot A ain gwine dey dey wid oona all time .
41014008	De ooman done done all wa e able fa do fa me . E done naint me wid sweet ointment fa mek me body ready head ob time fa wen dey bury me .
41014009	A da tell oona fa true , all oba de wol , wehsoneba dey da tell people de Good Nyews , dey gwine memba dis ooman an taak bout dis ting wa e done yah . ”
41014010	Den Judas Iscariot , one ob de tweb ciple dem , gone off ta de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem . Judas gone fa tell um say e gwine han Jedus oba ta dem .
41014011	Dey been too glad fa yeh wa e say , an dey gree fa gim money . So den Judas staat da look fa chance fa han Jedus oba ta dem .
41014012	E been de fus day ob de Jew holiday ob Unleaven Bread , wen de Jew dem da nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast . Dey alltime kill lamb dat day fa memba de Passoba , how dey ole people done come outta Egypt . Jedus ciple dem aks Jedus say , “ Weh ya wahn we fa go fa git de Passoba meal ready fa ya ? ”
41014013	Jedus sen two ob um , tell um say , “ Mus go eenta de city , weh oona gwine meet op wid a man wa da tote a wata jug . Oona mus go wid um .
41014014	Wen oona reach de house weh e gone een , oona mus tell de poson wa own de house say , ‘ De Teacha wahn fa know weh de room weh e gwine nyam de Passoba meal wid e ciple dem ? ’
41014015	Den de man gwine show oona one big opstair room . E done ready de room fa we , an ebryting wa we need dey eenside dey . An dey een dat room , oona gwine git ebryting ready fa we fa nyam de meal fa memba de Passoba . ”
41014016	De ciple dem gone ta de city . Dey find all ting jes like Jedus done tell um . So dey git ebryting ready fa nyam de meal fa memba de Passoba .
41014017	Wen sun done set fa red , Jedus an de tweb ciple dem come ta dat house .
41014018	Wiles dey beena nyam , Jedus say , “ A da tell oona , one ob oona gwine han me oba ta me enemy dem . One ob oona wa da nyam yah wid me now gwine do um . ”
41014019	De ciple dem been too saaful . One by one dey aks Jedus say , “ Fa sho , ya ain mean me , ainty ? ”
41014020	Jedus ansa say , “ One ob oona tweb gwine do um , one ob oona wa da dip e bread een de same dish yah , da nyam wid me .
41014021	De Man wa Come fom God gwine dead , jes like dey done write bout um een God Book . Bot e gwine be too bad fa dat man wa gwine sell de Man wa Come fom God ! E been faa betta fa dat man dey ef e ain neba been bon ! ”
41014022	Wiles dey beena nyam , Jedus tek bread , e pray , tell God say , “ Tankya fa de bread . ” E broke de bread an gim ta e ciple dem . E tell um say , “ Oona tek dis bread yah , nyam um . Dis yah me body . ”
41014023	Den e tek one cup wid wine een um . E pray , tell God tankya fa de wine . Den e gii de cup ta e ciple dem , an dey all drink fom de cup .
41014024	Jedus tell um say , “ Dis yah me blood . A gwine dead , da sacrifice me blood fa sabe a whole heapa people . Me blood gwine show ebrybody dat God gwine do same like e done say e fa do , wen e mek de nyew greement wid e people .
41014025	A da tell oona fa true , A ain gwine drink wine gin , til de time wen A drink de nyew wine een de place weh God da rule . ”
41014026	Den dey sing one hymn an gone out ta de Mount Olib .
41014027	Jedus tell e ciple say , “ Oona all gwine bandon me , lef me lone . Cause dey done write een God Book say , ‘ God gwine shrike de shephud an de sheep gwine scatta . ’
41014028	Bot wen A git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , A gwine go ta Galilee head ob oona . Oona gwine go meet me dey . ”
41014029	Peter ansa um scrong mout say , “ Eben ef all de oda ciple dem bandon ya , A ain gwine bandon ya neba ! ”
41014030	Jedus tell Peter say , “ A da tell ya fa true , dis same night , fo de cock crow two time , ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me . ”
41014031	Peter ansa mo scrong mout say , “ Eben ef A haffa dead wid ya , A ain gwine neba say A ain know ya ! ”
41014032	Jedus an e ciple reach one place wa name Gethsemane . Jedus tell um say , “ Oona seddown yah . A gwine go fa pray . ”
41014033	Jedus tek Peter , James an John wid um . An Jedus git too saaful an hebby hebby haat .
41014034	E tell um say , “ Me haat so hebby dat A feel like A gwine dead . Oona stay yah an pray . Mus dohn sleep . ” E git down flat pon de groun da pray ta God . E aks um say , “ Fada , ef ya say e kin be , A aks ya fa sabe me . Tek way dis time wa da come wen A haffa suffa an dead so . ”
41014035	Jedus lef um , gone a leetle way foda . E git down flat pon de groun fa pray ta God .
41014036	An e say , “ Fada , me Fada , ya able fa do all ting . Please sah , tek way dis cup wa A fa suffa . Stillyet , mus dohn do wa A wahn . Mus do wa ya wahn . ”
41014037	Den Jedus come back ta de shree ciple dem . E find um sleep . E tell Peter say , “ Simon , ya da sleep , ainty ? Ya ain able fa stay wake eben a leetle wiles ? ”
41014038	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus dohn sleep . Mus pray so dat oona ain gwine do ebil wen Satan try fa mek oona do um . Oona wahn fa do de right ting , bot oona ain hab scrent fa do um . ”
41014039	Jedus lef um gin , e gone on a leetle way . E pray wid de same wod e beena pray de fus time .
41014040	Den e come back gin an find Peter , James an John sleep . Dey ain been able fa keep dey eye open , an dey ain know wa fa say ta Jedus .
41014041	Jedus gone way gin an pray . Wen e come back fa de shree time , e tell um say , “ Oona stillyet da sleep an res ? Dat nuff fa now . De time done come . Look yah ! Sinna man gwine han de Man wa Come fom God oba ta de enemy .
41014042	Git op . Leh we go meet um . Oona look yah . See de man wa da han me oba ta me enemy . E da come yah now ! ”
