41014043	Wiles Jedus beena say dat , Judas , one ob de tweb ciple dem , git dey . A bunch ob people been wid um , da tote knife an big stick fa fight wid . De Jew priest leada dem , de Jew Law teacha dem an de oda Jew big leada dem done sen dem people wid Judas .
41014044	Judas done been tell dem people heada time how dey gwine know Jedus . E been say , “ De Man wa A gwine kiss , dat de Man oona wahn . Mus grab hole ta um , tek um way wid gyaad roun um . ”
41014045	Wen Judas git dey , e gone op ta Jedus , say , “ Teacha ! ” Den e kiss um .
41014046	De people grab hole ta Jedus an hole um tight .
41014047	One ob dem wa beena stanop dey dey by Jedus pull out e knife . E scrike de slabe ob de head man ob de Jew priest leada dem . Dat man cut off de slabe yea .
41014048	Jedus tell de crowd say , “ Oona haffa come wid knife an big stick fa grab hole ta me , ainty ? A ain no tief .
41014049	Ebry day A been dey wid oona een God House , da teach bout God . Bot oona ain neba grab hole ta me . Bot all wa dey done write een God Book haffa come true . ”
41014050	Den all de ciple dem lef Jedus an ron way .
41014051	One nyoung man beena folla long hine Jedus . Dat man ain hab no cloes on cepin a piece ob linen closs . An de people try fa grab hole ta um .
41014052	Bot de man lef de closs een dey han an ron way nekid .
41014053	Dey tek Jedus ta de head man ob de Jew priest leada dem , eenta e house . All de leada dem ob de Jew priest , de oda Jew leada dem an de Jew Law teacha dem beena geda dey .
41014054	Peter beena folla long hine Jedus fom a way off . E folla long eenta de head man yaad . Wen e reach dey , Peter gone seddown close ta de gyaad dem , da waam esef by de fire .
41014055	De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an all de oda Jew leada dem wa jedge een de Jew High Court beena look fa find some poson fa taak ginst Jedus , say e done ebil ting , so dat dem leada kin kill um . Bot dey ain been able fa find nobody .
41014056	A heapa people tell lie ginst Jedus , bot dey ain mek dey story gree .
41014057	Den some people stanop an tell dis lie ginst Jedus .
41014058	Dey say , “ We done yeh Jedus say , ‘ A gwine stroy God House yah wa people done mek . An A gwine tek shree day fa mek oda God House , wa no poson gwine hep mek . ’ ”
41014059	Bot dem people yah wa say dat ginst Jedus ain neba mek dey story gree needa .
41014060	De head man ob de Jew priest leada dem stanop een front ob dem all . E aks Jedus say , “ Wa mek dem people yah say ya done dem ebil ting ? Wa ya say bout dat ? ”
41014061	Bot Jedus neba say a mumblin wod . De head man ob de priest dem keep on da quizzit um . E aks um say , “ Ya de Messiah , de Son ob de God we praise ? Tell we . ”
41014062	Jedus ansa um say , “ Yeah , A de Messiah . Oona gwine see de Man wa Come fom God , da seddown ta de right han side ob God wa hab all powa . An oona gwine see me da come ta dis wol da ride pon heaben cloud ! ”
41014063	De head man ob de priest dem bex fa true til e teah e cloes an say , “ We ain need no mo people fa taak ginst um , ainty ?
41014064	Oonasef done yeh de ebil ting e say ginst God . Wa oona say ? ”
41014065	Some dem staat fa spit pon Jedus . Dey tie a closs oba e eye . Den dey slap um an say , “ Guess who dat slap ya ? Tell we ! ” De gyaad deysef tek um an beat um op .
41014066	Peter been dey , down een de yaad , wen one de gyal dem wa wok fa de head man ob de priest dem come by .
41014067	Wen e see Peter da waam esef by de fire dey dey , dat gyal look um dead een de face an say , “ Yasef beena gone longside Jedus wa come fom Nazareth . ”
41014068	Bot Peter say e ain know Jedus . E ansa de gyal say , “ A ain know wa ya da taak bout . ” An Peter gone out close ta de gate . Same time a cock crow .
41014069	Wen de gyal see Peter dey , e tell de people wa beena stan roun , say gin , “ Dis man yah one ob dem wa beena gone longside Jedus ! ”
41014070	Bot Peter say gin , “ A ain know um . ”
41014071	Peter say , “ A da tell oona fa true ! Leh God mek me suffa ef A ain taak scraight . A ain know dat man oona da taak bout ! ”
41014072	Same time e say dat , a cock crow noda time . Peter memba wa Jedus done been tell um . Jedus done been say , “ Fo de cock crow two time , ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me . ” Peter buss out da cry .
41015001	Wen day clean broad , de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem , de oda Jew leada dem , de Jew Law teacha dem , an all de oda memba dem ob de Jew Council geda togeda fa mek plan ginst Jedus . Dey mek de gyaad dem tie op Jedus han an tek um way fa go ta Gobna Pilate .
41015002	Pilate aks Jedus say , “ Ya de king ob de Jew people ? ”
41015003	De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem beena cuse Jedus , say e done do plenty ebil ting .
41015004	Pilate aks Jedus noda time say , “ Ya ain got nottin fa say fa ansa um ? Ya yeh all dem ebil ting wa dey say ya done ? ”
41015005	Stillyet Jedus ain ansa nottin , an Pilate been stonish .
41015006	Ebry yeah wen de Passoba holiday come , Pilate nyuse fa free one poson wa de Jew people wahn fom outta de jailhouse .
41015007	An jurin dis time yah , some people done been riot een dat country , an dem wa done kill a poson been pit eenta de jailhouse . One dem een de jailhouse been a man name Barabbas .
41015008	De crowd come geda togeda dey ta Pilate yaad . Dey aks Pilate fa leh one poson outta de jailhouse fa de people , same like e beena do ebry yeah .
41015009	Pilate aks de people say , “ Oona wahn me fa leh de Jew people king go free ? ”
41015010	E been know dat de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem been han Jedus oba ta um cause dey been jealous ob um .
41015011	Bot de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem chaage de crowd fa tell Pilate dey wahn um fa free Barabbas fom outta de jailhouse , stead ob Jedus .
41015012	Pilate aks de people say , “ Well den , wa A gwine do wid de man oona call de Jew people king ? ”
41015013	Dey holla back ta Pilate say , “ Kill Jedus . Nail um pon de cross ! ”
41015014	Pilate aks um say , “ Wa fa ? Wa ebil ting e done ? ”
41015015	So fa mek de crowd heppy , Pilate leh Barabbas outta de jailhouse . E chaage de sodja dem fa beat Jedus . Den e hab dem tek Jedus fa kill um , nail um pon de cross .
41015016	De sodja dem tek Jedus eenta one yaad eenside ob Gobna Pilate bighouse . Dey geda togeda all de oda sodja dem dey .
41015017	Cause de people call Jedus King , de sodja dem dress Jedus een a purple robe fa laugh at um . Dey mek a crown fom bramble branch an pit um pon e head .
41015018	Den dey hole um cheap , hail um say , “ Leh de Jew people King hab long life ! ”
41015019	Dey beat Jedus wid a stick pon e head , an dey spit pon um . An dey kneel down fo um fa laugh at um , mek like dey da woshup um .
41015020	Atta dey been shru hole um cheap , dey pull de purple robe off um an pit e own cloes back pon um . Den dey tek um fa kill um , nail um pon de cross .
41015021	Wiles dey beena gwine , dey meet one man name Simon , wa been bon een Cyrene . E been Alexander an Rufus dem fada . Simon beena come fom de countryside , da gwine ta Jerusalem . De sodja dem mek Simon tote de cross fa Jedus .
41015022	Dey tek Jedus ta a place dey call Golgotha . Dat mean “ De Place wa Stan Like Man Skull . ”
41015023	Dey mix wine wid a medicine wa dey call myrrh . Dey gim ta Jedus fa drink , bot e neba drink um .
41015024	Den de sodja dem nail Jedus pon de cross . Dey shrow dice fa share Jedus cloes mongst um , see who gwine git wa piece .
41015025	E been nine o'clock een de maanin wen dey nail Jedus pon de cross .
41015026	Dey write down de chaage dey been hab ginst Jedus . De chaage say , “ DE KING OB DE JEW PEOPLE . ”
41015027	Dat same time , dey nail op two tief , each pon e own cross . Dey pit one cross pon Jedus right han side an de oda pon Jedus lef han side . [
41015028	So de ting wa dey done write een God Book come true , wa dey say , “ People tink say dat e mongst dem wickity man . ” ]
41015029	De people wa beena pass by shrow slam at Jedus . Dey shake dey head an tell um say , “ So dey ! Ya beena say ya gwine stroy God House an tek shree day fa build um back op !
41015030	Well den , sabe yasef now . Come down fom de cross ! ”
41015031	Same way so , de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Jew Law teacha dem beena hole Jedus cheap , shrow slam at um . Dey say ta one noda , “ E been sabe oda people , bot e ain able fa sabe esef !
41015032	Leh we see de Messiah , de king ob Israel , come down fom de cross now , so dat we kin bleebe een um ! ”
41015033	E been high noon an all dat lan git daak , daak . E been daak fa shree hour .
41015034	At shree o'clock Jedus holla loud , say , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? ” Dat mean , “ Me God , me God , hoccome ya da bandon me ? ”
41015035	Some ob de people wa beena stanop close by de cross , dey yeh wa Jedus say . Dey say , “ Listen , e da call Elijah fa come hep um ! ”
41015036	One ob dem ron go soak a sponge wid wine winega an tie de sponge pon de end ob a long stick . Den e hice de stick op ta Jedus lip , try fa git Jedus fa suck de sponge . E say , “ Hole on ! Leh we see ef Elijah gwine come fa tek um down fom de cross ! ”
41015037	Jedus holla loud an den e dead .
41015038	Jes den , de big tick curtain wa beena hang eenside God House split down de middle , fom de top down ta de bottom .
41015039	De sodja dem leada , wa beena stanop fo de cross see how Jedus done holla out ta God an dead . E say , “ Fa true , dis man yah God Son ! ”
41015040	Some ooman been stanop faaway , da look . Some ob dem been Mary Magdalene , an Mary wa been de modda ob de nyoung James an e broda Joseph , an Salome .
41015041	Wen Jedus been dey een Galilee , dem ooman beena trabel long wid um an hep um . An plenty oda ooman wa done come ta Jerusalem wid Jedus been stanop dey da look .
41015042	E been de Preparation Day . Dat de day wen de Jew people git ready fa dey Woshup Day . An e been jes a leetle bit fo de sun set .
41015043	Joseph wa come fom Arimathea town been dey . E been a big man een de Jew Council . Joseph beena look fa de time wen God gwine come fa rule dis wol , an e ain been scaid fa go ta Pilate an aks um fa Jedus body .
41015044	Pilate been stonish wen e yeh dat Jedus done dead . E sen call fa de sodja dem leada an aks um ef fa true Jedus done dead .
41015045	Wen de sodja dem leada tell Pilate dat Jedus done dead fa true , Pilate tell Joseph dat e kin go git Jedus body .
41015046	Joseph gone buy some fine linen closs . E tek Jedus body down fom de cross an wrop um op een de closs . Den Joseph pit um eenside a tomb wa done been dig outta de rock . An Joseph tek a big stone an roll um cross de tomb doormout fa kiba um op .
41015047	Mary Magdalene an Mary wa been de modda ob Joseph beena watch an dey see weh Joseph fom Arimathea pit Jedus body .
41016001	Wen de Jew Woshup Day done pass , Mary Magdalene an Mary wa been James modda , an Salome gone buy spice ointment wa hab fine smell fa go rub um pon Jedus body .
41016002	Aaly een de maanin de fus day ob de week , jes atta day clean broad , dey gone ta de tomb .
41016003	Wiles dey beena gwine , dey beena aks one noda say , “ Who dat gwine roll way de stone fa we , dat stone wa kiba de tomb doormout ? ”
41016004	Bot wen dey look op at de tomb , dey see dat de big stone wa beena kiba de doormout done been roll way . An dat been a big big stone .
41016005	Wen de ooman dem gone eenside de tomb , dey see one nyoung man dress op een a long white robe . E beena seddown pon de right han side . An dem ooman been stonish down .
41016006	De nyoung man tell um say , “ Oona mus dohn be stonish . A know dat oona da look fa Jedus fom Nazareth , wa done been nail pon de cross an dead . E ain yah . E done rise op fom mongst de dead people an e da lib gin ! Look , dis yah de place weh dey done lay um down .
41016007	Oona go tell Peter an e oda ciple dem say , ‘ E da gwine fo oona ta Galilee . Oona gwine meet um dey , same like e done tell oona . ’ ”
41016008	De ooman dem been all shake op an scaid . Dey come outta de tomb an ron way fom dey . Dey ain say nottin ta nobody cause dey been scaid down .
41016009	Now den , aaly een de maanin pon de fus day ob de week , Jedus done rise op fom mongst de dead people , da lib gin . E come fus ta Mary Magdalene . Mary been de ooman wa been hab seben ebil sperit eenside um wa Jedus done dribe outta um .
41016010	Atta Mary see Jedus , e gone ta dem people wa beena folla longside um . Dey still beena cry out an moan cause Jedus done dead . Mary tell um all wa done happen .
41016011	Stillyet wen dey yeh dat Jedus da lib gin an dat Mary esef done shim , dey ain bleebe wa e say .
41016012	Noda time atta dat , two man wa beena waak wid Jedus beena gwine ta one willage . Wiles dey da waak , Jedus come ta um , bot e look diffunt .
41016013	De two man gone back ta Jerusalem an tell de oda res wa done happen . Bot dey ain bleebe dem man needa .
41016014	Atta dat , Jedus come ta de leben ciple wen dey beena nyam . E buke um cause dey ain been bleebe dat e da lib , an cause dey been too haad head fa bleebe dem people wa done been shim atta e done git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin .
41016015	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus go all oba de wol an tell all de people de Good Nyews bout me .
41016016	De poson wa bleebe de Good Nyews an git bactize , God gwine sabe dat poson . Bot de one wa ain bleebe de Good Nyews , God gwine jedge um .
41016017	Dem people wa bleebe de Good Nyews , God gwine gim powa fa do dem miracle yah . Een me name dey gwine dribe ebil sperit outta people , dey gwine taak een nyew tongue .
41016018	Ef dey pick op snake or ef dey drink pison , nottin ain gwine hut um . Dey gwine pit dey han pon sick people an pray fa dem fa be well , an dem people gwine git well . ”
41016019	Wen de Lawd Jedus done taak ta e ciple dem , God tek Jedus op eenta heaben . Jedus gone seddown ta God right han fa rule wid um .
41016020	De ciple dem gone all oba , da tell people de Good Nyews . An de Lawd Jedus hep um , gim powa fa do miracle so dat de people know dat wa de ciple dem say , e true fa sho . ]
42001001	Deah Theophilus , plenty people beena try fa write down all de ting dem wa we bleebe fa true , wa done happen mongst we .
42001002	An all wa dey done write down , dis de same ting wa de people dem dat been wid Jedus wen e fus staat , dey done tell we . An dey beena preach God wod .
42001003	So , Honorable Theophilus , A figga since A done beena study bout dem ting good fashion fom de time dey fus staat , A oughta write um down fa ya step by step fom staat ta finish .
42001004	A da write fa mek ya know all de trute consaanin dem ting wa dey done laan ya , fa leh ya know dat all dis wa dey laan ya bout done happen fa true .
42001005	Same time wen Herod been king ob Judea , one Jew priest name Zechariah been dey . E been one ob de priest dem ob Abijah group . An e wife name been Lizzybet . Lizzybet blongst ta de fambly ob de head Priest Aaron too .
42001006	Zechariah an Lizzybet beena waak scraight wid God . Dey beena keep all de Law ob de Lawd an do ebryting e tell um fa do .
42001007	Bot dey ain hab no chullun cause Lizzybet ain been able . An now dey bof been ole .
42001008	One time wen Abijah group beena wok een God House , Zechariah beena do e wok dey , da cyaa out de priest judy .
42001009	Now den , wen de priest dem wahn fa pick one ob um fa go eenside God House fa bun incense , dey write all de priest dem name down , fole de paper an pick one . Dis time yah Zechariah name come out fa bun de incense . So e gone eenside de Lawd house fa do e wok .
42001010	Same time de incense beena bun eenside God House , de whole crowd wa been dey beena pray outside een de yaad .
42001011	Den een God House , Zechariah see a angel dat de Lawd sen . Dat angel stan fo um pon de right han side ob de alta , weh Zechariah da bun de incense .
42001012	Wen Zechariah see de angel , e been opsot . E mos scaid ta det .
42001013	De angel tell um say , “ Mus dohn feah , Zechariah ! De Lawd done yeh ya pray , an e ansa um . Ya wife Lizzybet gwine hab son . Mus name um John .
42001014	Ya gwine be glad fa true wen e bon , an a heapa oda people gwine be glad cause e bon !
42001015	Dat chile gwine be a great man een de Lawd eye . E mus dohn neba drink no wine or nottin wa mek a poson dronk . An e gwine be full op wid de Holy Sperit eben fo e bon .
42001016	E gwine mek a heapa Israel people come ta de Lawd dey God .
42001017	E gwine go head ob de Lawd an hab scrong sperit an powa , jes like de prophet Elijah , wa done tell God wod . E gwine mek de fada dem haat ton ta dey chullun . An e gwine mek de people dat ain do wa God wahn , memba God an ondastan wa right fa do . E gwine mek de Lawd people ready fa de time wen de Lawd gwine come . ”
42001018	Zechariah aks de angel say , “ How A spose fa know wa ya say gwine happen ? A done ole , an me wife , e ole too . ”
42001019	De angel ansa um , “ A Gabriel . A da stanop fo God , da saab um . E sen me fa come tell ya dis good nyews .
42001020	Bot listen yah ! Dis ting wa A done tell ya , dat how e gwine be wen de right time come . Bot cause ya ain bleebe me , ya ain gwine be able fa taak . Ya ain gwine crack ya teet til all wa A tell ya done happen . ”
42001021	All dat time dey , de people outside beena wait fa Zechariah . Dey wonda hoccome e stay so long eenside God House .
42001022	Wen e come out , e ain been able fa taak ta de people , so dey figga fa true e been hab wision eenside God House . E jes beena mek sign wid e han , an e ain able fa say nottin .
42001023	Wen e time been op fa wok een God House , Zechariah gone home .
42001024	Atta wile , e wife Lizzybet been speckin . An Lizzybet hide eenside e house fibe mont .
42001025	E say , “ De Lawd been good ta me fa true an bless me fa be wid chile . Now e done tek way me shame so dat people ain gwine look down pon me no mo ! ”
42001026	Wen Lizzybet been speckin , een e six mont God sen e angel Gabriel ta Nazareth , a town een Galilee .
42001027	God sen um ta one nyoung ooman name Mary . E ain know nottin bout no man yet , bot e been gage fa marry a man name Joseph , wa been one ob King David kin people .
42001028	Dat angel come ta Mary say , “ How ya da do , Mary . De Lawd done bless ya fa true ! E da trabel longside ya ! ”
42001029	Wen Mary yeh wa de angel say , e beena trouble tommuch , an e study e head fa try fa figga wa dat mean .
42001030	De angel tell um say , “ Mus dohn be scaid , Mary , cause God heppy wid ya .
42001031	Ya gwine be wid chile . Ya gwine hab son . Mus gim name Jedus .
42001032	E gwine be great . Dey gwine call um de Son ob de Mos High God . An de Lawd God gwine mek um king fa rule jes like e ole people leada King David .
42001033	Jedus gwine hab tority faeba oba de fambly ob Jacob . E gwine rule oba um faeba an eba ! ”
42001034	Mary aks de angel say , “ A ain neba been wid no man . So hoccome a gwine hab chile ? ”
42001035	De angel ansa um , “ De Holy Sperit gwine come ta ya . De High God dat great mo den all , e gwine sen e powa pon ya fa do dis . Cause ob dat , people gwine call dis chile fom God wa ya gwine hab , de God Chile , God own Son .
42001036	Fodamo , Lizzybet , wa kin ta ya , e wid chile . Eben dough e way too ole fa hab chullun , e een e six mont . Now ebrybody tink say , Lizzybet ain able fa hab chile . Stillyet , e gwine hab son .
42001037	Cause dey ain nottin dat God ain able fa do . ”
42001038	Mary tell um say , “ A ready fa saab de Lawd . A ready fa saab um jes like ya done say . ” Den de angel gone lef um .
42001039	Soon atta dat , Mary git ready . E mek hace an gone ta a town een Judea een de hill country .
42001040	E gone ta Zechariah house , an e hail Lizzybet .
42001041	Wen Lizzybet yeh Mary boice , e baby eenside um jomp roun . An Lizzybet been full op wid de Holy Sperit .
42001042	E raise e boice loud , tell Mary say , “ God da bless ya mo den all oda ooman , an same time e bless de chile wa ya da cyaa !
42001043	A ain feel wody fa hab dis great ting happen ta me , dat de modda ob me Lawd come wisit me .
42001044	Cause same time A yeh ya boice , dis chile wa A da cyaa , e jomp roun fa joy .
42001045	Ya bless fa true , Mary , cause ya bleebe de Lawd gwine do all dat e done tell ya ! ”
42001046	Mary say ,
42001047	God wa sabe me done mek me haat glad fa true .
42001048	E done memba me , e humble saabant !
42001049	Cause God wa got powa oba all ting , e done do great ting fa me .
42001050	E da show mussy ta all dem wa feah um ,
42001051	E done show de great scrent een e aam .
42001052	E done pull down de mighty king dem fom off dey shrone ,
42001053	E done gii plenty good ting ta dem wa hongry .
42001054	E done hep de Israel people , wa da saab um .
42001055	E keep e wod wa e gii ta we ole people . E show mussy ta Abraham
42001056	Mary stay dey wid Lizzybet bout shree mont . Den e gone home .
42001057	De time come fa Lizzybet fa go een , an e hab son .
42001058	E neighba dem an e kin yeh say de Lawd done hab mussy pon Lizzybet . E gim chile . An all dem rejaice wid um .
42001059	Eight day atta de chile been bon , dey come togeda fa circumcise de chile . Dey been gwine gim name Zechariah , like e fada .
42001060	Cep e modda Lizzybet tell um say , “ No ! E name spose fa be John . ”
42001061	Wen Lizzybet say dat , de people tell um say , “ Bot ya ain got no kin people name John ! ”
42001062	So dey mek sign ta e fada Zechariah fa aks um wa e wahn de chile name fa be .
42001063	Zechariah mek sign ta dem , aks fa sompin fa write pon . Den e write down say , “ E name John . ” All de people been stonish .
42001064	Same time Zechariah boice come back , an e staat fa taak . E da praise God .
42001065	All de neighba wa yeh Zechariah been scruck . Dey taak bout dis ting , an de nyews git roun all oba Judea een de hill country .
42001066	An all dem wa yeh dis ting , study bout um say , “ Wa dis chile yah gwine be ? ” Cause fa true de Lawd powa been dey pon um .
42001067	Zechariah , John fada , been full op wid de Holy Sperit , an e tell God wod . E say ,
42001068	“ Leh we praise de Lawd , de God ob de Israel people !
42001069	E done sen we scrong poson wa gwine sabe we .
42001070	God own prophet dem , dey promise fom way back .
42001071	Dey say , ‘ Dis poson gwine sabe we fom we enemy .
42001072	God hab mussy pon we , jes like e been tell we ole people .
42001073	E promise we ole people leada Abraham an mek a wow .
42001074	E say e gwine sabe we fom we enemy dem
42001075	We gwine be God own people , da waak scraight fo um
42001076	Me chile , dey gwine call ya de prophet wa taak fa de Mos High God .
42001077	Ya gwine tell e people say God gwine paadon dey sin ,
42001078	Cause we God feel wa we feel ,
42001079	Dat light gwine shine pon all de people wa lib een de daak shada ob det .
42001080	An wiles de chile John da grow big , e da come close ta God mo an mo . E beena lib een de wildaness til de time come fa wok mongst de Israel people .
42002001	Een dat time , Caesar Augustus been de rula ob de Roman people . E mek a law een all de town een de wol weh e hab tority , say , “ Ebrybody haffa go ta town fa count by de head an write down e name . ”
42002002	Dis been de fus time dey count by de head , jurin de time Quirinius de gobna ob Syria country .
42002003	So den , ebrybody gone fa count by de head , ta e own town weh e ole people been bon .
42002004	Now Joseph same fashion gone fom Nazareth town een Galilee . E trabel ta de town name Betlem een Judea , weh de ole people leada , King David , been bon . Joseph gone dey cause e blongst ta David fambly .
42002005	E gone fa count by de head , an Mary gone long wid um . E gage fa marry um . An Mary been speckin .
42002006	Same time wen dey been dey , time come fa Mary gone een .
42002007	E hab boy chile , e fusbon . E wrop um op een closs wa been teah eenta scrip an lay um een a trough weh dey feed de cow an oda animal dem . Cause Mary an Joseph beena stay weh de animal sleep . Dey ain been no room fa dem eenside de bodin house .
42002008	Now some shephud been dey een de fiel dat night . Dey beena stay dey , da mind dey sheep .
42002009	Den one angel ob de Lawd appeah ta um . De night time done lightnin op jes like day clean broad . Cause ob dat , de shephud mos scaid ta det .
42002010	Bot de angel tell um say , “ Mus dohn feah ! A hab good nyews wa gwine mek ebrybody rejaice .
42002011	Cause A come fa tell oona , ‘ Right now , dis day , a Sabior done bon fa oona . E Christ de Lawd . An e bon een David town ! ’
42002012	A gwine tell oona wa oona gwine see dey . Cause ob dat , oona gwine know A done tell oona de trute . Oona gwine find de chile wrop op een closs wa been teah eenta scrip , an e been leddown een a trough . ”
42002013	All ob a sudden , a heapa oda angel fom heaben been longside dat angel . Dey all da praise God , say ,
42002014	“ Leh we gii glory ta God een de mos high heaben .
42002015	Den de angel lef um an gone back ta heaben . An de shephud dem say ta one noda , “ Leh we go ta Betlem fa see dis ting wa happen oba dey . De Lawd esef done sen e angel fa tell we . ”
42002016	So de shephud dem mek hace an gone ta Betlem fa look . Wen dey git dey , dey find Mary an Joseph an de chile . An dat chile been leddown een a trough .
42002017	Atta de shephud shim , dey done tell ebrybody bout de chile . Dey tell um all wa de angel done say consaanin um .
42002018	An all de people wa de shephud dem tell been stonish .
42002019	Mary memba all dis ting an study bout um .
42002020	De shephud dem gone back ta dey fiel . Dey da praise God . Dey da rejaice tommuch fa all dey done see an yeh . All wa de angel done tell um , e stan jes like e say .
42002021	Eight day atta de chile bon , e been time fa circumcise um . Dey name um Jedus , jes like de angel done been gim fo e modda Mary been speckin .
42002022	De time come fa Joseph an Mary fa go ta God House fa do dem ting wa gwine mek um clean een God eye , like de Law wa God gii Moses say dey mus do . Den dey cyaa de chile ta Jerusalem ta God House fa offa um ta de Lawd .
42002023	Cause de Law ob de Lawd say , “ Ebry fusbon son gwine blongst ta de Lawd fa do God wok . ”
42002024	An Joseph an Mary gone too fa gii God two tottledob or two nyoung pigeon . Dey gim ta de Jew priest fa mek sacrifice ta God cause de Law ob de Lawd say fa do dat .
42002025	Dat time dey , one man name Simeon lib een Jerusalem . Dis man beena waak scraight fa do all wa God wahn , an e lob God . E beena wait fa de time wen God gwine sabe de Israel people . An de Holy Sperit beena lib een um .
42002026	Dat Holy Sperit done tell um say , “ Fa sho , ya gwine see de Messiah . God gwine sen um fo ya pass oba . ”
42002027	An God Sperit tell Simeon fa go eenta God House . Wiles e been dey , Joseph an Mary cyaa een de chile Jedus fa offa um op ta de Lawd an do dem ting wa God Law say .
42002028	Simeon tek de chile een e aam , an e praise God say ,
42002029	“ Lawd , A ya saabant . Ya done do wa ya promise me .
42002030	Cause wid me own eye A done see de one wa gwine sabe all people een de wol .
42002031	Ya done mek um ready een de open weh all people kin shim .
42002032	E de light wa gwine mek dem dat ain Jew know ya trute ,
42002033	Ebryting dat Simeon say bout de chile Jedus stonish e fada an modda .
42002034	Simeon aks God fa bless um , an e tell Mary , e modda , say , “ Fa true , God done pick dis chile fa come . Wen dey shim , plenty Israel people gwine be stroy cause dey ain bleebe um . An plenty oda Israel people gwine bleebe um , an God gwine sabe dem . God sen Jedus fa sho we wa God wahn we fa do . Bot a heapa people gwine taak ginst um .
42002035	Dat how dey gwine show ebrybody wa dey beena tink , wa nobody ain been know . An wen all dis happen , Mary , ya own haat gwine hut tommuch , gwine hut like a sode been jook een um . ”
42002036	One prophet ooman been dey . E name Anna , an e fada been Phanuel wa blongst ta Asher kin people . Now Anna been a ole ooman . E husban done been dead long time . Fom de time wen Anna marry , e been jes seben yeah fo e husban pass oba .
42002037	An now Anna been a wida ooman eighty-fo yeah ole . All de time e beena come ta God House . Day an night e been dey dey , da woshup God an fast an pray .
42002038	Now den , Anna come ta God House de same time Joseph an Mary come da bring Jedus een dey . An Anna tank God fa de chile Jedus . E taak bout um ta all dem wa beena wait fa see God set de people een Jerusalem free .
42002039	Wen Joseph an Mary done do all de ting wa de Law ob de Lawd say , dey gone back ta dey own town , Nazareth , een Galilee .
42002040	An de chile Jedus da grow big an scrong . An e been git plenty sense . An God been heppy wid um .
42002041	Ebry yeah Joseph an Mary , Jedus fada an modda , gone ta Jerusalem fa de Jew holiday feas dey call de Passoba .
42002042	Wen Jedus been een e tweb yeah , e gone long wid um ta de Passoba feas , like all de Israel people beena do .
42002043	Atta de feas done oba , dey staat fa home , cep de boy Jedus ain gone long wid um . E stay dey een Jerusalem . An Mary an Joseph ain know .
42002044	Dey beena tink Jedus gone long een de crowd . Dey done trabel all day , an den dey find out dat e ain been dey . Dey saach fa um mongst dey fambly an dey fren .
42002045	Bot dey ain find um . So dey gone back ta Jerusalem fa saach fa um .
42002046	Atta shree day done gone , dey find Jedus een God House , da seddown mongst de Jew teacha dem . An e beena listen ta wa dem teacha say , an e beena aks um plenty ting too .
42002047	All de people wa yeh Jedus been stonish cause de chile hab sommuch sense an mek ansa ta de queshon .
42002048	Wen e modda an e fada shim , dey been stonish down . An e modda aks um say , “ Me son , wa mek ya do we like dis ? Ya fada an me beena saach ebryweh fa ya . An wen we ain see ya , we beena fret tommuch . ”
42002049	Jedus ansa um say , “ Hoccome oona beena saach fa me ? Ain oona know dat A been spose fa be yah een me Fada house fa tek cyah ob e bidness ? ”
42002050	Bot dey ain hab de ondastandin fa know wa e da taak bout .
42002051	Den Jedus gone back wid um ta Nazareth , an e pay um mind . E modda memba all dem ting een e haat , an e study bout um .
42002052	Jedus beena grow een e mind an een e body . An God an de people been heppy wid um .
42003001	Now den , Caesar Tiberius been de rula ob de Roman people . Wen e been rule fifteen yeah , Pontius Pilate been gobna ob Judea . Herod beena rule een Galilee , an e broda , Philip , beena rule een Iturea an Trachonitis . An Lysanias beena rule een Abilene .
42003002	Annas an Caiaphas been head ob de Jew priest dem . Same time , God gii John , Zechariah son , e wod fa tell people . An John been dey een de wildaness .
42003003	So John gone waak bout all de arie close ta de Jerden Riba . E beena preach say , “ Ef oona change oona sinful way an dohn do um no mo , A gwine bactize oona an God gwine paadon oona fa de ebil oona done . ”
42003004	John beena do jes like de prophet Isaiah done write down een e book say ,
42003005	All de walley mus be full op ,
42003006	An ebrybody een de wol gwine see how God da sabe e people ! ’ ”
42003007	A whole heapa people come fa hab John bactize um . John tell um say , “ Oona wickity , jes like snake ! Who tell oona dat ef oona git bactize , oona kin git way fom de jedgiment wa God gwine sen fa punish oona ?
42003008	Oona mus do dem ting wa show oona done change oona way . Mus dohn tink say , ‘ We de chullun ob Abraham . ’ Dat ain gwine sabe oona . A da tell oona , God able fa tek dem stone yah an ton um eenta Abraham chullun !
42003009	Now de ax ta de foot ob de tree . Ebry tree wa ain beah good fruit , God gwine cut um down an chunk um een de fire . ”
42003010	De crowd aks John say , “ Wa we haffa do now fa git way fom God jedgiment ? ”
42003011	E ansa um say , “ Anybody wa got two coat mus gii one ta de poson wa ain got none . Same fashion , ebrybody mus share wa e got fa nyam . ”
42003012	Some tax man too come fa hab John bactize um . An dey aks um say , “ Teacha , wa we mus do fa sho we done change we way ? ”
42003013	John ansa um say , “ Mus dohn tek no mo money fom de people den de Roman gobment tell oona fa tek . ”
42003014	Some sodja dem aks um too , say , “ An we , wa we haffa do ? ”
42003015	All de people beena hab high hope , da look fa sompin fa happen . An dey beena study dey head , da wonda ef John been de Messiah .
42003016	John ansa um all say , “ A da bactize oona wid wata . Bot de one wa hab heap mo tority den me gwine come . A ain fit eben fa loose e shoe . E gwine bactize oona wid de Holy Sperit an wid fire .
42003017	E gwine jedge all de people an separate um op like a faama wa hab e pitfork een e han fa separate out de chaff fom de wheat . E gwine geda de good wheat an pit um een e baan . Bot de chaff , e gwine bun um een de ebalastin fire . ”
42003018	John preach ta de people , laan um plenty ting bout de Good Nyews an coax um fa change dey way .
42003019	Bot John beena buke Gobna Herod cause e done marry Herodias , e broda wife , an cause Herod done plenty oda ebil ting .
42003020	Den pontop ob all dem oda ebil ting Herod beena do , e sen e man dem fa git John , lock um op een de jailhouse .
42003021	Wen John beena bactize all de people , dat same time e bactize Jedus . An wiles Jedus da pray dey , de sky open op .
42003022	An de Holy Sperit tek shape like a dob an come light pon Jedus . Den a boice fom heaben say , “ Ya me Son wa A lob . A sho please wid ya . ”
42003023	Jedus been bout tirty yeah ole wen e staat fa do e wok wa God sen um fa do mongst de people . An de people beena tink say , Joseph been Jedus fada . Joseph fada been name Heli .
42003024	Heli fada been name Matthat . Matthat fada been name Levi . Levi fada been name Melchi . Melchi fada been name Jannai . Jannai fada been name Joseph .
42003025	Joseph fada been name Mattathias . Mattathias fada been name Amos . Amos fada been name Nahum . Nahum fada been name Esli . Esli fada been name Naggai .
42003026	Naggai fada been name Maath . Maath fada been name Mattathias . Mattathias fada been name Semein . Semein fada been name Josech . Josech fada been name Joda .
42003027	Joda fada been name Joanan . Joanan fada been name Rhesa . Rhesa fada been name Zerubbabel . Zerubbabel fada been name Shealtiel . Shealtiel fada been name Neri .
42003028	Neri fada been name Melchi . Melchi fada been name Addi . Addi fada been name Cosam . Cosam fada been name Elmadam . Elmadam fada been name Er .
42003029	Er fada been name Joshua . Joshua fada been name Eliezer . Eliezer fada been name Jorim . Jorim fada been name Matthat . Matthat fada been name Levi .
42003030	Levi fada been name Simeon . Simeon fada been name Judah . Judah fada been name Joseph . Joseph fada been name Jonam . Jonam fada been name Eliakim .
42003031	Eliakim fada been name Melea . Melea fada been name Menna . Menna fada been name Mattatha . Mattatha fada been name Nathan . Nathan fada been name David .
42003032	David fada been name Jesse . Jesse fada been name Obed . Obed fada been name Boaz . Boaz fada been name Salmon . Salmon fada been name Nahshon .
42003033	Naasson fada been name Amminadab . Amminadab fada been name Aram . Aram fada been name Hezron . Hezron fada been name Perez . Perez fada been name Judah .
42003034	Judah fada been name Jacob . Jacob fada been name Isaac . Isaac fada been name Abraham . Abraham fada been name Terah . Terah fada been name Nahor .
42003035	Nahor fada been name Serug . Serug fada been name Reu . Reu fada been name Peleg . Peleg fada been name Eber . Eber fada been name Shelah .
42003036	Shelah fada been name Cainan . Cainan fada been name Arphaxad . Arphaxad fada been name Shem . Shem fada been name Noah . Noah fada been name Lamech .
42003037	Lamech fada been name Methuselah . Methuselah fada been name Enoch . Enoch fada been name Jared . Jared fada been name Mahalaleel . Mahalaleel fada been name Cainan .
42003038	Cainan fada been name Enos . Enos fada been name Seth . Seth fada been name Adam . Adam fada been God .
42004001	Jedus come back fom de Jerden Riba , an e been full op wid de Holy Sperit . De Sperit lead um eenta de wildaness .
42004002	Jedus been dey foty day . An all dat time de Debil beena try fa mek um do some ebil ting . Jedus ain nyam nottin jurin dat time . So wen dem foty day done pass , e been hongry down .
42004003	De Debil tell um say , “ Since ya God Son , mek dis rock yah ton ta bread . ”
42004004	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dey write down een God Book say , ‘ People ain able fa lib fa true lessin dey got mo den sompin fa nyam . Dey lib by ebry wod wa God gim . ’ ”
42004005	De Debil tek Jedus op a high place an show um all de country een de wol at one time .
42004006	E tell Jedus say , “ A gwine gii ya powa fa rule oba all dem country yah an all de good ting dem dey , wa mek people too heppy . Cause all dem ting yah blongst ta me now , an A able fa gim ta anybody A wahn .
42004007	A gwine gii ya all dem ting ef ya bow down an woshup me op . ”
42004008	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dey write down een God Book , say , ‘ Mus woshup de Lawd ya God an mus dohn saab nobody cep um . ’ ”
42004009	De Debil tek Jedus ta Jerusalem an set um op pon de mos high paat ob God House . E tell Jedus say , “ Since ya God Son , shrow yasef down fom yah .
42004010	Cause dey write down een God Book say ,
42004011	An e say too , ‘ De angel dem gwine tote ya een dey han ,
42004012	Jedus ansa um , “ Dey write down een God Book , say , ‘ Mus dohn tempt de Lawd ya God fa jes do wa ya wahn . ’ ”
42004013	Wen de Debil done try fa mek Jedus do ebil een all kind ob way an e ain able fa tempt um , e gone an lef Jedus fa leetle wile .
42004014	Jedus gone back ta Galilee wid de powa ob God Sperit , an de nyews bout Jedus git roun ebryweh een de whole arie .
42004015	Jedus beena laan de people een all dey meetin house , an ebrybody praise um .
42004016	Jedus gone ta Nazareth , weh e lib fom de time e been a leetle chile til e git big . Wen de Jew Woshup Day come , e gone ta de meetin house like done all de time , an e stanop fa read God Book ta de people .
42004017	Dey gim de book wa de prophet Isaiah been write . So den , Jedus open de book ta de place weh Isaiah write , say ,
42004018	“ De Sperit ob de Lawd pon me .
42004019	An e sen me fa tell de people say ,
42004020	Den Jedus shet de book an gim ta de man wa tek cyah ob de book an e seddown . Ebrybody een de meetin house fasten e eye pon um .
42004021	An Jedus tell um say , “ Taday dis paat ob God Book done come true , same time oona yeh um . ”
42004022	De people dem all taak good bout Jedus . Dey stonish cause e know how fa pit e wod jes so . An dey say , “ Ain dis Joseph boy ? ”
42004023	An Jedus tell um say , “ Fa sho , oona gwine tell me dat ole wise wod , say , ‘ Docta , mek yasef well ! ’ Oona gwine say , ‘ All dem miracle wa we yeh say ya done een Capernaum , ya mus do de same ting yah weh ya raise op . ’ ”
42004024	An Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , ain no prophet wa eba git hona weh e raise op .
42004025	Fa true , de time wen Elijah been een Israel , e ain rain fa shree yeah an six mont . Dey been a dry drought , an de people beena staab een de whole country . An fa sho , plenty wida ooman been dey een Israel .
42004026	Stillyet , God ain sen Elijah ta none dem wida ooman een Israel . Steada dat , e jes sen um ta one wida wa lib een Zarephath town een de arie call Sidon .
42004027	An de time wen Elisha de prophet beena tell God wod een Israel , plenty people wid leposy been dey , bot Elisha ain mek none dem clean cep fa Naaman , wa come fom Syria . ”
42004028	Wen de people een de meetin house yeh dat , dey all been mad down .
42004029	Dey jomp op an chunk Jedus outta de town . Dey tek um ta de top ob de hill weh dey town been build , fa shrow um oba de edge ob de hill .
42004030	Bot Jedus waak shru de middle ob de people an gone pon e way .
42004031	Jedus gone down ta Capernaum , a town een Galilee . E beena laan de people dey ebry Jew Woshup Day .
42004032	An dey been stonish wen dey yeh um , cause e laan um wid tority fa true .
42004033	One ebil sperit been een a man dey een de Jew meetin house , an e holla loud say ,
42004034	“ Leh we be ! Jedus fom Nazareth , wa bidness ya got wid we ? Ya come fa stroy we ? A know who ya da . Ya blongst ta God fa true ! ”
42004035	Jedus chaage dat ebil sperit say , “ Dohn crack ya teet ! Come out fom eenside dis man ! ” De ebil sperit shrow de man ta de groun fo all de people , an e lef um . An e ain done de man no haam .
42004036	All de people been stonish , an dey tell one noda say , “ Wa kind ob wod dis man nyuse ? E da taak scrong , wid tority , an e da gii orda ta de ebil sperit an dey come out ! ”
42004037	An de nyews git roun all de town an settlement close by bout wa Jedus da do .
42004038	Jedus git op an lef de meetin house an gone ta Simon house . Simon wife modda been bad off sick wid a high feba , so dey aks Jedus fa hep de sick ooman .
42004039	Jedus gone stanop close ta e bed , an e buke de feba , an de feba lef um . Same time de ooman git op an staat fa fix sompin fa dem fa nyam .
42004040	Bout fus daak , all de people bring all kind ob sick people ta Jedus . E pit e two han pon um , an all dem been heal .
42004041	Fodamo , ebil sperit dem come outta a heapa people . Dem sperit holla say , “ Ya God Son ! ”
42004042	Wen day clean , Jedus lef de town an gone ta a place weh dey ain been no people , an de crowd saach fa um . Wen dey find um , dey try fa keep um dey wid um .
42004043	Bot Jedus tell um say , “ A haffa go ta all de oda town dem too , fa tell de people de Good Nyews bout how God da rule , cause dat wa God sen me fa do . ”
42004044	An Jedus gone an preach een de Jew meetin house dem een Judea .
42005001	One day , Jedus beena stanop pon de sho ta Lake Gennesaret . All de people crowd bout um fa yeh God wod .
42005002	E see two boat dey , pull op pon de sho . De fishaman dem done lef um an beena wash dey net .
42005003	Jedus git een a boat wa blongst ta Simon an e tell um say , “ Shob off a leetle piece fom de sho . ” Den Jedus seddown een de boat an e laan de people wa beena stanop pon de sho .
42005004	Wen e git shru de taak , e tell Simon say , “ Mus go out ta de deep wata . Ya an ya paatna dem mus cyas oona net fa ketch fish . ”
42005005	Simon ansa um say , “ Massa , we done try all night an we ain ketch nottin . Bot cause ya say fa do um , A gwine cyas de net gin . ”
42005006	Wen Simon dem been shru cyas dey net , dey ketch sommuch fish til dey net staat fa teah .
42005007	Dey mek sign ta dey paatna dem een de oda boat fa come an hep um . Dey come an full op all two de boat dem til dey boat staat fa sink .
42005008	Wen Simon Peter see dat , e git down pon e knee fo Jedus , tell um say , “ Lawd , mus go way fom me , cause A a sinna man ! ”
42005009	cause Simon dem been stonish wen dey ketch sommuch fish .
42005010	Same fashion , e paatna dem , James an John , Zebedee son , dey been stonish . Jedus tell Simon say , “ Mus dohn feah . Ya beena ketch fish , bot tareckly , A gwine laan ya fa ketch people fa me . ”
42005011	Den dey lan dey boat . Dey lef ebryting an gone long wid Jedus fa folla um , fa be e ciple .
42005012	One time wen Jedus been ta one town , a man been dey wa been kiba wid leposy . Wen e see Jedus , e git down pon de groun fo um . E beg um say , “ Sah , ef ya gree fa do um , ya able fa heal me ! ”
42005013	Jedus scretch out e han an tetch um say , “ A wahn fa do um . A mek ya well an clean ! ” Same time de leposy lef , an de man been well .
42005014	Jedus chaage um say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody bout dis . Mus go sho yasef ta de Jew priest an offa de sacrifice wa Moses done chaage de people fa mek . Dat gwine mek ebrybody know ya all well now fa sho . ”
42005015	Bot mo an mo , de people cyaa de nyews roun consaanin Jedus . An plenty crowd come geda roun fa yeh um , an fa hab um heal um .
42005016	Bot Jedus lef um an gone off by esef weh dey ain no people , fa pray ta God .
42005017	One day wen Jedus beena laan de people , some Pharisee an Jew Law teacha dem beena seddown dey . Dey been come fom ebry town een Galilee an Judea an fom Jerusalem . An de powa ob de Lawd God been wid Jedus fa heal de sick .
42005018	Some man dem come long da tote one man wa cripple op an ain able fa moob . Dey beena tote um pon a sleep mat , an dey done try fa gone een de house fa lay de man pon de flo fo Jedus .
42005019	Bot sommuch people been dey , de man dem ain able fa git shru de crowd . Dey climb pontop de house wid de sick man , pull off some de roof tile an open op a hole een de house top . Den dey leddown dat sick man pon e sleep mat eenta de middle ob de people dey fo Jedus .
42005020	Wen Jedus see dat dey bleebe fa true dat e gwine heal de man , e tell de sick man say , “ Me fren , ya sin done been paadon . ”
42005021	De Law teacha an de Pharisee dem staat fa study bout dat , tink say , “ Who dis yah , wa da hole God cheap ? Ain nobody able fa paadon sin . Jes God kin do dat ! ”
42005022	Jedus know wa dey beena tink , so e say , “ Wa mek oona da tink dat wa A do ain right ?
42005023	Fa sho , e mo easy fa tell dis cripple op man say , ‘ Ya sin done been paadon , ’ den fa chaage um say , ‘ Git op an waak , ’ ainty dough ?
42005024	A gwine show oona dat de Man wa Come fom God hab tority een dis wol fa paadon people sin . ” So Jedus tell de man wa cripple op say , “ Git op , tek ya sleep mat an go on home ! ”
42005025	All ob a sudden de man git op right een front ob ebrybody . E tek e mat wa e beena leddown pon an e gone home . E beena praise God cause e done been heal .
42005026	All de people been stonish , an dey praise God . Dey been cyaa way , an dey say , “ We done see sompin yah taday dat we ain neba been see ! ”
42005027	Atta Jedus done heal de man , e gone outta dey . An e see one man name Levi , wa da geda tax , seddown een e office . Jedus tell um say , “ Come folla me fa be me ciple . ”
42005028	Levi git op . E lef ebryting dey , an e gone folla Jedus .
42005029	Levi mek a big feas een e house fa Jedus . Plenty people wa da geda tax been dey an some oda people been dey een de house too , an all dem beena seddown da nyam .
42005030	Some Pharisee , long wid some dem own Law teacha , been dey , an dey beena grumble ta Jedus ciple dem say , “ Wa mek oona nyam an drink longside dem people wa da geda tax , an dem oda people wa ain fit fa mix wid Jew people ? ”
42005031	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dem wa well ain need no docta . Dem wa sick need um .
42005032	A ain come fa call dem wa tink dey da waak scraight wid God . A come fa call de sinna dem . ”
42005033	Some people come ta Jedus say , “ John ciple dem da fast plenty time , fa woshup God an pray . De Pharisee ciple dem do dat too . Bot ya own ciple dem jes da nyam an drink an ain fast . ”
42005034	Jedus ansa um say , “ Wen oona call people fa come ta marry feas , oona cyahn keep um fom nyam , ainty ?
42005035	Bot de time gwine come wen de groom gwine be tek way fom mongst um . Dat de time wen dey gwine fast . ”
42005036	Jedus tell um a paable , e say , “ Nobody gwine teah piece fom nyew cloes fa patch e ole cloes . Ef e do dat , e gwine mek e nyew cloes look bad cause ob de teah . Pontop ob dat , e ole cloes gwine look bad cause de piece wa e teah fom de nyew cloes ain gwine match de ole cloes .
42005037	An nobody gwine tek ole bottle an pit een nyew wine wa still da wok . Cause ef e do dat wiles de nyew wine da wok , dat wine gwine buss open de ole bottle . De wine gwine waste an de bottle gwine ruint too .
42005038	Steada dat , dey mus pit nyew wine een nyew bottle wa ain gwine broke op .
42005039	An wen people done drink ole wine , dey ain gwine wahn fa drink nyew wine , cause dey gwine say , ‘ De ole wine a heap mo betta ! ’ ”
42006001	One Jew Woshup Day , Jedus dem beena waak shru de wheat fiel , an e ciple dem pick some de yea ob de wheat . Dey shook um een dey han an nyam um .
42006002	Some Pharisee dem aks um say , “ Hoccome oona da do dat ? Fa sho , dat ginst wa we Jew Law say fa do pon de Woshup Day , ainty ? ”
42006003	Jedus ansa um say , “ A mos sho oona done read wa King David done wen e an e man dem been hongry , ainty ?
42006004	David gone eenside God House , an e tek de bread dat de Jew priest dem done gii ta God . David nyam some ob dat bread an gim ta dem wa been wid um fa nyam . Stillyet , we Law say nobody mus nyam dat bread cep de priest dem . ”
42006005	Jedus tell um say , “ De Man wa Come fom God hab chaage oba de Woshup Day . ”
42006006	Noda Jew Woshup Day , Jedus gone eenside de Jew meetin house an laan de people . One man been dey wa hab right han dat been flicted .
42006007	Some Jew Law teacha an Pharisee dem been wahn fa cuse Jedus , say e da do wrong . So dey fasten dey eye pon um fa see ef e gwine heal de man han pon de Woshup Day .
42006008	Bot Jedus know wa dey beena tink , so e tell de man wa han been flicted say , “ Git op an come stan yah fo all de people . ” De man git op an gone stan dey .
42006009	Jedus say ta dem wa watch um , “ Leh me aks oona sompin . Wa we Law leh we do pon we Woshup Day ? We spose fa do good , or we spose fa do ebil ? We spose fa sabe life or we spose fa stroy um ? ”
42006010	Jedus look roun pon all dem . E tell de man wa han been flicted say , “ Scretch out ya han ! ” De man do wa Jedus tell um , an e han git well gin .
42006011	De Law teacha an de Pharisee dem been mad down . Dey aks one noda say , “ Wa we kin do ta Jedus ? ”
42006012	Jurin dat time Jedus gone op a hill fa pray . E beena pray ta God all shru de night .
42006013	Wen day clean , e call e ciple dem fa come ta um , an e pick tweb dem . E gim name postle , dat mean e gwine sen um out fa do e wok .
42006014	E pick Simon , wa e gii name Peter , an e broda Andrew , James an John , Philip an Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew an Thomas , James wa been Alphaeus boy , an Simon wa been call de Patrot ,
42006016	an Judas wa been James boy , an Judas Iscariot , wa ton Jedus een fa money .
42006017	An Jedus come down de hill wid e postle dem . E gone an stan weh de groun been lebel , an plenty oda e ciple dem been wid um . An a whole heapa people geda dey . Dey come fom all oba Judea an fom Jerusalem , an some come fom dem town close ta de sho een Tyre an Sidon . Dey come fa yeh Jedus an fa hab um heal um .
42006018	Fodamo , dem wa hab ebil sperit come an git heal .
42006019	Ebrybody beena try fa tetch Jedus , cause powa beena come out fom um . An dat powa heal all ob um .
42006020	Jedus look at e ciple dem an tell um say ,
42006021	Oona bless fa true , oona wa hongry now ,
42006022	Oona bless fa true , wen people hate oona ,
42006023	“ Mus be heppy wen de time come wen de people do oona dat way . Jomp op wid joy den , cause oona gwine git a whole heapa good ting dat God da keep fa oona een heaben . Mus memba dat de people wa gwine mek oona suffa dem ting yah , dey ole people done done de same ting ta dem wa God been sen fa gii e wod .
42006024	“ Bot e gwine be a haad time fa oona wa got plenty now ,
42006025	E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa da nyam all wa oona wahn now ,
42006026	E gwine be a haad time fa oona wen ebrybody da praise oona .
42006027	“ Bot A da tell oona wa yeh wa A say , mus lob ya enemy dem . Mus do good ta dem wa hate ya .
42006028	Mus aks God fa bless dem wa cuss ya , an mus pray fa dem wa do ya bad .
42006029	Ef anybody knock one side ob ya face , mus ton de oda side an leh um knock dat side too . Ef somebody tek ya coat , mus gim ya shat too .
42006030	Ef somebody aks ya fa sompin , mus gim . An ef somebody tief sompin wa blongst ta ya , mus dohn aks um fa gim back .
42006031	Oona mus do ta ebrybody jes like oona wahn dem fa do ta oona .
42006032	“ Ef ya jes lob dem wa lob ya , ya ain done nottin fa git praise fa , ainty ? Cause eben dem people wa ain try fa do wa God say , dey lob people wa lob dem !
42006033	An ef ya do good jes ta dem wa do good ta ya , ya ain done nottin fa git praise fa , ainty ? Cause same fashion , eben dem wa ain try fa do wa God say , dey da do dat too !
42006034	Ef ya lend ting jes ta dem wa ya spect gwine pay ya back , ya ain done nottin fa git praise fa , ainty ? Cause same fashion , eben dem wa ain try fa do wa God say , dey lend ting an spect fa git um back !
42006035	Bot ya mus lob ya enemy dem . Mus do um good . Wen ya da lend ya enemy sompin , mus dohn spect fa git payback . Wen ya ain look fa payback , ya gwine git payback wid big blessin , an ya gwine be chullun ob de Mos High God . Cause God good ta eben dem wa ain preciate nottin , an dem wa lib wickity .
42006036	Mus hab mussy pon all people jes like God , oona Fada , e hab mussy pon ebrybody .
42006037	“ Oona mus dohn jedge oda people . Den God esef ain gwine jedge oona . Mus dohn condemn . Den God esef ain gwine condemn oona . Mus fagib oda people . Den God esef gwine fagib oona .
42006038	Mus gii ta oda people . Den God esef gwine gii ta oona . E gwine gii ya plenty , jes like wen people full op a basket wid sompin an dey mash um down . Dey shake um bout an pile um op til e ron oba de top ob de basket . So ef ya gii plenty , God gwine gii ya plenty . Ef ya ain gii plenty , God ain gwine gii ya plenty . ”
42006039	Jedus tell um a paable say , “ A bline poson ain able fa sho oda bline poson de road , ainty ? Cause den , dey all two gwine faddown eenta de ditch .
42006040	Anybody wa da laan ain mo betta den de one wa da laan um . Bot anybody wa laan good ebryting wa e fa laan , e gwine know all , jes like de one wa laan um .
42006041	“ Wa mek ya see de leetle splinta ob wood een ya broda eye , bot ya ain pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye .
42006042	How ya gwine tell ya broda say , ‘ Broda , leh me tek dat leetle splinta out ya eye , ’ wen ya ain eben pay no mind ta de big log een ya own eye ? Oona hypicrit ! Fus mus tek de big log outta ya own eye . Den ya kin see plain fa tek dat leetle splinta outta ya broda eye .
42006043	“ A tree wa da grow good ain beah no bad fruit , an a tree wa ain da grow good ain beah no good fruit .
42006044	Oona gwine know ef de tree good or bad by de fruit wa e da beah . Oona ain gwine geda fig fom de briah patch , an oona ain gwine pick grape fom a bramble bush .
42006045	De same way so , a good poson da do good cause e hab plenty good ting een e haat , an a bad poson da do bad cause e hab plenty bad ting een e haat . De wod wa come out oona mout come fom all dem ting wa pile op een oona haat , wa oona da study bout all de time .
42006046	“ Oona ain do wa A tell oona fa do , so hoccome oona da call me , ‘ Lawd , Lawd ’ ?
42006047	Anybody wa come ta me an yeh me wod an do wa A tell um , A gwine show oona how e stan .
42006048	E stan jes like a man wa da build a house . E dig way down een de groun til e find de rock an lay de foundation pontop ob dat rock . Wen de flood come , a whole heapa wata hit dat house , bot de house ain moob . Nottin happen ta um , cause de man done build um pon de rock .
42006049	Bot anybody wa yeh me wod an ain do wa A tell um fa do , stan jes like a man wa build e house pontop ob de groun . E ain dig down fa lay de foundation . Soon as de flood hit dat house , e faddown . Bam ! E smash op ! ”
42007001	Atta Jedus done tell de people all dis , e gone ta de town name Capernaum .
42007002	One sodja high op een de Roman aamy been dey . E hab saabant wa e like a whole heap , bot dat saabant been sick til e mos dead .
42007003	Wen dat offisa yeh bout Jedus , e sen some ob de Jew leada dem ta Jedus fa beg um fa come heal e saabant .
42007004	De leada dem gone ta Jedus an beg um wid all dey haat fa come heal de saabant ob de sodja . Dey tell um say , “ Dis sodja a good man an e good fa hep um .
42007005	Cause e lob de Jew people , an e de one wa done build de Jew meetin house fa we yah . ”
42007006	So Jedus gone long wid um . Wen e git close ta de house , de sodja sen e fren dem wid a message fa Jedus . E tell um say , “ Sah , mus dohn bodda yasef fa come yah , cause A ain fit fa hab ya come eenta me house .
42007007	Cause ob dat , A ain tink A fit fa come ta ya needa . Bot do please , say de wod an me saabant gwine git well .
42007008	A mesef a man onda tority ob offisa oba me , an A hab tority oba oda sodja dem wa onda me . A tell one say , ‘ Mus go ! ’ an e gone . An A tell noda one say , ‘ Mus come ! ’ an e come . An A tell me saabant say , ‘ Mus do dis wok ! ’ an e do um . ”
42007009	Wen Jedus yeh wa de offisa done say , e been stonish . E ton roun ta de crowd wa beena gone long wid um , an e say , “ A da tell oona , A ain neba see nobody eben yah een Israel wa bleebe een God sommuch like dis Roman sodja bleebe ! ”
42007010	Wen dem wa bring de message git back ta de sodja house , dey find dat de saabant done git well .
42007011	De day atta dat , Jedus gone ta one town wa dey call Nain , an e ciple dem an a heapa oda people gone long wid um .
42007012	Wen dey git ta de gate ob de wall wa go roun de town , dey meet plenty people gwine fa bury a man . Dat man wa dead been e modda onliest son . E been a wida ooman , an a whole crowd ob people fom de town been long wid um .
42007013	Wen de Lawd see de ooman , e haat been hebby fa um , an e tell um say , “ Mus dohn cry ! ”
42007014	E gone oba an tetch de coffin , an de man dem wa beena tote de coffin , dey stop . Jedus tell de dead man say , “ Nyoung man , A da tell ya say , mus git op . ”
42007015	De nyoung man wa been dead , e set op an staat fa taak . An Jedus gim ta e modda .
42007016	All de people been scruck an stonish , an dey praise God , say , “ We done see one prophet mongst we ! ” An dey say , “ God done come fa hep e people ! ”
42007017	Dis nyews bout Jedus git roun shru Judea an all de arie close by .
42007018	John ciple dem gone tell um bout all dem ting .
42007019	John call two ob e ciple dem , sen um ta de Lawd Jedus fa aks um say , “ Ya de one wa been gwine fa come , or we spose fa look fa somebody else ? ”
42007020	Wen de man dem git ta Jedus , dey tell um say , “ John wa Bactize sen we fa aks ya ef ya de one wa been gwine fa come , or we spose fa look fa somebody else . ”
42007021	Dat same time , Jedus beena heal plenty people . E heal dem wa sick , an e dribe out ebil sperit wa been een some ob de people , an e mek a heapa bline people see .
42007022	So Jedus ansa dem wa John sen , say , “ Mus go back , tell John wa oona done see an wa oona done yeh . De people wa been bline , dey kin see . De cripple op people da waak . Dem wa hab leposy , dey git clean . De deef people able fa yeh , an dem wa done dead git op an lib gin . An de po people da yeh de Good Nyews .
42007023	De one wa ain got no doubt bout me , e bless fa true ! ”
42007024	Now wen dem wa John sen done gone back , Jedus tell de great crowd bout John . E say , “ Wen oona gone ta John een de wildaness , wa oona been spect fa see ? Oona spect fa see a piece ob grass wa da bend down wen de breeze da blow ? No , oona ain gone fa see dat .
42007025	Den wa oona gone fa see ? Oona gone fa see a man dress op een fine cloes ? No , oona ain gone fa see dat . Cause dem wa rich an dress op een fine cloes , dey lib een house wa blongst ta king dem .
42007026	Bot fa true , wa oona gone fa see ? Oona gone fa see a prophet , ainty ? An A da tell oona de trute , oona done see de man wa a heap mo greata den de oda prophet dem .
42007027	John de one dey been write bout een God wod , say ,
42007028	A da tell oona say , John mo greata den all de people wa eba lib . Stillyet , de poson wa leas ob all dem people wa God da rule , dat poson mo greata den John ! ”
42007029	Wen all de people , eben dem wa da geda tax , yeh Jedus , dey gree wid um , say dat God way , e right . Cause dey done hab John bactize um .
42007030	Bot de Pharisee dem an de Jew Law teacha dem , dey ain gree fa do wa God wahn um fa do , cause dey ain hab John bactize um .
42007031	Jedus say , “ De people dat lib een dis day yah , wa kin A say dey like ? How dey stan ?
42007032	Dem people stan like chullun wa da seddown ta de maakut . An dey da holla ta oda chullun , say ,
42007033	Wen John wa Bactize come , e fast fa woshup God an e ain drink no wine . Bot oona say , ‘ A ebil sperit een John . ’
42007034	Now wen de Man wa Come fom God come , e da nyam an drink . An oona say , ‘ Look , dis man yah da pack e gut an e a dronka ! Dem people wa da geda tax an dem oda people wa ain fit fa mix wid Jew people , dem e fren ! ’
42007035	Stillyet , dem wa da do wa God tell um fa do , dey gwine show dat God wise fa true . ”
42007036	One Pharisee come aks Jedus fa nyam wid um . Jedus gree an gone wid de Pharisee ta e house an seddown fa nyam .
42007037	A ooman been dey een dat town wa beena lib loose life . Wen de ooman yeh say Jedus beena nyam ta de Pharisee house , e cyaa a white stone bottle dat been full op wid spensiz pafume , an e gone ta de house .
42007038	De ooman stanop hine Jedus , close ta e foot . E staat fa cry , an e cry sommuch til de wata outta e eye wet op Jedus foot . So den , e dry Jedus foot wid e hair . E kiss e foot an e tek de pafume an rub um pon Jedus foot .
42007039	Wen de Pharisee wa aks Jedus fa come fa nyam wid um see dat , e tink say , “ Ef dis yah man been a prophet fa true , e been gwine know wa kinda ooman dis yah , wa da tetch um an rub um wid pafume . Cause dis ooman da lib a loose life . ”
42007040	Jedus ansa de Pharisee say , “ Simon , A got sompin fa tell ya . ”
42007041	Jedus say , “ Dey been two man wa beena owe a man wa lend people money . One man owe um fibe hundud silba coin , an de oda owe um fifty silba coin .
42007042	Bot all two ob dem ain been able fa pay um back . So de man wa lend de money tell dem bof say , ‘ Ya ain haffa pay me back de money . ’ Now den , wish one ob dem two gwine lob dat man mo ? ”
42007043	Simon ansa Jedus say , “ A spose de man wa owe um mo money . ”
42007044	Den Jedus ton ta da ooman an e still beena taak ta Simon . E say , “ Ya see dis ooman , yah ? Wen A come eenta ya house , ya ain gii me no wata fa wash me foot . Bot dis ooman yah done cry pon me foot , til me foot wet an e done dry um wid e hair .
42007045	Wen A come eenta ya house , ya ain welcome me wid one kiss , bot eba since A been yah , dis ooman beena kiss me foot .
42007046	Ya ain rub no olib oll pontop me head fa mek me feel betta , bot dis ooman done rub spensiz pafume pon me foot .
42007047	Cause ob dat , A da tell ya say , de ting wa dis ooman done show e lob me a whole heap . Dat show God done paadon e sin , an dey been a whole heap . Bot wen God paadon a poson wa ain sin a whole heap , dat poson gwine lob me jes a leetle bit . ”
42007048	Jedus tell de ooman say , “ Ya sin done been paadon . ”
42007049	De oda people dat beena nyam wid Jedus staat fa say ta one noda , “ Who dis man yah ? E eben paadon people fa dey sin ! ”
42007050	Jedus tell de ooman , “ Cause ya bleebe een me , God done sabe ya . Ya kin go now an hab peace een ya haat . ”
42008001	Soon atta dat , Jedus an de tweb ciple dem gone fom one town an settlement ta noda , da tell all de people de Good Nyews bout how God rule oba people .
42008002	Some ooman wa Jedus done heal gone long wid Jedus dem too . Some dem done been sick , an some done been hab ebil sperit . Mary , wa dey call Magdalene , been dey . Jedus done dribe out seben ebil sperit outta um .
42008003	An Joanna , Chuza wife , been dey . Dat de Chuza wa tek cyah ob King Herod place . An Susanna an plenty oda ooman all gone long wid Jedus dem an gim dey own money an ting fa hep um .
42008004	De people beena come out fom all de town dem fa yeh Jedus . An wen a big crowd done geda , Jedus tell um one paable .
42008005	E say , “ One faama gone ta e fiel fa plant seed . Wiles e beena scatta de seed , some fall long de pat . People waak pontop ob um , an de bod dem nyam um op .
42008006	Some seed fall pontop ob groun full op wid rock . De seed sprout an staat fa grow , bot dey wilta cause dey ain git no wata dey pon de rock .
42008007	Some seed fall eenta de briah . De briah choke um til de seed cyahn grow .
42008008	An some seed fall pon good groun . Dey grow good crop , a hundud time mo den wa e staat wid . ”
42008009	Jedus ciple dem aks um wa dat paable mean .
42008010	Jedus ansa um say , “ God gii oona de chance fa ondastan dem secret bout how e da rule . Bot fa de oda people , A da tell paable so dat dey kin look , bot eben dough dey look , dey ain gwine see . Dey kin yeh , bot dey ain gwine ondastan .
42008011	“ Dis yah wa de paable bout de seed mean : De seed , dat God wod .
42008012	De seed wa fall long de pat , dat like people wa yeh God wod , bot den de Debil come long an tek way de wod fom dey haat . So dey ain bleebe um , an dey ain git sabe needa .
42008013	De seed wa faddown pontop de groun wa full ob wid rock , dat like de people wa yeh God wod , an dey heppy fa yeh um . Bot dey ain bleebe um een dey haat fa true . Dey like de seed pontop de rock dat staat fa grow , bot e ain hab no root . Dem people bleebe jes a leetle wile . Wen de Debil test um , dey ain bleebe God wod no mo .
42008014	An dem seed wa fall eenta de briah , dat like de people wa yeh God wod , bot leetle by leetle dey staat fa fret bout de ting dem dey got . Dey fret all de time bout dey plenty money an ting an dey pledja een dis wol . Dem ting choke out God wod een dey haat , an dey crop ain mount ta nottin .
42008015	Bot de seed wa fall pon de good groun , dat like de people wa yeh God wod an hole um een dey haat . Dey da do wa God wod say . Dey ain stop fa bleebe , an dey hep plenty oda people bleebe . Dey mek good crop . ”
42008016	“ Ain nobody gwine light a lamp an den kiba um op wid a bowl , needa pit um ondaneet de bed . E da pit um pontop de table , so dat dem wa come een de house kin see .
42008017	Dey ain nottin wa been hide wa ain gwine come out een de open . An ain nottin wa been done een de daak wa ain gwine come out ta de light fa people fa yeh bout um .
42008018	“ So den , oona mus watch out how oona listen . Cause fa dem wa got sompin , God gwine gim mo . An dem wa ain got nottin , God gwine tek way eben dat leetle bit wa dey tink dey got . ”
42008019	Jedus modda an e broda dem come ta um . Bot dey ain been able fa git weh e been , cause sommuch people been dey .
42008020	Somebody tell Jedus say , “ Ya modda an ya broda dem da stan outside de house . Dey wahn fa see ya . ”
42008021	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dem wa yeh God wod an do wa e say , dem me modda an me broda dem . ”
42008022	One day , Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Leh we go cross ta de oda side de lake . ” So dey git eenta a boat an cyas off .
42008023	Wiles dey beena sail , Jedus drop da sleep een de boat . Jes den , a big wind come an blow oba de lake . E mek de wata come een de boat til e mos sink . Dey been een a fix .
42008024	De ciple dem gone an wake Jedus op . Dey holla say , “ Massa , Massa , we all gwine git drown ! ”
42008025	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Hoccome oona ain got no fait een me ? ”
42008026	Jedus an e ciple dem sail een de boat , cross oba ta de arie weh de Gadarene people lib . Dis been ta de oda side ob de lake fom Galilee .
42008027	Wen dey git dey , Jedus git outta de boat . An same time , a man fom de town come meet um . Dis man hab some ebil sperit dat beena lib eenside um fa a long time . E been nekid , an e ain stay een no house . E beena stay een de grabeyaad .
42008028	Wen de man see Jedus , e holla loud an git down pon de groun fo Jedus foot . E holla say , “ Jedus , ya de Son ob de Mos High God ! Wa bidness ya got wid me ? A da beg ya , do please , dohn toment me ! ”
42008029	De man taak so , cause Jedus done chaage de ebil sperit wa been eenside de man fa lef um . Plenty time de sperit beena tek hole ta de man an mek um ron way ta de desat . Eben dough people tie e han an e foot wid iron chain an gyaad um , ebry time e buss de chain an de ebil sperit mek um ron way .
42008030	Jedus aks um say , “ Wa ya name ? ”
42008031	Dem ebil sperit beena beg Jedus oba an oba say , “ Do , dohn sen we ta dat deep hole wa ain got no bottom . ”
42008032	Same time , a heapa hog beena nyam pon a hill dey . So de ebil sperit beg Jedus say , “ Leh we go eenside de hog dem . ” An Jedus leh um .
42008033	Wen de ebil sperit dem come outta de man an gone eenta de hog dem , all de hog dem ron down de side ob de steep hill like sompin wile . Dey ron eenta de lake an git drown .
42008034	Wen de people wa beena mind de hog dem see wa happen , dey mek hace an gone ta de town an ta de whole arie an tell people de nyews .
42008035	Den de people gone fa see wa been happen . Dey come ta Jedus , an dey see de man wa de ebil sperit dem been come outta , da seddown ta Jedus foot , da listen ta um . E hab on cloes an e been een e right mind . Wen de people see dat , dey been scaid .
42008036	Dem people wa been dey wen Jedus dribe out de ebil sperit dem fom eenside dat man , dey tell de oda people how Jedus been heal de man .
42008037	Den all dem fom dat arie weh da Gadarene people lib been scaid down . Dey aks Jedus fa go way fom dey . So den , Jedus git eenta de boat an gone back ta de place weh e come fom .
42008038	Bot wiles Jedus still dey , de man wa been hab de ebil sperit dem , e beg Jedus say , “ Leh me go long wid ya . ” Bot Jedus ain leh um go wid um .
42008039	Jedus tell de man say , “ Mus go back home an tell de people bout de great ting God done fa ya . ”
42008040	Wen Jedus git ta de oda side ob de lake gin , de people glad fa shim , an dey come meet um . Dey all beena wait fa um .
42008041	Den one man wa been leada een de Jew meetin house , e come . E name Jairus , an e come git down ta Jedus foot . E beg um say , “ Do please , come ta me house wid me . ”
42008042	Cause Jairus onliest daughta been mos dead . De gyal been bout tweb yeah ole .
42008043	One ooman been dey wa been sick tweb yeah . All dat time e beena bleed . E done pay docta all e money an ting , bot ain nobody been able fa hep um .
42008044	Dat ooman ketch op wid Jedus , come hine um , an e tetch de edge ob Jedus cloes . De same time e tetch um , e git heal . De bleedin stop , Bam !
42008045	Jedus aks de people say , “ Who dat done tetch me ? ”
42008046	Bot Jedus say , “ Somebody done tetch me . A know , cause powa done gone outta me . ”
42008047	De ooman wa tetch Jedus cloes find out dat e ain able fa hide . E staat fa tremble , an e come git down pon de groun ta Jedus foot . Fo all de people , dat ooman tell Jedus hoccome e been tetch um , an how dat same time wen e tetch um , e done git heal .
42008048	Jedus tell de ooman say , “ Me daughta , cause ya bleebe , ya done git heal . Ya kin go wid peace een ya haat . ”
42008049	Wiles Jedus beena taak , a man come fom Jairus house , tell Jairus say , “ Ya daughta done dead . Ya ain need fa bodda de Teacha no mo . ”
42008050	Jedus yeh um say de chile done dead , an e tell Jairus say , “ Mus dohn feah . Jes bleebe an ya chile gwine lib gin . E gwine be heal . ” An dey gone long ta Jairus house .
42008051	Wen dey git ta de house , Jedus ain leh nobody go een wid um cep Peter , John , James , an de chile fada an e modda .
42008052	Ebrybody beena weep an wail fa de chile . Jedus tell um say , “ Mus dohn weep , cause e ain dead . E da sleep ! ”
42008053	De people dem laugh at um , cause dey know de chile dead fa true .
42008054	Bot Jedus tek de chile han an call um say , “ Chile , git op ! ”
42008055	Life come back eenta de chile , an jes den e git op . Den Jedus tell um fa gii de chile sompin fa nyam .
42008056	De chile modda an e fada been stonish . Bot Jedus chaage um mus dohn tell nobody wa been happen .
42009001	Jedus call e tweb ciple dem , an e gim powa an tority fa dribe out all de ebil sperit dem an fa heal dem wa sick .
42009002	Den e sen um fa go all roun fa tell bout how God da rule , an fa mek de sick people well .
42009003	Fo dey gone , Jedus tell um say , “ Wen oona da trabel so , mus dohn tote nottin long wid ya . Mus dohn cyaa no stick fa waak , needa no bag fa cyaa ting een , needa no bread an no money . Dohn eben cyaa no extry shat .
42009004	Wen ya go een somebody house an dey gree fa leh ya stay dey , ya mus stay wid dem til ya ready fa lef dat town .
42009005	Ef ya go ta a town an de people ain heppy fa hab ya stay dey , mus lef dat town . Wiles ya da gwine , mus shake de dort fom off ya foot fa leh um know God ain please wid de way dey done an e gwine hole dat ginst um . ”
42009006	Den de ciple dem lef Jedus , an dey gone fom settlement ta settlement , da tell ebrybody de Good Nyews an heal people ebryweh .
42009007	Herod wa beena rule een Galilee yeh bout all wa happen . E been all mix op een e head , cause some ob de people beena taak say dat John wa Bactize wa done come back fom de dead .
42009008	An some people beena say dat de prophet Elijah come back . Oda people say dat one ob dem prophet fom way back done come back fom de dead .
42009009	Herod say , “ A done hab John head cut off . Bot who dis yah A da yeh susha ting bout ? ” So e beena try fa see Jedus .
42009010	Wen de postle dem come back , dey tell Jedus all wa dey done done . Jedus tek um an gone way fom de oda people . Dey gone ta a town name Bethsaida .
42009011	Wen de crowd yeh say Jedus gone ta Bethsaida , dey gone folla um dey . Jedus glad fa shim . E tell um bout how God da rule , an e heal dem wa been need fa be heal .
42009012	Wen e been mos fus daak , de tweb ciple dem come ta Jedus say , “ Nobody ain lib ta dis place yah . Mus sen way de crowd . Mek um go ta some ob de settlement an faam dem roun bout yah an find sompin fa nyam an a place fa stay . ”
42009013	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus gim sompin fa nyam . ”
42009014	Bout fibe tousan man been dey .
42009015	De ciple dem mek de people all seddown like how Jedus tell um fa do .
42009016	Jedus tek de fibe loaf ob bread an de two fish . E look op ta heaben an e tell God , “ Tankya fa de bread an de fish . ” Den e broke de bread an de fish an gim ta e ciple dem fa saab de crowd .
42009017	Ebrybody nyam til dey been sattify . An de ciple dem geda tweb basket ob lef oba bread an fish .
42009018	One day Jedus been ta esef an e beena pray . Wen e ciple dem come jine um , e aks um say , “ Who de people say A da ? ”
42009019	Dey ansa um say , “ Some people say ya John wa Bactize . Oda people say ya Elijah . An some say ya one dem prophet fom way back wa done come back fom de dead . ”
42009020	Den Jedus aks e ciple dem say , “ Well den , who oona say A da ? ”
42009021	Jedus gii e ciple dem scrick orda say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody who A da . ”
42009022	E tell um , “ De Man wa Come fom God haffa suffa a whole heap . Dem Jew head leada an de leada dem ob de priest dem an de Law teacha dem ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um . De people gwine kill um , bot atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ”
42009023	Jedus tell um all say , “ Ef a poson wahn fa come wid me , e mus dohn do jes wa e wahn fa do no mo . E haffa tote e cross an folla me ebry day .
42009024	De poson wa da try fa sabe e life , e gwine loss e true life . Bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me , e gwine git de true life .
42009025	Wa good e do a man ef e git ebryting een de whole wol an e gone ta hell wen e dead ? E done loss e true life , ainty ?
42009026	Ef anybody da shame ob me an wa A done laan um , de Man wa Come fom God gwine be shame ob dat poson wen e come like a king . E gwine come wid great powa an light wa come out fom heaben an shine pon um . Dat de same light wa da shine pon me Fada God an pon God angel dem wa gwine come wid um .
42009027	A da tell oona fa true , some ob dem wa da stanop yah now , dey ain gwine dead til dey done see God da rule oba de wol , a king fa true . ”
42009028	Wen bout eight day done pass atta e say dat , Jedus call Peter , John , an James fa go long wid um . Dey gone pontop a high hill fa pray .
42009029	Wiles Jedus beena pray , e face change . E cloes change too . Dey ton pure white an beena shine like shaap lightnin .
42009030	All ob a sudden two man appeah , da taak wid Jedus . Dem man been Moses an Elijah ,
42009031	an a bright light beena shine all roun um . Dey beena taak wid Jedus bout wen e gwine haffa dead een Jerusalem fa finish wa God done plan .
42009032	Peter dem been een a haad sleep . Bot dey wake op an see dat bright light roun Jedus an de two man dem wa beena stan wid um .
42009033	Wen Moses an Elijah staat fa lef Jedus , Peter tell Jedus say , “ Massa , e a good ting we yah ! Leh we mek shree bush aaba , one fa ya , one fa Moses , an one fa Elijah . ” Bot Peter ain beena ondastan wa e beena taak bout .
42009034	Wiles Peter beena taak , a cloud come an cyas a shada oba um . Wen de cloud kiba um , de ciple dem been scaid .
42009035	Dey yeh a boice wa come outta de cloud . An e tell um say , “ Dis me Son , wa A lob a whole heap . Mus listen ta wa e tell oona ! ”
42009036	Wen de boice git shru , ain nobody been dey cep Jedus . Atta dat , de ciple dem ain crack dey teet bout wa dey been see dat day . Dey ain tell nobody jurin dat time .
42009037	De day atta dat , wen Jedus dem come down fom de hill , a whole crowd ob people come fa meet Jedus .
42009038	One man een de crowd holla , “ Teacha , A da beg ya ! Do please , come look at me son , cause e de onliest chile A got .
42009039	A ebil sperit tek hole ta um . Dat sperit mek um holla all ob a sudden . E ketch fits , an e da foam out de mout . De sperit keep on da bruise um op . Ain haadly eba lef um off .
42009040	A beena beg ya ciple dem fa dribe dat sperit out , bot dey ain been able fa do um . ”
42009041	Jedus mek ansa say , “ Oona people yah wa lib een dis time ain got no fait ! Oona ain ondastan nottin . Hommuch mo longa A gwine haffa pit op wid oona ? ” Den e tell de man say , “ Bring ya son yah . ”
42009042	Wiles de boy beena come ta Jedus , de ebil sperit shrow um down ta de groun wid fits . Bot Jedus gii orda ta dat ebil sperit fa come outta de boy , an de boy been heal . Den Jedus gim back ta e fada .
42009043	All de people been stonish fa see de great powa ob God .
42009044	E tell um say , “ A wahn oona fa listen good ta wa A gwine tell oona . Dey gwine han um oba . Dey gwine ton de Man wa Come fom God een ta dem wa een chaage yah . ”
42009045	De ciple dem ain ondastan wa Jedus mean . Cause God done hide de meanin fom um , so dey ain know yet wa been gwine happen . Dey been scaid fa aks Jedus wa e mean wen e say dat .
42009046	De ciple dem staat fa aagy bout wish one dem been gwine be great de mos .
42009047	Jedus know wa dey beena tink , so e tek a leetle chile an stan um op by e side .
42009048	E tell e ciple dem say , “ Anybody wa tek een a leetle chile like dis one yah een me name , dat poson done tek me een . An anybody wa tek me een , e done tek een de one wa sen me . De poson wa tink e ain nottin mongst oona , e de one wa sompin fa sho . ”
42009049	John tell Jedus say , “ Massa , we done see one man da dribe out ebil sperit by de powa ob ya name . We tell um fa stop dat , cause dat man ain one ob we . ”
42009050	Jedus say , “ Mus dohn tell de man fa stop , cause ef anybody ain ginst oona , e fa oona . ”
42009051	Wen de time mos come wa God done set fa tek Jedus op ta heaben , Jedus set e mind fa go ta Jerusalem .
42009052	E sen messenja dem fa go head ob um fo e staat off . De messenja dem gone een a Samaria settlement fa git ebryting ready fa Jedus .
42009053	Bot de people een dat settlement ain wahn Jedus fa stop dey , cause dey been know e done set e mind fa go on ta Jerusalem .
42009054	Wen James an John , e ciple dem , see dat de people een dat settlement ain wahn Jedus fa stop dey , dey aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , ya wahn we fa aks God fa sen fire down fom heaben fa bun op dem people ? ”
42009055	Jedus ton roun ta James an John an e buke um .
42009056	[ E say , “ Oona ain know wa kind ob sperit dey een oona haat . Cause de Man wa Come fom God ain come fa tek way people life . E come fa sabe um . ” ] Den Jedus an e ciple dem gone long ta noda settlement .
42009057	Wiles Jedus an e ciple dem gone long de road , one man tell Jedus say , “ A gwine folla ya wehsoneba ya go . ”
42009058	Jedus ansa um say , “ De fox got hole een de groun , an de bod wa fly roun op een de air dey got nes . Bot de Man wa Come fom God ain got noweh fa lay e head . ”
