42009059	Jedus tell noda man say , “ Come folla me ! ” Bot de man ansa um say , “ Sah , fus leh me go an bury me fada . ”
42009060	Jedus ansa , “ Leh dem wa dead bury dey own dead . Bot ya yasef go , tell oda people bout God rule . ”
42009061	An noda man tell Jedus say , “ Sah , A gwine folla ya , bot fus leh me go tell me fambly A da gwine . ”
42009062	Jedus ansa um say , “ De poson wa staat fa plow groun an e keep on da look back hine um , e ain fit fa lib onda God rule . ”
42010001	Atta dis , de Lawd pick sebenty oda man . E sen um out two by two fa go eenta ebry town an settlement weh Jedus esef been bout fa go .
42010002	Fo de man dem gone , Jedus tell um say , “ De crop done ready fa haabis , bot dey ain nuff han fa geda um . Mus pray ta de Lawd ob de crop fa sen out mo han fa geda de crop .
42010003	Now go ! A da sen oona out jes like lamb mongst wolf .
42010004	Wiles oona gwine long so , mus dohn cyaa no money . Mus dohn cyaa no bag or no shoe . Mus dohn waste time da taak wid people long de road .
42010005	Wasoneba house ya go een , mus fus say , ‘ God bless all oona een dis house . ’
42010006	Ef dey a peaceable poson dey , e gwine hab de blessin dat ya done pray fa um fa git . Bot ef dey ain no peaceable poson dey , dat blessin wa ya done gim gwine come back ta ya .
42010007	De fus house weh ya gone een , weh dey gree fa leh ya stay , mus stay een dat house all de time ya dey een dat place . Mus nyam an drink wasoneba dey gii ya , cause ebrybody wa wok oughta git pay . Mus dohn moob fom one house ta noda .
42010008	Wensoneba ya go een a town an de people glad ya come , ya mus nyam wasoneba dey gii ya .
42010009	Mus heal de sick een dat town , an mus tell de people dey , say , ‘ Time fa God fa rule oba oona da come . ’
42010010	Wensoneba ya go een a town an de people ain glad ya come , mus go out een de screet an taak ta um .
42010011	Tell um say , ‘ We da shake off eben de dort ob oona town fom off we foot fa waan ya dat ya done bad . De time da come wen God gwine rule oba oona . ’ ”
42010012	Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , wen de Jedgiment Day come , dem een dat town gwine suffa mo den de people ob Sodom ! ”
42010013	Jedus say , “ E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa lib een Chorazin an een Bethsaida . Cause ef de people wa lib een Tyre an Sidon been see dem miracle wa A beena do fa oona , dey been gwine change dey sinful way . Dey been gwine weah croka sack an rub ashesh pon dey head an seddown fa leh ebrybody know dey done change dey way !
42010014	Wen de Jedgiment Day come an God da jedge all de people een de wol , oona gwine suffa mo den dem people een Tyre an Sidon !
42010015	Oona wa lib dey een Capernaum , oona tink say , oona gwine git lif op ta heaben , ainty ? No ! Oona gwine git chunk down ta hell ! ”
42010016	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Anybody wa pay oona mind , dat poson da pay me mind . Anybody wa ton way fom oona , e done ton way fom me . An anybody wa ton way fom me , e done ton way fom de one wa sen me . ”
42010017	Den de sebenty man dem come back ta Jedus . Dey been full op wid joy , an dey tell um say , “ Lawd , eben de ebil sperit dem pay we mind wen we nyuse ya name ! ”
42010018	Jedus ansa um say , “ A done see Satan faddown , come outta heaben like lightnin .
42010019	Fa true , A done gii oona powa oba de enemy an all de powa e got . Ef oona waak pon snake an scorpion , dey ain gwine hut oona . Nottin ain gwine hut oona .
42010020	Stillyet , mus dohn be so glad cause de ebil sperit dem pay oona mind . Mus be glad cause oona name done been write down een heaben . ”
42010021	Dat same time , de Holy Sperit full Jedus op wid joy . Jedus say , “ Fada , ya de Lawd . Ya da rule heaben an ya da rule dis wol ! A tank ya cause ya done show dese ting ta dem wa ain hab no laanin . An ya done hide dese ting fom dem wa tink say , dey wise an hab plenty laanin . Yeah , Fada , e been ya good pledja fa do um like dis . ”
42010022	Jedus tell de people say , “ Me Fada done gii me powa oba ebryting . Nobody ain know who de Son da , cep fa de Fada . An ain nobody know who de Fada da , cep fa de Son an dem wa de Son pick fa mek um know de Fada . ”
42010023	Jedus ton ta e ciple dem . E tell jes dem say , “ Fa true , oona been bless cause ob wa oona da see !
42010024	A da tell oona , plenty prophet an king done been wahn fa see dem ting wa oona da see , bot dey ain shim . Dey wahn fa yeh wa oona da yeh , bot dey ain yeh um . ”
42010025	One Jew Law teacha come op fa test Jedus . E aks Jedus say , “ Teacha , wa A haffa do fa git life wa las faeba ? ”
42010026	Jedus aks um say , “ Wa ting dey write down een de Jew Law Book ? How ya tapetate wa e say ? ”
42010027	De Law teacha ansa Jedus say , “ De Law say , ‘ Mus lob de Lawd ya God wid all ya haat an wid all ya soul . Mus lob um wid all ya scrent an wid all ya mind . An mus lob ya neighba de same way ya lob yasef . ’ ”
42010028	Jedus say , “ Ya ansa right , fa true . Ef ya do dem ting , ya gwine lib faeba . ”
42010029	De Law teacha been wahn fa sho Jedus e right fa taak wa e taak , so e aks Jedus say , “ Who dat me neighba ? ”
42010030	Jedus ansa um say , “ One time a man beena gwine down fom Jerusalem ta Jericho . Wiles e beena gwine , some robba layway um . Dey gang um an scrip off e cloes . Den dey beat um op til e been mos dead . An dey gone an lef um dey een de road .
42010031	A Jew priest come down de road . Wen e see de man pon de groun dey , e cross oba ta de oda side ob de road an gone .
42010032	Same fashion , a Levite , a Law teacha , come ta de place weh de man been een de road . Wen de Levite git dey an shim , e cross oba ta de oda side ob de road an gone too .
42010033	Bot one scranja wa come fom Samaria beena trabel long dat road . Wen e git dey an e see de man wa de robba beat op , e feel too saary fa um .
42010034	E gone oba ta de man . E pour medicine , oll an wine , een de cut weh de robba done beat um op . E wrop op de cut . Den e pit de man pon e own mule , cyaa um ta a bodin house . An e stay dey wid um an nuss um .
42010035	Nex day wen de man fom Samaria git ready fa go , e call de man wa ron de bodin house . E gim money , two silba coin , an e tell um say , ‘ Mus tek cyah ob dis man fa me . Wasoneba mo e cost , A gwine pay ya wen A git back . ’ ”
42010036	“ Now den , ” Jedus aks de Law teacha , say , “ Wa ya tink ? Wish one dem shree man show e been a neighba ta de man wa git rob ? ”
42010037	De Law teacha ansa Jedus say , “ De scranja fom Samaria , de one wa hab mussy pon de man wa been rob . ”
42010038	Jedus an e ciple dem trabel long . Dey gone ta a settlement weh a ooman name Martha beena lib . E welcome Jedus an eenbite um fa come een de house .
42010039	Martha hab sista name Mary , an Mary gone seddown close by Jedus foot fa yeh wa ting Jedus gwine laan um .
42010040	Bot Martha beena ton roun , da fix sompin fa nyam an da git de house ready fa saab de compny . E gone ta Jedus an tell um say , “ Lawd , ya ain saary fa me ? Me sista lef me by mesef . E ain hep me git nottin ready . Tell um fa come hep me ! ”
42010041	Jedus ansa um , “ Martha , Martha , ya opsot an bodda bout tommuch ting .
42010042	Ya ain need bot one ting . Ya see Mary da seddown yah an A da laan um . Mary done pick de good ting , an ain nobody gwine tek um fom um . ”
42011001	One day Jedus beena pray dey een one place . Wen e git shru da pray , one e ciple dem tell um say , “ Lawd , laan we how fa pray , jes like John laan e ciple dem . ”
42011002	Jedus tell um say , “ Wen oona pray , mus say ,
42011003	Gii we de food wa we need
42011004	Fagib we fa we sin ,
42011005	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Sposin one ob oona hab a good fren , an ya gone ta e house een de middle ob de night . Ya call um say , ‘ Fren , do lend me shree loaf ob bread .
42011006	A got a fren wa beena trabel an e done come by fa wisit me . A ain got nottin fa gim fa nyam . ’
42011007	Den e gwine ansa ya fom een de house an say , ‘ Mus dohn bodda me . A done lock de door , an me an me chullun done lay down een de bed fa de night . A ain able fa git op an gii ya nottin . ’ Sposin dat how e stan ?
42011008	A da tell ya , eben ef ya fren ain git op an gii ya nottin cause e ya fren , ef ya ain shame fa keep on da aks um , e gwine git op an e gwine gii ya wa ya need , cause ya ain shame fa keep on da aks um .
42011009	A da tell oona say , aks God an e gwine gii ya wa ya aks fa . Look ta God , an ya gwine find wasoneba ya da look fa . Knock ta God door , an e gwine open um ta ya .
42011010	Cause de poson wa aks , God gwine gim wa e aks fa . De poson wa look ta God , e gwine find wasoneba e da look fa . An de poson wa knock ta God door , God gwine open de door ta um .
42011011	Oona wa fada , ef ya son aks ya say , ‘ Fada , gii me a piece ob bread , ’ ya ain gwine gim no rock , ainty ? An ef ya son aks ya fa a piece ob fish , ya ain gwine gim no snake , ainty ?
42011012	An ef ya son aks ya fa a egg , fa sho ya ain gwine gim no scorpion !
42011013	Ef oona wa ebil know how fa gii oona chullun good ting , oona Fada een heaben know mo den dat how fa gii de Holy Sperit ta dem wa aks um ! ”
42011014	Jedus beena dribe out a ebil sperit fom a man . Cause ob dat sperit , de man ain been able fa taak . Wen Jedus mek de ebil sperit come outta dat man , de man staat fa taak . All de people been stonish .
42011015	Bot some dem people say , “ Dat de debil Beelzebub , de leada ob de ebil sperit dem , wa da gii Jedus de powa fa dribe um out . ”
42011016	Oda people try fa test Jedus . Dey tell um say , “ Mus do one dem miracle fa sho we dat ya hab God powa fa true . ”
42011017	Jedus know wa dem people beena tink , so e tell um say , “ Ef de people een a country da fight ginst one noda , dat country ain gwine las . Same way so , ef a fambly da fight mongst deysef , dat fambly gwine paat .
42011018	An ef dem wa wok fa Satan fight mongst deysef , Satan rule ain gwine las , ainty ? A da say dat cause oona say , ‘ Beelzebub , de head leada ob de ebil sperit dem , e da gii me de powa fa dribe out de ebil sperit . ’
42011019	Ef Beelzebub da gii me de powa fa dribe ebil sperit , who dat gii oona people de powa fa dribe um out ? No ! Dem ting wa oona people deysef da do , dey show oona ain right .
42011020	God esef da gii me de powa fa dribe out ebil sperit , an dat show fa true dat God done staat fa rule mongst oona .
42011021	“ Wen a scrong man hab all e weapon ready an e da gyaad e house , den ain nobody gwine tief e ting dem .
42011022	Bot wen a man wa mo scronga come ginst dat man an beat um op , de one wa beat um op gwine tek all e weapon . E gwine tek way all de ting dem wa dat man hab fa hep um fight , cyaa um way , an wide um op wid dem wa trabel long wid um .
42011023	“ Now anybody wa ain fa me , e ginst me . An anybody wa ain hep me fa geda people , bring dem ta me , e da scatta um .
42011024	“ Wen ebil sperit done come outta a man , e da trabel shru dry place fa find a place fa res . Ef e ain able fa find no place , e say ta esef , ‘ A gwine back eenside de house weh A been . ’
42011025	Wen dat ebil sperit come back eenside de man , e find um jes like a house wa clean an scraighten op .
42011026	Den de ebil sperit gone an git seben oda sperit way mo ebil den esef . Dey all come fa lib eenside dat man . Now dat man een a wossa shape den e been . ”
42011027	Wen Jedus say dis , a ooman een de crowd tell um say , “ Dat sho a bless ooman wa bon ya an nuss ya ! ”
42011028	Jedus ansa um say , “ Yeh , dat true , bot de one wa bless fa true , e de one wa yeh God wod an do wa God tell um fa do ! ”
42011029	Mo an mo people beena crowd op roun Jedus , an e taak ta um . E say , “ De people wa lib now , dey wickity . Dey da aks me fa sho um a sign , bot A ain gwine do um . Dey ain gwine see no sign cep de sign ob de prophet Jonah .
42011030	Jes like Jonah been a sign ta de people een Ninevah , same way so , de Man wa Come fom God gwine be a sign fa dem people wa da lib now .
42011031	Wen Jedgiment Day come , de queen wa nyuse fa rule een de sout , e gwine stanop an taak ginst de people wa da lib now . Cause e been trabel haf way roun de wol fom e country clean ta weh Solomon been . E gone dey fa yeh de wise wod wa Solomon say . Bot look yah , somebody way mo den Solomon dey yah now .
42011032	Wen Jedgiment Day come , de people wa nyuse fa lib een Ninevah , dey gwine taak ginst dem people wa da lib now . Cause wen de people ob Ninevah done yeh wa de ole people prophet Jonah say , dey change dey sinful way an ain do um no mo . An look yah , somebody way mo den Jonah dey yah now ! ”
42011033	Jedus say , “ Ain nobody gwine light a lamp an den hide um someweh weh dey cyahn shim . Needa e ain gwine pit de lamp ondaneet a bushel basket . E gwine pit de lamp pontop ob a table so dem wa come een de house kin see de light .
42011034	Ya eye like a lamp fa ya body . Ef ya got good eye , all ya body full op wid light . Bot ef ya eye ain no good , all ya body gwine be een de daak .
42011035	Mus mek sho ya hab light steada daak een ya .
42011036	Ef all ya body full op wid light an e ain hab no daak paat een um , dat light wa dey een ya gwine shine all oba , jes like a bright lamp wa da shine pon ya . ”
42011037	Wen Jedus git shru da taak , one de Pharisee dem eenbite um fa come nyam ta e house . So Jedus gone an seddown fa nyam .
42011038	De Pharisee been stonish wen e see dat Jedus done seddown fa nyam an e ain wash e han same way de Pharisee dem beena wash dey han .
42011039	De Lawd tell um say , “ Oona Pharisee da wash de outside ob oona cup an plate , bot eenside oona haat , oona full op wid wickity an ebil ting .
42011040	Oona ain got a bit ob sense ! God mek de outside an de eenside all two , ainty ?
42011041	Mus gii de food wa eenside oona cup an oona plate ta dem wa ain got nottin , an ebryting oona hab gwine be clean fa oona . ”
42011042	Jedus tell um say , “ E gwine be a haad time fa oona Pharisee ! Oona gii God a tent ob all de crop an ting oona git , eben de leetle mint an rue an oda herb wa oona raise fa season oona food . Stillyet , oona ain do right ta people , an oona ain lob God . Fa true , dese ting oona mus do . An oona mus dohn lef off dem oda ting wa oona spose fa do .
42011043	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona Pharisee ! Cause oona lob fa seddown een de bes seat een de Jew meetin house so people kin see oona . An wen oona een de maakut , oona lob fa dem fa hail oona fa sho ebrybody dat oona sompin special .
42011044	E gwine be a haad time fa oona Pharisee ! Cause oona jes like grabe wa ain got no stone fa maak um . People ain see dem grabe , so dey waak pontop ob um . An wen dey do dat , dey ain eben know wa dey da do . ”
42011045	One ob de Jew Law teacha dem ansa Jedus say , “ Teacha , wen ya da taak like dat , ya hole we cheap too . ”
42011046	Jedus ansa um say , “ E gwine be a haad time fa oona wa teach de Jew Law ! Cause oona da tapetate de Law so scrick an add sommuch ting ta um , oona mek um hebby load fa tote . Bot oonasef ain pit eben one finga fa hep dem tote dat load . Oona say dey mus lib coddin ta dem whole heapa law , bot oona ain do nottin fa hep mek um easy .
42011047	E gwine be a haad time fa oona ! Oona build fine tomb fa memba de prophet dem . Dem de same prophet dat oona ole people done kill .
42011048	So den , oona da show oona bleebe oona ole people done do right . Cause dey kill de prophet dem an oona build fine tomb fa memba dem prophet .
42011049	Cause ob dat , God wise wod tell we say , ‘ A gwine sen me prophet dem an me messenja dem ta um . Bot dey gwine kill some ob dem , an dey gwine mek some de oda res suffa . ’
42011050	So God gwine hole oona people yah wa lib now sponsable fa ebry one ob dem prophet wa oona ole people done kill eba since God mek de wol .
42011051	God gwine hole oona sponsable fa de prophet dem wa de ole people done kill , fom Abel all de way ta Zechariah , wa dey done kill dey tween God House an de alta weh dey mek sacrifice ta God . Fa true , A da tell oona , God gwine hole oona people sponsable wa lib now fa all dem wa oona ole people kill !
42011052	“ E gwine be a haad time fa oona Law teacha ! Cause oona done lock op de wod ob God , de onliest place weh people kin go fa laan fa true . An oona done tek de key so dey cyahn go een . Oona ain gone eenside an try fa laan , an oona da stop de oda people dem wa da try fa gone een fa laan ! ”
42011053	Jedus staat fa go way fom dey , an de Law teacha an de Pharisee dem staat fa cuse um tommuch an aks um queshon bout a whole heapa ting .
42011054	Dey beena try fa mek Jedus taak ginst Moses Law , eeda ginst God name , so dey kin bring chaage ginst um , say e done wrong .
42012001	Same time , a whole heapa people come fa yeh Jedus . Dey beena crowd op togeda so , til dey beena step pontop one noda . Fus Jedus laan e ciple dem . E tell um say , “ Mus dohn be no hypicrit like dem Pharisee . Mus dohn fool op wid dem hypicrit , wa stan like yeast mix op een flour . E all kiba op an e da spread all oba eenside de flour .
42012002	Wasoneba kiba op gwine be onkiba . Wasoneba people do een secret , ebrybody gwine know bout um .
42012003	Wasoneba oona beena taak bout een de daak ob de night , people gwine yeh ebryting oona done say . Dey gwine yeh um een de broad day light . Wasoneba oona beena taak bout ondaneet oona bret eenside a room een de house , oona gwine yeh ebrybody da holla um , da tote de nyews outside een de screet .
42012004	“ Me fren , A tell oona , mus dohn be scaid ob people wa able fa stroy oona body , cause dey ain able fa do no mo den dat . Dey cyahn do nottin tall bout oona soul . So mus dohn be scaid ob dem people .
42012005	A gwine leh oona know head ob time who dat oona mus be scaid ob . Mus feah God . Cause wen e done mek somebody dead , e hab powa fa punish um atta dat , fa chunk dat poson soul eenta hell . Yeah , fa true , oona mus feah God !
42012006	“ De sparra wot leetle or nottin . Fibe ob dem cost bout two cent , ainty ? Eben so , God dohn neba fagit bout none ob dem sparra , none tall .
42012007	Oona way mo walyable den a whole heapa sparra . De Lawd God done count ebry scran ob hair pon oona head , an e know eben hommuch hair oona got . So den , mus dohn be scaid ob people . God da tek cyah ob oona ! ”
42012008	Jedus tell um say , “ Fa true , anybody wa tell people dat e blongst ta me , de Man wa Come fom God gwine tell God angel dem say , ‘ Dat poson dey blongst ta me . ’
42012009	Bot anybody wa tell people say , e ain blongst ta me , A gwine tell God angel dem say , ‘ Dat one dey ain blongst ta me ! ’
42012010	“ De poson wa taak ginst de Man wa Come fom God , God kin fagib um , bot de poson wa say ebil ting ginst de Holy Sperit , God ain neba gwine fagib um .
42012011	“ Wen dey ketch oona fa jedge oona een de Jew meetin house , an dey cyaa oona een front ob de leada dem an tority dem , mus dohn fret bout how oona gwine ansa dem , or wa ting oona gwine say .
42012012	Cause dat same time , de Holy Sperit gwine tell oona wa ting oona spose fa say . ”
42012013	One man dey een de crowd tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , me fada done dead . A wahn ya fa tell me broda fa wide wid me de propaty we fada lef fa we . ”
42012014	Jedus ansa de man say , “ Look yah , man , ain nobody sen me fa be no jedge , needa fa be de one fa wide op propaty tween oona . ”
42012015	Den Jedus tell all de people say , “ A da tell oona head ob time , mus dohn hab de big eye bout nottin . Cause we true life ain medja by de ting dem we got , eben ef we got a whole heapa ting . ”
42012016	Den Jedus tell um a paable , say , “ One time , one man hab a heapa ting . E hab faam wa mek good crop .
42012017	E study e head , e tink say , ‘ Wa A gwine do ? A hab sommuch crop , A ain hab no place fa pit all ob um . ’
42012018	E tink say , ‘ A know wa fa do . A gwine teah down me ole baan an build um mo bigga . A gwine pit all me grain an ting een dey .
42012019	Wen A done do dat , A gwine tell mesef say , ya got plenty ting pit back , all de good ting dem ya gwine need fa plenty yeah fa come . Now den , ya ain need fa warry bout nottin . Mus jes nyam an drink an pledja yasef ! ’
42012020	God tell de man say , ‘ Ya fool ! Dis night yah , A gwine tek ya life . Den who gwine git all dem ting yah dat ya beena pit back , fa keep fa yasef ? ’
42012021	“ Dat how e stan fa de people wa jes da pile op plenty ting fa deysef . Dey sho ain rich een de ting dem dat count fa true wid God . ”
42012022	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ So den , A da tell oona say , mus dohn warry bout how ya gwine lib , wa ya gwine nyam , needa wa cloes ya gwine weah pon ya body .
42012023	Cause ya life walyable way mo den sompin fa nyam , an ya body walyable way mo den cloes .
42012024	Now den , leh we study bout dem crow . Dey ain plant no seed , needa geda crop . Dey ain hab no conehouse , needa no baan fa keep wa dey geda . Stillyet , God da feed um ! Oona way mo walyable den de bod !
42012025	An fa true , ain nary one ob oona kin grow a bit talla cause e da warry bout um , ainty ?
42012026	Ef ya ain able fa do leetle ting like dat , hoccome ya da warry bout de oda res ?
42012027	An leh we study bout de lily wa da grow wile . Dey ain wok , needa mek cloes fa deysef . Now , A da tell oona , King Solomon been too rich , an e hab fine cloes . Stillyet , eben Solomon ain neba hab cloes fa dress purty an fine like dem lily wa da grow wile .
42012028	God de one dat gii cloes ta de wile grass , mek um purty an fine . An dat grass dey taday , an e gone demarra . People cut um down an nyuse um fa mek fire een dey oben . Ef God dress op de wile grass like dat , fa true e gwine do way mo den dat fa mek sho oona hab cloes fa weah . Sho nuff oona ain bleebe God wid all oona haat !
42012029	Mus dohn fret yasef bout wa ya gwine nyam an wa ya gwine drink . Mus dohn warry bout um tall .
42012030	De people dat ain bleebe pon God , dey da warry all de time bout dem ting . Bot God oona Fada , an e know oona haffa hab sompin fa nyam an drink an cloes fa weah .
42012031	Steada dat , ya mus study bout how fa leh God rule een ya life . Den God gwine gii ya all dem oda ting too . ”
42012032	“ A de shephud , an oona me leetle flock . Oona ain a whole heap , bot mus dohn fret . Cause God oona Fada , e glad fa mek oona rule wid esef .
42012033	Oona mus sell ebryting wa oona hab an gii ta de people wa ain got nottin . Dat how ya gwine git God good ting fa oonasef . Like money wa dohn neba ron out , ya gwine hab ya tredja een heaben , weh e gwine stan faeba . Cause tief ain able fa tief um dey , an no mot kin stroy um .
42012034	Cause wehsoneba ya tredja da , dat weh ya haat gwine be too .
42012035	“ Ya mus fix ya cloes so ya ready fa wok . Mus light ya lamp , an mus dohn leh um go out .
42012036	Oona mus stan like a wokman wa da wait fa de man e da wok fa fa come back fom a marry feas . E da wait so dat wensoneba e massa come home an knock , e ready an kin open de door fa um .
42012037	Dem wokman gwine be bless fa true dat ready an ain sleep wen de man dey wok fa come home ! A da tell oona fa true , de man dey wok fa gwine fix e cloes so e ready fa wok , an e gwine call e wokman dem , mek um come seddown ta de table . E gwine saab um , gim sompin fa nyam .
42012038	Dem wokman gwine be bless fa true . Dey gwine be bless eben ef de man dey wok fa come een de middle ob de night , or ef e come jes fo de roosta crow . Dey gwine be bless ef e find um ready !
42012039	Oona mus know dat ef de man wa own a house been know wen de tief gwine come ta um , dat man ain gwine sleep . E ain gwine lef e house . E gwine stay dey , an de tief ain gwine broke een an go eenside .
42012040	Same fashion , oona too mus be ready all de time . Cause de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back ta dis wol wen oona da tink say , ‘ E ain da come now . ’ ”
42012041	Peter aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , dis paable dat ya jes tell , ya tell dat fa we or fa all de people ? ”
42012042	De Lawd ansa say , “ Who dat wokman wa got plenty sense an wa true ta de man e da wok fa ? E de one dat de bossman gwine gii chaage oba all dem een e house wen de bossman gwine off . De bossman chaage dat wokman fa sho de oda wokman dem all de ting dem dey fa do . An dat wokman een chaage gwine wide op de food fa dem fa nyam wen e spose .
42012043	Dat wokman gwine be bless fa true , wen de bossman come home , ef e find um da do dem ting wa e done tell um fa do .
42012044	A da tell oona fa true , de bossman gwine gim chaage oba all e propaty an ting .
42012045	Bot wa gwine happen ef dat wokman een chaage tink say , ‘ Fa long time now , me bossman ain come back . ’ Den e staat fa beat op pon all dem man an ooman . An de wokman een chaage jes da nyam an drink an git dronk .
42012046	Ef dat wokman een chaage ain do wa e spose fa do an e treat de oda wokman dem bad , one day e bossman gwine come back home wen dat wokman ain spect um . De bossman gwine whip dat wokman too bad . E gwine mek um suffa jes like de people dat ain bleebe God .
42012047	“ De wokman dat know wa e bossman wahn um fa do , bot e ain git esef ready an e ain do um , e gwine git whip good fashion .
42012048	Bot de wokman dat ain know wa e bossman wahn um fa do an stillyet e do ting wa mek de bossman whip um , e bossman ain gwine whip um bad . God spect plenty fom de poson wa e done gii plenty ta . E spect mo fom de poson wa e been gii mo ta . ”
42012049	Jedus say , “ A come fa bring fire dat gwine bun pon de eart , an A wish wid ebryting een me dat e done staat fa bun now .
42012050	A haffa go shru a whole heapa suffrin . A got a burden fa dis ting til A done oba dat .
42012051	Oona tink say , A come fa bring peace ta de people een de wol , ainty ? No , A da tell oona , dat ain hoccome A come yah . Cause A come , people ain gwine gree wid one noda . Dey gwine tek side ginst one noda an wide op .
42012052	Fom now on , a fambly wa got fibe people een um gwine fight ginst one noda an wide op . Shree people wid me gwine fight ginst de oda two een de fambly . An two people wid me gwine fight ginst de oda shree .
42012053	Dey gwine wide op . De fada gwine fight ginst e son , an de son gwine fight ginst e fada . De modda gwine fight ginst e daughta , an de daughta gwine fight ginst e modda . De moda-een-law gwine fight ginst e daughta-een-law , an de daughta-een-law gwine fight ginst e moda-een-law . ”
42012054	Jedus tell de crowd say , “ Wen oona see de cloud dem da rise op oba yonda een de west , tareckly oona know say , ‘ E gwine be bad weda , ’ an e bad weda fa true .
42012055	An wen oona feel de sout wind da blow , oona know say , ‘ E gwine git hot , ’ an e git hot fa true .
42012056	Oona hypicrit ! Oona know how fa look ta de eart an ta de eliment an tapetate bout de weda . Den hoccome oona ain know wa dem ting mean bout me wa dey yah een dis wol now ? Fa true , oona ain wahn fa know , ainty ? ”
42012057	“ Hoccome oona ain jedge fa oonasef wa right fa do ?
42012058	Ef anybody aagy wid one ob oona an e da tek ya ta court , ya mus try fa settle wid um fo ya git dey . Cause ef ya ain able fa settle wid um , e gwine drag ya ta de jedge . An de jedge gwine gii ya ta de police , an e gwine tek ya ta de jailhouse .
42012059	Ef dat so e stan , A da tell ya , ya gwine stay een de jailhouse til ya done pay de las cent ob de fine wa ya owe . ”
42013001	Dat same time , some people wa been dey tell Jedus bout dem people fom Galilee wa Pilate , de Roman gobna , gii orda fa kill wiles dey beena offa op sacrifice fa woshup God .
42013002	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona tink dat dem Galilee people wa Pilate kill , dey dead like dat cause dey done ebil mo den all de oda res ob de people een Galilee , ainty ?
42013003	No , A tell oona , e ain so ! An ef oona dohn change oona sinful way , oona gwine git kill op jes like dem .
42013004	An oona memba bout dem eighteen people ta Siloam , wa git kill op wen de towa fall pontop um ? Wa oona tink bout dat ? Oona tink dat dey dead like dat cause dey done ebil mo den de oda res wa lib een Jerusalem , ainty ?
42013005	No , A da tell oona , ef oona dohn change oona sinful way , oona gwine git kill op jes like dem . ”
42013006	Jedus tell um a paable . E say , “ One man hab fig tree wa beena grow een e gyaaden . Ebry now an den e beena come look op een um fa find fig , cep no fig ain neba been dey een dat tree .
42013007	So e tell e wokman say , ‘ Dis yeah mek shree yeah dat A beena come look op een dis tree fa find fig , bot A ain neba find none dey . E ain wot nottin . Mus chop um down ! Ain mek no sense fa waste de groun . ’
42013008	Bot de wokman beg um say , ‘ Sah , do please , lef de tree dey jes til nex yeah . A gwine dig roun um an pit fertiliza ta um .
42013009	Ef de tree beah fig nex yeah , well an good . Bot ef e ain beah no fig , ya kin tell me fa chop um down . ’ ”
42013010	One Jew Woshup Day , Jedus beena laan de people een one Jew meetin house .
42013011	One ooman been dey wa hab a ebil sperit dat done mek um sick fa eighteen yeah . Cause ob dat , de ooman been bend oba an e ain able fa stanop scraight .
42013012	Wen Jedus shim , e call um fa come ta um . E tell um say , “ Sista , fom now on , ya ain gwine be sick wid dis no mo ! ”
42013013	Jedus pit e two han pon dat ooman , an tareckly e stanop . E back scraighten op , an de ooman praise God .
42013014	De leada ob de meetin house been mad down cause Jedus mek de sick ooman well pon de Woshup Day . E tell de people say , “ Six day we spose fa wok , so oona oughta come pon one dem day fa hab Jedus heal oona . Mus dohn come pon de Woshup Day ! ”
42013015	De Lawd ansa um say , “ Oona hypicrit ! Pon da Woshup Day oona ontie oona ox or mule fom de stable , tek um fa drink wata , ainty ?
42013016	Dis ooman , e one ob Abraham chullun . Satan done bine um down sick dese las eighteen yeah . Ain A oughta heal dis ooman pon de Woshup Day too ? ”
42013017	Wen Jedus tell um dis , wa e say mek all dem wa been ginst um shame . An all de oda res de people rejaice cause ob all de great ting dem Jedus beena do .
42013018	Jedus say , “ Wa e like wen God da rule ? Wa ting A gwine tek fa sho how e stan ?
42013019	Wen God da rule , e stan like one leeleetle mustard seed dat a man tek an plant een e gyaaden . De seed grow til e ton ta a tree , an de bod dem come an mek nes pon e limb . ”
42013020	Jedus tell um gin say , “ Wa ting A gwine tek fa sho how e stan wen God da rule ?
42013021	E stan like yeast wa a ooman tek an mix um wid a big sack ob flour til de whole dough rise op . ”
42013022	Wiles Jedus beena head fa Jerusalem , e beena laan de people een dem town an settlement weh e pass shru .
42013023	Somebody aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , e jes a few people wa God gwine sabe ? ”
42013024	E say , “ De door ta de place weh God da rule , e leeleetle fa true . Oona mus do de bes ya kin fa go shru um an go eenside . Cause A da tell oona say , plenty people gwine try fa go eenside weh God da rule an dey ain gwine be able fa go shru de door .
42013025	De time gwine come wen de one wa de house blongst ta gwine git op an lock de door . Den oona gwine stanop outside de door an knock , say , ‘ Lawd , Lawd , do please , open de door fa we ! ’ De Lawd gwine ansa say , ‘ A ain know oona . An A ain know weh oona come fom ! ’
42013026	Den oona gwine say , ‘ We done nyam an drink longside ya . Ya done laan de people een de screet weh we lib at ! ’
42013027	De Lawd gwine ansa gin say , ‘ A ain know oona . A ain know weh oona come fom . All oona wickity people , git way fom me ! ’
42013028	Oona gwine see Abraham , Isaac , Jacob an all de prophet dem eenside de place weh God da rule . Bot oona gwine cry an gnash ya teet , cause dey gwine chunk oona out .
42013029	People gwine come fom all oba de wol , fom de east an de west , fom de nort an de sout . Dey gwine come ta de table fa feas een de place weh God da rule .
42013030	Den fa true some dem wa las now , dey gwine be fus , an some dem wa fus now , dey gwine be las . ”
42013031	Same time , some Pharisee come ta Jedus an tell um say , “ Ya mus go way fom yah , cause Herod da scheme fa kill ya . ”
42013032	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dat man Herod like a fox . Oona go tell um A say , ‘ A da dribe out ebil sperit an heal sick people taday an demarra . Wen dat time done pass , atta shree day , A gwine be shru wid me wok yah . ’
42013033	Stillyet , A haffa be pon me way ta Jerusalem taday an demarra an de nex day . Jerusalem weh dey da kill de prophet dem , ainty ?
42013034	“ O Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Oona kill de prophet dem an chunk rock til oona kill dem wa God sen ta oona ! Hommuch time A been wahn fa geda oona people togeda roun me , jes like a hen geda e biddy dem ondaneet e wing ! Bot oona people ain wahn me fa do dat !
42013035	So God gwine lef de place weh oona dey . A da tell oona , oona ain gwine see me gin til de time come wen oona gwine say , ‘ God bless de one dat e done sen , dat come een de Lawd name . ’ ”
42014001	One Jew Woshup Day Jedus gone fa nyam dinna ta one de Pharisee leada dem house . An de people wa been dey beena watch Jedus fa see wa e gwine do .
42014002	One sick man come ta Jedus wa hab de dropsy . E han an e foot been swell op .
42014003	Jedus aks de Jew Law teacha dem an de Pharisee dem say , “ De Law say weza or no ya kin heal poson pon de Woshup Day ? ”
42014004	Bot de Law teacha dem an de Pharisee dem ain crack e teet . Jedus heal de sick man , an sen um pon e way .
42014005	Den Jedus aks de leada dem say , “ Sposin one ob oona hab a mule eeda a ox wa fall een de well pon de Woshup Day . Wa ya gwine do ? Ya gwine mek hace an pull um outta de well , ainty ? ”
42014006	Dem leada ain been able fa say nottin ginst wa Jedus tell um .
42014007	Jedus see dat some de compny wa been aks fa come ta dinna been go ta de bes place ta de table fa nyam . Cause ob dat , e tell um one paable .
42014008	E say , “ Wen dey eenbite one ob oona ta a marry feas , ya mus dohn go ta de front ob de room fa nyam . Cause ef dat place been sabe fa somebody else een some mo high op position den ya ,
42014009	wen dat poson come , de poson wa been eenbite ya , e gwine haffa come tell ya say , ‘ Mus git op , leh dis man yah hab dat place ! ’ Den ya gwine be too shame , an ya gwine haffa go tek a place een de back ob de room .
42014010	Steada dat , wen dey eenbite ya ta de marry feas , go seddown een de back . Den wen de poson wa eenbite ya come ta ya , e gwine tell ya say , ‘ Me fren , moob on op ta de front weh e mo betta . ’ All dem oda people dey een de marry feas gwine see dat ya git hona .
42014011	Cause dem wa pit deysef op high , God gwine bring um down low fa mek um humble , an dem wa humble , God gwine hona dem mo den all . ”
42014012	Den Jedus tell de man wa eenbite um say , “ Wen ya hab dinna eeda a big feas , mus dohn eenbite ya fren dem , ya broda dem , ya kin , needa ya rich neighba dem . Cause den dey gwine eenbite ya back ta dey house fa nyam , an wen dey eenbite ya back , ya done git ya payback .
42014013	Bot wen ya hab feas , mus eenbite dem wa ain got much , dem wa cripple op , an dem wa ain able fa waak good , an dem wa bline .
42014014	Dem people ain able fa gii ya de payback fa de good ya done fa um . Bot God gwine bless ya fa dat good ya done . E gwine gii ya de payback pon de day wen dem dat done wa God say gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ”
42014015	One dem wa beena nyam ta de table wid Jedus yeh wa e say . Dat man tell Jedus say , “ Dem dat gwine be ta de big feas wen God da rule , dey sho gwine be bless ! ”
42014016	Jedus ansa um say , “ One time one man beena mek a big feas , an e eenbite plenty compny fa come .
42014017	Wen de time come dat de food been ready fa nyam , e sen e wokman fa go ta dem people dat e been eenbite , tell um say , ‘ Come ta de feas . Ebryting done ready now ! ’
42014018	Bot all dem staat fa mek scuse , say dey ain able fa go nyam now . De fus one say , ‘ A jes buy a piece ob lan , an A haffa go fa look um oba . Do please , tell ya bossman A saary A ain able fa come nyam wid um . ’
42014019	Noda one say , ‘ A jes buy ten oxen , an A da gwine fa try um fa see how dey da wok . Do please , tell ya bossman A saary A ain able fa come nyam wid um . ’
42014020	Noda say , ‘ A jes git marry . Cause ob dat , A ain able fa come nyam wid um . ’
42014021	De wokman gone back an tell e bossman all wa dey say . De bossman been too bex , an e tell e wokman say , ‘ Ron quick ! Go ta de main screet an de back screet een de town . Bring yah de people wa ain got nottin , de cripple op , an dem wa ain able fa waak good , an dem wa bline . ’
42014022	Wen de wokman come back , e tell e bossman say , ‘ Sah , A done do all wa ya tell me fa do . Stillyet , plenty room lef dey fa mo people . ’
42014023	De bossman tell um say , ‘ Go ta de main highway an de back road wa go ta dem settlement an mek de people dey come yah fa full op me house !
42014024	A da tell oona fa true , ain none dem people dat A been eenbite fus fa come nyam wid me gwine taste one leetle bit ob de food wa A fix fa de feas ! ’ ”
42014025	Plenty people beena trabel long wid Jedus . E ton roun an taak ta dem .
42014026	E tell um say , “ Whosoneba wahn fa be me ciple mus lob me mo den e lob e fada an e modda . E mus lob me mo den e wife an e chullun , e broda an e sista dem . E mus lob me mo den e lob e own sef . Ef e ain lob me like dat , e ain able fa be me ciple .
42014027	Whosoneba dohn tote e own cross an come folla hine me , dat poson cyahn be me ciple .
42014028	“ Ef one ob oona wahn fa mek a towa fa nyuse fa watch oba ya fiel , fus ya gwine seddown an figga hommuch e gwine cost . Ya gwine see ef ya got nuff money fa build all de towa .
42014029	Ef ya ain do dat , an ya lay de foundation an den ya ain able fa git shru build de towa , den ebrybody gwine mek fun ob ya .
42014030	Dey gwine say , ‘ Dis man staat fa mek e towa , bot e ain able fa finish um ! ’
42014031	“ An sposin one king hab ten tousan sodja an e gwine out fa fight noda king wa come ginst um wid twenty tousan . Dat king haffa fus seddown an figga ef e an e sodja dem scrong nuff fa fight dem twenty tousan .
42014032	Ef e ain scrong nuff fa fight um , fo de oda king an e sodja dem git close ta e country , e gwine sen e messenja dem ta de oda king , meet um an tell um say , ‘ We ain wahn fa fight ginst oona . Leh we see how we kin settle dis ting . ’ ”
42014033	Den Jedus say , “ Same fashion , ain none ob oona kin be me ciple ef e ain hab de mind fa lef ebryting wa e got .
42014034	“ Salt taste good een oona mout , bot ef de salt done loss e taste , ain no way oona kin mek um git e good taste back .
42014035	Dat salt ain no good fa de groun , needa fa mek fertiliza . E ain good fa nottin bot fa chunk out . Oona got yea fa yeh , ainty ? Den oona mus yeh wa A da say ! ”
42015001	A heapa people come geda roun Jedus fa yeh wa e say . Dem wa geda tax come an dem oda Jew people dat de Jew dem ain neba mix op wid cause dey ain keep all de Jew Law .
42015002	Dat mek de Pharisee dem an de Law teacha dem staat fa mek chaage say , “ Dis man Jedus da mix op wid bad people , an e eben da nyam wid um ! ”
42015003	So Jedus tell um one paable .
42015004	E say , “ Sposin a hundud sheep blongst ta one ob oona . Ef one ob dem sheep git loss , wa ya fa do ? Sho nuff , ya gwine lef de ninety-nine wa safe een de fiel , an ya gwine saach fa de one wa loss til ya find um , ainty ?
42015005	Wen ya done find um , ya gwine be too glad , so ya gwine pit um cross ya shoulda .
42015006	Wen ya git home , ya gwine hail ya fren dem an ya neighba dem , geda um roun an say , ‘ A been loss one ob me sheep , an A saach fa um til now A done find um . Come , we gwine rejaice an mek merry ! ’
42015007	A da tell oona , same fashion , dem wa een heaben rejaice wensoneba eben jes one sinna change e way an do wa God wahn um fa do . Fa true , dey gwine rejaice fa dat one mo den fa ninety-nine oda res wa tink say dey ain haffa change dey way .
42015008	“ Same way , sposin a ooman hab ten piece ob silba money . Ef one ob dem git loss , wa e gwine do ? Sho nuff e gwine light de lamp an sweep de house good fashion . E gwine saach ebryweh til e find um , ainty ?
42015009	Den , wen e done find um , e gwine hail e fren an neighba dem . E gwine tell um say , ‘ A been hab ten piece ob silba money an A loss one . A saach fa um til now A done find um . Come , we gwine rejaice an mek merry ! ’
42015010	A da tell oona fa true , jes like dey all rejaice wen dat ooman find e money , same fashion , God angel dem da rejaice tommuch wen eben jes one sinna change e sinful way an do wa God wahn um fa do . ”
42015011	Den Jedus tell um say , “ One man been hab two son .
42015012	De nyounga son say , ‘ Fada , mus gii me me share ob de propaty wa A spose fa hab . ’ So de man wide op e propaty tween e two son dem .
42015013	Ain long atta dat , de nyounga son sell all e hab . E tek e money an e gone ta a place way off . E ron roun dey da lib loose life , an e shrow way all e money .
42015014	Atta e done spen all e hab , a dry drought come shru oba all dat place an de people ain hab nottin fa nyam . Hongry come ta dat son doorstep . E ain hab nottin .
42015015	So e gone fa wok fa a man een dat country , an de man sen um ta e fiel fa mind de pig dem .
42015016	E been so hongry dat e been wahn fa nyam de pig slop . Bot nobody ain gim nottin fa nyam .
42015017	Wen e come ta e sense , e say ta esef , ‘ All dem wa wok fa me fada hab mo den nuff food fa nyam , an A yah da staab !
42015018	A gwine git op an go ta me fada an tell um say , “ Fada , A done sin ginst God an ginst ya .
42015019	Cause ob wa A done , A ain fit fa ya fa call me ya son no mo . Ya mus treat me same like ya da treat ya wokman dem . ” ’
42015020	So de son git op , an e gone back ta e fada .
42015021	E son tell um , ‘ Fada , A done sin ginst God an ginst ya . A ain fit fa ya fa call me ya son no mo . ’
42015022	Bot e fada tell e wokman dem say , ‘ Mek hace an git de bes cloes fa me son fa weah . Pit a ring pon e finga , an pit shoe pon e foot .
42015023	Den , oona gwine go git de bes calf an kill um so we kin hab a feas an mek merry .
42015024	Cause dis son yah ob mine been dead , bot now e da lib gin . E been loss , bot we done find um . ’ So dey staat fa hab a feas an mek merry .
42015025	“ Same time , de man fusbon son been een de fiel . Wen e git close ta de house , e yeh music an de people da dance .
42015026	So e call one de wokman an aks um say , ‘ Wa gwine on yah ? ’
42015027	De wokman tell um say , ‘ Ya broda done come home , an ya fada kill e bes calf an hab feas , cause e been git e son back . Ya broda been loss , bot now e home safe an soun . ’
42015028	De big broda been so mad til e ain wahn eben fa go eenside de house . So e fada gone out an beg um fa come een .
42015029	Bot e ansa e fada say , ‘ See yah , all dese yeah A beena wok haad like a slabe fa ya , an A da pay ya mind all de time . Stillyet , ya ain neba gii me eben a leetle goat fa hab feas wid me fren dem .
42015030	Bot dis yah son , ya son wa waste all ya money an ron roun wid loose ooman , wen e come home , ya kill de bes calf fa um ! ’
42015031	E fada tell um say , ‘ Me son , ya dey yah wid me all de time , an all wa A got blongst ta ya .
42015032	Bot we right fa feas an mek merry , cause ya broda done been dead , an now e da lib gin . E been loss , bot we done find um . ’ ”
42016001	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ One time a rich man hab one wokman een chaage ob e propaty . Dat rich man yeh say dat de wokman ain been scraight , dat e beena loss e bossman money .
42016002	De rich man call de wokman an aks um say , ‘ Wa dis A yeh bout ya ? Gii me de book weh ya da write all dat ya done tek een an all wa ya done spen . Cause ya ain gwine hab chaage oba me propaty no mo . ’
42016003	De wokman een chaage say ta esef , ‘ Wa A gwine do now ? Me bossman ain gwine leh me wok fa um no mo . A ain scrong nuff fa dig ditch , an A too shame fa beg .
42016004	Now den , A know wa A gwine do so dat people gwine eenbite me ta dey house atta A done loss me job . ’
42016005	So de wokman sen an call fa all de people wa owe e bossman , one atta de oda . Wen dey come , e aks de fus one say , ‘ Hommuch ya owe me bossman ? ’
42016006	E ansa say , ‘ A hundud barrel ob olib oll . ’ De one een chaage tell um say , ‘ Yah ya bill . Seddown quick an change de one hundud wa done been write down dey ta fifty . ’
42016007	Den de wokman een chaage aks noda one say , ‘ Hommuch ya owe me bossman ? ’ Dat one ansa , ‘ A owe um one tousan bushel ob wheat . ’ De one een chaage tell um say , ‘ Yah ya bill . Change de one tousan wa write down dey ta eight hundud . ’
42016008	“ Now den , de bossman say de ceitful wokman een chaage hab heapa sense . Fa true , de people wa tink all de time bout ting een dis wol , dey da tink good how fa deal wid people like deysef . Dey tink bout dat mo betta den de people wa da waak een God light . ”
42016009	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ A da tell oona , oona oughta spen money an ting een dis wol fa mek fren fa oonasef . Den wen de money an ting done gone , God gwine welcome oona eenta ya ebalastin home een heaben .
42016010	De poson dat ya kin trus fa tek chaage oba leetle bit an do good , dat de poson ya kin trus fa tek chaage an do good oba big ting . An de poson dat ain scraight bout leetle ting ain gwine do right wid big ting .
42016011	So den , ef dey ain able fa trus oona wid money an ting een dis wol , ain nobody gwine trus oona wid ting dat walyable fa true , ainty ?
42016012	Ef dey ain able fa trus oona wid oda poson propaty , ain nobody gwine gii ya propaty fa ya own , ainty dough ?
42016013	“ One wokman ain able fa saab two massa . Ef e da try fa do dat , e gwine hate one an lob de oda one . E gwine be true ta one an hole de oda one cheap . Ya ain able fa saab God an be a slabe ta money same time . ”
42016014	Wen de Pharisee dem yeh wa Jedus say , dey suck dey teet an shrow slam pon um , cause dey lob money a whole heap .
42016015	Bot Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mek people tink dat oona ain da do bad . Bot God know wa dey een oona haat . Dem ting wa people say walyable fa true , dey ain wot nottin een God eye .
42016016	“ De Law wa God gii Moses an de prophet dem , dem wod hab heapa tority til John wa Bactize come long . Fom dat time , dey da preach de Good Nyews bout how God da come fa rule , an all de people da do dey bes fa hab God fa rule oba um .
42016017	Bot e mo easy fa mek heaben an de whole wol disappeah den fa mek one leetle paat ob God Law loss wa e mean .
42016018	“ A man wa worce e wife an gone marry noda ooman da lib een sin . Same fashion , a man wa gone marry ooman wa done been worce da lib een sin . ”
42016019	“ One time dey been a rich man wa dress fa beat de ban , an e hab feas an joy esef tommuch ebry day .
42016020	An one po man name Lazarus lib dey too . E been kiba wid sore . E ain able eben fa waak roun . An ebry day , dey come bring Lazarus , leddown ta dat rich man door .
42016021	Lazarus beena wahn fa nyam de scrap ob food wa lef oba , wa fall fom de table wen de rich man beena nyam . Pontop ob dat , de dog dem beena come long dey an lick dat po man sore .
42016022	“ Den dat po man pass oba . God angel cyaa um fa seddown longside de ole people leada , Abraham , een heaben . De rich man pass oba too , an e git bury .
42016023	E gone ta hell , an e beena suffa tommuch oba dey . E raise e eye an see Abraham way off , an Lazarus been longside um .
42016024	So de rich man hail Abraham say , ‘ Fada Abraham ! Hab mussy pon me ! Sen Lazarus fa me . Mek um pit e leetle finga een wata an come yah fa tetch me tongue an cool um off , cause A da suffa tommuch eenside dis yah fire ! ’
42016025	“ Bot Abraham tell um say , ‘ Me son , memba wen ya beena lib oba dey een de wol , ya beena joy yasef . Ya done git ya paat . Ya git all ya good ting fo ya pass oba . Same time Lazarus done git all de bad ting dem . Bot now e da joy esef yah an ya da suffa .
42016026	Fodamo , dey a deep deep ditch tween we an oona . Cause ob dat , dem wa wahn fa cross oba fom yah ta oona side ain able fa go , an dem ta oona side ain able fa cross ta yah weh we at . ’
42016027	“ De rich man say , ‘ Well den , Fada Abraham , A beg ya , sen Lazarus ta me fada house .
42016028	A hab me fibe broda oba dey . Leh Lazarus go fa waan um . Leh Lazarus tell um say dat dey mus dohn lib de way A done lib een de wol . Den wen dey pass oba , dey ain haffa come yah ta dis place weh A da suffa tommuch . ’
42016029	“ Bot Abraham tell um say , ‘ Ya broda dem hab de Book wa Moses an de prophet dem been write . Dem wod dey fa waan um . Leh um yeh an pay mind . ’
42016030	“ De rich man ansa say , ‘ No , dat ain nuff , Fada Abraham . Me broda dem ain gwine listen ta wa Moses an de prophet dem done say een dem Book . Bot ef somebody wa done dead go fa waan um , dey gwine change dey sinful way an do wa God wahn um fa do . ’
42016031	“ Bot Abraham tell um say , ‘ Ef ya broda dem ain listen ta wa Moses an de prophet dem done say een de Book , dey ain gwine pay mind ta somebody wa done dead , wa gone back een de wol fa waan um . Dey ain gwine change dey way . ’ ”
42017001	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Fa true , ting gwine happen wa mek people do bad . Bot de poson wa mek dem ting happen gwine hab plenty trouble !
42017002	E mo betta fa dat poson ef dey tie a big grine stone roun e neck an chunk um eenta de sea . E mo betta ef e drown een de wata like dat den ef e mek one ob dem leetle one do bad .
42017003	So den , tek cyah wa ya do !
42017004	Eben ef e do ya bad seben time een one day , ef e ton back ebry time , come tell ya say , ‘ A saary an A ain gwine do ya bad no mo , ’ mus paadon um . ”
42017005	Jedus postle dem tell um say , “ Lawd , hep we bleebe God mo den we bleebe now . ”
42017006	De Lawd ansa um say , “ Ef oona bleebe een God , eben ef ya fait jes leetle like one leeleetle mustard seed , ya kin tell dis tree , ‘ Tek yasef outta de groun an go stanop an grow een de sea ! ’ Eben dough ya fait ain no bigga den de mustard seed , dat mulberry tree gwine pay ya mind . E gwine do wa ya say . ”
42017007	“ Sposin one ob oona hab wokman wa da plow een de fiel or e da mind ya sheep . Wen de wokman come fom e wok , wa ya gwine tell um ? Fa true , ya ain gwine tell um say , ‘ Mus hurry op . Come seddown an nyam . ’
42017008	No ! Fa sho ya gwine tell de wokman say , ‘ Go cook me suppa . Git yasef ready an pit de food pon de table . Atta A done shru nyam an drink , den ya kin hab sompin fa nyam an drink . ’
42017009	De massa ain gwine praise de wokman jes cause dat wokman done wa e tell um fa do , ainty ?
42017010	Oona stan jes so . Wen oona done do all wa de massa tell oona fa do , oona mus say , ‘ We jes wokman . We ain desaab no praise , cause we jes done wa we spose fa do . ’ ”
42017011	Pon e way ta Jerusalem , Jedus gone long shru de arie tween Samaria an Galilee .
42017012	Wen Jedus git close ta one settlement , e meet ten man wa been sick een dey skin wid leposy . Dem man beena stan faa way .
42017013	Dey holla say , “ Jedus ! Massa ! Hab mussy pon we ! ”
42017014	Jedus shim an tell um say , “ Oona go ta de Jew priest dem . Leh dem xamine oona . ”
42017015	Wen one ob dem see dat e done been heal , e come back ta Jedus . E holla , da praise God .
42017016	E git down pon de groun een front ob Jedus foot an e tank um . An dat man been fom Samaria .
42017017	Jedus say , “ A done mek ten man clean , ainty ? Weh de oda nine dem ?
42017018	Hoccome ain nobody ton back fa tank God cep dis one man wa ain one ob we Jew people ? Hoccome de oda Jew man dem ain come back ? ”
42017019	Jedus tell de man say , “ Git op an go home . Cause ya bleebe een me , ya done git heal . ”
42017020	Some Pharisee aks Jedus wen God gwine come fa rule . Jedus ansa um say , “ Wen God come fa rule , oona ain gwine see no sign fa sho dat .
42017021	Ain nobody gwine say , ‘ Look yah , dey e dey dey ! ’ Needa , ‘ Look yonda ! ’ Cause God da rule mongst oona . ”
42017022	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ De time gwine come wen oona gwine wahn bad fa see de Man wa Come fom God come back , eben ef e jes fa one day . Bot oona ain gwine shim .
42017023	People gwine tell oona say , ‘ Look yonda , oba dey de Man wa Come fom God ! ’ Oda gwine say , ‘ Look yah , e dey dey ! ’ Mus dohn go long wid um . Mus dohn folla um .
42017024	Wen de Man wa Come fom God come back ta de wol , ebrybody gwine be able fa shim , jes like lightnin dat flash cross de sky an light um op fom one side ta de oda .
42017025	Bot fo dis happen , e haffa suffa plenty ting , an de people wa lib taday ain gwine hab nottin fa do wid um .
42017026	Jes like how e been een Noah time , dat de way e gwine be wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back .
42017027	Een Noah time , de people beena nyam an drink an git marry op . Dey beena lib dat same way til dat day wen Noah gone eenside de ark . Den de big rain come , an all dem outside de ark git kill op een dat wata wa kiba um all op .
42017028	Same way , een Lot time , de people beena nyam an drink . Dey beena buy an sell . Dey beena plant crop an build house .
42017029	Bot de day wen Lot lef out fom Sodom , fire an sulfa stone come down fom heaben like rain an stroy all de people dey .
42017030	Dat so e gwine be dat day wen de Man wa Come fom God gwine come back ta de wol .
42017031	“ Dat day dey , de poson wa dey pontop e house mus dohn tek time fa go down eenside e house fa geda e ting . Same way , de poson wa dey een e fiel , e mus dohn ton back ta e house .
42017032	Oona memba wa happen ta Lot wife !
42017033	Whosoneba da try fa sabe e life , e gwine loss e true life . Bot de poson wa loss e life cause ob me , e gwine hab de true life .
42017034	A da tell oona , dat night dey gwine be two people da sleep een de same bed . Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one .
42017035	Two ooman gwine be togeda , da grine meal . Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one . [
42017036	Two man gwine be een de fiel , da wok . Angel gwine come tek one an lef de oda one . ] ”
42017037	Jedus ciple dem aks um say , “ Lawd , weh dem ting gwine happen ? ”
42018001	Jedus tell e ciple dem one paable fa laan um dat dey mus pray all de time ta God an mus bleebe dat God gwine ansa um .
42018002	Jedus say , “ Dey been a jedge een one town . Dat jedge ain been scaid ob God , an e ain pay people no mind .
42018003	One wida ooman been dey een dat same town . Dis ooman beena go ta de jedge all de time an tell um say , ‘ Mus please gii me wa right . Mus hep me ginst de one wa done me wrong . ’
42018004	Fa a long time , de ooman come ta de jedge , bot de jedge ain done nottin . Bot atta wile e say ta esef , ‘ Fa true , A ain scaid ob God , an A ain pay people no mind .
42018005	Bot cause dis ooman da bodda me all de time , A gwine gim wa right . Ef A ain do dat , e gwine keep on da come ta me til e weah me out ! ’ ”
42018006	An de Lawd say , “ Oona yeh wa de jedge wa ain scraight say .
42018007	Now den , fa true , God gwine do wa right fa e people , dem dat e done pick an wa da aks um een de day time an een de night time fa hep um , ainty ? De Lawd ain gwine be slow fa ansa um , ainty ?
42018008	A da tell oona , God gwine mek hace fa do wa right fa um ! Stillyet , wen de Man wa Come fom God come back gin , A wonda ef e gwine meet anybody een de wol wa bleebe een um ! ”
42018009	Jedus tell one paable ta de people dem wa tink dat dey beena do right an hole all de oda people cheap .
42018010	E say , “ One time two man gone op ta God House fa pray . One dem been a Pharisee . De oda been a man wa geda tax .
42018011	“ De Pharisee stanop an pray bout esef say , ‘ A tank ya , God , cause A ain like all dem oda people . A ain tief fom nobody . A beena waak scraight an do wa de Law say . An A ain sleep wid oda man wife . An A tank ya dat A ain eben like dat man oba yonda wa da geda tax .
42018012	Two day ebry week A da fast so A kin woshup ya betta . A tek a tent ob all wa A git an gim ta ya . ’
42018013	Bot de man wa da geda tax stan way off . E ain eben lif e eye ta heaben , cause e know e done sin . E beena beat e chest cause e too saary fa e sin . An e pray ta God say , ‘ God , hab mussy pon me , cause A a sinna ! ’ ”
42018014	Jedus tell de people say , “ Wen dat man gone back home , God done fagib um fa de ebil e done , an e stan right wid God . Bot God ain paadon de Pharisee . Cause dem wa pit deysef op , God gwine bring um down . Bot dem wa tek low , God gwine raise um op mo den all . ”
42018015	Some people beena bring dey baby ta Jedus fa hab um pit e han pon dey head an bless um . Wen Jedus ciple dem shim , dey buke dem people fa do dat .
42018016	Bot Jedus call de chullun . E tell e ciple dem say , “ Oona mus dohn stop de chullun . Leh um come ta me . Cause de people wa like dese chullun yah gwine hab God rule oba um .
42018017	A da tell oona fa true , de poson wa ain gree like a leeleetle chile fa leh God rule oba um , dat poson ain neba gwine hab God fa e King . ”
42018018	One Jew leada come aks Jedus say , “ Good Teacha , wa A mus do fa git ebalastin life ? ”
42018019	Jedus ansa um say , “ Hoccome ya da say A good ? Ain nobody good cep fa God .
42018020	Ya know wa God Law chaage we fa do . ‘ Mus dohn sleep wid oda man wife . Mus dohn kill nobody . Mus dohn tief . Mus dohn tell lie pon nobody . Mus pay mind ta ya fada an ya modda . ’ ”
42018021	De leada tell Jedus say , “ A done keep all dem law fom wen A been a boy . ”
42018022	Wen Jedus yeh wa de leada say , e tell um , “ Stillyet ya mus do one mo ting . Mus go sell ebryting ya got an gii de money ta de people wa ain got nottin . Ef ya do dat , ya gwine hab tredja een heaben . Atta ya done gii way ya money , come folla me . ”
42018023	Wen dat leada yeh wa Jedus say , e been sad , cause e been too rich .
42018024	Jedus see de man been too sad an e say , “ Fa true e ain easy eben a leetle bit fa rich people fa leh God rule oba um .
42018025	E mo easy fa mek de camel go shru a needle eye den fa a rich man fa come onda God rule . ”
42018026	De people wa yeh wa Jedus say , aks um , “ Den who dat kin git sabe ? ”
42018027	Jedus ansa say , “ God able fa do wa people ain able fa do . ”
42018028	Den Peter say , “ Look yah ! We done lef ebryting fa folla ya . ”
42018029	Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , ebrybody wa lef e house , or e wife , or e broda dem , or e modda or e fada , or e chullun so dat e kin leh God rule oba um , dat one gwine git plenty mo fom God .
42018030	Een dis time yah , God gwine gim plenty mo den wa e done lef fa folla God . An God gwine gim ebalastin life een de wol dat gwine come . ”
42018031	Jedus tek de tweb ciple dem ta one side an tell um say , “ Listen , we da gwine op ta Jerusalem . All de ting dem de prophet dem done write bout de Man wa Come fom God gwine happen fa true .
42018032	Dey gwine han um oba ta de people wa ain bleebe pon God . Dem people gwine shrow slam at um . Dey gwine hole um cheap an spit pon um .
42018033	Dey gwine whip um an den dey gwine kill um . Bot atta shree day , de Man wa Come fom God gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ”
42018034	Bot de ciple dem ain ondastan none ob dese ting . Dey ain know wa e mean . Dey ain know wa e beena taak bout .
42018035	Wen Jedus git close ta Jericho , a bline eye man been dey , da seddown side de road , an e beena beg .
42018036	Wen de bline man yeh de crowd da pass , e aks de people say , “ Wa gwine on ? ”
42018037	Dey tell um , “ Jedus fom Nazareth da pass long dis way . ”
42018038	Wen de bline man yeh dat , e holla say , “ Jedus , Son ob David , hab mussy pon me ! ”
42018039	De people wa beena lead de crowd buke de man , tell um e mus hush op e mout . Bot de man holla mo louda say , “ Son ob David , hab mussy pon me ! ”
42018040	Jedus stop dey , an e chaage de people fa bring de bline man ta um . Wen e git close ta Jedus , Jedus aks um say ,
42018041	“ Wa ya wahn me fa do fa ya ? ”
42018042	Jedus tell de man say , “ A da mek ya see . Cause ya bleebe een me , ya done git well ! ”
42018043	Dat same time de man been able fa see . E folla longside Jedus , da praise God . Wen de crowd shim , dey all praise God too .
42019001	Jedus done gone eenta Jericho an beena pass shru dey .
42019002	One man been dey name Zacchaeus . E been a head man ob dem wa da geda tax , an e hab a heapa money .
42019003	Zacchaeus beena try fa see Jedus , bot e ain been able fa shim cause e been a shot man an e ain been able fa see oba de crowd wa been roun Jedus .
42019004	So Zacchaeus ron head ob de crowd an climb op a sycamo tree fa hab chance fa see Jedus , wa been gwine come long dat way .
42019005	Wen Jedus git ta de tree weh Zacchaeus been , e look op an tell um say , “ Hurry op an come down , Zacchaeus , cause A haffa stay ta ya house taday . ”
42019006	Zacchaeus come down quick . E tek Jedus ta e house an gim haaty welcome .
42019007	All de people wa shim een Zacchaeus house staat fa grumble say , “ Jedus gone fa stay ta de house ob a man wa ain keep de Jew Law . ”
42019008	Zacchaeus stanop an tell de Lawd say , “ Look , Lawd ! A gwine gii haf ob ebryting A got ta de po people . An ef A done tief fom anybody , A gwine gim back fo time wa A done tief fom um . ”
42019009	Jedus tell um , “ Taday God done sabe dis man an e fambly . Dis man one ob Abraham chullun too .
42019010	Cause de Man wa Come fom God , e come fa saach fa people wa loss , an sabe um . ”
42019011	De people beena listen ta wa Jedus say . E been mos ta Jerusalem now , an dey beena tink say dat dey gwine see God come down an rule tareckly . So den , Jedus tell um one paable .
42019012	E say , “ One time one man wa fom a king fambly beena gwine ta a country faa way fa leh dem mek um king an den e gwine come back home gin .
42019013	Fo de man lef , e call ten ob e wokman dem an gim each a gole coin . E tell um say , ‘ See hommuch ya kin mek wid dis money fo A come back . ’
42019014	“ Now den , de people wa lib een dat country been hate um . Dey sen messenja dem atta um fa say , ‘ We ain wahn dis man fa rule oba we . ’
42019015	“ Bot de man git mek king ob dey country , an e come back ta e house . Tareckly e sen fa e ten wokman dem fa come tell um hommuch money dey been mek wid e gole coin .
42019016	De fus wokman come an say , ‘ Sah , A done mek ten mo gole coin wid de one wa ya gii me . ’
42019017	De king tell um say , ‘ Ya done good . Ya a good wokman . Cause A able fa trus ya fa do a leetle job , A gwine mek ya rula oba ten city . ’
42019018	De secon wokman come ta de king an say , ‘ Sah , A done mek fibe mo gole coin wid de one wa ya gii me . ’
42019019	De king tell um say , ‘ Ya gwine rule oba fibe city . ’
42019020	Oda wokman come ta de king say , ‘ Sah , yah de one gole coin wa ya been gii me . A been tie um op een a hankachief fa keep um safe .
42019021	A been scaid ob ya cause ya a haad man . Ya da tek dat wa ain ya own an ya da haabis wa ya ain plant ! ’
42019022	De king tell um say , ‘ Ya a good fa nottin wokman . De wod wa ya own mout done taak A gwine nyuse fa condemn ya ! Ya know A a haad man , ainty ? A da tek dat wa ain me own an A da haabis wa A ain plant .
42019023	Ya oughta hab pit me money een de bank , an den wen A come back , leas A been gwine hab de money an de interest e done git too . ’
42019024	Den de king tell de wokman dem wa beena stan dey , say , ‘ Oona tek de one gole coin way fom dis man an gim ta de wokman wa hab ten . ’
42019025	Dem wokman say , ‘ Sah , dat man done hab ten coin ! ’
42019026	An de king ansa say , ‘ A da tell oona say , dat ebry poson wa got sompin , God gwine gim mo . Bot de one wa ain got nottin , God gwine tek way dat leeleetle bit wa e got .
42019027	Now den , me enemy dem wa ain wahn me fa rule oba dem , fetch um yah an kill um een front ob me ! ’ ”
42019028	Atta Jedus say dat , e gone long head ob de people , da waak ta Jerusalem .
42019029	Wen e git close ta Bethphage an Bethany , dey ta de Mount Olib , e call two ob e ciple dem an e sen um on head ob um .
42019030	E tell um say , “ Oona go ta de settlement wa dey head ob oona . Wen oona go eenta de settlement , oona gwine see one nyoung donkey dat dey done tie op dey . Nobody ain neba yet ride pon dat donkey . Mus ontie um an fetch um yah .
42019031	Ef anybody aks oona hoccome ya da ontie um , ansa um say , ‘ De Lawd need um . ’ ”
42019032	De two ciple dem gone long ta de settlement an dey find ebryting jes like Jedus tell um .
42019033	Wen dey beena ontie de nyoung donkey , dem wa e blongst ta aks um say , “ Hoccome oona da ontie um ? ”
42019034	Dey ansa say , “ De Lawd need um . ”
42019035	Den dey tek de donkey ta Jedus . Dey pit dey cloes pontop de animal an hep Jedus git pon um .
42019036	Wiles Jedus beena ride long pon e way ta Jerusalem , de people spread some dey cloes pon de road fo um fa sho um hona .
42019037	Wen Jedus come fom de Mount Olib , da gwine down de hill , e come close ta Jerusalem . An all de big crowd ob people wa beena trabel long wid um staat fa rejaice an tank God . Dey beena holla ta de top ob dey boice , da praise God fa all de miracle dem wa dey beena see Jedus do .
42019038	Dey say ,
42019039	Some de Pharisee dem dey een de crowd tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , buke dem people wa da folla ya . Chaage um fa hush op dey mout ! ”
42019040	Jedus ansa um say , “ A da tell oona , ef dem people hush op dey mout , dem rock yah gwine staat fa holla ! ”
42019041	Wen Jedus git close ta de city , e shim an e staat fa cry .
42019042	E say , “ A wish oona dey een Jerusalem been know taday wa ting oona need fa hab peace ! Bot oona ain able fa shim now !
42019043	De time da come wen oona enemy dem gwine build wall roun de city . Dey gwine hab oona pen op an fence op ta ebry side so dat oona ain gwine be able fa git outta dey .
42019044	Dey gwine stroy de city an all ob oona an eben all oona chullun . Dey gwine knock all de city stone dem ta de groun . Dey ain gwine lef eben one stone weh e stan . Dey gwine do all dat cause oona ain recognize de time wen God beena come fa sabe oona ! ”
42019045	Den Jedus gone eenside God House . E staat fa dribe out dem people wa beena sell ting eenside dey .
42019046	E tell um say , “ God say een e wod , ‘ Me house gwine be place weh people pray ta me ! ’ Bot oona done ton um ta place weh tief dem da hide ! ”
42019047	Jedus beena laan de people een God House ebry day . De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem , de Jew Law teacha dem , an de oda Jew leada dem beena try fa find way fa kill Jedus .
42019048	Bot dey ain been able fa figga how fa do um , cause all de people been dey , beena geda roun Jedus fa yeh um . Dey ain been wahn fa miss eben one wod e say .
42020001	One day wiles Jedus beena laan de people an da preach de Good Nyews , de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem , de Jew Law teacha dem an de oda Jew leada dem come ta Jedus .
42020002	Dey aks um say , “ Tell we , wa gii ya de right fa do dem ting yah ? Who dat gii ya de tority ? ”
42020003	Jedus ansa um say , “ Leh me aks oona one queshon too . Oona tell me ,
42020004	wen John wa Bactize people been come yah , who dat gim de right fa bactize . Tell me , God gim de tority , or de people gim de tority ? ”
42020005	Dey staat fa aagy mongst deysef say , “ Wa we gwine ansa um ? Ef we say ‘ God gii John de tority fa bactize people , ’ e gwine say , ‘ Well den , hoccome oona ain bleebe um ? ’
42020006	Bot ef we say ‘ People gii John dat tority , ’ all dem people yah gwine chunk stone pon we , cause dey bleebe fa true dat John been a prophet . ”
42020007	So dey ansa Jedus , say dey ain know who dat gii John de tority fa bactize people .
42020008	Jedus tell um say , “ Well den , A ain needa gwine tell oona who dat gii me de tority fa do dem ting yah . ”
42020009	Jedus tell de people one paable say , “ One time one man plant some grapewine pon e faam . E hire some wokman fa tek cyah ob de faam an den e gone way ta noda country , an e stay dey a long time .
42020010	Wen de time come fa de grape haabis , de owna sen a saabant ta e faam fa fetch e share ob de haabis . Bot de wokman dem wa cyah fa e faam beat dat man wa de owna sen . Dey sen um back dout nottin .
42020011	De owna sen noda saabant fa fetch e share . Dey beat dat man too an shame um . Den dey sen um back wid nottin .
42020012	De owna sen still noda man . Dem wa cyah fa de faam beat dat one til dey hut um fa true , an dey chunk um off de faam .
42020013	De faam owna say , ‘ Wa A gwine do now ? A gwine sen me own deah son wa A lob . Dey gwine show hona ta me son . ’
42020014	Bot wen dem wa cyah fa de faam see de owna son come , dey all taak togeda say , ‘ Dis de owna son . Dis propaty yah gwine be lef ta um . Leh we kill um so dat de propaty gwine come ta we . ’
42020015	Den dey chunk de owna son off de faam , an dey kill um .
42020016	E gwine come an kill dem , an e gwine gii e faam ta oda wokman dem . ”
42020017	Jedus look scraight at um an aks um say , “ Well den , oona tell me wa dey mean wen dey write een God Book say ,
42020018	“ De poson wa faddown pon dis stone yah gwine broke op all e bone dem . An wen dis stone faddown pon a poson , e gwine mash um all op . ”
42020019	Now , dem Law teacha an dem priest leada ondastan dat Jedus been tell dat paable ginst dem . So dat same time , dey try fa ketch Jedus an hole um . Bot dey ain ketch um cause dey been scaid ob de people dey .
42020020	So dey beena watch Jedus fa try fa ketch um . Dey pay some man dem , sen um ta Jedus . De tell dem man fa mek like dey mean wa dey say fa true , an chaage um fa aks Jedus schemy queshon . Dey plan fa tek de wod wa Jedus ansa fa ketch um , say e taak bad ting . Den dey kin go cuse Jedus an tek um ta de Roman gobna , wa hab tority an powa fa jedge um .
42020021	De man dem wa dey beena pay fa ketch Jedus come ta um fa aks um schemy queshon . Dey tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , we know wa ya da say an laan we , e right fa true . We know ya da look pon all people de same . Fa true ya da teach God way . ”
42020022	Den dey aks um say , “ E right fa we fa pay tax ta de Roman rula Caesar ? Wa de Jew Law say bout dat ? ”
42020023	Bot Jedus obareach um . E been know dey beena try fa ketch um een e wod . So e chaage um say ,
42020024	“ Show me a coin . ” Wen dey show um dat money , e aks um say , “ Who dat hab e face an e name pon dis coin yah ? ”
42020025	Jedus say , “ Well den , mus gii Caesar dat wa blongst ta Caesar an gii God wa blongst ta God . ”
42020026	So den wid all de people dey , dem man ain been able fa ketch Jedus een none ob de wod wa e say . Wen Jedus ansa um so , dey been stonish down an dey hush op dey mout .
42020027	Some Sadducee come ta Jedus . De Sadducee dem bleebe dat dead people ain gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin .
42020028	Dey aks Jedus say , “ Teacha , Moses write law fa we say , ‘ Ef a man dead an lef e wife an ain hab no chullun , de man broda mus marry de wida ooman fa hab chullun een de name ob de man wa done pass oba . ’
42020029	One time dey been seben broda . De fus one marry an e pass oba . E ain lef no chullun .
42020030	De nex broda marry e broda wida ooman . An dat broda pass oba an ain lef no chullun fa e dead broda .
42020031	Den de nex broda marry de wida ooman an e pass oba . De same ting happen ta all de seben broda dem . Dey all marry dat ooman , one atta de oda , an dey all pass oba an ain hab no chullun .
42020032	Las ob all , de wida ooman esef pass oba .
42020033	All seben broda done marry dat ooman . So den , tell we , wen de time come wen de dead people gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , who dat gwine hab dat ooman fa e wife ? ”
42020034	Jedus ansa de Sadducee dem say , “ Yah een dis wol de people da git marry op .
42020035	Bot atta dey pass oba , de people dem wa God see fit fa mek um git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , dey ain fa be marry .
42020036	Dey gwine be like de angel dem , an dey cyahn dead no mo . Dey God chullun , cause dey done been dead bot now dey done git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin .
42020037	Moses eben show dat dem wa done dead git op fom de grabe an lib gin . E show dat dey een God Book , weh e write down bout de bush dat beena bun . Dey dey e call de Lawd ‘ de God ob Abraham , de God ob Isaac , an de God ob Jacob . ’
42020038	E de God ob dem wa da lib . E ain no God ob dead people . Cause ta God all people da lib . ”
42020039	Some de Law teacha dem tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , dat a good ansa ! ”
42020040	Atta dat , de people been scaid fa aks Jedus oda queshon .
42020041	Jedus aks um say , “ Hoccome people say dat de Messiah gwine be de chile ob David chullun chullun ?
42020042	Cause David done write down een de book ob Psalms say ,
42020043	til A pit ya enemy dem ondaneet ya foot . ’
42020044	David call de Messiah ‘ Lawd . ’ So den how de Messiah kin be David son ? ”
42020045	Wiles all de people beena listen , Jedus taak ta e ciple dem .
42020046	E say , “ Oona mus be on de watch fa de Law teacha dem . Dey like fa waak roun een dey long robe fa mek people say dey a big leada . An dey lob fa go ta de maakut place weh plenty people geda , so dat de people kin gim hona . Wen dey go ta de Jew meetin house , dey lob fa seddown een de bes seat . An wen dey go ta de feas , dey lob fa seddown een de place weh de big leada dem seddown .
42020047	Dem Law teacha yah tek oba wida ooman propaty an tief all dey got . An den dey stanop da pray long time so dat people kin say dey good people fa true ! God gwine punish dem mo den e gwine punish oda people . ”
42021001	Jedus been ta God House . E beena look roun , an e see de rich people come an drop dey money wa dey da gii ta God eenta de money box dey .
42021002	Same time e see one po wida ooman come too . E drop two leetle coppa coin eenta de box .
42021003	Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , dis po wida ooman yah done gii mo den all de oda people .
42021004	Cause de oda res come an gii jes a leetle bit fom all de whole heapa money dey got . Bot dis ooman wa too po done gii all de money e got fa lib off . ”
42021005	Some de ciple dem beena taak bout God House , how e stan so purty , wid e fine stone an all de ting dey wa people done gii fa God . Jedus say ,
42021006	“ Oona see all dis ? De time gwine come wen none dese stone yah wa oona da see ain gwine be lef een dey place , one pontop de oda . Ebry stone yah gwine be chunk down outta e place . ”
42021007	Dey aks Jedus say , “ Teacha , wen dat gwine happen ? Wa sign gwine show we dat time done come ? ”
42021008	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus be on de watch . Mus dohn leh nobody fool oona . Cause plenty man dem gwine come een me name . Dey gwine say , ‘ A de Messiah ! ’ An dey gwine say , ‘ De time done come ! ’ Oona mus dohn go long wid dem .
42021009	Mus dohn be scaid wen oona yeh bout waa an rebolution . Dem ting haffa happen fus , bot dat ain mean dat de end time done come . ”
42021010	Den Jedus tell um say , “ De country dem ob de wol gwine fight ginst one noda . Nation gwine scrike out ginst oda nation .
42021011	De groun gwine shake too bad . A dry drought gwine come shru an people ain gwine hab nottin fa nyam . A whole heapa people gwine git sick an dat sick gwine spread all roun . All dat gwine happen een plenty place all oba de wol . Plenty ting gwine happen fa mek people scaid ta det , an dey gwine be great ting een de sky fa sho people wa gwine come .
42021012	Bot fo all dem ting happen , de people wa hab tority gwine grab hole ta oona an do oona plenty bad ting . Dey gwine drag oona fa be jedge fo de leada dem een de Jew meetin house , an dey gwine pit oona een de jailhouse . Dey gwine bring oona fo king dem an gobna dem cause oona me ciple dem .
42021013	Dat de time dey wen oona gwine hab good chance fa tell de people de true ting wa oona know bout me .
42021014	Bot fo dey grab hole ta oona an tek oona fa be jedge , mus mek op ya mind dat ya ain gwine fret bout wa ya gwine ansa um .
42021015	Cause A gwine gii ya nuff wise wod an sense fa ansa dem . Eben oona enemy dem gwine haffa gree wid wa ya tell um .
42021016	Bot eben ya modda an fada , ya broda dem , ya fambly , an ya fren dem gwine han ya oba ta de tority fa tek ya fo de jedge . An dem tority gwine kill some ob oona .
42021017	All de people gwine hate oona cause oona bleebe een me .
42021018	Stillyet , ain eben one hair een oona head gwine be loss .
42021019	Mus stan firm , an oona gwine git true life .
42021020	“ Bot wen oona see de aamy dem da geda all roun Jerusalem , oona gwine know dat de time done come wen dat city gwine be stroy .
42021021	Dat de time wen de people een Judea mus ron way quick ta de hill country . Dem een de city ob Jerusalem mus lef dey , an dem wa out een de country mus dohn go eenta dat city .
42021022	Cause dat de time dey wen God gwine punish de people an do all dat de prophet dem done write down een God Book .
42021023	Dat time gwine be mighty haad fa ooman dem wa een de fambly way an dem wa hab leetle baby ! De people een dis lan gwine suffa too bad . God gwine show dat e bex fa true an punish dis people .
42021024	Some dem gwine git kill wid de sode . Oda dem gwine git ketch an be prisona , an oda people gwine cyaa um way ta all de diffunt country dem . De people fom dem oda lan gwine tek chaage oba Jerusalem , trample um down all oba til de time come fa dem people wa ain Jew fa loss dey powa .
42021025	“ Scrange ting gwine happen ta de sun an de moon an de staa fa sho people wa da come . A whole heapa people een plenty place een dis wol ain gwine know wa fa do . Dey gwine be scaid fa true wen dey see de salt wata git rough an de swellin ob dat tide wata roll like tunda .
42021026	People gwine pass out . Dey gwine be scaid ta det , wiles dey da wait fa see wa gwine happen ta all de wol . De powa wa dey een de eliment gwine shake an moob outta dey place weh dey spose fa be .
42021027	Dat de time wen de people gwine see de Man wa Come fom God da come down een a cloud eenta de wol . E gwine hab great powa , an a too bright light gwine shine roun um .
42021028	Wen oona see dem ting staat fa happen , oona oughta stanop . Look op ta God , cause e gwine sabe oona soon . ”
42021029	Jedus tell um a paable , say , “ Look at de fig tree an all de oda tree dem .
42021030	Wen oona see dem leaf da buss open , oona know dat summa gwine come soon , ainty ?
42021031	Same way , wen oona see dem ting wa A done taak bout staat fa happen , oona gwine know dat de time wen God gwine rule ain way off .
42021032	“ A da tell oona fa true , all dem ting yah gwine happen fo de people wa da lib now pass oba .
42021033	De eliment an de wol esef ain gwine las faeba , bot me wod gwine las faeba an eba .
42021034	“ Oona mus tek cyah wa oona da do . Mus dohn leh oona mind ron on all de time bout tommuch nyam an drink . Mus dohn fret tommuch bout oona trouble een dis wol . Cause ef oona do , dat day gwine come all ob a sudden , wen oona ain ready .
42021035	Dat day gwine come pon all de people all oba de wol , like a trap close quick pon a bod .
42021036	Oona mus be on de watch an pray all de time so dat oona gwine hab scrent fa beah all dem ting wa gwine happen een dis wol an be able fa stan fo de Man wa Come fom God . ”
42021037	Jurin dat time , Jedus beena spen de day da laan de people een God House , an wen fus daak come , e gone an spen de night ta de Mount Olib .
42021038	Ebry maanin wen day clean , all de people wa e beena laan , dey gone fa meet um een God House fa yeh wa e gwine laan um dat day .
42022001	De time mos come fa de Feas ob Unleaven Bread , de Jew holiday wen dey nyam bread wa ain hab no yeast een um . Dey call dat de Passoba holiday .
42022002	De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Law teacha dem beena study dey head fa figga how fa kill Jedus dout nobody find out bout um . Cause dey been scaid ob de people .
42022003	Den Satan tek hole ta Judas wa dey call Iscariot . E been one ob de tweb ciple dem .
42022004	So Judas gone off an taak ta de priest leada dem an dem offisa ob dem wa gyaad God House . Judas taak ta um bout how e kin hep um ketch Jedus .
42022005	De leada dem been glad fa yeh dat , an dey offa fa pay Judas money fa do um .
42022006	Judas gree ta dat , an e staat fa saach fa way fa han Jedus oba ta um . Dey been wahn fa do dat wen dey ain gwine be no crowd ob people roun fa know bout um . So Judas look fa dat .
