42022007	Jurin de Feas ob Unleaven Bread , de day come wen dey haffa kill de lamb fa mek sacrifice ta God , so dey kin nyam um an memba de Passoba wen God done bring e people outta Egypt lan .
42022008	So Jedus call Peter an John an tell um say , “ Oona go git de Passoba food ready fa we fa nyam . ”
42022009	Dey aks um , “ Weh ya wahn we fa git um ready ? ”
42022010	Jedus ansa um , “ Wen oona go eenta de city , oona gwine meet a man wa da tote a big jug ob wata . Oona mus folla dat man an go eenta de house weh e go .
42022011	Tell de man wa own dat house say , ‘ De Teacha da aks ya weh de room weh e an e ciple dem gwine nyam de Passoba suppa . ’
42022012	De man gwine show oona a big room opstair , wid all wa we need dey . Mus git de food ready dey . ”
42022013	Peter an John gone ta de city , an dey find ebryting jes like Jedus tell um . So dey git de food ready fa nyam de Passoba suppa .
42022014	Wen de time come fa de Passoba suppa , Jedus come ta de table wid e tweb postle dem .
42022015	Jedus tell um say , “ A been wahn fa nyam dis Passoba suppa wid oona too bad fo A suffa .
42022016	Cause A da tell oona , A ain gwine nyam um gin til all wa de Passoba stan fa come true , wen God gwine rule oba all ting een dis wol . ”
42022017	Jedus tek de cup ob wine an e tank God . Den e say , “ Oona pass dis cup roun an leh all oona drink .
42022018	Cause A da tell oona dat atta dis suppa , A ain gwine drink wine no mo til God rule oba dis wol . ”
42022019	Jedus tek some bread an e tank God . Den e broke op de bread , gim ta e postle dem . E say , “ Dis bread me body wa A da gii ta God fa oona sake . Oona mus nyam um fa memba me . ”
42022020	Same way , atta de Passoba suppa , Jedus tek de cup ob wine an gim ta e postle dem . E say , “ De wine een dis cup , e de nyew cobnant tween God an e people . A da seal dat cobnant wid me blood , wen A gree fa leh people kill me fa oona sake .
42022021	“ Bot look yah ! De poson wa gwine han me oba ta dem people wa wahn fa kill me , e da nyam wid me ! E han right yah pon de table wid me !
42022022	De Man wa Come fom God gwine dead like God done cide um . Bot e gwine be too bad fa dat man wa da han um oba ta dem wa gwine kill um ! ”
42022023	Den de postle dem staat fa aks one noda say , “ Wish one ob we gwine do dis ting wa Jedus taak bout ? ”
42022024	De ciple dem staat fa aagy wid one noda bout wish one ob dem dey oughta tink e great mo den all .
42022025	Jedus tell um say , “ Dey een de wol , de king dem hab chaage oba dey people . An dem people call dey rula ‘ De People Fren . ’
42022026	Bot oona mus dohn neba be like dat . Steada dat , de poson wa greata mongst oona mus be like de nyounga . An oona leada mus be like de one wa da saab .
42022027	Ef oona hab two people , one wa seddown ta de table fa nyam an de oda poson wa da saab um , wish one de greata ? Dat de poson wa da seddown ta de table , ainty ? Bot A da stan mongst oona like a poson wa da saab .
42022028	“ Oona beena stay wid me jurin all me haad time .
42022029	Me Fada done gii me tority fa rule oba people . Same fashion , A gwine gii oona tority fa rule .
42022030	Oona gwine nyam an drink ta me table wen A da rule . An oona gwine seddown pon shrone fa jedge de tweb tribe ob Israel .
42022031	“ Simon , Simon , listen ! Satan done aks fa test all ob oona fa wide op de good fom de bad , like a faama da wide op e grain fom de chaff .
42022032	Bot A done pray ta God fa ya , Simon , dat ya ain gwine loss ya fait een me . An wen ya done ton back ta me , ya mus hep ya broda dem git mo scronga . ”
42022033	Peter ansa Jedus say , “ Lawd , A ready fa go wid ya ta de jailhouse , an fa dead wid ya too ! ”
42022034	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell ya , Peter , fo de roosta crow taday , ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me . ”
42022035	Den Jedus aks e ciple dem say , “ Dat time wen A been sen oona fa go an tell de Good Nyews , A been chaage oona dat oona mus dohn tek no money , no bag needa no shoe . Oona ain hab need ob nottin jurin dat time , ainty ? ”
42022036	Den Jedus tell um say . “ Bot now , ef oona hab money or a bag , mus tek um wid oona . An ef oona ain got no sode , mus sell oona coat an buy um .
42022037	Cause A da tell oona , wen de prophet write een God Book say , ‘ People tink dat e one ob dem wickity people , ’ e beena write bout me . All wa God wod say bout me da happen , fa true . ”
42022038	De ciple dem say , “ Look yah , Lawd ! We hab two sode . ”
42022039	Jedus lef de city an gone ta de Mount Olib , jes like e nyuse fa do , an de ciple dem gone long wid um .
42022040	Wen e git ta de place , e tell um , “ Oona mus pray ta God so dat wen Satan tempt oona , oona ain gwine fall eenta sin . ”
42022041	Den Jedus lef um an gone a leetle bit mo , bout one hundud foot way . An e kneel down an pray ta God .
42022042	E say , “ Fada , ef ya gree , do please , tek way dis cup wa A fa suffa . Stillyet , ya mus dohn do wa A wahn . Mus do wa ya wahn fa do . ”
42022043	Den one angel come outta heaben ta Jedus an gim scrent .
42022044	Jedus beena suffa tommuch , an e pray eben mo haada . E sweat been like blood wa da drop down ta de groun .
42022045	Wen Jedus git op fom e pray , e gone back ta de ciple dem . Bot e see dat dey beena sleep , cause dey haat been too hebby .
42022046	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona ain oughta sleep , ainty ? Git op an pray ta God so dat wen Satan tempt oona , oona ain gwine fall eenta sin . ”
42022047	Wiles Jedus beena taak , a crowd come op . Judas , one ob de tweb ciple dem , beena lead de people . An e come op ta Jedus fa kiss um .
42022048	Bot Jedus aks um say , “ Judas , wid a kiss ya da han de Man wa Come fom God oba ta e enemy dem ? ”
42022049	Wen de ciple dem wa been wid Jedus see wa bout fa happen , dey aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , kin we fight dem wid we sode ? ”
42022050	An one dem ciple tek e sode an scrike de saabant ob de head man ob de Jew priest dem an cut off e right yea .
42022051	Bot Jedus chaage e ciple dem say , “ Dat nuff . Oona stop dat ! ” E tetch de saabant head an heal e yea .
42022052	Jedus aks de leada dem ob de priest dem an de leada dem wa beena gyaad God House an de oda Jew leada dem wa been come dey fa git um , e say , “ Oona haffa come yah fa git me wid sode an stick like A been a robba ?
42022053	A been wid oona ebry day een God House , an oona ain try fa grab hole ta me . Bot dis de time wen God gree fa leh oona tek me , now wen Satan wa da rule oba de daakness dey een chaage . ”
42022054	Dey grab hole ta Jedus an tek um ta de head man ob de Jew priest dem , eenta e house . Peter folla long hine um bot e ain git close ta um .
42022055	Now a fire been light dey een de middle ob de head man yaad , an people beena seddown roun dat fire . So Peter gone an jine um .
42022056	One saabant gyal see Peter da seddown dey , wid de fire light da shine pon um . Dat gyal study Peter good fashion an e tell de people dey , say , “ Dis man too been wid Jedus ! ”
42022057	Bot Peter say dat ain so . E tell um say , “ Ooman , A ain eben know dat man ! ”
42022058	Atta wile , a man beena watch Peter . Dat man say , “ Ya one ob dem wa been wid Jedus dem too ! ”
42022059	Atta bout one hour , noda man tell de people say , “ Fa true , dis man yah been wid Jedus , cause e come fom Galilee too . ”
42022060	Peter ansa um say , “ Man , A ain know wa ya da taak bout ! ”
42022061	De Lawd ton roun an look scraight at Peter . An Peter memba dat de Lawd done tell um say , “ Fo de roosta crow taday , ya gwine say shree time dat ya ain know me . ”
42022062	Peter gone outta de yaad an e cry bitta teah .
42022063	De sodja dem wa beena gyaad Jedus mek fun ob um an beat um .
42022064	Dey tie a rag oba e eye , den dey knock um an say , “ Ef ya a prophet , tell we who dat knock ya ! ”
42022065	An dey tell Jedus plenty oda ting fa hole um cheap .
42022066	Wen day clean , dey hab meetin ob de Jew Council . De people leada dem , de leada dem ob de priest dem , an de Law teacha dem geda togeda , an de sodja dem tek Jedus fo dat Council .
42022067	De people ob de Council chaage Jedus say , “ Ef ya de Messiah , ya mus tell we . ”
42022068	An ef A aks oona a queshon , oona ain gwine ansa me .
42022069	Bot fom now on , de Man wa Come fom God gwine seddown ta de right han ob God , wa hab all powa . ”
42022070	All de people wa beena jedge um een de Council aks um say , “ Well den , ya God Son ? ”
42022071	Den de people wa beena jedge um say , “ We ain need no mo people wod ginst um . Wid we own yea we done yeh wa e say ! ”
42023001	All de crowd ob people wa beena jedge een de Jew Council grab hole ta Jedus an tek um way ta Gobna Pilate .
42023002	Den dey staat fa cuse Jedus , tell Pilate say , “ We done find dis man da pit wod een we people yea fa mek um riot ginst de tority . E tell um say we ain spose fa pay tax ta Caesar . An e say e de Messiah . Dat mean e a king . ”
42023003	Pilate aks Jedus say , “ Ya de king ob de Jew people ? ” Jedus ansa um say , “ Dat wa ya say . Dat so e stan . ”
42023004	Pilate tell de leada dem ob de priest dem an de heapa people wa done geda dey say , “ A ain see nottin bad wa dis man done . ”
42023005	Bot de people dem ob de Council keep on da cuse um mo an mo . Dey tell Pilate say , “ Jedus beena stir op de people wid de ting wa e da laan um all oba Judea . E staat een Galilee , an now e done come all de way yah ta Jerusalem . ”
42023006	Wen Pilate yeh wa dem people say , e aks um ef Jedus been fom Galilee .
42023007	Soon as Pilate find out dat Jedus been fom Galilee , de arie weh Herod da rule , e sen Jedus ta Herod fa jedge um . An dat same time Herod been dey een Jerusalem too .
42023008	Herod been too glad wen e see Jedus , cause e done yeh bout um an been wahn fa shim fa a long time . E been wahn fa shim do some miracle .
42023009	Herod quizzit Jedus tommuch , bot Jedus neba ansa um eben a wod .
42023010	De leada dem ob dey priest dem an de Law teacha dem come stan fo Herod , da cuse Jedus still mo an mo .
42023011	An Herod an e sodja dem hole Jedus cheap . Dey laugh an suck dey teet , shrow insult pon um . An dey mek um weah a fine robe , like a king weah . Den Herod sen Jedus back ta Pilate .
42023012	Now Pilate an Herod dem done beena fight each oda , bot dat same day , dey come fa be fren .
42023013	Pilate sen fa de leada dem ob de Jew priest dem , an e call fa de tority dem wa da rule , an fa de people . E call um all fa come togeda .
42023014	E tell um say , “ Oona done bring dis man yah ta me , tell me dat e da stir op de people , pit wod een dey yea . Bot wen A quizzit um fo oona , A see dat e ain done none ob dem ting wa oona say e done .
42023015	An Herod ain see nottin bad wa Jedus done needa , so e sen um back ta we yah . Oona kin see dat Jedus ain done nottin fa mek me hab dem kill um .
42023016	Cause ob dat , A gwine jes hab dem whip um an den leh um go . ” [
42023017	Cause ebry yeah wen dey hab de Passoba feas , Pilate haffa free one man wa de Jew people wahn . ]
42023018	Bot wen Pilate say e wahn fa free Jedus fa um , all de people holla say , “ No . Kill dis man an free Barabbas fa we ! ”
42023019	( Barabbas de man wa dey been pit een de jailhouse cause e been a leada wen de people been riot een de city an one poson been git kill . )
42023020	Pilate been wahn fa free Jedus , so e taak ta de people gin .
42023021	Bot de people holla , tell Pilate say , “ Nail um ta de cross ! Nail um ta de cross ! ”
42023022	Pilate tell de people gin . Dat mek shree time . E aks um say , “ Wa fa ? A ain see nottin dat e done fa mek me hab dem kill um ! Cause ob dat , A gwine hab dem whip um an den leh um go . ”
42023023	Bot de people beena holla mo an mo , say Pilate oughta hab e sodja dem kill Jedus pon de cross . An cause de people holla sommuch an cause ob de leada dem ob de priest dem , e change e mind .
42023024	So Pilate done wa de people been wahn um fa do .
42023025	E free Barabbas , de man dey aks fa , wa been een de jailhouse fa de riot an fa kill somebody . Den Pilate tell e sodja dem fa tek Jedus an do wa de people been wahn um fa do .
42023026	De Roman sodja dem tek Jedus an gone . Wiles dey beena gwine , dey meet one man name Simon , wa been bon een Cyrene . E beena come fom out een de country , da gwine ta Jerusalem . De sodja dem grab hole ta um an pit Jedus cross pon um . Dey mek um folla Jedus , da tote de cross .
42023027	A whole heapa people beena folla Jedus . Some dem ooman wa beena folla um beena weep an wail fa um .
42023028	Jedus ton roun ta dem an say , “ Oona daughta ob Jerusalem , mus dohn cry fa me ! Mus cry fa oonasef an fa oona chullun .
42023029	Cause de time gwine come wen people gwine say , ‘ Bless fa true dem ooman wa ain neba hab no chullun , dem wa ain neba bon no baby an wa ain neba nuss none ! ’
42023030	Een dat time , people gwine tell de mountain say , ‘ Faddown pon we ! ’ An dey gwine tell de hill say , ‘ Kiba we op ! ’
42023031	Cause ef dey da do dis ting ta de green wood , fa sho dey gwine do wossa ting ta de dry wood , ainty ? ”
42023032	Wen de sodja dem tek Jedus an go fa kill um , dey tek two oda bad man fa kill wid Jedus too .
42023033	Wen dey git ta de place dey call “ De place wa look like a man head , ” de sodja dem nail Jedus ta e cross . An dey nail de two bad man too , each pon e own cross . Dey pit one man pon de right han side ob Jedus an de oda man pon e lef han side .
42023034	Jedus say , “ Fada , paadon dem , cause dey ain ondastan wa dey da do . ”
42023035	De people beena stanop dey da look , an de Jew leada dem been dey , da hole Jedus cheap . Dey say , “ E sabe oda people . So den , leh um sabe esef , ef e de Messiah wa God done pick fa true ! ”
42023036	De sodja dem hole Jedus cheap too . Dey come op ta um an try fa gim wine winega fa drink .
42023037	Dey tell um say , “ Ef ya de king ob de Jew people , sabe yasef ! ”
42023038	Dey write de chaage ginst Jedus fa de people fa read , an dey nail um oba Jedus head . De chaage say , DIS MAN YAH DE KING OB DE JEW PEOPLE .
42023039	One dem two bad man wa beena hang dey pon e cross , e shrow slam at Jedus . E say , “ Ya de Messiah , ainty ? Well den , sabe yasef an sabe we too ! ”
42023040	Bot de oda bad man wa beena hang dey , e buke dat man say , “ Ya ain scaid ob God ? Dey done condemn ya fa dead jes like dis man yah .
42023041	Dey condemn we fa wa we done , an we da git we pay fa all de bad ting dem we done . Bot dis man yah ain done nottin bad . ”
42023042	Den e beg Jedus say , “ Jedus , please do , memba me wen ya come fa be King ! ”
42023043	Jedus ansa um say , “ A da tell ya fa true , taday ya gwine be wid me een heaben . ”
42023044	E been bout tweb o'clock wen all dat lan ton pitch daak til shree o'clock .
42023045	De sun stop fa shine , an de big tick curtain wa beena hang eenside God House split down de middle .
42023046	Jedus holla say , “ Fada , A gii oba me sperit ta ya fa tek cyah ob me ! ” Wen e done say dat , e dead .
42023047	Wen de offisa fa de sodja dem see wa happen , e praise God . E say , “ Fa true , dis man yah ain done nottin bad . ”
42023048	All de people wa beena geda dey fa look , wen dey see wa happen , dey lef an gone home . Wiles dey beena gwine , dey beat pon dey chest .
42023049	An all de people wa been know Jedus , an de ooman dem wa come wid um outta Galilee , beena stanop way off fom de cross , da look pon all wa happen .
42023050	One man been dey name Joseph , a memba ob de Jew Council . E been a good man an e beena waak scraight .
42023051	E ain been gree wid de Council wen dey cide fa condemn Jedus an han um oba ta de Roman tority dem . Joseph come fom de town name Arimathea een Judea . E beena wait fa de time wen God gwine rule oba dis wol .
42023052	Joseph gone ta Pilate an aks um fa leh um hab Jedus body , an Pilate leh um hab um .
42023053	So den , Joseph tek Jedus body down fom de cross an wrop um op een a linen closs . E pit um eenside a tomb wa done been cut outta a big rock . Nobody ain neba been pit een dat tomb fo dat .
42023054	An dat day been de Preparation Day , wen dey git ready fa de Jew Woshup Day . An de Woshup Day been jes bout fa staat .
42023055	De ooman dem dat been come outta Galilee wid Jedus , dey folla Joseph an see de tomb an how Joseph pit Jedus body een um .
42023056	Den dey lef an gone home an git spice an pafume ready fa rub pon Jedus body .
42024001	Aaly een de maanin de fus day ob de week , fo day clean , de ooman dem tek de spice wa dey done been mix op an gone ta Jedus tomb .
42024002	Wen dey git ta de tomb , dey see dat de stone wa beena kiba de door ta de tomb done been roll back .
42024003	So dey gone eenside , bot dey ain find de Lawd Jedus body .
42024004	Dey beena wonda bout wa done happen , wen all ob a sudden dey see two man da stanop dey wa hab on bright cloes wa da shine .
42024005	De ooman dem been too scaid , an dey bow dey head down ta de groun . Bot de man dem tell um say , “ Oona ain oughta look yah mongst de dead people fa a man wa da lib , ainty ?
42024006	Jedus ain yah . E done git op fom mongst de dead , an e da lib gin ! Oona memba wa e been tell oona wen e been dey wid oona een Galilee .
42024007	E say , ‘ Dey gwine grab hole ta de Man wa Come fom God an han um oba ta wickity people wa gwine kill um pon a cross . Atta shree day e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . ’ ”
42024008	Den de ooman dem memba all dat wa Jedus been tell um .
42024009	Dey lef de tomb an gone back ta town an tell de leben postle dem an all de oda people wa beena waak wid Jedus , bout all wa done happen .
42024010	Dem ooman been Mary Magdalene , Joanna , an Mary , James modda . Dem an de oda ooman dem wa been dey wid um tell de postle dem wa done happen .
42024011	Bot de postle dem ain bleebe dem ooman , cause wa dey say ain mek no sense ta um .
42024012	Bot Peter git op an ron ta de tomb . Wen e git dey , e bend down an e look eenside . E jes see de linen grabe cloes wa dey been nyuse fa wrop op Jedus body dey , nottin mo . Den Peter gone back home , da wonda wa been happen .
42024013	Dat same day , two man wa beena folla Jedus , dey beena gwine ta a settlement name Emmaus . Fom Jerusalem ta dat settlement been bout seben mile .
42024014	De two man beena taak bout all dem ting wa jes happen een Jerusalem .
42024015	Wiles dey beena taak , Jedus esef come nigh ta um an waak longside um .
42024016	Dey shim , bot dey ain recognize who e been .
42024017	Jedus aks dem say , “ Wa oona da taak bout togeda wiles oona da waak long ? ”
42024018	One dem wa name Cleopas ansa Jedus say , “ Ya mus be de onliest man wa da lib een Jerusalem an ain know wa been happen dey een dem day wa jes gone , ainty ? ”
42024019	Jedus aks dem say , “ Wa ting ? ”
42024020	De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an we rula dem done tek Jedus an han um oba ta de Roman Gobna Pilate fa condemn um fa dead . An de sodja dem nail um ta de cross an kill um .
42024021	We been tink dat Jedus been gwine free de Israel people ! Pontop ob dat , taday mek shree day since all dat happen .
42024022	An pontop ob all dat , some we ooman dem stonish we tommuch . Dey gone ta de tomb aaly dis maanin ,
42024023	bot dey ain find Jedus body dey een de tomb . Wen dey come back , de ooman dem tell we dat dey been see a wision ob angel fom God dey . De angel dem tell um dat Jedus da lib .
42024024	Den some we people dat been wid we gone ta de tomb , an dey find um jes like de ooman dem beena tell we . Bot dey ain see Jedus . ”
42024025	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona ain got no sense . Een oona haat oona ain wahn fa bleebe all dat de prophet dem done say !
42024026	De Messiah haffa suffa dem ting an den go ta heaben an hab e paat een God glory , ainty ? ”
42024027	An Jedus splain ta de two man dem . E staat wid Moses an all de prophet dem , da laan um wa dey been write bout um . Jedus laan um fom all God Book bout esef .
42024028	Wen de two man done git close ta de settlement weh dey beena gwine , Jedus mek like e been gwine on .
42024029	So de man dem beg um fa stay wid um . Dey tell um say , “ Stay yah wid we , cause de day mos gone an de night da come soon . ” So Jedus gone fa stay wid um .
42024030	Wen e git ta de table fa nyam wid um , Jedus tek de loaf ob bread an tank God fa um . Den e broke op de bread an gim dey piece .
42024031	Same time Jedus do dat , e been like de man dem eye been open op , an dey recognize dat Jedus esef dey wid um . Bot den Jedus jes disappeah an dey ain shim .
42024032	De two man dem say ta one noda , “ Wiles e beena taak ta we , wen we beena waak long de road , dat been like a fire wa da bun een we haat , ainty ? We been too glad wen e beena splain God Book ta we . ”
42024033	Same time , dey git op an gone back ta Jerusalem . Dey find de leben ciple dem an some de oda people geda togeda .
42024034	Dem people tell de two man dem say , “ De Lawd done git op fom mongst de dead an e da lib gin fa true ! E done appeah ta Simon ! ”
42024035	Den de two man dem tell de people wa happen ta dem wiles dey beena waak long de road ta Emmaus . Dey tell um how dey been recognize dat e been de Lawd Jedus dey wid um wen e broke op de bread fa um .
42024036	Dat same time dey , wen dey beena taak bout dat , Jedus esef stanop mongst um dey . E tell um say , “ Hab peace een oona haat ! ”
42024037	Dey been scaid mos ta det . Dey tink dey beena see a haant .
42024038	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona ain oughta be scaid . Oona ain oughta wonda wa oona da see .
42024039	Look pon me han an me foot . See , A mesef fa true ! Oona mus tetch me an look pon me good fashion . Den oona gwine know dat A ain no haant . A haant ain hab no body needa no bone like oona see dat A hab . ”
42024040	Wen Jedus done say dat , e show um e han an e foot .
42024041	Dey beena wonda an dey still ain know wa fa tink , cause wa dey see mek um so full op wid joy . Jedus aks um say , “ Oona hab sompin fa nyam yah ? ”
42024042	Dey gim some roas fish an some honeycomb .
42024043	E tek de fish an honey an nyam um dey fo dey eye .
42024044	Jedus tell um say , “ Wen A been dey wid oona , A done tell oona bout dis . A tell oona dat all ting wa Moses been write down een de Law bout me , an wa dem prophet write down , an all dey write down een de Psalms bout me , dey all haffa happen fa true . ”
42024045	Jedus mek um able fa ondastan wa been write dey een God Book .
42024046	E tell um say , “ Een God Book dey write dis down : Dey tell we dat de Messiah haffa suffa an dead . An atta shree day , e gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin .
42024047	God Book tell we too dat een Christ name , e ciple dem mus tell all people say , ‘ Mus change oona way an do wa God wahn oona fa do . Den God gwine paadon oona . ’ Oona mus tell um dat een Jerusalem an den all oba de wol .
42024048	Oona done see all dem ting yah , an oona mus tell people bout dem .
42024049	An A gwine sen oona wa me Fada done promise . Bot fo oona go , oona mus wait een de city til oona git dat Holy Sperit powa wa gwine come outta heaben an come down pon oona . ”
42024050	An Jedus waak wid um outta Jerusalem ta Bethany . Wen dey git dey , e raise e han op an e bless um .
42024051	Wiles e beena bless um , Jedus lef um . God tek um op eenta heaben .
42024052	De people wa bleebe een Jedus woshup um op , an den dey gone back ta Jerusalem . Dey been full op wid joy .
42024053	An dey been een God House all de time , da praise God .
43001001	Fo God mek de wol , de Wod been dey . De Wod been dey wid God , an de Wod been God .
43001002	Fo God mek de wol , de Wod been dey wid God .
43001003	Shru dat Wod , God mek ebryting . Ain nottin een de whole wol wa God mek dat been done dout de Wod .
43001004	De Wod , e de one wa all life come fom . An dis life yah de life wa da mek all people see de light .
43001005	De light da shine een de daak , an de daak ain neba been able fa pit out dat light .
43001006	God sen one man fa come eenta de wol , an dat man name been John .
43001007	E come fa tell people bout de light , so dat ebrybody kin bleebe wen dey yeh wa e say .
43001008	John esef ain been de light . E jes come fa tell people bout de light .
43001009	De light wa e taak bout , dat de true light wa come eenta de wol an da shine pon ebrybody .
43001010	So den de Wod been dey een de wol , an shru um God mek all ting een de wol . Stillyet , de people een de wol ain been know who e been .
43001011	E come ta e own place , bot e own people ain wahn hab nottin fa do wid um .
43001012	Stillyet , some bleebe pon um . Ta all dem , e gim de right fa be chullun ob God .
43001013	Dey ain git fa be chullun ob God same way like people een de wol hab chullun . Dey ain chullun ob God cause dat wa somebody wahn , needa cause some man wahn dat fa be . Bot God esef mek um come fa be e chullun .
43001014	De Wod come fa be a man , an e lib mongst we fa a wile . We see de glory God gim , cause e de onliest Son ob de Fada God . An e gii we all de blessin ob God an mek we know wa true bout God .
43001015	John beena tell people bout um . E holla say , “ Dis de poson A beena tell oona bout wen A say , e gwine come wen A done done de wok wa God sen me fa do . Bot e great fa true , way mo den me , cause e done been dey fo A bon . ”
43001016	Cause e full op wid blessin fa we , e da bless we mo an mo .
43001017	Moses bring we de Law , bot Jedus Christ de one wa bring we God blessin an mek we know wa true .
43001018	Nobody ain neba see God . Bot God onliest Son , e one wid e Fada , an de Son mek people know who God da .
43001019	De Jew leada dem een Jerusalem sen Jew priest an Levite ta John fa aks um say , “ Who ya da ? ”
43001020	John ain back op one bit wid wa e say . E tell um plain an out een de open , say , “ A ain de Messiah . ”
43001021	Wen John ansa um so , dey aks um say , “ Den who ya da ? Ya Elijah ? ”
43001022	So den dey say , “ Well , tell we who ya da . De people wa sen we gwine aks we fa gim ansa . Wa ya kin tell we bout yasef ? ”
43001023	Wen John ansa um , e tell um wa de prophet Isaiah been say . John say ,
43001024	Den dem wa de Pharisee dem sen , dey come ta John .
43001025	Dey aks um say , “ Ef ya ain de Messiah , an ya ain Elijah , an ya ain de Prophet , den hoccome ya da bactize people ? ”
43001026	John ansa say , “ A da bactize people wid wata , bot dey one mongst oona dat oona ain know .
43001027	E gwine come wen A done done de wok wa God sen me fa do . A mesef ain fit eben fa loose e shoe . ”
43001028	All dis happen een Bethany , pon de east side ob de Jerden Riba . Dat weh John beena bactize people .
43001029	De nex day John see Jedus da come ta um . An e say “ Look yonda , de Lamb ob God da come fa tek way de sin ob people all oba de wol !
43001030	E de one A beena taak bout wen A say , ‘ One man gwine come atta A done done de wok wa God sen me fa do . Dat man great fa true , way mo den me , cause e done been dey fo A bon ! ’
43001031	A ain been know who dat poson gwine be , bot A come fa bactize people wid wata so dat de Israel people kin know who e da . ”
43001032	Den John tell bout wa e been see . E say , “ A see God Sperit come fom heaben like a dob an stay dey pon um .
43001033	A ain been know dat e de poson A beena wait fa , cep dat God wa sen me fa bactize people wid wata done tell me bout um . God say , “ Ya gwine see de Sperit come down pon one poson an stay dey pon um . Dat de one wa gwine bactize people wid de Holy Sperit . ”
43001034	John tell um say , “ A done see dis happen , an A da tell oona say , ‘ Dis man , e de Son ob God . ’ ”
43001035	De nex day John been dey gin wid e ciple dem een de same place weh e beena bactize people .
43001036	Wen John see Jedus waak by , e say , “ Look yah ! Dat de Lamb ob God ! ”
43001037	Wen John ciple dem yeh wa John say , dey gone folla Jedus .
43001038	Den Jedus ton roun an shim da folla um , an e aks um say , “ Wa oona da look fa ? ”
43001039	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona come look ! ” So dey gone wid um an see weh e beena stay . Dat been bout fo o'clock een de ebenin , an dey stay wid um til night time .
43001040	One ob dem two people wa yeh wa John say an gone wid Jedus been name Andrew , de broda ob Simon Peter .
43001041	Fus ting , Andrew gone an find e broda Simon , tell um say , “ We done find de Messiah . ” ( Messiah mean “ de Christ . ” )
43001042	Andrew bring Simon ta Jedus .
43001043	De nex day Jedus mek op e mind fa go ta Galilee . E find Philip an tell um say , “ Come wid me fa be me ciple ! ”
43001044	Philip been fom Bethsaida , de same town weh Andrew an Peter come fom .
43001045	Philip gone an look fa Nathanael , tell um say , “ We done find de man Moses been write bout een de Law Book . E de one de prophet deysef done write bout too . E Jedus wa come fom Nazareth , Joseph chile . ”
43001046	Nathanael aks Philip say , “ Nazareth ! Ain nottin good kin come fom Nazareth , ainty ? ”
43001047	Wen Jedus see Nathanael da come , e say , “ Look ! Dis yah a Israel man fa true . Ain no lie bout um .
43001048	Nathanael aks Jedus say , “ How ya know me ? ”
43001049	Nathanael ansa say , “ Teacha , ya de Son ob God . Ya de King ob Israel . ”
43001050	Jedus say , “ Ya bleebe pon me jes cause A been tell ya dat A see ya wen ya been dey onda de fig tree , jes dat ? Ya gwine see ting wa great mo den dat ! ”
43001051	Den e tell um say , “ A da tell oona fa true , ya gwine see heaben open op . Ya gwine see God angel dem da come down pon de Man wa Come fom God an da go back op . ”
43002001	Atta two day , dey been a weddin een Cana , wa dey een Galilee . Jedus modda been dey ta de weddin .
43002002	An dey been eenbite Jedus an e ciple dem too fa go .
43002003	Wen all de wine done , Jedus modda tell Jedus say , “ Dey ain got no mo wine . ”
43002004	Jedus tell e modda say , “ Ya ain fa tell me dem ting yah now . De time wen A fa do dem ting ain come yet . ”
43002005	Jedus modda tell de saabant dem say , “ Oona mus do wasoneba e tell oona fa do . ”
43002006	De Jew dem got plenty law wa say how dey fa wash dey body een a special way an all ting wa dey da nyuse , ef dey wahn fa be clean een God eye . Fa sake ob dat , six big stone wata jug been close by dey een dat place . De jug dem been so big dat jes one jug kin hole twenty ta tirty gallon ob wata .
43002007	Jedus tell de saabant dem say , “ Oona mus full op dem wata jug wid wata . ” An dey full de pot dem op ta de brim .
43002008	Den Jedus tell um say , “ Now mus tek some ob dat outta de jug an go cyaa um ta de man een chaage ob de marry feas . ” So de saabant dem done wa Jedus tell um fa do .
43002009	Den dat man een chaage taste de wata wa Jedus done been ton ta wine . Dat man een chaage ain been know weh de wine come fom , bot de saabant dem wa been tek de wata outta de jug , dey been know . So dat man een chaage call de groom oba .
43002010	E tell um say , “ Ebrybody kin saab de wine wa mo betta fus , an atta de people done drink plenty wine , dat de time dey wen dey kin saab de cheap wine . Bot ya beena keep de wine wa mo betta til now . ”
43002011	Jedus done dis fus miracle een Cana , wa dey een Galilee . Dat de way e show de people e powa , an e ciple dem bleebe pon um .
43002012	Atta dat , Jedus an e modda , e broda dem , an e ciple dem gone ta Capernaum . Dey stay dey two , shree day .
43002013	De time been close fa de Jew holiday dey call Passoba , so Jedus gone ta Jerusalem .
43002014	Wen Jedus gone eenta God House dey , e meet op wid people da sell cow an goat , sheep an pigeon . An oda people wa beena mek change fa de people money beena seddown dey ta dey table .
43002015	So Jedus tek some rope an mek a whip , an e dribe um all outta God House , long wid de sheep an de cow dem . Den e ton oba de table dem weh people beena change money an e scatta dey coin .
43002016	An e chaage de people wa beena sell pigeon , say , “ Mus git dem pigeon outta yah ! Mus dohn ton de House ob me Fada eenta a maakut place ! ”
43002017	Den e ciple dem memba weh dey write een God Book say , “ O God , A wahn people fa hona ya House . A wahn um sommuch til e bun een me haat jes like a fire wa gwine bun me op . ”
43002018	Den de Jew leada dem come aks Jedus say , “ Wa miracle ya kin do fa show we dat ya got tority fa do dis wa ya done yah ? ”
43002019	Jedus tell um say , “ Ef oona stroy dis House ob God , een shree day A gwine build um back gin . ”
43002020	Den de Jew leada dem tell Jedus say , “ E been tek foty-six yeah fa build dis House . Ya mean fa say dat ya gwine tek jes shree day fa build um back gin ? ”
43002021	Bot wen Jedus taak bout God House , dat e body e beena taak bout .
43002022	So wen God mek Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , e ciple dem memba wa Jedus been taak bout . Den dey bleebe wa been write dey een God Book an de wod Jedus done been taak bout .
43002023	De time come fa de Passoba Feas wiles Jedus been dey een Jerusalem . An plenty people bleebe pon um , wen dey see de miracle dem wa e beena do .
43002024	Bot Jedus ain lef esef een dey han cause e been know all people too good .
43002025	E ain been no need fa people fa tell Jedus wa been dey een dey haat .
43003001	Dey been one ob de Pharisee dem name Nicodemus , wa been a leada wa blongst ta de Jew Council .
43003002	One night , Nicodemus come ta Jedus an say , “ Teacha , we know ya a teacha wa God sen . Cause ain nobody able fa do dem miracle wa ya da do , ef God ain dey wid um . ”
43003003	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell ya fa true , ain nobody kin come onda God rule ef e ain bon gin . ”
43003004	Nicodemus aks Jedus say , “ How kin a poson wa done grown git bon gin ? Fa sho , a poson ain gwine git leetle an go back eenside de belly ob e modda an git bon a secon time like a leetle baby ! ”
43003005	Jedus say , “ A da tell ya fa true , ain nobody kin come onda God rule ef dat poson ain bon wid wata an wid de Holy Sperit .
43003006	We fada an modda gii we we body , bot God Sperit gii we we sperit .
43003007	Ya mus dohn wonda wen A tell ya say , ‘ Ya mus be bon gin . ’
43003008	De breeze da blow wehsoneba e wahn fa blow . Ya da yeh de soun wa e mek , bot ya ain know wa side e da come fom an ya ain know wa side e da gwine . Dat de same way e happen wen de Holy Sperit gii people nyew life , an dey bon gin . ”
43003009	Nicodemus aks Jedus say , “ How dat kin be ? ”
43003010	Jedus aks um say , “ Ya a big teacha een Israel an ya ain ondastan wa A da taak bout ?
43003011	A da tell ya fa true , wa we know an wa we done see , we da tell oona bout . Stillyet , oona ain wahn fa bleebe wa we da tell oona .
43003012	Oona ain bleebe me wen A tell oona bout dem ting wa dey een dis wol . So den , how ya gwine bleebe me wen A tell ya bout dem ting wa dey een heaben ?
43003013	Dey ain nobody neba gone op ta heaben cep de Man wa Come fom God , wa come down outta heaben .
43003014	“ Jes like Moses done hice de bronze snake op pon a pole dey een de wildaness , same way so , dey gwine haffa hice op de Man wa Come fom God ,
43003015	so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon um gwine git true life wa ain gwine neba end .
43003016	Cause God lob all de people een de wol sommuch dat e gii we e onliest Son . God sen we um so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon um ain gwine dead . Dey gwine lib faebamo .
43003017	God ain sen e Son eenta de wol fa condemn um . God sen e Son fa come sabe de people shru e Son .
43003018	“ Ef a poson bleebe pon God Son , God ain gwine condemn dat poson dey . Bot ef a poson ain bleebe pon God Son , God done condemn um , cause e ain bleebe pon de name ob de onliest Son ob God .
43003019	God been mek de light ob trute come eenta de wol , bot people like de daak steada de light cause dey keep on da do ebil ting . Dat so de jedgiment stan .
43003020	Ebrybody wa da do ebil ting , dey ain like de light tall an ain gwine come eenta de light , cause dey ain wahn de light fa show de ebil ting dem wa dey da do .
43003021	Bot ebrybody wa da lib coddin ta de trute ob God gwine come eenta de light , so dat de light kin show dat fa sho dey beena do wa God tell um fa do . ”
43003022	Atta dat , Jedus an e ciple dem gone ta Judea lan . E stay some time wid um dey an e beena bactize people .
43003023	John wa Bactize beena bactize people een Aenon too , wa been dey close ta Salim , cause plenty wata been dey . People beena go ta John dey , an e beena bactize um .
43003024	( De time wen all dis beena happen , John ain been pit een de jailhouse yet . )
43003025	Some ob John ciple dem an one Jew man staat fa aagy bout de Jew Law wa say a poson mus wash een a special way ef e wahn fa be clean een God eye .
43003026	So dey gone ta John an tell um say , “ Teacha , ya memba dat man wa been wid ya wen ya been dey pon de oda side ob de Jerden Riba , de one ya beena tell bout ? Well , now e da bactize people een de Jerden Riba , an ebrybody da gwine ta um ! ”
43003027	John tell um say , “ Ain nottin like dis kin happen ta a poson cep God mek um happen .
43003028	Oonasef yeh me wen A say , ‘ A ain de Messiah , bot God sen me heada de Messiah , fa come mek a way fa um . ’
43003029	De bride blongst ta de groom , bot de fren ob de groom da stan by da listen fa de groom , an wen e yeh de groom boice e full op wid joy . Dat so e stan fa me . A full op wid joy .
43003030	E mus come fa be mo an mo great , an A mus come fa be less an less . ”
43003031	De one wa come fom heaben , e oba all . De one wa dey een dis wol blongst ta dis wol , an e da taak bout dis wol own bidness . Bot de one wa come fom heaben , e oba all .
43003032	De one wa come fom heaben da taak bout wa e done see an yeh . Stillyet , ain nobody bleebe wa e say .
43003033	De poson wa bleebe wa e say , e show dat e been bleebe dat wa God say , e true .
43003034	De one wa God sen , e da tell people de message wa God gim , cause God da gim e Sperit , til e full op wid um .
43003035	God we Fada da lob e Son an e gim chaage oba all ting .
43003036	Ebrybody wa bleebe pon God Son , dey got de true life wa ain neba gwine end . Bot ebrybody wa ain do wa God Son say , dey ain neba gwine git de true life , an God gwine be too bex wid um faeba .
43004001	De Pharisee dem yeh say dat Jedus beena git mo ciple an bactize mo ciple den John .
43004002	( Bot fa true , Jedus ain beena bactize people . E ciple dem beena bactize um . )
43004003	Wen Jedus yeh wa dey beena say , e lef Judea an gone back gin ta Galilee .
43004004	Wen e beena gwine , e haffa go shru Samaria fa git dey .
43004005	Een Samaria , e come ta a town name Sychar , wa stan close ta de fiel wa Jacob gii ta e son Joseph .
43004006	De well wa nyuse fa blongst ta Jacob been dey dey . Wen Jedus been weary fom de journey , e seddown close ta de well . E been bout noontime .
43004007	One ooman fom Samaria come fa git wata fom de well , an Jedus aks um say , “ Please gii me some wata fa drink . ”
43004008	( E ciple dem done been gone ta town fa buy ting fa nyam . )
43004009	De Samaria ooman aks Jedus say , “ Ya a Jew an A a ooman fom Samaria . Hoccome ya da aks me fa wata fa drink ? ” ( De ooman say dat cause de Jew dem ain neba nyam needa drink fom de same dish dat de people fom Samaria nyuse , an dey ain neba sociate wid one noda . )
43004010	Jedus say , “ Ef ya been know wa God kin gii , an who dis yah wa da aks fa wata , ya been gwine aks um an e been gwine gii ya dat wata wa da mek people lib fa true . ”
43004011	De ooman tell um , “ Sah , ya ain got no bucket , an de well too deep . Weh ya git dat wata wa da mek people lib fa true ?
43004012	We fada Jacob gii we dis well . Jacob an e son dem an e flock beena come yah ta dis well fa drink wata . Ya da tell me dat ya mo greata den Jacob ? ”
43004013	Jedus say , “ Ebrybody wa da drink de wata wa dey een dis well gwine tosty gin .
43004014	Bot ebrybody wa da drink de wata A gwine gim ain neba gwine git tosty no mo . Fa true , de wata A gwine gim gwine be een um like a spring ob wata wa keep on da gim true life wa ain neba gwine end . ”
43004015	De ooman say , “ Please sah , gii me dat wata ! Den A ain gwine neba git tosty no mo , an A ain gwine haffa come yah ta dis well gin fa git wata . ”
43004016	Jedus tell de ooman say , “ Go git ya husban an come back yah . ”
43004017	De ooman say , “ A ain got no husban . ”
43004018	Fibe diffunt man dem done marry ya . An de man ya da lib wid now ain ya husban . Ya da tell me de trute . ”
43004019	De ooman say , “ Sah , A see ya a prophet wa God sen .
43004020	We fada beena woshup God ta dis mountain , bot oona Jew people say we mus go ta Jerusalem fa woshup God . ”
43004021	Jedus tell de ooman say , “ Ya mus bleebe wa A da tell ya . De time gwine come wen oona ain gwine woshup we Fada God pon dis mountain , needa een Jerusalem .
43004022	Oona Samaria people ain know de God wa oona da woshup . Bot we Jew people know de God we da woshup , cause shru de Jew people , God da sabe oda people .
43004023	Stillyet , de time da come , an e done come now , wen people wa da woshup fa true gwine woshup we Fada God een dey haat . An dey gwine woshup um een de right way , jes like e stan fa true . Cause we Fada God da look fa people like dat fa woshup um .
43004024	God a Sperit , an dem wa woshup um mus woshup um een dey haat an een de right way , jes like e stan fa true . ”
43004025	De ooman tell Jedus say , “ A know dat de Messiah , wa dey call Christ , gwine come . Wen e come , e gwine splain all ting ta we . ”
43004026	Jedus tell um say , “ A de one ya da taak bout . ”
43004027	Same time Jedus ciple dem come back , an dey been stonish fa see Jedus da taak ta a ooman . Bot ain none ob dem aks de ooman say , “ Wa ya wahn ? ” Needa none ob um aks Jedus say , “ Hoccome ya da taak ta de ooman ? ”
43004028	Den de ooman lef e wata jug an gone back ta town , an e tell all de people dey fa come .
43004029	E tell um say , “ Oona mus come see a man wa tell me ebryting A done done . Oona tink e de Messiah ? ”
43004030	So de people lef town an come ta Jedus .
43004031	Same time , Jedus ciple dem beena try fa git Jedus fa nyam sompin . Dey say , “ Teacha , please , tek sompin fa nyam . ”
43004032	Bot Jedus say , “ A got food fa nyam wa oona ain know nottin bout . ”
43004033	So de ciple dem aks one noda say , “ Ya tink somebody done fetch um some food ? ”
43004034	Jedus tell um say , “ Wen A do wa de one wa sen me yah wahn me fa do , an finish op all de wok e gii me fa do , den dat me food .
43004035	Oona kin taak say , ‘ Fo mo mont fo haabis , ainty ? ’ Bot A da tell oona say , look pon de fiel good . De crop done ready fa haabis .
43004036	Eben now de poson wa da cut de crop da git e pay . Eben now e da geda op de crop fa ebalastin life so dat de poson wa da plant de crop an de poson wa da geda um op , all two dem heppy fa true togeda .
43004037	Cause like people say , ‘ One poson da plant , an oda poson da geda op de crop . ’ E stan so !
43004038	A been sen oona fa haabis de crop een a fiel weh oona ain wok . Oda people done wok um , an oona done gain fom de wok dey done . ”
43004039	Plenty people ob Samaria dey een dat town bleebe pon Jedus cause de ooman say , “ E tell me ebryting A done done . ”
43004040	So wen de people ob Samaria come ta Jedus , dey beg um fa stay wid um . An e stay dey two day .
43004041	Cause e taak ta de people dey , a heap mo ob um come fa bleebe pon Jedus .
43004042	Den dey tell de ooman say , “ We bleebe now . Dis time yah , e ain jes cause ob wa ya been tell we . We bleebe now cause wesef done yeh um . An we know dat e de Sabior ob de wol , fa true . ”
43004043	Wen Jedus done spen de two day dey een Samaria , e gone ta Galilee .
43004044	Jedus esef been say , “ A prophet ain got no hona dey een e own country . ”
43004045	De people een Galilee done been ta Jerusalem ta de Passoba Feas , an dey been see ebryting e beena do jurin dat time dey . So wen Jedus git ta Galilee , de people dey gim haaty welcome .
43004046	Jedus gone back gin ta Cana een Galilee , de same place weh e ton de wata eenta wine . One gobment offisa been dey een Cana , an e hab a son wa been sick een Capernaum .
43004047	Wen de offisa yeh say dat Jedus been come fom Judea ta Galilee , e gone ta Jedus an e beg um fa come ta Capernaum fa heal e sick son , wa mos dead .
43004048	Jedus say , “ Ain none ob oona neba gwine bleebe dout oona see me da do miracle an oda great ting . ”
43004049	De offisa say , “ Please sah , come long wid me now , fo me son dead . ”
43004050	Jedus tell um say , “ Ya kin go . Ya son gwine lib ! ”
43004051	Wiles e beena gwine ta e house , e saabant dem meet um an tell um de nyews say , “ Ya boy gwine lib ! ”
43004052	De offisa aks e saabant dem wa time e been wen e son staat fa git betta . Dey tell um say , “ E been one o'clock yestiddy atta noon wen de feba broke an lef um . ”
43004053	Den de fada memba , dat been de same time wen Jedus been tell um say , “ Ya son gwine lib ! ” So de offisa an all de people een e house , dey bleebe pon Jedus .
43004054	Dat been de secon time dat Jedus done a miracle een Galilee atta e come fom Judea .
43005001	Atta dat , Jedus gone ta Jerusalem fa a Jew holiday feas .
43005002	Een Jerusalem , a pool ob wata been dey by de place dey call “ Sheep Gyate . ” De Jew people call dat pool Bethesda , an dey been fibe poch close by dat wata .
43005003	A whole heapa sick people been gone leddown pon dem fibe poch . Some dem been bline , some been cripple op , an some been paralyze . [ All dem beena wait fa de waata fa moob .
43005004	Fom time ta time one angel ob de Lawd come down fa stir op de wata . Wen de wata moob , de fus one wa git een de wata gwine be heal ob wasoneba ailment e hab . ]
43005005	One man been dey wa been sick tirty-eight yeah .
43005006	Wen Jedus come , e see de man leddown dey . E know dat man been sick a long time , so e aks um say , “ Ya wahn fa git well ? ”
43005007	De sick man ansa say , “ Sah , A ain got nobody fa pit me een de wata wen e moob . Ebry time A da try fa git een , somebody beat me ta de wata . ”
43005008	Den Jedus tell de man say , “ Git op fom dey . Pick op ya mat an waak ! ”
43005009	All ob a sudden de man been well . E pick op e mat an waak .
43005010	So de Jew leada dem see de man wa been sick an done git well , da tote e mat . Dey tell um say , “ Dis yah we Woshup Day , an e ginst we Law fa ya fa tote ya mat pon we Woshup Day . ”
43005011	Dat man ansa say , “ De man wa mek me well tell me fa pick op me mat an waak . ”
43005012	Den de Jew leada dem aks um say , “ Wa man tell ya fa do dat ? ”
43005013	De man wa Jedus been mek well ain know who dat been , cause dey been a heapa people dey , an Jedus done slip way .
43005014	Jedus find dat man eenside God House . E tell um say , “ Look yah , ya well now . Mus dohn sin no mo , or sompin mo wossa gwine happen ta ya . ”
43005015	Den de man lef Jedus an gone fa tell de Jew leada dem say , dat man wa mek um well , e name Jedus .
43005016	So den de Jew leada dem staat fa do Jedus bad cause e mek de man well pon de Woshup Day .
43005017	Jedus tell um say , “ Me Fada da wok all de time eben ta now , an A da wok too . ”
43005018	Wen Jedus say dat , de Jew leada dem cide fa kill um fa sho , cause e broke de Jew Law pon de Woshup Day . An den too , e eben say dat God e own Fada , so e mek esef same like God .
43005019	Jedus ton ta de Jew leada dem an e say , “ A da tell oona fa true , de Son cyahn do nottin by esef . E do jes wa e see e Fada da do . De Son cyahn do nottin mo den dat . Wasoneba de Fada do , dat wa de Son do too .
43005020	Cause de Fada lob e Son an e da show um all wa e da do . E gwine show de Son mo ting wa e fa do wa a whole heap mo betta den dis ting yah . Dem gwine mek oona stonish bout um fa true .
43005021	Jes like how de Fada da mek people wa done dead git op , come out fom dey grabe an mek um lib gin , same fashion de Son da gii life ta dem dat e wahn fa gim .
43005022	Fodamo , de Fada esef ain jedge nobody . E done gii e son all tority fa jedge people .
43005023	E do dat so dat all people gwine gii hona ta de Son same like how dey gii hona ta de Fada . Dem wa ain gii hona ta de Son , dey ain gii hona ta de Fada wa sen de Son eenta de wol .
43005024	“ A da tell oona fa true , de poson wa da yeh me wod an bleebe pon de one wa sen me eenta de wol , dat poson done got de true life wa ain neba gwine end , an God ain gwine jedge um . E been dead , bot now e done cross oba ta de true life .
43005025	Fa true , de time da come an e done come now , wen de people wa done dead gwine yeh wa God Son da say , an ebrybody wa yeh de Son gwine lib .
43005026	Cause de Fada , e de one weh life come fom , an e got powa fa gii life . Same fashion , e mek life come fom de Son esef an e got powa fa gii life .
43005027	An de Fada been gii de Son de tority fa jedge all people , cause de Son , e de Man wa Come fom God .
43005028	Oona mus dohn be stonish bout dat . De time da come wen all de people wa done dead an een dey grabe gwine yeh wa de Son say .
43005029	Dey gwine git op outta dey grabe . Dem wa beena do good gwine git op outta dey grabe an git life wa las faeba . Bot dem wa beena do bad , dey gwine git op outta dey grabe an git jedge .
43005030	“ A ain got de tority fa do nottin by mesef . A da jedge people same like how A yeh God tell me fa jedge um . So den A jedge people de right way cause A ain da try fa do wa A wahn . A da do wa me Fada wa sen me wahn , an no mo .
43005031	“ Ef A say great ting bout mesef , e ain gwine mount ta much cause nobody ain gwine bleebe wa A say .
43005032	Bot dey a noda poson wa tell bout me , an A know dat wa e say bout me , dat de trute .
43005033	Oona done sen messenja fa aks John bout me , an wa John tell um , dat de trute .
43005034	Dat ain fa say dat A pend pon wa people say bout me . A da tell oona dat wa John say bout me de trute , so dat God kin sabe oona .
43005035	John been same like a lamp wa beena bun an de light shine bright fa mek all people see . Oona done gree fa leh de light shine pon oona fa a leetle wile an mek oona haat glad .
43005036	Bot wa A da do show wa A da fa true , mo den wa John say bout me . A da do all wa me Fada tell me fa do , jes dat . Dem wok yah wa A da do da mek people know who A da . Dey show dat me Fada sen me fa come eenta de wol .
43005037	An de Fada wa sen me , e too been say who A da . Oona ain neba yeh e boice . Oona ain neba see wa e look like .
43005038	An oona ain keep e wod een oona haat cause oona ain bleebe pon de one wa e sen fa come eenta de wol .
43005039	Oona da study God wod haad cause oona tink dey gwine gii oona life wa las faeba . An dem wod da tell bout me !
43005040	Stillyet oona ain wahn fa come ta me so dat oona kin hab true life .
43005041	“ A ain da look fa people fa praise me .
43005042	Bot A know oona . A know oona ain lob God een oona haat .
43005043	A done come een me Fada name . E sen me wid e tority , bot oona ain pay me no mind . Ef noda poson come een e own name an ain nobody sen um , oona gwine pay mind ta um .
43005044	Oona lob fa git praise fom one noda . Bot oona ain try fa git praise fom de onliest God . So den how oona gwine bleebe wa A say ?
43005045	Bot oona mus dohn tink dat A gwine cuse oona ta de Fada . No , Moses de one wa gwine cuse oona ta de Fada . Dat de same Moses wa oona beena look fa sabe oona .
43005046	Ef oona bleebe wa Moses say fa true , oona gwine bleebe wa A say , cause Moses write bout me .
43005047	Bot oona ain bleebe wa e write bout me . So den fa sho oona ain gwine bleebe wa A da say , ainty ? ”
43006001	Atta wile , Jedus cross back oba Lake Galilee ( wa some call Lake Tiberias ) .
43006002	A big crowd ob people beena folla Jedus , cause dey see dem miracle wa e done wen e mek de sick people well .
43006003	Jedus an e ciple dem gone op ta a mountain an seddown dey .
43006004	De time fa de Jew Passoba Feas been close .
43006005	Wen Jedus look roun , e see de big crowd ob people da come ta um , so e aks Philip say , “ Weh we gwine buy bread nuff fa feed dem people ? ”
43006006	Jedus say dat jes fa test Philip fa see wa e gwine do . Cause Jedus done been know wa e gwine do .
43006007	Philip ansa Jedus say , “ Fa gii all ob dem eben jes a leetle bit fa nyam , we gwine haffa hab mo den two hundud silba coin fa buy de bread . ”
43006008	Den noda one ob Jedus ciple dem , Andrew , de broda ob Simon Peter , say ,
43006009	“ Dis leetle boy yah got fibe baaley bread an two fish . Bot dem ain gwine be nuff fa all dem people yah , ainty ? ”
43006010	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Oona mus tell de people fa seddown . ” Plenty grass been dey , so ebrybody seddown . Dey been roun fibe tousan man dey .
43006011	Jedus tek de bread an tell God tankya , an den e gii out bread fa de people wa beena seddown . E do de same ting wid de fish . An all de people git all dey wahn fa nyam .
43006012	Wen dey all been full op wid food , Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Mus geda op all de leetle piece dem wa lef oba . Mus dohn waste nottin . ”
43006013	So e ciple dem geda all de leetle piece dem wa been lef oba fom de fibe baaley bread atta de people done nyam , an dey full op tweb basket wid bread .
43006014	Wen de people see de miracle wa Jedus done , dey say , “ Fa true , dis man de Prophet wa Moses say gwine come eenta de wol . ”
43006015	Jedus know de people been wahn fa come git um an mek um king , so e gone way gin , op eenta de mountain . E ain tek nobody wid um .
43006016	Een de ebenin time de ciple dem gone ta de lake .
43006017	Dey git eenta a boat an staat back cross de lake fa go ta Capernaum . Night come , an Jedus still ain come ta um .
43006018	A big wind beena blow an de wata staat fa git rough .
43006019	De ciple dem row bout shree mile wen dey see Jedus da waak pon de wata . E waak op close ta de boat an dey been mos scaid ta det .
43006020	Jedus tell um say , “ Dis me ! Mus dohn be scaid . ”
43006021	Wen dey know dat been Jedus , dey been heppy fa hep um eenta de boat . An dat same time dey , de boat reach lan weh dey beena go .
43006022	De crowd ob people beena stay dey ta de oda side ob de lake . De nex day , wen dey come fa see Jedus , dey memba dat jes one boat been dey . Dey know dat Jedus ain been git eenta dat boat wid e ciple dem , an de ciple dem done lef fa Capernaum dout um .
43006023	Den some oda boat dem come fom Tiberias an lan close ta de place weh de crowd nyam de bread , atta de Lawd done tell God tankya fa de bread .
43006024	Wen de people dem ain see Jedus needa e ciple dem dey , dey git eenta de boat dem an gone fa look fa Jedus een Capernaum .
43006025	Wen de people cross ta de oda side ob de lake , dey see Jedus . An dey aks um say , “ Teacha , wen ya git yah ? ”
43006026	Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true . Oona come da look fa me cause A been gii oona de bread , an oona nyam til oona been sattify . Oona ain come ta me cause oona ondastan wa de miracle dem wa A da do mean .
43006027	Oona mus dohn wok fa food wa ain gwine las . Stead ob dat , oona mus wok fa de food wa da gii life wa ain neba gwine end . Dat de food wa de Man wa Come fom God gwine gii oona , cause de Fada God been show fa true dat e heppy wid me . ”
43006028	Den de people aks Jedus say , “ Wa we haffa do , so dat we kin do de wok God wahn we fa do ? ”
43006029	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dis yah de wok wa God wahn oona fa do : Oona mus bleebe pon de one wa God sen eenta de wol . ”
43006030	Dey aks um back say , “ So den wa miracle ob powa ya gwine do so dat we gwine see an bleebe ya ? Wa wok ya gwine do ?
43006031	We ole people beena nyam de manna wen dey been dey een de wildaness . Like dey write een God Book say , ‘ E gim bread wa come fom heaben fa nyam . ’ ”
43006032	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell oona fa true , ain Moses wa been gii oona de bread wa come fom heaben . Me Fada , e de one wa da gii oona de true bread wa come fom heaben .
43006033	Cause de bread wa God da gii , dat de one wa da come down fom heaben an da gii people een de wol de true life . ”
43006034	Den dey say , “ Please sah , gii we dat bread all de time . ”
43006035	Jedus tell um say , “ A de bread wa da gii life . Ebrybody wa come ta me ain neba gwine git hongry , an ebrybody wa bleebe pon me ain neba gwine git tosty .
43006036	Bot like A done tell oona , oona done see me , stillyet oona ain bleebe pon me .
43006037	All dem wa me Fada gii me gwine come ta me . A ain neba gwine ton way nobody wa come ta me .
43006038	Cause A come down fom heaben fa do wa de one wa sen me wahn me fa do . A ain come down fom heaben fa do wa A wahn .
43006039	An de one wa sen me ain wahn me fa loss eben one ob all dem wa e done gii me . E wahn me fa mek um all git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , pon de las day .
43006040	Cause me Fada wahn all people wa da look ta e Son an bleebe pon um fa git life wa ain neba gwine end . An A gwine mek um all git op fom mongst de dead pon de las day . ”
43006041	Den de Jew dem staat fa aagy ginst um , cause Jedus say , “ A de bread wa come down fom heaben . ”
43006042	Dey say , “ Dis man yah Jedus , Joseph son , ainty ? We know e fada an e modda . How e kin say now , ‘ A come down fom heaben ? ’ ”
43006043	Jedus tell um say , “ Oona mus dohn grumble mongst one noda !
43006044	Ain nobody kin come ta me cep me Fada wa sen me bring dat poson ta me . An A gwine mek dat poson git op fom mongst de dead people pon de las day .
43006045	De prophet dem been write say , ‘ God gwine laan all dem wa dey fa do . ’ Ebrybody wa pay mind ta de Fada an laan wa e laan um , dey gwine come ta me .
43006046	Dat ain mean fa say dat dey done see de Fada . Ain nobody see de Fada cep de one wa come fom God . E de onliest one wa see de Fada .
43006047	A da tell oona fa true , de poson wa bleebe pon me , dat one dey done git true life wa ain neba gwine end .
43006048	A de bread wa da gii life .
43006049	Oona ole people beena nyam de manna wen dey been dey een de wildaness . Stillyet , dey done dead .
43006050	Bot dis de bread wa come down fom heaben , dat a poson kin nyam an e ain gwine dead .
43006051	A de bread wa da gii life , wa come down fom heaben . Ebrybody wa da nyam dis bread , dat one gwine git true life wa ain neba gwine end . Dis bread wa A gwine gii , dat me body wa A gwine gii fa be a sacrifice so dat all people een de wol kin git true life . ”
43006052	Dis wa Jedus say mek de people bex , an dey staat fa aagy wid one noda . Dey say , “ How dis man yah gwine gii we e body fa nyam ? ”
43006053	Jedus tell um say , “ A da tell oona fa true . Ef oona ain nyam de body ob de Man wa Come fom God an drink e blood , oona ain gwine git no true life .
43006054	Ebrybody wa nyam me body an drink me blood , dey got true life wa ain neba gwine end . An A gwine mek um git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , pon de las day .
43006055	Cause me body de true food fa nyam , an me blood de true drink .
43006056	Ebrybody wa nyam me body an drink me blood , dey da lib een me haat , an A da lib een dey haat .
43006057	De Fada wa da gii life , e sen me fa come eenta de wol , an de Fada mek me git life . Same way so , A gwine mek ebrybody wa nyam me body git life .
43006058	Dis de bread wa come down fom heaben . E ain like dat bread we ole people beena nyam wen dey been dey een de wildaness . Atta wile , dey done dead . Bot de one wa nyam dis bread yah , e gwine git life wa ain neba gwine end . ”
43006059	Jedus tell de people all dem ting wen e beena laan um een de Jew meetin house een Capernaum .
43006060	Plenty people wa beena folla Jedus , wen dey yeh dem wod , dey say , “ Dem ting wa e da laan we , dey too haad fa tek . Who kin gree fa do wa e da say ? ”
43006061	Jedus been know dat de people beena grumble bout wa e tell um , eben dough nobody ain tell um . So e aks um say , “ Dis ting mek oona wahn fa ton way fom me , ainty ?
43006062	Well den , wa gwine happen ef oona see de Man wa Come fom God da go back op ta de place weh e come fom ?
43006063	God Sperit da gii people life . People ain got no powa fa gii life . De wod dem wa A done tell oona , dey da mek God Sperit , wa da gii life , come ta oona .
43006064	Stillyet , some ob oona ain bleebe . ” ( Fom de time wen Jedus fus staat fa laan de people , e been know dem wa ain gwine bleebe pon um an de poson wa gwine sell um . )
43006065	Jedus taak gin say , “ Dis de ting wa mek me tell oona say , ain nobody gwine come ta me cep de Fada mek dat one able fa come ta me . ”
43006066	Fom dat time dey , plenty people wa beena folla Jedus , dey ton back an ain folla um no mo .
43006067	Jedus aks de tweb ciple dem say , “ Oona wahn fa lef me too ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter ansa say , “ Lawd , who we gwine go ta ? Ya de one wa da say dem wod wa da gii people life wa ain neba gwine end .
43006069	We bleebe , an now we know dat ya de one dat God sen ta we . ”
43006070	Den Jedus say , “ A done pick oona all tweb , ainty ? Stillyet , one ob oona a debil ! ”
43006071	Jedus beena taak bout Judas , de son ob Simon Iscariot . Eben dough Judas been one ob de tweb ciple dem , e been gwine sell Jedus .
43007001	Atta dat , Jedus gone all roun Galilee . E ain been wahn fa go eenta Judea , cause de Jew leada dem wa lib oba dey beena look fa kill um .
43007002	De Jew Feas ob Tabernacle been close .
43007003	So e broda dem tell um say , “ Mus go way fom yah an go ta Judea , so dat de people wa da folla ya kin see dem miracle wa ya da do .
43007004	Nobody ain gwine hide wa e da do wen e wahn people fa know um good . Ya da do dem miracle yah , so den , leh ebrybody een de wol know bout ya ! ”
43007005	( Cause eben Jedus own broda dem ain bleebe pon um . )
43007006	Jedus tell um say , “ Fa oona , e ain matta wa time , bot de time ain right fa me yet .
43007007	De people ob de wol , dey boun fa like oona . Bot dey hate me cause A da tell um dat dey da do bad .
43007008	Bot oona go head on ta Jerusalem fa de Feas . A ain gwine dey cause de time fa me ain right . ”
43007009	Atta Jedus say dat , e stay on een Galilee .
43007010	Atta Jedus broda dem done gone ta Jerusalem fa de Feas , Jedus gone dey too . E gone by esef so de people ain shim .
43007011	De Jew leada dem beena look fa Jedus dey . Dey beena aks de people fa um say , “ Weh dat man dey ? ”
43007012	Plenty people een de crowd beena whispa bout Jedus . Some dem say , “ Jedus one good man . ” Oda dem say , “ No , Jedus ain no good man . E da fool de people . ”
43007013	Bot nobody ain taak loud bout Jedus fa mek de crowd yeh cause dey been scaid ob de Jew leada dem .
43007014	De holiday feas done been gone bout haf way wen Jedus gone ta God House an staat fa laan de people dey .
43007015	De Jew leada dem stonish , an dey aks say , “ Hoccome dis man know sommuch wen e ain been ta school eben one day ? ”
43007016	Jedus ansa um say , “ E ain me own laanin . A da laan oona bout de one wa sen me . E tell me wa fa laan oona .
43007017	Ebrybody wa wahn fa do wa God wahn , dey gwine know ef God da tell me wa A da laan people or ef wa A da taak da come jes fom me .
43007018	De poson wa da tell jes wa da come fom esef , e da try fa mek people praise um . Bot de poson wa wahn fa mek people praise de one wa sen um , dat poson trute mout . E ain got no lie noweh bout um .
43007019	Moses done gii oona de Law , ainty ? Bot ain none ob oona da do wa de Law say . Wa mek oona da try fa kill me ? ”
43007020	De crowd ob people ansa say , “ Ya got a debil dey een ya ! Who dat da try fa kill ya ? ”
43007021	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona all been stonish wen A done one miracle .
43007022	Stillyet , Moses done tell oona fa circumcise oona boy chullun . ( Bot fa true Moses ain de one wa fus staat fa circumcise . De ole people fus staat fa do dat ) . So oona da circumcise boy chullun pon de Woshup Day .
43007023	Now den , ef oona circumcise boy chullun pon de Woshup Day so dat oona kin keep de Law wa Moses gii oona , hoccome oona bex wid me cause A mek a poson well pon de Woshup Day ?
43007024	Oona mus dohn jedge jes wa oona da see . Mus jedge how ting da fa true . ”
43007025	Den some de people dey een Jerusalem beena aks say , “ Dis de man wa de Jew leada dem da try fa kill , ainty ?
43007026	Bot see yah , e da taak yah weh ebrybody yeh um , an dey ain say nottin ginst um ! Ya spose de Jew leada dem know fa true dat Jedus , e de Messiah ?
43007027	Bot wen de Messiah come , nobody ain gwine know weh e come fom , an we all know weh dis man come fom . ”
43007028	So wen Jedus beena laan de people een God House , e taak loud say , “ Oona tink ya know me good , ainty ? An oona tink ya know weh A come fom . Bot A ain come yah on me own . De one wa sen me , e fa true , an oona ain know um .
43007029	Bot A know um , cause A come fom um an e sen me . ”
43007030	Den dey try fa grab hole ta Jedus an res um , bot ain nobody tetch um , cause de time fa tek um ain come yet .
43007031	Stillyet , heapa people een de crowd bleebe pon Jedus . Dey say , “ Wen de Messiah Christ come , e ain gwine do no mo miracle den wa dis man yah done do , ainty ? ”
43007032	De Pharisee dem yeh de crowd da whispa dem ting bout Jedus . So de Pharisee dem an de leada dem ob de priest dem , dey sen gyaad fom God House fa grab hole ta Jedus an res um .
43007033	Jedus say , “ A gwine stay wid oona jes a leetle wile longa . Den A gwine back ta de one wa sen me fa come eenta de wol .
43007034	Wen dat time come , oona gwine look fa me bot oona ain gwine find me , cause oona ain able fa go ta de place weh A da gwine . ”
43007035	De Jew leada dem staat fa taak ta one noda say , “ Weh dis man tink e da gwine weh we ain gwine find um ? Ya tink e da gwine ta dem town weh de Jew people da lib mongst de people wa ain Jew , fa laan dem wa ain Jew dey ?
43007036	Dis man say , ‘ Oona gwine look fa me , bot oona ain gwine find me . ’ An e say , ‘ Oona ain able fa go ta de place weh A da gwine . ’ Wa e mean fa say ? ”
43007037	De las day ob de holiday feas been a big day , mo bigga den all de oda day . Dat day Jedus stanop an say een a loud boice , “ Ebrybody wa tosty , leh um come ta me . Come drink .
43007038	Dey done write een God Book say , ‘ Ebrybody wa bleebe pon me , a heapa wata wa da gii life gwine come out like a riba fom eenside dey haat . ’ ”
43007039	Jedus say dat bout de Sperit wa all de people wa bleebe pon um gwine git . God ain gim e Sperit yet , cause e ain sen Jedus fa go op eenta heaben an git hona yet .
43007040	Some people een de crowd yeh wa Jedus say an dey say , “ Fa true , dis man yah de Prophet wa we beena look fa ! ”
43007041	Oda people say , “ Dis man yah de Messiah . ”
43007042	Ain dey been write een God Book say de Messiah gwine come fom de fambly ob de people leada , King David ? De Messiah gwine bon een Betlem , de town weh King David been lib , ainty ? ”
43007043	So den , de people beena spute an tek side ginst one noda bout Jedus .
43007044	Some ob de people been wahn fa grab hole ta Jedus an res um , bot nobody ain tetch um .
43007045	De gyaad dem fom God House come back ta de leada dem ob de priest dem an de Pharisee dem . An dem leada an Pharisee aks de gyaad hoccome dey ain bring Jedus ta um .
43007046	De gyaad dem ansa say , “ Nobody ain neba taak like dis man yah . ”
43007047	De Pharisee dem say , “ Oona mean fa say dat Jedus done fool oona , too ?
43007048	Oona ain neba know no Jew leada needa no Pharisee wa bleebe pon Jedus , ainty ?
43007049	Dis crowd ob people yah ain know de Law wa God gii Moses , so God gwine punish um ! ”
43007050	Now den , one ob de Pharisee dem been Nicodemus . E de one wa been gone fa see Jedus fo all dis happen . Nicodemus taak ta e broda Pharisee dem .
43007051	E say , “ We Law say we mus dohn condemn a poson fo we yeh wa dat poson got fa say , so dat we kin know wa e done , ainty ? ”
43007052	Den e broda Pharisee dem ansa Nicodemus say , “ Well , ya da taak like ya come outta Galilee too . Tek time fa look at wa dey done write een God Book an ya gwine laan dat dey ain no prophet wa eba come outta Galilee . ”
43007053	An all ob um gone ta dey own house . ]
43008001	Jedus gone ta de Mount Olib .
43008002	Day clean de nex day , Jedus gone back ta God House . All de people geda roun um an e seddown an e laan um .
43008003	De Jew Law teacha an Pharisee dem bring one ooman wa dey been ketch da sleep wid a man wa ain e husban . Dey mek de ooman stanop fo all de people .
43008004	Den dey tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , dey ketch dis ooman da sleep wid a man wa ain e husban .
43008005	We Jew Law wa God gii Moses chaage we fa chunk stone pon ooman like dis til e dead . Wa ya say bout dat ? ”
43008006	Dey say dat fa yeh wa Jedus gwine say . Dey beena try fa mek Jedus say sompin so dat dey kin cuse um , say e ain ansa right . Bot Jedus stoop down an write pon de groun wid e finga .
43008007	De Law teacha an Pharisee dem beena keep on da aks Jedus bout dat , so Jedus stanop an say , “ Ef one ob oona yah ain neba sin , leh dat poson chunk de fus stone pon dis ooman . ”
43008008	Den Jedus stoop down gin an write pon de groun .
43008009	Wen dey yeh wa Jedus say , dey all lef dey , one by one . De ole one dem fus come outta dey , an den de nyoung one dem . So den jes Jedus been lef , an de ooman beena still stanop dey .
43008010	Jedus stanop an aks de ooman say , “ Weh ebrybody ? Ain nobody yah fa condemn ya ? ”
43008011	De ooman ansa say , “ Ain nobody yah , sah ! ”
43008012	Wen Jedus taak gin ta de people , e say , “ A de Light ob de wol . De one wa da folla me gwine hab de light wa da gii life an e ain gwine neba waak een de daak . ”
43008013	De Pharisee dem say , “ Ya jes da taak bout yasef . Nobody ain yah fa stan fa ya , so wa ya da say ain mean nottin . ”
43008014	Jedus ansa um say , “ Ain nobody yah fa stan fa me . Bot A da taak true , cause A know weh A come fom an weh A da gwine . Oona ain know weh A come fom an oona ain know weh A da gwine .
43008015	Oona da jedge like how people jedge oda people . A ain jedge nobody .
43008016	Bot ef A fa jedge people , A gwine jedge um scraight . Cause ain jes me wa gwine jedge um . Me Fada wa sen me , e yah wid me .
43008017	Een oona own Jew Law dey write say , wen two people say de same ting bout wa happen , dat mean dey da taak true .
43008018	A da stan fa mesef , an me Fada wa sen me , e da stan fa me . ”
43008019	Dey aks um say , “ Weh ya Fada dey ? ”
43008020	Jedus say dem wod wen e beena laan de people een God House , eenside de room weh de collection box been . Bot nobody ain res um cause de time fa res um ain come yet .
43008021	Jedus tell de people gin say , “ A gwine off . Oona gwine look fa me , bot oona gwine dead wid all oona sin . Oona ain able fa gone ta de place weh A da gwine . ”
43008022	So de Jew leada dem say , “ Dis man say we ain able fa gone ta de place weh e da gwine . Oona tink dat mean e gwine kill esef ? ”
43008023	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona blongst ta dis wol yah , bot A come fom heaben . Oona come fom dis wol , bot A ain come fom dis wol .
43008024	Dat wa mek me tell oona say , oona gwine dead wid all oona sin . Ef oona ain bleebe dat A de one A say A da , fa sho oona gwine dead wid oona sin . ”
43008025	Dey aks Jedus say , “ Who ya da ? ”
43008026	A hab a heapa ting fa say bout oona , an a heapa ting fa jedge oona fa . Bot de one wa sen me , e fa true . An A da tell de people een de wol jes wa e tell me . ”
43008027	Dey ain ondastan dat Jedus beena tell um bout de Fada wa dey een heaben .
43008028	So den Jedus tell um say , “ Wen oona lif op de Man wa Come fom God , den oona gwine know who A da . Oona gwine know dat A ain do nottin on me own . A jes say wa de Fada laan me fa say .
43008029	An de one wa sen me , e dey wid me . E ain lef me ta mesef , cause all de time A da do jes wa e wahn me fa do . ”
43008030	Plenty people wa yeh Jedus say dem wod , dey bleebe pon um .
43008031	So den Jedus tell de Jew dem wa bleebe pon um say , “ Ef oona keep on da do all wa A tell oona fa do , oona me ciple fa true .
43008032	Den oona gwine know de trute , an de trute gwine mek oona free . ”
43008033	Dey ansa Jedus say , “ We de chullun ob Abraham . We ain neba been nobody slabe . So hoccome ya da tell we , ‘ Oona gwine be free ? ’ ”
43008034	Jedus ansa um say , “ A da tell oona fa true , ebrybody wa sin , dey de slabe ta sin .
43008035	Slabe ain blongst ta e massa house faeba , bot de son blongst ta e fada house faeba .
43008036	So ef God Son mek oona free , den oona gwine be free fa true .
43008037	A know oona de chullun ob Abraham . Stillyet , oona da try fa kill me cause oona ain wahn fa do wa A tell oona .
43008038	A da tell oona bout dem ting wa God me Fada done show me , bot oona da do wa oona own fada tell oona fa do . ”
43008039	Dey ansa Jedus say , “ Abraham we fada . ”
43008040	A da tell oona jes dem true wod wa A yeh fom God . Stillyet , oona da try fa kill me . Abraham ain do nottin like dat .
43008041	Oona da do wa oona true fada do . ”
43008042	Jedus say , “ Ef God been oona Fada fa true , oona been gwine lob me . Cause A come fom God fa come yah . A ain jes come on me own , bot me Fada God sen me .
43008043	Hoccome oona so haad head dat oona ain ondastan wa A da say ? Oona ain ondastan cause oona ain wahn fa yeh wa A da tell oona .
43008044	De Debil , e oona fada , an oona wahn fa do wa oona fada wahn . Fom way back wen time staat , de Debil beena kill people . An e ain like nottin true , cause dey ain nottin true bout um . Wensoneba e da tell lie , dat jes da show how e da , cause e da tell lie all de time . An e de one weh de lie fus staat .
43008045	Bot A da tell de trute . Cause ob dat , oona ain bleebe me !
43008046	Ain eben one ob oona kin show dat A done sin , ainty ? So den , ef A da tell de trute , hoccome oona ain bleebe me ?
43008047	Poson wa blongst ta God da listen ta God wod . Bot oona ain blongst ta God , an dat hoccome oona ain listen ta God wod . ”
43008048	De Jew people aks Jedus say , “ Ain we da tell de trute wen we say ya come fom Samaria an ya got a ebil sperit dey een ya ? ”
43008049	Jedus say , “ A ain got no ebil sperit , bot A gii hona ta me Fada . An oona ain gii me no hona tall .
43008050	A ain da try fa mek people gii me hona . Bot dey one wa gwine gii me hona , an e gwine jedge scraight .
43008051	A da tell oona fa true , ebrybody wa da do wa A da laan um , dey ain neba gwine dead . ”
43008052	Den de Jew dem tell Jedus say , “ Now we know fa sho dat ya got a ebil sperit dey een ya ! Abraham done dead , an all de prophet dem dead . Stillyet ya say , ‘ Ebrybody wa da do wa A da laan um , dey ain neba gwine dead . ’
43008053	We fada Abraham done dead . Ya mean fa say dat ya mo bigga den Abraham ? De prophet dem done dead too . Who ya spose fa be ? ”
43008054	Jedus ansa um say , “ Ef A da gii hona ta mesef , dat ain nottin . Me Fada de one wa da gii hona ta me , an e de one wa oona da call oona God .
43008055	Oona ain neba know um , bot A know um . Ef A say dat A ain know um , A been fa lie same like oona . Bot A know um , an A da do wa e say .
43008056	Oona fada Abraham been too heppy cause God show um de time wen A gwine come eenta de wol . Fo A bon , e been know A gwine come , so e been heppy . ”
43008057	De Jew people say , “ Ya ain fifty yeah ole yet . Hoccome ya say ya done see Abraham ? ”
43008058	Jedus ansa um say , “ A da tell oona fa true , fo Abraham bon , ‘ A da . ’ ”
43008059	Den de people pick op stone fa chunk pon Jedus , bot e hide an come out fom eenside God House .
43009001	Wen Jedus beena waak long , e see a bline eye man wa been bon bline .
43009002	De ciple dem aks Jedus say , “ Teacha , who dat sin wa mek dis man yah bon bline ? Dat man sin , or e modda an e fada ? ”
43009003	Jedus ansa say , “ De bline wa oona see een dis man eye yah ain got nottin fa do wid e own sin , needa e modda an e fada sin . E bline so dat people kin see de wok wa God gwine do een e life .
43009004	Long as de daytime las , we haffa do de wok wa de one wa sen me gii we fa do . Cause de night time da come , an dey ain nobody gwine be able fa wok den .
43009005	Wiles A dey yah een de wol , A de light ob de wol . ”
43009006	Atta Jedus say dat , e spit pon de groun . Den e mek mud wid de spit an e rub de mud pon de bline man eye .
43009007	E tell de man say , “ Mus go wash ya face een de wata ta de Pool ob Siloam . ” ( Siloam mean “ De one wa dey sen . ” ) So de man gone . An atta e wash e face dey een de wata , jes den e able fa see . E gone back ta e house , e see ebryting .
43009008	E neighba dem an de people wa beena shim wen e nyuse fa beg , dey say , “ Ain dis de man wa nyuse fa seddown an beg ? ”
43009009	Some people ansa say , “ Dat de man . ” Bot oda people say , “ No , dat ain de man . E jes fabor um . ”
43009010	So de people aks um say , “ Hoccome ya kin see now ? ”
43009011	De man ansa um , “ De man dey call Jedus mek mud wa e rub pon me eye . Den e tell me say , ‘ Mus go wash ya face een de wata ta de Pool ob Siloam . ’ So A gone , an atta A wash me face , A been able fa see . ”
43009012	Dey aks um say , “ Weh Jedus dey ? ”
43009013	Den de people tek de man wa been bon bline an gone ta de Pharisee dem .
43009014	Now den , Jedus been mek de mud an heal dat bline eye man pon de Woshup Day .
43009015	So de Pharisee dem aks de man noda time hoccome e able fa see . De man tell um say , “ E rub mud pon me eye an A wash me face , an now A able fa see . ”
43009016	Some de Pharisee dem say , “ De man wa done dis ain come fom God , cause e ain do wa de Law say we fa do pon de Woshup Day . ”
43009017	So de Pharisee dem aks de man gin say , “ Ya de one dat man mek able fa see . So den , wa ya say bout um ? ”
43009018	Stillyet , de Jew leada dem ain bleebe de man been bline an now e kin see , til wen dey sen fa e modda an e fada .
43009019	Dey aks um say , “ Dis man oona chile ? Oona say e bon bline . Well , hoccome e able fa see now ? ”
43009020	De man modda an fada ansa um say , “ We know dis we chile , an we know e been bline wen e bon .
43009021	Bot we ain know hoccome e able fa see now . An we ain know who dat heal e eye . Oona mus aks um . E ole nuff . E kin taak fa esef ! ”
43009022	De man modda an e fada say dat cause dey been scaid ob dem Jew leada . De Jew leada dem done beena gree dat ebrybody wa say e bleebe Jedus de Messiah Christ , dem leada gwine chunk um fom outta de Jew meetin house .
43009023	Dat wa mek de man modda an e fada say , “ Oona mus aks um . E ole nuff . E kin taak fa esef ! ”
43009024	De Jew leada dem call de man wa been bline fa come back , an dey tell um say , “ Ya mus sweah fo God dat ya gwine tell we de trute ! We know dat dis man wa heal ya eye got sin een e life . ”
43009025	De man ansa um say , “ A ain know ef e got sin or ef e ain got sin een e life . One ting A know fa sho . A been bline , bot now A da see . ”
43009026	Dey aks um gin say , “ Wa de man do ta ya fa heal ya eye ? ”
43009027	De man ansa um say , “ A done tell oona , bot oona ain listen . Wa mek oona wahn me fa tell oona gin ? Oona wahn fa be e ciple too ? ”
43009028	Wen dem Pharisee yeh dat , dey shrow slam at de man an say , “ Ya dat man ciple , ainty ! We Moses ciple .
43009029	We know God done taak ta Moses , bot dis man yah , we ain eben know weh e come fom . ”
43009030	De man ansa say , “ Dat sho nuff scrange ! Oona ain eben know weh dis man come fom , bot e done heal me eye .
43009031	We know God ain yeh wa no sinna say ta um . Bot God yeh all de people wa woshup um fa true an do wa e tell um fa do .
43009032	Fom wen God fus mek de wol , nobody ain neba yeh say dat somebody done heal a poson wa been bon bline .
43009033	Ef dis man ain been come fom God , e ain been able fa do nottin . ”
43009034	Den dem Jew leada ansa say , “ Ya done bon wid sin all roun ya . Ya da try fa laan we ? ” Den dey shrow de man outta de meetin house .
43009035	Jedus yeh say dey been chunk de man out , so e gone an find de man an e aks um say , “ Ya bleebe pon de Man wa Come fom God ? ”
43009036	De man ansa say , “ Sah , tell me who dis Man wa Come fom God , so A kin bleebe pon um ! ”
43009037	Jedus say , “ Ya done shim . E da taak ta ya . ”
43009038	De man say , “ Lawd , A bleebe ya ! ” An e kneel down fo Jedus an e woshup um .
43009039	Jedus say , “ A come eenta dis wol fa jedge , so dat bline eye people kin see , an dem wa see kin ton out fa be bline . ”
43009040	Some Pharisee been dey wid Jedus an dey yeh wa e say . Dey aks Jedus , “ Ya ain mean fa say we bline too , ainty ? ”
43009041	Jedus tell um say , “ Ef oona been bline , oona ain been guilty fa none ob oona sin . Bot now dat oona say oona ain bline , dat mean dat oona guilty stillyet . ”
