43010001	Jedus say , “ A da tell oona fa true , de poson wa ain go shru de gyateway fa go eenside de sheep pen , bot e climb een some oda side eenta weh de sheep dey , e a tief an a robba .
43010002	De poson wa go shru de gyateway fa go eenside , dat de shephud , de one wa da mind de sheep fa true .
43010003	De gyateman kin open op de gyate fa de shephud , an de sheep pay mind ta de shephud boice . De shephud call e own sheep name , an dey come ta um . E da waak head ob um , da lead um shru de gyateway outta de sheep pen .
43010004	An wen de shephud done lead all ob e own sheep out shru de gyateway , e da waak head ob um . An dey da folla um , cause dey know e boice .
43010005	De sheep ain neba gwine folla noda poson wa dey ain know . Fa true , dey gwine ron way fom noda poson , cause dey ain know dat poson boice . ”
43010006	Jedus tell dis paable ta de people , bot dey ain ondastan wa e mean fa say .
43010007	So Jedus tell um gin say , “ A da tell oona fa true , A de gyate fa de sheep fa go shru .
43010008	All dem people wa come fo me , dey tief an robba , an de sheep ain pay um no mind .
43010009	A de gyate . Ebrybody wa go shru me fa go eenside , dey gwine be sabe . Dey gwine be free fa go een an come out fa go find green grass fa nyam .
43010010	De tief jes come fa tief , fa kill an stroy . Bot A come so dat dey kin hab true life , so dat dey kin lib a life ob joy wa heap op an ron oba .
43010011	A de good shephud . De good shephud ready fa gii e life fa de sheep .
43010012	De poson wa git pay fa mind oda people sheep , e ain no true shephud , an de sheep ain blongst ta um . So den , de poson wa de sheep ain blongst ta , wen e see de wolf da come , e gwine ron way an lef de sheep . Den de wolf gwine come een pon dem sheep an grab hole ta one . An de res ob de sheep gwine ron all oba de place .
43010013	De poson wa de sheep ain blongst ta , e gwine ron way cause e dey fa git pay fa e wok . So e ain cyah fa true bout no sheep .
43010014	A de good shephud . Jes like de Fada know me an A know de Fada , same way so A know me own sheep an me own sheep know me . An A ready fa gii me life fa de sheep .
43010015	
43010016	A hab oda sheep wa blongst ta me , bot dey ain een dis flock yah . A haffa bring dem too . An wen A taak ta um , dey gwine pay mind ta me too . So den , all de sheep gwine come togeda an dey gwine be one flock an hab one shephud fa mind um .
43010017	Me Fada lob me cause A ready fa gii me life , so dat wen A shru wid dat , A gwine tek me life back op gin .
43010018	Nobody ain gwine kill me ef A ain gree ta um . A de one wa gree fa leh um kill me . A got de powa fa gii me life , an A got de powa fa tek me life back gin . Dat wa me Fada done chaage me fa do . ”
43010019	Wen de Jew people yeh dem wod wa Jedus say , dey ain been able fa gree mongst deysef gin .
43010020	Heapa dem say , “ A ebil sperit dey een dat man ! E mad ! Hoccome oona da listen ta um ? ”
43010021	Bot oda dem say , “ Ef a man got a ebil sperit een um , e ain gwine taak like dat ! Ain no way a ebil sperit able fa mek de bline see , ainty ? ”
43010022	Winta time come , an de people gone ta Jerusalem fa de holiday dey call de Feas ob de Dedication .
43010023	An Jedus been dey . E beena waak een God House , een de side dey call Solomon Piza .
43010024	De Jew people geda roun um an aks um say , “ How long ya gwine mek we wait ? Ya mus tell we de plain trute so we kin ondastan ef ya de Messiah dat God been promise . ”
43010025	Jedus ansa um say , “ A done tell oona , bot oona ain bleebe me . Dem miracle wa A da do een me Fada name , dey da show oona dat A de Messiah Christ .
43010026	Oona ain bleebe me cause oona ain me own sheep .
43010027	Me sheep pay mind ta wa A da tell um . A know um , an dey da folla me .
43010028	A gim life wa las faeba . Dey ain gwine neba dead . Ain nobody able fa tek um outta me han .
43010029	Me Fada wa gii me dem sheep , e hab powa mo bigga den all . Ain nobody able fa tek um outta me Fada han .
43010030	Me an me Fada , we one . ”
43010031	Wen Jedus say dat , de Jew people pick op stone gin fa stone um .
43010032	Jedus tell um say , “ A done do plenty miracle wa oona see , an me Fada gii me powa fa do um . Wish one ob dem miracle mek oona wahn fa stone me ? ”
43010033	De Jew people ansa um say , “ We ain wahn fa stone ya fa none ob dem miracle wa ya done . We wahn fa stone ya cause ya da hole God cheap . Ya jes a man , bot ya da tek yasef fa be God ! ”
43010034	Jedus ansa um say , “ Een oona own Law , God say , ‘ Oona god dem , ’ ainty ?
43010035	We know dat wa dey done write een God Book true all de time . An God done say ta de people wa e gii e wod ta , dat dey god dem .
43010036	Fa me own paat , me Fada done pick me fa do e wok an sen me fa come eenta de wol . So wa mek oona say A da hole God cheap wen A say A de Son ob God ?
43010037	Oona mus dohn bleebe me ef A ain da do wa me Fada da do .
43010038	Bot ef A da do wa me Fada da do , eben dough oona ain bleebe me now , oona oughta bleebe cause oona see dem miracle wa A beena do . Cause ob dat , oona kin know fa sho an ondastan dat me Fada dey een me , an A mesef dey een me Fada . ”
43010039	Den de people try fa grab hole ta Jedus gin , bot e git pass um .
43010040	Den Jedus cross back oba de Jerden Riba an gone ta de place weh John fus nyuse fa bactize people , an e stay dey .
43010041	Heapa people gone fa meet um dey , an dey tell one noda say , “ John ain neba done no miracle , bot ebryting wa e say bout dis man yah , all dem ting been true . ”
43010042	An a heapa people een dat place bleebe pon Jedus .
43011001	One man name Lazarus been sick . E beena lib een Bethany , de town weh Mary an e sista Martha beena lib .
43011002	Dis Mary yah dat same ooman wa been pour pafume pon de Lawd foot an den wipe um wid e hair . E broda , Lazarus , de one wa sick .
43011003	So de two sista dem sen wod ta Jedus say , “ Lawd , ya fren wa ya lob , e sick . ”
43011004	Wen Jedus yeh dat , e say , “ Dis ailment yah ain gwine mean dat Lazarus gwine dead . Dis ailment happen fa mek people see God powa an praise um , an so dat de Son ob God gwine git praise . ”
43011005	Jedus lob Martha an e sista an Lazarus .
43011006	Stillyet , wen Jedus yeh dat Lazarus been sick , e stay two mo day een de place weh e been .
43011007	Atta de two day done pass , e tell e ciple dem say , “ Leh we go back ta Judea . ”
43011008	E ciple dem tell Jedus say , “ Teacha , jes a leetle time back , de Jew dem wa lib dey beena try fa stone ya . Now ya wahn fa go back dey ? ”
43011009	Jedus ansa um say , “ Dey tweb hour fom sunop til sundown , ainty ? So ef somebody da waak een de daytime , e ain gwine stumble , cause e da see de light wa dey een dis wol .
43011010	Bot de one wa da waak een de night time gwine stumble , cause e ain got no light een um . ”
43011011	Jedus say dat an den e say fodamo , “ We fren , Lazarus , done gone fa sleep , bot A gwine wake um op . ”
43011012	De ciple dem say , “ Lawd , ef Lazarus da sleep , e gwine git well . ”
43011013	Wen Jedus say Lazarus done gone fa sleep , e wahn fa mek e ciple dem ondastan dat Lazarus done dead . Bot de ciple dem beena tink Jedus mean fa say Lazarus jes da sleep .
43011014	So Jedus tell um plain say , “ Lazarus done dead .
43011015	Bot fa oona sake , A glad A ain been dey wid um , cause dat gwine leh oona laan fa bleebe pon me . Leh we gone ta um . ”
43011016	Thomas , wa dey call de Twin , e tell de oda ciple dem say , “ Leh we all go long wid de Teacha too , so we kin dead wid um . ”
43011017	Wen Jedus git ta Lazarus place , e find out say Lazarus been dead fo day .
43011018	E ain been two mile tween Bethany an Jerusalem .
43011019	An heapa Jew dem done been come fa tell Martha an Mary dat dey saary dey broda Lazarus dead .
43011020	Wen Martha yeh say Jedus da come , e gone fa meet um . Bot Mary ain come outta de house .
43011021	Martha tell Jedus say , “ Lawd , ef ya been yah , me broda ain been fa dead !
43011022	Stillyet A know , eben now God gwine gii ya wasoneba ya aks um fa . ”
43011023	Jedus tell Martha say , “ Ya broda gwine git op an come outta e grabe . E gwine lib gin . ”
43011024	Martha ansa say , “ A know e gwine git op an come outta e grabe pon de las day , wen all people gwine git op an come outta dey grabe . ”
43011025	Jedus tell um say , “ A da mek people git op an come outta dey grabe , an A da gim life . De one wa bleebe pon me , eben dough e done dead , stillyet e gwine lib gin .
43011026	An de one wa da lib an bleebe pon me , e ain neba gwine dead . Ya bleebe dat ? ”
43011027	Martha ansa say , “ Yeah , Lawd , A bleebe ya de Messiah Christ , God Son , wa been fa come eenta de wol . ”
43011028	Atta Martha done say dat , e gone back an call e sista Mary off by esef . E tell um say , “ De Teacha come an e da aks fa ya . ”
43011029	Wen Mary yeh dat , e git op an mek hace an gone fa meet Jedus .
43011030	Jedus ain git ta de willage yet . E still been dey een de place weh Martha been meet um .
43011031	De Jew people wa beena sit wid Mary dey een e house fa ease e haat , dey see Mary git op an mek hace an go out , so dey folla um . Dey beena tink e beena gwine ta Lazarus grabe fa weep dey .
43011032	Wen Mary git ta de place weh Jedus been an e shim , e git down pon de groun down by e foot an say , “ Lawd , ef ya been yah , me broda ain been fa dead ! ”
43011033	Wen Jedus see how Mary an de Jew dem wa been come long wid um beena weep , e haat been too hebby an e beena trouble fa true .
43011034	Jedus aks um say , “ Weh oona bury um ? ”
43011035	Jedus weep .
43011036	De Jew dem say , “ Look yah , oona kin see e beena lob Lazarus a whole heap ! ”
43011037	Bot some ob dem say , “ Jedus done open op de bline man eye , ainty ? Hoccome e ain been able fa keep Lazarus fom det ? ”
43011038	Jedus haat been too hebby gin . E gone ta de tomb . Dat tomb been a cabe , a big rock wid a hole een um , an a stone been dey , da kiba de doormout .
43011039	Jedus say , “ Oona mus moob de stone fom de doormout ! ”
43011040	Jedus tell Martha say , “ Ain A tell ya say , ya gwine see God powa ef ya bleebe pon me ? ”
43011041	So dey moob de stone fom de doormout . Jedus look op an pray say , “ Fada , A da tell ya tankya cause ya done yeh me an ansa me wen A pray .
43011042	A know ya yeh me an ansa me all de time . Bot A da say dis fa sake ob dem people wa da stanop yah , so dey kin bleebe dat ya sen me . ”
43011043	Wen Jedus done say dat , e holla een a loud boice say , “ Lazarus , come outta dey ! ”
43011044	Lazarus come outta e tomb . E two han an e two foot been wrop op wid linen closs an a closs piece been wrop roun e face . Jedus tell de people say , “ Loose de closs dem an leh um go . ”
43011045	So den a heapa de Jew dem wa been come fa sit wid Mary , dey see wa Jedus done an dey bleebe pon um .
43011046	Bot some ton back an gone an tell de Pharisee dem wa Jedus done .
43011047	Den de Jew priest leada dem an de leada ob de Pharisee dem call a meetin wid de oda Jew leada dem ob de Council . Dey say , “ Wa we fa do ? Oona see all de miracle dem wa dis man yah da do ?
43011048	Ef we lef um lone fa do mo ob dem miracle , all de people gwine bleebe pon um . An wen dat happen , de Roman dem gwine come fa tek way we House ob God , an stroy we people too . ”
43011049	One man dey name Caiaphas . Dat yeah e been de head man ob de priest leada dem . E say , “ Oona ain know nottin tall !
43011050	Oona ain ondastan dat e mo betta fa leh jes one man dead fa sake ob all de people , den fa leh dem Roman stroy all we people ! ”
43011051	Caiaphas ain jes say dem wod yah on e own , bot wen e been de head man dat yeah ob de priest leada dem , e beena tell de people head ob time , say Jedus gwine dead fa sake ob all de Jew people .
43011052	An Jedus ain dead jes fa de Jew people . E dead fa all God chullun , dem people wa scatta all bout , an fa bring um togeda fa be one fambly .
43011053	Fom de day wen Caiaphas say dat , de Jew leada dem mek scheme fa kill Jedus .
43011054	Cause ob dat , Jedus ain waak out een de open gin weh all de Jew dem been able fa shim . E lef Judea an gone ta a place close ta de wildaness , ta a town name Ephraim . Oba dey e stay wid e ciple dem .
43011055	De time fa de Passoba Feas been close , so plenty people gone fom roun de countryside ta Jerusalem . Dey gone fa do de ting dem wa fa mek um clean een God eye same like how de Jew Law say , fo de time fa de Passoba come .
43011056	Dey beena look fa Jedus . Wen dey geda een God House , dey beena aks one noda say , “ Wa ya tink ? Jedus ain gwine come ta de Passoba Feas tall , ainty ? ”
43011057	Now den , de Jew priest leada dem an de leada ob de Pharisee dem beena chaage de people say , “ Ef one ob oona know weh Jedus dey , ya mus tell we , so dat we kin go res um . ”
43012001	Six day fo de Passoba holiday staat , Jedus gone ta Bethany , weh Lazarus lib . Dat de man wa done dead an Jedus mek um git op fom e tomb , an lib gin .
43012002	Some ob Jedus fren dem beena cook suppa fa hona Jedus . Martha beena hep fa saab de food , an Lazarus one ob de people wa beena seddown longside de table wid Jedus .
43012003	Wiles dey beena nyam , Mary git a whole pint ob pafume . Dey mek dat pafume fom jes de nard plant , an e cost a whole heapa money . Mary pour dat pafume pon Jedus foot . Den e wipe um op wid e hair . All de people een de house beena smell de sweet scent ob dat pafume .
43012004	One ob Jedus ciple dem , Judas Iscariot wa been gwine ton Jedus een , e ain like wa Mary done .
43012005	E say , “ Hoccome dey ain sell dis pafume yah fa shree hundud silba coin , an gii de money ta de po people wa ain got nottin ? ”
43012006	Judas ain say dat cause e been wahn fa hep de people wa ain got nottin . E say dat cause e been a tief . E beena keep de money bag fa Jedus an e ciple dem , bot e beena tief some dat money fa esef .
43012007	Bot Jedus say , “ Mus dohn bodda dat ooman ! E right dat e done dat fa de day wen dey gwine bury me .
43012008	Dem people wa ain got nottin gwine stay wid oona all de time , bot A mesef ain gwine stay wid oona all de time . ”
43012009	A whole heapa Jew people yeh say Jedus been dey een Bethany , so dey gone dey . Dey ain gone jes fa meet Jedus . Dey gone dey fa see Lazarus too , de man wa done dead an Jedus mek um git op fom e tomb an lib gin .
43012010	So de leada dem ob de priest dem beena mek scheme fa kill Lazarus too .
43012011	Cause wen Jedus mek Lazarus lib gin , a heapa Jew people lef dey leada dem an bleebe pon Jedus .
43012012	De nex day , de big crowd wa been come ta Jerusalem fa de Passoba Feas , dey yeh say Jedus beena come ta Jerusalem .
43012013	So den , dey cut a whole heapa palm branch an gone out fa meet Jedus een de road . Dey beena holla say , “ Praise God ! God bless de one wa come een de name ob de Lawd ! God bless de King ob Israel ! ”
43012014	Jedus find a nyoung donkey , an e ride pon um . All dis been jes like dey been write een God Book say ,
43012015	“ Oona mus dohn be scaid ,
43012016	Jedus ciple dem ain been ondastan wa dat mean . Bot wen God done mek Jedus git op outta e tomb an lib gin , an God gim hona an glory fa true , de ciple dem memba say , dis wod wa been write een God Book been bout Jedus . An dey see dat all wa been write down , e happen jes like God Book say .
43012017	De crowd wa been dey wid Jedus wen e call Lazarus fa come outta e tomb an mek um lib gin , dey beena spread de nyews bout wa happen .
43012018	Dat mek a whole heapa people go out fa meet Jedus , cause dey been yeh say e done do dat miracle .
43012019	Den de Pharisee dem tell one noda say , “ See dey , we ain able fa do nottin ! All de people da folla um ! ”
43012020	Some Greek people been dey mongst de people wa gone fa woshup God een Jerusalem , wen de time fa de Feas come .
43012021	Dem Greek gone ta Philip . E de one wa come fom Bethsaida , dey een Galilee . Dey tell Philip say , “ Sah , we wahn fa see Jedus . ”
43012022	Philip gone an tell Andrew , an den dem two gone an tell Jedus wa de Greek people been wahn .
43012023	Jedus ansa um say , “ De time done yah wen God gwine show de true glory ob de Man wa Come fom God .
43012024	A da tell oona fa true , one seed ob wheat jes gwine stay one seed , ef e ain faddown an go eenta de groun an dead . Bot ef dat seed go eenta de groun an dead , e gwine grow an beah a whole heapa seed .
43012025	De poson wa lob e own life gwine loss um , bot ebrybody wa hate e own life een dis wol gwine keep e life faeba .
43012026	De poson wa da wok fa me , e haffa do wa A tell um fa do . De poson wa da wok fa me , e gwine stay wid me wehsoneba A da . Fodamo , me Fada gwine gii hona ta ebrybody wa da wok fa me . ”
43012027	“ Now me haat burden down , an wa A gwine say ? A cyahn say , ‘ Fada , sabe me fom dat hour wen A gwine suffa . ’ Cause ob dis bery ting , A come eenta dis wol .
43012028	Fada , mek people see dat dey oughta gii ya glory ! ”
43012029	De crowd wa beena stanop dey yeh de boice , an dey say e been tunda . Oda people say a angel taak ta um .
43012030	Bot Jedus say , “ Dis boice yah ain taak fa sake ob me . E taak fa oona sake .
43012031	Dis de time now wen God gwine jedge all de people een de wol . An dis de time now wen e gwine win out oba de one wa da rule dis wol , an dribe um out .
43012032	Wen dey hice me op fom de groun , A gwine draw all people ta me . ”
43012033	Wen Jedus say dat , e beena tell bout how e gwine dead .
43012034	De crowd ansa Jedus say , “ We Law da say de Messiah ain gwine dead . E gwine lib faeba . Hoccome ya say e haffa happen dat dey gwine hice op de Man wa Come fom God ? Who dat dis Man wa Come fom God ? ”
43012035	Jedus tell um say , “ De light gwine stay wid oona jes a leetle bit mo . Oona mus waak wiles de light dey dey , so dat de daak ain gwine meet oona wen oona da waak . Cause de one wa da waak een de daak ain know weh e da gwine .
43012036	Now wen de light dey wid oona , bleebe pon de light , so dat oona kin be de kinda people wa stay een de light all de time . ”
43012037	Eben dough Jedus beena do all dem miracle wa de people see fa deysef , dey still ain been bleebe pon Jedus .
43012038	All dis happen so dat de wod wa de prophet Isaiah been say , gwine come true . E say ,
43012039	De people ain able fa bleebe , cause like Isaiah say dis yah too ,
43012040	“ God done bline de people eye ,
43012041	Isaiah say dem wod yah cause e see how God gwine gii Jedus glory .
43012042	Stillyet , eben heapa Jew tority dem bleebe pon Jedus een dat time . Bot cause dey been scaid ob de Pharisee dem , dey ain tell oda people dat dey bleebe pon Jedus . Dey been scaid de tority dem gwine dribe um outta de Jew meetin house .
43012043	Dey been lob fa hab praise fom people mo den dey lob fa hab praise fom God .
43012044	Jedus taak een a loud boice say , “ Ebrybody wa bleebe pon me , e ain jes bleebe pon me . E da bleebe pon de one wa sen me too .
43012045	An wen somebody da look at me , e da see de one wa sen me .
43012046	A done come eenta de wol like light , so dat ebrybody wa bleebe pon me ain gwine stay een de daak .
43012047	Wen somebody yeh me wod an ain do wa A da tell um , A ain gwine jedge um . A ain come fa jedge de people een de wol . A come fa sabe de people .
43012048	Dey a jedge dey wa gwine jedge ebrybody wa ton e back pon me , ebrybody wa ain wahn fa bleebe de wod wa A da say . Dem wod wa A done say gwine condemn dat one wen de las day come !
43012049	Dat so e stan , cause A ain jes da taak on me own . Me Fada wa sen me done chaage me , e tell me wa A haffa say an how A haffa say um .
43012050	An A know dat de wod wa me Fada chaage me fa say , dat da mek people git life wa gwine las faeba . So den , wa me Fada tell me fa say , dat jes wa A da say . ”
43013001	De time ob de Passoba Feas come close , an Jedus been know de time been come fa um fa lef dis wol an gone back ta de Fada . Fom de fus , Jedus been lob e own people een de wol , dem wa bleebe pon um . Now e da show um fa true hommuch e lob um .
43013002	Een de ebenin , Jedus an e ciple dem beena nyam . De Debil been pit eenta Judas haat dat e oughta ton Jedus een ta dem wa been ginst um . Dis Judas yah been Simon Iscariot chile .
43013003	Jedus been know dat de Fada been gim all powa fa win out oba ebryting . E been know dat e come fom God an e gwine go back ta God .
43013004	So Jedus git op fom de table weh dey been seddown da nyam . E pull off e robe wa e weah oba e oda cloes , an tie a towel roun e wais .
43013005	Den e pit wata een a basin an staat fa wash e ciple dem foot . E dry um wid de towel wa been tie roun e wais .
43013006	Wen Jedus come ta Simon Peter , Peter aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , ya da come fa wash me foot ? ”
43013007	Jedus ansa um say , “ Ya ain ondastan wa A da do now . Bot ya gwine ondastan um by an by . ”
43013008	Simon Peter tell Jedus say , “ No , ya ain neba gwine wash me foot ! ”
43013009	So Simon Peter tell Jedus say , “ Well den , Lawd , ef dat so e stan , mus dohn wash jes me foot . Mus wash me han an me head too ! ”
43013010	Jedus ansa um say , “ De one wa done wash e body ain need fa wash e body gin , cause e done clean all oba . E jes need fa wash e foot , wa git dorty gin . Oona clean , bot all ob oona ain clean . ”
43013011	Jedus done been know who dat gwine ton um een ta dem wa been ginst um . Dat mek um say , “ Oona clean , bot all ob oona ain clean . ”
43013012	Wen Jedus been wash all de ciple dem foot , e pit on e robe gin oba e oda cloes . Den e gone an seddown gin ta de table weh e beena nyam . E aks e ciple dem say , “ Oona ondastan wa A jes done ta oona ?
43013013	Oona da call me Teacha an Lawd , an oona right wen oona say dat , cause dat wa A da .
43013014	Now den , A , oona Lawd an Teacha , done wash oona foot . Same fashion , oona oughta wash one noda foot .
43013015	A done do dat fa show oona wa oona oughta do , so dat oona gwine do de same ting .
43013016	A da tell oona fa true , ain no saabant wa mo betta den e massa , an ain no messenja wa mo greata den de one wa sen um .
43013017	Now dat oona know dat , oona gwine be heppy fa true ef oona do dat jes like A done tell oona fa do .
43013018	“ A ain da taak bout all ob oona . A know dem wa A done pick . Bot wa dey done write een God Book haffa happen . Dey write say , ‘ De one wa da nyam me bread done ton ginst me . ’
43013019	A da tell oona now wa gwine happen , so dat wen e happen , oona gwine bleebe A da who A da .
43013020	A da tell oona fa true , whosoneba gii haaty welcome ta de one wa A sen , dat poson da gii haaty welcome ta me too . An whosoneba gii haaty welcome ta me , dat poson da gii haaty welcome ta de one wa sen me . ”
43013021	Wen Jedus done say dat , e haat been hebby . An e taak plain say , “ A da tell oona fa true , one ob oona gwine ton me een ta dem wa ginst me . ”
43013022	De ciple dem been bumfumble . Dey look at one noda , cause dey ain know wish one ob dem Jedus beena taak bout .
43013023	One ob e ciple dem , wa Jedus lob a whole heap , e beena seddown close ta Jedus .
43013024	Simon Peter mek sign ta dat ciple wa close ta Jedus an say , “ Aks um wish one e da taak bout . ”
43013025	So dat ciple moob mo close ta Jedus , aks um say , “ Lawd , who dat ya da taak bout ? ”
43013026	Jedus ansa say , “ A gwine dip dis piece ob bread eenta de sauce an gim ta um . Dat de man . ” So Jedus dip de piece ob bread eenta de sauce an gim ta Judas , Simon Iscariot chile .
43013027	Jes wen Judas tek dat bread , Satan gone eenta e haat . Jedus tell Judas say , “ Wa ya gwine do , go do um quick ! ”
43013028	None ob de oda ciple dem wa beena seddown ta de table fa nyam wid Jedus ain ondastan hoccome Jedus tell Judas dat .
43013029	Since Judas beena keep de money bag fa um , some tink Jedus been tell Judas fa go buy ting wa dey need fa de Passoba Feas , or dey tink say Jedus been tell Judas fa go gii sompin ta de po people .
43013030	Jes wen Judas tek de bread , e lef an gone out quick , an e been daak .
43013031	Atta Judas gone , Jedus tell de oda ciple dem say , “ Now God gwine show de people de glory ob de Man wa Come fom God . An God gwine nyuse de Man wa Come fom God fa show God glory .
43013032	An ef de Man wa Come fom God show de people God glory , den God gwine show de glory ob de Man wa Come fom God . An God gwine do dat now .
43013033	Me chullun , A ain gwine stay yah wid oona much mo longa . Oona gwine look fa me , bot A da tell oona same wa A done tell dem Jew leada , ‘ Oona cyahn go ta de place weh A da gwine . ’
43013034	An now A da gii oona a nyew chaage . Oona fa lob one noda . Same fashion A done lob oona , same fashion oona fa lob one noda .
43013035	Ef oona da lob one noda , ebrybody gwine know dat oona me ciple dem . ”
43013036	Simon Peter aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , weh ya da gwine ? ”
43013037	Peter aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , hoccome A cyahn folla ya dey now ? A ready fa gii me life fa ya ! ”
43013038	Jedus ansa say , “ Ya ready fa gii ya life fa me , fa true ? A da tell ya , fo de roosta crow demarra maanin , shree time ya gwine say ya ain know me . ”
43014001	Jedus tell e ciple dem say , “ Mus dohn leh oona haat be hebby . Mus trus God , an trus een me too .
43014002	Plenty room dey een me Fada house . A gwine dey fa mek de place ready fa oona . Ef e ain been so , A been fa tell oona .
43014003	An atta A done mek de place ready fa oona , A gwine come back fa tek oona wid me an go ta dat place so dat oona too gwine be weh A da .
43014004	Oona know de way fa git ta de place weh A da gwine . ”
43014005	Thomas aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , we ain know weh ya da gwine , so how we kin know de way fa git dey ? ”
43014006	Jedus ansa um say , “ A de way , A de trute , an A de life . Ain nobody kin come ta de Fada cep e go shru me .
43014007	Ef oona been know me fa true , oona been gwine know me Fada too . An fom now on , oona know um an oona da shim . ”
43014008	Philip aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , show we de Fada . Dat all we need . ”
43014009	Jedus ansa Philip say , “ A done lib mongst oona all dis long time . Stillyet ya ain know me , Philip ? Ebrybody wa done see me done see me Fada . Hoccome ya say , ‘ Show we de Fada ’ ?
43014010	Ain ya bleebe A lib een de Fada an de Fada lib een me ? ” Den Jedus say ta all e ciple dem , “ E ain jes me wod wa A done tell oona , bot de Fada , wa da lib een me , e da do e own wok .
43014011	Oona mus bleebe me wen A da tell oona say , de Fada lib een me an A lib een de Fada . Bot ef oona ain bleebe me wen A say dat , oona mus bleebe me wen oona memba dem miracle A da do .
43014012	A da tell oona fa true , ebrybody wa bleebe pon me gwine do miracle same like A da do . E gwine do ting wa eben mo greata den A da do , cause A da gwine ta de Fada .
43014013	Wasoneba oona aks fa een me name , A gwine do wa oona wahn , so dat de Son gwine gii glory ta de Fada .
43014014	Oona kin aks fa anyting een me name an A gwine do um .
43014015	“ Ef oona lob me , oona gwine do wa A tell oona fa do .
43014016	A gwine pray ta de Fada fa gii oona noda one fa come longside oona fa hep an lib wid oona faeba .
43014017	Dat de Holy Sperit wa da mek people know de trute . De people een de wol ain able fa leh dis Holy Sperit een dey life , cause dey ain shim an dey ain know um . Bot oona know um , cause e da lib wid oona an e gwine stay een oona .
43014018	“ Wen A gone , oona ain gwine be lef like chullun wa ain got nobody fa hep um . A gwine come back ta oona .
43014019	Soon , de people een de wol ain gwine see me no mo , bot oona gwine see me . An cause A hab de true life , oona gwine hab de true life too .
43014020	Wen dat day come , oona gwine know A da lib een me Fada an oona da lib een me , same like A da lib een oona .
43014021	“ Ebrybody wa know wa A done chaage um fa do an do um , dat de one wa lob me fa true . Me Fada gwine lob dat one wa lob me , an A gwine lob um too . An A gwine mek dat one know me mo an mo . ”
43014022	Judas ( not Judas Iscariot ) aks um say , “ Lawd , hoccome e jes we ya gwine mek know who ya da ? Hoccome ya ain gwine mek all de people een de wol know who ya da ? ”
43014023	Jedus ansa um say , “ De one wa lob me gwine do wa A laan um fa do . Me Fada gwine lob dat one . An me an me Fada gwine come ta um an lib wid um .
43014024	De one wa ain lob me ain gwine do wa A laan um fa do . Dem wod wa A da laan oona , dey ain me own wod . Dey de Fada wod wa e sen me fa laan oona .
43014025	“ A done tell oona dem wod now wiles A still yah wid oona .
43014026	Bot de One wa gwine longside oona fa hep , dat de Holy Sperit . De Fada gwine sen um ta oona een me name . De Holy Sperit gwine laan oona all ting an mek oona memba all A done tell oona .
43014027	“ Now dat A da gwine way fom yah , A da gii oona peace een oona haat . Me own peace A da gii oona . A ain da gii oona de kind ob peace dat de people an de ting een dis wol yah da gii . Oona mus dohn leh oona haat be hebby bout nottin . Mus dohn be scaid .
43014028	Oona done yeh me tell oona say , ‘ A da gwine way fom yah , bot A gwine come back ta oona . ’ Ef oona been lob me , oona been gwine know fa true dat A da gwine ta de Fada , cause de Fada mo greata den me .
43014029	A done tell oona all dis fo e happen , so dat wen e happen , oona gwine bleebe .
43014030	A ain got much mo time fa taak ta oona now , cause de one wa da rule oba dis wol , e da come . Bot e ain got no powa oba me .
43014031	Bot de people een de wol haffa know A lob de Fada , an cause ob dat , A do jes wa e chaage me fa do .
43015001	“ A de true wine , an me Fada de one wa tek cyah ob de gyaaden .
43015002	Ebry wine branch wa been jine ta me bot e ain beah no fruit , me Fada cut um off . An ebry branch wa da beah fruit , e da trim um back so dat branch kin beah mo fruit .
43015003	De wod wa A done tell oona done mek oona haat clean .
43015004	Oona mus stay one wid me all de time , an A gwine stay one wid oona . De wine branch wa stay ta esef an ain jine ta de wine , dat branch ain able fa beah no fruit . E haffa be jine ta de wine fa beah fruit . Same way so , oona cyahn do nottin fa God cep oona stay one wid me all de time .
43015005	“ A de wine . Oona de branch dem . Whosoneba stay jine ta me all de time , e gwine beah a heapa fruit fa me Fada . Oona cyahn do nottin ef ya ain jine ta me .
43015006	Whosoneba ain stay jine ta me all de time , e same like a wine branch wa cut off ta esef . Dey shrow um way an den e dry op . Dey gwine geda dem dead branch an chunk um eenta de fire , weh dey gwine bun .
43015007	Ef ya stay jine ta me an me wod stay een ya haat , ya kin aks me Fada fa wasoneba ya wahn an e gwine gim ta ya .
43015008	Ef oona beah a heapa fruit fa me Fada , oona gwine show people dat oona gii glory ta um , an oona gwine show dat oona me ciple dem .
43015009	A lob oona same like me Fada lob me . Now den , oona mus lib een me lob all de time .
43015010	Ef ya do wa A chaage oona fa do , ya gwine lib een me lob . Same fashion , A beena do wa me Fada chaage me fa do , an A da lib een de lob ob me Fada .
43015011	“ A done tell oona dis so dat oona kin lib full op wid me joy .
43015012	A da chaage oona fa do dis : Oona mus lob one noda same fashion A done lob oona .
43015013	Ain nobody hab no mo lob den de one wa gii e life fa de sake ob e fren dem .
43015014	Oona me fren ef oona do wa A chaage oona fa do .
43015015	A ain da call oona me saabant no mo , cause de saabant ain know wa e massa da do . Steada dat , A da call oona me fren , cause A done tell oona all wa me Fada done laan me .
43015016	Oona ain pick me . A de One wa done pick oona , fa go an beah a heapa fruit , fruit wa gwine las . Den de Fada gwine gii oona wasoneba oona aks um fa , ef oona tek me name wen oona aks .
43015017	So den , dis wa A da chaage oona fa do , ‘ Oona mus lob one noda . ’
43015018	“ Ef de people een de wol hate oona , oona mus memba dat dey been hate me fo dey hate oona .
43015019	Ef oona blongst ta de wol , den de people ob de wol gwine lob oona , same like dey lob dey own . Bot oona ain blongst ta de wol . A done pick oona fa come out fom mongst um . Cause ob dat , dey hate oona .
43015020	Mus memba wa A done tell oona say : ‘ De saabant ain no mo betta den e massa . ’ De people mek me suffa , an dey gwine mek oona suffa too . Some ob dem beena do wa A laan um , an dey gwine do wa oona laan um .
43015021	Bot dey gwine do all dem ting ta oona cause oona done tek me name , cause dey ain know de One wa sen me .
43015022	Ef A ain come an taak ta um , dem people ain been fa know dey da sin . Bot now dat A done come , dey ain hab no scuse fa dey sin .
43015023	De one wa hate me , e hate me Fada too .
43015024	De people ain been guilty ob dey sin ef A ain beena do all dem miracle wiles A been dey wid um . Ain no oda one neba done susha miracle . Bot now dey done see dem miracle wa A done . Stillyet , dey hate me an dey hate me Fada too .
43015025	Bot dat so e haffa be , so dat dem ting kin come same like wa been write een dem people own Law say , ‘ Dey hate me , bot A ain done nottin fa mek um hate me . ’
43015026	“ De One wa da go longside people fa hep um , e gwine come . E de Sperit wa da come fom me Fada , an e gwine mek people know de trute . A gwine sen de Sperit ta oona fom me Fada , an e gwine come an tell bout me .
43015027	An oona mus go an tell bout me too , cause oona been dey wid me fom de time wen A fus staat fa laan people . ”
43016001	Jedus say , “ A done tell oona all dis so dat oona ain gwine fall fom oona fait een me .
43016002	De Jew people gwine dribe oona outta dey meetin house . An fodamo , de time da come wen de poson wa kill oona gwine tink dat e da do wa God wahn um fa do .
43016003	Dey gwine do dem ting ta oona cause dey ain neba know de Fada , an dey ain neba know me needa .
43016004	Bot A done tell oona dis now so dat wen de time come wen dey da do dem ting ta oona , oona gwine memba wa A done tell oona .
43016005	Bot now A da gwine back ta de one wa sen me fa come eenta de wol . Stillyet , ain none ob oona aks me weh A da gwine .
43016006	Now dat A done tell oona all dis , oona haat hebby .
43016007	Bot A da tell oona fa true , e mo betta fa oona ef A gone way . Cause ef A ain gone , de One wa come longside oona fa hep , e ain gwine come ta oona . Bot ef A gone way , A gwine sen um ta oona .
43016008	An wen e come , e gwine mek de people een de wol know dat dey been wrong bout sin . E gwine mek um know dat dem ting wa dey tink right , dey ain right . An e gwine mek um know dat God gwine jedge all people .
43016009	E gwine mek people know dat dey been wrong bout sin , cause dey ain bleebe pon me .
43016010	E gwine mek people know dat dem ting wa dey tink right , dey ain right , cause A da gwine ta de Fada , an oona ain gwine see me no mo .
43016011	E gwine mek people know dat God gwine jedge all people , cause God done condemn de Debil , wa da rule dis wol .
43016012	“ A got plenty mo fa tell oona , bot dat mo den oona kin stan jes now .
43016013	Bot God Sperit wa da mek people know de trute , e da come an e gwine hep oona know all ting wa true . An wa e say ain gwine come fom esef . E gwine say jes wa e yeh fom God , an e gwine tell oona bout dem ting wa gwine happen by an by .
43016014	E gwine gii hona ta me , cause e gwine tek me wod an mek oona know wa A say .
43016015	All wa blongst ta de Fada blongst ta me too . Dat hoccome A say de Holy Sperit gwine tek wa A gim an mek oona know wa A say .
43016016	“ Atta leetle wile , oona ain gwine see me no mo . Bot den atta leetle wile mo , oona gwine see me gin . ”
43016017	Some ob e ciple dem aks one noda say , “ Wa e try fa say ? E say , ‘ Atta leetle wile , oona ain gwine see me . ’ An e say , ‘ Den atta leetle wile mo , oona gwine see me gin . ’ An e say too , ‘ Dat so cause A da gwine ta de Fada . ’
43016018	Wa e mean wen e say ‘ Atta leetle wile ? ’ We ain know wa e da taak bout ! ”
43016019	Jedus know dat de ciple dem been wahn fa aks um bout dat , so e tell um say , “ A say , ‘ Atta leetle wile oona ain gwine see me , bot den atta leetle wile mo , oona gwine see me gin . ’ Ain dat wa oona da aks one noda bout ?
43016020	A tell oona fa true . Oona gwine weep an wail , bot de people een de wol gwine rejaice fa true . Oona gwine be burden down , bot by an by oona gwine rejaice fa true .
43016021	Wen a ooman time come fa bon e chile , e burden down , cause e time done come fa suffa . Bot wen e done hab e chile , e fagit de pain wa e been suffa , cause e da rejaice dat a chile been bon eenta de wol .
43016022	Same fashion , oona burden down now . Bot de time da come wen A gwine see oona gin , an dat gwine mek oona rejaice fa true . An ain nobody gwine be able fa tek dat joy way fom oona .
43016023	“ Wen dat time come , oona ain gwine aks me fa nottin . A da tell oona fa true , me Fada gwine gii oona wasoneba oona aks um fa , wen oona aks um een me name .
43016024	Til now , oona ain aks God fa nottin een me name . Aks God an e gwine gii oona wa oona aks fa . Den oona haat gwine be full op wid joy .
43016025	“ A beena laan oona all dem ting yah een paable . Bot de time da come wen A ain gwine tell um een paable no mo . A gwine taak plain ta oona bout me Fada .
43016026	Wen dat time come , oona gwine aks um een me name . A ain say dat A gwine aks de Fada fa oona sake .
43016027	Cause de Fada esef lob oona . E lob oona cause oona lob me an oona bleebe A come fom de Fada .
43016028	A come fom de Fada eenta de wol , an now A da gwine fom de wol an A da gwine back ta me Fada . ”
43016029	Jedus ciple dem tell um say , “ See yah , ya da taak plain now . Ya ain da taak een paable .
43016030	We know now dat ya know ebryting . Ya ain haffa hab nobody aks ya queshon . Dat mek we bleebe God done sen ya . ”
43016031	Jedus ansa um say , “ Oona bleebe me fa true now , ainty ?
43016032	Bot de time da come , an e yah now , wen dey gwine mek all ob oona scatta . Ebrybody gwine ron way ta e own house . Oona gwine lef me all ta mesef . Stillyet , A ain gwine be lef all ta mesef fa true , cause de Fada right yah wid me .
43016033	A done tell oona all dem ting yah so dat oona wa come fa be one wid me kin hab peace een oona haat . Een dis wol oona gwine hab trouble pon ebry han , bot mus dohn be scaid ! A done win out oba de wol ! ”
43017001	Atta Jedus say dis , e look op ta heaben an e pray say , “ Fada , de time done come . Gii glory ta ya Son , so dat ya Son kin gii glory ta ya .
43017002	Cause ya done gii de Son tority oba all people , so dat e kin gii life wa las faeba ta all dem people wa ya done gim .
43017003	Now den , fa git dat life wa las faeba dey fa know ya , de onliest true God , an dey fa know Jedus Christ , wa ya done sen ta dem .
43017004	A done bring glory ta ya mongst de people ob de wol . A done done de wok ya gii me fa do .
43017005	Fada , gii me glory now een de place weh ya da . Gii me dat same glory wa A hab fo de wol staat .
43017006	“ A done laan dem bout ya , dem wa ya gii me . Dey been ya own people . Ya gii me um , an dey done do all dat ya wod tell um fa do .
43017007	An now dey know dat all wa ya gii me , e come fom ya .
43017008	Cause A done gim de wod wa ya gii me , an dey done pay mind ta um . Dey know dat A come out fom ya fa true , an dey bleebe ya been sen me eenta de wol .
43017009	“ A da pray fa de people wa ya done gii me , cause dey ya own people . A ain pray fa de oda people een de wol wa ain ya own .
43017010	All me own people blongst ta ya , an all ya own people blongst ta me , an dey da bring glory ta me .
43017011	An now A da come back ta ya . A ain gwine stay een de wol no mo , bot dem ya gii me gwine stay een de wol . Do please , Holy Fada , keep dem safe by de powa een ya name , de name ya gii me , so dat dey all kin be one , an hab one haat , same like we hab one haat .
43017012	Wiles A been still wid dem , A beena keep um safe wid dat powa een ya name , de name ya gii me . A beena keep dem safe . Ain none ob dem been loss , cep de man wa boun fa scruction , so dat wa done been write een God Book gwine happen .
43017013	Now A da come back ta ya . Bot A da say dem ting yah now wiles A still een de wol , so dat dem wa ya gii me kin be full op wid me joy .
43017014	A done gim ya wod . An de oda people een de wol been hate um , cause dey ain blongst ta de wol , same like A ain blongst ta de wol .
43017015	A ain aks ya fa tek um way fom outta de wol , bot A da aks ya fa keep um safe . Dohn leh de ebil one do um no haam .
43017016	A ain blongst ta de wol . Same way so , dey ain blongst ta de wol .
43017017	Leh ya wod , wa true fa sho , mek dem ya own people .
43017018	A done sen dem eenta de wol , same like ya done sen me eenta de wol .
43017019	A ya own fa true , fa dey sake , so dat dey too kin be ya own fa true .
43017020	“ A ain da pray jes fa dem . A da pray too fa de oda res wa gwine bleebe pon me cause ob wa me ciple dem gwine tell um bout me .
43017021	A da pray , Fada , leh all ob um hab one haat , same like ya dey een me an A dey een ya . Leh dem all hab one haat wid we , so dat de oda people een de wol kin bleebe dat ya done sen me .
43017022	A done gii glory same like ya gii glory ta me , so dat dey all kin hab one haat like we hab one haat .
43017023	A dey een dem an ya dey een me . A da pray , leh dem lib wid one haat like one poson , so dat de oda people een de wol kin know ya done sen me , an ya beena lob dem same like ya beena lob me .
43017024	“ Fada , ya done gii dem ta me , an A wahn fa hab dem wid me dey weh A da gwine , so dat dey kin see de glory ya gii me . Ya done gii me dat glory , cause ya done been lob me fo de wol been mek .
43017025	Fada , wa da do wa scraight all de time , de oda people een de wol ain know ya . Bot A know ya , an dem yah wa ya gii me know dat ya been sen me .
43017026	A done show ya ta um . An A gwine keep on da show ya ta um , so dat dey kin lob me an dey kin lob one noda same like ya lob me , an A mesef kin be dey een dem . ”
43018001	Wen Jedus been pray dem wod , e an e ciple dem lef dat place . Dey cross oba a creek wa dey call Kidron . Den e gone wid e ciple dem eenta a gyaaden dey wa hab plenty olib tree .
43018002	Judas , wa han oba Jedus ta e enemy dem , been know dat place good , cause Jedus an e ciple dem been meet dey plenty time .
43018003	So Judas gone fa meet Jedus een de gyaaden wid some Roman sodja dem , an some ob dem man wa gyaad God House . De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de Pharisee dem sen de gyaad fa go wid Judas . Dey beena tote oll lamp an toch , an weapon fa fight wid .
43018004	Jedus been know all wa gwine happen ta um , so e gone fa meet dem people . E aks um say , “ Who oona da look fa ? ”
43018005	Dey ansa say , “ We da look fa Jedus wa come fom Nazareth . ”
43018006	Wen Jedus say , “ Dis yah me . A Jedus , ” de people moob back an faddown ta de groun .
43018007	Jedus aks um gin say , “ Who oona da look fa ? ”
43018008	Jedus ansa um say , “ A done tell oona dat A Jedus . Ef oona da look fa me , leh dese oda man go den . ”
43018009	Dis happen so dat wa e been say gwine happen , e happen jes like e say . Cause e say , “ Fada , A ain loss eben one ob dem wa ya gii me . ”
43018010	Simon Peter beena tote a sode . E pull out de sode an hit de saabant ob de head man ob de Jew priest leada dem , an e cut off dat saabant right yea . Dat saabant been name Malchus .
43018011	Jedus ton ta Peter an e chaage um say , “ Pit way ya sode ! Ain A gwine drink de cup wa me Fada done gii me ? ”
43018012	Den de Roman sodja dem , dey head leada , an de Jew gyaad dem res Jedus an tie um op .
43018013	Dey tek um an gone fus fa see Annas . Annas been Caiaphas fada-een-law , an Caiaphas been de head man ob de priest dem dat yeah .
43018014	Caiaphas de one wa been wise de Jew leada dem , tell um say , “ E mo betta fa one man fa dead fa all de people . ”
43018015	Simon Peter an noda ciple beena folla Jedus . De head man ob de Jew priest leada dem know de oda ciple good . So de oda ciple gone wid Jedus eenside de yaad ob de head man house .
43018016	Bot Peter been lef outside ta de gyate . De oda ciple , wa de head man know good , come out gin . E taak ta de gyal wa beena keep watch by de gyate , an e tek Peter eenside de yaad .
43018017	De gyal wa been by de gyate aks Peter say , “ Ya noda one ob dat man ciple dem , ainty ? ”
43018018	De place dey been cole , so de saabant dem an de gyaad dem been mek a fire , an dey beena stanop roun de fire fa waam deysef . An Peter gone an stanop wid um da waam esef too .
43018019	De man wa nyuse fa be de head man ob de priest leada dem , e quizzit Jedus . E quizzit um bout e ciple dem an dem ting wa e beena laan people .
43018020	Jedus ansa de head man say , “ All de time A beena taak fo all de people een de open . A laan um een de Jew meetin house an een God House , weh all de Jew people meet togeda . A ain neba hide fa tell nobody nottin .
43018021	Hoccome ya da quizzit me ? Quizzit dem people wa done yeh wa A say . Fa sho , dey know wa A beena say . ”
43018022	Wen Jedus say dat , one ob de gyaad dem slap um an say , “ Dat ain no way fa taak ta de head man , ainty ? ”
43018023	Jedus ansa say , “ Ef A done say sompin wa ain right , tell ebrybody yah wa A say . Bot ef A done say wa true , wa mek ya slap me ? ”
43018024	So den Annas sen Jedus ta Caiaphas , de head man ob de priest leada dem een dat time . An Jedus han been still tie op .
43018025	Peter been still dey close ta de fire da waam esef . De oda people wa been dey aks um say , “ Ya ain noda one ob dat man ciple dem , ainty ? ”
43018026	Den noda man come op ta Peter . E been one ob de saabant dem wa wok fa de head man an e been kin ta de man wa got e yea cut off . E aks Peter say , “ A done see ya wid um een de olib gyaaden , ainty ? ”
43018027	Peter say gin , “ No , A ain been dey ! ” Dat same time , a roosta crow .
43018028	Day clean , de gyaad dem tek Jedus way fom Caiaphas house an gone ta de Roman gobna bighouse . Bot de Jew dem ain gone eenside de gobna bighouse . Cause dey Law say ef dey gone eenside de house weh people wa ain Jew da stay , dey ain gwine be clean een God eye , an dat gwine mek um so dey ain fit fa nyam de Passoba Feas . Now de Jew dem been wahn fa nyam de feas .
43018029	So Pilate , de Roman gobna , gone fa meet um an aks um say , “ Wa oona say dis man done do ? ”
43018030	Dey ansa Pilate say , “ We ain been fa bring dis man ta ya ef e ain done bad . ”
43018031	Pilate tell um say , “ Oona tek um an go jedge um by oona own law . ”
43018032	Wen all dis happen , dat mek um come true wa Jedus been say bout de way e been gwine dead .
43018033	Pilate gone eenside de bighouse ta de place weh dey jedge people . Den e mek um tek Jedus an come meet um eenside dey . E quizzit Jedus say , “ Ya de King ob de Jew people dem ? ”
43018034	Den Jedus aks Pilate say , “ Dat wa ya tink ? O dat wa oda people tell ya bout me ? ”
43018035	Pilate ansa say , “ Ya tink A a Jew ? Ya own Jew people an de leada dem ob de priest dem , dey done han ya oba ta me . Wa ya done done ? ”
43018036	Jedus tell Pilate say , “ A ain a king like de king dem wa rule een dis wol . Ef A been a king like dat , me man dem been gwine fight fa me so dat de Jew dem ain res me . No , A ain a king like dem wa rule een dis wol yah . ”
43018037	Pilate aks um say , “ Well den , dat mean ya a king , ainty ? ”
43018038	Pilate aks um say , “ De trute , wa dat mean ? ”
43018039	Bot ebry yeah wen de Passoba come , A hab um tek a man outta de jailhouse an leh um go free fa oona . Oona wahn me fa leh de king ob de Jew people go ? ”
43018040	De people holla loud , ansa Pilate say , “ No , mus dohn leh dat man dey go free ! Leh Barabbas outta de jailhouse fa we ! ” Now den , Barabbas been a robba .
43019001	Pilate tell de sodja dem fa tek Jedus an go beat um .
43019002	De sodja dem tek some sticky briah an mek a crown , an dey pit um pon Jedus head . Den dey pit a long purple robe pon um fa weah .
43019003	Dey beena op ta um an mek fun ob um , da say , “ Ya mus lib faeba , ya de King ob de Jew people ! ” An dey slap um .
43019004	One mo time Pilate gone out ta de Jew dem . E tell um say , “ Oona look yah , A gwine mek um bring um back ta oona so dat oona gwine know dat A ain find nottin bad wa e done fa mek me condemn um . ”
43019005	So Jedus come out , an e beena weah de briah crown an de long purple robe . Pilate tell de people say , “ Oona look ! Yah de man ! ”
43019006	Wen de leada dem ob de priest dem an de gyaad dem see Jedus , dey holla loud say , “ Nail um ta de cross ! Nail um ta de cross ! ”
43019007	Bot de Jew people ansa back , “ We hab a law wa say e haffa dead , cause e say e God Son . ”
43019008	Wen Pilate yeh wa dey say , e been eben mo scaid .
43019009	E gone back eenside de bighouse an aks Jedus say , “ Weh ya come fom ? ”
43019010	Pilate aks um say , “ Ya ain gwine taak ta me ? Ain ya know dat A hab de powa fa leh ya go , an A hab de powa too fa mek um nail ya ta de cross ? ”
43019011	Jedus ansa say , “ Ya hab powa oba me jes cause God gii ya dat powa dey . So den , de man wa han me oba ta ya , e de mo wossa sinna . ”
43019012	Wen Pilate yeh wa Jedus say , e try fa find a way fa leh Jedus go . Bot de Jew people holla say , “ Ef ya leh dis man yah go , ya ain no fren ob de Roman rula Caesar . De one wa say e a king , e de enemy ob Caesar . ”
43019013	Wen Pilate yeh wa de people say , e mek um bring Jedus out . Den Pilate seddown een de chair weh dey seddown fa jedge people , een de place dey call De Stone Pabement . ( De Hebrew people call um Gabbatha . )
43019014	Now by den , e been bout midday ob de Preparation Day . Dat de day fo de Passoba staat . Pilate tell de Jew people say , “ Oona look ! Yah oona King ! ”
43019015	Bot de people holla say , “ Tek um way ! Tek um way ! Nail um ta de cross . Kill um ! ”
43019016	So den , Pilate han Jedus oba ta um fa leh de Roman sodja dem go nail um ta de cross .
43019017	An e gone out , da tote e own cross pon e shoulda , til e come ta a place dey call “ De place wa stan like a man head . ” ( De Hebrew people call dat place “ Golgotha . ” )
43019018	Dey , de sodja dem nail Jedus ta de cross . An dey nail two oda man ta two oda cross , one ta Jedus lef han side an de oda ta Jedus right han side . Jedus been dey een de middle ob dem two .
43019019	Pilate write pon a paper an mek a sign wa say , “ Jedus , wa come fom Nazareth , de King ob de Jew People . ” An Pilate mek um pit dat sign dey pon Jedus cross .
43019020	A heapa Jew people read dat sign , cause de place weh dey been nail Jedus ta de cross been dey close ta de city . An dey been write dat een shree language , een Hebrew , Latin an Greek .
43019021	De Jew priest leada dem tell Pilate say , “ Mek um write dat sign noda way . Mus dohn write , ‘ Dis de King ob de Jew People . ’ Mek um write , ‘ Dis man say , A de King ob de Jew People . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate ansa say , “ Wa A done write , dat wa gwine stay dey . ”
43019023	Atta de sodja dem been nail Jedus ta de cross , dey tek e cloes an wide um fo way , an ebry sodja tek a paat . Den dey tek e robe , wa been mek ob jes one piece ob closs fom top ta bottom , an ain hab no seam een um .
43019024	De sodja dem tell one noda say , “ Mus dohn teah de robe . Leh we shrow dice fa see who gwine git um . ” Wen dis happen wa done been write een God Book come true . Dat say ,
43019025	Close ta Jedus cross been some ooman da stanop dey . Dey been Jedus modda , e sista , an Mary wa been Clopas wife , an Mary Magdalene .
43019026	Wen Jedus see e modda an de ciple wa e lob da stanop dey , e tell e modda say , “ Ooman , look yah . Dis yah ya son . ”
43019027	Den e tell dat ciple say , “ Look yah . Dis yah ya modda . ” Fom den on , dat ciple tek Jedus modda fa lib een e own house .
43019028	Wen dat happen , Jedus know e done done all wa e spose fa do een dis wol , an e say , “ A tosty . ” Wen e say dat , wa dey been write een God Book come true .
43019029	A jug full op wid winega wine been dey , so dey soak a sponge een de wine an tie um ta a hyssop branch . Den dey pit de sponge op ta Jedus mout .
43019030	Jedus tek de wine . Den e say , “ A done done um ! ”
43019031	Now den , e been de Preparation Day . De nex day been de Passoba Woshup Day , an de Jew leada dem ain been wahn de man dem body fa stay dey pon dey cross pon dat Woshup Day . Cause dat day been a special big Woshup Day . So dey gone an aks Pilate fa leh de sodja dem broke de man dem leg an tek um down off ob dey cross .
43019032	So de sodja dem gone ta de fus man wa been nail ta e cross an dey broke e leg . Den dey broke de oda man leg .
43019033	Bot wen dey come ta Jedus , dey see e done dead , so dey ain broke e leg .
43019034	Steada dat , one ob de sodja dem tek e speah an jook Jedus een e side . Dat mek blood an wata pour outta Jedus body .
43019035	( De man wa see dem ting yah happen , e tell all dis fa mek oona bleebe . An wa e say , e so . E know fa sho dat all wa e say happen fa true . )
43019036	All dis happen so dat wa done been write een God Book gwine come true . Dat say , “ Dey ain gwine broke none ob e bone dem . ”
43019037	An dey write een noda place een God Book say , “ Dey gwine look pon de one dey been jook . ”
43019038	Atta dat , Joseph wa come fom Arimathea gone an aks Pilate fa leh um tek way Jedus body . Pilate gree , so Joseph tek de body an gone . ( Dis Joseph yah de man dat beena bleebe pon Jedus an folla um , bot e ain wahn fa leh oda people know dat , cause e been scaid ob de Jew head man dem . )
43019039	Nicodemus gone long wid Joseph fa tek way Jedus body fom de cross . E tote spice wa dey call myrrh an aloes , mix togeda . Dat spice weigh bout a hundud pound . ( An dat Nicodemus de man dat fus gone fa see Jedus one night . )
43019040	De two man dem tek Jedus body way . Dey tek de spice an some piece ob linen closs an dey wrop op de body wid um , same like how de Jew people wrop op dead body wen dey bury um .
43019041	A gyaaden been dey een de place weh dey nail Jedus ta de cross . Eenside dat gyaaden dey been a nyew tomb weh dey ain neba bury nobody .
43019042	Cause dat day been de Preparation Day fo de Jew Woshup Day an cause de tomb ain been faa way fom de cross , de two man pit Jedus body dey een dat tomb .
43020001	Aaly een de maanin , de fus day ob de week , wen de place been still daak , Mary Magdalene gone ta de tomb . E see dat de stone wa dey been pit oba de door ob de tomb fa kiba um been moob fom dey .
43020002	Mary ton back an ron ta Simon Peter an de oda ciple , de one wa Jedus lob . E tell um say , “ Dey done tek way de Lawd body outta de tomb an we ain know wa dey done wid um ! ”
43020003	So Peter an de oda ciple staat off ta de tomb .
43020004	Bof dem beena ron , bot de oda ciple ron mo fast den Peter , so e git ta de tomb fus .
43020005	E bend oba an e look eenside de tomb . An e see jes dem piece ob linen closs dey , wa de two man dem been nyuse fa wrop op Jedus body . Bot dat ciple ain gone eenside de tomb .
43020006	Den Simon Peter , wa come hine um , git ta de tomb too . E gone eenside de tomb an e see dem piece ob linen closs da lay dey .
43020007	An e see de closs wa dey been nyuse fa wrop roun Jedus head . Dat been pon noda side , fole op by esef .
43020008	Den de oda ciple , wa fus git ta de tomb , gone eenside too . Wen e see all dat , e bleebe .
43020009	Stillyet dey ain ondastan wa done been write een God Book , dat say dat Jedus haffa git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin .
43020010	Den de ciple dem gone back ta dey house .
43020011	Mary beena stanop da cry close ta de tomb . Wiles e beena cry , e bend oba an look eenside .
43020012	Dey eenside de tomb e see two angel . Dey beena weah white cloes an beena seddown een dat place dey weh Jedus body done been . One angel been ta de head , an de oda angel been ta de foot weh Jedus done been .
43020013	De angel dem aks Mary say , “ Hoccome ya da cry ? ”
43020014	Wen Mary say dat , e ton roun an e see Jedus da stanop dey . Bot Mary ain know dat been Jedus .
43020015	Jedus aks um say , “ Hoccome ya da cry ? Who ya da look fa ? ”
43020016	Jedus say , “ Mary ! ”
43020017	Jedus tell um say , “ Mus dohn hole on ta me , cause A ain gone back op yet ta de Fada . Bot go ta me bredren an tell um fa me say , ‘ A da gwine back op ta me Fada , wa oona Fada too . E me God an e oona God too . ’ ”
43020018	So Mary Magdalene gone ta de ciple dem an tell um e been see de Lawd . An e tell um dat Jedus say dem ting .
43020019	Fus daak de fus day ob de week , de ciple dem been geda . Dey lock all de door dem , cause dey been scaid ob de Jew leada dem . Wiles dey been dey , Jedus come outta noweh an e stanop mongst um . E tell um say , “ Peace pon oona . ”
43020020	Atta e say dat , e show um de cut een e han an e side . An wen de ciple dem see de Lawd , dey been full op wid joy .
43020021	Jedus tell um gin say , “ Peace pon oona . Same like de Fada sen me fa come eenta de wol , same fashion A da sen oona fa go fa do me wok . ”
43020022	Den e blow e bret pon um an say , “ Leh de Holy Sperit come pon oona .
43020023	Ef oona paadon a poson wa sin , God gwine paadon dat poson dey . Ef oona ain paadon dat poson wa sin , God ain gwine paadon dat poson dey . ”
43020024	One ob de tweb ciple dem wa name Thomas ( dey call um de Twin ) , e ain been dey wen Jedus come ta de oda ciple dem .
43020025	So de oda ciple dem tell Thomas dey been see de Lawd .
43020026	Atta eight day been pass , de ciple dem been geda gin een de house . Thomas esef been dey wid um . Eben dough de door been lock , stillyet Jedus come gin an stan mongst um . E say , “ Peace pon oona . ”
43020027	Den Jedus tell Thomas say , “ Tek ya finga an tetch me two han an look pon um good . Scretch out ya han an pit um een me side . Mus dohn doubt no mo . Bleebe pon me ! ”
43020028	Thomas ansa Jedus say , “ O me Lawd an me God ! ”
43020029	Jedus tell um say , “ Ya bleebe pon me cause ya done see me , ainty ? Bot fa true God gwine bless dem wa bleebe pon me eben dough dey ain neba see me . ”
43020030	Jedus done a heapa oda miracle wa e ciple dem see , bot dey ain write down een dis book yah .
43020031	Bot de ting dem wa write down een dis book , dey write down so dat oona kin bleebe dat Jedus de Messiah Christ , God Son . An ef oona bleebe pon Christ , oona gwine hab true life .
43021001	Atta dat , Jedus appeah gin ta e ciple dem , wen dey been close ta Lake Tiberias . E happen like dis yah :
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( dey call um de Twin ) , Nathanael wa come fom Cana dey een Galilee , Zebedee two son , an two oda Jedus ciple , dey all been dey togeda .
43021003	Simon Peter tell um say , “ A da gwine fa fish . ”
43021004	Day clean , Jedus gone an stanop pon de sho . Bot de ciple dem ain been know dat been Jedus .
43021005	Den Jedus tell um say , “ Me fren dem , oona ain ketch nottin ? ”
43021006	Jedus tell um say , “ Tek oona net an shrow um pon de right han side ob de boat . Den oona gwine ketch some fish . ” So dey shrow out dey net pon de side weh Jedus tell um . Den dey ain been able fa draw de net back eenside , dey been sommuch fish een de net .
43021007	Dat ciple wa Jedus lob tell Peter say , “ Dat de Lawd da stanop yonda pon de sho ! ” Now Simon Peter been tek off e top cloes wa e weah wiles e beena fish . So wen e yeh dat ciple say , “ Dat de Lawd , ” e jes wrop e top cloes roun esef an jomp eenta de wata .
43021008	De oda ciple dem tek de boat an gone ta de sho , da drag de net full op wid fish . De sho ain been faa off . E been bout a hundud yaad .
43021009	Wen dey git ta de sho , dey see fish da roas pon coal , an some bread .
43021010	Jedus tell um say , “ Bring some ob de fish wa oona jes ketch . ”
43021011	Simon Peter gone back eenside de boat an drag de net ta de sho . Dey been a hundud an fifty-shree big fish wa full op de net . Stillyet , de net ain teah .
43021012	Jedus tell um say , “ Come an nyam . ” None ob de ciple dem hab mind fa aks um say , “ Who ya da ? ” cause dey been know dat de Lawd .
43021013	So Jedus gone an tek de bread . Den e gim de fish .
43021014	Dis mek shree time dat Jedus appeah ta e ciple dem , atta e been git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin .
43021015	Atta dey been nyam , Jedus aks Simon Peter say , “ Simon , John son , ya lob me fa true mo den all dem oda ciple yah lob me ? ”
43021016	Jedus aks Peter de secon time say , “ Simon , John son , ya lob me fa true ? ”
43021017	Jedus aks Peter gin say , “ Simon , John son , ya lob me ? ”
43021018	A da tell ya fa true , wen ya been nyoung , ya been able fa dress yasef , an jes git ready an gone wehsoneba ya been wahn fa gone . Bot wen ya done ole , ya gwine scretch out ya han , an noda poson gwine dress ya an tek ya weh ya ain wahn fa go . ”
43021019	( Wen Jedus say dat , e beena show how Peter gwine dead an hona God . ) Den Jedus tell um say , “ Ya mus folla me ! ”
43021020	Peter ton roun an see de ciple wa Jedus lob hine um . Dat de one dey wa been seddown close ta Jedus wen dey beena nyam an aks um say , “ Lawd , who gwine han ya oba ta ya enemy dem ? ”
43021021	Wen Peter see dat ciple , e aks Jedus say , “ Lawd , wa gwine happen ta dis man yah ? ”
43021022	Jedus ansa say , “ Ef A wahn um fa lib een de wol til A come gin , wa diffunce dat mek ta ya ? Ya mus folla me ! ”
43021023	So den , de wod gone roun ta de broda dem wa bleebe pon Jedus dat de ciple dat Jedus lob ain gwine dead . Bot Jedus ain say dat ciple ain been gwine dead . E say , “ Ef A wahn um fa lib een de wol til A come gin , wa diffunce dat mek ta ya ? ”
43021024	Dis de ciple dat see an yeh all dem ting yah . E write um een dis book . An we know dat wa e write , dat true fa sho .
43021025	Jedus done a heapa oda ting . Ef dey all been write down , A tink dat eben de whole wol ain big nuff fa hab place fa hole all de book dem dat dey gwine haffa nyuse fa write um een .
44001001	Deah Theophilus :
44001002	til de day wen God tek um op ta heaben . Fo Jedus gone ta heaben , de Holy Sperit gim wod fa chaage dem postle dat e done pick an laan um wa fa do .
44001003	Atta Jedus done suffa an come back fom mongst de dead , jurin foty day e appeah a heapa time ta e postle dem . Fom de way e appeah ta um , e postle dem ain doubt none tall dat e da lib gin . An wensoneba Jedus been wid um , e beena tell um bout how God rule .
44001004	One time wen Jedus beena nyam wid um , e chaage um say , “ Mus dohn gone way fom Jerusalem . Wait yah til oona git wa me Fada promise oona , wa A beena tell oona bout .
44001005	John bactize people wid wata , bot soon God gwine bactize oona wid de Holy Sperit . ”
44001006	Wen de postle dem meet togeda wid Jedus , dey aks um say , “ Lawd , dis yah de time wen ya gwine leh de people ob Israel hab dey own country gin ? ”
44001007	Jedus tell um say , “ Me Fada de onliest one dat hab tority fa say pazactly wa day or time all dem ting gwine happen . Oona ain spose fa know wen dem ting gwine be .
44001008	Wen de Holy Sperit come pon oona , e gwine gii oona powa , an oona gwine tell all bout me een Jerusalem , an all oba Judea an Samaria , an eben ta de fudares place een de wol . ”
44001009	Atta Jedus say dat , wiles de postle dem beena look pon um , God tek um op eenta heaben . An de postle dem been look op pon Jedus til a cloud hide um .
44001010	De postle dem still beena look op ta de sky wiles e been gwine , wen all ob a sudden dey see two man wa weah white cloes stanop close ta um .
44001011	De two man dem tell um say , “ Oona wa come fom Galilee , hoccome oona da stanop dey , da look op ta de sky ? Dis Jedus yah dat God done tek way op eenta heaben , e gwine come back ta de wol jes like oona done shim wen e gone op eenta heaben . ”
44001012	Den de postle dem come fom de hill wa dey call Mount Olib , an gone back ta Jerusalem . E bout haf mile fom de Mount Olib ta Jerusalem .
44001013	Wen dey git ta Jerusalem , dey gone op ta de opstair een de house , ta de room weh dey beena stay . Dem wa been dey been Peter , John , James an Andrew , Philip an Thomas , Bartholomew an Matthew , James wa been Alphaeus chile , an Simon wa dey call de Patrot , an Judas wa been James chile .
44001014	Dem postle yah , de ooman dem , an Mary , Jedus modda , an e broda dem , dey beena meet dey togeda all de time , an dey beena pray wid one haat .
44001015	One day wen dem wa bleebe pon Jedus been geda togeda , bout one hundud an twenty people been dey . Peter stanop een de middle ob de people an staat fa taak ta um .
44001016	E say , “ Bredren , de Holy Sperit taak ta David way back dey , an hab um write een God Book bout Judas , wa been come fa bring de people fa res Jedus . An all dem ting wa David been tell , dey been haffa come true .
44001017	Judas been one ob we , an we all beena wok togeda fa God . ”
44001018	( Now den , wen dat man Judas sell Jedus , e tek de money an gone an buy a fiel . Een dat fiel dey , Judas gone an faddown head fus . E belly buss open an e guts fall out an e dead .
44001019	All de people een Jerusalem yeh bout wa been happen ta Judas . So dey call dat place weh Judas dead , Akeldama , wa een dey language mean “ Fiel ob Blood . ” )
44001020	An Peter gone on fa tell de people say , “ Dey write bout Judas een de book ob Psalms say ,
44001021	“ Cause ob dat , we haffa pick one man fa jine we fa tell oda people dat Jedus done git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . We haffa pick one ob dem wa been dey wid we all de time wen de Lawd Jedus been trabel wid we , fom de time wen John beena bactize people , til de time wen God tek Jedus op ta heaben . ”
44001022	
44001023	So den , dey pick two man . Dey pick Joseph , wa dey call Barsabbas ( dey call um Justus too ) , an dey pick Matthias .
44001024	Dey pray say , “ Lawd , ya know all people haat . We da aks ya fa show we outta de two man dem yah , wish one ya done pick
44001025	fa be a postle an do dis wok wa Judas lef wen e gone ta de place weh e blongst . ”
44001026	Den dey draw lots fa pick one . Matthias name come out , so dey add um ta de oda leben postle dem .
44002001	Wen de day ob Pentecost come , all de people dat bleebe pon Jedus been geda togeda een one place .
44002002	All ob a sudden dey yeh a nise dat soun like a haad wind da blow . Dat nise come fom de eliment , an e been dey all roun eenside de house weh dey been seddown .
44002003	Dey see sompin een dat place dat look like fire dat been shape op like tongue dem . Dem tongue ob fire spread out , one ta ebry poson dey . A tongue ob fire beena stay dey pontop ob ebry one ob um .
44002004	De Holy Sperit come pon all dem people dey an full um op . E mek um all staat fa taak diffunt language dem dat dey ain neba laan . Ebry poson beena say wa de Holy Sperit wahn um fa say .
44002005	Now een dat same time dey , some Jew people wa feah God , wa come fom oda country , beena lib dey een Jerusalem .
44002006	Wen dey yeh dat nise , a big crowd come togeda . An dey all been scruck cause dey yeh dem dat bleebe pon Jedus da taak een dem diffunt language . An ebry poson yeh somebody da taak een e own language .
44002007	De people all been stonish fa true . Dey say , “ All dese people yah dat we yeh da taak een diffunt language , dey all come fom Galilee , ainty ?
44002008	Hoccome we yeh dem da taak een we own language ?
44002009	We come fom plenty diffunt country . Some ob we come fom Parthia , some fom Media , an some fom Elam , some fom Mesopotamia , fom Judea an fom Cappadocia , some fom Pontus an fom Asia .
44002010	Some ob we come fom Phrygia , fom Pamphylia , fom Egypt an fom paat ob Libya close ta Cyrene . Some ob we trabel fom Rome . We all mix . Some ob we been bon Jew an some ob we jine de Jew dem atta we gree fa bleebe wa dey bleebe .
44002011	Some ob we come fom Crete an some fom Arabia , stillyet we all da yeh dem people yah dat come fom Galilee da taak een we own diffunt language bout de great ting dem dat God done do ! ”
44002012	De people all been stonish an all mix op , so dey beena aks one noda say , “ Wa dis mean ? ”
44002013	Bot some oda people beena mek fun ob dem dat bleebe pon Jedus , say , “ Dem people done drink tommuch wine ! ”
44002014	Wen dey say dat , Peter an de oda leben postle dem stanop , an Peter taak ta de crowd een a loud boice . E tell um say , “ Oona me Jew broda dem , an all ob oona dat lib een Jerusalem , leh me splain dis . Listen ta wa A da tell oona .
44002015	Oona tink dat dese people dronk , bot dey ain dronk . E jes nine o'clock een de maanin !
44002016	Stead ob dat , dis ting dat oona see happen , dat wa de prophet Joel beena taak bout wen e say :
44002017	‘ God say , Dis wa A gwine do wen dem las day come .
44002018	Yeah , wen dem las day come ,
44002019	A gwine do miracle dem op een de sky ,
44002020	Fo de day ob de Lawd gwine come ,
44002021	An ebrybody dat call pon de name ob de Lawd gwine git sabe . ’
44002022	“ Oona people ob Israel listen good ta wa A da say . Jedus wa come fom Nazareth , e a man dat God sen ta we . Fa show oona dat God been sen um , God gii Jedus e powa fa do a heapa miracle an great wok wa mek people stonish . An e sho oona heapa sign wa mek oona know e powa . Oona know bout all dem ting , cause e been mongst oona weh e done um .
44002023	Dat man Jedus , dey han um oba ta oona , cause God done been cide fa dat fa happen . E done been know bout dat . An oona kill Jedus wen oona gim ta wickity people fa leh um nail um ta de cross .
44002024	Bot atta Jedus done dead , God mek Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . E free Jedus so dat e ain suffa de pain ob det no mo . Det ain able fa hab no powa tall fa keep Jedus een de grabe .
44002025	Cause David taak bout Jedus say ,
44002026	Cause ob dis , me haat heppy ,
44002027	Cause ya ain gwine lef me soul een de place ob de dead people .
44002028	Ya done show me de way wa da lead ta life .
44002029	“ Bredren , A da taak ta oona plain bout we ole people leada David . E done dead an dey bury um , an e tomb still yah wid we .
44002030	Bot David been a prophet , an e been know wa God been promise um . God mek a wow say e gwine mek one ob David granchullun chullun fa be king same like David .
44002031	David been know wa God gwine do , fo de ting happen . So den , David tell bout how God gwine mek Christ git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , wen e say ,
44002032	God done mek dis Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . We da tell oona dat dis done happen fa true . We all shim .
44002033	God hona Jedus a whole heap . E call um op weh e dey an e mek um seddown ta e right han fa rule wid um . De Fada God done gii Jedus de Holy Sperit dat e been promise . An wa oona da see an da yeh now , dat de gif ob de Holy Sperit wa Jedus done pour out pon we .
44002034	Cause David ain gone op eenta heaben , stillyet e say ,
44002035	til A pit ya enemy dem ondaneet ya foot . ’
44002036	“ So den , leh all de Israel people know fa sho dat God done mek dis Jedus fa be Lawd an Christ ! An e de same one dat oona done nail ta de cross . ”
44002037	Wen de people yeh wa Peter say , dey been too opsot . Dey aks Peter an de oda postle dem say , “ Bredren , wa we fa do ? ”
44002038	Peter ansa um say , “ All ob oona haffa ton fom oona sin . Come ta God an leh um bactize oona een de name ob Jedus Christ , so dat God gwine paadon oona sin an gii oona de Holy Sperit .
44002039	Cause de promise dat God promise , dat fa oona an fa oona chullun an fa all dem dat faaway . Dat de promise fa all de people dat de Lawd we God call fa come ta esef . ”
44002040	Peter taak ta um fa a long time . E waan um an tell um say , “ Oona haffa sabe oonasef fom dem ting dat gwine mek de wickity people wa da lib now suffa ! ”
44002041	De people dat bleebe wa Peter say bout Jedus been bactize . An dat day , bout shree tousan people jine dem dat trus een Jedus .
44002042	Dey beena spen dey time da laan fom de postle dem . An dey beena meet togeda , an all hab one haat togeda , an dey beena nyam an pray togeda .
44002043	Wid God powa , de postle dem beena do a heapa miracle an sign dem dat mek all de people stonish fa true .
44002044	All de people dat bleebe pon Jedus been togeda . An all dem beena bring wa dey hab fa share um .
44002045	Dey beena sell dey propaty an ting an share de money wid ebrybody , so dat dey all hab wa dey need .
44002046	Ebry day dey beena geda togeda een God House . An dey beena geda een one noda house fa nyam togeda . An dey been heppy an dey beena share wid one noda .
44002047	Dey beena praise God , an all de people been too heppy wid um . An dem wa de Lawd beena sabe jine op wid dem dat done been trus een Jedus , an dey been mo an mo ob um ebry day .
44003001	Bout shree o'clock een de ebenin , de time wen de Jew people gone fa pray , Peter an John beena waak ta God House fa pray .
44003002	Some people beena tote one man wa ain been able fa waak eba since e been bon . Ebry day dem people beena cyaa um , an lef um close ta de gyate ta God House , wa dey call De Purty Gyate . Dey beena lef dat man dey fa beg fom de people wa pass by fa go eenta God House fa pray .
44003003	Wen de cripple op man see Peter an John da go eenta God House , e beg um fa gim money .
44003004	Peter an John look dat man dead een e eye , an Peter tell um say , “ Look at we ! ”
44003005	So de man pay mind ta Peter an John an look at um , cause e beena tink dey been gwine gim sompin .
44003006	Peter tell um say , “ A ain got no money , no silba or gole , bot A gwine gii ya wa A got . Een de name ob Jedus Christ wa come fom Nazareth , git op an waak ! ”
44003007	Peter tek de man right han an hep um git op . Same time de man foot dem git scronga .
44003008	E jomp op an staat fa waak . Den e gone wid Peter an John eenta God House , an e beena waak an jomp an praise God .
44003009	All de people shim wen e beena waak an praise God .
44003010	An dey know dat de same man wa beena seddown close ta De Purty Gyate ob God House an beg . Dem been stonish an scruck tommuch wen dey see wa been happen ta de man .
44003011	De man wa jes git heal beena hole on ta Peter an John , an all de people been stonish . Dey ron ta weh de man been wid Peter an John een de place dey call Solomon Piza .
44003012	Wen Peter see de people , e tell um say , “ Me countryman dem ob Israel , hocccome oona so stonish ? Hoccome oona da look haad pon we ? Oona tink dat we done mek dis man well cause ob we own powa or cause we so good , ainty ?
44003013	Bot de God ob we ole people leada dem , Abraham , Isaac an Jacob , dis same God gii glory ta e saabant , Jedus . Fo dat , oona been han Jedus oba ta Pilate fa leh um kill um . Pilate been mek op e mind fa leh Jedus go free , bot oona ton ginst um .
44003014	Jedus waak scraight wid God an blongst ta um , bot oona ton ginst um . Oona beg Pilate fa kill Jedus an leh noda man wa been kill people go free .
44003015	So oona done kill Jedus , de one wa da gii life . Bot God mek um git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . We see Jedus wid we own eye atta e come outta e tomb .
44003016	Jedus powa mek dis man well an scrong . Wa oona done see yah an wa oona know , dat cause we trus een Jedus name . Jedus powa done heal dis man , an all ob oona shim .
44003017	“ Now den , bredren , A know oona an oona leada dem ain ondastan wa oona beena do wen oona kill Jedus .
44003018	Bot dat de way God mek dat ting come true dat e been say way back dey . Cause e mek all de prophet dem tell de people say Christ haffa suffa .
44003019	So oona mus ton fom oona sin an come ta God . Den God gwine paadon oona fa all oona sin an tek um all way .
44003020	Wen oona do dat , God , we Lawd , gwine wok eenside oona haat fa mek oona fait mo scronga . An e gwine sen de Messiah wa e done pick fa sabe oona . Dat Jedus esef .
44003021	Jedus haffa stay dey een heaben til de time gwine come fa God fa mek all ting nyew , jes like God been promise way back dey shru e prophet dem .
44003022	Moses been tell de people say , ‘ God oona Lawd gwine sen oona a prophet same like e done sen me . An dat prophet gwine come fom mongst oona own people . Oona mus pay mind ta all wa e gwine tell oona .
44003023	Ebrybody wa ain pay mind ta wa de prophet tell um , God gwine tek dat one way fom mongst de people an stroy um . ’
44003024	Samuel an all de oda prophet dem atta Samuel , dey all tell bout dis time now .
44003025	Dem ting wa God promise we , wa dem prophet tell bout , dem ting fa oona . Oona hab oona paat een dat blessin , wa God been promise wen e mek a cobnant wid oona ole people . E tell Abraham say , ‘ A gwine mek oona chullun chullun a blessin ta all de people een de wol . ’
44003026	Wen God sen e saabant Jedus eenta dis wol , God sen um fus ta oona , de people ob Israel . E sen um fa bless oona , so dat all ob oona gwine ton fom oona wickity way . ”
44004001	Peter an John still beena taak ta de people wen de Jew leada dem come ta um . De Jew priest dem an de offisa ob dem wa da gyaad God House , an de Sadducee dem , dey all come .
44004002	Dem leada been opsot cause de two postle dem beena laan de people an tell um say Jedus done dead bot e git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . Dat show dat wen somebody dead , e gwine lib gin .
44004003	Dem leada grab hole ta Peter an John . Bot cause de son beena set fa red , dey pit um een de jailhouse til de nex day .
44004004	Bot a heapa people wa yeh Peter an John wod bleebe wa dey tell um . An now , all de man dem wa bleebe been bout fibe tousan .
44004005	Nex day , de Jew rula dem , long wid de oda Jew leada an Law teacha dem , dey meet togeda een Jerusalem .
44004006	Annas , wa been de head man ob de Jew priest dem , e been dey , an Caiaphas , an John an Alexander an de oda man dem ob Annas fambly .
44004007	Dey tek Peter an John outta de jailhouse an mek um stan fo all dem man wa done been geda dey . Den dey quizzit Peter an John say , “ Weh oona git de powa fa mek dis man yah waak ? Who gii oona dat powa ? ”
44004008	Peter been full op wid de Holy Sperit , so e ansa um say , “ Oona wa da rule de people an oona leada dem wa dey yah !
44004009	Oona bring we yah taday an aks we bout de good ting wa we done do fa dat cripple op man . Oona da aks we wa dat powa we hab fa heal um .
44004010	So den , all ob oona oughta know , an all de people een Israel oughta know . Oona done kill Jedus Christ fom Nazareth . Oona nail um ta de cross . Bot God mek um git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . An de powa ob Jedus name , dat wa mek dis man yah stan mongst ya , an e heal now .
44004011	God been taak bout Jedus wen e say ,
44004012	Ain nobody bot Jedus able fa sabe people . Een all de wol ain nobody else , no oda name dat God gii ta people so dat we kin git sabe . ”
44004013	Now den , de leada dem een de Jew Council see dat Peter an John been people jes like ebrybody else , an dey ain hab no school laanin . Bot Peter an John ain been scaid fa taak ta um bout Jedus . Dat mek dem leada stonish , an mek um know dat Peter an John beena waak wid Jedus .
44004014	De leada dem ain been able fa say nottin bad ginst Peter an John , cause de man wa dey heal beena stanop dey wid um .
44004015	So de leada dem ob de Council sen Peter an John outta de Council room . Den dey taak ta one noda bout all dis .
44004016	Dey aks one noda say , “ Wa we gwine do wid dem man Peter an John ? All de people een Jerusalem know dey done dis great miracle . Dey done heal de man wa ain neba been able fa waak . We cyahn say dat ain so .
44004017	Bot we ain wahn dis nyews fa spread roun mongst mo people . So den , leh we call Peter an John an waan um say , dey mus dohn taak ta nobody no mo een Jedus name . ”
44004018	So de leada dem call Peter an John fa come eenside de place . Dey taak scrong ta um an chaage um say , “ Mus dohn taak ta nobody tall een de name ob Jedus . Mus dohn laan nobody een Jedus name . ”
44004019	Bot Peter an John ansa um say , “ Wa we spose fa do ? E mo betta fa we fa do wa oona say , or fa do wa God say ?
44004020	We ain able fa shet we mout an stop da taak bout wa we done see an yeh . ”
44004021	De leada dem ob de Council waan um mo scronga gin an leh um go way . Dey ain find no way fa punish um , cause all de people dey beena praise God fa wa been happen .
44004022	An de man wa God heal wid dis miracle , e been pass foty yeah ole .
44004023	Wen Peter an John been ton loose , dey gone back ta dey own people wa bleebe pon Jedus . Dey tell um wa de leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem tell um .
