God mek we all able fa know fa sho bout dis , wen e mek dat man e done pick , git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . Dat show we all fa true . ”
44017032	De people yeh Paul da taak bout somebody dat done dead an git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin . Wen dey yeh Paul say dat , some dem mek fun ob Paul . Bot oda dem tell Paul say , “ We wahn fa yeh ya taak mo some oda time bout dis . ”
44017033	So den , Paul come outta de council meetin .
44017034	Some people jine op wid Paul an bleebe pon Jedus . One dem been Dionysius . E been a memba ob de council dat meet pon Areopagus hill . An dey been a ooman name Damaris , an some oda people too .
44018001	Den Paul come outta Athens an gone ta Corinth .
44018002	Paul meet one Jew man dey name Aquila . Aquila been bon een a Rome arie name Pontus , an Aquila an e wife Priscilla jes been come outta Italy . Cause de Roman rula Claudius been chaage all de Jew people , say dey mus go outta Rome . So Paul gone fa see Aquila an Priscilla dey een Corinth .
44018003	E stay ta dey house an dey all beena wok togeda dey . Paul beena mek tent fa sell fa git money fa tek cyah ob esef , an dat de same wok Aquila an Priscilla beena do too .
44018004	Ebry week wen de Woshup Day come , Paul gone ta de Jew meetin house . E gone dey fa taak ta de Jew people , an ta dem wa ain Jew , fa try fa git um fa bleebe wa e say fom God wod .
44018005	Wen Silas an Timothy git dey fom Macedonia , Paul lef off da mek tent . E spen all e time da tell de Jew people dey , say Jedus de Messiah .
44018006	De Jew people ain been gree wid wa Paul tell um . Dey hole um cheap , so Paul shake de dort off e cloes fo dem fa show e ain gree wid um . E tell um say , “ Ef God condemn oona , oona haffa blame oonasef ! A ain sponsable . Atta taday A ain gwine stay mongst oona . A da gwine fa tell de people dat ain Jew bout Jedus . ”
44018007	So den , Paul lef de Jew people dey een de meetin house . E gone fa stay ta one man house dat ain Jew . E name Titius Justus , an e been a man wa woshup God . Titius Justus house been longside de Jew meetin house .
44018008	Now de big leada een de Jew meetin house been name Crispus . E an all de people een e house been bleebe pon de Lawd . An a heapa oda people dey een Corinth yeh wa Paul say . Dey bleebe pon Jedus an git bactize .
44018009	One night de Lawd taak ta Paul een a wision . De Lawd tell um say , “ Mus dohn feah . Mus keep on da tell de people wa A tell ya fa say . Mus dohn git weary .
44018010	Cause A right yah wid ya . Ain nobody gwine be able fa do ya no haam , cause a heapa people een dis city blongst ta me . ”
44018011	Paul stay dey een Corinth one yeah an six mont , da laan de people de wod ob God .
44018012	Bot wen Gallio been de Roman gobna een Achaia , de Jew people geda togeda . Dey grab hole ta Paul an tek um ta court fa mek de gobna jedge um .
44018013	Dey tell de gobna say , “ Dis man da try fa laan we people fa woshup God een way dat mek um do wa ain right coddin ta de law ! ”
44018014	Paul been bout ready fa taak , wen Gallio tell de Jew dem say , “ Ef Paul broke de law or do some oda kinda ebil ting , den A been gwine haffa listen ta oona .
44018015	Bot wen oona jes da taak bout diffunt wod an diffunt name een oona own Jew Law , A ain gwine jedge dem ting . Oona gwine haffa cide wa fa do . ”
44018016	An Gallio mek um lef de court .
44018017	Den dey all grab hole ta Sosthenes , de leada ob de Jew meetin house . Dey beat um op right dey een front ob de court . Bot Gallio ain pay no mind ta dat .
44018018	Paul beena stay some time wid de Christian dem een Corinth . Den e lef dem bredren an e ketch a boat ta Syria . Priscilla an Aquila gone long wid um . Bot fo Paul gone , wen e been een Cenchrea , e mek a wow ta God fa do sompin . So e cut e hair pon e head same like how de Jew people beena do wensoneba dey promise God fa do sompin .
44018019	Wen dey git ta Ephesus , Paul lef Priscilla an Aquila , an e gone eenta de Jew meetin house fa taak ta de Jew people an splain God wod ta um dey .
44018020	Dey beg Paul fa stay mo longa wid um . Bot Paul ain gree fa stay .
44018021	Steada dat , wen Paul staat fa lef um , e tell um say , “ Ef God wahn me fa come back , A gwine come back ta oona . ” So e gone an ketch a boat , da sail fom Ephesus .
44018022	Wen Paul git ta Caesarea , e gone op ta Jerusalem an wisit de choch people . Den e gone ta Antioch .
44018023	Paul stay a wile een Antioch , an den e trabel all roun de arie ob Galatia an Phrygia . E courage all dem wa waak een de way ob de Lawd , an hep um bleebe God wod mo an mo .
44018024	Jurin dat time , one Jew man name Apollos come ta Ephesus . E been bon een Alexandria . Dat man know how fa taak too good , an e know all bout wa been write down een God Book .
44018025	Apollos been laan bout God way . E been too heppy fa taak bout Jedus , an de ting dem wa e beena laan de people been true . Bot e jes know bout how John beena bactize .
44018026	Apollos ain been scaid tall fa taak ta de people een de Jew meetin house . Bot wen Priscilla an Aquila yeh wa Apollos say , dey eenbite um fa go ta dey house an splain ta um mo betta bout God way .
44018027	Now den , wen Apollos been wahn fa go oba ta Achaia , de Ephesus bredren courage um , an dey write letta ta dem wa waak een de Lawd way een Achaia . Dey tell um say , “ Wen Apollos come ta oona , oona oughta gim haaty welcome . ” An wen Apollos git ta Achaia , e meet dem people dat cause ob God mussy been bleebe . An e hep um plenty ,
44018028	cause Apollos taak too good , an wid powa , dey een de place weh de people all geda . E win out oba all wa de Jew dem say , an show um dat coddin ta God wod , Jedus de Messiah fa true .
44019001	Wiles Apollos been dey een Corinth , Paul beena trabel roun shru de middle ob de arie til e git ta Ephesus . Wen e git dey , e find some wa bleebe an waak een de way ob de Lawd .
44019002	Paul aks um say , “ Wen oona fus bleebe pon Jedus , de Holy Sperit come pon oona same time ? ”
44019003	Paul aks um say , “ Wa oona bleebe een den wen dey bactize oona ? ”
44019004	An Paul say , “ Wen John beena bactize people , e tell um e bactize um fa show dat dey done change dey sinful way an ain gwine do um no mo . John tell um say , ‘ Mus bleebe pon de one dat gwine come atta A gone . ’ Dat de Lawd Jedus dat John beena taak bout . ”
44019005	Wen de bleeba dem yeh wa Paul say , dey git bactize een de name ob de Lawd Jedus .
44019006	Paul lay e han pon dey head an de Holy Sperit come pon um . Dey staat fa taak dem language dat dey ain neba laan , an dey taak God message .
44019007	All togeda dey been bout tweb man wa git bactize .
44019008	Paul been dey een Ephesus fa shree mont , an all dat time e beena go eenta de Jew meetin house fa taak ta de people dey . E ain been scaid one bit . E been try fa bring um fa bleebe een de Lawd . E done dat , da tell um pint by pint bout how God rule .
44019009	Bot some dem people been haad head . Dey ain been wahn fa bleebe pon Jedus . An out een de open , een front ob ebrybody , dey shrow slam bout de Way ob de Lawd . So Paul lef um an gone . E tek de Christian bleeba dem wid um . An Paul gone ebry day ta Tyrannus place weh people come togeda fa taak bout diffunt ting .
44019010	Paul keep on fa two yeah dey . Cause ob dat , all de people een de arie ob Asia , de Jew people an de people dat ain been Jew , all dem yeh God wod .
44019011	God nyuse Paul fa do powaful miracle wok .
44019012	People beena tek sweat rag an closs dem dat Paul been tetch , an dey gone cyaa um ta de sick people , an dem sick people git well gin , an ebil sperit dat been een um come out fom um .
44019013	Some Jew people beena trabel roun fa dribe out ebil sperit dem fom eenside people . Dey try , too , fa nyuse de name ob de Lawd Jedus fa dribe out de ebil sperit dem . Dey tell dem ebil sperit say , “ A da chaage oona een Jedus name , dat Jedus wa Paul da taak bout . A da chaage oona fa come out . ”
44019014	Dey been one ob de Jew priest leada dem name Sceva . Sceva hab seben son , an dey beena chaage de ebil sperit dem dat way , een Jedus name .
44019015	Bot de ebil sperit tell um say , “ A know Jedus , an A know Paul , bot who ya da ? ”
44019016	De man dat hab de ebil sperit eenside um jomp pon Sceva boy dem . E mo scronga den all ob um . E teah dey cloes off um an gash um op . E beat um til dey ron way fom outta de house .
44019017	Wen all de Jew people an dem wa ain Jew , all dem dat lib dey een Ephesus yeh bout dat , dey been scaid , an dey been hole op de name ob de Lawd Jedus .
44019018	Heapa dem dat bleebe pon Jedus come an taak out een de open fo de people , bout de bad ting dem dey beena do .
44019019	Heapa dem people dat beena wok root , dey come dey an bring dey book dem wa tell how fa wok root . Dey geda all dem book togeda an bun um op out een de open weh all de people been able fa shim . Wen dey count op de money dat all dem book cost , dey been fifty tousan silba coin .
44019020	So den , dat de way de wod ob de Lawd keep on da spread all oba . An mo an mo people bleebe pon Jedus .
44019021	Atta all dat happen , Paul cide fa go shru Macedonia an Achaia pon e way ta Jerusalem . Paul say , “ Atta A gone dey , A haffa go an wisit Rome too . ”
44019022	Timothy an Erastus been two ob dem dat beena hep Paul dey . Paul sen um on ta Macedonia , an e stay on fa a leetle wile mo een de arie ob Asia .
44019023	Bot dat same time , a ruckus come op mongst de people dey een Ephesus . Dey beena fight bout de Way ob de Lawd .
44019024	One man dey name Demetrius beena tek silba an mek ting . E beena mek dem leetle house wa da look like de same house weh de people go fa woshup op de idol wa name Diana . Demetrius an e wokman dem beena mek a whole heapa money dat way .
44019025	So Demetrius call togeda all e wokman dem , an de oda wokman dem dat beena do de same kinda wok . E tell um say , “ Bredren , oona know dis wok da mek we a whole heapa money .
44019026	Oona da see an oona da yeh fa oonasef wa dis man Paul da do an say . E say dat god dat people mek wid dey han ain no true god tall . E taak so good dat plenty people yah een Ephesus an people all oba de arie ob Asia done bleebe wa e tell um .
44019027	So den , A ain jes da taak bout we wok an how de people kin hole we cheap an say de wok we do ain mount ta nottin . A da taak bout de great god Diana , an de house weh people da go fa woshup um op . De people gwine suck dey teet an say e ain wot nottin . Den de great glory an powa ob Diana ain gwine mount ta a ting needa . An Diana de god dat de people all oba Asia an een all de wol da woshup op ! ”
44019028	Wen de crowd yeh wa Demetrius say , dey been mad down . Dey staat fa holla say , “ Diana , de god ob de Ephesus people , e great fa true ! ”
44019029	Fus ting ya know , de whole city been een a ruckus . De people grab hole ta Gaius an Aristarchus . Dem two man been fom Macedonia an beena trabel long wid Paul . De crowd tote um an gone quick ta de place weh de people been .
44019030	Wen dat crowd geda dey , Paul been wahn fa go een fa taak ta de people . Bot de Christian bleeba dem ain leh um go dey .
44019031	Some ob de big tority dem dey een de arie ob Asia been Paul fren . Dey sen wod fa beg Paul , say e mus dohn go eenta dat place weh de people beena geda .
44019032	Dey been a big mixop gwine on een dat place . Some beena holla one ting . Oda dem holla sompin else . Cause mos all dem wa been dey ain know hoccome dey been dey fa staat wid .
44019033	De Jew people dey shob Alexander een front ob de whole crowd . An some ob de crowd beena holla ta Alexander an try fa tell um wa fa do . E mek sign ta de people fa mek um hush some ob dey racket , cause e been wahn fa splain ta de people .
44019034	Bot wen de people see dat Alexander been a Jew , dey all staat fa holla . Dey beena holla fa two solid hour say , “ Diana , de god ob de Ephesus people ! E great fa true ! ”
44019035	Den de man wa been hab chaage oba de city , e aks de people fa hole dey peace , an e tell um say , “ Oona me bredren wa lib yah een Ephesus , ebrybody know dat Ephesus de city sponsable fa de house weh people da woshup de great Diana , ainty ? Ain dey all know dis city sponsable fa de holy stone dat been faddown outta de sky pon de city ?
44019036	Nobody ain gwine say we da tell lie bout dis . So den , oona mus shet oona mout an tink fo oona cyaa on so .
44019037	Oona done bring dem man yah , bot dey ain tief nottin fom de house weh de god Diana dey . An dey ain taak bad ginst we god Diana needa .
44019038	Ef Demetrius an e wokman dem got sompin ginst somebody an wahn fa cuse um , de courthouse wide open . Leh um go ta de court an mek dey chaage .
44019039	Bot ef oona wahn fa taak bout sompin else , oona haffa tell de city leada dem fa call all de people togeda an do wa de law say , een a open meetin .
44019040	Cause ob wa we da do yah , A scaid de Roman tority dem gwine say we sponsable fa a ruckus . Ef dey cuse we , we ain gwine be able fa splain all dis ruckus , cause dey ain no reason fa um . ”
44019041	Atta e say dat , e tell de people wa been geda togeda dey fa go home .
44020001	Wen de ruckus een Ephesus been oba , Paul call togeda dem dat beena waak een de way ob de Lawd Jedus . E courage um , an e tell um say e da gwine on now . Den e lef um an gone ta Macedonia .
44020002	E gone all oba dat arie , da taak plenty fa courage de people . Den e gone ta Greece .
44020003	Paul stay dey shree mont . Den e been wahn fa ketch a boat fa sail ta Syria . Bot e yeh say de Jew people dey beena build scruction an scheme fa ketch um , so e cide fa go back shru Macedonia .
44020004	Wen Paul lef , Sopater dat come fom Berea gone long wid um . Sopater been Pyrrhus boy . De oda people dat gone long wid Paul been Aristarchus an Secundus fom Thessalonica , Gaius fom Derbe , an Timothy , an Tychicus an Trophimus dat come fom de arie ob Asia .
44020005	Dem man gone long head ob we an wait fa we een Troas .
44020006	Atta de Jew holiday feas ob Unleaven Bread ( dat de one wen dey da nyam bread dat ain hab no yeast ) , we lef een a sailboat fom Philippi . Atta fibe day , we git ta Troas an we meet de oda man dem dey , an we stay one week een Troas .
44020007	De fus day ob de week , we geda togeda fa nyam . Paul splain de wod ta de people , an cause e been gwine on de nex day , e keep on da taak til midnight .
44020008	Plenty lamp been dey een dat room opstair weh we hole de meetin .
44020009	One nyoung man name Eutychus beena seddown een de winda dey . Paul beena taak wen sleep ketch Eutychus . Paul keep on da taak , an Eutychus gone eenta a deep sleep an faddown outta de winda ta de groun . An dat house been a shree story house . Wen dey gone down an pick um op fom de groun , Eutychus been dead .
44020010	Bot Paul gone down an scretch esef oba de nyoung man an hole um tight . An Paul say , “ Oona mus dohn git opsot . Eutychus da lib ! ”
44020011	Den Paul gone back opstair an broke de bread an nyam wid de people dey . An e taak ta um til day clean , an den e gone .
44020012	De people gone wid de nyoung man Eutychus ta e house . Eutychus beena lib , an dey been too heppy fa dat .
44020013	We gone on fo Paul an ketch a sailboat an gone ta Assos weh we been spose fa meet Paul , so e able fa git pon de boat dey . E been tell we dat e gwine come ta de boat een Assos cause e been gwine waak an meet we dey .
44020014	So wen Paul meet we een Assos , e git pon de boat . Den we gone ta Mitylene .
44020015	We lef dey an gone on da sail til we git close ta Chios de nex day . De day atta dat , we gone on ta Samos . Den de day atta dat , we git ta Miletus .
44020016	Paul done been cide dat e ain been gwine mek de sailboat stop een Ephesus , cause e ain wahn fa spen extry time dey een de arie ob Asia . E been wahn fa git ta Jerusalem soon as e kin . E beena try fa git dey een time fa de day wen de Christian dem da memba Pentecost , dat day wen God gim e Holy Sperit .
44020017	Atta Paul git ta Miletus , e sen wod ta Ephesus , ta de choch elda dem . E say e wahn dem da fa come meet um een Miletus .
44020018	Wen de choch elda dem git ta Miletus , e tell um say , “ Oona know how A beena lib all de time A been dey wid oona , fom de fus day wen A come yah ta de arie ob Asia .
44020019	Oona know A ain neba brag , bot A tek low wiles A beena wok , da saab de Lawd . Plenty time A beena cry . A been hab haad bone fa chew an bitta pill fa swalla , cause de Jew dem build scruction ebryweh A ton .
44020020	Oona know dat wen A beena taak bout de wod ta oona , A ain hole back nottin fa hep oona . A beena laan oona een de place weh all de people hab meetin een de open . An A beena laan oona , da go fom one house ta de nex .
44020021	A beena tell de Jew people an dem wa ain Jew . A tell um say , ‘ Mus stop fa sin an change oona way an come ta God . Mus bleebe pon we Lawd Jedus Christ . ’
44020022	Now de Holy Sperit tell me dat A haffa go ta Jerusalem , an A gwine do wa e tell me . A ain know wa dey gwine do ta me wen A git dey .
44020023	All A know , e dat de Holy Sperit done tell me dat een ebry city weh A da gwine , people gwine pit me een de jailhouse an A gwine suffa an hab a haad time .
44020024	Bot A ain tek me life fa be wot nottin ta me , so dat A kin do all God sen me fa do , so dat A kin finish me race an do all de wok dat de Lawd Jedus gii me fa do . An dis de wok e gii me , A spose fa tell people de Good Nyews bout how God da bless people .
44020025	“ A done gone bout mongst oona fa tell all ob oona bout how God da rule . Now den , A know dat ain none ob oona eba gwine see me gin .
44020026	So taday A da tell oona fa true say , A ain sponsable ef God condemn any ob oona .
44020027	Cause A ain hole back nottin , bot A beena tell oona all dat God wahn fa do .
44020028	Oona mus watch out how oona da lib , an mus mind all de flock ob God people yah . De Holy Sperit done mek oona sponsable fa um . Oona mus tek cyah ob God people een de choch , jes like de shephud cyah fa e sheep . Cause God own Son , de Lawd Jedus , dead fa mek de people ob de choch blongst ta God .
44020029	A know dat atta A done gone way , some ceitful people gwine come een mongst oona people een de choch , like wile wolf come pon sheep . Dey gwine do some ob oona too bad , an try fa ton oona way fom God .
44020030	De time gwine come wen eben some ob oona own people gwine lie fa mek some ob oona wa waak een de way ob de Lawd go long wid um .
44020031	So den , oona mus watch out fa dem people dat lie like dat . Oona haffa memba how fa shree whole yeah A ain neba stop fa waan ebry one ob oona . A beena tell oona wa God say , day an night , wid de eyewata da ron down me face .
44020032	“ Now A da lef oona een God han an A da lef e wod dat tell oona bout God blessin pon oona . God wod able fa hep oona fa bleebe pon Jedus mo an mo , an God gwine gii oona de blessin dat e been promise fa gii ta dem wa blongst ta um .
44020033	A ain neba hab de big eye fa wa blongst ta nobody . A ain wahn dey silba , dey gole , needa dey fine cloes .
44020034	Oona know dat A beena wok wid me own han fa git all wa A need , an fa git all wa dey need fa dem wa gone long wid me too .
44020035	Een all A done do , A show oona dat we haffa wok haad like dis so dat we kin hep dem dat ain hab wa dey need . Mus memba wa de Lawd Jedus esef tell we say , ‘ De one wa da gii , e gwine git blessin mo den de one dat da git . ’ ”
44020036	Atta Paul taak , e kneel down wid all ob um an pray .
44020037	De people all beena cry down wiles dey beena hug an kiss Paul , da tell um bye .
44020038	De ting dat mek de people saaful mo den all , been dat e tell um dat dey ain neba gwine shim gin . So den , dey gone long wid Paul ta de big boat .
44021001	Atta we tell um bye an lef um , we git eenta de big boat an sail scraight ta Cos . De nex day we git ta Rhodes , an fom dey we gone ta Patara .
44021002	Den we find a big boat dat been ready fa cross oba ta Phoenicia . So we git eenta de boat an sail way .
44021003	We see Cyprus an sail sout ob um an gone on ta Syria . An we git off de boat een Tyre , weh dey been gwine unload de boat .
44021004	We find some dat bleebe pon Jedus dey , an we gone on wid um . We stay dey wid um a week . Dey waan Paul e ain oughta go on ta Jerusalem , cause de Sperit been tell dem wa gwine happen ta Paul dey .
44021005	Bot wen de time come fa lef Tyre , we gone pon we way . An all dem Christian man , dey wife dem an dey chullun , dey gone long wid we wiles we beena waak outta de city . Wen we git ta de seasho , we all kneel down an pray .
44021006	Den we tell one noda bye , an we git eenta de big boat , an dey gone back ta dey house .
44021007	We gone on , da sail fom Tyre ta Ptolemais . Dey we find de Christian bredren . We tell um hey an stay wid um one day .
44021008	De nex day , we lef Ptolemais an git ta Caesarea . We gone fa stay wid one man name Philip , wa beena tell people de Good Nyews . E one ob dem seben man dat dey been pick een Jerusalem fa hep fa do God wok .
44021009	E hab fo daughta dat ain been marry yet . Dem ooman been prophet .
44021010	We been dey some wile een Caesarea wen one prophet name Agabus come fom Judea .
44021011	E come ta we , an e tek Paul belt an nyuse um fa tie op e own han an foot . An e say , “ De Holy Sperit say , jes like dis , de Jew dem een Jerusalem gwine tie op de one wa own dis belt . Dem Jew gwine han um oba ta de people dat ain Jew . ”
44021012	Wen we yeh dat , we an de people dey een de town beg Paul say , e mus dohn go on ta Jerusalem .
44021013	Bot Paul ansa say , “ Wa oona da do , da cry like dis an da mek me haat saaful ? A ready fa leh um chunk me eenta de jailhouse een Jerusalem . A eben ready fa leh um kill me fa sake ob de Lawd Jedus . ”
44021014	We ain been able fa mek Paul change e mind . So we lef off da beg um , an we say , “ We pray dat wasoneba de Lawd wahn gwine happen . ”
44021015	Atta some wile dey , we git ready an lef fa go on ta Jerusalem .
44021016	Some dem fom Caesarea wa bleebe pon Jedus gone long wid we ta Jerusalem . Dey cyaa we ta de house ob one man name Mnason weh we been gwine stay . Mnason come fom Cyprus , an e been one ob de fus fa bleebe pon de Lawd Jedus an waak een e way .
44021017	Wen we git ta Jerusalem , de Christian bredren gii we haaty welcome .
44021018	De nex day Paul gone wid we fa see James . An all de choch elda dem been dey too .
44021019	Atta Paul tell um hey , e tell um all wa God beena do mongst dem people wa ain Jew wiles Paul beena wok dey wid um .
44021020	Now wen James an de choch elda dem yeh wa Paul say , dey praise God . Den dey tell Paul say , “ Broda , ya kin see dat many tousan Jew people yah bleebe pon Jedus . An dey all da tek cyah fa keep de Jew Law too good .
44021021	Oda people done tell um bout ya , say ya da laan all de Jew people oba dey een dem oda country mongst de people dat ain Jew . Dey say ya tell all dem Jew oba dey dat dey ain oughta do wa Moses Law say . Dey say ya tell um oba dey dat dey ain oughta circumcise dey chullun an dey ain oughta do dem ting dat de Jew people da do , dem ting dat we ole people laan we fa do .
44021022	Now wa we gwine do ? Dem Jew yah mus know dat ya done come .
44021023	Ya haffa do wa we gwine tell ya fa do . Fo man dey yah wid we dat done mek a wow . Dey done promise God fa do a saticula ting .
44021024	Ya haffa go long wid dem man an jine een wid um fa do dem ting dey do fa mek um clean een God eye . An ya mus pay wa dat cost fa dem man , so dat dey gwine be able fa git dey head shabe . Ef ya do dat , ebrybody gwine know dat wa people beena say bout ya ain true tall . Dey gwine know dat ya da keep de Law too , dat God gii Moses .
44021025	Now den , we wahn fa taak bout de people dat ain Jew dat bleebe pon Jedus . We done write a letta ta dem . We say dat we done cide dat dey mus dohn nyam nottin dat people done sacrifice ta dey god dat ain fa true . Dey mus dohn nyam no blood an mus dohn nyam no meat dat been scrangle an hab de blood een um . An mus dohn lib loose life . ”
44021026	De nex day , Paul gone long wid de fo man dem . Dey all done dem ting dat de people do fa mek um clean een God eye . Den e gone eenta God House fa mek people know how many day e gwine be til dey finish dem ting dey da do fa mek um clean een God eye , wen dey been gwine offa de sacrifice fa all ob um .
44021027	Jes fo de seben day been oba , some Jew people dat come fom de arie ob Asia see Paul eenside God House . Dem Jew people stir op all de crowd an grab hole ta Paul .
44021028	Dey holla ta de crowd say , “ People ob Israel , come hep we ! Dis de man dat been gwine all oba , da laan de people , da say bad ting ginst we Israel people , ginst we Law dat God gii Moses an ginst God House . An mo den dat , now e done bring people wa ain Jew eenta God House . E done mek dis place dat blongst ta God dorty een God eye ! ”
44021029	( Dem Jew say dat , cause dey been see Trophimus wid Paul een de city . Trophimus come fom Ephesus , so dem Jew tink Paul been tek Trophimus eenta God House . )
44021030	Den heapa people staat fa mek trouble all oba de city . De people come da ron fom all oba . Dey geda togeda dey an grab hole ta Paul , an dey drag um outta God House . Right den dey shet de door ob God House .
44021031	Den dem people beena try fa kill Paul . Bot somebody gone an tell de commanda ob de Roman sodja dem , da say all de people een Jerusalem been een a ruckus .
44021032	Right den , de commanda tek some offisa an some sodja dem an ron down fa meet de people dat been dey . Wen de people see de commanda an e sodja dem , dey stop da beat Paul .
44021033	De commanda gone ta Paul an res um . E gii de sodja dem orda fa tie Paul op wid two chain . Den e aks de people say , “ Who dis man ? Wa e done ? ”
44021034	Some people een de crowd holla one ting . Some holla noda ting . De nise ob de ruckus been so loud dat de commanda ain been able fa find out wa been happen . So e chaage de sodja fa tek Paul op eenta de place weh de sodja dem beena lib .
44021035	Wen dey git ta de step , de sodja dem been haffa cyaa Paul , cause de people been so wile ginst Paul .
44021036	Dey all beena folla atta Paul , da holla say , “ Kill um ! ”
44021037	Jes wen de sodja dem been ready fa cyaa Paul eenside de place weh dey lib , Paul aks de commanda say , “ Please sah , leh me tell ya sompin . ”
44021038	So den , ya ain dat man fom Egypt dat a leetle wile back mek people staat fa riot , dat man dat been git fo tousan man dat ready fa fight an kill people an gone out wid um eenta de desat , ainty ? ”
44021039	Paul ansa de commanda say , “ A a Jew an A come fom Tarsus oba dey een Cilicia . De city weh A bon ain no leetle city . Please sah , leh me taak ta de people . ”
44021040	De commanda gii Paul a chance fa taak . Paul stanop pon de step dey an mek sign wid e han ta de people ta um fa hush op . Wen all de people hush op , Paul taak ta um een de Hebrew language .
44022001	Paul tell um say , “ Oona we bredren an we fada dem , listen op now . Leh me tell oona wa A done do . Den oona ain gwine wahn fa condemn me ! ”
44022002	Wen dey yeh Paul da taak Hebrew , dey hush op eben mo .
44022003	Den Paul tell um say , “ A a Jew . A bon een Tarsus oba dey een Cilicia . Bot A been raise yah een Jerusalem , an Gamaliel been me teacha . E tek time fa laan me all de Law dat we ole people done lef we . An A gii mesef fa do wa God wahn , jes like all ob oona yah taday .
44022004	A beena fight ginst de people dat folla dis Way , an mek some ob um suffa til dey dead . A beena grab hole ta man dem an ooman dem an tie um op an chunk um eenta de jailhouse .
44022005	De head man ob de Jew priest dem an all de leada dem een de Jew Council kin tell oona dat A da tell oona de trute . A eben been git letta fom dem leada fa tek ta de Jew bredren een Damascus . A beena gwine dey fa grab hole ta dem people dey wa da folla dis Way , fa tie um op an bring um back yah ta Jerusalem fa git punish .
44022006	“ A beena trabel ta Damascus , an A mos git dey , wen all ob a sudden , bout de middle ob de day , a bright light come outta de sky an shine roun bout me .
44022007	A faddown ta de groun , an A yeh a boice say , ‘ Saul ! Saul ! Wa mek ya fight ginst me so ? ’
44022008	A aks say , ‘ Lawd , who ya da ? ’ De boice ansa me say , ‘ A Jedus dat come outta Nazareth . A de one ya da fight ginst . ’
44022009	Now de people dat been dey wid me , dey see de light , bot dey ain yeh de boice ob de one dat beena taak ta me .
44022010	A aks say , ‘ Lawd , wa A fa do ? ’ De Lawd tell me say , ‘ Git op . Mus go eenta Damascus . An een Damascus dey gwine tell ya all de ting dem dat God done cide fa ya fa do . ’
44022011	Now dat bright light been mek me bline . So de people dat been dey wid me tek hole ta me han an hep me go on eenta Damascus .
44022012	“ One man name Ananias beena lib dey een dat town . E been a man wa wahn fa please God . E beena do wa de Jew Law say , an all de Jew people wa lib een Damascus spec um .
44022013	Ananias come stanop by me an say , ‘ Me broda Saul , ya gwine see gin right now ! ’ Jes like dat , right den A been able fa see gin , an A see Ananias .
44022014	“ E say , ‘ De God dat we ole people beena woshup , e done pick ya fa mek ya know wa e wahn ya fa do , an fa show ya de One wa da waak scraight wid God , an fa mek ya yeh e own boice da taak ta ya .
44022015	Cause ya gwine tell all de people wa ya done see an wa ya done yeh .
44022016	Now den , hoccome ya da wait ? Git op . Leh um bactize ya , an pray ta de Lawd Jedus Christ fa wash way ya sin . ’
44022017	“ A gone back ta Jerusalem . An wen A beena pray een God House , God show me a wision .
44022018	A see de Lawd . E tell me say , ‘ Go , git outta Jerusalem right now . Cause de people dey ain gwine bleebe wa ya tell um bout me . ’
44022019	A ansa um say , ‘ Lawd , dey know A nyuse fa gone fom one Jew meetin house ta de nex fa grab hole ta dem people dat bleebe pon ya . A nyuse fa chunk um een de jailhouse an beat um op .
44022020	An A been dey too wen dey kill Stephen , de man dat beena tell people bout ya . A beena gree fa hab um kill Stephen , an A beena gyaad de coat dem ob de people wen dey beena kill um . ’
44022021	Den de Lawd tell me say , ‘ Mus go way , cause A gwine sen ya way off ta de people dat ain Jew . ’ ”
44022022	De people listen ta wa Paul say til e say God been sen um way ta de people dat ain Jew . Den dey staat fa holla say , “ Leh we git rid ob Paul ! Leh we kill um an sen um way fom dis wol ! E ain fit fa lib ! ”
44022023	De people beena holla loud , an dey shrow off dey coat an dey shrow dort op een de air .
44022024	De commanda ob de Roman sodja dem tell e sodja dem fa cyaa Paul eenta de place weh dey lib . E chaage um fa beat Paul fa mek um taak , an tell um hoccome de people beena holla ginst um like dis .
44022025	Bot wen dey tie Paul op an scretch um out fa beat um , Paul taak ta de offisa wa beena stanop dey . Paul aks um say , “ De law ain tell oona dat oona kin beat a Roman citizen wen nobody ain eben jedge um , needa find out dat e done sompin bad , ainty dough ? ”
44022026	Wen de offisa yeh wa Paul say , e gone fa tell de commanda say , “ Wa ya da do ? Dis man a Roman citizen ! ”
44022027	So den de commanda gone ta Paul an aks um say , “ Tell me fa true , ya a Roman citizen ? ”
44022028	De commanda say , “ A pay plenty money fa git fa be a Roman citizen . ”
44022029	Right den de sodja dem dat been gwine beat Paul fa mek um taak , dey ton back an lef um . An de commanda , too , been scaid wen e yeh dat Paul been a Roman citizen , cause e been mek de sodja dem tie Paul op wid chain .
44022030	De commanda been wahn fa know jes wa de Jew people beena cuse Paul bout . So de nex day e hab e sodja dem tek off Paul chain . Den e chaage de leada dem ob de priest dem an all de memba dem ob de Jew Council fa come meet togeda . An e bring Paul , an mek um stanop een front ob um .
44023001	Paul look scraight at de memba dem een de Jew Council , an e tell um say , “ Bredren , all ob me life , right op ta taday , A beena lib scraight so dat A ain hab no doubt een me haat dat A da do right fo God . ”
44023002	Ananias , de head man ob de priest dem tell dem dat beena stanop close ta Paul fa slap e mout .
44023003	Den Paul tell Ananias say , “ God gwine slap ya ! Ya like a wall dat people paint white fa mek um look good ! Ya da seddown dey fa jedge me coddin ta de Law , bot ya da broke de Law wen ya chaage dem people fa slap me , ainty ? ”
44023004	Dem dat beena stanop close ta Paul tell um say , “ Dat de head man ob de priest dem ya da shrow slam at ! ”
44023005	Paul ansa um say , “ Bredren , A ain been know dat e de head priest . Cause God Book say , ‘ Mus dohn taak bad bout a rula ob ya people . ’ ”
44023006	Now den , Paul see dat de people een de Jew Council been mix . Some dem been Sadducee an some been Pharisee . So e call out een de Council tell um say , “ Bredren , A a Pharisee an de son ob a Pharisee . Dey wahn fa jedge me yah cause A bleebe dat God gwine mek de people dat done dead lib gin . ”
44023007	Wen Paul say dat , de Pharisee dem an de Sadducee dem staat fa spute an taak ginst one noda . De people all beena aagy ginst one noda .
44023008	( De Sadducee dem say dat wen somebody done dead , e ain neba gwine lib gin . An dey say dey ain no angel needa no sperit . Bot de Pharisee dem bleebe dat wen somebody dead , e gwine lib gin . An dey bleebe een angel an sperit fa true . )
44023009	Den de Pharisee an de Sadducee dem holla mo loud . Some ob de Jew Law teacha dem dat been Pharisee stanop an aagy een a loud boice say , “ We ain find nottin dat dis man Paul done bad ! Ef a angel or a sperit been taak ta um fa true , we ain oughta fight ginst God ! ”
44023010	Dem people aagy so scrong an wile til de commanda been scaid de people been gwine teah Paul op , piece by piece . So e sen e sodja dem fa go git Paul way fom de crowd an cyaa um back ta de place weh de sodja dem lib .
44023011	Wen night come , de Lawd come an stanop close ta Paul an say , “ Mus hab courage ! Ya beena tell people een Jerusalem wa ya know bout me . Same way so , ya haffa do dat een Rome , too . ”
44023012	Wen day clean come , some Jew dem meet togeda an mek plan . Dey mek a wow an tell God , say dey ain gwine nyam nottin an dey ain gwine drink nottin til dey done kill Paul .
44023013	Dey been mo den foty people wa geda togeda an mek dis scheme .
44023014	Den dey gone ta de leada dem ob de priest dem an ta de oda Jew leada dem . Dey tell um say , “ We done mek a wow an tell God , say we ain gwine nyam nottin an we ain gwine drink nottin til we kill Paul .
44023015	Now den , oona an de memba dem een de Jew Council , oona mus sen ta de commanda ob de sodja dem an aks um fa bring Paul fa come fo oona . Oona mus mek de commanda bleebe oona wahn fa yeh mo bout Paul case . We ready fa kill Paul fo dey git yah wid um . ”
44023016	Bot Paul sista boy yeh bout dat plan , so e gone fa meet Paul eenside de place weh de sodja dem lib , an e tell Paul wa e been yeh .
44023017	Paul call a offisa ob de sodja dem . E tell um say , “ Tek dis nyoung man ta ya commanda . E got sompin fa tell um . ”
44023018	De offisa tek de nyoung man an gone ta de commanda . E tell um say , “ Dat man Paul een de jailhouse call me an aks me fa bring dis nyoung man yah ta ya , cause e got sompin fa tell ya . ”
44023019	De commanda tek de nyoung man han an gone a leetle way off fom de oda people . E aks um say , “ Wa dat ya wahn fa tell me ? ”
44023020	De nyoung man say , “ De Jew leada dem done gree fa aks ya fa tek Paul fo de Council demarra . Dey gwine try fa mek ya bleebe dat dey wahn fa yeh mo bout Paul .
44023021	Bot ya mus dohn listen ta um cause mo den foty people da hide out , lay wait fa kill Paul wen e gwine come by . Dey done mek a wow tell God , say dey ain gwine nyam nottin an dey ain gwine drink nottin til dey done kill Paul . Dey ready now , bot dey da wait fa yeh dat ya gii orda ta de sodja dem fa tek Paul ta de Council . ”
44023022	De commanda chaage de nyoung man say , “ Mus dohn tell nobody dat ya done tell me dis . ” An e sen um way .
44023023	De commanda ob de sodja dem call two ob e offisa dem an e tell um say , “ Oona git ready two hundud sodja , an sebenty dat ride hoss , an two hundud dat hab speah fa fight . Oona mus go ta Caesarea . Mus git ready fa go by nine o'clock dis night .
44023024	Oona mus find hoss fa Paul fa ride pon . Mus tek um ta Gobna Felix . Mus dohn leh nottin haam Paul . ”
44023025	Den de commanda write dis letta ta de gobna :
44023026	“ A , Claudius Lysias , da write ta e Excellency , Gobna Felix . A da tell ya hey , sah !
44023027	De Jew people done grab hole ta dis man an dey been ready fa kill um . Bot A yeh say e been a Roman citizen , so A gone wid me sodja dem an pull um outta de Jew dem han .
44023028	A been wahn fa know hoccome dey beena cuse um , so A cyaa um ta de Jew Council .
44023029	A find out dat e ain done nottin fa mek um kill um or fa mek um chunk um een de jailhouse . Dey beena hole um cause dey say e done sompin ginst dey Jew Law .
44023030	Wen A yeh say dat de Jew people done scheme an mek plan fa kill um , dat mek me sen um ta ya right den . An A done chaage de Jew people dat done cuse um fa go ta ya too , fa mek dey case ginst um . ”
44023031	So de sodja dem done wa dey commanda chaage um fa do . Dey tek Paul an gone dat night ta Antipatris .
44023032	Wen day clean , dem sodja gone back ta de place weh dey lib . Bot dey lef de man dem dat beena ride hoss fa tek Paul .
44023033	Wen dey git ta Caesarea , dey tek Paul ta de gobna an gim de letta .
44023034	De gobna read de letta an aks wa arie ob de country Paul come fom . Wen e find out dat Paul come fom Cilicia ,
44023035	e tell Paul say , “ A gwine hole ya case til dem Jew dat cuse ya come yah . ” An e chaage de gyaad dem fa pit Paul een de bighouse dat Herod been build an gyaad um dey .
44024001	Wen fibe day pass , Ananias , de head man ob de Jew priest dem , an some some ob de oda leada dem an a lawya name Tertullus , dey gone ta Caesarea fa tell Gobna Felix wa Paul done do .
44024002	Wen de Gobna call Paul fa come een , Tertullus tell e case ginst Paul ta de Gobna .
44024003	We heppy all de time fa wa ya do ebryweh , an we tell ya tankya fa true .
44024004	A ain wahn fa waste ya time so A da beg ya please fa listen ta wa we come fa taak bout fa jes a leetle wile .
44024005	We find out dat dis man yah beena mek heapa trouble . E beena stir op ruckus mongst de Jew people all oba de wol . An e de leada fa de group dey call Nazarene .
44024006	One time dis man yah eben try fa mek God House so dat e ain clean een God eye , bot we grab hole ta um . An we been wahn fa jedge um like we Jew Law say fa do .
44024007	Bot de commanda , Lysias , come an jomp pon we an tek um fom we .
44024008	Den Lysias gii orda dat we wa cuse Paul haffa come fo ya . Ef ya quizzit dis man Paul , ya kin find out fom um dat all dat we tell ya ginst um , e true . ”
44024009	An de Jew dem too say dem same ting ginst Paul , an say dat dem ting de trute .
44024010	Gobna Felix mek sign ta Paul , fa tell um bout dis ting . Paul ansa say , “ A know ya been jedge oba de people een dis country fa many yeah . So den , A heppy dat ya gii me de chance fa ansa bout dis ting yah .
44024011	Ef ya aks , ya kin find out dat no mo den tweb day gone by since A gone op ta Jerusalem fa woshup een God House .
44024012	De Jew dem ain find me da aagy wid nobody dey een God House . Dey ain find me da stir op de crowd een de Jew meetin house , an dey ain find me da stir op de people een no oda side ob de city needa .
44024013	An dey cyahn show dat wa dey da say ginst me , e true .
44024014	Bot A da tell ya dis : Wen A da lib coddin ta de Way , A da woshup de God dat we ole people beena woshup . An de Jew people say dis Way yah ain true . A bleebe all de ting dem wa dey een de Law dat God gii Moses , an all dat de prophet dem done write .
44024015	A hab de same hope jes like de Jew dem hope , dat God gwine mek all people , de good an de bad , lib gin .
44024016	So den , A da try all de time fa do all A kin fa hab a clean haat een God eye an fo people too .
44024017	“ Now , atta some yeah done pass wen A been gone fom Jerusalem , A come dey fa cyaa some money fa gii ta me Jew people an fa offa sacrifice ta God .
44024018	A beena offa de sacrifice fa mek mesef clean een God eye wen some people come an find me dey een God House . Ain been no crowd dey wid me an no ruckus .
44024019	Bot some Jew dat come outta de arie ob Asia been dey . Dey oughta come yah fo ya an cuse me , ef dey hab sompin ginst me .
44024020	Ef dem fom Asia ain do dat , leh dem people yah tell ya wa bad ting dey done find A done wen dey beena jedge me een de Jew Council .
44024021	Wen dey beena jedge me , dey ain find nottin cep de one ting A holla wiles A beena stan fo um . A say , ‘ Oona da jedge me taday cause A bleebe fa true dat God gwine mek de people dat done dead lib gin . ’ ”
44024022	Gobna Felix know too well bout de Way ob de Lawd , an e tell um fa wait . E say , “ A gwine cide ya case wen Lysias , de commanda ob de sodja dem , git yah . ”
44024023	E gii orda ta de offisa ob de sodja dem fa hab um keep on da gyaad Paul . Bot e say dey mus dohn keep Paul like a prisona een de jailhouse all de time , an dey haffa leh Paul fren dem come bring um wa e need .
44024024	Atta some time pass , Felix come , long wid e Jew wife name Drusilla , an e sen fa Paul . Dey listen ta wa Paul tell um bout wa dey mean wen dey say dey bleebe pon Jedus Christ .
44024025	Paul gone on fa splain bout wa dey mean wen dey say somebody da waak scraight , how e able fa trol esef , an bout de day wen God gwine jedge all people . Wen Felix yeh dat , e been scaid , an e tell Paul say , “ Ya kin go , now . Some oda time wen A git de chance , A gwine sen fa ya . ”
44024026	Same time , Felix beena hope dat Paul been gwine gim some money fa free um . Cause ob dat , Felix beena sen fa Paul plenty time an taak wid um .
44024027	Atta two yeah been pass , Porcius Festus tek Gobna Felix place . Bot Felix been wahn fa mek de Jew people like um , so e ain free Paul fom de jailhouse fo e gone .
44025001	Shree day atta Gobna Festus git ta e arie , e lef Caesarea an gone ta Jerusalem .
44025002	De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem gone fa meet Festus . Dey tell um bad ting ginst Paul .
44025003	Dey beg Festus fa do um fabor . Dey wahn um fa bring Paul back ta Jerusalem , cause dey done been mek plan fa kill um long de road .
44025004	Festus ansa um say , “ Dey da gyaad Paul an keep um een Caesarea . An soon A gwine go back dey too .
44025005	Ef Paul done sompin bad , leh oona leada dem come wid me ta Caesarea . Leh um cuse de man dey . ”
44025006	Festus ain stay wid um een Jerusalem no mo den eight or ten day fo e gone back ta Caesarea . De nex day e gone an seddown een de court fa jedge , an e gii orda fa dem fa bring Paul fo um .
44025007	Wen Paul git ta de court , de Jew leada dem dat been come fom Jerusalem gone an stanop roun um . Dey cuse Paul , say e done plenty bad ting , bot dey ain been able fa show nottin tall dat e done bad fa true .
44025008	Den Paul hab a chance fa ansa um , fa show dat e ain done nottin bad . E say , “ A ain done nottin dat de Jew Law say we ain oughta do . A ain done nottin bad een God House . An A ain done nottin dat de rula Caesar say we ain oughta do . ”
44025009	Now den , Festus wahn fa mek de Jew people like um , so e aks Paul say , “ Ya wahn dem fa tek ya ta Jerusalem an leh me go yeh ya case dey ? ”
44025010	Paul ansa um say , “ A da stanop yah fo de Roman rula Caesar court , weh dey oughta jedge me . Ya know too well dat A ain done nottin bad ginst de Jew people .
44025011	Ef A done broke de law an A done sompin bad so dat A oughta dead , A ain gwine say oona mus dohn kill me . Bot ef wa dem people yah say ginst me ain true tall , nobody oughta han me oba ta um . A wahn ya fa tek me fa go fo Caesar . ”
44025012	Atta Festus been taak wid dem wa wise um , e ansa Paul say , “ So den , ya say ya wahn fa go fo Caesar . Fa sho , A gwine sen ya ta Caesar . ”
44025013	Two shree day atta dat , King Agrippa an Bernice come ta Caesarea . Dey come fa see Festus an tell um dey heppy e been come dey .
44025014	Wen dey been dey some time , Festus tell King Agrippa bout Paul case . E say , “ Dey one man yah dat Felix been lef as a prisona .
44025015	Wen A gone ta Jerusalem , de leada dem ob de priest dem an de oda Jew leada dem tell me dat man Paul done bad , an dey aks me fa jedge um .
44025016	Bot A tell um dat de Roman dem ain da do like dat . We ain jedge nobody fo we gim de chance fa meet wid dem dat cuse um an leh dem ansa bout wa dey say e done .
44025017	Wen dem dat cuse um come yah , A ain wait eben a leetle bit . De nex day , A gone an seddown een de court an chaage um fa bring Paul een .
44025018	Wen dem dat cuse um stanop fa taak , dey ain say nottin bad ginst um like how A beena tink dey gwine taak .
44025019	Dey jes beena spute wid um bout how de Jew dem oughta woshup dey God an bout one dead man name Jedus . Bot Paul say dat man da lib gin now .
44025020	A ain know how fa laan nuff bout dis , fa jedge de case . Cause ob dat , A aks Paul ef e wahn fa go ta Jerusalem fa leh um jedge um dey .
44025021	Bot Paul aks me fa keep um een de jailhouse an leh de rula Caesar jedge um . So A chaage um fa gyaad Paul til A able fa sen um ta Caesar . ”
44025022	Agrippa tell Festus say , “ A wahn fa yeh dis man mesef . ”
44025023	De nex day , Agrippa an Bernice gone ta de place weh people da geda . An all de people done plenty ting fa show dey spec um , an dey gim haaty welcome . Agrippa dem gone eenside de place wid de offisa dem ob de sodja dem , an de leada dem een de city . Wen Festus chaage um fa bring Paul , dey bring um een .
44025024	Festus say , “ King Agrippa an all people dey yah . Oona look pon dis man ! All de Jew people een Jerusalem an dem yah een Caesarea da holla say e ain oughta lib no mo .
44025025	Bot A ain find nottin dat e done fa mek me jedge um fa dead . An e say e wahn fa go fo de rula , so A done cide fa sen um dey .
44025026	Bot A ain hab nottin dat A kin write ta Caesar bout dis man . A done bring um fo oona , an mos ob all A bring um ta ya , King Agrippa , so dat atta we quizzit um an find out bout e case , A kin hab sompin fa write ta Caesar .
44025027	Cause A tink dat e ain mek no sense fa sen a prisona ta Caesar ef A ain able fa tell um wa bad ting dat prisona done do . ”
44026001	Den King Agrippa tell Paul say , “ Ya kin taak fa yasef now . ” So Paul pit e han op an staat fa ansa bout wa been happen .
44026002	E say , “ King Agrippa , A heppy fa dis chance dat A hab fa stanop fo ya taday an ansa fa all de bad ting dem dat de Jew people say A done .
44026003	A heppy dat ya know all bout how de Jew people lib , an de ting dem dey kin spute bout wid one noda . So den , A da beg ya fa tek time fa listen ta all A da tell ya now .
44026004	“ All de Jew people know how A beena lib fom wen A been a chile . Dey know fom de fus ob me life , how A been dey wid me own people an een Jerusalem .
44026005	Dey been know me fa a long time , an ef dey wahn fa taak true , dey kin tell oona . A beena lib scraight , a good memba ob de Pharisee dem , de group dat mo den all oda group da folla dem rule bout de way we woshup God .
44026006	Now A da stanop yah an dey da jedge me cause fa true , A da look fa de promise dat God gii we ole people .
44026007	Dis de same promise dat de tweb tribe ob we Jew people hope gwine come true fa dem wiles dey da woshup God day an night . King Agrippa , cause A da look fa dis same promise fa come true , de Jew dem da taak bad ginst me !
44026008	Hoccome all ob oona ain able fa bleebe dat God da mek de people dat done dead lib gin ?
44026009	“ A too beena tink dat fa sho , A oughta do all A kin do ginst de name ob Jedus dat come outta Nazareth .
44026010	A done jes dat een Jerusalem . De leada dem ob de priest dem , dey gii me de tority , an A done chunk heapa God people een de jailhouse . An wen dey condemn um fa dead , A done cyas me vote ginst um too .
44026011	Plenty time A gone ta all de Jew meetin house dem fa hab um punish God people dey , an A try fa mek um say dey ain bleebe pon Jedus Christ no mo . A been so mad down ginst um til A eben nyuse fa go ta city dem faa off een oda country fa mek dem people ob God suffa .
44026012	“ Dat hoccome A beena trabel ta Damascus . De leada dem ob de Jew priest dem been sen me dey wid letta dat show dey gii me de tority fa grab hole ta God people dey .
44026013	King Agrippa , A beena trabel pon de road ta Damascus een de middle ob de day , wen A see a bright light fom heaben come shine pon me an de man dem dat beena trabel long wid me . Dis light yah been too bright , mo bright den de sun .
44026014	We all faddown ta de groun . An A yeh one boice da taak ta me een de Hebrew language say , ‘ Saul , Saul , wa mek ya fight ginst me so ? Ya da haam yasef wen ya fight me , same like a ox wen e da kick ginst de stick ob e owna . ’
44026015	A aks , ‘ Who ya da , Lawd ? ’ De Lawd ansa me say , ‘ A Jedus dat ya da fight .
44026016	Now git op , stan pon ya foot . A done appeah ta ya fa tell ya dat A done pick ya fa wok fa me . Ya gwine tell oda people bout wa ya done see taday an wa A gwine show ya .
44026017	A gwine sabe ya fom ya own Jew people an A gwine sabe ya fom de people dat ain Jew , dem dat A gwine sen ya ta .
44026018	Ya gwine open dey eye . Ya gwine ton um way fom de daak an bring um eenta de light . Ya gwine ton um way fom onda Satan powa an bring um ta God , so dat dey gwine bleebe pon me . An cause dey bleebe pon me , God gwine paadon dey sin an dey gwine hab dey place mongst de people dat God done pick fa e own . ’
44026019	“ So den , King Agrippa , A beena do dem ting dat de boice dat come outta heaben een dat wision tell me fa do .
44026020	Fus A gone an tell de people een Damascus , den een Jerusalem , an den all oba Judea . An A tell de people dat ain Jew too . A tell um all dat dey haffa ton fom dey sin an come ta God . Dey oughta do dem ting dat show dey done ton fom dey sin .
44026021	Cause ob dat , dem Jew grab hole ta me wen A been dey een God House , an dey try fa kill me .
44026022	Bot God beena hep me all de time , an eben taday . So den , A da stanop yah an tell all ob oona . A da tell de leetle one dem an de big leada dem . A da tell oona de trute bout God , da say jes de same ting dat de prophet dem an Moses done beena say gwine happen .
44026023	Dey been say dat de Messiah haffa suffa an dead . Dey say dat e gwine be de fus fa git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , an dat e gwine tell e own Jew people an de people dat ain Jew bout de light ob God sabation . ”
44026024	Wen Paul say dat , Festus holla say , “ Paul , ya crazy ! Ya done study an laan sommuch til dat da mek ya crazy ! ”
44026025	Paul ansa say , “ Mos gran Festus , A ain crazy ! De wod dem A da say , dey mek sense an dey de trute .
44026026	King Agrippa , ya know bout dem ting yah . A know dat dey ain been hide fom ya , cause dey ain been done een a cona weh ain nobody kin shim . So A ain scaid fa tell ya bout um .
44026027	King Agrippa , ya bleebe wa de prophet dem tell we , ainty ? A know ya bleebe um . ”
44026028	King Agrippa tell Paul say , “ Ya tink dat een susha leetle wile , ya gwine mek me come fa be a Christian ? ”
44026029	Paul ansa say , “ Ef e jes a leetle wile or ef e tek a long time , A da pray ya gwine come ta Christ . A da pray ta God fa ya , an all de oda res dat da listen ta me taday , dat all ob oona gwine come fa be like me , cep fa dem chain yah dat A da weah . ”
44026030	Den de king an de gobna an Bernice , an all de oda people dat been seddown dey , dey git op .
44026031	Wen dey gone out , dey tell one noda say , “ Dis man yah ain done nottin fa mek um kill um or mek um chunk um een de jailhouse . ”
44026032	King Agrippa tell Festus say , “ Ya been able fa set dis man free ef e ain been say e wahn fa hab Caesar jedge e case . ”
44027001	Atta dey cide dat we oughta sail ta Italy , dey gii tority ta a offisa name Julius fa tek Paul an some oda prisona . Julius been a offisa een de Roman aamy regiment ob de rula Caesar .
44027002	We git een a big boat dat come fom Adramyttium . De boat been ready fa sail ta some dem town long de sho een de arie ob Asia . So we sail way , an Aristarchus , a Macedonia man dat come fom Thessalonica , gone wid we .
44027003	De nex day we git ta Sidon . De offisa Julius been good ta Paul . E leh Paul go fa see e fren dem so dat dey kin gim wasoneba e need .
44027004	We gone on fom Sidon . Bot cause dey been a heapa breeze ginst we , we gone an sail by de islant name Cyprus , pon de side weh dey ain been much breeze .
44027005	We cross de wata close ta Cilicia an Pamphylia an gone on ta Myra dey een Lycia .
44027006	Een Myra de offisa find a big boat dat come fom Alexandria . De boat been gwine sail fa Italy , so e pit we pon dat boat .
44027007	De boat beena gwine slow fa plenty day . E ain been easy , bot at las we manage fa git close ta a town name Cnidus . De scrong breeze ain leh we go de way we been wahn fa go , so we sail down by Crete islant weh de breeze ain da blow scrong . We pass close ta Salmone .
44027008	De breeze beena blow mo scronga , so e ain been easy . Bot we keep close by de sho til we git ta a place name Fair Havens , close ta de city name Lasea .
44027009	Now we done been loss tommuch time , cause e done been atta de day wen de Jew people beena hab dey fast dat yeah , an de wata been too rough . So Paul waan de oda people een de boat .
44027010	E tell um say , “ Oona me fren , A see dat we trabel now gwine mek we suffa tommuch wen we come outta yah . Dey gwine be plenty haam ta we , an de load , an de boat too . An dey gwine be loss ob life too . ”
44027011	Bot de aamy offisa ain tek wa Paul say . E listen ta wa de boat captain an de man wa own de boat say .
44027012	De haaba weh dey been ain been good fa stay een oba de winta time . So mos all de man dem been wahn fa sail outta dey an go on an try fa reach Phoenix . Dat been a haaba een Crete dat open ta de wata ta soutwest an ta de nortwest . Dey been wahn fa stay dey til de winta been pass .
44027013	A leetle breeze fom de sout staat fa blow , an de man dem been tink dey kin sail like dey been plan . So dey loose de boat an sail um pass , close ta de sho ob Crete Islant .
44027014	Purty soon , a big , big wind like a hurricane blow down fom de islant . Dey call dat wind de “ Norteasta . ”
44027015	De wind shake de boat scrong . Dey try fa ton de boat fa go ginst de wind an sail ta Crete , bot de big wind ain leh we go dat way . So we ain try dat no mo , an we leh de wind tek de boat long .
44027016	De breeze ain blow so bad wiles we beena pass sout ob a leetle islant name Cauda . Dey we manage fa fix de small lifeboat mo betta pon de big boat , bot dat ain been easy fa do .
44027017	De man dem pull de lifeboat eenta de big boat . Den dey tie rope tight roun de big boat fa mek sho e ain gwine fall apaat . Sandbank been dey een de wata close ta de sho ob Libya , so dey been scaid dat de big boat gwine fasten dey pon de sandbank . Dey pull de sail down an leh de wind tek de boat long .
44027018	De boat beena shake tommuch een de big storm . So de nex day , dey staat fa shrow way some ob de boat load eenta de wata .
44027019	De tird day , dey tek an pull some ob de ting dem like sail an tackle fom eenside de boat an shrow um way eenta de wata .
44027020	Fa plenty day , we ain been able fa see de sun an we ain been able fa see de staa . An de wind keep on da blow scrong , til at las we beena tink we gwine dead fa sho .
44027021	De man dem een de boat ain nyam nottin fa a long time . Paul stanop wen dey geda togeda an say , “ Oona been spose fa tek wa A been tell oona , wen A say oona ain oughta sail fom Crete . Den we ain beena haffa suffa all dis damage an loss .
44027022	Bot now , A da beg oona , mus tek courage ! Nobody ain gwine dead . Jes de boat gwine git stroy .
44027023	Las night de God dat A blongst ta an dat A da woshup , e sen e angel ta me . Dat angel come stan by me .
44027024	E say , ‘ Paul , mus dohn feah ! Ya haffa stanop fo Caesar een Rome . An God show e blessin . E done gii ya all dem dat da sail wid ya . Nobody ain gwine dead . ’
44027025	So oona mus tek courage ! Cause A trus God dat all e done tell me , e gwine happen jes like e say .
44027026	Bot de wind gwine blow we ta sho pon some islant . ”
44027027	Pon de day dat mek foteen , een de night , de big wind still beena dribe de big boat cross de Mediterranean Sea . Een de middle ob de night time , de man dem dat beena wok dey een de boat been tink we beena come close ta sho .
44027028	So dey drop line fa medja , an dey find dat de wata been one hundud an twenty foot deep . Atta leetle wile , dey medja de wata gin , an dey find dat de wata been ninety foot deep .
44027029	De man dem dat wok een de boat been scaid dat de boat gwine smash op pontop ob dem big stone close ta de sho . So dey drop fo anka down eenta de wata fom de back ob de boat fa try fa mek de boat stop fa drift . An dey beena pray fa mek day clean .
44027030	Den de man dem dat beena wok een de big boat try fa scape fom dey . Dey leh down de small lifeboat dat been dey eenside de big boat pon de wata , an dey mek like dey gwine pit out some anka fom de front ob de boat .
44027031	Paul tell de aamy offisa an de sodja dem say , “ Ef dem man yah ain stay eenside de big boat , oona gwine dead ! ”
44027032	So de sodja dem cut de rope dat been tie fa hole de small lifeboat , an leh de lifeboat gone way eenta de wata .
44027033	Jes fo day clean , Paul beg all de man dem fa nyam , say , “ Fa foteen day now oona beena wait , an oona ain nyam nottin .
44027034	A da beg oona fa nyam some ration , so dat oona kin git mo scronga an lib . Cause ain none ob oona gwine loss eben one hair fom ya head . Nottin gwine haam oona . ”
44027035	Atta Paul say dat , e tek some bread an tell God tankya fo all ob um . Den e broke de bread an staat fa nyam .
44027036	Dat courage um all , an dey all nyam some ration too .
44027037	All togeda dey been two hundud sebenty six ob we dey eenside de big boat .
44027038	Atta ebrybody been nyam til dey sattify , dey shrow way all de wheat eenta de wata fa mek de big boat mo lighta .
44027039	Wen day clean , dey see de sho , bot nobody ain know nottin bout um . Bot dey see a bay wid a sandy beach . Dey cide dat ef dey able fa do um , dey gwine mek de big boat go eenta de bay an op pon ta de sho dey .
44027040	Dey cut de rope dat hole de anka dem an lef dem anka een de wata . Same time , dey loose de rope dat beena tie op dem oar dat steer de boat . Den dey hice op de big sail een de front ob de boat fa leh de wind blow de boat an tek um ta de sho .
44027041	Bot de boat hit a sandbank . De front paat ob de boat fasten dey pon de groun an ain been able fa moob eben one leetle bit . An de scrong swellin ob de wata broke op de back paat ob de boat .
44027042	De sodja dem plan fa kill all de prisona dem so dat none ob um ain able fa swim ta sho an ron way .
44027043	Bot de offisa ob de sodja dem ain wahn um fa kill Paul , so e ain leh um kill de prisona dem . E gii orda ta all de man dem dat been able fa swim , fa jomp eenta de wata fus an swim ta de sho .
44027044	Den de oda people haffa go nex an grab hole ta some wood plank or some oda piece dat broke off de boat , an dey nyuse dat fa git ta sho . An dat how dey done , so dat dey all git ta de sho an nottin ain haam none ob um .
44028001	Atta we reach de sho an nottin ain haam none ob we , dey tell we dat dat islant name Malta .
44028002	De people wa lib dey been good ta we . E beena staat fa rain , an de place been cole , so dey mek a fire fa we an gii we all a haaty welcome .
44028003	Paul geda a bundle ob stick . Wen e beena pit um pon de fire , a pison snake come outta de bundle cause ob de heat ob de fire . Dat snake bite Paul han an fasten dey .
44028004	De people dat lib pon de islant see de snake da hang fom Paul han , an dey tell one noda say , “ Dis man yah done kill somebody fa sho . Cause eben dough e been sabe fom de wata , de god dem ain gwine leh um lib ! ”
44028005	Bot Paul shake e han oba de fire an de snake faddown eenside . An Paul ain been haam eben one leetle bit .
44028006	De people beena wait fa see Paul swell op or jes faddown an dead all ob a sudden , cause ob de snake . Atta dey been wait a long time , dey see dat nottin ain happen ta Paul . So den , dey change dey mind an beena say , “ Paul a god ! ”
44028007	Publius been de head man een dat islant , an e hab a big faam close ta dey . E been heppy fa see we , an e tek we ta e house . We stop dey shree day an e tek good cyah ob we .
44028008	Now Publius fada been sick een bed . E hab feba an de back door trot . Paul gone eenta e room fa shim . Den Paul pray ta God fa de man an lay e han pon um , an God heal um .
44028009	Wen dat happen , de oda sick people een de islant come ta Paul , an dey been heal .
44028010	Dey gii we plenty ting fa hona we . Den wen we been ready fa sail , dey gii we plenty ting fa we trabel . Dey gii we all wa we been need fa git ta de oda side ob de wata .
44028011	Atta we been shree mont een Malta , we sail way een a big boat dat done been dey een Malta all de winta . Dey call de boat “ De Twin God Dem , ” an e done come outta Alexandria .
44028012	We git ta a city name Syracuse an stay dey shree day .
44028013	Den we sail way fom dey an gone ta a city name Rhegium . De nex day de sout wind staat fa blow . An de day atta dat , we git ta Puteoli .
44028014	We meet some Christian bredren dey , an dey aks we fa stay wid um one week fo we gone on . An dat de way we git ta Rome .
44028015	De Christian bredren een Rome yeh say we beena come ta Rome , so dey come faa as de Maakut ob Appius an a place name De Shree Bodin House Dem fa meet we . Wen Paul see dem bredren dey , e tell God tankya an e tek courage .
44028016	Wen we git ta Rome , dey ain pit Paul een de jailhouse . Dey leh um lib een a house by esef , bot dey hab a sodja gyaad um .
44028017	Atta shree day , Paul call de Jew leada dem een Rome fa come meet wid um . Atta dey been geda , Paul tell um say , “ Bredren , A ain done nottin ginst we people . A ain done nottin ginst de way we Jew people lib , de way dat we ole people been gii we . Bot jes de same , de Jew dem grab hole ta me een Jerusalem an mek me prisona . Den dey han me oba ta de Roman dem .
44028018	Wen de Roman dem jedge me case , dey been wahn fa leh me loose , cause dey see dat A ain done nottin fa mek um kill me .
44028019	Bot de Jew dem fight ginst me , da say de Roman dem ain oughta leh me loose . So den A been haffa say dat A wahn de Roman rula Caesar fa jedge me . Bot A ain been hab no chaage fa mek ginst me own people , de Jew dem .
44028020	Cause ob dat , A call oona fa see oona an taak wid oona . Fa true , dey chain me fa sake ob de one dat de Israel people da hope fa . ”
44028021	Dey ansa Paul say , “ We ain git no letta fom Judea bout ya . An none ob we Jew bredren dat come fom dey ain tell we no nyews bout ya . Dey ain say nottin bad bout ya needa .
44028022	Bot we wahn fa yeh wa ya bleebe , cause we know dat people all oba da taak bad ginst dis group dat ya done jine . ”
44028023	So dey cide pon a time fa come meet gin wid Paul . Wen de day come , plenty people , eben mo den been dey de fus time , geda togeda fa meet wid um een de place weh e beena stay . Paul taak fom maanin ta night , da splain ta um an da tell um all bout how God rule . E read de Law dat God been gii Moses , an dem ting dat de prophet dem been write , da try fa sho de people de trute bout Jedus .
44028024	Some people bleebe dat Paul taak true , bot oda dem ain bleebe um .
44028025	So dey ain gree mongst deysef , an dey lef Paul place an gone pon dey way . Dat been atta Paul been say , “ De Holy Sperit say de trute wen e tell de prophet Isaiah fa tell oona ole people say ,
44028026	‘ Go tell dis people say :
44028027	Cause dem people git haad haat .
44028028	An Paul tell de people say , “ So den , A wahn fa mek oona know , God done sen people fa tell dem dat ain Jew bout how e da sabe people . An dem dat ain Jew gwine listen ! ”
44028029	Atta Paul say dis , de Jew dem lef , fa spute plenty wid one noda .
44028030	Fa two whole yeah , Paul beena lib dey een a house dat e beena rent . E gii haaty welcome ta all dem dat come fa shim .
44028031	E beena tell um bout how God da rule , an e laan um bout de Lawd Jedus Christ . E ain been scaid fa tell um out een de open , an nobody ain stop um .
45001001	Fom Paul wa da saab Jedus Christ . A a postle wa God done pick , an e gii me orda fa go tell people de Good Nyews wa God sen . A Paul da write ta oona .
45001002	God promise way back dey fa sen dis Good Nyews . E hab e prophet dem write um down een God Book , say dis Good Nyews gwine come .
45001003	Dis de Good Nyews bout God Son , we Lawd Jedus Christ . Wen e Son come as a man , e been bon one ob David chullun chullun .
45001004	De Son ob God come fom God an blongst ta God . Wen God mek um git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , e show wid e mighty powa dat Jedus Christ , we Lawd , e God Son .
45001005	Shru Christ an fa sake ob e name , God bless me an gii me de wok fa be e postle , so dat A kin go hep people all oba de wol fa bleebe pon Christ an do wa e tell um fa do .
45001006	An oona dey een Rome , oona too mongst dem wa God call fa blongst ta Jedus Christ .
45001007	So A da write ta all ob oona een Rome , oona wa God lob an wa e call fa be e own people .
45001008	Fus off , A tank me God shru Jedus Christ fa all ob oona , cause people all oba de wol da yeh say oona trus een Jedus Christ .
45001009	A da saab God wid all me haat , fa tell de Good Nyews bout e Son . An God know dat wa A say , e true . E know dat A da memba oona all de time , wensoneba A da pray .
45001010	An A da pray say God gwine mek a way fa me now fa come see oona , like A been wahn fa do all dis time , ef God gree .
45001011	Cause A wahn fa see oona too bad , fa share wid oona some ob de blessin dem wa de Holy Sperit da gii , so dat oona gwine bleebe pon Christ mo an mo .
45001012	Wa A mean fa say , A wahn fa courage oona een oona fait , an oona kin courage me wen A see how oona trus een God .
45001013	Me Christian bredren , A wahn oona fa know dat plenty time A beena plan fa come see oona . Bot all de time sompin come op , so A ain been able fa come . A wahn fa wok dey so dat A kin see people mongst oona come waak een de Lawd way too , jes like A beena wok mongst de oda res ob de people wa ain Jew so dat dey waak een e way .
45001014	A hab a judy fa tell de Good Nyews ta all people , dem wa lib cibilize an dem wa ain lib cibilize , dem wa got book laanin an dem wa ain got no book laanin .
45001015	Cause ob dat , A wahn fa tell de Good Nyews ta oona wa da lib een Rome too .
45001016	A ain shame eben one leetle bit ob de Good Nyews , cause dis Good Nyews God powaful way fa sabe all de people wa bleebe pon Jedus Christ . Fus de Jew people an den dem wa ain Jew , dey all gwine be sabe ef dey bleebe .
45001017	Cause de Good Nyews da show we how God da mek all ting right tween people an esef , ef dey bleebe . God da mek um right cause ob dey fait , fom de fus ta de las . Jes like God Book say , “ De one wa God mek right wid esef cause e bleebe pon God , dat one gwine hab life . ”
45001018	God da show fom heaben dat e bex too bad ginst people wa hab sin een dey haat an da do ebil . Dey wickity way da hide de trute bout God fom oda people .
45001019	Cause dey know too good wa people kin know bout God . God esef mek dat plain ta um .
45001020	Fom de time wen God mek de wol , people been able fa know plain dat God got powa wa dey faeba , an dat e de true God . People ain see dem ting bout God wid dey eye , bot dey kin know um , cause dey kin ondastan um fom de ting dem dat God been mek . So den , ain nobody kin say dat e ain know e da sin .
45001021	Dey know God , bot dey ain gim de hona dat dey oughta gii ta God , an dey ain tank um fa wa e da do . Steada dat , dey ain got a bit ob sense . Dey beena git all mix op een dey head til dey ain know wa right fa do .
45001022	Dey say dey got sense , bot dey come fa be fool .
45001023	Steada dey woshup God wa neba dead , dey da woshup idol wa look like a poson or a bod or a animal or a ting dat da crawl pon de groun .
45001024	Dat wa mek God lef people lone an leh um go on an do dem dorty ting wa dey een dey haat . Dey da do dorty ting wid dey body wid one noda , wa oughta mek um too shame .
45001025	Steada dey bleebe de trute bout God , dem people bleebe wa ain true tall . Dey da woshup an saab dem ting wa God mek , steada woshup an saab de God wa mek all ting . Dat de God we oughta praise faeba an eba ! Amen .
45001026	Cause people do dat , God lef um lone an leh um go on an do dem dorty ting wa dey een dey haat , ting wa oughta mek um too shame . De ooman dem deysef lef off da sleep wid husban an da do dorty ting wid oda ooman , wa God ain mek ooman fa do wid oda ooman .
45001027	Same way so , de man dem too lef off da sleep wid dey ooman an do wa dey wahn fa do een dey haat , dem dorty ting wid oda man wa God ain mek man fa do wid oda man . Man dem do dorty ting dem wid oda man wa oughta mek um too shame . Cause ob dat , God punish um wid de punishment dey oughta git fa de dorty ting dem dey done .
45001028	Pontop ob dat , cause people ain see fit fa pit dey haat pon de true ting wa dey know bout God , God lef um lone an leh um go on an tink all de time bout dem dorty ting so dat now dey jes da do dem ting wa dey ain oughta do .
45001029	Dey haat full op wid all kind ob wickity ting . Dey da do all kind ob ebil . All de time dey da wahn wa oda people got , an dey da do one noda bad tommuch . Dey full op wid de big eye an dey jealous ob one noda . Dey da kill one noda an fight one noda . Dey da ceebe one noda an dey da tink bad ting bout one noda . Dey onrabble dey mout , da taak bad bout oda people .
45001030	Dey da da hole oda people cheap . Dey hate God . Dey shrow slam at one noda . Dey tink dey mo betta den oda people , an dey da brag bout deysef . Dey da tink op mo way fa do bad ting all de time . An dey ain pay no mind ta dey fada , needa so dey modda .
45001031	Dey ain got no sense . Dey ain do wa dey say dey gwine do . Dey ain show no mussy ta one noda , an dey ain cyah nottin tall bout one noda .
45001032	Dey know God Law say dat dem wa da do dem ting yah oughta dead . Stillyet , dey keep on da do um . An pontop ob dat , dey say dat oda people do good wen dey da do dem same dorty ting .
45002001	So den , oona ain got no scuse tall fa de bad ting dem ya da do . Dohn mek no neba mind who ya da . Cause wensoneba ya jedge oda people , bot ya keep on da do de same bad ting dem dey da do , ya da jedge yasef .
45002002	We know God da do de right ting wen e jedge de people wa da do dem bad ting .
45002003	Bot oona wa da jedge oda people , ya da do dem same bad ting dem dat ya jedge oda people fa ! Fa sho , ya ain gwine be able fa git way . God gwine jedge oona too , ainty ?
45002004	Ya tink dat God blessin pon oona ain mean nottin ? Fa a long time , e da pit op wid ya , an e ain punish ya . Fa true , ya know dat God do ya sommuch good , cause e da try fa git ya fa change ya bad way an do wa e wahn ya fa do , ainty ?
45002005	Bot ya haat mo haada den a rock an ya ain wahn fa change ya way . So den , God gwine mek ya suffa eben mo , wen e punish ya on dat day , wen e gwine show how e bex wid people cause dey da do bad . Dat wen e gwine jedge um scraight , fa true .
45002006	Cause God gwine gii ebry poson de payback fa wasoneba e done .
45002007	Some people da do good ting all de time . Dey wahn fa hab God gim praise an hona an life wa go on faeba . An God gwine gim dat life wa ain neba gwine end .
45002008	Oda people jes da lib fa deysef . Dey ain wahn fa waak een de true way an do wa dey oughta do . Dey da waak een de ebil way , jes da do wa dey ain oughta do . God gwine show e bex fa true wid dem an punish um too bad .
45002009	E gwine be too bad fa all people wa keep on da do ebil . Fus de Jew people an den de people wa ain Jew , dey all gwine suffa too bad , ef dey keep on da do ebil .
45002010	Bot all de people wa da do good ting , God gwine praise um an gim hona an peace , fus de Jew people an den de people wa ain Jew .
45002011	Cause God da jedge all people de same way .
45002012	All de people wa ain hab de Law wa God gii Moses , dey da sin an dey gwine be loss dout de Law . An all dem wa hab de Law wa God gii Moses , dey da sin , an God gwine jedge um coddin ta de Law .
45002013	Jes cause dey done yeh wa de Law say , dat ain mek people stan right wid God . Dem wa da do wa de Law say , dey da stan right een God eye .
45002014	De people wa ain Jew ain know de Law wa God gii Moses . Bot wensoneba dey do sompin wa dey haat tell um fa do , an dat a ting wa de Law say , dey show dey know wa dey oughta do an wa dey ain oughta do , eben dough dey ain know dat Law .
45002015	Wa dey do , dat da show dat wa de Law say dey oughta do , dat wa dey een dey haat . Same way so , wa dey da tink da show dat de Law dey een dey haat , cause sometime dey kin tink say dey done do bad , an sometime dey kin tink say dey done do good .
45002016	So coddin ta wa de Good Nyews wa A da tell people say , all dem ting yah gwine happen pon dat day wen God gwine sen Jedus Christ fa jedge de secret ting dem wa all people da tink een dey haat .
45002017	Now den , wa bout oona wa say , “ A a Jew ” ? Ya da trus een de Law , an ya da brag dat ya people de people dat God done pick .
45002018	Oona know wa God wahn ya fa do , an ya know de good way , cause de Law laan ya wa right an wa ain right fa do .
45002019	Oona tink say fa sho ya kin lead de bline people , an ya like a light fa dem wa dey een de daak .
45002020	Ya tink say fa sho ya kin laan de people wa ain got no sense an dem wa ain staat fa laan yet . Cause ya Law wa God gii Moses mek ya know all wa ya need fa know , an all wa true .
45002021	Oona da laan oda people . Hoccome ya ain laan yasef ? Ya da tell oda people say , “ Mus dohn tief , ” stillyet ya da tief ?
45002022	Ya da tell oda people say , “ Mus dohn sleep wid noda poson wife or husban , ” stillyet ya da do dat ? Ya da taak say , ya hate dem idol wa people mek fa woshup . Stillyet ya da tief fom de place dem weh people woshup ?
45002023	Ya da brag say , ya know de Law wa God gii Moses . Stillyet , ya ain do wa dat Law tell ya fa do . An cause ob dat , people ain hab no spec fa God tall , ainty ?
45002024	So den , jes like dey write een God Book say , “ Ya Jew people da mek de people wa ain Jew hole God name cheap . ”
45002025	Ef ya da do wa de Law say , den de way ya been circumcise mean sompin fa true . Bot ef ya ain do wa de Law say , e stan jes like ya ain neba been circumcise tall .
45002026	Ef somebody wa ain neba been circumcise do wa de Law say fa true , God gwine look pon um jes like somebody wa done been circumcise , ainty ?
45002027	So den , de people wa ain been circumcise een dey body , an stillyet da do wa de Law say , dey gwine condemn oona . Cause oona wa done been circumcise an wa got de Law wa Moses done write , ya ain do wa de Law say .
45002028	So den , who de true Jew ? A man ain no true Jew jes cause e body been circumcise .
45002029	No , de true Jew , e de one wa God done pit e maak pon dat man haat . God sperit do dat . Ain de Law wa Moses write wa do dat . God da praise dat one , an dat praise ain come fom no man .
45003001	Well den , wa good e da fa be a Jew ? Wa good e da fa be circumcise ?
45003002	A da tell oona say , dey plenty good ting fa de Jew dem een ebry way ! Fus off , God gii e wod ta de Jew dem so dey gwine keep um an tell oda people .
45003003	Some dem Jew ain do wa God wahn um fa do , ainty ? Dat ain mean dat cause ob dat , God ain gwine keep ta e wod .
45003004	Fa true , dat ain so tall ! God gwine keep ta e wod fa sho , eben ef all people da lie . Jes like dey done write een God Book , say ,
45003005	Bot wa ef de ebil we da do show eben mo betta dat God da do right . Wa we gwine say ta dat ? Kin we say God ain do right wen e punish we fa de ebil we done ? ( A da taak yah like people taak . )
45003006	Dat ain so ! Ef God ain do right , den fa sho e cyahn jedge de people ob de wol , ainty ?
45003007	Bot some people kin aagy say , “ Ef de lie A da lie gwine show eben mo betta dat God da taak true , an dat mek people gim mo glory , hoccome God stillyet condemn me , da say A a sinna ? ”
45003008	So den , people kin say , “ Leh we do ebil so dat good gwine come outta dat ebil we do . ” Fa true , some people shrow slam pon we , da say A done say dat ! God gwine jedge dem people wa da tell lie pon me like dat , an gim wa dey desaab .
45003009	Well den , wa we kin say ? We Jew people , we betta een God eye den dem oda people wa ain Jew ? No , we ain no betta , eben a leetle bit ! Cause A done show oona dat sin da rule oba all people , oba de Jew people , an oba dem wa ain Jew .
45003010	Jes like dey done write down een God Book say :
45003011	Ain nobody wa da ondastan wa right .
45003012	All people done ton dey back pon God .
45003013	De wod dem wa come outta dey mout ,
45003014	Dey mout full op wid bad an bitta cuss wod .
45003015	Dey ron quick so dey kin haam people an kill um .
45003016	Ebryweh dey go , dey stroy an mek people suffa .
45003017	Dey ain know nottin tall bout peace .
45003018	Dey ain neba laan fa feah God . ”
45003019	Now den , we know dat ebryting wa done been write een de Jew Law da taak ta dem people wa spose fa lib coddin ta dat Law . De Law dey so nobody kin say e ain know wa right fa do , an so all de people een de whole wol gwine haffa ansa ta God fa wa dey done .
45003020	So e ain cause a poson do wa de law say e haffa do , dat gwine mek dat poson right een God eye . Steada dat , de Law dey fa mek people know dey sin .
45003021	Bot now God done show we de way e done mek ebryting right twix esef an all de people een de wol . An dat ain coddin ta de Law , eben dough wa de Law say an wa de prophet dem beena say , dey da tell we bout dat way .
45003022	God mek ebryting right twix esef an people ef dey bleebe pon Jedus Christ . God do dat fa all people wa bleebe pon Jedus , fa de Jew people an fa dem people wa ain Jew . Cause dey ain no diffunce tall tween um .
45003023	All people done sin an ain able fa do right nuff fa medja op ta God glory .
45003024	Bot God show we e blessin , fa mek ebryting right twix um an all people . E done dis wen Jedus Christ buy all people wid e blood fa mek um free fom sin .
45003025	God pick Jedus an sen um fa sacrifice e life een we place . An wen Jedus dead fa we sin , dat de way God paadon people sin wen dey bleebe pon um . Een dis way , God show dat fa true e da do wa right all de time . Op til now e beena pit op wid people sin .
45003026	E done dat fa show dat e right , an e da do wa right all de time . E gwine mek ebryting right twix esef an ebrybody wa bleebe dat Jedus done dead een dey place .
45003027	So den , wa we kin brag bout ? Ain nottin we kin brag bout , ainty ? Hoccome we cyahn brag ? We da do wa de Law tell we fa do , ainty ? Ain dat mek ebryting right twix God an we ? No , fa sho we cyahn brag bout dat , cause ebryting ain right twix God an we jes cause we da do wa de Law tell we fa do . No , ebryting right twix God an we cause we bleebe een Jedus .
45003028	So den , we know dat ebryting right tween God an we cause we bleebe . Ain cause we da do wa de Law tell we fa do .
45003029	An God ain dey jes fa de Jew people , ainty ? Ain e dey fa dem wa ain Jew too ? Fa true , e dey fa de Jew dem an fa dem wa ain Jew all two .
45003030	Dey jes one God an no mo , fa de Jew dem an fa dem wa ain Jew . An e gwine mek ebryting right tween dem an de Jew people , ef dey bleebe pon Jedus . E gwine mek ebryting right twix esef an de people wa ain Jew too , ef dey bleebe pon Jedus .
