An cause de wife wa ain bleebe done come fa be one wid e husban , God gwine tek de wife like one ob e own . Ef dat ain been so , dey chullun ain gwine be fit fa God . Bot de way e stan , dey fit fa God .
46007015	Bot ef de husban or de wife wa ain bleebe wahn fa lef um , leh um lef um . Wen dat happen , de husban or wife wa bleebe , e free fa go e own way . God call we fa hab peace .
46007016	Wife , how ya gwine know ya ain gwine sabe ya husban ? Husban , how ya gwine know ya ain gwine sabe ya wife ?
46007017	Ebrybody oughta lib e life de same way dat de Lawd mek fa um , like e been wen God call um . Dis de chaage A gii een all de choch dem .
46007018	Ef a man done been circumcise wen God call um , e ain oughta tek way de maak dat show e circumcise . Ef a man ain been circumcise wen God call um , e ain oughta hab um circumcise um .
46007019	Ef a man circumcise or ef e ain circumcise , dat ain mean nottin . Wen ya da do wa God say , dat wa count mo den all .
46007020	Ebrybody oughta keep on de same way e been wen God call um .
46007021	Ef ya been a slabe wen God call ya , mus dohn leh dat trouble ya . Bot ef ya git de chance fa be free , tek um .
46007022	Cause whosoneba been a slabe wen de Lawd call um , e de Lawd free poson . Same way so , whosoneba been a free poson wen de Lawd call um , e Christ slabe .
46007023	God done buy oona . E done pay fa oona wen Christ dead pon de cross . So now oona e slabe . Mus dohn leh nottin ob dis wol mek oona come fa be slabe ob oda people .
46007024	Me Christian bredren , ebry one ob oona oughta waak wid God de same way ya been wen God call ya .
46007025	Now A say dis yah bout dem wa ain marry yet . God ain gii me no rule bout um , bot A da tell oona wa A jedge fa be right . An God wa show mussy ta me gii me sense , so dat wen A da taak , people kin bleebe wa A tell um .
46007026	Cause ob de trouble time now , A tink e mo betta fa ebrybody fa stay same like e been .
46007027	Ef ya hab a wife , ya ain oughta try fa git rid ob um . Ef ya ain marry , oona ain oughta go da look fa a wife .
46007028	Bot ef a man wa ain marry git marry , dat ain no sin . An ef a ooman wa ain know no man git marry , dat ain no sin . Bot dem wa marry gwine hab a whole heapa trouble een dis life . A ain wahn oona fa haffa suffa dem trouble .
46007029	Me Christian bredren , A mean fa say dey ain much time lef . Fom now on , leh de man dem wa hab wife lib same like dem wa ain hab no wife .
46007030	Leh dem wa da weep an wail lib like dey ain sad . Leh dem wa da rejaice lib like dey ain da rejaice . An leh dem wa da buy ting lib like dey ain hab dem ting .
46007031	Dem wa hab bidness wid ting een dis wol ain oughta spen all dey time pon um . Cause dis wol like we shim , e da pass way .
46007032	A ain wahn oona fa hab no warry . A man wa ain marry , e consaan wid de Lawd wok , how e kin please de Lawd .
46007033	Bot a marry man consaan esef wid ting ob dis wol , how e kin please e wife .
46007034	So e hab two ting dat consaan um all de time . A wida ooman or a ooman wa ain neba know no man , dey consaan wid de Lawd wok , cause dey wahn all wa dey da do wid dey body , an all wa dey tink , mek um fa God . Bot a marry ooman consaan wid ting ob dis wol , how e kin please e husban .
46007035	A da tell oona dis fa hep oona . A ain da try fa stop oona fom de ting oona wahn fa do . A wahn oona fa lib een de right way an dohn leh nottin stop oona da wok fa de Lawd wid all oona haat .
46007036	Now A say dis yah bout de man wa gage fa marry a ooman bot e ain know wa fa do . Ef de man tink e ain da do wa right fa e ooman , ef e ain haadly able fa tek chaage ob esef , den dey oughta git marry , like e wahn fa do . Dat ain no sin .
46007037	Bot ef e ain haffa , ef e able fa tek chaage ob esef an e done mek op e mind dat e ain gwine git marry ta de ooman , den dis man da do de right ting too .
46007038	So den , de man wa git marry ta e ooman , e da do right . Bot de man wa ain git marry , e gwine do mo betta .
46007039	A marry ooman ain free fom e husban long as e still da lib . Bot ef e husban done dead , de ooman free fa git marry ta wasoneba man e wahn , long as dat man blongst ta de Lawd .
46007040	Bot A tink dat ooman gwine be mo heppy ef e stay same like e da , mo den ef e git marry gin . An A bleebe dat God Sperit da hep me wen A say dis .
46008001	Now dis yah wa A da say bout food dat people done sacrifice ta idol . Dat true wa dey say , we all know a heapa ting . An wen people tink dey know sompin , dey git de big head . Bot wen we lob one noda , we hep one noda waak wid God mo betta .
46008002	Ef somebody tink e know sompin , dat show e ain know nottin yet .
46008003	Bot ef somebody lob God , God know dat poson .
46008004	Now den , we spose fa nyam food dat people done sacrifice ta idol ? We know dat idol ain no god tall . We know dat dey ain no oda god cep de one God .
46008005	Eben ef dey sompin een heaben an een dis wol wa people da call “ god , ” an eben dough dey plenty ob dem “ god ” an plenty ob dem “ lawd , ”
46008006	stillyet , we know dat fa we dey jes one God , we Fada . All ting come fom God an we lib fa um . An we know dat dey jes one Lawd , Jedus Christ . God we Fada hab Christ mek all ting , an Christ da gii we life .
46008007	Bot ain all people know dis . Some people wa nyuse fa bleebe een idol , now wen dey da nyam food dat done been sacrifice ta idol , dey tink dat food stillyet blongst ta idol . Dey ain bleebe scrong nuff een Christ een dey haat yet . So dey tink dey da do wa ain right wen dey nyam dat food .
46008008	Bot food ain mek we no betta een God eye . We ain got nottin fa loss wid God ef we ain nyam um . An we ain got nottin fa gain ef we nyam um needa .
46008009	Bot oona mus tek cyah . Mus mek sho dat jes cause oona free , oona ain gwine mek oona Christian bredren sin ef dey ain know fa sho yet wa ting right .
46008010	Spose somebody wa ain know yet wa ting right bout dis , e see one ob oona wa know wa right , da nyam food eenside de house weh people woshup idol ? Wen e see ya , e gwine tink e kin nyam de food wa done been sacrifice ta idol , ainty ?
46008011	So den , dis ting ya know gwine stroy de oda broda Christ done dead fa , cause e ain know no betta yet .
46008012	Wen ya do dat , ya da sin ginst ya Christian broda , an ya da hut um cause ya courage um fa do wa e ain know right fa do . Dat mean ya da sin ginst Christ .
46008013	So den , ef wa A nyam gwine mek me Christian broda fall eenta sin , A ain neba gwine nyam no mo ob dat meat . Cause A ain wahn fa be sponsable fa mek me broda fall eenta sin .
46009001	Ain A a free man ? Ain A a postle ? Ain A done see Jedus we Lawd wid me own eye ? An fa true , cause ob me wok as a postle , oona come fa be one wid de Lawd , ainty dough ?
46009002	Eben ef oda people ain tink A a postle fa sho , A a postle ta oona ! Cause ob de way oona da waak wid de Lawd , oona show dat fa true A a postle .
46009003	Wen people quizzit me , da say A ain da do right , dis yah wa A kin ansa um .
46009004	Fa true , we got de right fa tek food an drink , ainty ?
46009005	Ain we got de right fa hab a wife long wid we wen we da trabel , same like de oda postle dem an de Lawd broda dem an Peter da do ?
46009006	Ya da say Barnabas an me , jes we two haffa keep on da wok fa we libin , same time we da wok fa de Lawd ?
46009007	Ain no sodja wa haffa pay e own way , ainty ? Ain no faama wa plant grape wine an den ain nyam none ob de grape ob dat wine . An ain nobody wa mind sheep dat ain git none ob de sheep milk , ainty dough ?
46009008	A ain tink dem ting outta me own head , cause de Law dat God gii Moses say de same ting .
46009009	Dey write een de Law dat God gii Moses say , “ Mus dohn tie op de ox mout so e ain able fa nyam wiles e da tread out de grain . ” Now den , ain fa sake ob dem ox dat God say dat , ainty ?
46009010	Fa sho , God mean we wen e say dat , ainty dough ? Dey done write dat fa we sake . Cause de plowman wa da plow de groun an de one wa da geda de haabis , all two dem oughta do dey wok wid de hope dat dey gwine git dey paat ob dat haabis .
46009011	We beena plant God seed een oona haat . Ef we git haabis fom oona ob dem ting dat we body need fa lib , dat ain tommuch , ainty ?
46009012	Ef oda people got a right fa tink oona gwine gim dem ting dey body need , ain we got a right eben mo den dem ?
46009013	Fa sho , oona know dat dem wa da wok een God House git dey ration fom dey wok een God House . An dem wa mek animal sacrifice pon de alta een God House git dey paat ob de meat wa dey da sacrifice .
46009014	Same way so , de Lawd chaage we , say dem wa da preach de Good Nyews bout Christ , dey oughta git wa dey need fa lib cause ob de wok dey da do .
46009015	Bot A ain neba aks nobody fa gii me none ob dem good ting wa A got a right fa hab . An A ain da write dis letta ta oona cause A da look fa dem ting fom oona now . A ain gwine leh nobody tek way me right fa brag bout dis . Fo A do dat , leh me dead .
46009016	Stillyet , wen A da preach de Good Nyews bout Jedus Christ , A ain got no right fa brag . A haffa do dat . E gwine be too bad fa me ef A ain tell de Good Nyews ebryweh .
46009017	Ef A da do me wok cause A wahn fa do um , den A got me payback . Bot ef A do me wok cause A haffa do um , A jes do um cause God gii me dis wok fa do .
46009018	So den , wa me payback ? Dis me payback : A able fa preach de Good Nyews dout pay . Wen A do dat , A ain aks fa all dem ting wa A got a right fa aks fa .
46009019	A a free man . A ain blongst ta no man . Stillyet , A mek mesef a slabe ta ebrybody , so dat A gwine bring all dem wa A kin bring ta Christ .
46009020	Wen A da wok wid Jew people , A da lib same fashion like dem Jew , so dat A kin bring um ta Christ . An eben dough A ain haffa lib coddin ta de Law dat God gii Moses , A lib coddin ta dat Law , so dat A kin bring dem ta Christ .
46009021	Same fashion , wen A da wok wid people wa ain lib coddin ta de Jew Law , A da lib like A ain onda de Jew Law , so dat A kin bring dem ta Christ . A ain mean fa say A ain do wa God Law say , cause fa true A da lib onda Christ Law .
46009022	Ta dem wa ain gone faa yet wid Christ , A kin mek like A too ain gone faa yet , so dat A kin hep dem go mo faa . So coddin ta how all people da lib , A change how A lib , fa find all kind ob way A kin fa sabe some ob dem people .
46009023	A da do all dis so dat de Good Nyews kin spread all oba , an A kin hab me paat ob de blessin dat de Good Nyews da bring .
46009024	Oona know fa true dat ob all de people wa da ron een a race , jes one ob um kin win de prize , ainty ? Same way so , oona too oughta ron een susha way dat oona gwine win de prize .
46009025	Ebrybody wa da ron een a race gwine do all dey kin do fa mek dey body fit , so dey able fa ron mo betta . Dey do all dat fa git a crown pon dey head dat ain gwine las long . Bot we gwine git a crown dat las faeba .
46009026	Well den , A da pit all me haat eenta de race . A ain da do like a boxa man wa ain neba hit de one e da fight ginst .
46009027	A treat me body rough , A da do all dem ting wa mek me able fa tek chaage ob me body . A da do dat so dat God ain neba gwine tell me dat atta A done preach de Good Nyews ta people all oba , A ain fit fa win de prize .
46010001	Me Christian bredren , A wahn fa mek oona memba wa happen ta we ole people . De cloud been dey oba um fa protec um an dey all pass shru de sea .
46010002	Onda dat cloud an shru de wata ob de sea , dey all come fa be bactize one wid Moses .
46010003	Dey all beena nyam de same food wa come fom God .
46010004	An dey all beena drink de same drink wa God gim . Cause God own rock gone long wid um , an dey beena git dey drink fom dat . Dat rock dey been Christ .
46010005	Stillyet , mos all ob um ain please God , so de time come wen dey dead body been scatta een de desat .
46010006	Now den , dem ting yah happen fa waan we dat we ain oughta pit we haat pon ebil ting , like we ole people done .
46010007	We mus dohn woshup idol like some dem beena do . Like dey write een God Book say , “ De people been seddown fa nyam an drink , an dey git op fa dance . ”
46010008	We mus dohn lib loose life , like some dem people done . An twenty-shree tousan ob um done dead een one day .
46010009	We mus dohn try de Lawd , like some ob dem done , an snake bite um an dey dead .
46010010	An we mus dohn grumble , like some ob dem people beena do , an de Det Angel kill um .
46010011	All dem ting yah happen ta um fa mek we know wa gwine happen ta we ef we do like dat . Dey done write um down fa waan we , cause we da lib een a time wa close ta de end .
46010012	So ef one ob oona tink e da stanop scrong , e oughta tek cyah dat e ain gwine faddown .
46010013	Ebry kinda test oona hab , dat de same kinda test oda people hab . Bot all de time God do wa e promise fa do . E gwine gii ya scrent so dat ya ain haffa do nottin bad . Jes wen ya wahn fa do dat ebil ting , dat same time dey , God gwine mek ya able fa stan scrong , an e gwine show ya de way fa keep fom do dat wrong ting dat ya been wahn fa do .
46010014	So den , me deah Christian bredren , mus dohn woshup idol tall .
46010015	A da taak ta oona like people wa got sense . Ya kin mek op ya own mind bout wa A da tell ya .
46010016	Een de Lawd Suppa wen we drink wa dey een de cup , we tank God dat we all hab we paat een de blood dat Christ done shed fa we , ainty ? An wen we broke de bread , we all hab we paat een Christ body , ainty ?
46010017	Dey one bread dey . Eben dough dey plenty ob we , we all one body , cause we all da nyam dat one bread .
46010018	Leh we look at de Jew people . Dem wa nyam de ting dey done sacrifice ta God , dey all hab dey paat een dat sacrifice pon de alta , ainty ?
46010019	Wa dat mean ? Dem idol an de food wa people sacrifice ta idol ain mount ta nottin tall , ainty ?
46010020	A da tell oona , de food wa people wa ain know God da sacrifice ta idol pon dey alta , dey da gim ta ebil sperit . Dey ain gii dat sacrifice ta God . An A ain wahn oona fa hab no paat wid ebil sperit .
46010021	Ya cyahn drink bof de wine fom de cup dat de Lawd gii an drink fom de cup people done nyuse fa woshup ebil sperit . Same way so , ya cyahn nyam an hab paat een bof de Lawd table an een de table ob sacrifice ta ebil sperit dem .
46010022	Fa true , we ain wahn fa mek God bex wid we , ainty ? Fa sho , we ain tink we mo scronga den God !
46010023	Some people say , “ We free fa do wasoneba we wahn . Ain no law fa stop we . ” Bot ain all ting wa people kin do wa ton out fa be good fa um . Dey say , “ We free fa do wasoneba we wahn . Ain no law fa stop we . ” Bot ain all ting build we op .
46010024	Leh all people do wa good fa oda people , steada wa good fa dey own sef .
46010025	Ya free fa nyam anyting dey sell een de meat maakut . Ain haffa trouble ya mind an quizzit bout weh de food come fom .
46010026	Cause dey write een God Book say , “ Dis wol an all ting een um blongst ta de Lawd . ”
46010027	Ef somebody wa ain bleebe eenbite ya fa come nyam wid um an ya wahn fa go , ya oughta nyam wasoneba dey gii ya . Ain haffa trouble ya mind an quizzit bout weh de food come fom .
46010028	Bot ef somebody tell ya say , “ Dey done sacrifice dat food dey ta idol , ” ya mus dohn nyam dat food . Ya ain oughta nyam um fa sake ob de one wa done tell ya dat , cause ef ya nyam um , dat gwine trouble e mind .
46010029	A ain mean fa say , ef ya nyam de food , dat gwine trouble ya mind . Bot dat gwine trouble de mind ob de one wa tell ya bout um .
46010030	Ef A tank God fa me food fo A nyam um , fa sho ain nobody oughta shrow slam pon me , say A da do bad cause A nyam de food wa A done tank God fa , ainty ?
46010031	Ebryting oona do , ef ya da nyam or ya da drink or ya da do oda ting , ya oughta do ebryting een susha way dat God git de praise fa um .
46010032	Ya oughta lib ya life so dat ya ain gwine mek no trouble fa Jew people , or fa people wa ain Jew , or fa de people ob God choch .
46010033	Oona oughta do like A do . Een ebryting wa A do , A da try fa please all people . A ain try fa git nottin fa mesef , bot A da wok fa hep oda people so dey kin git sabe .
46011001	So oona oughta do like A da do , een de same way A da do like Christ .
46011002	Oona da do good , cause een ebryting oona da memba me an da folla ebryting de same way A laan oona .
46011003	Bot A wahn oona fa ondastan dat Christ de head oba ebry man , de husban de head oba e wife , an God de head ob Christ .
46011004	So de man wa kiba e head wen e da pray or wen e da tell people God wod , e ain hona Christ .
46011005	An de ooman wa ain kiba e head wen e da pray or wen e da tell God wod , e ain hona e husban . E like dat ooman head shabe .
46011006	Ef a ooman ain kiba e head , den e oughta git e hair cut off . Bot wen de ooman shabe e head or cut e hair , e bring shame pon esef , so e oughta kiba e head .
46011007	A man ain oughta kiba e head , cause God mek man like esef , an man da gii hona ta God . Bot de ooman da gii hona ta man .
46011008	Cause God ain mek man fom paat ob ooman . God mek ooman fom paat ob man .
46011009	An God ain mek man fa sake ob ooman . God mek ooman fa sake ob man .
46011010	Cause ob dat , an cause ob de angel dem , ooman oughta kiba e head , fa show dat e dey onda e husban tority .
46011011	Stillyet , wen we lib een de Lawd way , ooman cyahn do dout man , an man cyahn do dout ooman .
46011012	Fa true , God done tek a paat fom man an mek ooman . Same way so , e true dat man bon fom ooman . Bot all ting come fom God .
46011013	A wahn oona fa mek op oona own mind . E right fa ooman pray ta God wen e head ain kiba ?
46011014	Fa true , de way God mek ting een dis wol laan we dat wen man hab long hair , people ain gwine spec um , ainty ?
46011015	Bot long hair fa a ooman e glory . God gim long hair fa kiba e head .
46011016	Bot ef somebody wahn fa aagy bout dat , leh we tell um say dis de way we beena do , an we an de choch ob God dem ain neba do um no oda way .
46011017	Bot A ain gwine say oona da do good bout de ting dem dat A da come now fa chaage oona fa do . Cause wen oona geda togeda , dat do mo bad den good .
46011018	Now dis yah de fus ting A wahn fa taak bout . A yeh say een oona choch meetin , oona cyahn gree wid one noda , an oona wide op eenta group ginst one noda . An A bleebe dey some trute een wa A yeh .
46011019	A spose dey haffa be group mongst oona dat cyahn gree wid one noda , fa show dem mongst oona wa da waak een God way fa true .
46011020	Wen oona geda togeda , oona kin tink oona da nyam de Lawd Suppa , bot e ain so .
46011021	Cause wen oona nyam , ebry one ob oona go head an nyam e own food an dohn wait fa nobody else . So some people stay hongry , an some people git dronk .
46011022	Fa sho , wen oona wahn fa nyam an drink , oona got oona own house fa do dat een , ainty ? Oona treat God choch like dort an mek shame de people wa ain got nottin , ainty ? Wa A gwine say ta oona ? A gwine tell oona say oona do good bout dis ? Fa sho , A ain gwine do dat !
46011023	So den , de Lawd gii me dis wa A pass on ta oona . De same night wen dey han oba de Lawd Jedus ta dem wa been wahn fa kill um , E pick op a bread .
46011024	E tell God tankya fa um , an e broke um op . Den e say , “ Dis me body A broke fa oona . Oona mus do same like dis fa memba me . ”
46011025	Same way so , wen dey done nyam suppa , e pick op de cup . E say , “ Dis cup de nyew cobnant seal wid me blood . Oona mus do dis fa memba me wensoneba oona drink um like dis . ”
46011026	Cause til de Lawd come back , wensoneba oona nyam dis bread an drink fom dis cup , oona da mek people know dat de Lawd done dead fa all people .
46011027	So den , wensoneba somebody da nyam de Lawd bread or drink fom e cup een a way dat ain show hona , dat poson dey , e guilty ob sin , cause e ain gii hona ta de Lawd body an e blood .
46011028	Ebrybody oughta look eenside e haat good fa see ef e right wid God , fo e nyam de bread an drink fom de cup .
46011029	Cause wen somebody da nyam de bread an drink fom de cup an e ain memba dat e da nyam de Lawd body an wa dat mean , dat one dey done bring de Lawd jedgiment pon esef .
46011030	Cause ob dat jedgiment , plenty ob oona ain got no scrent , plenty ob oona sick , an some done dead .
46011031	Ef we look eenside we haat good fa see ef we right wid God fus , fo we nyam de bread an drink fom de cup , de Lawd ain gwine jedge we .
46011032	Bot wen de Lawd da jedge we , e da punish we so dat een de end e ain gwine haffa condemn we , long wid de people ob de wol .
46011033	So , me Christian bredren , wen oona geda togeda fa nyam de Lawd Suppa , oona mus wait fa one noda .
46011034	Ef one ob oona hongry , leh um nyam een e own house , so dat wen oona geda togeda , oona ain gwine bring de Lawd jedgiment pon oonasef . Now bout dem oda bidness , A gwine chaage oona bout um wen A come ta oona .
46012001	Now den , me Christian bredren , A wahn oona fa ondastan de trute bout de gif dem de Holy Sperit da gii .
46012002	Oona know dat wen oona ain know God yet , oona git ton way fom de right road an woshup idol wa ain got no life .
46012003	So den , A wahn oona fa ondastan dat ef de Holy Sperit tek chaage ob a poson , e ain gwine say , “ Leh dey be a cuss pon Jedus . ” An nobody ain able fa say , “ Jedus de Lawd , ” cep de Holy Sperit da tek chaage ob um .
46012004	Dey plenty diffunt kind ob ting dat God Sperit da gii we , bot de same Holy Sperit da gii we um all .
46012005	Dey plenty diffunt way fa saab de Lawd , bot all we da saab de same Lawd .
46012006	People wa know how fa do plenty diffunt kinda wok , bot de same God da mek all people know how fa do all dem wok .
46012007	God da gii ebrybody sompin fa show dat e Sperit powa da wok eenside um fa de good ob all de people .
46012008	God Sperit da mek one poson able fa taak wid sense . Same time , de same Sperit da mek noda one able fa laan people .
46012009	De same Sperit da gii one poson fait . E da gii oda one powa fa heal sick people .
46012010	An de same Sperit da gii one poson powa fa do miracle . Same time , e da gii noda one powa fa taak God wod . De Sperit da mek oda one able fa know ef God Sperit or oda sperit da mek people taak wa dey da taak . God Sperit da mek oda poson able fa taak oda language . An e da mek noda one able fa tapetate dem oda language .
46012011	Dat de same Holy Sperit wa da gii ebrybody dey gif fa do wa e wahn um fa do .
46012012	Same way a body hab all kinda paat , an all dem ting paat ob de same body , e de same say so wid Christ .
46012013	De same Holy Sperit done bactize we all , an we come fa be one body . Some ob we Jew people , an oda people ain Jew . Some slabe an oda people free . An de same Sperit done come eenside all ob we .
46012014	De body ain got jes one paat . De body got plenty paat .
46012015	Ef de foot say , “ A ain a han , so A ain blongst ta de body , ” dat ain mean fa say de foot ain still paat ob de body .
46012016	An ef de yea say , “ A ain a eye , so A ain blongst ta de body , ” dat ain mean fa say de yea ain still paat ob de body .
46012017	Ef de one whole body been jes a eye , how e gwine yeh ? Ef de one whole body been jes a yea , how e gwine be able fa smell ting ?
46012018	Bot fa true , God pit ebry paat yah een de body jes de way e wahn um .
46012019	Ef all dem diffunt paat yah been jes one paat , de body ain gwine be a body tall .
46012020	Bot fa true dey plenty paat , stillyet dey mek op jes one body .
46012021	So den , de eye cyahn tell de han say , “ A kin do dout ya ! ” De head cyahn tell de foot say , “ A kin do dout ya . ”
46012022	No , we cyahn do dout dem body paat wa we tink ain got much scrent .
46012023	An dem paat ob de body wa we tink ain wot nottin , dey de one we tek cyah ob mo betta . An dem paat wa ain so fine fa see , we kiba dem op .
46012024	Bot we ain haffa kiba op dem paat wa fine fa see . God done pit all de paat togeda een de body een susha way so dat dem paat wa we tink ain wot sommuch git hona mo den dem oda one .
46012025	God done dis so dat dey ain gwine be no quarrellin een de body . Bot de diffunt paat fa lib een susha way dat dey hab de same cyah fa one noda .
46012026	Ef one paat da suffa , all de oda paat suffa wid um . Ef one paat git praise , all de oda paat rejaice wid um .
46012027	Now den , oona mek op Christ body . Ebry one ob oona a paat ob dat body .
46012028	Dat so e stan een de choch . God been pit all de paat dem een place . Fus , de postle dem , secon , de prophet dem , tird , de teacha dem . Den God pit dem wa da do miracle . Atta dem , e pit dem wa e gii powa fa heal , an den dem wa able fa hep oda people , den dem wa able fa lead oda people . An den , dem wa e gii de gif fa taak oda language .
46012029	Fa sho , all de people ain postle , ainty ? Dey ain all prophet , an dey ain all teacha . Dey ain all got powa fa do miracle , ainty ?
46012030	All ob um ain got powa fa heal . Dey ain all able fa taak oda language , an dey ain all got powa fa tapetate dem oda language .
46012031	So den , set oona haat pon dem gif wa mo betta den all de res .
46013001	Eben ef A kin taak een all de language dem wa people da taak an wa de angel dem da taak , ef A ain lob oda people , all wa A da say ain mount ta nottin . E jes like de nise wen somebody da beat a bucket or wen a cymbal da soun too loud .
46013002	Eben ef A got powa fa tell people wod wa God tell me fa say , an ef A kin ondastan all God plan wa e ain tell oda people an A know all ting , an ef A bleebe God sommuch dat e da gii me powa fa moob mountain , eben ef A able fa do all dem ting yah , ef A ain lob oda people , A ain wot nottin .
46013003	Eben ef A gii way ebryting A got an A gree fa leh um bun me body , ef A ain lob oda people , all dat ain do me no good .
46013004	Ef oona lob oda people , oona gwine beah wid um . Oona gwine be kind ta um . Oona ain gwine all de time wahn wa dey got , an oona ain gwine brag on oonasef an be oppity .
46013005	Ef oona lob people , oona gwine be manisable all de time an oona ain gwine wahn ya own way . Oona ain gwine git bex , an oona ain gwine keep ting een oona haat ginst oda people wa do oona wrong .
46013006	Ef oona lob oda people , oona ain gwine rejaice oba no ebil ting , bot oona gwine rejaice oba wa true .
46013007	Ef oona lob people , oona gwine beah op onda ebryting wa people do ta oona . Oona gwine be ready fa bleebe good ting bout people . Oona gwine hope fa de betta bout um , an oona gwine pit op wid people an lob um eben wen oona da suffa .
46013008	Lob ain neba gwine end . De wod wa God tell e people fa taak , time da come wen dem people ain gwine taak um no mo . De oda language dem wa people da taak , time da come wen people ain gwine taak dem no mo . An all de ting wa people know , time da come wen dey ain gwine know um no mo .
46013009	Cause we ain know ebryting . We jes know paat . An eben dough God gii we de wod fa taak ta oda people , we ain able fa tell ebryting .
46013010	Bot wen de time come wen all ting gwine be how dey spose fa be , we ain gwine jes haf know ting , an we ain gwine jes haf do ting no mo .
46013011	Wen A been a chile , A beena taak same like chullun da taak . A beena tink like chullun da tink , an A beena ondastan same like chullun da ondastan . Bot now dat A a man , A done do way wid dem chilish ting .
46013012	Wa ting we da see now , dey like wa we kin see een a mirror wa ain cleah . Bot den wen dat time come , we gwine see too good , eye ta eye . Dey plenty ting A ain know now , bot dat time dey , A gwine know all too good , jes like God da know all ting bout me too good .
46013013	Now den , dey shree ting dat gwine las . People gwine bleebe . Dey gwine look fowaad wid hope , an dey gwine lob . Bot lob de ting dat great de mos .
46014001	So mo den all , oona mus try fa lob oda people . Wid all oona haat oona oughta keep on da look fa git dem gif wa de Holy Sperit da gii . An de gif dat oona oughta try fa mo den all , dat God Sperit gwine mek oona able fa tell people God wod dat e gii oona fa say .
46014002	Cause de one wa got de gif fa taak een diffunt kind ob language , e ain da taak ta people . E da taak ta God , cause fa true , ain nobody ondastan um . Wid de powa wa God Sperit gim , e da say ting dat oda people ain know .
46014003	Bot de one wa da tell people de wod wa God tell um fa say , dat one da taak ta people , an wa e da say kin hep um git mo scronga een de Lawd an courage um an gim comfot .
46014004	De one wa da taak diffunt kind ob language , e da hep jes esef fa git mo scronga , bot de one wa da taak wod wa God tell um fa say , e da hep all de people ob de choch git mo scronga .
46014005	So den , A like fa all ob oona fa taak diffunt kind ob language . Bot mo den dat A wahn oona fa tell people de wod dat God gii oona fa say . Cause de one wa da tell people de wod wa God tell um , dat one mo greata den de one wa da taak diffunt kind ob language , cep ef dey somebody dey wa kin splain wa e da say , so dat de wod e da say kin hep all de people ob de choch git mo scronga .
46014006	So , me Christian bredren , wen A come ta oona , ef A staat fa taak diffunt kind ob language dem wa oona ain ondastan , how dat gwine hep oona ? A ain gwine hep oona no way , cep ef A tell oona ting wa God show me , or ting wa e mek me know , or ting wa e da tell me , or ting wa oona oughta laan bout .
46014007	Ef a poson da play sompin like flute or haap wa ain got no life een um , ain nobody gwine know wa tune e da play ef e ain play dem note good an cleah , ainty ?
46014008	An ef de one wa da play bugle wa ain blow um good an cleah , fa true ain nobody gwine git ready fa go fight , ainty ?
46014009	Same way so wid oona . Ain nobody gwine ondastan wa oona da taak bout ef oona da taak diffunt kind ob language wa people cyahn ondastan . Oona wod jes gwine blow way een de breeze .
46014010	Fa sho , dey plenty diffunt language een de wol , stillyet ain none ob um wa ain hab meanin .
46014011	Bot ef A ain ondastan de language wa somebody da taak , de one wa da taak um gwine be a scranja ta me an A gwine be a scranja ta um .
46014012	Now oona wahn tommuch fa God Sperit fa gii oona dem ting wa e da gii . So den , oona oughta try mo an mo fa nyuse wa God Sperit da gii oona dat mek oona able fa hep de choch .
46014013	Cause ob dat , de one wa da taak diffunt kind ob language wa people ain ondastan , e mus pray ta God fa mek um able fa splain wa e da say .
46014014	Cause ef A pray een dat diffunt language yah , me sperit da pray fa true , bot me mind ain git no good fom um , cause A ain ondastan wa A da say .
46014015	So wa A fa do ? A gwine pray wid me sperit , bot A gwine pray too wid me mind . A gwine sing wid me sperit , bot same way so , A gwine pray wid me mind .
46014016	Wen oona da tell God tankya wid jes oona sperit , how kin somebody wa come ta meetin bot ain ondastan bout dem ting yah , how kin e say , “ Amen ” wen oona git done ? E ain ondastan nottin dat oona da say ainty ?
46014017	Eben dough oona da pray good fa true , wen oona tell God tankya , oona ain da hep de oda one wa da listen ta oona , tall .
46014018	A da tell God tankya cause A da taak dem diffunt kind ob language mo den all ob oona .
46014019	Stillyet , wen we people ob de choch da meet togeda , A tink e mo betta dat A say fibe wod wa people gwine ondastan an wa gwine laan um sompin , den fa say ten tousan wod een diffunt kind ob language dat people ain ondastan .
46014020	Me Christian bredren , oona mus dohn tink like chullun . Fa true , oona oughta be like leetle chullun wen e come ta ebil , bot oona mus tink like grownop people .
46014021	Dey write een God Book dat de Lawd say ,
46014022	So den , wen God mek somebody able fa taak diffunt kind ob language wa people ain ondastan , dat fa show de people wa ain bleebe dat God hab powa . Dat ain fa dem wa bleebe God . Bot wen God mek somebody able fa tell de wod wa e tell um fa say , dat fa people wa bleebe . Dat ain fa dem wa ain bleebe God .
46014023	So ef all de people ob de choch geda togeda an den dey all staat fa taak diffunt kind ob language dem wa people ain ondastan , wen de people wa ain know bout dem kinda ting an ain bleebe pon God come eenta de choch meetin , dey gwine say oona outta oona head , ainty ?
46014024	Bot ef all de choch people da tell de wod wa God gim fa say , wen somebody wa ain ondastan bout dem kind ob ting an ain bleebe God come eenta de choch meetin , wen e yeh wa dey da say , e gwine come fa know fa true dat e a sinna . An wa e yeh fom all dem gwine mek um jedge esef .
46014025	All de ting wa hide eenside e haat gwine come out fa all fa know . So e gwine kneel down an woshup God an tell de people say , “ Fa true , God dey dey wid oona ! ”
46014026	So den , me Christian bredren , dis wa A mean . Wensoneba oona geda togeda fa woshup , some ob oona gwine hab a song fa praise God . Noda one gwine hab sompin fa laan de oda res ob de people . Noda one hab sompin fa tell dat God da show um . Noda one gwine taak diffunt kind ob language wa people ain ondastan . Noda one gwine splain wa dat one done say . All dem ting yah wa oona do , dey haffa be fa hep de choch people waak mo betta een God way .
46014027	Ef some people gwine taak dem diffunt kind ob language wa people ain ondastan , den no mo den two or shree oughta taak . Dey oughta taak one atta noda , an somebody mus splain wa dey da say .
46014028	Bot ef dey ain nobody dey wa kin splain , den dem people yah wa da taak een diffunt kind ob language mus dohn say nottin een de choch meetin . Dey mus taak jes een dey own haat an ta God .
46014029	Two or shree people wa God gii wod fa tell , dey oughta taak . An de oda res mus pay tention fa know ef dey da tell God wod fa true .
46014030	Bot ef God gii wod ta some oda one wa da sit dey een de meetin , de one wa beena taak fus oughta stop .
46014031	Oona all kin tell de wod wa God gii oona , one by one , so dat ebrybody kin laan an git courage fa waak God way .
46014032	Dem wa God gii de powa fa tell e wod , dey kin trol wa dey say .
46014033	Cause God ain wahn fa hab we mix op . E wahn fa hab ebryting go good an peaceable .
46014034	de ooman dem mus dohn say nottin een de choch meetin . Dey ain got no right fa taak dey an dey ain oughta be leada dey , jes like de Jew Law tell we .
46014035	Ef de ooman dem wahn fa know bout sompin , leh um aks dey husban bout um een dey own house . Ef ooman taak een de choch meetin , dat a shameful ting .
46014036	Fa true , de wod ob God ain fus come fom oona , ainty ? An ain jes oona wa done yeh dat wod , ainty dough ?
46014037	Ef one ob oona tink e got de gif fa taak de wod wa God gim or ef e tink God Sperit da mek um able fa do some oda ob dem ting , dat one dey oughta know fa sho dat wa A da write yah , dat wa de Lawd chaage we fa do .
46014038	Ef e ain pay no tention ta dis wa A say , oona mus dohn pay no tention ta dat poson .
46014039	So den , me Christian bredren , wid all oona haat oona oughta wahn de powa fa tell God wod . An mus dohn tell people dat dey cyahn taak dem diffunt kind ob language wa people ain ondastan .
46014040	Bot oona mus do all ting een de right way an een good fashion .
46015001	Me Christian bredren , A wahn oona fa memba bout de Good Nyews wa A beena tell oona . Oona done tek um eenta oona haat . An dat mek oona keep on da bleebe an da stan scrong fa God .
46015002	De wod wa A tell oona , dat de Good Nyews . An dat Good Nyews yah da sabe oona , ef oona stillyet keep on da memba um een oona haat , cep ef oona bleebe oda ting dat ain wot nottin .
46015003	A come da tell oona dat wod wa dey done laan me . Dat wod wa betta faa mo den all oda ting , tell we dat Christ done dead fa sabe we fom we sin , jes like dey write een God Book .
46015004	Dey bury um , an God mek um git op fom mongst de dead pon de tird day an lib gin , jes like dey write een God Book .
46015005	Christ come an appeah ta Peter , an den noda time e appeah ta de tweb postle .
46015006	Den e appeah ta mo den fibe hundud ob we Christian bredren , all at de same time . Mos ob dem people ain dead yet , bot some done dead .
46015007	Atta dat , e appeah ta James . Den e appeah ta all de postle dem .
46015008	Las ob all , e appeah ta me too , eben dough A been like somebody wa been bon at de wrong time .
46015009	Cause dem oda postle mo betta den me , an A ain fit fa hab um eben call me postle , cause A beena mek de people ob God choch suffa .
46015010	Bot God bless me , fa dat mek me wa A da . An dat blessin dat God gii me ain been fa nottin , cause A beena wok mo den all de oda postle dem . Bot fa true , A ain beena wok jes by mesef . Cause ob God blessin , e powa een me beena hep me wok .
46015011	So den , whosoneba beena do de wok , weza A or dem oda postle tell oona bout de Good Nyews , we all da tell de same Good Nyews , an dis wa oona bleebe .
46015012	Now den , we beena tell oona say , God done mek Christ git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . So hoccome some ob oona da say , God ain gwine mek dem wa done dead lib gin ?
46015013	Ef dat so , dat mean fa say God ain eben mek Christ lib gin .
46015014	An ef God ain mek Christ lib gin , den de Good Nyews we da tell people ain mean nottin , an oona trus een Christ ain mean nottin needa .
46015015	An eben mo den dat , oona da say we da lie bout God , cause we beena say e done mek Christ git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . Bot ef dat true wa oona da say , dat God ain mek people wa done dead lib gin , dat mean fa say God ain mek Christ lib gin .
46015016	Cause ef God ain mek de people wa done dead lib gin , dat mean fa say e ain mek Christ lib gin needa .
46015017	An ef God ain mek Christ lib gin , oona trus een Christ ain mount ta nottin , an oona sin stillyet da rule oba oona .
46015018	Ef God ain mek Christ lib gin , dat mean fa say too , dat dem wa done dead , wa beena bleebe pon Christ , dey done loss faeba .
46015019	Ef de hope we hab een Christ good jes fa dis wol , people oughta be saary fa we mo den fa all de oda people een all de wol .
46015020	Bot fa true , God done mek Christ git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . E de fus mongst a whole heapa people God gwine mek git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin .
46015021	Cause jes one man done bring det eenta de wol . Same way so , one man mek dem wa done dead lib gin an git op outta dey grabe .
46015022	All people dead cause dey one wid Adam . Same way so , God gwine mek all dem wa come fa be one wid Christ lib gin .
46015023	Bot ebrybody gwine lib gin coddin ta e own time . Christ fus , den wen e come back , dem wa blongst ta Christ gwine git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin .
46015024	Den de end gwine come . Christ gwine win out oba all dem wa da rule an all dem wa hab tority an powa . Den Christ gwine han oba all e da rule ta God so dat God e Fada gwine be King oba all .
46015025	Christ haffa rule til God done win out oba all e enemy an pit um down onda e foot .
46015026	De las enemy God gwine stroy gwine be det .
46015027	Cause dey write een God Book say , “ God done pit all ting onda e foot . ” Now wen e say “ all ting ” done been pit onda um , fa sho , dat ain mean God esef been pit onda um , cause God de one wa da pit all ting onda Christ .
46015028	Bot wen all ting done been pit onda Christ rule , den Christ , de Son , e gwine be onda God , wa done pit all ting onda Christ . So den , God gwine be great mo den all , an rule oba all .
46015029	Now den , leh we taak bout de people wa dey da bactize fa sake ob dem wa done dead . Ef , like some people da say , God ain mek dem wa done dead lib gin fa true , hoccome people go git bactize fa sake ob dem wa done dead ?
46015030	An wa bout we ? Hoccome we da pit wesef een danja all de time ?
46015031	Me Christian bredren , ebry day A da look det een de eye ! A da tell oona dis fa true , cause ob me praise ta God fa oona een Jedus Christ we Lawd .
46015032	Right yah een Ephesus A done fight fa me life jes like A beena fight wid wile beast dem . Ef A done dat jes fa sattify mesef , wa good dat gwine do me ? Ef God ain mek dem people wa done dead lib gin , den jes like dey say , “ Leh we nyam an drink an hab a good time , cause demarra we gwine dead . ”
46015033	Oona mus dohn leh nobody fool oona . “ Ef good people keep on da waak longside ebil people , den de good one dem gwine be ruint . ”
46015034	Oona oughta git oona sense back . Mus dohn waak een ebil way no mo . Cause some ob oona ain know God . Oona oughta be too shame wen A say dat ta oona .
46015035	Somebody gwine aks say , “ How God gwine mek people wa done dead git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin ? Wa kinda body dey gwine hab ? ”
46015036	Ya a fool man ! Wen ya plant seed een de groun , de seed ain gwine staat fa sprout an grow cep e done dead fus .
46015037	Wa ya da plant een de groun , dat jes a seed no mo , like a grain ob wheat or oda seed . Wa ya da plant ain de big plant wa gwine grow op atta a wile fom de seed .
46015038	God da mek de seed ton eenta de body ob a plant , jes like e wahn um fa be . E da mek ebry kind ob seed ton eenta e own kind ob plant .
46015039	All ting wa hab life ain hab de same kind ob body . People hab one kind ob body , animal hab noda kind . Bod hab noda kind ob body , an fish hab noda kind .
46015040	Same way so , dey some body wa dey een heaben an oda body wa dey een dis wol . Bot dey one kind ob beauty wa blongst ta de body dem een heaben . Dey noda kind ob beauty wa blongst ta de body dem een dis wol .
46015041	An de sun hab e own kind ob beauty . De moon hab noda . De staa dem hab noda , an eben mongst de staa dem , one hab one kind ob beauty an noda hab diffunt kind .
46015042	Dat so e gwine be wen God mek dem wa done dead git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . Wen dey bury de body yah , dat body da perish . Bot de body wa God gwine mek lib gin , dat body ain neba gwine perish .
46015043	Wen dey bury de body , e ain hab no hona tall . Bot wen God mek um git op , e gwine be too purty . Wen dey bury de body , e ain hab no scrent tall . Bot wen God mek um git op , e gwine be scrong .
46015044	De body dey bury , dat a body wa come fom de dort . Bot de body wa God gwine mek git op , dat de body wa come fom de Sperit . Fa sho , dey a body fom de dort , an dey haffa be a body fom de Sperit .
46015045	Dey write een God Book say , “ God mek de fus man , Adam , fa be a poson wa git life . ” Bot de las Adam , e come fa be a sperit wa da gii life .
46015046	De body de Sperit da gii ain come fus . De body wa come fom de dort come fus , an atta dat de body dat de Sperit da gii .
46015047	God done tek de dort ob de groun een dis wol fa mek de fus man . De secon man come fom heaben .
46015048	De people wa blongst ta dis wol , dey jes like de man wa God mek fom de dort ob dis wol . Dem wa blongst ta heaben , dey jes like de man wa come fom heaben .
46015049	We beena hab body wa like de body ob de man wa God done mek fom de dort ob dis wol . Same way so , we gwine be like de man wa come fom heaben .
46015050	Me Christian bredren , dis wa A mean fa say ta oona . De body ob dis wol wa God mek flesh an blood , dat cyahn hab no paat dey weh God da rule . An nottin dat dead gwine hab no powa fa ton eenta ting wa cyahn neba dead .
46015051	Leh me tell oona sompin wa been secret . Listen ta dis ! We ain all gwine dead , bot God gwine change we all .
46015052	Dat gwine happen too quick , like wen somebody wink e eye , wen dey blow de las trumpet . Wen dey blow dat trumpet , God gwine mek dem wa done dead lib gin an git op wid nyew body wa cyahn neba dead . An God gwine change we all .
46015053	We body wa da dead mus ton eenta body wa cyahn neba dead . Dat wa dead haffa ton eenta dat wa cyahn neba dead .
46015054	So wen wa been dead done ton eenta dat wa cyahn neba dead , den wa dey write een God Book gwine come true . Dey say , “ Fa true , de Lawd done stroy det ! E done win de victory fa eba ! ”
46015055	“ Det , tell me weh dat victory
46015056	Sin mek det able fa do people bad , an de law mek sin hab powa .
46015057	Bot leh we tell God tankya ! God da gii we de victory shru we Lawd Jedus Christ !
46015058	So den , me deah Christian bredren , oona mus stan scrong een de Lawd . Mus dohn leh nottin mek oona doubt . Oona mus keep on da do de Lawd wok all de time . Cause oona know dat fa true , all ting wa oona da do fa de Lawd ain gwine be fa nottin .
46016001	Leh we taak now bout de money oona gwine geda fa hep God people . Oona mus do jes like A been chaage de Christian dem een de choch dem een Galatia fa do .
46016002	Pon de fus day ob ebry week , ebry one ob oona oughta pit some money ta one side , coddin ta de money e done git . Sabe op dat money yah , so dat atta A come , oona ain gwine haffa geda op no mo money fa dat .
46016003	Den , wen A git ta oona , A gwine sen de bredren dat oona say oona trus fa cyaa oona collection money ta Jerusalem . Fo dey go , A gwine gim letta fa leh God people een Jerusalem know dat we sen um .
46016004	Bot ef e look like e betta fa me fa go too , den dey gwine go long wid me .
46016005	Wen A come fom Macedonia , A gwine come ta oona . Cause A done mek op me mind fa pass shru Macedonia .
46016006	A gwine stay wid oona fa some time ef A kin , or eben stay all de winta . Den oona kin hep me so dat A kin trabel on ta wehsoneba A gwine atta dat .
46016007	Wen A come fa see oona , A ain wahn fa stay jes a leetle time , as A da pass by . Ef de Lawd leh me , A hope fa stay dey some wile wid oona .
46016008	Bot A gwine stay yah een Ephesus til de day ob Pentecost .
46016009	Cause dey a chance yah , fa true , fa do a big wok fa God , eben dough dey heapa enemy wa ain wahn de wok fa go on .
46016010	Wen Timothy git ta oona , mus mek um know dat fa sho oona da gim hearty welcome , cause e da wok fa de Lawd jes like me .
46016011	Ain nobody oughta hole um cheap . Oona mus hep um so e kin trabel on e way peaceable , so e kin come back ta me . Cause me an de Christian broda da wait fa um fa come back ta we .
46016012	Now leh we taak bout we bredren Apollos . Plenty time A done beena tell um e oughta go fa see oona , long wid de oda bredren . Bot e ain sho dat e oughta go jes now . Wen e git de chance , e gwine come see oona .
46016013	Oona mus keep oona eye open . Stanop fa true fa de fait oona hab een de Lawd . Mus hab courage an be scrong fa God .
46016014	Een ebryting oona da do , oona mus lob de people .
46016015	Oona done yeh bout Stephanas an e fambly . Dey been de fus fa bleebe pon Christ een Achaia . An dey beena gii dey life da wok fa God people .
46016016	Me Christian bredren , A da beg oona fa folla dem kind ob leada yah an all de oda people wa da jine um , da wok haad wid um .
46016017	A heppy dat Stephanas , Fortunatus , an Achaicus done come . Wen oona ain been able fa come , dey done mek op fa wen A ain hab oona wid me .
46016018	Dey beena mek me haat glad , jes like dey mek oona haat glad . People like dem kind yah , dey fit fa git hona fom oona .
46016019	Dem choch een Asia province da tell oona hey . Aquila an Priscilla an de people ob de choch wa da geda een dey house , da tell oona hey een de Lawd wid all dey haat .
46016020	An all de Christian bredren yah say hey .
46016021	Now A wid me own han da write dis paat : A Paul da tell oona hey .
46016022	Ef dey somebody wa ain got no lob fa de Lawd , leh dey be a cuss pon um . We Lawd da come !
46016023	A pray dat de Lawd Jedus bless oona .
46016024	A lob oona all een Jedus Christ . Amen .
47001001	A Paul , a postle ob Jedus Christ cause dat wa God wahn , an Timothy , we Christian broda , we da write ta oona , God choch dey een Corinth , an ta all God people all oba Achaia .
47001002	We pray dat God we Fada an we Lawd Jedus Christ bless oona an gii oona peace een oona haat .
47001003	Leh we praise God , de Fada ob we Lawd Jedus Christ . E we Fada wa hab mussy pon we , e chullun , an we God wa da gii all courage .
47001004	E da courage we wensoneba trouble come ta we , so dat de same courage wa God da courage we wid kin mek we able fa courage oda people , too , wensoneba trouble come ta um .
47001005	Cause jes like we git we paat ob suffrin plenty time , wa Christ beena suffa , same way so , Christ da courage we plenty time .
47001006	Wensoneba we da suffa , we suffa fa courage oona an fa sabe oona . Wensoneba we git courage , dat fa mek oona git courage so dat oona kin beah op fa true onda de suffrin ob dem same ting wa we da beah op onda .
47001007	We know fa sho dat we ain haffa warry bout oona . Cause we know dat jes like oona da suffa same like we da suffa , same way God gwine courage oona , jes like e da courage we .
47001008	We Christian bredren , we wahn oona fa know dat we done beena suffa plenty wen we been een Asia province . We been trouble sommuch dat we tink dat we ain hab no hope fa lib no mo .
47001009	We tink dat we gwine dead fa sho . Bot dat happen fa show we dat we ain oughta pend pon wesef . We mus pend jes pon God . E de one wa mek dead people lib gin .
47001010	E done sabe we fom susha terrible danja ob det , an e gwine sabe we gin . We know fa sho dat e gwine keep on da sabe we .
47001011	E gwine sabe we wiles oona hep we by oona pray ta God fa we . An God gwine ansa dem pray an bless we . Plenty people gwine tank God cause e da bless we .
47001012	One ting we heppy bout . We know een we haat fa true dat ain by people sense dat we da waak een dis wol , an mos ob all , ain by people sense dat we da do all dem ting wa we da do fa oona . Bot God blessin show we how fa hona oona an waak scraight wid oona .
47001013	Wensoneba we da write letta ta oona , we write jes dem ting oona able fa read an ondastan . Bot A hope oona gwine ondastan we een ebryting .
47001014	So wa oona ain ondastan good now , oona gwine ondastan too good . Den wen de day come dat we Lawd Jedus gwine come back , oona kin be too heppy cause ob we , jes like we gwine be too heppy cause ob oona .
47001015	A been so sho dat oona gwine ondastan bout me een ebryting dat A done been mek plan fa come see oona fus , so dat A able fa mek oona heppy two time .
47001016	A done been plan fa come see oona pon me way ta Macedonia an den stop by gin fa see oona wen A come back fom dey . Dat way , oona been able fa hep sen me pon me way ta Judea .
47001017	Fa sho , wen A plan fa do dat an den me plan change op , A ain been like no poson wa ain serious bout wa e do , ainty ? Wen A plan fa do sompin , fa true , A ain tink jes bout mesef , like people ob de wol do . Oona ain tink dat A say “ Yeah ” one minute an “ No ” de oda minute , ainty ?
47001018	Sho as God ain neba lie , wa we say ta oona ain “ Yeah ” an “ No . ” We ain say fus one ting an den change um ta noda .
47001019	Cause Jedus Christ , God Son , wa Silas , Timothy an me beena tell oona bout , e ain no poson wa say “ Yeah ” one minute an “ No ” de oda minute . Bot all de time Jedus Christ de ansa “ Yeah ” fom God .
47001020	Cause ebry one ob de promise dem wa God promise got de ansa “ Yeah ” een Christ . Dat wa mek we say “ Amen ” een Jedus Christ name wensoneba we da praise God .
47001021	God de one wa da mek we an oona stan scrong , da know fa sho dat we all one een Christ . God de one wa done pick all ob we fa do e wok .
47001022	E done pit e maak pon we fa show dat we e own people . An e pit e Sperit eenside we haat fa mek we know dat fa true we gwine git all wa e gwine gii we .
47001023	God me witness ! E know wa dey een me haat ! A been mek op me mind A ain gwine come ta oona een Corinth , cause A ain wahn fa mek oona feel bad .
47001024	Now den , we ain da try fa tell oona wa oona haffa bleebe , cause oona stan scrong een oona trus een Jedus . We da wok togeda wid oona fa mek oona rejaice .
47002001	So A mek op me mind dat A ain gwine come gin an tell oona ting wa gwine mek oona haat sad .
47002002	Ef A beena mek oona haat sad , who dat gwine be lef fa mek me heppy ? Ain nobody bot dem dat A mek sad , ainty ?
47002003	Dat hoccome A done write oona dat letta . A ain been wahn fa come an hab me haat sad . De same people wa oughta mek me rejaice done mek me sad . Cause A know fa sho dat wen A rejaice , oona gwine rejaice too .
47002004	Wen A beena write ta oona , me haat been hebby an A beena warry bad . A beena cry plenty . Bot A ain write ta oona fa mek oona haat sad . A been write fa mek oona know hommuch A lob oona .
47002005	Now den , somebody done do a bad ting wa been mek people sad . Ain me e done mek sad . Bot A know , e mek all ob oona sad a leetle bit . A ain wahn fa mek dat one feel bad tommuch .
47002006	Mos ob oona done punish dat one yah , so leh dat do .
47002007	So den , oona oughta paadon um now an courage um so dat e ain gwine git so sad dat e ain able fa go on .
47002008	Please leh um know dat oona lob um .
47002009	A done write oona dat letta cause A been wahn fa test oona an see ef oona ready all de time fa do wa A tell oona fa do .
47002010	Wen oona paadon somebody fa wa e done bad , A gwine paadon dat one too . An ef dey some reason fa me fa paadon sompin , A gwine paadon um fo Christ fa sake ob oona .
47002011	A do dat so dat Satan ain gwine be able fa win out oba we een nottin . Cause we know e da scheme fa mek op bad ting fa do ginst we .
47002012	Wen A got ta Troas fa tell um de Good Nyews bout Christ , A see dat de Lawd mek a way fa me fa wok dey .
47002013	Bot een me haat A beena warry bad , cause A ain find me broda Titus dey . So A tell de people dey say , A da gwine , an A gone on ta Macedonia .
47002014	We tell God tankya , cause God mek Christ win out oba de powa ob ebil . An wen we one wid Christ , God all de time da mek we hab we paat wid Christ fa win out oba de powa ob ebil . An God da nyuse we fa spread all oba , wa people oughta know bout Christ , like a sweet smell kin spread all oba .
47002015	We jes like de sweet smell wa da come fom incense , wa Christ da gii ta God . Dem people wa God da sabe an dem wa da gwine pon dey way fa be loss faeba , dey all da smell um .
47002016	Fa dem wa da gwine ta hell , dat a smell wa da kill . Bot fa dem wa gwine git sabe , dat a smell wa da gii life . Ain nobody fit fa do dis wok ainty ?
47002017	Cause we ain like plenty people wa da tell oda people God wod fa mek money . Bot cause God sen we , we wa da saab Christ , we da taak scraight wod fo God .
47003001	Oona gwine tink dat we da staat fa taak ta oona gin bout wesef , ainty ? Bot fa sho dat ain so . We ain fa do like some oda people haffa do . We ain haffa bring letta ta oona fa mek oona know ef we good , ainty ? An oona ain haffa sen letta bout we ta oda people needa .
47003002	Cause oona we letta wa done been write down eenside we haat fa ebrybody fa know an read .
47003003	Oona da show fa true dat oona a letta fom Christ wa we done bring . An nobody ain tek ink fa write dis letta . God write um wid e Sperit . E ain write pon stone , bot pon people haat .
47003004	We da say dem ting yah cause we know fa true dat we kin trus God shru Christ .
47003005	We ain able fa do nottin by wesef , so we ain gwine say dat we able . God de one wa da mek we able fa do all ting wa we da do .
47003006	Same fashion , God mek we able fa be minista ob a nyew cobnant wa e mek wid people . Dat cobnant ain no law wa been write down een a book . God Sperit mek dat cobnant wid we . Cause de law wa been write down , dat condemn people ta det , bot God Sperit da gii life .
47003007	Now den , de Law wa condemn we ta det been write down pon stone . Wen God gim , e shinin glory come pon Moses . An de Israel people dem ain been able fa keep da look pon Moses face , cause e face beena shine sommuch , eben dough dat glory beena fade way .
47003008	So ef de Law wa bring det come wid sommuch glory , fa sho , de wok ob God Sperit gwine be full ob eben mo glory den dat !
47003009	De wok wa Moses done , wa condemn people , been full ob glory . Bot de wok wa God do wa mek all ting right twix God an e people , dat haffa be full ob glory heap mo den dat , fa true .
47003010	Cause dat wa been a shinin glory ain got no glory tall now wen we see de glory wa come , wa great mo den all .
47003011	De ting wa ain been fa las long , e hab glory . So den dat wa gwine las faeba , dat eben mo full op wid glory .
47003012	Now den , cause we know we kin look fowaad ta dat , we ain fraid tall fa taak plain fa God .
47003013	We ain like Moses wa been kiba e face so dat de Israel people ain see dat de shinin glory beena fade an gone way .
47003014	Bot fa true , jes like dat ting wa kiba Moses face , sompin been mek dem Israel people so dat dey ain git ondastandin bout dat . Eben op ta taday , dat same ting dey wa da mek um so dat dey ain ondastan wen dey da read de book dem wa taak bout de ole cobnant . Cause jes wen somebody come fa be one wid Christ , jes den dat face kiba gone an e git dat ondastandin .
47003015	Eben op ta taday , wensoneba dey da read de Law wa God gii Moses , dey ain ondastan .
47003016	Bot wen somebody ton ta de Lawd , God mek um git ondastandin bout dat .
47003017	Now den , de Lawd , e de Sperit . Wehsoneba de Sperit ob de Lawd dey , de people free .
47003018	So now dat God done moob de kiba fom we face , wensoneba people see we , dey see de glory ob de Lawd da shine fom we . An God Sperit da mek we jes like de Lawd wid mo an mo ob e glory .
47004001	God een e mussy gii we dis yah wok fa do . So den , we ain gwine leh nottin mek we gii op .
47004002	We ain hab nottin fa do wid dem bad ting wa people do , da try fa hide um fom oda people , an wa da mek um too shame . We da waak scraight wid people . An we ain da tangle God wod . We say um jes like e da . We da taak de trute fa all people fa ondastan , cause we know dat God da look pon we . An cause ob dat , we hope dat all people gwine be sattify dat we da waak een a good way .
47004003	Ef some ob de people wa da yeh de Good Nyews we da tell um ain ondastan um , dey de one dem wa da gwine pon dey way fa be loss faeba .
47004004	Dey ain bleebe wa we da say , cause Satan , de ebil god ob dis wol , done bline dey eye , so dat dey ain able fa see de light wa da shine pon um . Dat de light ob de Good Nyews bout Christ glory , an Christ pazactly de same as God .
47004005	Cause fa true , we ain da tell oona bout wesef . We da tell oona bout Jedus Christ we Lawd . An we say dat we oona saabant fa sake ob Jedus .
47004006	God , wa say , “ Leh light shine outta de daak ! ” e de same God wa mek e light shine een we haat . An dat light wa da shine fom Christ face , dat da mek we know God glory .
47004007	Stillyet , eben dough God da gii we dis tredja dey eenside we , we stan jes like ole clay jug . We weak an plain . Dat show dat de powa dey een God han . Fa true , we ain got dat powa .
47004008	Plenty time we got trouble ebryweh , bot dat ain mek we gii op . Plenty time we ain know wa fa tink , bot we ain loss we courage .
47004009	People mek we suffa , bot all de time God dey wid we . Dey kin knock we down , bot dey ain able fa stroy we .
47004010	De det ob Jedus dey een we body all de time , so dat people kin see e life too een we body all de time .
47004011	Cause wiles we da lib een dis life , all de time we da stan een de patway ob det fa sake ob Jedus , so dat people kin see e life een we body .
47004012	So den , we da stan een de patway ob det all de time , bot oona dey een de patway ob life wa ain neba gwine end .
47004013	Dey write een God Book say , “ A been bleebe wa God tell me , an dat mek me tell wa A bleebe . ” Same way so , we bleebe een dat same way ob fait , an we da tell wa we bleebe .
47004014	We know dat God wa mek we Lawd Jedus git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , e gwine mek we lib gin too , long wid Jedus . An God gwine bring we , long wid oona , eenta de place weh e dey .
47004015	All dis da happen fa sake ob oona . An as God da bless mo an mo people , dey gwine tell God tankya mo an mo an show e glory .
47004016	Cause ob dat , we ain neba gii op . Eben dough we body da waste way , stillyet nyew life da come ta we sperit eenside we ebry day .
47004017	De leetle trouble dem we da suffa fa dis shot time , dey da git we ready fa blessin an hona faeba . An dem blessin an hona gwine be faaway mo den de suffrin we da suffa now .
47004018	Cause we pit we haat pon dem ting wa we ain da see . We ain pit um pon dem ting wa we da see . De ting dem wa we da see , dey ain las long , bot dem ting wa we ain da see , dey gwine las faeba an eba .
47005001	We know dat ef dis tent we lib een , we body yah een dis wol , git stroy , God got a place fa we fa lib een heaben . Dat a house wa God mek wa gwine las faeba .
47005002	Fa true , wiles we da lib yah , we da groan , cause we wahn fa pit on we nyew cloes . We wahn fa be eenside we house een heaben .
47005003	Cause wen we dey eenside we house een heaben , we ain neba gwine be dout nottin fa kiba we op .
47005004	Wiles we still da lib yah eenside dis tent , we da groan wid we hebby burden we da tote . Dat ain fa say dat we wahn fa come outta we body dat we got een dis wol . Bot we wahn God fa pit we house fom heaben pon we , so dat life wa gwine las faeba gwine swalla op we body yah wa gwine dead .
47005005	God de one wa done ready we fa dis nyew house , an e gii we e Holy Sperit fa show we dat .
47005006	So den , cause we know dem ting yah , we ain neba gii op . We know dat all de time dis body yah we house , we ain gone yet fa lib een de house dat God da keep fa we .
47005007	Cause we da waak coddin ta fait . We ain da waak jes by wa we da see wid we eye .
47005008	A da tell oona , we ain neba gii op . An fa sho , we wahn fa go way fom dis body an go lib wid de Lawd .
47005009	Bot weza we da lib een we body yah or way op een heaben , de ting we wahn mo den all , we wahn fa do dem ting wa gwine mek we Lawd sattify .
47005010	Cause we all gwine haffa stanop fo Christ jedgiment seat . E gwine jedge we , an ebrybody gwine git e payback fa e wok wen e been dey een dis life , weza e good or bad .
47005011	So den , we know wa e mean fa be scaid ob de Lawd , so we da try fa taak ta people fa win um oba ta de Lawd . God know we shru an shru , an A hope dat oona ondastan we een oona haat too .
47005012	We ain da try fa tell oona gin dat we good . We da try fa gii oona good reason fa be heppy cause ob we . Den oona gwine be able fa ansa dem wa da brag bout wa people da do so dat oda people kin shim , steada bout wa dey eenside a poson haat .
47005013	Ef e look like we ain got no sense , den dat fa sake ob God , ainty ? Ef oona bleebe we got sense , dat fa sake ob oona .
47005014	De lob ob Christ fa we da rule oba we , cause we know fa sho , dat one man done dead fa all people . An dat mean dat all people done dead wid um .
47005015	E done dead fa all , so dat dem wa got life mus dohn lib no mo fa deysef . Dey oughta jes lib fa de one wa done dead an wa God mek lib gin fa dey sake .
47005016	So we ain oughta jedge nobody no mo same like people da jedge um . Eben dough we beena jedge Christ like people da jedge oda people , we ain do dat no mo .
47005017	Wen somebody come fa be one wid Christ , e a nyew poson . De ole way ob life wa e beena lib done done . E da lib a nyew way ob life now .
47005018	God do all dis . Shru Jedus Christ , God mek all ting right twix esef an we . An e gii we de wok fa go tell oda people how dey kin come ta um an leh God mek all ting right twix God an dem .
47005019	Dat mean fa say dat God mek all ting right twix esef an people cause ob wa Christ done . God ain memba people sin ginst um no mo fa punish um . An e chaage we fa go tell people how e mek all ting right twix God an dem .
47005020	So den , Christ sen we fa tell oona dis . Wen we da taak ta oona , e like God esef da taak . Fa sake ob Christ , we da beg oona . Come ta God an leh um mek all ting right tween esef an oona .
47005021	Christ ain neba do no sin , bot fa we sake , God pit we sin dem pon Christ , so dat wen we come fa be one wid Christ , all ting come fa be right twix God an we .
47006001	So den , we wa da wok togeda wid God da beg oona . Mus dohn leh de blessin wa God gii oona go fa nottin .
47006002	Cause God say ,
47006003	We da try fa lib so dat we ain gwine bodda nobody noway , so dat nobody ain gwine blame we fa de wok wa we da do .
47006004	Bot de way we da do all ting , we da show dat , fa true , we da do God wok . We da beah op onda heapa trouble , wen we da suffa , wen haad time come , an all kind ob bad ting come ta we .
47006005	Sometime people beat we an pit we een de jailhouse , Sometime dey been a heapa people wa bex come ginst we . Sometime we haffa wok til we cyahn wok no mo , an we haffa go dout no sleep an ain got nuff food fa nyam .
47006006	Den too , we da show dat we da do God wok by de way dat we lib clean , by how we know fa true bout Christ , by how we da beah wid people an got good haat fa um . An we da show um by de Holy Sperit , an how we lob people fa true .
47006007	Wen we da taak true an God powa dey pon we , dat show too dat we da do God wok . De way we da waak scraight wid God , dat we weapon wa we got fa fight , pon de lef han side an de right han side .
47006008	Sometime people hona we , an sometime dey taak bad bout we . Sometime dey praise we , an sometime dey hole we cheap . We da taak true , bot sometime dey taak bad bout we , da say we ain taak true .
47006009	People know we ebryweh , stillyet , sometime e like nobody know we . We been good as dead , bot stillyet , ya kin see we da lib . People mek we suffa , stillyet dey ain kill we .
47006010	We kin hab hebby haat , bot we da rejaice all de time . We ain got plenty ting , stillyet we da mek a whole heapa people rich een fait . E seem like we ain got nottin , bot we got all ting fa true .
47006011	We deah fren dem een Corinth , we haat open ta oona . We done tell oona all wa dey een we haat . We ain hide nottin .
47006012	We ain shet op we haat ginst oona , bot oona da shet op oona haat ginst we .
47006013	So A da taak ta oona now jes like oona me chullun . Open op ya haat ta we , like we own haat open ta oona !
47006014	Oona mus dohn jine op wid people wa ain bleebe pon Christ , da try fa lib like oona one wid um . Cause ting wa right an ting wa ain right ain able fa jine togeda ainty ? How de light an de daak gwine be one an lib togeda een one place ?
47006015	Christ an de Debil ain neba gwine gree togeda , ainty ? How somebody wa bleebe pon Christ an somebody wa ain bleebe gwine gree togeda ?
47006016	De place weh God lib ain neba gwine gree fa jine op wid idol dem wa people mek fa pray ta ! Fa true , God da wa lib faeba an da gii life , we e house ! God say ,
47006017	An de Lawd say ,
47006018	A gwine be oona Fada ,
47007001	Me deah Christian fren dem , God mek all dem promise yah fa we . So den , leh we mek we life clean fa true fom sin . Mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid no ebil ting dat gwine mek we body or we sperit dorty een God eye . Leh we lib jes fa God , wa we blongst ta , an show dat we da hona um fa true .
47007002	Open op oona haat fa we . We ain do nobody nottin bad . We ain stroy nobody fait . We ain tek no wantage ob nobody .
47007003	A ain say dem ting yah fa condemn oona . Cause , like A done tell oona , oona een we haat all de time . We lob oona sommuch dat nottin kin keep we fom oona . We togeda wid oona all de time , weza we da lib or we dead .
47007004	A sho dat oona ain gwine disappaint we . Oona da mek me too heppy . Eben dough we got plenty trouble , stillyet A got plenty courage , A full op wid joy .
47007005	Eben wen we come ta Macedonia , we body ain got no chance fa res . We been flicted dey pon all side . People beena aagy wid we an we been scaid .
47007006	Bot God , wa da courage dem wa got hebby haat , e courage we wen Titus come .
47007007	An we ain been courage jes cause e come . We been courage , too , wen e tell we how oona courage um dey . E tell we dat oona wahn fa see me too bad . An oona saary fa true fa wa happen . An e say , too , dat oona all de time ready fa tek op fa me . So A da rejaice now eben mo .
47007008	Eben ef de letta A done write mek oona too sad , A ain saary dat A write um . A been saary wen A see dat de letta mek oona sad fa a wile .
47007009	Bot A heppy now . A ain heppy dat A done mek oona sad . A heppy cause oona been so sad til dat done mek oona change oona way . Oona change cause oona been feel saary like God wahn . So , we ain do oona no haam .
47007010	Wen God mek somebody saary , dat gwine mek e haat change an e gwine ton fom e sin . An cause ob dat , e gwine be sabe . So dat ain nottin fa regret . Bot ef somebody feel saary jes cause ob sompin wa dey een dis wol , dat kind ob saary dey gwine mek um dead an loss faeba .
47007011	Look wa God done fa oona wen e mek oona saary . Fa sho , e mek oona study fa do wa oona oughta do an fa show fa true dat oona ain done nottin wrong . Oona been bex bad an oona been scaid . Wen God mek oona saary , dat mek oona wahn fa see me too bad , an oona been ready fa punish de one wa done bad . Oona done all wa oona been able fa do fa mek all ting scraight . All dat done show dat dey ain nottin fa blame oona fa een dat trouble .
47007012	So eben wen A write dat letta , A ain write um fa sake ob de one wa done bad , an A ain write um needa fa sake ob de one wa suffa fa um . A write um fa show oona dat God know dat oona cyah fa we fa true .
47007013	An all dat courage we . An pontop ob de courage dat oona gii we , Titus mek we eben mo heppy , cause oona mek um heppy fa true by de way oona all beena hep um so dat e ain warry no mo .
47007014	A been tell Titus dat A too heppy bout oona , an oona ain leh me down . We taak true ta oona all de time . Same way so , oona show dat wa we tell Titus bout oona , e true .
47007015	So den , Titus da lob oona mo an mo , wen e da memba how oona all been ready fa do wa e tell oona fa do , an how wen oona welcome um , oona been so scaid an ain wahn fa do nottin fa mek um feel bad .
47007016	A heppy fa true , cause A know A kin trus oona fa sho , een ebryting .
47008001	Me Christian bredren , we wahn fa mek ya know bout de blessin wa God been gii de choch dem een Macedonia .
47008002	Eben dough dey beena suffa a heapa trouble wa test um fa true , stillyet dey heppy . An cause ob dat , dey wahn fa hep oda people , an dey gii way a whole heapa ting , eben wen dey ain got much tall ob dey own .
47008003	A da tell oona fa true dat dey gii all dey able fa gii an eben mo den dat , cause dey wahn fa do um .
47008004	Dey beena beg we wid all dey haat fa leh um hab de blessin fa be able fa gii ta God people wa got need .
47008005	We ain beena spect um fa do all dey done . Fus dey gii de Lawd dey life an den pit deysef een we han , jes like God wahn um fa do .
47008006	So den , we courage Titus , wa staat dis wok , fa go on wid um an hep oona fa finish op dis special wok weh oona da gii plenty , cause oona lob oona Christian bredren .
47008007	Oona way head ob oda people een oona fait , een de way oona da taak , een oona laanin , een de way oona da do ting wid all oona haat , an een oona lob fa we . So jes like oona way head ob oda people een dem ting , oona oughta be way head , too , een dis wok yah .
47008008	A ain da chaage oona dat oona haffa do um . Bot wen A da tell oona how oda people wahn fa hep fa do dis wok , A da try fa find out dat de lob dat oona got da come fa true fom oona haat .
47008009	Oona know de way we Lawd Jedus Christ bless we . Eben dough e got ebryting op dey een heaben , stillyet fa oona sake e come fa lib een dis wol jes like a poson wa ain got nottin . E done dat fa mek oona git all ting op een heaben .
47008010	Now listen yah ta wa A tink oona oughta do bout dis offrin . E betta fa oona fa finish op tareckly wa oona done staat fa do las yeah . Oona been de fus fa staat da gii fa de offrin ta God people , an oona been de fus fa wahn fa gim sompin .
47008011	So finish op de wok . Jes like oona been wahn fa git um ready , so now oona oughta finish um op . An oona oughta gim coddin ta wa oona got .
47008012	Ef somebody wahn fa gii , God gwine be sattify coddin ta wa dat poson got , an not coddin ta wa e ain got .
47008013	A ain da try fa tek oda people hebby load fom off um an pit um pon oona .
47008014	A mean dat e good fa all fa share an share de same . Oona got plenty ting now , an oona oughta hep dem wa ain got wa dey need . Den wen de time come dat oona ain got wa oona need , dem wa got plenty ting gwine hep oona . Dat way , all oona gwine share de same .
47008015	Like dey write een God Book say , “ De one wa geda a heap ain got tommuch , an de one wa geda jes a leetle bit got wa e need . ”
47008016	A tell God tankya fa mek Titus haat open fa hep oona , jes like me own haat open ta oona .
47008017	Wen A aks Titus fa go ta oona , e been heppy fa go . Fa true e been too heppy fa go hep oona . E de one wa mek op e mind fa go .
47008018	An we da sen , long wid Titus , noda Christian broda wa ebrybody praise een all de choch dem , cause ob e wok da tell de Good Nyews .
47008019	An e ain only dat , de choch dem pick um fa go wid we wen we do dis wok ob lob , da cyaa de offrin ta de Christian dem een Judea , so dat de Lawd gwine git de praise , an dey gwine see dat fa sho we wahn fa hep um .
47008020	We wahn fa tek cyah dat nobody ain gwine blame we bout de way we nyuse dis heapa money yah .
47008021	We da try we bes fa do wa right , not jes fo de Lawd , bot fo people too .
47008022	We da sen noda ob we Christian bredren fa go long wid um . E show we plenty time an een plenty way dat e wahn wid all e haat fa hep . An now dat e trus oona good fashion , e wahn fa hep oona mo den eba .
47008023	Now bout Titus , e de one wa fa true da wok longside me an wok wid me fa hep oona . Dem oda ob we Christian bredren , dey da gwine long wid Titus fom de diffunt choch dem wa sen um fa go ta oona . Dey da bring hona ta Christ .
47008024	So den , oona oughta show um how oona lob um , so all de choch dem gwine know fa true dat oona lob um , an dey gwine know dat we right wen we da brag bout oona .
47009001	Fa true , A ain need fa write oona bout de offrin dat de Christian dem gwine sen ta Judea fa hep God people dey .
47009002	Cause A know dat oona wahn fa hep , an A beena taak bout dat good ting oona do . A da tell de people een Macedonia say , “ We Christian bredren een Achaia been ready fa hep oona since las yeah . ” Plenty dem dey een Macedonia staat fa hep wen dey yeh how oona wahn fa hep too bad .
47009003	Bot A da sen bredren yah ta oona now so dat me good wod bout oona hep ain gwine be jes empty taak , an oona gwine be ready wid wa oona wahn fa gii fa hep een dis wok , jes like A beena say .
47009004	Ef oona ain ready an some ob we Christian bredren fom Macedonia come wid me an see dat oona ain got nottin ready yet fa gii , we gwine be too shame an oona gwine be shame mo den we . Cause we been sho dat oona been ready fa hep .
47009005	Dat mek me tink dat A mus courage dem Christian bredren yah fa try fa go ta oona fo A come , an hep oona git ready , fo A git ta oona , wa oona promise fa gii . Den dat gwine be ready wen A come . An dat gwine show dat oona da gii cause oona wahn fa gii , an e ain cause somebody da mek oona gii .
47009006	Wa A mean fa say , de one wa ain plant bot a leetle bit ob seed ain neba gwine haabis a big crop . Bot de one wa plant plenty seed gwine haabis a whole heapa crop .
47009007	Ebrybody mus gii wa e mek op e mind fa gii . E mus dohn gii wid sad haat jes cause dey mek um gii . God lob de one wa heppy een e haat fa gii .
47009008	An God able fa gii oona all oona need , an plenty mo too , so dat all de time oona gwine git all oona need , an a heap mo dat oona kin gii fa ebry good wok .
47009009	Like dey write een God Book say ,
47009010	God da gii de faama seed , an e da gii bread fa nyam . Same way so , God gwine gii oona , too , all de seed oona need fa plant an e gwine mek um grow . Oona da do a heapa good ting , an God gwine mek dat seed grow fa be a big crop fa true .
47009011	God gwine gii oona nuff ting all de time so dat oona gwine be able fa gii plenty all de time . Den people gwine tell God tankya fa wa oona gii we fa cyaa ta um .
47009012	Dis wok wa oona da do ain jes fa gii God people wa dey need . Dis wok da mek um tell God tankya plenty .
47009013	Dis wok wa oona da do da show dat oona trus God fa true . Dat gwine mek God people praise God , cause oona da folla de way ob de Good Nyews ob Christ wa oona da tell people bout , an cause oona da gii dem an oda people plenty ting .
47009014	So den , dey gwine pray fa oona wid all dey haat , cause ob de blessin wa God been gii oona mo den all .
47009015	Leh we tell God tankya fa wa e gii we , wa mo greata den we kin say !
47010001	A , Paul , da beg oona een de name ob Christ , wa kind an da beah wid people . Dey say A da taak low wen A dey wid oona , bot wen A ain dey close ta oona , A got plenty mout .
47010002	A da beg oona dat wen A come ta oona , oona ain gwine mek me hab scrong mout mongst oona , like A plan fa do mongst some people wa tink dat we da waak een de way ob de wol .
47010003	Fa true , we da lib een de wol , bot we ain da fight dis waa like people ob de wol da fight .
47010004	De weapon dem wa we tek fa fight wid , dey ain wa people ob dis wol fight wid . We got weapon wa got powa fom God fa stroy de scrong place dem ob de enemy .
47010005	We da nyuse dem weapon fa show dat de aagyment dem dat people da aagy bout God , dey ain mek no sense . We da stroy ebryting wa people wa tink dey high op da nyuse fa keep people fom know bout God . Ebry kinda way people da tink , we res um an pit um een de jailhouse til e ready fa obey Jedus Christ .
47010006	An wen fa true oona do all wa oona oughta do , we gwine be ready fa punish whosoneba ain da do wa e oughta do .
47010007	Oona da look jes at wa people see . Ef somebody dey wa da tink dat fa sho e blongst ta Christ , leh um memba dat jes like e blongst ta Christ , same fashion we blongst ta Christ .
47010008	A ain gwine be shame eben ef A taak a leetle tommuch bout de tority de Lawd gii we . E sen we fa come hep oona grow op een Christ . E ain sen we fa stroy oona .
47010009	A ain wahn oona fa tink dat A da write oona dem letta fa mek oona scaid .
47010010	Some people da taak say , “ Paul da write haad ting full ob powa een dem letta yah wa e sen we . Bot wen e yah wid we , e ain look like e got no powa tall , an e taak ain mount ta nottin . ”
47010011	Ef people da taak dat way , leh um ondastan dat wa we write een we letta wen we ain dey wid oona , dat de same ting we gwine do wen we dey wid oona .
47010012	Oona know dat we ain gwine be scrong mout nuff fa compare wesef wid some ob dem wa tink dey mo betta den oda people . Fa true , dey ain got sense ! Dey jes da compare deysef wid one noda , an dey da jedge deysef jes by wasoneba dey tink right .
47010013	Bot we ain gwine taak bout no good ting dat we ain oughta taak bout . We gwine taak jes bout de wok God gii we fa do , an we wok mongst oona paat ob dat .
47010014	So we ain do nottin mo den wa we oughta do wen we come ta oona . We been de fus fa git ta oona an tell oona de Good Nyews bout Christ .
47010015	We ain taak bout de good wok wa oda people done do , wok wa ain paat ob wa God gii we fa do . Bot we wahn fa see oona trus een God mo an mo , so dat wiles oona da trus um mo an mo , we wok mongst oona gwine grow mo an mo .
47010016	Den we gwine be able fa go ta de lan dem oba yonda , clean oba ta de oda side ob weh oona dey , an tell all de people dey de Good Nyews . Cause we ain wahn fa taak bout de good wok wa oda people done do een dem lan weh God sen um .
47010017	Like dey write een God Book say , “ Ef somebody wahn fa brag , leh um brag bout de good wok dat de Lawd done do . ”
47010018	Cause de one wa taak bout esef , say e do good , dat one ain gwine git praise . De one wa de Lawd say e da do good , dat de one wa gwine git praise .
47011001	A hope oona gwine beah wid me wiles A cut de fool . Kin ya do dat much fa me ?
47011002	Cause A jealous oba oona same fashion God esef jealous . Cause A done promise oona fa marry ta Christ , so dat A able fa gii oona , like ooman wa ain neba know no man , ta e one husban .
