47011003	A scaid dat wa happen ta Eve gwine happen ta oona too . Jes like de snake trick Eve an ceebe um , somebody gwine trick oona so dat oda ting dem go on een oona head , an den oona gwine stop fa trus een Christ fa true wid all oona haat .
47011004	A scaid fa oona , cause oona ready fa listen ta wasoneba poson wa come ta oona , da tell oona bout noda Jedus wa ain de same Jedus we beena tell oona bout . Oona cept de sperit dey promise oona , wa ain de one oona got wen A been dey , an oona da listen ta wasoneba poson wa come da tell oona ting wa diffunt fom de Good Nyews bout Jedus wa we tell oona .
47011005	A da taak bout dem big shot wa call deysef postle . A ain tink dey eben a leetle bit mo betta den me .
47011006	Eben ef A ain able fa taak too good , wa A know , A know um good fa sho . We done mek dat plain ta oona een ebryting , an een ebry way .
47011007	A ain aks oona fa no pay wen A beena tell oona de Good Nyews bout God . A been pit mesef down low so dat oona kin come high op . Fa true , dat ain no bad ting A beena do , ainty ?
47011008	Wen A beena wok mongst oona , oda choch dem been gii me wa A need fa lib . E same like A beena tief dem choch so dat A kin hep oona .
47011009	An wiles A been dey wid oona , wensoneba A beena need sompin , A neba bodda none ob oona . A ain aks oona fa nottin . Cause de bredren wa come fom Macedonia , dey bring all dat A beena need . An jes like e been , dat so e gwine be all de time . A ain gwine be no burden pon oona .
47011010	A promise oona dat wehsoneba A go een all ob Achaia , A gwine taak bout dis good ting , say dat A ain tek no pay fom oona han . Ain nobody gwine stop me fom say dat . Dat de true wod wa Christ pit een me haat fa taak .
47011011	Oona tink dat A da taak dis way cause A ain lob oona ? Dat ain so . God know dat A lob oona !
47011012	A gwine still keep on da do wa A da do now , so dat dem oda people wa some call postle , ain gwine git no reason fa brag , say dey da do de same wok jes like we da do .
47011013	People wa da do like dat ain no true postle tall . Dey da lie bout dey wok , an dey jes da mek deysef look like dey Christ true postle dem .
47011014	Oona ain oughta wonda bout dat , cause Satan too kin change an mek esef look like a angel ob light .
47011015	So den , ain no big ting wen Satan saabant dem , too , da mek deysef look like dey God true saabant wa da waak een God way . Wen dey own time done end , dey gwine git dey pay fa de ting dem wa dey do .
47011016	A da tell oona gin dat nobody mus dohn tink dat A a fool . Bot ef dat so oona tink , oona oughta listen ta me jes like e been a fool wa da taak ta oona , so dat A kin still taak a leetle bit bout dem good ting wa mek me too heppy .
47011017	Wen A taak like dis now , A ain da say wa de Lawd tell me fa say . A da taak like a fool .
47011018	Plenty people da brag bout how good dey da , da taak jes een de way ob de wol . So A , too , gwine brag .
47011019	Oona got sense , an dat mek oona glad fa beah wid fool dem !
47011020	Oona da beah wid wasoneba poson wa da mek like e oona massa an oona e slabe , or wa da tek wantage ob oona or set trap fa oona . Oona da beah wid um wa da mek like e mo betta den oona , or wa da knock oona een de face .
47011021	A shame fa tell oona dat we ain been scrong mout nuff fa do dat !
47011022	Dey say dey Hebrew , ainty ? A Hebrew too . Dey people ob Israel ? A one ob Israel people too . Dey Abraham chullun chullun ? A one ob Abraham chullun chullun too .
47011023	Dey Christ saabant ? A da taak like a mad man , bot A a saabant mo betta den dey ! A beena wok faa way mo den dey beena wok . A been chunk een de jailhouse heap mo time den dey been chunk een de jailhouse . People done beat me op fa true mo bad den dey done beat dem op . An A come close ta det oba an oba gin .
47011024	Fibe time de Jew dem done beat me . Ebrybody ob dem fibe time , dey scrike me tirty-nine time .
47011025	A been beat op wid a rod shree time . One time people done chunk stone at me , da try fa kill me . Shree time de boat A been on done git all smash op an sink eenta de wata . An dey been one time wen A been dey een de wata one whole day an one whole night .
47011026	All de time A beena trabel all oba , A been een haam way . Dey been plenty ting wa kin kill me , de flood ob de riba , tief dem , me own Jew countryman dem , an dem wa ain Jew , all dem wa try fa do bad ta me . Dey been ting wa kin kill me dey een city dem , an een de desat , an wen A lef de sho fa go faaway pon de sea . An dey been dem people wa beena say dey me broda , bot fa true dey been me enemy .
47011027	Fa sho , A been wok haad , an plenty night A ain got no sleep . Sometime A been hongry an tosty . An plenty time A ain nyam nottin , an A been cole , an ain got no cloes fa weah .
47011028	Den pontop ob all dem oda ting , ebryday A da tink bout all de choch dem , how dey da do .
47011029	Wen oona ain able fa stan scrong , A feel like A ain scrong . Wen oona git trap an fall eenta sin , A feel bad fa true .
47011030	Ef A haffa brag bout de good ting dem A done , A gwine brag bout dem ting wa show dat A ain scrong .
47011031	God , de Fada ob we Lawd Jedus , e know dat A ain da tell no lie . Leh all people praise um faeba !
47011032	Wen A been dey een Damascus , de gobna wa been dey onda King Aretas , e sen sodja dem fa watch at de city gyate fa grab hole ta me .
47011033	Bot me Christian bredren pit me eenside a basket . Den dey done pass de basket shru a winda een de city wall an leh me down outside de city . Dat hoccome de gobna ain ketch me .
47012001	A haffa go on da taak bout de good ting dem A done eben dough A ain got nottin fa gain . Bot now A gwine taak bout de wision dem wa de Lawd show me an ting wa e mek me know .
47012002	A know one Christian broda wa been tek op quick eenta de tird heaben . Foteen yeah done pass now fom wen dat happen . ( A ain know ef dat man body gone op eenta heaben or ef jes e sperit gone op dey , bot God know . )
47012003	A say gin , A know dat dis man been tek op quick eenta de place dey call Paradise . ( A ain know ef de man body gone op dey or ef jes e sperit gone op , bot God know . )
47012004	Op dey e yeh ting dem wa nobody ain able fa tell , an wa nobody ain spose fa taak bout .
47012005	A gwine brag bout dis man yah . Bot A ain gwine brag bout mesef , cep A taak jes bout dem ting wa show dat A ain able fa do nottin by mesef .
47012006	Eben ef A wahn fa taak bout de good A done , A ain gwine be no fool . Cause A been gwine taak wa de trute fa sho . Bot A ain gwine taak bout mesef . Cause A ain wahn fa mek people tink dat A a betta poson den wa dey see me do an wa dey yeh me say .
47012007	Bot so dat de heapa good ting wa God show me ain gii me de big head , A been git sompin like a torn een me body , wa da hut me bad . Dat Satan messenja wa come fa beat pon me so dat A ain gwine be proud .
47012008	Shree time A done pray an aks de Lawd say , please tek way dis ting yah fom me .
47012009	De Lawd ansa say , “ De blessin wa A da gii ya , dat all wa ya need . Cause wen somebody ain able fa do nottin fa esef , dat de time wen me powa mo greata , een dat poson life . ” So A mo heppy fa taak bout wa A cyahn do by mesef , so dat de powa ob Christ kin mek e home een me .
47012010	So den , fa sake ob Christ , A heppy fa suffa . A heppy wen A weak an wen people shrow slam at me . A heppy wen haad time come pon me , an wen people fight ginst me , an A got all kind ob trouble cause ob Christ . Cause de time wen A ain able fa hep mesef , dat de time wen A mo scronga fa true .
47012011	A da taak like a fool , bot oona been mek me do dat . Fa true , oona oughta beena taak good bout me . Cause dem big shot wa call deysef postle ain no mo betta den me , eben dough A ain nobody .
47012012	Dem sign wa show dat A a postle fa true , dat wa A done wiles A beena beah wid oona , wen A wok dey . Dey been sign an miracle an wok weh God show e powa .
47012013	Fa true , A ain treat dem oda choch people no betta den A treat oona , cep dat A ain warry oona fa hep me , ainty ? Paadon me fa do oona wrong like dat !
47012014	Now de tird time A ready fa come wisit oona , an A ain gwine aks oona fa nottin . Cause A come fa hep oona . A ain wahn oona money . Atta all , chullun ain oughta sabe op fa gii dey modda an fada wa dey need . De modda an de fada , dey de one dem wa oughta sabe op fa gii dey chullun wa dey need .
47012015	A gwine be heppy fa gii oona all dat A got , an gii oona mesef too , fa hep oona . Cause A lob oona mo , oona ain oughta lob me no less , ainty ?
47012016	So den , oona gwine gree wid me dat A ain been no bodda ta oona . Bot somebody gwine say A da play trick pon oona an lie fa ketch oona !
47012017	A ain neba tek wantage ob oona wen A sen messenja dem fa go ta oona , ainty ?
47012018	A done beg Titus fa go ta oona , an A sen we oda Christian broda wid um . Oona ain wahn fa tell me dat Titus done tek wantage ob oona , ainty ? We two been do de wok een de same sperit an een de same way , ainty ?
47012019	Oona beena tink all dis time dat we jes beena try fa mek oona tink we da do right ? Dat ain so . We beena taak fo God , da say wa Christ wahn we fa say . Oona we deah fren dem , an all wa we do , we da do fa mek oona mo scronga een de fait .
47012020	A scaid dat wen A come dey , A gwine see dat oona diffunt fom how A wahn oona fa be , an oona gwine see dat A diffunt fom how oona wahn me fa be . A scaid dat A gwine see dat some ob oona dey da tek side an aagy wid one noda , dat oona jealous an git mad down wid one noda . A scaid dat some mongst oona da try fa git all ting jes fa deysef , an shrow slam an onrabble dey mout bout oda people . An A scaid dat some dey , all de time tink dey mo betta den oda people an git ebrybody all mix op ginst one noda .
47012021	A scaid dat wen A come gin ta oona , God gwine mek me feel small fo oona . An A scaid A gwine weep fa plenty people wa beena sin , bot dey ain saary an dey ain change dey way . Dey ain lef off dey loose life an de bad sin dey beena do .
47013001	Dis de tird time A da come wisit oona . Dey write een God Book say , “ Ef dey say somebody do bad , fa settle de case , two or shree people haffa be dey wa done shim wen de poson done bad . ”
47013002	A done waan oona wa beena sin , an all dem oda people , wen A been dey wid oona de secon time . Now wiles A gone fom oona , A da waan oona gin . Wen A come back , A gwine punish all dem wa sin , fa true .
47013003	Wen A do dat , oona gwine git wa oona wahn , cause oona wahn me fa show oona dat Christ da taak shru me . Christ ain weak wid oona . E powa big mongst oona .
47013004	E ain show e powa wen dey kill um pon de cross . Stillyet , God powa mek um lib gin . Same fashion , we wa one wid Christ ain got no powa , bot wiles we da wok wid oona , we gwine lib wid Christ an hab powa wa God da gii we .
47013005	Oona mus look ta oona own haat an life fa see ef oona da bleebe een Christ . Oona mus pit oonasef ta de test . Fa sho , oona know dat Jedus Christ dey eenside oona , ainty ? Ef oona cyahn shim dey , maybe e ain dey tall !
47013006	A da trus dat oona gwine find out dat we done pass de test .
47013007	We da pray ta God dat oona ain gwine do wa ain right . Ain jes fa mek people see dat we pass de test , bot dat oona do wa right eben ef e look like we ain pass de test .
47013008	Cause we ain got no powa fa do nottin ginst de trute . We jes got powa fa wok fa de trute .
47013009	We heppy wen we weak bot oona scrong . We da pray dat God mek oona grow mo an mo een oona waak wid Christ .
47013010	A da write dem ting yah ta oona now fo A git dey , cause A hope dat wen A come , A ain gwine haffa deal no scronga wid oona , wid de tority de Lawd gii me . E gii me dat tority fa come hep oona grow op een Christ . E ain gii me dat tority fa stroy oona .
47013011	Las ob all , me bredren , goodbye ! Try fa grow mo an mo een oona waak wid Christ . Mus pay tention ta wa A da tell oona . Oona mus gree wid one noda an lib peaceable . An God wa da lob we an da gii we peace , e gwine be dey wid oona .
47013012	Tell one noda hey een Christian lob .
47013013	All God people yah tell oona hey .
47013014	A pray dat we Lawd Jedus Christ bless all ob oona , an dat oona gwine know how God da lob oona , an dat oona jine han wid one noda jes like de Holy Sperit mek oona able fa do .
48001001	A Paul , A de postle , da write ta de people ob de choch dem een Galatia . Ain no man wa pick me an gii me de tority fa be a postle . Jedus Christ , an God we Fada wa done mek Jedus git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin , dey pick me fa be a postle .
48001002	An all de Christian bredren yah wid me da write ta oona too , ta de choch een Galatia .
48001003	A aks God we Fada an we Lawd Jedus Christ fa bless oona an gii oona peace een oona haat .
48001004	Christ done leh people kill um fa pay fa we sin . E done dat fa set we free , so we ain haffa lib like people lib now een dis wol weh ebil da rule . Wen Christ do dat , e do wa we Fada God wahn .
48001005	Leh we praise God faeba an eba ! Amen .
48001006	Oona mek me stonish fa true ! Oona da ton way so quick fom folla God wa call oona . Oona done come ta God cause ob Christ blessin pon oona . Bot now oona da ton ta noda message wa some people say de Good Nyews .
48001007	Dey ain no oda Good Nyews no weh . Bot some people da trouble oona an mek oona opsot . Dey da try fa change de Good Nyews bout Christ .
48001008	Bot ef we , or a angel esef wa come outta heaben , preach diffunt message ta oona , leh God condemn um fa suffa een hell faeba !
48001009	We beena tell oona , an A da tell oona gin say , ain nobody noweh oughta preach no Good Nyews ta oona wa diffunt fom wa oona done bleebe at fus . Ef somebody da do dat , leh God condemn um fa suffa een hell faeba !
48001010	A ain da try fa mek people praise me , ainty ? No ! A wahn God fa praise me ! Oona ain tink A da try jes fa do wa people wahn , ainty ? Ef A stillyet jes wahn fa please people , fa true A ain no saabant ob Christ .
48001011	Me Christian bredren , A wahn oona fa know dat de Good Nyews wa A da preach ain nottin dat people done mek op .
48001012	Ain been no man wa fus tell me dis Good Nyews , an ain nobody laan me nottin bout um . Steada dat , Jedus Christ show um ta me , fa mek me ondastan de Good Nyews .
48001013	Oona done yeh bout de way A nyuse fa lib wen A beena folla God like de Jew people da folla God . Oona know A beena mek de people ob God choch suffa too bad . A ain hab no mussy pon um . A beena do all dat A able fa do fa stroy um .
48001014	A beena do plenty ting fa folla de way dat de Jew people da folla God . A beena do a heap mo den oda nyoung people like me . Cause A been wahn fa do dem ting wa we ole people laan we fa do , de way dey beena folla God , wid all me haat .
48001015	Bot God bless me fa true . E pick me fom way back fo A been bon , an e call me fa saab um .
48001016	An wen e cide fa mek me know e Son , so dat A gwine go tell de Good Nyews bout um ta dem people wa ain Jew , A ain aks no oda poson fa tell me wa fa do .
48001017	Wen God call me , A ain gone op ta Jerusalem fa taak wid dem wa been postle fo me . Steada dat , A jes gone right way ta Arabia . Den A come back ta Damascus .
48001018	E tek shree yeah atta A bleebe pon Jedus Christ , fo A gone op ta Jerusalem fa taak ta Peter . An A stay dey wid um fa fifteen day .
48001019	A ain see none ob dem oda postle , cep fa jes James , de Lawd broda .
48001020	All wa A da set down yah true fa sho . God know A ain da tell oona no lie !
48001021	Atta A come outta Jerusalem , A gone ta Syria an Cilicia .
48001022	Jurin dat time dey , de Christian dem wa been dey een de choch dem een Judea , dey ain been know me yet .
48001023	Dey jes beena yeh people da taak say , “ Dat man wa nyuse fa mek we suffa , now e da tell all de people , say dey oughta bleebe pon Jedus Christ . E beena try fa stroy all dem wa bleebe pon Jedus ! ”
48001024	So all dem people yah beena praise God fa wa e da do shru me .
48002001	Atta foteen yeah , A gone back op ta Jerusalem . Barnabas gone long wid me , an A tek Titus long too .
48002002	A gone ta Jerusalem cause God show me dat A oughta go dey . A hab meetin wid jes de leada dem ob de choch an splain ta um de message ob Good Nyews dat A da tell ta de people wa ain Jew . A meet wid jes de leada dem , cause A ain wahn fa hab de wok wa A beena do an de wok wa A da do now mount ta nottin .
48002003	Titus , wa come wid me , e a Greek . Stillyet , dey ain eben mek um git circumcise .
48002004	Dey been some people dey dat beena mek like dey bleebe pon Jedus Christ . Dey sneak een mongst we fa find out bout wa we bleebe . Dey see dat cause we trus een Jedus Christ , we free fa do all ting wa God wahn we fa do . An dem people dey been wahn fa mek we slabe ta de Jew Law .
48002005	Bot we ain gree eben one minute fa leh um change de true message ob de Good Nyews . Cause we wahn dat true Good Nyews fa be wid oona an be sabe faeba fa oona .
48002006	Now dem people een Jerusalem dat dey say leada een de choch , dey ain tell me nottin fa mek me change de message ob de Good Nyews dat A beena tell people . Ain no neba mind ta me who dem people da , cause God ain neba jedge nobody coddin ta wa e appeah fa be .
48002007	So dem choch leada see dat dey ain oughta change nottin bout de Good Nyews dat A beena tell . Bot dey see dat fa true , God been pick me an sen me fa go tell de people wa ain Jew de Good Nyews . Same way , God pick Peter an sen um fa tell de Jew people .
48002008	Cause God powa beena wok een me fa sen me fa go tell de Good Nyews ta de people dat ain Jew , jes like God powa beena wok een Peter fa sen um fa go tell de Jew people .
48002009	James , Peter , an John , dem wa people say been de big leada dem een de choch , dey see dat God been bless me fa gii me dis special wok yah fa do . So dey shake me han an Barnabas han , fa show dat we one een we wok fa God . Dey gree wid we dat we oughta go wok mongst de people wa ain Jew , an dey oughta go wok mongst de Jew people .
48002010	Dey jes aks we fa do one ting say , “ Leh we keep on da hep de Jew people wa ain hab nottin . ” An dat wa A been wahn fa do all de time .
48002011	Wen Peter come ta Antioch , e beena do sompin wa A ain gree wid . An A tell um dat , cause fa sho e ain beena do right .
48002012	Dis wa happen : James been sen some people ta Antioch . Now fo dey git dey , Peter nyuse fa nyam wid de Christian dem wa ain Jew . Bot atta dem people dat James sen git dey , Peter ain wahn fa nyam no mo wid dem Christian wa ain Jew . Cause e beena scaid ob dem dat say dey oughta circumcise all de Christian man dem wa ain Jew .
48002013	Den de oda Jew Christian bredren too , dey staat fa do wa dey know ain right . Dey do same way Peter beena do , an dey stop fa nyam wid de Christian wa ain Jew . Eben Barnabas cide fa go dey way an do wa e know ain right .
48002014	Den A come an see dat dey ain do right coddin ta de true wod , wa de Good Nyews . So A stanop fo all de Christian dem , an A tell Peter say , “ Ya a Jew , stillyet ya beena lib like ya ain no Jew . Ya ain beena do wa Jew people do . Now den , hoccome ya da try fa mek dem wa ain Jew do jes like Jew people ? ”
48002015	Fa true , we fada an modda dem , dey Jew people . We ain been bon ta people dat ain Jew , dem we call sinna .
48002016	Stillyet , we know dat jes cause a poson da do wa de Jew Law say e haffa do , dat ain gwine mek ebryting right twix dat poson an God . Wen e trus een Jedus Christ , jes dat wa mek ebryting right twix dat poson an God . Same way so , we too trus een Jedus Christ , so dat God mek ebrtyting right twix we an esef , cause we trus een Christ . Ain been cause we da do wa de Jew Law say we haffa do . God ain neba gwine mek ting right wid nobody jes cause dat one da do wa de Jew Law say .
48002017	We pit we hope pon God fa mek ebrtyting right twix esef an we , cause now we one wid Christ . Bot wiles we da hope dat way , ef e ton out dat we da sin jes like dem wa ain Jew , dat ain mean dat Christ da coax we fa sin , ainty ? No , dat ain so !
48002018	Ef A staat fa build op wa A done been knock down , dat mean fa say A da broke de Law an A da sin fa true .
48002019	Cause A jes like somebody wa done dead , so de Jew Law ain hab no powa oba me no mo . Dat Law esef done mek me dat way . All dis happen so dat A kin lib fa God .
48002020	A done dead wid Christ pon de cross . Now Christ de one wa da lib een me an gii me life . Now A da trus een God Son , wa lob me an gii e life fa me sake , an dat mek me lib de way A da lib .
48002021	So den , A ain gwine say de way God gii e blessin ain wot nottin . Ef somebody kin do wa de Jew Law say e haffa do , an dat kin mek all ting right twix dat poson an God , den dat mean fa say Christ done dead fa nottin !
48003001	People ob Galatia ! Oona ain got no sense ! Whodat da mix op oona til oona ain know wa oona da do ? A beena tell oona cleah as day , how people kill Jedus Christ pon de cross .
48003002	Oona tell me jes dis . God ain gii oona e Sperit cause oona da do wa de Jew Law tell oona fa do , ainty ? E gii oona e Sperit cause oona yeh de Good Nyews an bleebe um , ainty dough ?
48003003	Oona ain got no sense ? God Sperit mek oona staat fa lib dis nyew way . Fa sho , oona ain wahn fa try fa lib de res ob oona life oona own way , jes by oona own powa , ainty ?
48003004	Oona tink say all wa happen ta oona ain mean nottin ? Fa true , dat haffa mean plenty ta oona !
48003005	God ain da gii oona de Sperit an mek miracle happen mongst oona cause oona da do wa de Jew Law tell oona fa do , ainty ? E da do all dat jes cause oona yeh de Good Nyews an bleebe um .
48003006	Now den , leh we tink bout wa happen ta Abraham . Dey write een God Book say , “ Abraham trus God , an cause ob dat , all ting been mek scraight twix esef an God . ”
48003007	So den , oona oughta ondastan dat de people wa trus een God fa true , dey Abraham chullun chullun . Dey Abraham chullun chullun mo den dem wa done been bon ta Abraham fambly .
48003008	Fo e happen , God Book been say God gwine mek ebryting right twix esef an dem people dat ain Jew , wen dey trus pon um fa true . An fo e happen , wa dey done write een God Book show how Abraham been yeh de Good Nyews wen God tell um say , “ A gwine nyuse ya fa bless all de people een de wol . ”
48003009	Abraham trus een God fa true , an God bless um . Same way , God da bless all dem dat trus een um fa true , jes like e bless Abraham .
48003010	De one wa tink ebrtyting gwine be right twix um an God cause e da try fa do wa de Jew Law say , dat one dey da lib all de time da know God gwine pit e cuss pon um . Cause dey write een God Book say , “ God gwine pit e cuss pon de one wa ain da do all de time all dat de Book ob da Jew Law say . ”
48003011	Now den , ebrybody kin see dat God ain mek nottin right twix esef an a poson jes cause dat one da do wa de Law say e haffa do . Cause God Book tell we say , “ Wen somebody trus een God , God mek ebryting right twix esef an dat one , an dat gwine mek dat poson lib de true life . ”
48003012	Bot ef oona da do all wa de Law say , dat ain tall de same as wen a poson da trus een God . God Book say , “ Ef somebody da do wa de Law say , den e gwine git de life dat de Law say e git . ”
48003013	Bot Christ done mek we free . E mek de Law so e ain hab no cuss pon we no mo . Cause Christ leh um cuss um fa dead pon de cross fa we sake , like dey write een God Book say , “ God gwine cuss de poson dey hang pon a tree . ”
48003014	Jedus Christ mek we free so dat cause ob wa e done do , de people dat ain Jew gwine git de blessin jes like e promise Abraham , so dat we gwine git God Sperit wa e promise cause we trus een God .
48003015	Me Christian bredren , A gwine taak bout ting dat we all know . De promise ob God same like wen two people gree bout sompin an sign a paper fa say dat . Dat mean fa say dey mek a cobnant . Ain nobody kin change wa dey gree fa do een dat cobnant an pay no tention ta um . An nobody kin add mo wod ta um needa .
48003016	Now den , God mek e promise den ta Abraham an ta de chile ob e chullun chullun . God Book ain say , “ an ta ya chullun chullun , ” cause e ain beena taak bout a whole heapa people wa all been Abraham chullun chullun . God Book say , “ an ta de chile ob ya chullun chullun . ” Dat mean fa say God beena taak bout jes one poson , an dat one de Christ .
48003017	A da tell oona , God been mek a cobnant wid Abraham , an e promise fa do wa e tell Abraham e gwine do . Wen God gree fa mek dis cobnant yah , e wait fo hundud an tirty yeah fo e gii de Jew people de Law . An dis Law yah ain neba gwine change wa God promise , or mek dat come ta nottin .
48003018	Ef wa God gii come ta somebody cause dat one da do jes wa de Law say , den dat mean fa say dat blessin ain come ta de poson cause ob wa God promise e gwine do . Bot God promise dat blessin ta Abraham , an dat wa mek God gim de blessin .
48003019	So den , wa mek God gii people de Jew Law ? God gii people de Law atta e gim de cobnant fa show um dat dey da sin . An God mek de Law fa las til Christ come . Christ de chile ob Abraham chullun chullun . An e de one wa God taak bout wen e mek de promise . God sen some angel dem fa come gii Moses de Law . An Moses been de poson wa gone tween God an de Jew people . E pass de Law on ta de people dem .
48003020	Now dey ain no need fa a oda poson fa go tween , cep wen dey mo den jes one poson . An God , e jes one , an ain need no oda poson fa go tween .
48003021	Fa true , de wod ob de Law ain ginst wa God done promise , ainty ? No , not eben a leeleetle bit ! Cause ef God done gii people some special kind ob law dat kin mek um lib , den fa true , God been gwine mek ebryting right twix dem people an esef wen dey do wa dat special law say .
48003022	Bot dey write een God Book say , sin da rule all de wol , so dat God gwine gii dem wa trus een Jedus Christ wa e promise fa gim . An wa e promise fa gim come jes wen dey trus een Jedus .
48003023	Fo de time come wen people been able fa trus een Jedus Christ , de Jew Law dat Moses gii we beena guard we like we been prisona . We been shet op een de jailhouse by de law til dat time come wen God show people de way dey oughta trus een Jedus .
48003024	So den , til Christ come , de Jew Law been like a poson wa da rule oba we fa try fa mek we do wa we oughta do . De law done dis so dat wen Christ done come , God been able fa mek ebryting right tween we an esef wen we trus een Christ .
48003025	Bot now dat we kin trus een Christ , de Jew Law ain rule oba we no mo .
48003026	Cause oona trus een Jedus Christ , God done mek all ob oona e chullun .
48003027	Ebry one ob oona wa done git bactize , oona come fa be one wid Christ , an so oona all come fa be like Christ .
48003028	Jew an dem wa ain Jew , slabe an free man , man an ooman , all ob oona come fa be one een Jedus Christ .
48003029	Cause oona all blongst ta Christ , dat mean fa say oona Abraham chullun chullun , an oona gwine git wa God promise fa gii ta Abraham chullun chullun .
48004001	Wa A mean fa say , wen a poson stillyet a leetle chile , e ain gwine git de propaty dat e fada promise um . Wen e a chile , dey gwine treat um like a saabant , eben dough e got all dat propaty .
48004002	Wiles e still a chile , dey people wa tek cyah ob um . Dey gwine show um wa fa do an dey gwine be sponsable fa um bout de propaty dat gwine come ta um . Dey gwine do dat til e fada say de time done come fa leh e chile do um .
48004003	Same way , we , too , been slabe ta de sperit dem wa da rule oba de wol , wen we been like leetle chullun , fo we been ondastan de trute bout God .
48004004	Bot wen de right time come , God sen e Son eenta de wol . E hab a modda jes like all people hab , an e do wa de Jew Law say .
48004005	E come fa sabe de people wa dey onda de Jew Law , so dat we all kin come fa be God own chullun .
48004006	An cause oona come fa be God chullun , God sen de Sperit ob e Son eenta we haat . An dat de Sperit dat call out ta God say , “ Fada , me Fada ! ”
48004007	So den , oona ain no slabe no mo . Ebry one ob oona , ya God chile , an cause ya God chile , e gwine gii ya all dat e got fa gii ta e chullun .
48004008	Oona ain been know God , so oona been slabe ta dem ting dey call “ god ” wa ain no god tall .
48004009	Bot now dat oona come fa know God--or A oughta say , now dat God know oona--hoccome oona da ton back fa be slabe gin ta dem sperit wa da rule oba de wol . Dey ain got no scrent an dey ain wot nottin . Fa sho , oona ain wahn fa be dey slabe all oba gin , ainty ?
48004010	Oona got special day an mont an season an yeah wa oona da celebrate cause oona tink dat gwine mek God sattify wid oona .
48004011	Fa true , A consaan bout oona . Oona mean fa say , all wa A done fa hep oona been fa nottin ?
48004012	Me Christian bredren , A da beg oona , be like me , cause A come fa be like oona . Oona ain done me no bad ting .
48004013	Oona know hoccome A fus tell oona de Good Nyews bout Jedus Christ . Cause A been sick , A git de chance fa preach ta oona .
48004014	Wen A been sick down , dat mek ting haad fa oona fa true . Stillyet , oona ain neba hole me cheap . Oona ain say A ain wot nottin . Steada dat , oona treat me too good an tek me een , jes like oona tek een one ob God angel . Oona tek me een , jes like oona tek een Jedus Christ .
48004015	Oona been too heppy ! Wa happen fa change all dat ? Fa true , A know oona been ready fa gii me ebryting oona got , eben ef A aks oona fa tek out ya own eyeball an gim ta me .
48004016	Now cause A da tell oona de trute , oona tink say A done come fa be oona enemy ?
48004017	Dem oda people da try haad fa hab oona go dey way , bot dey ain op ta no good fa oona . Dey wahn fa mek oona stop gree wid me so dat oona kin try mo haada fa folla dey way .
48004018	E a fine ting fa try haad ef oona wahn fa do good . An oona oughta do like dat all de time , eben wen A ain dey wid oona .
48004019	Me deah chullun , A da feel pain fa oona sake . An dis pain dat A feel , e jes like de pain dat a ooman feel wen e chile wahn fa bon . A gwine feel dis pain yah til oona come fa lib like people wa hab Christ een um fa true .
48004020	Wid all me haat A wahn fa be wid oona now , so dat A kin stop da taak scrong wod ta oona . A so consaan bout oona , A ain know wa fa do .
48004021	See yah , oona wa wahn fa hab de Jew Law rule oba oona , oona ain ondastan fa true wa de Jew Law say , ainty ?
48004022	Dey write een de Law , say Abraham git two son . One ooman wa been de slabe ob e wife , e bon one ob Abraham son . An e wife , wa been a free ooman , bon de oda one .
48004023	De ooman dat ain been free been wid chile an bon Abraham son de way ooman da bon chullun . Bot de son dat Abraham wife , de free ooman , bon , e bon um cause God done been promise Abraham dat chile dey .
48004024	Now den , wa happen wid Abraham two son mean two diffunt ting . De two ooman , dey like two diffunt cobnant . One ob de cobnant dem come fom Mount Sinai . De ooman wa ain free , name Hagar , stan fa dat cobnant , an Hagar chullun ain been free wen dey bon .
48004025	Wen we da taak bout Hagar , we da taak bout Mount Sinai een Arabia . An wen we da taak bout Hagar , we kin taak too bout Jerusalem taday . Jes like Hagar ain free an e hab jes chullun dat ain free , same way so Jerusalem ain free , an all de people ob dat city ain free needa .
48004026	Bot de Jerusalem wa dey een heaben , e free , an dat Jerusalem dey , e like we modda .
48004027	Cause dey write een God Book say ,
48004028	So den , me Christian bredren , oona God chullun , cause dat de way God promise e gwine happen . Same way , Abraham git e son , Isaac , cause God promise dat .
48004029	Een dat time dey , Abraham son wa Hagar bon like ooman da bon chullun , e mek dat oda son suffa wa been bon cause ob wa God Sperit promise . An de same ting happen now .
48004030	Bot wa dat dey write een God Book ? Dey write dey say , “ Mus mek de ooman dat ain free go way , an e son mus go too . Cause de son ob de ooman wa ain free ain neba gwine hab no paat ob de fada propaty . De son ob de wife wa free , dat de son wa gwine git de propaty . ”
48004031	So den , me Christian bredren , we ain chullun ob de ooman wa ain free . We chullun ob de wife wa free .
48005001	Christ mek we free so dat we gwine be free people fa true . So den , leh we stan scrong an lib de way free people oughta lib . Mus dohn leh people mek oona lib like slabe gin .
48005002	Now A , Paul , da tell oona say , ef oona gree fa leh um circumcise oona , dat mean dat wa Christ do fa oona ain wot nottin ta oona . Oona yeh wa A say ?
48005003	A da waan oona gin say , ef a man gree fa leh um circumcise um , dat man mus do all de ting dem dat de Jew Law say .
48005004	Oona wa da tink ef oona do wa de Jew Law say , den all ting gwine be right twix oona an God , oona done ton oona back pon Christ an de blessin dem dat God wahn fa gii oona .
48005005	Fa we own paat , we da look fowaad ta wa we know gwine happen . God gwine mek all ting right twix we an esef . We da wait fa dat . God Sperit da hep we . An cause we trus een Christ , we da keep on .
48005006	Wen we one wid Jedus Christ , ef we git circumcise or ef we ain git circumcise , dat ain mean nottin tall . Bot de ting wa matta mo den ebryting else , dat we trus een Christ . An people gwine see dis wen dey see how we da show lob ta oda people .
48005007	Oona beena do too well ! Whodat mek oona stop do dem ting dat God tell oona fa do ? Wa somebody do fa change oona haat ?
48005008	Fa sho , God wa call oona ta esef ain change oona haat dat way .
48005009	Like people say , “ E jes a leeleetle bit ob yeast wa dey tek fa mek plenty bread . ”
48005010	God hep me know oona ain gwine gree wid wa some oda poson da tell oona , bot wid wa A tell oona . An God gwine jedge dat one wa da git oona opsot . Ain mek no diffunce who e da .
48005011	Me Christian bredren , look at me own trouble yah . Ef like dey say , A still beena tell people dat dey haffa git circumcise , hoccome dey da mek me suffa so ? Ef fa true A beena tell um dat dey haffa git circumcise , den people ain oughta still mek trouble wen A da tell um bout wa Christ det pon de cross mean .
48005012	De people wa da mek oona opsot , dey kin go all de way an castrate deysef .
48005013	Me Christian bredren , Christ call oona fa come ta um fa mek oona free . Bot jes cause oona free now , mus dohn tink oona kin leh oonasef do jes wasoneba oona sinful haat wahn fa do . Steada dat , oona mus hep one noda , cause oona lob one noda .
48005014	Cause all de Jew Law togeda come ta jes one law wa say , “ Ya mus lob oda people same way ya lob yasef . ”
48005015	Bot ef oona keep on like wile animal , da fight an gii one noda pain an suffrin , den oona mus look out , cause oona gwine stroy one noda .
48005016	A da tell oona say , oona oughta lib de way God Sperit tell oona fa lib . Den oona ain gwine do jes wasoneba ting oona sinful haat wahn fa do .
48005017	Wa we people wahn een we sinful haat ain tall wa God Sperit wahn . An wa God Sperit wahn , dat ain wa we people wahn . Wa God Sperit wahn an wa we sinful haat wahn , dem two da fight one noda all de time . Dis mean dat oona ain do wa oona wahn fa do .
48005018	Bot ef oona da lib een de way God Sperit tell oona fa lib , den de Law ain rule oba oona tall .
48005019	Ain nobody dat cyahn see wa people een dey sinful haat wahn fa do . People wahn fa lib loose an bad life wa ain deestent .
48005020	People wahn fa woshup op ta idol , an dey hoodoo one noda . Dey hate one noda an fight one noda . Dey cobish dey neighba propaty an git mad op wid one noda . Dey da pit deysef head ob oda people . Dey wide op eenta group an ain gree wid one noda .
48005021	Dey cobish . Dey dronka , an dey hab wile paaty . An dey do plenty oda bad ting like dem yah . A da waan oona jes like A beena waan oona , dem people dat lib dat way ain neba gwine hab God rule oba um .
48005022	Bot God Sperit da mek people good like a tree da grow good fruit . God Sperit da mek people lob one noda . E da mek um hab joy een dey haat . E da mek um gree wid one noda . E da mek um able fa beah trouble , an e da mek um hep one noda . E da mek um do good ta one noda . An e da mek um able fa do wa e wahn um fa do .
48005023	God Sperit da mek people so dat dey ain push one noda roun . An e da mek um so dat dey ain do jes wa dey wahn fa do . Dey ain no law ginst people wa da lib dis way .
48005024	Dem people wa blongst ta Jedus Christ ain leh dey own sinful haat rule oba um no mo . Dey done dead ta deysef like somebody wa dead pon a cross . Dey ain do all dem bad ting no mo , dem ting wa dey own sinful haat wahn um fa do .
48005025	God Sperit gii we life . So den we mus leh um tell we de way we oughta lib .
48005026	We ain oughta git de big head , an we ain oughta mek oda people bex wid we . Fodamo , we mus dohn cobish ting wa one noda got .
48006001	Me Christian bredren , ef somebody da do sinful ting an oona find out bout um , oona wa da do wa God Sperit tell oona oughta go hep dat one fa stop sin . Oona mus dohn taak scrong ta um . An mus watch out so dat oona , too , ain gwine wahn fa do ting wa ain right .
48006002	Wen sompin da trouble somebody an e da beah hebby load , oona mus hep um . Wen oona do dat , oona gwine do wa Christ chaage oona fa do .
48006003	Ef somebody tink e sompin great , wen fa true e ain nottin tall , e jes da mek a fool ob esef .
48006004	Ebrybody oughta tink bout wa e da do an cide ef e da do right . Ef e da do right , den e kin be sattify . E ain oughta look at wa oda people da do fa cide ef e da do right .
48006005	Cause ebrybody gwine haffa beah e own load .
48006006	De one dat dey da laan God wod ta , e oughta gii some ob all de good ting dem e hab ta e teacha wa da laan um .
48006007	Mus dohn mek a fool ob oonasef . Ain nobody kin fool God . Wasoneba oona plant , dat wa oona gwine haabis .
48006008	E jes like wen a faama plant seed , e gwine git wasoneba e plant . Same way , wen somebody do bad ting dat e sinful haat jes wahn fa do fa please esef , God gwine punish dat one . E gwine git stroy . An wen somebody do wa God Sperit tell um fa do fa please God , dat one gwine git haabis ob life dat ain neba gwine end .
48006009	So we mus dohn git tired fa do good . Cause ef we ain gii op , de time gwine come wen we gwine git a good haabis .
48006010	So den , any time we git de chance , we oughta do good ta all people , an eben mo ta we Christian bredren , cause dey blongst ta we fambly een Christ .
48006011	Oona see de big letta dem A da mek , as A da write ta oona wid me own han now .
48006012	De people wa da try fa mek oona git circumcise , dey jes wahn fa show off an brag bout how dey body look . Dey da do all dat jes so dat people ain gwine mek um suffa . Cause people gwine mek um suffa ef dey taak bout how Christ done dead pon de cross fa sabe people .
48006013	Eben dem wa git circumcise ain do wa de Law say . Dey wahn fa hab oona git circumcise so dat dey kin brag , say oona done leh um circumcise oona .
48006014	Fa me own paat , A ain gwine brag bout nottin cep de det ob we Lawd Jedus Christ pon de cross . Cause Jedus done dead pon de cross , de way ob de wol ain mean nottin ta me no mo . A done dead ta dem way , an dis wol ain got nottin fa do wid me no mo .
48006015	Ef we git circumcise or ef we ain git circumcise , dat ain mean nottin tall . Bot de ting wa matta mo den all , e dat God change we life , mek we a nyew kind ob people .
48006016	A da pray dat God gii peace an mussy ta all dem people wa lib dis way dat A done tell um , all dem wa God people .
48006017	Las ob all , mus dohn leh nobody bodda me no mo , cause A got de scar dem pon me body dat show A Jedus slabe .
48006018	Me Christian bredren , A da pray dat we Lawd Jedus Christ bless oona . Amen .
49001001	A , Paul , wa God pick fa be a postle ob Jedus Christ , da write ta God people een Ephesus , dem wa true ta God cause dey come fa be one wid Jedus Christ .
49001002	We aks God we Fada an de Lawd Jedus Christ fa bless oona an gii oona peace een oona haat .
49001003	Leh we praise de God an Fada ob we Lawd Jedus Christ , cause e bless we wa one wid Christ . E gii we ebry good ting wa haffa do wid esef dey een heaben .
49001004	God done pick we fa esef eben fo e mek de wol so dat we gwine be e own people wa ain hab no sin , wen e look pon we .
49001005	Cause God lob we , e done cide fohan fa hab Jedus Christ come fa bring we ta um , so dat we gwine come fa be God own chullun , an dat mek um too heppy .
49001006	God done dat so dat we gwine praise um fa dis big blessin dat e gii we , an dat ain cost we nottin . God own deah Son mek dis happen fa we .
49001007	Cause Christ shed e blood an dead pon de cross , we done been set free . God paadon we sin . God good ta we fa sho !
49001008	E pour out e blessin pon we fa hab sense an ondastan all ting .
49001009	E done wa e been cide fa do , an e tell we e plan , wa people ain neba know . E done been cide fa sen Christ fa do all dat e plan .
49001010	God plan dat wen de right time come , all ting dat God been mek , ebryting een heaben an ebryting een de wol , e gwine mek um all come fa be one togeda onda Christ fa rule oba um .
49001011	God mek all ting happen jes like e been plan an how e wahn um fa be . E pick we fa be e own people wa one wid Christ , cause dat wa e wahn an wa e been plan fo , fom fo de wol staat .
49001012	God do dat so dat we wa fus hope pon Christ gwine lib fa gim praise an show dat e great sho nuff .
49001013	Now oona , too , come ta blongst ta Christ wen oona yeh de true wod wa de Good Nyews dat sabe oona . Een Christ , wen oona bleebe , God gii oona de Holy Sperit wa e been promise . An e God maak wa e gii oona fa show dat now oona e own people .
49001014	Cause we hab God Sperit , we kin know fa sho dat we gwine git wa God promise fa gii e people , wen God gwine set free dem wa blongst ta um . Leh we praise um an show dat e great sho nuff !
49001015	Cause ob all dat wa God done , eba since A yeh bout how oona trus een de Lawd Jedus an how oona lob all de people dat blongst ta God ,
49001016	A ain neba stop da tell God tankya fa oona . An wensoneba A da pray , A aks God fa bless oona .
49001017	A aks de God ob we Lawd Jedus Christ , God we Fada wa full ob glory , fa gii oona e Sperit wa gwine gii oona sense an show oona de trute bout God , so dat oona gwine know um mo an mo betta .
49001018	A pray ta God , too , dat e open op oona haat fa ondastan de trute wa come fom God , so dat oona know de good ting dem e say oona kin look fowaad ta . A pray fa God fa mek oona ondastan how walyable dem great blessin dat God gwine gii ta e own people .
49001019	An A pray , too , dat oona gwine ondastan how scrong mo den all e great powa da , dat da hep we wa trus een um . Dis great powa ob God wa da hep we ,
49001020	dat de same powa dat God nyuse fa mek Christ git op fom mongst de dead people an lib gin , an fa mek um seddown een heaben pon e right han side .
49001021	Christ da rule dey een heaben wid faa mo tority den all oda rula an tority an leada an dem wa hab powa . Christ name greata mo den all dem oda name ob de rula dem een dis time yah an een all de time fa come .
49001022	An God mek all ting fa come onda Christ tority . E mek Christ de head , de Lawd fa rule oba ebryting fa de choch .
49001023	De choch , e Christ body , an dat body full op wid Christ , de one wa da full ebryting een ebry way .
49002001	Oona nyuse fa be people wa done dead , cause oona ain do wa God tell oona fa do , an oona keep on da sin .
49002002	Oona nyuse fa folla de ebil way ob dis wol . Oona beena do wa de ebil one wa da rule oba de sperit dem een de sky wahn . Dat de sperit wa da hab tority now oba people wa ain do wa God tell um fa do .
49002003	We all nyuse fa lib jes like dem people . We beena do jes wa we sinful haat an we body an we mind tell we fa do . We been people jes like ebrybody else , an so e haffa happen dat we been gwine suffa cause God bex wid we , cause ob we sin , jes like all dem oda people .
49002004	Bot God lob we sommuch . Cause ob dat , e hab a whole heapa mussy pon we .
49002005	So den , eben wen we been dead cause we ain do wa God tell we fa do , God gii we life togeda wid Christ . Wen God sabe oona , dat ain been cause dat fittin coddin ta wa ya done do .
49002006	Cause we blongst ta Jedus Christ , God done mek we git op fom mongst de dead people , jes like e mek Christ git op an lib gin , an e mek we fa seddown fa rule wid Christ een heaben .
49002007	God done dis fa show fa all time fa come how walyable fa true e blessin pon we , mo den we kin eba tell . An e show how e lob we by wa e done shru Jedus Christ .
49002008	Wen God sabe oona , dat ain been cause dat fittin coddin ta wa ya done do . E done dis cause oona trus een Christ . Eben dat trus wa oona got ain come fom oonasef . E de gif fom God .
49002009	So den , oona ain got nottin fa brag bout , cause dey ain nottin oona kin do fa sabe oonasef .
49002010	God de one wa mek we , an e mek we one wid Jedus Christ fa do dem good ting dat e plan way back yonda .
49002011	Cause ob dat , oona wa ain Jew , oona oughta memba wa oona nyuse fa be . Oona mongst dem wa de Jew people call “ people wa ain circumcise , ” an dey call deysef “ people wa been circumcise . ” ( Dat mean fa say dem man cut dey son dem fa show dey God people . )
49002012	Oona memba dat back den , oona ain been one wid Christ . Dey ain been count oona mongst de Israel people wa God done pick . An so oona been jes like come-yah people . Back den , oona ain hab no paat een de cobnant dem wa God mek wid e people . Dem cobnant been God promise ta e people fa mek um God own . Een dat time , oona been jes dey een de wol . Oona ain bleebe pon God , an oona ain hab no hope .
49002013	Oona nyuse fa be faa way fom God . Bot now oona come fa be one wid Jedus Christ . Christ done shed e blood an dead fa oona fa bring oona ta God .
49002014	Cause Christ we peace . E done mek de people wa ain Jew an de Jew people come fa be one people . Fo dat , dey been cut off fom one noda an enemy wid one noda . Bot wen Christ dead pon de cross , e broke down de wall ob hate wa beena cut um off fom one noda .
49002015	Jedus Christ pit de Jew Law , wid dem rule wa chaage de people an tell um wa dey haffa do , ta one side . Christ done dat fa mek dem people wa ain Jew an de Jew people come fa be one nyew people , e own people . Dat de way e done mek um all be peaceable wid one noda .
49002016	Wen Christ dead pon de cross , e done stroy de hate twix um . E done mek um come fa be one body , an e bring um back ta God .
49002017	Christ come an tell oona de Good Nyews wa kin mek all people come fa be peaceable . E tell oona bout dat peace , oona wa ain Jew an wa nyuse fa be faa way fom God , an e tell um ta de Jew people , wa been close ta God .
49002018	Wen Christ dead pon de cross , e done mek a way by de one Sperit fa all ob we , de Jew people an dem wa ain Jew , fa come ta we Fada God .
49002019	So den , oona wa ain Jew , oona ain no scranja needa come-yah people no mo . Now e jes like oona wid God people come fom de same country . We all blongst ta God fambly togeda .
49002020	Oona , too , come fa be paat ob de buildin wa got de postle dem an de prophet dem fa e foundation . An Jedus Christ , e de fus stone , wa gii scrent ta de buildin .
49002021	Jedus Christ , e de one wa mek all dat buildin fit togeda an da mek um grow bigga an bigga fa be God own house wa blongst ta de Lawd .
49002022	Oona too , come fa be one wid Jedus Christ , an e da build oona togeda wid all de oda res wa bleebe , eenta a buildin weh God da lib , by e Sperit .
49003001	Cause ob dat , A da pray ta God , A , Paul , wa come fa be a prisona , cause A da saab Jedus Christ an wok fa sake ob oona wa ain Jew .
49003002	Fa sho , oona been yeh bout how God bless me , da gii me dis wok fa do fa hep oona .
49003003	God done show me e plan wa people ain been know . ( A been write oona a leetle bit bout dat .
49003004	Wen oona read wa A done write , oona gwine know wa A ondastan bout dat plan ob God wa people ain been know bout , wa Christ done mek happen . )
49003005	God ain tell none ob de people wa beena lib way back dey bout all dis plan yah . Bot now de Holy Sperit done show de secret ta God postle an prophet dem wa blongst ta um .
49003006	Dis yah de secret wa God ain been show : Wen dem people wa ain Jew bleebe de Good Nyews jes like de Jew people bleebe , God gim all de same good ting . Dey all togeda come fa blongst ta one body . An Jedus Christ mek um all git wa God been promise um .
49003007	God bless me fa mek me Christ saabant fa tell de Good Nyews all oba , an e gii me e powa fa dat wok .
49003008	All God people mo betta den me . Stillyet , God bless me an pick me fa go tell de people wa ain Jew bout all de blessin dem dat Christ da gii e people . Dem blessin so good dat we ain eben able fa ondastan all bout um .
49003009	An God pick me fa splain ta all people an mek um ondastan how God gwine mek e secret plan happen . All dis time yah wa done pass een dis wol , God , wa mek all ting , ain leh people know bout all wa e da plan .
49003010	God do all dat so dat de choch kin mek de rula an de tority dem een heaben know now at dis time all de diffunt way dat God hab sense fa true een ebryting .
49003011	God done dis jes like e beena plan fa do um , shru Jedus Christ we Lawd .
49003012	Cause we know we trus een Christ an we come fa be one wid um , we free fa come fo God . We ain scaid tall fa come .
49003013	So den , A da beg oona , mus dohn git weary cause A da suffa yah fa oona sake . Cause e fa oona glory dat A da suffa .
49003014	Cause ob dat , A da kneel down fo we Fada God .
49003015	E de one wa gii ebry fambly een heaben an een dis wol dey true name .
49003016	A da pray ta God dat fom dem special blessin wa e got een heaben , e gii oona powa fa mek oona scrong een de Lawd een oona haat . De Holy Sperit e de one wa da do dis .
49003017	An dat so e stan , cause oona trus een um , Christ gwine mek e home dey een oona haat . So den , wasoneba oona da do , oona gwine do um cause ob lob , jes like a tree wa got root wa go down deep eenta de groun an grip de groun tight . An dat lob gwine be a scrong foundation fa oona .
49003018	So den , A pray dat oona , togeda wid all de oda res ob God people , gwine hab powa fa ondastan hommuch Christ lob we fa true , how wide e lob , an how long , how high e lob , an how deep .
49003019	A da pray dat God mek oona come fa know dis lob ob Christ , eben dough dey ain none ob we kin know all bout how e lob we . Den wen oona know how Christ lob oona fa true , oona kin be all full op een oona life wid all wa God da .
49003020	Leh we gii glory ta God ! Cause ob e powa wa da wok eenside ob we , God able fa do faa way mo den all we gwine eba aks fa or eben tink ob .
49003021	Leh we gii glory ta God ! Leh all we people wa een de choch an wa one wid Jedus Christ gii glory ta um , fa all time , fa eba an eba ! Amen .
49004001	So den , A Paul , wa dey pit een de jailhouse cause A da wok fa de Lawd , A da beg oona , mus waak een God way , jes like God tell oona fa lib wen e call oona fa trus een Christ .
49004002	Oona mus dohn neba tink oona mo betta den noda poson . Mus dohn be rough on um . Mus wait fa oda people an beah wid um cause ob oona lob .
49004003	De Holy Sperit da gii oona de peace wa mek oona all one body een Christ . Oona mus try wid all oona haat fa gree togeda , so dat oona kin all hab peace wid one noda .
49004004	We all blongst ta one body . We all got de same Holy Sperit , jes like dey one ting wa oona hope fa wen God call oona .
49004005	Dey jes one Lawd , an one fait , an one bactism .
49004006	Dey jes one God an Fada ob all . E de Lawd wa rule oba all . E da wok shru all , an e een all .
49004007	Now den , Christ done bless we fa mek ebry one ob we able fa do a special wok . Ebry one ob we hab we own gif .
49004008	Dat wa mek um write een God Book say ,
49004009	Wa dat dey mean wen dey say , “ E gone op ” ? Dat mean fa say , fo e gone op , e done been come down ta de mos deep place ob de eart .
49004010	Dat one wa come down , e de same one wa gone op high pass all de heaben , so dat e gwine full op ebryweh .
49004011	E mek some people postle , an some prophet . Some ob um , dey evangelist fa tell oda people de Good Nyews . Some oda , dey pastor an teacha .
49004012	Christ do dis fa mek God people ready an able fa do de wok dat dem wa trus een Christ oughta do , so dat de body ob Christ , de choch , gwine grow scrong an git build op
49004013	til we all togeda gwine come fa be one people , da gree een we fait an een wa we know bout God Son . Den we gwine trus een God een ebryting til we all done grown op een God , jes like Christ .
49004014	Een dat time we ain gwine be like leetle chullun no mo , wa kin change wa dey bleebe wensoneba dey yeh a nyew ting . Dey like a leeleetle boat dat de wata kin toss all oba , an de big wind kin keep on da change an da blow dat boat one way atudda . Now we ain gwine be like dem leeleetle chullun . Wen ceitful people try fa laan we , dey jes like dat wind . Bot dey ain gwine mek we bleebe all kind ob wrong ting wa ain true tall .
49004015	Steada dat , we mus lob one noda , da tell one noda wa true . Ef we do dat , we gwine grow op mo an mo een ebry way fa be one wid Christ , de head ob de choch .
49004016	Christ , de head , got chaage ob all de diffunt paat dem ob de body , so dat dey all jine togeda jes so . An ebry jaint een de body da hep fa keep all de body togeda , cause all de paat dem da jine togeda fa be one . So den , wen ebry one ob dem paat da do wa e oughta do , all de body da grow an git build op , as all de paat dem lob one noda mo an mo .
49004017	Een de Lawd name , A da chaage oona say , oona mus dohn lib oona life no mo like dem wa ain know God da lib . Wa dem people tink ain wot nottin .
49004018	Dey haat ain open , so dey cyahn ondastan de life dat God gii . Dey ain got no paat een dat true life wa God gii ta people , cause dey haat haad as a rock , an dat mek um so dat dey ain know nottin tall .
49004019	Dey ain got no shame bout nottin no mo . Dey mek op dey mind fa waak all de time een de ebil way . Dey lib loose life , an dey da wahn fa do all kind ob ebil ting mo an mo .
49004020	Now den , wa oona been laan bout Christ ain neba been like dat !
49004021	Fa sho , people beena tell oona bout Christ , an oona wa folla um beena laan de trute dat een Jedus .
49004022	So den , oona mus gii op oona ole sef , dat ole way wa mek oona do dem bad ting oona nyuse fa do . Oona ole sef beena stroy oona , da mek oona wahn fa do schemy ting wa mek oona sin .
49004023	Oona mus leh God Sperit change de way oona tink .
49004024	Oona mus be de nyew poson wa God mek fa be like esef . Dat nyew poson gwine treat oda people right an do wa right een God eye .
49004025	So den , ebry one ob oona mus dohn neba tell lie no mo . Oona mus all tell de trute ta e neighba , cause we all blongst togeda ta Christ one body .
49004026	Ef oona bex , oona mus dohn leh dat mek oona sin . An oona mus dohn leh de sun go down an oona stillyet bex .
49004027	Oona mus dohn gii de Debil chance fa mek oona sin .
49004028	De poson wa beena tief , e mus dohn tief no mo . E mus wok , da do sompin good wid e han , so dat e gwine be able fa hep dem wa hab need .
49004029	Oona mus dohn taak haamful wod wa ain do nobody no good . Steada dat , mus taak wod wa gwine hep oda people so dat oona wod gwine build um op , coddin ta wa dey need fa yeh . Een dat way , oona gwine be a blessin ta de people wa da yeh oona .
49004030	Oona mus dohn mek de Holy Sperit saaful . Cause de Sperit ob God een oona , dat God maak wa e gii fa show dat oona blongst ta um an oona kin know fa sho dat e gwine keep oona til dat day wen God gwine set oona free .
49004031	Mus dohn hab no bittaness tall een oona haat . Mus dohn be bex at nobody . An mus dohn taak mean or shout , needa shrow slam at nobody . Mus dohn hate nobody tall .
49004032	Steada dat , oona mus do good ta people . Mus hab waam , kind haat fa one noda , an mus paadon one noda , jes like God fagib oona , cause oona blongst ta Christ .
49005001	So den , oona mus try fa be like God , cause oona e chullun wa e lob fa true .
49005002	Oona life mus be full op wid lob een all dat oona do , jes like Christ lob we an done gii e life op fa we . E offa op e life as a sweet smellin offrin ta God , a sacrifice wa sattify God .
49005003	Oona God people , so e ain right fa none ob oona fa eben taak bout da lib a loose life or da ramify roun . E ain right needa fa oona fa eben taak bout da git de big eye , all de time da wahn wa oda people hab .
49005004	An e ain right fa oona taak bad , foolish , or doty wod . Steada dat , oona oughta tell God tankya .
49005005	Oona kin know fa sho dat dey ain nobody wa da lib a loose life , nobody wa ramify roun , nobody wa hab de big eye , all de time da wahn wa oda people hab ( cause a poson wa do dat , e da woshup idol ) , none ob dem neba gwine go ta de place weh Christ an God da rule .
49005006	Mus dohn leh nobody ceebe oona , da taak lyin wod wa ain mek no sense . All dese ting yah wa A da taak bout , dem mek God bex fa true wid people wa ain do wa e tell um fa do .
49005007	Oona mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid dem kind ob people yah .
49005008	Oona done been loss een sin , daak like de daak ob de night . Bot now oona come fa be light . Oona de Lawd own people . So den , oona mus lib like people wa blongst ta de light .
49005009	Cause ebryting wa good an wa right an wa true da come fom de light .
49005010	Try fa find out wa de Lawd wahn oona fa do .
49005011	Mus dohn hab nottin fa do wid dem ting wa people do wa ain wot nottin . Dem ting daak wid sin like de daak ob de night . Bot oona mus bring um ta de light , an mek people know wa dem daak ting be like fa true .
49005012	Ef somebody eben taak bout de bad ting wa people do wen nobody shim , e da shame esef .
49005013	Bot wen de light da shine pon sompin , den people able fa see fa true wa dat ting da . Cause all wa de light shine pon , we eye kin see . Cause de light mek we see ebryting .
49005014	Dat wa mek um write say ,
49005015	Oona mus tek cyah how oona da lib oona life . Mus dohn lib like people wa ain got no sense . Mus lib like dem wa got sense .
49005016	Ebry chance oona git fa do good , oona mus do all dat oona able fa do . Cause dis time yah a ebil time .
49005017	So den , mus dohn do nottin foolish , bot ondastan wa de Lawd wahn oona fa do .
49005018	Mus dohn be dronka , full op wid wine til oona do bad ting wa gwine dribe oona ta ruint . Steada dat , oona mus lib full op wid de Holy Sperit eenside oona .
49005019	Wen oona da taak wid one noda , oona oughta nyuse de wod ob de psalms an hymn an speritual . Oona oughta sing um wid all oona haat fa praise de Lawd .
49005020	Oona mus tell we Fada God tankya all de time fa all ting , een de name ob we Lawd Jedus Christ .
49005021	Oona mus obey one noda , cause oona hona Christ .
49005022	Wife , ya mus obey ya husban , jes like ya obey de Lawd .
49005023	Cause de husban de head ob de wife . E got tority oba e wife jes like Christ got tority oba de choch . An Christ de Sabior ob de choch , e body .
49005024	Jes like de choch mus obey Christ , same way so de wife mus obey e husban een all ting .
49005025	Husban , ya mus lob ya wife , jes like Christ lob de choch an done gii op e life fa um .
49005026	E gii e life fa de choch fa mek um God own , da mek e choch clean wen e wash um wid wata by e wod .
49005027	Christ do all dat so dat wen e bring de choch fa stanop fo um , de choch gwine be too purty . De choch ain gwine hab nottin bad or wrong bout um . E gwine blongst ta um fa true , an e ain gwine hab eben one bad spot or wrinkle , nottin fa tek way fom e beauty .
49005028	Een dat same way , de husban mus lob e wife jes like de husban lob e own body . De man wa da lob e wife , e da lob esef .
49005029	Fa sho , ain nobody neba hate e own body . Steada dat , e da feed e body an tek cyah ob um , an dat jes like Christ tek cyah ob de choch .
49005030	Cause we all blongst ta Christ body .
49005031	Dey write een God Book say , “ Cause ob dis , a man gwine lef e fada an e modda , an e gwine marry a wife . Dey gwine jine togeda , an de man an e wife gwine be one . ”
49005032	Dis wa A jes write show we a great ting wa true fa sho , a ting wa been haad fa ondastan . Bot A tell oona say dis wod da taak bout Christ an de choch .
49005033	Bot dis same wod da taak bout oona too . Ebry husban mus lob e wife jes like e lob esef an ebry wife mus hona e husban .
49006001	Chullun , ebry one ob oona mus do wa ya fada an modda tell ya fa do , cause dat de right ting fa do .
49006002	Een all de Law wa God gii Moses , de fus one wa got a promise long wid um say , “ Ya mus gii hona ta ya fada an ya modda . ”
49006003	De promise wa go long wid um say , “ So dat all ting wa happen ta ya gwine be good fa ya an ya gwine lib a long time yah een de lan . ”
49006004	Oona wa fada , mus dohn say an do ting ta oona chullun wa gwine mek um bex . Steada dat , oona mus laan um de Christian way .
49006005	Oona wa slabe , oona mus show hona ta oona massa an do wa dey tell oona fa do . Mus do de wok wid all oona haat like oona beena do um fa Christ .
49006006	Mus dohn do oona wok good jes wen oona massa da watch oona , jes so dat dey gwine praise oona . Bot cause oona a slabe ob Christ , oona mus do wa God wahn wid all oona haat .
49006007	Oona mus do good wok wid heppy haat like oona da do um fa Christ , an not jes fa people .
49006008	Cause oona know fa sho dat Christ gwine gii ebrybody e pay fa de good wok dat e do . Ain mek no neba mind ef dat one a slabe or ef e free .
49006009	Oona wa massa , oona mus treat oona slabe dem een dat same good way . Mus dohn mek um scaid , da tell um how haad oona gwine be on um . Cause oona mus dohn neba fagit dat oona an oona slabe dem blongst ta de same Massa een heaben . An e ain gwine treat one poson mo betta den noda .
49006010	Leh me tell oona dis las wod . Oona mus leh de Lawd mek oona scrong an gii oona e mighty powa .
49006011	Oona mus pit on all dat God got fa protec oona wen oona fight ginst ebil , jes like sodja dem pit on dey iron cloes fa protec all dey body . Oona mus do dat so dat wen de Debil come wid e ebil scheme , oona gwine be able fa stanop ginst um .
49006012	Cause we ain da fight ginst people yah . We da fight ginst dem powa wa we ain able fa see , de ebil sperit dem high op dey . We da fight ginst de scrong powa dem wa da rule oba people wa ain bleebe pon God , wa got tority now een dis daak time we da lib een .
49006013	So den , oona mus pit on all dat God got fa protec oona een de fight , so dat wen de day come dat ebil come ta oona fa true , oona gwine be able fa stanop an fight ginst all de ebil scheme ob de Debil . An long as de enemy come ginst oona , oona gwine keep on da fight um . Oona gwine still stanop ginst um .
49006014	So den , mus stanop scrong ginst de Debil . Leh all wa true be like de belt wa oona fasten roun oona wais . An leh de right way oona da do , be like de iron plate wa oona da weah fa kiba oona chest fa protec oona wen oona da fight .
49006015	An leh de Good Nyews bout de peace wa God gii keep oona da stan scrong , like de shoe oona da weah pon oona foot .
49006016	Fudamo , leh oona trus een Christ be like a shield dat oona cyaa . Dis shield yah gwine protec oona , so dat all de bunin arrow dem wa de mos ebil one da shoot ain gwine do nottin ta oona .
49006017	Oona mus leh de sabation dat God gii protec oona like a helmet wa oona da weah pon oona head . An leh de wod ob God , wa de Holy Sperit gii oona , be like a sode fa fight ginst de enemy .
49006018	Pray all de time an aks God fa hep ya . Aks God Sperit fa hep ya pray . Mus dohn neba gii op . Pray all de time fa all God people .
49006019	An oona mus pray fa me too , dat God gwine show me wa A oughta say wensoneba A staat fa taak , so dat A ain gwine be scaid wen A tell people bout de Good Nyews ob Christ , dat dey ain know .
49006020	Fa de sake ob dis Good Nyews , A God messenja yah een chain een de jailhouse . Oona mus pray fa me so dat A ain gwine be scaid fa tell people bout Jedus Christ jes de way A oughta tell um .
49006021	Tychicus , we deah Christian broda , e a faitful woka fa de Lawd . E gwine tell oona ebryting bout me , so dat oona gwine know how A da do an wa A da do .
49006022	Dat hoccome A da sen um ta oona , so dat e kin tell oona how we da do , an e gwine courage oona wid e wod .
49006023	A pray dat God we Fada an de Lawd Jedus Christ gii peace ta all de Christian bredren , an dat dey fait een Jedus Christ mek um all lob one noda .
49006024	An A pray dat God bless all dem wa lob we Lawd Jedus Christ wid lob wa ain neba gwine end .
50001001	We , Paul an Timothy , wa da saab Jedus Christ , da write ta all God people dem een Philippi wa come fa be one wid Jedus Christ , an ta de choch leada dem , an ta dem wa da hep een de choch wok .
50001002	We aks Fada God an de Lawd Jedus Christ fa show oona mussy an gii oona peace een oona haat .
50001003	Ebry time A da tink ob oona , A da say tankya ta God fa oona .
50001004	E mek me haat glad wensoneba A da bend me knee fa oona .
50001005	E mek me haat glad cause ob de way oona hep me fa tell oda people de Good Nyews , fom de fus day wen A staat dis wok een Philippi , right op ta now .
50001006	So den , A know fa sho dat God wa staat fa do dis good wok yah eenside oona haat , e gwine keep on da do um til e done finish all e been plan , op ta dat day ob Jedus Christ , wen e gwine come back .
50001007	Oona een me haat all de time , an so e right fa me fa feel dis way bout oona . Cause all hab a paat wid me een God blessin ta we , wiles A dey yah een de jailhouse , an wiles A been free fa go tell ebrybody de Good Nyews , da show um dat e true , an da mek um know fa true wa e say .
50001008	God know hommuch A wahn fa see oona . A da lob oona wid all me haat jes like Jedus Christ da lob we .
50001009	A da pray dat oona gwine keep on da lob God an all people mo an mo , an dat mo an mo , oona gwine know God trute an hab sense bout wa good an wa bad .
50001010	A da pray dis so dat oona kin know fa do wa bes fa do . Den oona ain gwine do nottin bad een oona life , an ain nottin dat oona gwine be blame fa , pon dat day wen Jedus Christ gwine come back .
50001011	An oona gwine waak scraight an do all dem ting wa good , dem ting wa jes Jedus Christ able fa mek e people do . An dat gwine mek oda people gii glory an praise ta God .
50001012	Me bredren , A wahn oona fa know , wa done happen ta me done hep fa spread de Good Nyews .
50001013	All de sodja dem wa da gyaad de rula Caesar house , an all de oda people yah , dey know dat people pit me een de jailhouse cause A da wok fa Christ .
50001014	Fudamo , cause A dey yah een de jailhouse , mos ob de bredren hab mo courage een de Lawd , so dat mo an mo dey ain scaid fa tell people God wod , an dey ain warry bout wa people gwine do ta um .
50001015	Fa sho , some tell de Good Nyews bout Christ cause dey jealous ob me an dey wahn fa show dat dey da wok mo den me . Bot oda dem da tell bout Christ cause dey wahn fa do de right ting .
50001016	Dem people wa wahn fa do de right ting , dey da tell bout Christ cause dey lob me . Cause dey know God done pit me yah fa tell people de Good Nyews an show um dat e true .
50001017	De oda people wa jealous , dey tell de Good Nyews bout Christ , bot dey ain do dat wid clean haat . Dey jes wahn fa git head ob oda people . Dey mean fa mek me suffa mo yah een de jailhouse wen dey do dat .
50001018	Wa dey da do fa mek trouble fa me ain matta ta me tall . Wa matta mos , dat dey da tell people bout Christ . Ef dey da tell bout um fa Christ sake , or ef dey da tell bout um fa dey own sake , A heppy fa true cause dey da tell bout Christ , an A gwine be too heppy cause ob dat .
50001019	A know fa sho dat cause ob oona pray an de hep wa come fom de Sperit ob Jedus Christ , all dat wa done happen ta me gwine ton out fa set me free .
50001020	A da hope wid all me haat an A spect dat A ain neba gwine be shame cause A ain do wa A spose fa do . An A da hope an spect dat all de time , A gwine be scrong ef A dead or ef A ain dead , so dat ebryting A da do gwine mek people praise Christ .
50001021	Fa me own paat , Christ all me life , an ef A dead , A gwine git life wa mo betta den dis life yah .
50001022	Bot ef A keep on da lib , A kin do mo good wok fa Christ . So den , A ain know ef A wahn fa lib or fa dead .
50001023	Dey time A wahn fa lib , an dey time A wahn fa dead . Bot A wahn fa true fa stop da lib yah een dis ole wol an go fa lib wid Christ . Dat gwine be faa way mo betta fa me .
50001024	Bot e gwine be betta fa oona ef A keep on da lib yah een dis wol , so dat A kin hep oona .
50001025	Cause ob dat , A know A gwine stay yah . A ain gwine dead yet . A gwine keep on da lib an da hep all ob oona fa trus een Jedus Christ mo an mo , an fa hep oona git mo joy een oona fait .
50001026	A gwine do dis so dat wen A come fa see oona gin , oona gwine hab mo cause fa praise Jedus Christ , cause ob me hep ta oona .
50001027	So den , wa matta de mores , e dat oona lib de way dat de Good Nyews bout Christ say oona oughta lib . Den ef A come an see oona , or ef A jes yeh bout oona , A gwine know dat oona gwine stanop scrong fa Jedus . A gwine know dat oona all gree togeda fa fight fa de fait dat we wa bleebe de Good Nyews hab .
50001028	Mus dohn be scaid ob oona enemy dem . An dat gwine show um dat God gwine sabe oona , bot dey gwine git stroy .
50001029	Cause God gii oona dis chance fa saab Christ wen oona da trus een um , an wen oona da suffa fa e sake too .
50001030	Now oona da jine me een de fight fa de Good Nyews , jes like oona see me do wen A beena fight , an like A keep on da fight , jes like oona yeh .
50002001	Een oona life , oona all been jine togeda wid Christ , an dat da courage oona fa true , ainty ? Cause Christ lob oona , oona ain haffa warry , ainty ? An oona hab God Sperit dey eenside oona , da mek oona one wid um , ainty dough ? Oona saary fa one noda , an oona wahn fa do good ta one noda , ainty ?
50002002	So den , A da beg oona now fa mek me haat heppy fa see oona jine togeda fa be one een de way oona tink , lob one noda een de same way , an all gree togeda wid one haat an one mind fa do de wok .
50002003	Mus dohn do nottin jes cause oona wahn fa pit oonasef head ob oda people . Mus dohn do nottin jes cause oona wahn people fa praise oona . Mus dohn hab de big head . Stead ob dat , ebry one ob oona oughta treat de oda people mo betta den esef .
50002004	Ebry one ob oona mus dohn jes study bout how fa protec e own ting . Mus study bout how fa protec oda people ting too .
50002005	Oona oughta tink een oona haat same like Jedus Christ :
50002006	E been God fa true ,
50002007	Stead ob dat , Jedus gii op all e high place ,
50002008	E mek esef tek low an e been ready fa do all wa God tell um fa do ,
50002009	Cause ob dat , God raise um op an mek um hab high place ,
50002010	So dat , fa show hona ta de name ob Jedus ,
50002011	All dem gwine tell ebrybody out een de open , say , “ Jedus Christ , e de Lawd . ”
50002012	Me fren dem wa A lob sommuch , wa all de time do wa A tell oona fa do , ain jes wen A been dey wid oona , bot now eben mo so wen A ain dey wid oona , mus keep on da do wa A say . Mus try eben mo fa do all oona kin so dat God sabation een oona haat gwine git mo an mo greata . Oona oughta do dat , an know oona sponsable ta God an mus show um hona .
50002013	Cause God da wok eenside oona haat so dat oona wahn fa do wa e wahn , an so dat oona able fa do um .
50002014	Oona mus dohn grumble bout one noda an mus dohn aagy wensoneba oona da do sompin .
50002015	Den oona gwine hab clean haat , an oona gwine be chullun ob God dat ain mix op wid no sin , eben dough oona dey yah een de wol , wid people wa wickity an wa da lib bad life all de time . Den oona life gwine shine fa um like staa light op de sky .
50002016	Oona mus tell ebrybody de wod wa da mek um lib fa true . Den wen de day come dat Christ come back , A gwine be heppy fa true bout oona , cause oona life gwine show dat all de haad wok wa A done fa oona sake ain gone fa nottin .
50002017	Bot A heppy , an A da rejaice wid all ob oona , eben ef dey kill me an me blood git pour out like a offrin pon de sacrifice dat oona da mek ta God cause oona trus een Christ .
50002018	Same way so , oona oughta be heppy wid me .
50002019	A spect fa sen Timothy fa come ta oona tareckly , ef de Lawd Jedus wahn um dat way . Den wen e come back e kin tell me bout oona , an dat gwine courage me .
50002020	A ain got nobody else like Timothy , wa cyah bout oona de way e cyah bout oona . E da cyah bout oona fa true .
50002021	All dem oda jes da study bout how dey kin hep deysef . Dey ain study bout how dey kin hep fa tell people bout Jedus Christ .
50002022	Bot oona know Timothy been show e da do good wok . E da wok wid me jes like e me son an A e fada , fa hep mo an mo people bleebe de Good Nyews .
50002023	So den , A hope fa sen Timothy ta oona wensoneba A know wa gwine happen ta me .
50002024	An de Lawd mek me bleebe dat tareckly A , too , gwine come ta oona .
50002025	A mek op me mind dat A haffa sen me bredren Epaphroditus , fa go back ta oona . E beena do Christ wok wid me an been Christ sodja wid me fa fight fa Christ . E been oona messenja , wa oona sen fa hep me git wa A need .
50002026	Epaphroditus wahn fa see all ob oona too bad . E opsot cause oona yeh say e been sick .
50002027	Fa true , e been sick down , an e come neah ta det . Bot God hab mussy pon um , an e hab mussy pon me too , so A ain haffa be eben mo sad .
50002028	So den , dat mek me wahn eben mo fa sen Epaphroditus ta oona so dat wen oona shim , oona gwine be heppy gin , an den A ain gwine warry sommuch bout um .
50002029	Gim haaty welcome an rejaice dat e come ta oona , cause e oona broda een de Lawd . Oona oughta gii hona ta people like dat .
50002030	Cause fa de sake ob Christ wok , e pit e life een danja an e mos dead fa mek op fa de hep dat oona ain been able fa gii me .
50003001	Me Christian bredren , dis de las ting A wahn fa tell oona een dis letta . Oona oughta rejaice een de Lawd . Ain no trouble ta me fa write de same ting dem gin wa A been a write ta oona . An e mo safe fa oona ef A do dat .
50003002	Oona mus watch out fa dem people wa da do ebil . Dey jes like bad dog . Dey de people dat say all de man dem haffa git dey body cut .
50003003	Bot we de people wa been circumcise fa true . Cause God Sperit da hep we woshup God , an we da rejaice een we life een Jedus Christ . An we ain pit no hope een nottin dat people do ta dey body fa try fa show dat dey God people .
50003004	Now den , ef A been wahn fa pit me hope een dem ting , A able fa do dat fa sho . Ef somebody got a right fa tink e oughta pit e hope een wa people do ta dey body fa try fa show dat dey God people , A got a right fa tink dat way eben mo den dat one .
50003005	Cause eight day atta A bon , dey circumcise me . Me modda an me fada , dey Israel people . Dey blongst ta Benjamin fambly . An me ole people , dem all Hebrew people . A blongst ta de Pharisee group , so like dem , A beena do all dat de Jew Law say .
50003006	A been wahn fa wok fa God sommuch dat A beena mek de people wa blongst ta de choch , suffa . So as faa as somebody kin go fa keep de Jew Law dat mek all ting right twix dat poson an God , A done um . Ain nobody kin pint finga at me bout dat .
50003007	Bot all dem ting yah dat A been , an all dat A done do , all dat A nyuse fa say been walyable ta me , now A figga dey ain wot nottin , cause ob Christ .
50003008	Fa true , A figga dat ebryting yah een de wol ain mean nottin ta me , cause fa know Jedus Christ me Lawd , dat faa way mo walyable den all oda ting . Fa Christ sake , A done lef all ting . Dey ain no mo betta den gaabage ta me now , so dat A kin git dat wa walyable mo den all . A kin blongst ta Christ .
50003009	A wahn fa be one wid Christ . Ain no mo wa A da do , fa keep de Jew Law an tink say dat mek all ting right twix me an God . Now all ting right twix me an God cause A trus een Christ . God mek all ting right twix people an esef cause dem people trus een Christ , jes dat .
50003010	Now A jes wahn fa know Christ an e powa een me life , de powa wa mek um git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin . A wahn fa hab a paat een de way e suffa an een de way e dead ,
50003011	so A kin hab a paat een de way e git op fom mongst de dead an lib gin too .
50003012	A ain say A done do all wa God wahn me fa do , an A ain say A done come fa be all wa A oughta be een God eye . Bot A da try wid all me haat fa mek dat prize me own , cause Jedus Christ done mek me e own .
50003013	Me Christian bredren , fa sho , A ain yet win dat prize . A ain all wa A oughta be een God eye . Bot one ting A da do . A da do all dat A able fa do fa git ta wa dey head ob me . A ain pay no mind ta nottin dat done pass .
50003014	A da try wid all me haat fa git ta de end ob de race , so dat A kin git de prize , fa lib een heaben weh Jedus Christ da call me fa lib wid um .
50003015	We all wa trus een Christ fa true an wa beena grow op een we waak wid um , we oughta pit we mind pon dis way dat A da taak bout yah . Bot ef some ob oona ain gree wid dis way dat A da taak bout yah , God gwine mek oona ondastan um fa true .
50003016	An dis one ting A say , leh we keep on pon de same road dat done bring we yah .
50003017	Me Christian bredren , oona oughta do all dat oona see A da do . We been show oona de right way fa go . Oona oughta pay mind ta dem wa waak een dat way .
50003018	Cause like A done tell oona plenty time bout some people , an now as A da tell oona gin , da weep wen A say , de life dat plenty people lib mek um enemy ta Christ det pon de cross .
50003019	Dem people yah gwine be stroy een de end . Cause dey tek all wa dey wahn fa dey own body dem , an ton dat eenta dey god . Dey proud bout dem ting wa oughta mek um too shame . An dey pay mind all de time ta jes dem ting dey yah een dis wol .
50003020	Bot we blongst ta heaben . We look fowaad fa see we Sabior , de Lawd Jedus Christ .
50003021	Jedus got powa wa da mek um able fa rule oba all ting . An wid dat powa , e gwine change dem lowly body wa we got now , an e gwine gim glory , like e own body .
50004001	Me Christian bredren , wa A lob , fa true , A wahn fa see oona . Oona me joy an me payback fa me wok ! Now den , me deah bredren , pon all dat A beena say ta ya , ya mus stan scrong wiles ya da lib one wid de Lawd .
50004002	Euodia an Syntyche , A da beg oona , try fa gree togeda all de time like sista een de Lawd .
50004003	An ya too , wa da wok longside me fa true , A da beg ya fa hep dem two ooman yah , cause dey beena wok han ta han wid me , da tell mo an mo people de Good Nyews . Clement an all de oda res ob dem wa beena wok longside me , dey tell plenty people de Good Nyews too . An God done write down dey name een de book ob dem wa hab true life fom God .
50004004	Oona oughta rejaice all de time wiles ya do lib jine togeda wid de Lawd . A da tell ya gin say , “ Oona oughta rejaice ! ”
50004005	Leh all people see dat oona kin beah wid people . De Lawd nigh .
50004006	Mus dohn leh nottin warry oona . Steada dat , pray ta God bout all ting . Wen ya da pray , aks um fa wa ya need , an tell um tankya .
50004007	So den , God peace , wa we ain eben able fa ondastan , dat peace ain gwine leh nottin warry ya so dat ya haat an ya mind gwine be safe , cause ya one wid Jedus Christ .
50004008	Me Christian bredren , las ob all , A da tell ya , mus keep on da study bout jes dem ting wa good mo den all an wa people oughta gii praise fa . Study bout dem ting wa true , dem ting wa honorable , dem ting wa right een God eye , dem ting wa ain neba mek people sin , dem ting wa mek ya wahn fa lob um , an dem ting wa people know fa be good fa true .
50004009	Do dem ting A done laan oona . Mus do wa A beena tell ya fa do an wa ya see dat A da do . An God wa da gii we peace , e gwine be dey wid oona .
